1b1(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA su bA cu pa ri prid tsA nA ma ma hA yA na sA tra/ bod skad du/
1b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa lag bzang gis pa zhus pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// // sangs rgyas dang /
1b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal zem/
1b4(dkon brtsegs): khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka'i gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu zhugs te/ de'i tshe byang chub
1b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzang zhes bya ba g.yog dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/
2a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od ma'i chos byug lad+ha ka'i gnas gas ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gas ba der song ste
2a2(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs
2a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzang gis
2a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bar btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
2a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldanan/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
2b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
2b2(dkon brtsegs): bzang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag bzang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
2b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// drug gi nga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa
2b4(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dbartson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
2b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ lag bzang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa
2b6(dkon brtsegs): rol tu drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// lag bzang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji sar sbyin
3a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
3a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ni chos kyis long spyod rnams yongasu tshol gyi/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no// mnyam pas yin gyi mi mnyam pas ni ma
3a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de srog chags gzhon ngag dang / sems can gnan rnams la gnod pa mi byed/ nyam nga bar mi byed par sbyid pa sbyin
3a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'dzes pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin//
3a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/ tshul 'chos pa ma yin/ kha gsag byed pa ma yin/ brnyas pa ma yin
3a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// sbyin gnas sam/ sbyin gnas ma yin pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa'am/ mngon par shes ma yin pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang
3b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ 'dris pa 'am/ ma 'dris pa 'am/ mdza' ba 'am/ mi mdza' ba la yang rung ste/ bkur stir/
3b2(dkon brtsegs): byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod pa byed cing / 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos de nyung ngu bdog na yang
3b3(dkon brtsegs): nyung ngu sbyin/ mang du bdog na yang mang du sbyin/ ngan pa bdog na yang ngan pa sbyin/ gya nom pa bdog na yang gya nom pa sbyin no// lag bzang ji ltar byang
3b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' brgya stong byin pa dang / rlabs po che'i sems dang / rang sa pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de bzhin du/ ka ka ni tsam yang sbyin zhing
3b5(dkon brtsegs): rlabs po che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin no// de zas 'dod pa rnams la sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na
3b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i stobs kyis brtan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir zas spyon// skom 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad bsal ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir
4a1(dkon brtsegs): sgo sbyin no// gos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i gos thob par bya ba'i
4a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir gos sbyin no// bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na
4a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bzhon pa sbyin no// spos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi dri ba sung thams cad
4a4(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir spos sbyin no// me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun gyi me tog
4a5(dkon brtsegs): na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir me tog rnams sbyin ro// bye ma 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyes par spyod pa'i dri mnga' ba'i dri ma ga
4a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i byeng bye ma skyed ro// drug pa 'dod pa rnams sa ni sems can nyes pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / srung pa'i drug pa thob pa
4b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir byug paskyid do// gdugs 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i gdung nga thams cad nye ba zhi ba'i stobs thong par bya ba'i phyir gdugs sbyor/
4b2(dkon brtsegs): lhar 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad bla ra med pa'i bde ba mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lham sbyir ro// mal ma 'dod pa rnams la ni sems cad tham cad
4b3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / rlangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i gnas pa'i mal cha yi bde bar sbyar ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir mo la ma sbyin no// stan 'dod pa nas la ni sems can thams cad
4b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying por 'dud pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi phyed pa/ dpa' ba'i snyan thob par bya ba'i phyir skyid do// garas 'dod pa rnam
4b5(dkon brtsegs): la ni sems can thams cad skyabs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir gnas sbyin no// phyi tog dang / dus pa dang / 'jog
4b6(dkon brtsegs): rmas 'dod pa rnas la ni sems can thams cad chos kyi rdzing lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir pra tog dang / dum pa dang / 'chog chos sbyin no// sems can thams cad bde ba dang
4b7(dkon brtsegs): nye ba shi ba bla na med pa'i ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dka' thub kyi nags tshal srir
4b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do// sems cad thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thongab par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten rnams pa/
4b9(dkon brtsegs): rgyud sbyid pa skyid do// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan mtha' yas pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mur khrod kyi mchod rten dam/ lam rnams la mar ro
4b10(dkon brtsegs): sgyid po skyid ro// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i sta mtha' yas pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams sam/ chos la mchod pa nar
4b11(dkon brtsegs): sam dge 'dun la mchod pa rnams rol mo'i dbyangs su sbyid pa sbyid do// sems can thams cad dra byad dang / tshul khrims dang / spyod pa mdzes pa bla na med pa 'tsha
4b12(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang / chos gos sbyin pa skyid ro// sems can thams cad dbugs byung ba'i spyod pa'i stobs rnyed par bya ba'i phyir chags sbyin pa skyid do// sems
4b13(dkon brtsegs): can thams ca shes rab chen po'i tshogs yongs su bskong ba 'thob par bya ba'i phyir smyug gu dang / sdig ra dang / glegs bu dang / chos kyi khri sngar skyid do// sems can thams
4b14(dkon brtsegs): cad kyin mongs pa'i dang thams cad gsos pa'i phyi na nga'i gsos snod dang / yi byad sbyid pasbyor do// sems cad thams cad byang chub rnam pa gsum gyis dang / da/
4b15(dkon brtsegs): 'i dbyings kyis 'tho ba pa bya ba'i phyir sa skyed pa skyed do// sems can thams cad slob dpon med pa'i dam pa'i chos 'gron pa 'grib par bya ba'i phyir/ mchod de na/
4b16(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir byug pa skyed do// gdugs 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad nye bar ni pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir gdugs spyir/
4b17(dkon brtsegs): lham 'dod pa rnams la ri sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lham sbyin no// mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni sems cad tham cad
4b18(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / rlangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i gnas pa'i mal cha yi bde bar sbyar ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyi'i mo la cha sbyin no// stan 'dod pa rnas la ni sems can thams cad
4b19(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying por 'dud pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi phyed pa/ dpa' ba'i stan thob par bya ba'i phyir sbyin no// gnas 'dod pa rna
4b20(dkon brtsegs): la ni sems can thams cad skyabs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir gnas sbyin no// phra tog dang / bum pa dang / 'tshog
4b21(dkon brtsegs): chas 'dod pa rnas la ni sems can thams cad chos kyi rdzing lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir phra tog dang / bum pa dang / 'chog chos sbyin no// sems can thams cad bde ba dang
4b22(dkon brtsegs): nye shi ba bla na med pa'i ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dka' thub kyi nags tshal sbyin
5a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sbyin no// sems cad thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshad sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten rnams la/
5a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyud sbyin pa srid do// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan mtha' yas pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mun khrod kyi mchod rten dam/ lam rnams la mar me
5a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin po spyir ro// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan mtha' yas pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams sam/ chos la mchod pa rnam
5a4(dkon brtsegs): sam dge 'dun la mchod pa rnams rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sbyin pa sbyid ro// sems can thams cad cha byad dang / tshul khrims dang / spyod pa mdzes pa bla na med pa 'thob
5a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang / chos gos sbyin pa sbyid no// sems can thams cad dbugs byung ba'i skyid pa'i stobs rnyed par bya ba'i phyir chags sbyin pa sbyin ro// sems/
5a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad shes rab chen po'i tshogs yongs su bsring ba 'thob par bya ba'i phyir smug gu dang / sdig ra dang / glegs bu dang / chos kyi khri skar skyid do// sems can thams
5a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dang thams cad gnom pa'i phyir na pa'i gsos slod dang / sa byed sbyi pa sbyid do// sems can thams cad byang chu rnam pa gsum gyis dang /
5a8(dkon brtsegs): ci'i dbyings kyis 'ayo ba bya ba'i byings spyod paskyed do// sems can thams cad srong dpo med pa'i das pa'i chos 'azod pa 'gro bar bya ba'i byor/ mdzad rdzo/
5b1(dkon brtsegs): bo dang sku gzugs mthon po byed do// kha dog bltan sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa myur ba 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/ myur zhing yongs su nyon mongs par ma
5b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur par spyod pa spyod do// sems can thams cad bar du gcod pa med pa mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rung ba skyon gyi/ rung ba ma yin pa ni
5b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// sems can thams cad spobs pa chen po yongs su mi 'chad pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su mi gcod par sbyin pa sbyar ro// sems can thams cad
5b4(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po mtshungs pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sbyin pa sbyin no// sems cad thams cad bdud dang / mu stegs byed pa pa thams cad
5b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis chang mi gcod pa dang / gdod par mi nus pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub mngon par bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan la mi gnod par skyed pa sbyin no// lag bzang
5b6(dkon brtsegs): gal te byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin du nor med cing / 'byor pa med par gyur na/ de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ sems can la sbyin pa mtha'
5b7(dkon brtsegs): sa shing dpag tu med pa 'di dag sbyin par yid kyis 'dod cing spor la/ smor lam 'debs te/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' do sbyir pa 'di dag sbyir ba'i nus pa dang
5b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yang rung / nus pa dang mi ldan pa yang rung ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems cad thams cad bdag gi bde bsgyur ba nyid dang ldan pa dang
6a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ldan par gyur cing / 'bad pa med pa dang / 'dod pa med par bajug pa rnams thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa
6a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi thams cad du shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing bsam pa ma lus par yongs su rdzogs nas/ bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur bar bdag gi deng bzang
6a3(dkon brtsegs): bor gyur cig/ bdag gi de dge bar gyur cig ces/ de ltar yid kyis 'did cing sprin la spod lam 'debs// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sem
6a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la rin po che'i rgya mtsho yang sbyi par 'dod cing sngon lam 'debaso// dbyig gi'i dang / gser gyi 'i dang / gos kyi dang / yo byad thams cad
6a5(dkon brtsegs): ri dang bza' ba rgya mtsho dang / btong ba rgya mtsho dang / gnas legs par byas pa/ legs par gnas pa/ mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa dag kyang sbyi
6a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod cing smod lam 'debs so// 'khor ba'i srid pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
6a7(dkon brtsegs): ltang byung ba thams cad kyi sbyid pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ngagang yin pa/ zang zing sbyid pa'am/ mi 'jigs paskyid pa'am/ chos sbyin pa ma lus pa de /
6a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la/ tha dus gsum du yang mngon par dga' ning mngon par rjes su yi rang ngo // gal te de la bslangs nor sbyin mi nos na yang / rang gi zan skam sbyin pa
6b1(dkon brtsegs): grogs su gyur pa'al/ ku tu btsal ba'o thabs kyang del ston par 'gyur// chos kyi gtam gyis de'i da pasem par byed// de na pa du par gyur
6b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod de sems can thams cad bskal pa dang / sems can tha sa cad bskos pa dang / sems can thams cad drugs dbyung bdang / mas pa
6b3(dkon brtsegs): cang yongs su ma nganalas 'da' ba dang / zas cad mkhyen pa nyid the bapar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir blan med pa
6b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su 'gyu'o// sbyin pa dang / mas cad mkhyen pa pad ma par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mams cad yongs su
6b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// gal te sbyid pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba de la stong pa/
6b6(dkon brtsegs): nus pa dang ro ldan par gyur na/ de yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang chags pa dang ser sna dang / sbyin pas 'jigs pa spang ba/
6b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus du su 'am/ cung zad zad du yang sbyin pa dang / rnam par gtong ba la slob pa dang / mngon par
6b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid du gzhon du gyur yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur
6b9(dkon brtsegs): na na mas
6'a1(dkon brtsegs): lag parangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bskam
6'a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub tu spod pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de de dag gi sbyin pa chen po dang / gtong ba chen po dang / rnam par gtong brtson pa dang / rnam par
6'a3(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba chen pa grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos kyi char sbyin pa
6'a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi cha sbyin par 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char gtong dang 'dod pa dang / bdud kyi dbyings kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi
6'a5(dkon brtsegs): chacha rnam par btong bar 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba thams cad kyi nang na mchog yin no/
6'a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / chags cung ngu dang / sdug bsngal nu dus myur du sbyin pa'i ba'o/
6'a7(dkon brtsegs): byin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lag parangs byang chub sems dpa' ni srong pa rnams kyis bsrings pasar/ mdolag dang shing lag gcod dam pa tsa nas kyang gams
6'a8(dkon brtsegs): la'i gyur ro// de ci'i phyi na no// de dag nyid kyi sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / mi dge ba'i las chen pa rgya chen yongs su spong ba'i phyir ro// sam
6'a9(dkon brtsegs): grogs su 'gyur ba'am/ kun tu btsal ba'i thabs kyang de la ston par 'gyur ro// chos kyi gtam gyis de'i 'dod pa sel bar byed do// de sbyid par 'dod par gyur pa
6'a10(dkon brtsegs): na yang sbyid pa de sems cad thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems cad thams cad bsgrol ba dang / sems cad thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems cad kyang
6'a11(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / thas cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bA med pa
6'a12(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// sbrid pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thong bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
6'a13(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// gal te sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba de la slob pa'i
6'a14(dkon brtsegs): nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang chags pa dang ser sna dang / sbyid pas 'jigs pa spang ba
6'a15(dkon brtsegs): dang dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus du su 'am/ cung zad zad du yang sbyin pa dang / rnam par gtong ba la slob pa dang / mngon par
6'a16(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid du gzhon du gyur yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/
6'a17(dkon brtsegs): lag 'dzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom
6'a18(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub tu smodan pa dang / byang chub tu smod lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de de dag gi sbyin pa chen po dang / gtong ba chen po dang / rnam par gtong ba chen pa dang / rnam par
6'a19(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba chen po grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos kyi char sbyin pa
6'a20(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi ma sbyin par 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char gtong dang 'dod pa dang / bdud kyi dbyings kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi
6'a21(dkon brtsegs): cha rnam par btong bar 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba thams cad kyi nang na mchog yin no/
6'a22(dkon brtsegs): deni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde pa dang ldan la/ yid 'dre ba dang ldan zhing / tshogs cung ngu dang / sdug bsngal nu dus myur du sbyin pa'i pa
6'a23(dkon brtsegs): byin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lag padangs byang chub sems dpa' ni spang ba rnams kyis bslangs pas na/ mdol ga dang nying lag gcod dam ba ba nas sring parnams
6'a24(dkon brtsegs): 'a gyur ro// ji ci'i byo nin/ de dag nyid kyi sems cad dmyal bachen por 'gyur ba dang / mi dge pa'i las ched pa rgya chen yongs su spong ba'i phyir ro// sems
6'b1(dkon brtsegs): gnan gyi pi ram/ sems can gzhan gyi ched la de rang gi yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su mi gtong ba ni ma yin no// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
6'b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po ni slong bas bdog pa thams cad bslangs na/ pha ma la gnod pa byas spangs te/ sdug bsngal bar byas/ bu dang / nung pa dang / dran pa dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa
6'b3(dkon brtsegs): dang zhogs 'tsho ba la/ gdod pa byas shing dngangs te/ sdug bsngal bar byas nas bdog pa thams cad slong brnams la sbyid par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
6'b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' thams cad la mtshungs par snying brtse ba yin te/ ji ltar pha ma la gnod par mi byed cing mi spong la sdug bsngal bar mi byed pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / brang po
6'b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho la gnod pa mi byed cing mi spong ste/ sdug bsngal bar mi byed par sbyin pa sbyin pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la
6'b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa gas par byed do// de ni sems cad gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems can gzhan gyi tshod la bdog pa thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yang ma yin no// lag
6'b7(dkon brtsegs): zangs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gnod pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsung ba ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang lag bcad pa de
6'b8(dkon brtsegs): ga gar 'gyur/ lag pa 'das byang chub sems dpa'ong ba tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cen/ lag bzangs 'dis byang chu
6'b9(dkon brtsegs): sems dang 'di srog gi phyir yang srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gan rnams la minag/ mi gsod cing / gsod papa
6'b10(dkon brtsegs): rjes su sa rang bar mi byed de// srog gi phyi'i yang ma byid par mi yin la/ mabyin par len du mi 'jug cing / ma byin par len la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed du/
6'b11(dkon brtsegs): srog gi phyir yang 'dod pal log par gsom mi byed la/ 'dod pa la log par g.yel pa byed du ma 'jug cing / 'dod pa la log pa ga sem pa la rjes su mi rang
6'b12(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang brdzun du mi sma la brdzun ze du mi 'jug cing brdzun sna ba la rjes yi rang ba mi byed do// sreg gi phyir yang 'ang mi 'thung 'chang 'a thung du mi 'jug
6'b13(dkon brtsegs): 'jang 'thung ba la rjes su mi ring 'o rom byed do// de bas pa'i gzhi lnga po de dgal ring du gnas shing / brtan pa'i gnaso la/ dam por gnas te/ mi lhod pa ga
6'b14(dkon brtsegs): shing bsgyur ba// de bzhin du zhing rmed pa dang / zhing rmed du 'jug pa dang / 'ching ba dang 'ching du 'jug pa dang / gorang 'jug pa dang / gorang gzhug tu 'jug pa dang
6'b15(dkon brtsegs): brdeg pa dang / brdeg tu 'jug pa dang / gcod pa dang / gcod du 'jug pa dag sung ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar 'bad par byed do// de de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi la
6'b16(dkon brtsegs): ga du gnas shing / ba pa gnas pa dam pa gnas te/ ma pa gnas pa zlabs// de bzhin du tha ba tshig da / ngag rtsub po dang / ga
6'b17(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi phyir pa/ sems can gnan gyi med la de rang gi yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su mi gtong ba ni ma yin do// lag pa 'angs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
6'b18(dkon brtsegs): ched po ni spong bas 'dog pa thams cad bslangs na/ ba ma la gnod pa byas spangs te/ sdug bsngal bar byas/ bu dang / chung ba dang / dran pa dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa
6'b19(dkon brtsegs): dang zhogs 'tsho ba la/ gdod pa byas shing dngangs te/ sdug bsngal bar byas nas bdog pa thams cad spong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
6'b20(dkon brtsegs): nub sems dpa' thams cad la mtshungs pa'i snying brtse ba yin te/ ji ltar pha ma la gnod par mi byed cing mi spong la sdug bsngal bar mi byed pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / brad po
6'b21(dkon brtsegs): dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tshol gnod pa mi byed cing mi spong ste/ sdug bsngal bar mi byed par sbyin pa sbyir ba de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la
6'b22(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par gas par byed do// de ni sems cad gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems can gzhan gyi ched la bdog pa thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yang ma yin no// lag
6'b23(dkon brtsegs): zangs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gnod pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsung ba ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag bcad pa de
6'b24(dkon brtsegs): ltar ga la 'gyur/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub
7a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni srog gi phyir yang srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gzhan rnams la mi rtag/ mi gsod cing / gsod pa la
7a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mi 'ang bar mi byed do// srog gi pir yang ma byin par mi len la/ ma byin par len du mi 'jug cing / ma byin par len pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
7a3(dkon brtsegs): srog gi phyir yang 'dod pa la log par g.yom mi byed lo/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed du 'jug cing / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa la rjes su mi rang
7a4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang 'ardzun du mi sprul brdzun zer du mi 'jug cing brdzun sgru ba la rjes yi rang ba'am byed do// srog gi phyir yang cang mi 'thung 'chang 'thung du mi 'jug
7a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chang 'thung ba la rjes su yi rang po rom byed do// de bsra pa pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag la ring du gnas shing / brtan po'i gnas la/ dam por gnas te/ mi lhod pa gan
7a6(dkon brtsegs): shing bsgrub ba// de bzhin du zhing rmed pa dang / zhing rmed du 'jug pa dang / 'ching ba dang 'ching du 'jug pa dang / go rang 'jug pa dang / gorang gzhug tu 'jug pa dang
7a7(dkon brtsegs): brdeg pa dang / 'jig tu 'jug pa dang / gcod pa dang / gcod du 'dug pa dag spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsam pa'a' dpar byed do// de de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi la
7a8(dkon brtsegs): po dag la 'di du gnas dang / bdan pa gnas la dam par gnas te/ mi sri par gnas shi sgrub ba// de bzhin du tha ma'i tshig dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig la
7b1(dkon brtsegs): spang ba dang / 'o pa dang / bsal bar 'dab par byed do// de srog chags thams cad dang sems can thams cad ni bdag gipa ma'i lta ba bzhin no// bu cig pa 'jong
7b2(dkon brtsegs): baji lta ba bzhin te/ ji ltar ba ma dang / bu cig pa 'phangs pa dga' khu yang slar 'khu bar mi byal/ lag pa 'am/ dong ba'am/ dbyug pa'am/ ral gri'am
7b3(dkon brtsegs): mda' brdegs kyang slar brdeg par mi bya/ gsod kyang sbar bsad par mi bya zhing / ji ltar pha ma dang / bu cig pa 'phangs pa 'khu yang slar 'khu bar mi bya ba de bzhin
7b4(dkon brtsegs): du/ bdag srog chags thams cad dang / sems can gyis lag pa'am/ bong ba'am/ dbyig pa'am/ ral gri'am/ mdas brdegs kyang spang brdeg par mi bya
7b5(dkon brtsegs): gsod kyang slar gsod par mi bya'o// zhes de ltar slob bo// dper na pa'am/ ma 'am/ bu cig pa pa'am pa yul ring por yul rgyus te/ 'ongs pa mthong na/ dga'
7b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing yid bde bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' yang srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba dang
7b7(dkon brtsegs): yid bde bar 'gyur ro// srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims srog gcod pa spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro//
7b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams mi cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims ma byin par len pa spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i 'dod pa
8a1(dkon brtsegs): pa log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims tshangs par spyod pa la dgo pa'i phyir ro// de'i rdzun du smra
8a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims brdzun du sra ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i 'chang 'thung ba spongs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad
8a3(dkon brtsegs): mi spong ba'i tshul khrims 'chang 'thu nga spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i zhing rmed pa dang / zhing rmed du 'jug pa spangs pa'i se tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad rdo rje ltar mi
8a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i ting nge 'a rin thob bar bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'ching ba dang / 'ching du 'jug pa'i spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcad
8a5(dkon brtsegs): da phyir/ de'i gor ga zhugs pa dang / gorang gzhug tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi 'gro lnga 'gag pa dang / bsal ba'i phyir ro//
8a6(dkon brtsegs): ngo brdeg pa dang / brdeg du'adug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems cad la bzhugs pa dang / gorar gzhug tu 'jug pa thams cad bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgring pabar du
8a7(dkon brtsegs): sa sa kyis tshas gyis la gad pa'i chos stong ba bya 'gyur/ de'i gcad pa dang / gtsad dul gyibasas brtul khrims de sems pa thams pa sa
8a8(dkon brtsegs): nga ri kyis las sasus 'grib bar bya bar phyi'o// de dri tshogasas pa rgyas thangs nig ga dmas kyi dge 'dud na mo byed pa 'a
8b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig rtsub bro spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni yan lag lnga pa'i ngag gi lam dang ldan pa'i rgyangs pa'i dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig 'khyal ba spangs pa'i tshul khrilas
8b2(dkon brtsegs): ni tshig bzung bar 'os pa thogs pa med pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / rgal
8b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gzhan gyi nor dang
8b4(dkon brtsegs): yo byad 'jig cing rlud za ba yongs su skyong pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nor bla na med pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gzhan gyi bud med la
8b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa gdeng bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed pa du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni 'khrul pa'i med pa'i chos nyid 'thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'gug pa gdong bar byed pa dang / gtong
8b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni rang gi sems la dbang 'thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'ching ba 'grol ba dang / 'grol du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo yi stan byang chub
8b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying por bdud kyi dalag dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'chad gshig pa'i phyir ro// de'i khyim nas byung ba'i tshul khrims ni sems rnam par grol ba'i sgrib pa med pa 'thob par bya ba'i phying
8b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i bdeg pa tshugs pa'i tshul khrims ni mi 'jigs pa bzhis/ 'jigs pa yang dag par gzhom pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gcod pa zlog pa'i tshul khrims ni kun tu
9a1(dkon brtsegs): bsrung nga'i chos bzhi 'thod par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i mi sU nga'i tshig smra pa'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i bstan byang chub kyi snying bdud dang / nyon mongs
9a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgrib nga'adu gcod pa thams cad kyi mi slu ba'i chos nyid 'thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i bye ba rnams kyi sdums byed cing mdza' ba brtan par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni/ g.yog 'phags
9a3(dkon brtsegs): nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun po mi byed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig snyad pa dang / 'jam po smra ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi rnang bde zhing snying du 'ong la bde ba'i ngag thob
9a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i kun tu mthun pa smra ba'i rdul khrims ni chang mi chod cing bzung bar 'os la 'bras bu yod pa'i chos pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi
9a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i yod tan dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / daltar byung
9a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa grangs med pa rnams la dus gsum du yan
9a7(dkon brtsegs): lag las btugs te phyag 'das par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad dpa' bo'i san byang chub kyi snying por mi byed cing / sral shin tu brtan pa'i dang
9a8(dkon brtsegs): da btsun 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab mchog gichos nyid dam pa lnga thong bar bya ba byor ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi
9b1(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang bathob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du chos kyi yon tan
9b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa sla nga'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnas med pa bla na med pa bskor ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge 'dun gyi yon tan brjod pa sna ba'i tshul khrims ni
9b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi byed pa'i g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la skyobs su 'gro ba'i rdul khrims ni/ sems can
9b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la skyabs bla na med pa sbyin pa'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams su thams cad dkon mchog gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
9b5(dkon brtsegs): stongs par mi 'gyur bar gsol po 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni bde bar 'gyur bar gcig tu nges par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgya
9b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bskal par chos ston pa gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin thob par bya ba'i phyir dus gsum du sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang
9b7(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa thams cad so sor 'dor ba dang / sdig pa thams cad smod pa'i tshul khrims ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//
9b8(dkon brtsegs): de dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de dus
9b9(dkon brtsegs): gsum du sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags panyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rnams ca
9b10(dkon brtsegs): du gtogs pa 'das dang / mdzangs pa dang / dgang byung bathams cad dang / sems can 'gro ba thams cad hru pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtugs
9b11(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / ma'ongs pa dang / dkar byung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi tshogs mtha' yas shing dpag tu med
9b12(dkon brtsegs): pa bsags pa yongs su rdzogs su rdzogs par byas pa'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa'i tshul khrims ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nges pa'i 'jug
9b13(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims ni/ gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
9b14(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i pha ma dang / bla la dang / rgad pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rdul khrims ni zil gyis mi gnon
9b15(dkon brtsegs): nga'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'jig rten dang / skad pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon med pa dbugs pa'i rdul khrims ni dris pa thams cad la skyo bar lan 'dabs
9b16(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / medang nu dang / 'gorgal la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi nang du nad pa rnams yongs su sgrub cing grags
9b17(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du chos kyi yon tan
9b18(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa sba ba'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnas med pa bla na med pa bskor ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge 'dun gyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni
9b19(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi phyed pa'i g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la skyebs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can
9b20(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la skyabs bla na med pa sbyin pa'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams su thams cad dkon mchog gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
9b21(dkon brtsegs): stongs par mi 'gyur bar gsol po 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni bde bar 'gyur bar gcig tu nges par rdzogs pa'i byang chubagrob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgya
9b22(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bskal par chos ston pa gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin thob par bya ba'i phyir dus gsum du sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang
9b23(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa thams cad so sor 'dor ba dang / sdig pa thams cad smod pa'i tshul khrims ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//
9b24(dkon brtsegs): de dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de dus
10a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum du sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
10a2(dkon brtsegs): du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / daltar byung ba thams cad dang / sems can 'gro ba thams cad dung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa
10a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / dkar byung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi tshogs mtha' yas shing dpag tu med
10a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bsags pa yongs su rdzogs su rdzogs par byas pa'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa'i tshul khrims ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nges pa'i 'jug
10a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims ni/ gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
10a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i pha ma dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / bsnyen dkur byed nga'i tshul khrims ni zil gyis mi gnon
10a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'jig rten dang / srang pa dang / nyam lag pa dang / mgon med pa dadugs pa'i dul khrings ni dris pa sems cad la skyo ba ya 'das
10a8(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pathong ngo bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / medang chu dang / bgazhal la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi nang du can pa rnams yongs su sub cing grags
10b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul khrims ni gnas dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yongs su bsrung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan
10b2(dkon brtsegs): thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rjes su bsngags pa'i tshul khrims ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bla na med pa thob par bya
10b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// de'i pha rol gyi sems pa rjes su bsrung ba dang / mthun pa'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par
10b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims ni/ pha rol gyi sems rjes su bsrung ba dang / mthun pa'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems mngon
10b5(dkon brtsegs): par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol gyi sems mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa thob par
10b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshe 'di'i don dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi don dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i don dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i don dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg
10b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don rnams la bag med pa dang / brjed pa rnams kyis dran pa yang dag skyed pa'i tshul khrims dang / dran pa 'byung bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni/ brjod pa med pa'i chos nyid
10b8(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos goms par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nye bar ston pa'i tshul
11a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskang bathob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshul khrims yang
11a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par len par 'dod pa dang / lhag pa'i spyod par 'dod pa na yang lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang
11a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bar sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
11a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// yang dag par 'dzin par dang / lhag par spyod pa dang / yang dag par blangs pa dang / lhag par spyad nas kyang se
11a5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bskal ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byang dang /
11a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi tshes khams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsro bar byedado// gal ldanal khrims de zhig pa dang / mngal ba dang / 'dud mam
11a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa sko ba'i nus pa dang mi ldan pa gyur na/ de 'di na yang dge par skyeb ste/ dus dus sul/ zung ba dadu mang mi dge zasang dang /
11a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yul lo // des dus sa ma/ cung me kyang nga dag ma zod / 'an pa ma 'a bya ba dang / sengs su rdzogs pa
11b1(dkon brtsegs): stsol lo/ 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag gzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu se
11b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sgom pa dang / byang chub smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid
11b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyod pa grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen
11b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag med pa'i tshul khrims skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob nga'i tshul khrims skyes par 'dod
11b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni/ dge ba'i tshul khrims
11b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin pa dang dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyod pa'i chog pa yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
11b7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / tshe gso rlung dang / sdug bsngal chu dus myur du skyed par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
11b8(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems
12a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni gzhan dag gis rang gi srog gcod dam/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog gam/ chung ma 'phrog gam/ brdzun du smra 'am/ bra ma dang / ngag rtsub
12a2(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / tshig khyal ba sgru'am/ gshe'am/ gsod dam/ 'dzin nam/ brdeg gam/ gcod kyang slar gnod par mi byed cing skar mi khra ste/ shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin
12a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed do// de 'di ltar yang dag par slong ste/ bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi srid pa rnams dang / srid pa la 'di sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa de dag gi
12a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu 'di yin/ de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu dang / rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag gis myong ba la ci'i phyir gzhan dag la sngar
12a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod par bya zhing / srar khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin par bya ba snyam du sems so// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob
12a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gal te bdag gi srog gcod pa'am/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog pa'am/ chung ma 'phrog pa'am/ brdzun du smra ba'am/ phra ma 'am/ ngag nul po'am/ tshig
12a7(dkon brtsegs): khyal pa'am/ gzhi ba'am/ gsod pa'am/ brdeg 'am/ gcod pa'ang rung / gzhan dag sur gdod pa byas sam/ skar khro'am/ shar gnyer zhing khon du'adzi
12a8(dkon brtsegs): / slar gdod pa byas pa dang / srar khros pa dang / shar gnyer zhing khor du bzung ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa/ yid du mi'ong
12b1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ngas/ bdag la las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / brgya gyur tam/ stong gyur tam/ de bas lhag par mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang
12b2(dkon brtsegs): yid du ni ring nga'i sdug bsngal gzhan yang 'gyur bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ sreg yod pas
12b3(dkon brtsegs): srog gcod par 'gyur/ rdzas yod pas rdzas 'phrog par 'gyur/ rna ba'i dbang po yod pas brdzun du smra ba thos par 'gyur/ bra ma dang / ngag rngub ma dang /
12b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khyal thob par 'gyur la/ lus yod na pas 'dren pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / brdeg pa dang / gcod par gyur te/ bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal gyi
12b5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po sdug bsngal bzhi po// srog gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / lus blangs par gyur na/ ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang / srar khro ba dang / shar
12b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyer zhing khon du bzung bar bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par spo ba ste/ dper na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni sra bas
12b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni ngo bo nyid/ don chos nyid de ni rang bzhin no// chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gnyer ba/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni che ba/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni yang zhi ga
12b8(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni rang bzhin no// de bzhin du srog chags thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos can no//
13a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te/ reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can no//
13a2(dkon brtsegs): lus thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos te/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni rang bzhin yin
13a3(dkon brtsegs): srog gi dbang po zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos can/ zad cing dengs la 'gog pa dang / dbang po drug po// sdug bsngal gyi chos can
13a4(dkon brtsegs): sdubang bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can rnams la sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pas/ ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa'am/ slar
13a5(dkon brtsegs): khro ba 'am/ shang gnyer zhing khon du bzung bar bya'o// de ci'i pir zhe na/ 'di ngo bo nyid/ 'di ni chos nyid/ 'di ni rang bzhin yin no// snyam mo// lag bzang gzhan
13a6(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chung sems dpa' 'dis yang dgapa slobaste/ bdag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / swA dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag gi med pa yin la/ gzhan dag/
13a7(dkon brtsegs): gicig dang / rna ba dang / swA dang / sne dang / lus dang / yid bdag gi med cing bdag med pa yin no// mkhas pas rig pa dag mig dang / rna ba dang / swA dang /
13a8(dkon brtsegs): da lus dang / yid bdag med cing / bdag gi medapal mig dang / rnang dang / swa dang / waM dang / lus dang / si dag dang bdag gi me pas
13b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar dga' nga'am/ rjes su chags pa'am/ yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'am/ brdeg pa'am/ slar gnod par byed pa'am/ slar khro ba 'am
13b2(dkon brtsegs): shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar slob ste/ 'di lta ste/ ming skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ni nyung zhing
13b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing chung gi/ yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal ni ches mi zad la/ ches zod par dka' ba yin/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i
13b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang ches mi zad cing / bzod par dka' ba yin na/ bdag gis ji ltar sdug bsngal zhing nyung ba tsam gyi phyir/ gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang
13b5(dkon brtsegs): slar khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du bzung bar bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang dag gcig
13b6(dkon brtsegs): bu'i don 'dod pa dang / bdag gcig phu la phan par 'dod pas/ gzhan dag la phyir gnod par byed cing phyir khro ste/ shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa de yang mi rigs te
13b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam yin na/ bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi don 'dod pas/ 'jig rten thams cad phan par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ yid dam pa bcas pa chen
13b8(dkon brtsegs): pos yi dam bcas pa/ yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen por yongs su bkang bar 'dod pa la smos kyang ci dgos te/
14a1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang / phyir gnod par byed pa dang / phyir khro ba dang / shang gte zhing du 'dzin pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs pa dang
14a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur gyi/ bzod pa dang / phyir gnod pa mi byed pa dang / phyir mi khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa mi byed pas/ sangs
14a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos 'di dag sogs shing 'brel te yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam mo// lag bzangs rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba
14a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas/ mdang med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi reg pas reg kyang / gzhan dag la skar gnod mi nga/ slar khro bar mi bya/ shang gnyer zhing khon du bzung bar mi bya na/ mi'i
14a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyis reg ngas lha spos kyang ci dgos/ de smos sapa/ brgya ngam/ slad dam ma snyan par byas kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / de bzhin
14a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i thugs shin tu dri ma med cing dag la dkar ba thob pang bya ba'i bzod pacing dang du len to// de drang shal tam/ bcings sam/ bzung yang byams pa'i sems dang
14a7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje'i sems dang / skad cig gcig la ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i slong 'isrungs gnam pa'i phyir brjod cing dang du len to// de brdegs kyang rung / byams pa'i sems dang
14a8(dkon brtsegs): gang rje'i sems dang / sems can gyi rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bo zlog pa'i phyir brjod cing dang du len to// den pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje
14b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / sems can thams cad dang bar bya ba'i rjes kyi rna la bskyed pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to// des bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang
14b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad nul khrims kyi yon tan mdzes shing blan med pa la longs spyod bang ba ba'i phyi'i ri zad cing dang du len to// de nang pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dpa
14b3(dkon brtsegs): sI rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pozhi thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing la dang du len to// de log pa bcad kyang rnams pa'i
14b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / snying rje'i sems/ sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos kyi yan lag brgyad pa sbyin pa theng par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to//
14b5(dkon brtsegs): de yan lag thams cad bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yan log dang / nying lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
14b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing dang du len to// de'i mig byung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yan lag dang / sems can thams cad shes bzhin gyi
14b7(dkon brtsegs): mig g.yung drang thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to// de mgo bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad thams cad
14b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi mgo thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to// de bzod pa 'di dag dang / ji mi snyam pa'i 'di dag mngon sum du bya ba 'dod pa dang / yid
15a1(dkon brtsegs): la bya ba 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba
15a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// mngon sum byed pa dang /
15a3(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can tham
15a4(dkon brtsegs): cadang dugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// gal te bad
15a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag dang ji mi snyam pa 'di dag mnyam pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/
15a6(dkon brtsegs): dus dus su'as/ sung sabung 'a dulang mi 'arjod pa dang / dri brim par byas pa spangs pa dang / do ba dang / bsil bar tshul// 'bad// dus du
15a7(dkon brtsegs): grong c-i ring 'dod dang / rims pa la spo ba dang / mngon pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs pa bya latshal lo// 'bad// srod pag/
15a8(dkon brtsegs): byung ban yong shus par mi 'gyur zhi myed mug par 'gyur ro// lag pa rangs byang chub sems dang rnams kyi khyod chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / ma
15b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smodan pa dang / byang chub smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa do nyid de dag gis brjod pa kun tu spyod pa dang
15b2(dkon brtsegs): dang brjod pa yang dag bskung pa dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad
15b3(dkon brtsegs): la zag pa med pa'i bzod pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i bzod pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bzod pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i
15b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni bzod pa kun tu spyod pa dge ba dang / bzod pa yang dag par sgrub par dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag
15b5(dkon brtsegs): bzangs de ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan lo/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs nu du dang / sdug bsngal chu dus myur du skyen par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
15b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sem dpa'
15b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar yang dag par slong ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med do// 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang seMso can mtha' yas
15b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas mu med pa la mtha' yod pa ma yin/ mu yod pa ma yin/ bdag ni sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing / mtha' yas pa
16a1(dkon brtsegs): de la ngan pa'i go cha dgos la/ sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de la bde ba'i phyir go cha bgos na/ sems can thams
16a2(dkon brtsegs): cad la phan 'a dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde bar dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa
16a3(dkon brtsegs): dgapag med par gyur tam/ sems gzhan du gyur tam/ gnyid kyis log kyang nyin mtshan du sems kyis skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang
16a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ sems kyi skang gcig sems kyi skad gcigs/ dge ba'i rtsang mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye ba dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi
16a5(dkon brtsegs): phung pom ma 'das shing ma yas padag skyebs rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag gi 'di sems srad cigs dge ba'i rgyang 'jal ba mchi 'alas ma
16a6(dkon brtsegs): / na nas pa 'ams ni mkhams u ga pa rjes sums gan dalas rdzogs pa'i byang chu dab meda' ba yang dag pa
16a7(dkon brtsegs): / gas rgyu na nga gakyi mas sgru ga sa nangs byang chu sas la
16a8(dkon brtsegs): sa pa sa/ gshi sems can gyi tshags ma ma ga ma chos dang/ nanga'i drug la gca ga zungs sa dang / rgan cigs
16b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skud gcig sems kyi skad gcigs dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas brgyas
16b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal
16b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'dod pa mi 'byor pa'i sdug bsngal dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / gshin
16b4(dkon brtsegs): rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grang ba'i sems dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sems
16b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bas par 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig sems can gyi
16b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i sdug bsngal sems kyi skad cig gcig pa'i sems kyi skad cig cig tsam dang / 'brel pa bsal bar 'dod pa de yang sems kyi
16b7(dkon brtsegs): skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ gang zhig ma 'ongs
16b8(dkon brtsegs): shing ma byin pa'i bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med pa rnams su/ sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal nas srid pa'i sdug bsngal bar
17a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par spong ste/ gang zhig rang sangs
17a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yon tan nam/ nyan thos kyi yon tan 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas par 'phel lo// dge ba'i rtsa
17a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas shing mtha' yas brgyas par 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan mtha' yas shing yon tan mu med pa/ stobs mtha'
17a4(dkon brtsegs): yas shing stobs mu med pa/ mtha' dag chub pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'dod pa dang / mos pa dang / smon pa lta smos kyang ji dgos te/ bag med par gyur tam
17a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyid kyis log kyang rgyu bzhi dang / rkyen bzhi dang / dmigs pa bzhi po de dag ni/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi
17a6(dkon brtsegs): phung po mtha' las shing mi med pa bzhi sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'bel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ sems skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas pa
17a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skye ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi skye ba dag gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub byed par mi dka' na/ bdag gis 'dis
17a8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ dge ba'i rtsa baphung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi dung po mtha' mas
17b1(dkon brtsegs): shing mtha' yas pa'i bani yang dag par rjes su mamyong la/ gzhi de las rdzogs pa'i byang na ba rnyed par me dka' bar yang dag par mthong bzhi du/ rdzogs pa byung
17b2(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus srog phyir yang ci'i phyir nyes par bya sa mo// rgya mtsho chen po bzhin shar phyogs kyi mtha' yas yang mngon zhing / mu yang mngon la/ lto
17b3(dkon brtsegs): nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi mtha' yang mngon zhing / mu yang mngon la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas mu med pa bzhi po de dag la ni/ mtha' dang
17b4(dkon brtsegs): mu yod pa ma yin na/ bdag gis sems kyi skad cig skad cig sems kyi skad cig cig la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgya mtsho bzhi po 'di dag 'phel zhing rgyas na/ rdzog pa'i byang
17b5(dkon brtsegs): chub thob par gyur pa la/ srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir brtson 'grus nyams par byas mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste
17b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag seng ge dang / stag dang / khyi dang / ce sbrang dang / bya rgod dang / khrung khrung dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / srin bu dang / sbrang ma dang / sbrang bu dang /
17b7(dkon brtsegs): snang du gyur pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na/ bdag mir gyur pa bzhin du/ srog gi phyir lang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub
17b8(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams par byas so// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ mi brgya 'am/ mi stong gi kyang
18a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nyid rtogs shing thob na/ bdag gis kyang 'di ci'i phyir mi rtogs shing thob par mi 'gyur/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin
18a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rtogs shing rnyed/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
18a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rtogs shing / rnyed par 'gyur na/ bdag gis 'dir srog gi por yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub slob par 'gyur ba'i brtson
18a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsom pa yin to/ sangs rgyas pa'o zhes ston sangs rgyas kyi gsung
18a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ nyan thos kyis bshad pa'am/ byang chub sems dpas bshad pa'am/ than slor rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos gang yin pa dag dang / sbyin pa'i
18a6(dkon brtsegs): la tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas gtan gyi po rol phyin
18a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos thob par gyur pa dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob ra 'gyur ba
18a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de dag mgo dang gosal me'i bar ba bzhin du/ rtag par rgyun tu nyan to// nges par byed to// rtog go
18b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa le lo med par ni ru shing bzhin du yid la byed pas/ mdung mthur dag gis bzlog kyang de mgo dang gos la me'abar ba bzhin du rtags par rgyun tu chos de
18b2(dkon brtsegs): dag 'dzin yongs su shes par byed do// 'chang ngo // klog go/ rje su sems so// gzhan dag la ston to// go bar byed do// mkhas pa le lo med pa
18b3(dkon brtsegs): ni ru shing bzhin du byed cing / yid la byed pas mdung krung gi bzlog kyang de bcol kyang rung / ma bcol kyang rung / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / cil byab
18b4(dkon brtsegs): chos can chos dang / 'jig rten 'di la bde ba'am 'jig rten pha rol tu phyi bde ba dag la rang gi lus nye bar spyod cing yo byad du gyur par byed do// 'di lta ste dper na
18b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba chen po ba sgrib pa med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yo byad du 'gyur ba rnams yin no//
18b6(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyis nye bar byed spang dang / yo byad du gyur byed de/ sangs rgyas dang
18b7(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / nad pa dang / mgon med pa de rnams la yongs su spyad
18b8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / sri zhu bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur byas bye brag tu 'gyura'oro// de mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin no// gzhan gyi sos dang / gzhan
19a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi snying dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig dang / rjes su mthun pa dang / mthun par byed pa dang / yang dag par dged par dang
19a2(dkon brtsegs): grogasu 'gyur ba dang / dge ba mthun pa dang / don mthun pas rje su zhugs nas mngon du gyur par dad par byas shing bsdus te/ nyan thos kyi theg
19a3(dkon brtsegs): pal 'os pa rnams ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dzud do// 'dul lo// 'god do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni/ rang sangs
19a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi theg pa la'o// rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa la 'dzud do// 'du'o// 'god /
19a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung dag gis bzlog kyang mgo dang / gos la le 'bar ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi rgyu dang / dam pa'i chos kyi ched dang
19a6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang / pha rol tu phyin drug gi ched dang / dge ba'i rgyu dang / dge ba'i ched la grang ba yang khyad du song la/ chab
19a7(dkon brtsegs): kres pa dang / sgom pa dang / skang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlu dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gnan gyis nga'adu smras pa
19a8(dkon brtsegs): tam du brjod pa'i tshig gi tam dang / ngal ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / gnyid dang / mi dga' ba dang / lus dang / srog kyang khyad du gsod do/
19b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa lelo meng ni ma dung byung dag gis bzlog kyang / de rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched la lha'i sdug bsngal yang khyan
19b2(dkon brtsegs): gsod do// lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal yad khyad du gsod do// mi'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal yang khyad drug
19b3(dkon brtsegs): dodud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung krung dag
19b4(dkon brtsegs): gis bzlog kyang de'i mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba dang / spyod lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
19b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs rdzogs par thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtag cing / rtul ba brtan brtan no// de brtson 'grus 'odi mngon sum du bya ba 'dod pa dang
19b6(dkon brtsegs): brtsam par 'dod pa na yang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin
19b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thas cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do//
19b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du byed pa dang / rtsom pa dang / mngon su du byas pa dang / brtsams nas kyang sems can tham cad bskal ba dang / sem canathams
20a1(dkon brtsegs): cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
20a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// gal te brtson 'grus 'di ma nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa
20a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de lta yang dag par spo ba ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang snyom las dang / le lo spang ba dang / 'dod pa dang bsal bsal bar
20a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsol lo/ 'ad do// dus du su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du brtson 'grus dang / rtul ba la slob pa dang / don 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya
20a5(dkon brtsegs): khar rtsol lo// 'bad de srid pa gnan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu
20a6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'dab pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs
20a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yi 'i de nyid de dag gi badzin 'grus dge ba dang / rtsom rgol ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta sa 'jig rten gyi kha
20a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag med pa'i brtsod 'grus skyob par 'dod pa dang / zag par med pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / ma /
20b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i brtson 'grus skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni brtson 'grus dge ba dang / rtsol ba dge ba thams cad kyi mcho/
20b2(dkon brtsegs): yid/ de dam pa yi no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid 'di ba dang ldan zhing / tshogs rlung du dang / sdug bsngal
20b3(dkon brtsegs): dus myur du skyen par brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ lage bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyir pa yongs
20b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed cer/ log bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mig gis gzugs rnams mthong na mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtagasu mi 'dzin pa yin te/
20b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gi phyir mig gi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas/ 'jig rten na brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnas la sems rjes
20b6(dkon brtsegs): zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing byed srung ste/ mig gi dbang pos mig gi dbang po sdom par byed do// de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang / snas
20b7(dkon brtsegs): dri rnams tshor ba dang / lus ro rnams myong ba rnams meng pa dang / lus kyi reg bya rnams la reg pa dang / yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes na/ mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing /
20b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir yid kyi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas 'jig rten na brnang sems dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
21a1(dkon brtsegs): drig dge pa chos rnams pa sems rjes su rag de dag 'dus pa'i du na byed cing srung ste/ mi kyi pa dasas kyi
21a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// de 'gro'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal lam/ cang mi smra bar gyur kyang rung ste/ mnyam par 'onag pa'i gnas dang / zhi gnas kyi gnas
21a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'di // bdag mi nod pa dang / mu co mi sra ba dang / tshig mi mang ba dang / mig mi g.yeng ba dang / dbang po mi g.yed pa dang / margod pa dang /
21a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / lus 'khrul pa med pa dang / dge 'khrul pa med pa dang / sems 'khrul pa med pa dang / dben yang rung mi dben yang rung spyod lam mi nyams pa
21a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / sman dang / gnas dang / nanga'i gso sman dang / yo byad ji lta bu yang rung bdag gis tshig shes shing gas
21a6(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dang / dgangs pa dang / rim gros pa dang / chog dang spyod yul dge ba dang / 'du 'dzin las dben pa'i spyod yul yin/ thob pa dang / mthob pa la mnya
21a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyu ba medade/ mkhengs bdul bayin/ 'de dang / sdug bsngal dang / bsnyed pa dang / smad pa / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang /
21a8(dkon brtsegs): rang tshi la mad 'gyur ba med de/ mkhes mdul pa yi ma 'tho dang / dgra nga / dag pa dang / mi ge dang / 'ad ba dang / ma
21b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba dang / mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa dang / 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams dang / dben pa dang / lang long rnams las
21b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'gyur ba med do// ma khengs ma dul ba yin/ gzugs sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa rnams la yang mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa med pa yin/ sgra dang / dri nga
21b3(dkon brtsegs): ro dang reg bya dang / chos dang sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa rnams la yang mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa med pa yin no// de 'dod pa rnams rang gi sems kyis kun tu bsla
21b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ log par rnam par rtog pas/ ro mang ba yin pas keng rus ltar yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni dgra mang ba'i phyir ro// sha sA gu lta bur yid la byed do//
21b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams ni blangs na sdug bsngal yongs su btud na bde ba'i phyir rtse me lha ngur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni gnod pa mang ba'i phyir shing gi rtse mo shing rtog lta bur
21b6(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni dbang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ slong ba pa lta bu yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni skad cig tsam zhig nor bas dga' ba'i
21b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir rmi lam lta bur byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes la phyin ci log gis bskyed pa'i phyir mdze lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnam
21b8(dkon brtsegs): ni nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi dngos po yin pa dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dang / sem can dmal ba'i mtha' yin pas mchis pa lta bur yid la byed
22a1(dkon brtsegs): do 'dod pa rnams ni 'joms par mi byed pa dang / sam pa 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir/ tsha nu lta bur yid la byed do// de 'od bdag 'as
22a2(dkon brtsegs): dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang / bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bas gtan
22a3(dkon brtsegs): dang po rdzogs par byas te gan so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongasu dang ste/ seMs kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin
22a4(dkon brtsegs): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnaso// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing
22a5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dong shes bzhin can yin te/ 'de b.lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis 'di dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas bdang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa sa
22a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gsu pa rdzogs par byas te gnas// de bde ba yang spangs ste/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid 'de ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nubapas pade/
22a7(dkon brtsegs): payang ma yin/ srub bsngal yang ma yin pa/ gang snyoms dang dun pa yongs su dag pas pasam gtan bani ba rdzogs par byas te gnaso// dems can
22a8(dkon brtsegs): cadapa 'de ba'i 'du shes yid la byed ngas byams pa tshad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas// de sems can thams cad la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes yi la bye dngas
22b1(dkon brtsegs): snying rje tshad med rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de sems can thams cad la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas/ dga' ba chad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas/
22b2(dkon brtsegs): desems can thams cad la sdug bsngal yang med bde ba yang med pas btang snyoms chad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnaso// de gzugs la rags pa'i 'du shes yid la byed cing rnam
22b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhabs zhi pa'i 'du shes 'ad la byi dngas/ namakha' mtha' las skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam par shes pa lazhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas
22b4(dkon brtsegs): sa mtha' las skye ma ched rdzogs par byas te gnas// de ci yang me pa la ni ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas
22b5(dkon brtsegs): de 'du shes re dang 'dro shes med min la zhi nga'i 'du shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rang gi dbugs rdzu ba dong / 'byung ba ltar gnas shing ji la
22b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa bzhin du rgyun thung ba rnams la yang rgyun 'thung ba'i 'du shes dang / rgyun ring ba rnams la yang rgyun ring ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dbugs rngub pa dang / dbus
22b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyung ba dran par rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de sems can gyis lus rnams la mi sdug pa'i mchin ma yid la byed pas/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas
22b8(dkon brtsegs): te gnaso// de chi ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas mchi ba'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de na pa dang rga ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas nyes dmigs/
23a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de kha zas yongs su 'tshol ba dang / 'gyur ba la nad kyi rgyu dang / gnod pa'i las rgyud yid la byed
23a2(dkon brtsegs): pas kha zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas// de khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi 'jig rten na thams cad la 'byor pa dang / bral ba'i mtshan
23a3(dkon brtsegs): mar yid la byed pa dang / nags tshal yid du byung ba dang / kun dga'i ra ba rmad du byung ba dang / bral ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pas/ 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dag
23a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te byas te gnas so// de nas gzug su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs cung ngu kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan par yid
23a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de nang gzugs 'dri shes pas phyi 'om gyi gzugs cad med pa kha dag bzang ngo po// kha dog ngan pa na
23a6(dkon brtsegs): ma nyis rigs pa / sa seMgs diste/ sa rnas
23a7(dkon brtsegs): sa du byas sa tha sas sa ga sa da / gan
23a8(dkon brtsegs): mas kyis gyig gas kyi 'jig dag ma
23b1(dkon brtsegs): sa gas so// dod kun dru gzugs dadang 'a'adu shes ngas kyi rol gyi gzugs nad med pa la ga pabyung po dang / ngas ngan pa rnams la mtshan ma ming sa bye
23b2(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnan pa'i snam da pani pa rdzogs par byas te gran so// de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyirim gyi gzugs sngon po tshang med pa yid la 'ong ba rnams kyi
23b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mar yid la byed pas/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzug
23b4(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po tshad med par yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa dang / bdun pa
23b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa rdzogs par byas te gnaso// des 'di mtha' yas so shes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad par rdzogs par byas te gnaso// de chu dang me dang / rlung dang
23b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / na mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad par chu dang
23b7(dkon brtsegs): zad par me dang / zad par rlung dang / zad par sngon po dang / zad par ser po dang / zad par dmar po dang / zad par dkar dang / zad par na mkha' dang / zad par rnam par
23b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rdzogs par 'jug pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dod byas te/ snying rje chen po la dmig pa
24a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la dmigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsuM gyi rigs rgyun mi chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgya
24a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi sku dang rgyan la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs la dmigs pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam yi dmigs dang / sems can thas cad yongs su
24a3(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par sbyang ba la dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la
24a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzhom pa la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dog so// de bsam gtan byed pa na rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa ni
24a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bar bsam gtan byed do// sa'i khams la mi gnas/ nu'i khas la mi gnas/ me'i khams la mi gnas/ rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ na mkha'i kha
24a6(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pa rol la mi gnas par bsam gtan byed do// de ti
24a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dang rnams pa 'jug zan med pa sams pa dme par bya ba'i phyir/ ngas gtan la gnas shing bsam gtanas dga'o// de bsam gan dang
24a8(dkon brtsegs): shing nge 'dzin de la bsam gtan byed par 'dod pa dang / snyoms par 'jug par 'dod par yang / sems can thams cad bskal ba dang / sems can thams cad
24b1(dkon brtsegs): dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad nga thugs dpung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs
24b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir yid kyis yongs su bsngo bar byed do// bsam gtan byed pa dang / bsam gtan byas pa dang / lnga nas kyang sems can thams cad bskal ba dang
24b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thas cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
24b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// gal te bsam gtan de dang / ting nge 'dzin de la slob pa'i gnas pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di lta
24b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par spong ste/ dus du su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang sems rnam par g.yeng ba dang ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa spang dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol
24b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dad do// dus du su'am/ cung zad cung zad du se yang sems rtse cig tu bya ba dang / sems mnyam par gzhag par slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar
24b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la slob po// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro//
24b8(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjesu dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang
25a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid dag gi sems mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba dang / sem
25a2(dkon brtsegs): rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ sems can thams cad la
25a3(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems
25a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par bzhag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa yang dag par bskyod par 'dod pa de ni/ sems mnyam par ban/
25a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba mtha' yas mu med pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bad
25a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing tshogs chung dang / sdug bsngal chu dus bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar
25a7(dkon brtsegs): sa rabakyi la ston pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cen/ lag pa rangs 'dis byang chub sems dpas ni mdu lung dag gis bzlog kyang / gang dag
25a8(dkon brtsegs): ma mang bzos 'anapa/ thos pa bsags pa da shes pa/ bzha gas pa byed shes pa di/ des thos pa'idod sa yongs su rtog de
25b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' rkyen cing / bsten te bsnyen bkur byedado// de thos pa'i ched deng / bgad pa'i ched dang / don gyi che dang / don la yongs rtog pa'i ched dang / slong
25b2(dkon brtsegs): dpor dang / mkhan pos bsnyen bkur bya bo'i ched du grangs pa yang khyad du bsad/ chang dang bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / shasrang dang / srang bud
25b3(dkon brtsegs): rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gzhan gyis ngan du smras shing ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / lus kyi tshor ba drag ba rtsub pa/ mi bzad
