25b4(dkon brtsegs): bo srog chad par 'gyur ba yang khyad du gsod do// de chos rnams la ni rin po cher 'du shes nye bar gnas/ chos smra ba rnams la ni rin po che'i gter du 'du shes/ chos
25b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la sa ni bkren pa rnyed par 'du shes/ chos 'dzin pa la ni don yod par srog gis phyogs par 'du shes/ chos kyi yon bdun mang du byed pa la ni srog don yod par
25b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes/ chos la yongs su rtog pa la ni tshe rabs brgyar mi rnyed par 'du shes par gnas pa yin te/ de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin la mang du byed cing yongasu rtog pa
25b7(dkon brtsegs): khas rnams kyang rab tu shes/ phung po rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rten cing 'brel 'byung 'ar ba dang / dus
25b8(dkon brtsegs): dang thegs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bsags pa yang rab tu shes// kham rnams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ khams gnyis te 'dus byas dang / 'das
26a1(dkon brtsegs): ma byas shes bya ba ste/ khams gnyis po de dag go// 'dus byas kyi khams ni gang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams ni gang zhe na/ gang
26a2(dkon brtsegs): yang rung ste/ skye ba dang gnas pa dang / 'gag pa 'dus byas kyi khas shes bya'o// gang ci yang rung ste/ skye ba med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
26a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ste/ de ltar 'dus mabyas kyi khams shes bya ste rab tu shes// gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/ dge ba'i khas dang
26a4(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i khams dang / lus du ma bstan pa'i khams gsum po de dag go// dge ba'i khams ni gang / mi dge ba'i khams ni gang / lung du ma bstan pa'i khams
26a5(dkon brtsegs): ni gang zhe na gang ci yang rung ste/ chags pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang
26a6(dkon brtsegs): yang rung ste/ gti mug med pa dang / gti mug med pa dang ldan pa de ni dge ba'i khas shes bya'o// gang ci yang rung ste/ chags pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang
26a7(dkon brtsegs): sa na/ ning dang / na pa dang / gang sa yang du ste/ ga mug dang / sug da ldan pa mi dge la gas bya'o// de banas
26a8(dkon brtsegs): gags pa'i sring dum 'anan pa nyid de/ dkar khams gsum rab tuzhes// gnan ma khams gsum rab tu shes te/ gsugang non/ 'di pa'i khams
26b1(dkon brtsegs): 'thul ngas dang/
26b2(dkon brtsegs): gas dang / gzugs med mas// 'dod pa ga shen/ sems cam stsal / sa rmon sgra gnas dang / ya
26b3(dkon brtsegs): lham min dang / mi dang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dka' bra ldan dang / gzhan 'tshul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
26b4(dkon brtsegs): gang de dag sa 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyis ston pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'dod
26b5(dkon brtsegs): nga'i khams shes bya'o// gzugs kyi khams gang zhe na/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa 'dun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od rlung dang
26b6(dkon brtsegs): tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge' rlung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams de skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med
26b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang
26b8(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyi smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gzugs kyi khams shes bya'o gzugs med pa'i khams
26b9(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / ci yang med pa'i skye
27a1(dkon brtsegs): mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun
27a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyi smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med
27a3(dkon brtsegs): nga'i khams shes bya ste/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams bzhi rab tu shes te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod nga'i khams dang / gzugs kyi
27a4(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ba khams bzhi po de dag ste/ de ltar khams rab tu shes// gzhan yang khams drug
27a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes te/ drug gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gnod sems kyi khams dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i khams dang / mngon par 'byung ba'i kham dang
27a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems med pa'i khams dang / rnam par 'che ba med pa'i khams dang / khams drug po de dag rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/ drug gang zhen
27a7(dkon brtsegs): sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams te/ khams drug po de dag rab tu
27a8(dkon brtsegs): sa de las 'i khams ni mi rtag pa/ mi brtan 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa
27b1(dkon brtsegs): de na du cu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / zung gi khams dang / namakha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang marig pa/ m-i brtan pa 'gyur pa
27b2(dkon brtsegs): rnas can// mau dag pa gang shin pa sngag bsas pa'o// rdus bskal pagang yin pa den bdag med pa ste/ stan 'ams drugarab tu shesas// dachos dadag
27b3(dkon brtsegs): cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du med cing yongs su rtog pa na gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par na
27b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phung po dang / phung po lnga rab tu sheso// gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / tshor ba la ni chu'i chu bur lta bu
27b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'di du mi gnas pa dang / 'du shes la ni smig rgyu lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'ang du mi gnas pa dang / 'du byed
27b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni chu shing lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / rnam par shes pa la ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi
27b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas par de ltar bung po lnga rab tu sheso// de chos de dag nyen cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongasu rtog pa na/ nang gi skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig nang gi
27b8(dkon brtsegs): skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang gi skye mched ces bya ba nang gi skye mched drug po de dag go/ de la mig nang gi skye
28a1(dkon brtsegs): mched na pa'i chos can dang / rga ba'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags
28a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi me dang / kun tu 'bang ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'ching dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
28a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bdi ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kun tu 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba rab tu shes so// de bzhin
28a4(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang gi skye mched la yang na pa'i chos can dang / rga ba'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang
28a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang / ne sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi me kun tul bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
28a6(dkon brtsegs): / mas 'dred padang / sas padang / mau m-i na dang / rnams kyis pa dang / bsas rgyas
28a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ba gsate/ des na sa med drug pa dag dang shes// gzhanan yang du'i skyem med rab tugs te/ mig pa rnaMs rigs par du
28a8(dkon brtsegs): ra rgya rgyu dang / nangs rnam pa gis par bya rnams dang / rnaMs ma pa shes rirab 'a rnams dang / rjes rnam pa shes pa bya ba nas
28b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos bya'i skye mched rnams shes bya ba ste/ skye mched drug
28b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag go/ de la mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs phyi'i skye mched la skye bas med do dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / ma rlung ngum/
28b3(dkon brtsegs): de la rtag pa'am/ brtan pa'am/ ther zug pa'am/ de bzhin nyid dom/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid dam/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi
28b4(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma de ni yod do// sgyu mar byas pa de ni yod/ sems rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de/ gang ci yang yod pa dang / de bzhin du rna ngas rnam par shes par bya ba
28b5(dkon brtsegs): sgra rnams dang / sngas rnam par shes par bya bar dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba dro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang
28b6(dkon brtsegs): yod kyis rnam par shes par bya ba chos kyi phyi'i skye mched la yang skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyams chung ba ste/ de la rtag pa
28b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / brtan pa'am/ ther zug pa'am/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dam/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/ sgyu mar byas pa
28b8(dkon brtsegs): de ni yod/ sems rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de/ gang ci yang yod par bya ba'i phyi'i skye mched drag po de ltar rab tu shes// de chos de dag nyen cing 'dzin
29a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rab tu shes so// bzhi gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'dag
29a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i
29a3(dkon brtsegs): bden pa bzhi po de dag go// phung po lnga rnams dang / khams drug po dag dang nang gi skye mched drug po dang / phyi'i skye mched drug po dag gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal zhes byas
29a4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal de ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / bdag med pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i chos nyid du blta'o//
29a5(dkon brtsegs): 'did chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam du mngon par zhen pa dang / bdag gi bdag ni 'di yin no// sa du bdag tu mngon par
29a6(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /
29a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra shes pan du 'gyu snyam pa dang / 'du gas can ma yin pa'ang 'du shes can ma yin pa yin par 'gyur snyam pa dang / dung po rnams bdag gosam pa dang / phung po
29b1(dkon brtsegs): las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / phung po rnams pa bdag snyam pa dang / bdag la phung po rnams snyam pa dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams bdag go snyam pa dang / skye mched
29b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams la bdag go smras pa dang / bdag la skye mched rnams snyam pa dang / tshor bar bdag go snyam pa dang / tshor bar byed
29b3(dkon brtsegs): bar dag snyam pa dang / gzugs can chu drong dag gi snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa chu du bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can mtha' yas par dag go snyam pa dang /
29b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin pa mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang / bdag rtag go snyam pa dang / bdag mi rtag snyam pa dang / rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi nag go stab dang
29b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod do snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod pa ma yin no snyam pa dang / mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha'
29b6(dkon brtsegs): med kyang med do snyam pa dang / mtha' yod pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi ba'i 'og tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang
29b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'byung yang 'byung la mi 'byung ngo snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi phyin tshar du 'byung ba yang ma yin mi 'byung ba yang ma yin no snya ba dang
29b8(dkon brtsegs): srog de lus de yin no snyam pa dang / srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan no snyam pa dang / sems can 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro
30a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / sems can yong ba las chad de 'jig cing med par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / byed pa de mngon pa yin no snyam pa dang
30a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yang gzhan no snyam pa dang / bdag yod pas bdag gi yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / bdag gi yod pas bdag yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'di na bdag des
30a3(dkon brtsegs): du'am bdag gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig na/ de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i zhig gam gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ram
30a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du babyung dang 'gyur ram/ 'dir bdag sngon 'byung ngam/ bdag da ltar 'byung ngam/ bdag gzhan du 'byung ngam snyam du de dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen te/
30a5(dkon brtsegs): bang ba tshigs lana'o// nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / sems kyi gnas dang / mngon par zhen pa dang / dargyal gyi bag la nyal dang / sems pa dang / dargyal byed
30a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bdag du snang 'i len pa dang / 'dod chags dang / ni sdang dang / gti mug dang rgyal gang yin pa de thams cad dam/ lus sam/ ngag gam/
30a7(dkon brtsegs): kyilas bsod nams su nye par 'gro ba'am/ bsod nams ma yin pa nye bar 'gro babam/ mi g.yo bar 'gro ba 'am/ 'dod par gtogs pa'am/ gzugs
30a8(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa'am/ gzugs med pa' gang yin pa de ni/ sdug bsngal kud 'drung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang 'did chags 'dapad
30b1(dkon brtsegs): ni snang zad pa dang / gti mug zang pa dang / nga rgyal 'ad pa dang / bdag tu mngon par zhen pa spangs pa dang / bdag tu smra ba'i len pa spangs pa de ni sdug bsngal
30b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhig pa'i 'phags pa'i bdon pa zhes bya'o// gang sdug bsngal la yang sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba la kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa la yang 'gro/
30b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / lal yang lam du yid la byed pa dang / 'du byed rnams la nyes dmigs su lta zhing gnas pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ya ngan yon du lta zhing gnas pa
30b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / ji ltar mthong ba dang / byas pa la so sor rtog pa yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dga' ba dang / yang dag pa'i
30b5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par
30b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag la dpyod cing rtog
30b7(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig 'dus byas kyi khams la ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par mthong ngo // 'dus pa
30b8(dkon brtsegs): byas kyi khams la ni sbyangs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / dpung gnyen du yang mthong la 'dus ma byas kyi khams mngon sum du yang mi byed do// de ska
31a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
31a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs kyi ming dang
31a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen pa gyis reg pa dang / reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rang dang / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen gyi
31a4(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang / len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang / srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// 'phags
31a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes pa dang / mi mthong ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o// gang cung zad lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis
31a6(dkon brtsegs): las bsod rnams su nye bar 'gro ba'am/ bsod nams ma yin pa nye bar 'gro ba'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa'i khams sunye bar 'gro ba'am
31a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi 'ams 'gro ba'am/ gzugs kyi khams sate par 'gro ba de dag ni 'du byed rnams shes pa'o// gang cung zad de las byang ba'i sem sogs bya 'dang / yid ce
31a8(dkon brtsegs): bya badzin da bar gos pazhes bya'o// gangs yang rung ba de las byung ba'i tshong dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa don meng shes bya'o//
31b1(dkon brtsegs): gang ci yang rung lhan cig byung ba me mer po'i gzugs dang / rdzus te byung ba'i gzugs dang / rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs de ni shes byed ste/ de gnyis ni ming dang / gzug shes
31b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de las byung ba'i mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de ni skye mched drug ces bya'o// mig la bsnyen cing gzugs la yang brten te/ mig gi
31b3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa 'byung ba dang / gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos rnams la brten te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang
31b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa ste de ni reg pa zhes bya'o// de las byung ba bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa de dag ni tshor ba gsuM zhes
31b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de las byung ba'i 'dod chags dang / chags pa dang / dga' ba de ni sred pa zhes bya'o de las byung ba kun tu chags pa dang / lta ba dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhug dang
31b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu smra ba de ni len pa zhes bya'o// de las byung ba gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni srid pa zhes bya'o//
31b7(dkon brtsegs): gang srid pa'i 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'grub pa de ni skye ba zhes bya'o// gang srid pa de ni 'gyur ba dang / 'jig pa dang / nye ba'i khrid pa de ni rga ba zhes bya'o//
31b8(dkon brtsegs): gang srid pa de 'tshe 'angos pa dang bral ba de ni 'chi ba zhes bya'o// de de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung de la dpyid cing yongs su rtog la/ khong du chud par byed cing na par 'jig par
32a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa nas rlom semasu mi byed/ sas rlom sems su mi byed/ sa bdag gi'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do// sa la mngon par dga' ba
32a2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do// chu dang me dang / rlung dang / na mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa la gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang // thos pa dang / bye brag byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang /
32a3(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gi snyam du rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do de rten cing
32a4(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams la/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
32a5(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig go/ de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rje su mthong ba na/ 'di lta ste ma rig par 'gag
32a6(dkon brtsegs): bas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas sgra
32a7(dkon brtsegs): mched du 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas regyi pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags ngas rlor gag/ rer ba 'gegs pas snyed pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas
32a8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'gag/ len pa 'gegs pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag par rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gag
32b1(dkon brtsegs): par khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig ste/ de de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa yang rje dag par rjes su mthong yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
32b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa mngon sum du yang mi byed de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa rab tu sheso// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongasu rtog
32b3(dkon brtsegs): ba na/ dus gsum rab tu shes te/ gsu gang zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i dus yin te/ de dag ni dus gsum rnams
32b4(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o// 'du byed gang la la bzhag pas de ni 'das pa'i dus shes bya'o// 'du byed gang la lam 'ongs shing ma skyes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus shes bya
32b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed gang la la da ltar byung ba da ltar gyur pa de ni da ltar byung ba'i dus shes bya'o// de 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rjes su dran na
32b6(dkon brtsegs): smod cing shung ste/ nges par spong ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rdul tsam la yang gcig tu rnam par smin par mthong la/ mi sdug rnam
32b7(dkon brtsegs): par smin par mthong / yid du mi 'ong bar rnam par smin par mthong / 'jig par mthong zhing gnaso// da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bdag gis mi dge ba'i rtse ba'i
32b8(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i skabs mi byed de/ lus sdom pas bsdams/ ngag sdom pas bsdams/ yid sdom pas bsdams/ dbang po drug sdom pas bsdams
33a1(dkon brtsegs): de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la smon pa dang /
33a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi smon lam 'debs pa rjes su dran zhing 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag po so so can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can
33a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tham cad
33a4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang
33a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / bdun drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dang drag pas sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang
33a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tha
33a7(dkon brtsegs): cad yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir 'dod do// sos yad dag kyis smon no// da ltar byung ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i sems kyis rgyud dang / dge ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyang
33a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bsngal ba dang / sems can thams cad dkrol pad / sems can thams cad dbyung ba dang / tham cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang
33b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi rtag par rgyun du 'dor ro// nyams par mi byed do// brjed par mi byed do// bdag med par ma
33b2(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ gang 'das pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de ni 'das pas/ 'gag pa med pa yod pa ma yin pa ste/ de ni ltar bdag med bdag gi med pa
33b3(dkon brtsegs): gang ma 'ongs pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de ni ma skyes pa ma byung ba/ yod pa ma yin pa ste/ de ni da ltar bdag med pa bdag gi med pa'o// gang
33b4(dkon brtsegs): nga byung ba'i dus kyi khams dang / phung po dang / skye mched mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten ni skad cig las lhag par mi gnas pa'i phyir
33b5(dkon brtsegs): skad cig pa de'i skye ba'i dus kyang gzhan/ gnas pa'i dus kyang gzhan/ 'gag pa'i dus kyang / gzhan/ gang yin pa'i skad cig de ni gnas med pa/ 'dug pa
33b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o// skad cog gi dus gang yin pa de ni ning dang phyi'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched do// nang dang phyi'i phung po// khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni
33b7(dkon brtsegs): dus da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni skad cig tsam yang mi gnas pa ma 'dug pa mi 'dug pa ste/ mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa lan
33b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gam bdag gir med de// de yang gang gi tshem 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ ma skyes pa ma byung ba yod pa ma yin pa'o// bdag tu ma gyur pa'o// bdag
34a1(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur pa'o// gang gis tshe 'das ste/ 'gegs pa dang / ma byung ba ste/ yod pa ma yin par gyur pa de'i tshe/ yang bdag med pa dang
34a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi med pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gang yang dus gsum du bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de ni ma'abyung zhing yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir mkhas shing rig pa rnams kyis 'di ni ngadag
34a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'o// bdag gi 'di ni yod de zhes rangag tu sna 'ongs pa ma yin no// de srid pa thams cad da bang byed thams cad la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang 'dod chags dang bral
34a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes dang / spangs pa'i 'du shes dang / 'gog pa'i 'du shes can du gnas te/ 'gog pa'i mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin no// gang de ltar dus gsum rab tu
34a5(dkon brtsegs): pade chos de dganyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtogs pa dang / theg pa gsum du rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ lha'i theg pa dang / tshangs pa'i theg
34a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa ste/ de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o// bsam gtan dang po ni lha'i theg pa ste/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang
34a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ya gA'i theg pa'o// byams pa tshangs pa'i thigs ste/ sring rje dang / dga' bdang / bad sa kya byangs pa'i theg pa'o// yang dag pa'i ga
34a8(dkon brtsegs): yang ga zhes pa dang / yang dag pa'i dga' ba dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha dang / yang dag pa'i 'do' dang / yang dag pa'i tshul pa dang / meng das
34b1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o// de dus dus su lha'i theg pasgom ste
34b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus dus su tshangs pa'i theg pa bsgom ste/ sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus dus su 'phags pa'i theg pa bskam
34b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing sems can rnams kyang de la 'god la rnam par grol pa 'phags pa'i mngon sum du yang mi byed do// gzhan yang theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan
34b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po ste/ de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o// mos pa dman pa dang / dbang po dman pa skad cig tsam
34b5(dkon brtsegs): yang srid ba la mos par mi byed/ sred par mi byed kyi/ mdor na de skad cig la de ma thag tu mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phan yon mthong bas mgo dang / gos la me
34b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba bzhin du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi pa dag khong du chud pa dang / rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang / rtsol ba'i shas che ba de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes
34b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// mos pa 'bring dang / dbang po 'bring dang / dben par dga' ba dang / rang gi don lhur len pa dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas par
34b8(dkon brtsegs): brtsom pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rab tu rnam par byed pa la mkhas pa dang / rang byang chub tu smon pa dang / rang byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni
35a1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya'o// mos pa khyad par du 'phags pa/ dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad
35a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thong bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs
35a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi don du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la
35a4(dkon brtsegs): mi lta ba dang / 'khor ba'i bde ba la yang smod pa mang ba yin na/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la smod pa mang basmos kyang ci dgos te/ tshul khrims dang / spyod pa khyang
35a5(dkon brtsegs): par du 'phags pa la rnam par gnas par gnas pa dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa can gyi mdo sde rnams bklag pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / lung bog
35a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid la byed pa la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin pa deg dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pa dang / de dag
35a7(dkon brtsegs): gi byin gyi brlabs bzhi po bden pa dang / gtong ba dang / dra rani bdang / shes rab la slob pa dang / shes bya thams cad nyan pa dang / len pa dang / 'dzin
35a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / dpyod pa dang / dpyong ba dga' ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms pa 'jug pa thams cad yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang /
35b1(dkon brtsegs): don la mi lta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi don gyu len pa dang / stobs nges pa bzhin du sems can thams cad theg pa gsum ba dag la dgod par 'ad ba dang / dgon
35b2(dkon brtsegs): par spro ba dang / bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi theg pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / mo phyed pa dang / mi skyod pa dang / rdo rje lta bu sems dang / rtag par rgyun tu byang chub tu
35b3(dkon brtsegs): smon cing / byang chub smon lam 'debs pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bya ste/ de ltar theg pa gsum po dag rab tu sheso// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa mang du byed cing
35b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa dang / dge ba'i tha bas rab tu shes ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'jig rten gyi khams
35b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag
35b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshalo/ zhes dmigs pad do// de phyag lan cig 'tshal ba na mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par phyag 'tshal bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de byang
35b7(dkon brtsegs): chub tu smon pa na sems can thams cad bskul ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thas cad mkhyen
35b8(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// de bzhin du skyabasu 'gro ba na yang sem bskyod
36a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'khrus byed pa dang / za ba dang / 'thung ba dang / zhing rmod pa dang / sa 'o/
36a2(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa dang / las thabs byed pa na yang mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byas byang chub tu smon lam gdab par bya'o zhes sems bskyed do// mang du byed do// snyoms
36a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan byed pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang
36a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyi mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam btab po//
36a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes sems bskyed do/ mang du byed do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 'jig rten gyi thams cad kyi mchog dang / sos can thams cad 'dul ba dang / mtshungs pa med pa
36a6(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad yongs su dgags dbyung ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yang dag par rdzog pa'i
36a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lal gdab po zhes sems bskyed do// mang du byed do// de dge ba gang ci spyod kyang
36a8(dkon brtsegs): desem ca thams cad kyi 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / ngan gro rnyan bcad pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad nye zhi par bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams
36b1(dkon brtsegs): shi bar bya dang / myanganalas 'das bathob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do nyan thos kyi theg pa cam pa byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi nyan thos kyi theg
36b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// rang sangs kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongasu rdzogs par
36b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byung ba rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su rdzog par bya
36b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma khyen pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams bskal par
36b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa dang / bskal bar chos ston pa dang / bskal par dge 'dun mthun par gyur par yongasu bsngo bar byed do// mthong ris kyi lam la dgod pa dang / nyan thos kyi
36b6(dkon brtsegs): lam la dgod pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi selam la dgod pa'am/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa'am/ sbyin pas rjes su 'jug pa'am/ snyan par smra bas
36b7(dkon brtsegs): rjesu 'jug pa 'am/ don gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ don 'dun pas rje su 'jug pa dang / ji lta ji ltar gzhan dag dge ba'i phyogs yang dag par skyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
36b8(dkon brtsegs): stsogs par gyur pa de yang rab tu sheso// de chos kyi tshig 'di dag la nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum du 'jug go/ yid la la byed do// de 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten dag
37a1(dkon brtsegs): gi khams rnams thams cad na// yang dag zhugs pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // chos dang dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' la/ gar 'gro
37a2(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos mtha' yas phyag kyang 'tshal// 'gro ba'i nang na yon tan/ ma da cing // mi mnyam mnyam pa'i yon tana' byung gnas// yon tan dpal med de dag thams cad la/
37a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni mgon pos mtha' yas skyabs su mchi// sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang tshogs rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'jig rten khams// gang yang rgyal stengs
37a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyangar mi 'gyur bar// de ltar gsol ba mtha' las rab tu 'debs// zhi ba'i chos ni rab tu ston mdzad cing // bskal pa ma lus rnams su bzhugs par yang // 'jig rten
37a5(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams kun gyi 'dag shegs sa// mgo bos gsos mtha' las rab tu 'debs// sngo dang dang skad cig tsam mang rung // bdag gis sdig pa gang da ba
37a6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa de dag thams cad smad dang bgyi// sdig pa rnams cad padag gis spangs par bgyi// skad cig tsam sa dag gi dge ba'adi// ma lus par yang yang dag pa
37a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyi// tshe yis cib mgru kyi 'dun// dge ba kun la gnas par 'gyur bar 'tshal// sangs rgyas dag dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams// byang chub
37a8(dkon brtsegs): tshal 'ba'ang ra bar// 'dig rten 'di ni byang dang byang bya dang // 'drung cu rnams kyi dge thathams cad // rgyal brnams dang 'phags pa thamasas
37b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul khrims dang ni ye shes ting 'dzin dang // rnam grol tshe dang chos rnams gang yin pa// de dag 'jig rten rnams la ban 'gyur cig/ 'gro ba lnga'i sems can thams cad dag
37b2(dkon brtsegs): byung dang byung gyur 'byung bar gyur rnams kyi// dge ba dag la bdag ni phyi phyir zhing // mgo bos mtha' yas rjes su yi rang ngo // yon tan yang dag dge ba mtha' yas pa// de dag
37b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'gro ba ma lus pas// sems can re re dang ni bdag nyid la'ang // yod par bdag ni smon lam mtha' yas 'debs// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag gi 'das pa
37b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar thams cad kyi// 'jig rten dag gi khams ni thams cad du// dkon mchog gsum po rtag tu 'byung bar shog/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub
37b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams// bskal par bzhugs pas phongs par ma gyur cing // bar du gcod pa med par byang chub dang // pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni rdzogs par shog/ sem
37b6(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni thams cad bde ba dang // 'jigs pa med cing ngan 'gro 'das pa dang // mi dge thams cad dang ni bral ba dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs gyur cig
37b7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa gsum po dag la ci rigs par// de dag la ni smon lam mthar phyin cing // tshe ring ba dang rnam par grol ba dang // khyad par can gyi don kun rdzogs par sheg
37b8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub smon lam 'debs pa ni// mtha' yas dpag tu med par rab tu 'de bas// sems can thams cad dag gi sdug bsngal dang // nyon mongs dag ni
38a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar ni gyur cig/ chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba rnams kyi phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnams thams cad kyi// rgyal ba kun dang byang chub sems
38a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la// rang gi lus ni nges pa'angadangul bar gyi// rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bar du// ma 'ongs pa yi smon lam mtha' yas gdab// skye dang skye bar dkon
38a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog gsum pol// bdag ni longs spyad par bgyid par shog/ 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi// dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa
38a4(dkon brtsegs): la/ na mkha' mnyam pa'i lha yi spos mchog dang // 'phreng ba me tog rkun pos mchod byed shog/ lhun po mnyam pa'i gser dang dngul dag dang // gos dang rin po che
38a5(dkon brtsegs): rung po dang // gzhal med khang bcas gzhon pa mal dang // bza' ba mtha' yas dag ni sbyin pa'i shog/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa lam gyis rdzogs byed cing // sbyangs
38a6(dkon brtsegs): do lus dang 'dra 'gyur bar rog/ bzod la dga' zhing tshul khrims gtsang ba dang / 'grol ches ni rab son gyur cig/ byang chub khrig pa mchog na rnyed pa
38a7(dkon brtsegs): chos pa ma byir poms pa 'o// ba sa byi pa yongs rdzogs byed cing // sangs rgyas nas rnams so su rdzogs bya // srog pakun
38a8(dkon brtsegs): gdang // yod kyis mthab dge bam log sbyong cig/ phying chupa seMmarnam ldag padag 'gyu zhing // byang chu bdag dang pyong chubasams dang 'gyur// srid ma tsha
38b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge bganal slob/ bdag gis chos rnams de dag gan la yang // 'jig rten thams cad btu 'gang par \u0f7f/
38b2(dkon brtsegs): de de ltar bdag dang gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rab tu shes so// de shes rab de dang / ye shes de mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / yid la bya bar 'dod na yang sem
38b3(dkon brtsegs): can thas cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang
38b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// mngon sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang
38b5(dkon brtsegs): yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / bras cad mkhyen
38b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// gal te shes rab de dang / ye shes de la
38b7(dkon brtsegs): slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus du su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / mi shes pa spang ba dang
38b8(dkon brtsegs): dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsolo// 'bad do// dusas su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang shes rab dang / ye shes la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya
39a1(dkon brtsegs): ra yongs su rdzogs par bya tshul lo// 'ad// sang pa shAn ba nga la pa ma tha te/ sa
39a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro// lag pa'angs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byong chub sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsnyem pa dang
39a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chubadu smon pa dang / byang chub snron lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de/ de dag gi shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes dag grangs med cing dngab tu med pa yin no// de ci
39a4(dkon brtsegs): phyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod
39a5(dkon brtsegs): podang / zag pa med pa'i shes rab yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi spong ba'i shes rab yang dag par bskyod par dod pa de ni/ shes rang dge ba dang / ye shes te/
39a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams cad kyi 'cho sa yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bangs dana'an drang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / tshogs chu dang / drug pa
39a7(dkon brtsegs): chudus myur du skyen par shes rab kyi pha rel phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ myu dri dran
39a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs na na pa rdzogs pa kyi'i/ ma thas ni nga mi bye 'i
39b1(dkon brtsegs): dag ga pa gsus dang / jongs su sa rgyas gru// brtson na 'das kyis na ces byaka' stsal / byang chub sems da ma
39b2(dkon brtsegs): lags pa 'angs dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang // nyan thos chen po de dge dang / lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i yolas te/
39b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 'grod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u snang phrag brgya pa las/ lag bdangs
39b4(dkon brtsegs): sa sa pa nas bya ba / drug sa/ rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan pa ta shes dang / 'dzin dra nga/
39b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi lo tsA ba la n+de ye shes spel sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gas brgyad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la ba' pa'o// @/ rgya ga
39b6(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ Ar+ya su rata pa 'i brid tshan ma ma hA yin su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa des pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gcig go
39b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang / byang churab sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal
39b8(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis
40a1(dkon brtsegs): gas su ga tu mas/ du/ rgyas pa na dang / slong sa gyi dang / ngas kyis da
40a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bkur sdings/ bla mar byas/ ri mos byas/ mchod pa byas so// de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer na grong khyer gyi dngul po nges pa zhes bya ba/ sangs
40a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la dad pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa chos la dad pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa/ dge 'dun la dang pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su brdung ba/ dge ba
40a4(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas te sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ snying la gnas te/ yid yongs su skyo ba med pa/ dga'
40a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsi ba la gnas te chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ btang snyoms la gnas te bde ba la dang sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
40a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs bsngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pa/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / dbul por ming
40a7(dkon brtsegs): du chags bzhig gnas te/ kwa'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sku'i mig rnam par dag/ mi las 'das pas grong khyerang bul po des bkon du 'dod pa chung ba/ chog
40a8(dkon brtsegs): dul khrims dang dul zhugs da dang / mid la 'a khrugs pa med pa/ rnag tu bzhi 'dum pa/ gzhan gyi 'phrul dag la sbyin du mis
40b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyis srung ba/ brkam pa med pa/ shes bzhin du spyod pa/ chog shes shing dgang skal gsos pa/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ gso med pa
40b2(dkon brtsegs): dmyal med pa/ bka' blo 'a pa/ mthun par 'dzin pa/ rtag tu sas srung gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ lag na gang la 'i sngo thogs pa/ bting ba lanyam
40b3(dkon brtsegs): gos ngan pa gyon pa/ rnyed kyang mi len pa/ bzang yang rung / ngan yang rung pogo ba byas nas thang / dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ chos mnyan pa'i 'dod pa
40b4(dkon brtsegs): gtam sna tshogs byung ba la stongs pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de mthong ngo // mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ci grong khyer gyi dngu
40b5(dkon brtsegs): po 'di yi dmal brtan nam mi brtan bdag gis brtag go snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi mang po mngon par sprul nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa
40b6(dkon brtsegs): la tshig ngan pa dag gis bshe zhing spo bar byed de/ bong ba dang dbyug pa dang / mtshon cha dag kyang bstan na/ nges pa de bzod pa'i stobs kyis dang du len par byed/ mi
40b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug cing gnod sems mi skyed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi gzhan dag cig sprul nas/ des pa de'i mdun du bzhag ste/ des pa de la dga' ba'i
40b8(dkon brtsegs): tshig gis kho bo cag ni khyod kyi don byed par 'dod pa yin gyis/ ji ste khyod 'dod pa ldan/ khyod la sdig pa'i dgra gang yin pa de dag kho bo cag gis char gcad par bya'o
41a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras so nges pas smras pa grogs po dag thong de skad ma zer cig/ gal te 'i 'di dag gis kho bo'i lus dum bu brgyad dum bu dum du ragatungs
41a2(dkon brtsegs): su rin kyang / kho bon mo 'di dgal sdig pa'i sems mi skyed do// grogs padag 'jig rten dag ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs gnyis la gnas la/ de'i
41a3(dkon brtsegs): nga ni gnyis kho na ste/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni bde 'gro/ mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni ngan 'gro'o// de bas na kho bo na sems can pa rol rig pa za bar byed par yang mi 'dodan
41a4(dkon brtsegs): rtse bltan ci smos/ de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa bon chab rnams kyis ni// 'bras bu tsha skye bar 'gyur// sa bon dang ba rnams kyi ni/
41a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu da rang skye bar 'gyur// dpe zla bya ba 'di yis na// sdig pa'i rnam smin tshang dang // dka' bo'i rnam smin dang ra yang // mkhas pa'i mis ni shes par 'gyur
41a6(dkon brtsegs): ga tu lus dang gi yid kyi// sdig pa nas gsumam byazhing // gzhan dag byed kyang mkhas payis// rjes su dga' ba mi bya'o// lus dang garnams kyi
41a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bo nam gsum dag tu bya// gang dag dge basbyong po dpa// gan dag la yang la nga // de nas lha'i dbang ba mabyin gyis// dus gzhan zhig na des pal
41a8(dkon brtsegs): nga byag dang / gas mang po gnanas 'di ska ces smras so// des nga rnalas kyi khye la tsun pa dag kyang byin cig bso nams dag kyig/ gas dang rgyan pa/
41b1(dkon brtsegs): sa ma pa sem na smra/ sa pa smras su
41b2(dkon brtsegs): dang yid kyis nyes pa srung pas 'di dbul po zhes bya bar gyur to// de bas na kho bos ni ma byin par len par mi 'dod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ nges pa khyod
41b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar ci bde bar 'tsho bar gyis/ 'jig rten pha rol bsam pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ nges pas smras pa/ grogs po gang gi tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos
41b4(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi mkhas pa rnams ni tshe byemached cher 'dzin to// 'dod pas zil gyis gnod pa dang / zhe sdang gis zil gyis gnon pa dang ti mug gis zil gyis gnon
41b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'dod chags kyis dril byos gnon pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi// mkhas pa dag ni brnam pa ma yin no// srogs 'jog ched cher 'dzin
41b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni ma phyin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni srogs 'jog mi byed do// bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin dang byas bdag ni ma byi nga phen par
41b7(dkon brtsegs): byed kyimakhas pa dgo ni bdag tu mi 'dzin cing / yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do// lus dang srog la lha bdag ni ma byin pa'i glen par byed kyi/ mkhas bdag
41b8(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la milta'o// ngoms mi shes shing chog mi shes padag ni ma byin par yin par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni rims shes shing cog shes pa yin no// 'tsho
42a1(dkon brtsegs): sum dag pa dag ma byin pa 'phen par rid kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin no// las ma mthong ba dag na
42a2(dkon brtsegs): byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin no// las ma mthong ba dag ni ma byin par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni las mthong ba yin//
42a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni rnam par mi 'tshe ba ched che 'dzin to// byas pa'i sems med pa dag ni ma byin
42a4(dkon brtsegs): par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan no// ci byin ci log bzhis sems bsrang ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa da/
42a5(dkon brtsegs): ni sems phyin ci ma log pa yin no// gzhan yang sems can bral po gang yin pa de dag kho bas tshigs su bcang ba dag gis bshad kyis nyon cig/ bye ba brag sa
42a6(dkon brtsegs): gter yod kyang / gang dag la ni gtong med pa// de dag 'jig rten 'di dang bul zhes// thos mang rnams kyis de skad bshad// gang la zan cig med bzhin du/
42a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yong sa dang gnas na// doni 'jig rten nor che zhes// gang dag gzigs pa rnams kyis bshad // gang la sdig med 'phags pa ni// rnam pa kun gyis ma
42a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis pasdig byed ba // shi kya rgyan gang rangs padzad// mkhas pa dgags skyes pa'o// byis ngas bsngags das na/
42b1(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa bsngags par bye// mkhas pa dag ni sdig la sdud // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzham nis kyis dus gzhan zhig na mi gan zhig stsal to// de nas
42b2(dkon brtsegs): mi des gser mang po khyer te des pa la 'di skad ces smra so// kye des pa gser khyer la kho bo mi gzhan zhig dang rtsod pa de la/ khyod gcig pus che ga ni bya bar kho bos byas
42b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis der kho bo'i tshi gzhi gyi shig/ des pas smras pa/ grogs po grong khyod de skad ma zer cig/ kho bo ni brdzun zer du mi 'dod do// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni
42b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag la yang sla zhing pha rol la yang sla la/ 'phags pa la yang slu ba yin te/ grags pa dam par byed pa dang / yid mi ches pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang
42b5(dkon brtsegs): brnyas par byed pa dang / sems yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin no// kye grogs po rdzun du smra ba ni kha mnam par byed kyi/ lus smad par byed pa dang / lha'i yid
42b6(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'ong bar byed kyi pa yin no// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnams la rku ba dang / dran pa rmugs par byed pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam la sgrib
42b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyis brtsan par mi bya ba dang / yang dag par smra ba rnams kyi nang du tshig mi mdzes pa dang / mkhas pa
42b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis spang ba dang / sdig pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang / brtul zhugs yongs su skong ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin
43a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smraso brdzun du smra ba'i kha nas ni/ rul ba'i dri yang gnas par
43a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ dgon par ji ltar bcom pa bzhid// sngon gyi dkar rnams spong bar byed// rmongs pas bdag dang lha rnams dang // 'phags rnams yid kyang 'byung ba
43a3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ mi ni gang zhig brdzud zer ba// de ni rtag tu dgas par 'gyur// brdzun du smra bar byed pa de/ sdig pa kun gyi rtsa ba dang // dka' thub can gyi rtsa gcod deng /
43a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gror 'gro ba zhes kyang bya// gal te 'jam gling gang ba yi// gser dag khyod kyis byin na yang // kho bo chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir// rtag tu brnyan ni sgra mi byed/
43a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i mi dres pa/ brdzun zer du gzhug ma nus nas song ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo 'od dang / lA ma yin gyi bum
43a6(dkon brtsegs): bde stegs la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed gnyis sing la brtul bzhugs pa dang / dka' thub byed pa 'di ci 'dod pa la longs spong ba zhig gam/ 'on te 'ad
43a7(dkon brtsegs): ba don du mi gnye bzhi ga yin pa rtogs kyi// denas snga ma yin gyi bu mo bde sngags dang / kwa'i bu mo 'di nam langs nas phyogs gang no ngos pa 'dug pa'i phyogs da
43a8(dkon brtsegs): nges pa tshig san pas smras te// nges par zhengs pa bdag cag gnyis na khyod kyi bsnyen bkur 'gyid ngal gsos// nges pa bdag cag gnyis kyilas
43b1(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/ shAcugs dang / kha dog dang / lus byugs pa dang / rgyan dang / chas dang / lha balnga ba dag la gzigs/ mchod dang po
43b2(dkon brtsegs): tso bab pa la gzigs/ des pa khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyi dang 'di 'dra ba bdag nyid kyi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/ nges pas ngaltas nas smras pa
43b3(dkon brtsegs): khyed gnyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du zhugs pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/ lce dang mi
43b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs padag gi ni ma yin no// khyed gnyis kyi lus ni sgyu ma dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bu'i kho bos mthong ngo // khyod gnyis kyi gzugs ni dngu ba dang
43b5(dkon brtsegs): chu bu dang / smig rgyu lta bur mthong // khyed tsan+dan gyi 'de gus byugs pa ni pags pa rlon pa shas g.yogs pa lta bur mthong ngo // khyed kyi rgyan dang lha ba lbu ni
43b6(dkon brtsegs): mi slu ba'i sgyu ma lta bur mthong ngo // khyed kyi lang tshoni mi rtag pa dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can du mthong // bsod nams ma yin par mthong ba'i phyir khyed gnyis la
43b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo ma chagaso// khyed gnyis ni spre'u dang / bud med kyi sems lta bur gyur pa rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/ sems dran pas kun nas bsrungs
43b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi ma yin no// che zhe dag 'dod pa la sten pa ni mi sdug pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni dri nang nga'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni rul ba'o// 'dod pa la ldan
44a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o// 'dod pa la spen pa ni bde ba thams cad yongasu 'grib par byed 'dod pa la sten pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
44a2(dkon brtsegs): dung 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gzhin rje'i 'jog rten la sed pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni ngan 'gron gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pani 'tha ba dang / rtsong pa dang / 'byed pa dgal
44a3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'o// 'dod pa la spen pa ni mi mthun pa dang / gor na gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la spen pa ni byin ci log skyed pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni sred pa'i ngag la nyal la gnas pa'o//
44a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la sbyin pa'i rnam par rmongs shing shin tu rmongs pa kun rmongs pa'o// 'dod pa la sbed pa ni nye bar bri cing rnam par gzi la rab tu gzir ba'o// 'dod pa la smin pa ni kun tug du
44a5(dkon brtsegs): shing rnam par gdungs la yongs su gdungs pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug cing dge ba yong su nyams par byed pa'o// 'dod pa la spen pa ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed
44a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la snyen pa ni ma dge ba'i dra nga'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs pa'o// 'dod pa la sbyin pa 'ini srin mo dang 'dris par byed pa'o// gzugs mi sdug pa dang 'dres par byed
44a7(dkon brtsegs): na/ ru / nga/ yos
44a8(dkon brtsegs): di gyi ma / sa nga/
44b1(dkon brtsegs): la sten pa ni brtul zhugs dang / dka' grub 'dor ba'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni shin tu bag med pa'o// 'dod pa la ston pa ni nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'dod pa
44b2(dkon brtsegs): la sten pa ni shin tu bar du gcod par byed pa'o// de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul ba des pas rigs su bcang pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod pa mi rtag rtag tu spang pa ste// shin tu sdug
44b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bde ba 'jig par byed// rtag tu ngan song rnams nas khyim du gyur// sems rmongs sgyur ba dag gis rtag tu bsten// 'thab rtsod can de mi bden chang du gyur// rtag tu
44b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed cing mi mthun gorang gnas// 'di dag phyir ci log skyed bzhi yin te// 'dod sten srid pa 'phel byed bde ba med// rnam rmongs rab rmongs de bzhin kun tu rmongs/
44b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod sten rtag tu gzir cing gnod pa ste// 'di ni kun gdungs rnams gdungs yongasu gdungs// sdig par spor zhing dge ba rlung gzon pa// 'di ni mi dge kun gyi rtsa ba ste/
44b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod sen dper na sprin gyi dra nga 'dra// 'dod sten sha za ma dang srin mo dang // bud med gzugs mi sdug dang 'dris bye bzhin// 'di ni ba lang bong burta dag dang // bag dang khyi dang wa dang
44b7(dkon brtsegs): rnga mo dang / glang cher lug rnams kyis kyang sten pa ste// 'dod pa skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis spangs// 'dod pa sten tshul khrims thos dang btong ba dang / dka' thub brtul zhugs
44b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni 'joms pa ste// 'di la rtag tu bag med nyes pa 'phel// de phyir thar 'dod rtag tu bud med spong // gal te 'jig rten 'di dag khyed 'dra ba'i// mdangs ldan
45a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can dag gis gang gyur kyang // yon tan gnas pa kho bo'i sems gcig kyang // 'dod chags la ni rnams kyang rten mi 'gyur/
45a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde stsogs dang / lha'i bu mo nyi 'di song nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ des ni 'di na bud med rnams kyi skyon
45a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag/ gang lags de dag shin tu mthong bar dogs ma mchis// ji lta de yi sems ni yul las log gyur pa/ de ltar 'dod pa rnams la sems ni chags ma mchis
45a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin grong khyer da bul po des pa'i thang du song nas tshig su bcad de smras pa/ ci zhig don gnyer nges pa chos myong ba// brtul zhugs de ni spyod pa rnam dag
45a5(dkon brtsegs): spros 'di yis nyi zla'am yang na dbang po'am// tshangs pa'am lha rgyal ci zhig khyod slong byed// nges pas smras pa/ nyi ma zla ba de bzhin brgya byin dang // tshangs pa'am
45a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'am 'di na gzhan dag kyang // 'gro brgya chen gang yod de dag kun// gar byed lta bzhin martan na// mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed// gang la skye med rga med 'ching
45a7(dkon brtsegs): me drug dang mi sdug rnams dang dra nga 'du byed// 'gro bgrol mdzadasangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes// dathong byoba'i sems kyi song bdis/ brgya byin gyis smras
45a8(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi kyi ga pa'i su'i 'ang ste// tshad kyi smin la 'ag pa legs par gru bcu tshig/ bdud rnams sde bcas myur nges par ba'om nas ni// kyis ga
45b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ldang byang chub thob gyur cig/ de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po ngas pas dus gzhan zhig na/ nor bu'in po me'i na thang med pa zhig rnyed nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te
45b2(dkon brtsegs): nor du rin po che 'jam du'i gling dmachog tu gyur pa 'di dag gis mnyan yod 'din thams cad na kyi nang na dngul po gang yin pa de la sbyin pa gor ma chag go ste nas/ de grong bar dus
45b3(dkon brtsegs): mas cad kyi nang na dbul po su yin pa de la rin po che 'di sbyin no// zhes sgra bsgrags pa dang / dbul po mgon med po phal po che de 'dus te/ bdag cag dngul
45b4(dkon brtsegs): bo yin gyis bdag cag la byin cig ces 'dzeran to// nges pas smras pa/ khyed ni dbul po ma yin gyi/ mnyan yod 'din ches dbul ba gzhan zhig yod kyis de la sbyin no
45b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis smras pa/ gang yin/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di yin// de dag gis smras pa/ khyod de skad ma zer cig/ rgyal po gsal rgyal ni phyug cing nor mongs
45b6(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod che ba yin gyi/ des pas smras pa/ nor mang gis ni ci zhig bya// rgya mtsho la ni klu rnams bzhin// gang dag la ni chog med pa// ma bsdams de dag
45b7(dkon brtsegs): dngul po yin// gang dag 'dod pa rab 'phel zhing // yang ba'i yid ni skye 'gyur ba// rmongs pa de dag che 'di dang // pha rol tu yang dngul por 'gyur// de nas grong khyer
45b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbul po des pa skye bo phal po che de dag gis yongasu bskor cing / nor bu rin po che de khyer nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi don bya ba'i sa ga la ba der song ngo //
46a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rigs dang ldan pa'i mchog lnga brgya tsam zhig g.yon nu ngu'i phyir 'dog
46a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad 'phrogs so// grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas nor bu rin po che de rgyal po la phul te/ rgyal po chen po nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa/ 'dzam bu gling thas cad
46a3(dkon brtsegs): rib bdag gis rnyedang 'di la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal to snya mo// de la bdag gis
46a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du bsams te/ khyod ni 'di na thas cad kyi nang na dbul po lagaso ste bgyid kyis/ kye nor bu rin po che 'di bzhe su gsol// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal yul
46a5(dkon brtsegs): yul por gyur cing / ngor ba ra 'gyur nas/ grong khyer gyi dngul po nges pa la 'di skad ces smras so// nges bcing khyod pas kyang ces dbul lam/ des smras pa/
46a6(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ bdag pas khyod ces dngul lags// rgyal ngos smras pa/ rnga grangs gang gis dngul ba yin/ des pas tshigs su bcad sa pa/ gang ga da
46a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ya la sa sungs su sa gying //
46a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul shed du sa ma ga lan// kyi ga sa 'di mas ni dus lags pa sems/ gang shig byams parab tu khrims sa
46b1(dkon brtsegs): bar mchis nyi / ga brgyan du na don tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing 'dod pa ma mchis la/ nyam thag mthongan nag/ snying rje bgyid cing shar gnyer bgyid par
46b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa// don drug cing na 'dzin// ra che dadapa las sogs yongs spyong gnas// gang zhig 'gro ba 'din dbang phyug rgya chen ldan la chos srung mi bgyid dang /
46b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig 'di skye bo dman ning sdug bsngal gzi ba mthong nas chad pas gcod// gang zhig rlung ma dag gis mdun bltas dga' zhing 'jog rten pa rol mig pa/
46b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos srang mi bgyid shin tu dngul zhing dman pa'i mi zhes rig par bgyi// dang nga mang ba dri ma med cing rab brtan tshul khrims dgal yang dag gnas// nag tung ma shes
46b5(dkon brtsegs): shing khrel yod thos pa 'dzin te gtong la dga' ba dang // shes rab kyi ni mthar phyin blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten kun la lta bgyid pa// de dag rtag tu mi dbul thob cing
46b6(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dod rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa lags// gang dag longs spyod rnams la rab chags 'de la dga' zhing gtong ba ma mchis la// lus dang srog la snying por 'dzin
46b7(dkon brtsegs): cing rtag par snying po don du mi gnyer dang // gang dag glang chen myos pa lta bur rtag tu yid myos rnam par rgyu ba dang // lce gcig gang dag dran pa ma mchis de dag dbul
46b8(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid ni thob pa lags// gang dag dkon mchog gsum po dri ma med la gus pa shin tu che ba dag/ lus dang srog dang ron rnams las ni rtag tu snying po sgrub pa'i mkhas pa
47a1(dkon brtsegs): dag rtag tu mi brgam sdang bar mi bgyid glen pa ma lags rab tu rgyags ma mchis// lha cig gang dag chos kyi brgyan pa de dag
47a2(dkon brtsegs): nor che skyes bu dam pa lags// lha cig me ni rtag tu nags kyi sran spyan skam po sreg pas chog ma 'tshal// lha cig 'di na rgya mtsho chu klung rnams kyi chu 'dzin pas
47a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang chog ma 'tshal// 'di ni nyi ma zla ba 'di dag mkha' la mthar gyis rgyu bas chog ma 'tshal// rgyal po banam byi rtag tu longs spyod dag gis chog mi mkhyen pas
47a4(dkon brtsegs): brlag par 'gyur// zhugs ni gum par gyur pas rtsa mang dag gis slar yang 'bar bar yod mi bgyid// de bzhin mkhas pa shes rab chog par mi 'dzin nyon mongs rnam
47a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'a ba mi 'gyid// chu'i thigs pa bzhin du rgyal srid dag kyang mi brtan 'jig par rab phyogs na// gnod pa'i rtsa bar gyur cing dge ba 'joms pa'i rgyal srid de ni su
47a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la// de nas rgyal ba gas sa rgyal sems 'khrugs nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po ngas pal 'di skad ces smras// des pa de ba'ang ni dbul la khyo
47a7(dkon brtsegs): la yang sa // des ngas smras pa/ swan bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyan yong ba nyid du bzhugs pa/
47a8(dkon brtsegs): khyo kyis lagasan ma/ rgyal bas smras pa/ ngas mthongs mdzang // rnas pas smras pa/ ma don sa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mgon sa
47b1(dkon brtsegs): tshang / chad ra 'gyur ba ste/ de ni bdag gi dbang lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ song la de bzhin gshegs pa de sun myos nipa dang / desa'i nang du 'angabs
47b2(dkon brtsegs): bad ni chungs zung ba bya'o// des ngas smras pa/ sngon pa de la bungam/ mo gzhan bdang 'os ma lags// 'dir ni bdag gis bsam bgyis na/
47b3(dkon brtsegs): nas ni gshegs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di'am pha rol la// de ni mi mkhyen cang mi mnga'// thugs kyis bas mkhyen nas kyang // 'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur
47b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la thugs brtsengs// de la nga rgyal skyo mo mnga'// sems can rnams la legs dgongs pas// shin tu ring du'ang gshegs 'gyur gyis// rgyal chen
47b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis gas pa la// nga ni legs par thugs ches mdzod// gang gis bston pa 'dir gshegs pa'i// bden pa'i byin rlabs bgyi bar 'tshal// me tog spos dang
47b6(dkon brtsegs): me tog 'breng // rgyal mtshan gdugs dang byug pa dang // sil snyan sa gon mdzod cig dang // 'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur// nges pas thal mo sbyar nas kyang // phrag pa
47b7(dkon brtsegs): cig tu gos gzar 'dug/ pus mo sa la bcugs byas nas// 'di skad du ni tshig kyang smras// kun mkhyen bden pa gang gis// bdag gis bsam pa mkhyen cen
47b8(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i tshig ni 'di nyid kyi// thub pa bdag gis mdun du bzhugs// de nas tshig 'di smras nas kyang // sa ni rab tu g.yos par 'gyur// sa gzhi rnopar brtos
48a1(dkon brtsegs): nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa byung bar gyur// rdzu 'phrul dag dang ldan pa yi// nyan thos lnga brgyas yongasu bskor// brgya phrag bcug
48a2(dkon brtsegs): sred dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// skyong ba dang ni lha dang klu// brgya byin pa tshangs pas mdun gyis bltas// de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul mthong nas ni// de
48a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten ngo mtshar 'dzin// rgyal po dpung bcas blon por bcas// ston pa'i zhabs la 'dud par byed// der ni srog chags stong dag gis// ston pa la ni mchod
48a4(dkon brtsegs): ba byas/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchong byas nas/ byang chub don du ming btud ngo // de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo mos phyag
48a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yod 'diran khyam zhing mchis mchis pa
48a6(dkon brtsegs): las/ nor burin po 'i mang ma mchis pa'i ga rnye nas/ des bdag 'disal 'gyid/ mnyan mod 'din thams cad kyi nang nang dngul po gang lags pa de la
48a7(dkon brtsegs): tosnyam nas/ de la bdag 'dis bgyid de/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni thams cad kyi nang na ches dbul bste/ 'di ni pha rol gyi nor 'phrog par bgyid pas na nges
48a8(dkon brtsegs): bas pags// sa shi dug rang byed pasan shi 'jas bsangs// gzhan gyi sangs spyod dag gis dngas pa 'jal palags/
48b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba rnams la rnam par tho'ajam pa lags// sgyir pa rnams rna ma 'byin pa lags so// dngul po rnams rab tu byung bar bgyid pa lags// drub
48b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams char gcod pa lags// shin tu rab tu myos pa lags so// rgyal po 'das skyong rnams dang / sred pas rnam par bcings pa lags so snya nas/ de la bdag gi
48b3(dkon brtsegs): srul na/ len par mi bgyid par 'di skad du/ de ltar nga ni dbul la khyod ni 'byor par khyod la dbang su yod ces mchi'o// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sos can thams
48b4(dkon brtsegs): cad la thugs snyoms pa/ ngo zlog mi skyong ba pa mi mnga' batha ba dang / dri ma dang / 'ong khro ba mi mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di legs par lung bstan par gsol
48b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod ni che 'di'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi longs spyod gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang /
48b6(dkon brtsegs): dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / bzhon pa dang / mdzod dang
48b7(dkon brtsegs): bang mdzod thob pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag phyug go ste du semaso// rgyal po chen po nges pa ni bzhi pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdoms pa dang / bzod pa dang
48b8(dkon brtsegs): nges pa dang / rdul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / bag yod pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad sbyangs pa la gnas pa dang / byam pa dang
49a1(dkon brtsegs): snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dang ba dang / dadang dang / tshul
49a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / brtan pa dang / sdom pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag phyag go snyam
49a3(dkon brtsegs): du sems so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi 'og tu gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag 'di gar khyod dang 'dra bar nor dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag ni/ des pas gom pa
49a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun dong nga'i bar gyis tshul khrims dang / bathos pa dang / brtu la zhugs dang / bka' klub dang / ngag yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i rgya'i char yang nye bar mi ba
49a5(dkon brtsegs): ba nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag gnas
49a6(dkon brtsegs): pani bdag gis rjod pa legs par byed pa lags so// bcom ldam 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che banyid 'dil
49a7(dkon brtsegs): gas sa// des rgyal pogs sa rgyas kyis des latshigs su smra pa/ rkyed kyis seMs ngas pa ba rgyas des sa
49a8(dkon brtsegs): na pa sa / mtshams na tu tshun 'dus sa/ kyis pa na gyis kya dag nangs na/ rdzu
49b1(dkon brtsegs): dag tung rgyal gyis kyang bslus// sdig pa'i grogs po dag gis bsko cing bzung ba las// des pa khyod nyid las ni chos 'di thos pas na// rab tu bsdams te kho bos chos
49b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin spyad par bya// khyim na gnas pa brgya phrag lnga po 'di dag ni// nor gyi ched du kho bos por bcug pa ste// kho bas thams cad btang gis bde bar khyer bar gyis/
49b3(dkon brtsegs): phyin chad 'di 'dra ba dag kho bo yang mi byed// lnga ngargya btang bar gyur pa gang yin de dag kyang // des pa la ni zhes legs par bskyed nas kyang // sems ni skyo ba ra gyur cing cil
49b4(dkon brtsegs): yang mi lta bar// bde ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam btang // nga ni dngul po ma yin khyod ni dbul po zhes// nges pa khyed kyi tshig 'di legs par smras pa ste/
49b5(dkon brtsegs): nges pa la ni gang zhig dbul po zhes brjod pa// mi de rgyal po'i khrims dang 'gal bar byed pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu nges pas 'di skad ces gsol
49b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la lta bas chog ma 'tshal ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ ci nas 'di dag
49b7(dkon brtsegs): gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don mchis par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'di dag la legs par chos bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nges pa
49b8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu ches bzhi dang ldanan/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// bzhig shen/ yid ches pa dang / dad pa dang / 'bangs par 'dzin pa dang
50a1(dkon brtsegs): gus pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ de bzhin
50a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong na// bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gcu
50a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni smra bar mi mdzad pa'i phyir/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag par sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad rton cing cher rab tu grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ yang
50a4(dkon brtsegs): sems de bskyed pa dang / dkon mchog gsu gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung bar yang sems de bskyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldanan
50a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ gzugs dben par mthong ba dang / nor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna
50a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa par mthong bdang / khams pani dang mkha' dang 'dra ba mthong ba dang / skye mched grong srongab sa bur mthong ba ste/ bzhi ba de dag dang sngon pa de bzhin gshe
50a7(dkon brtsegs): pa legs par mthong ba yin do// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pa dang / sems can med pa'i phyi'i sems can rnam pa' dag par
50a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdzo sa sa/ pa da kyi yang ga sa/ dayongs sa na/ ga sa pag
50b1(dkon brtsegs): na/ / myed pa da / sa kyi mamamam
50b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi spyan rjes rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi ba do dag dang ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gas pa ma thong bayinano// gzhan yang ba
50b3(dkon brtsegs): gas pa da ngas kyi drang ba yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams ca ma pa pad kyi phyi nga dzin gyi dang po yang su ngas pa dang tshig rten las 'das pa
50b4(dkon brtsegs): sa 'ang du tud pa'i phyi shes rab kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / de'i rnam par grol ba thong ba'i phyi rnam par grol ba yi shes mthong ba'i drung ba yongs su dag pas
50b5(dkon brtsegs): nges pa rigs kyi du chos bzhi po de dag dang ldanan/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po
50b6(dkon brtsegs): dag chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par mdzad nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po sngar 'khor dang bcas te bar snangal gshegs so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
50b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ rigs kyi bu nges pa la 'di skad ces smras so// des pa khyod nam de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe kho ba la yang ston cig dang
50b8(dkon brtsegs): kho bo yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'gro'o// des sa smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de ltar bgyi'o// bdag ni khyod bud med dang / gzhon nu dang
51a1(dkon brtsegs): blon po las stsogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gzigs su gsol gshegs par 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen
51a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag gcig bul phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ri 'khor bal chen mdzes so// rgyal pos smras pa
51a3(dkon brtsegs): nges pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'kho ga yid/ nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po yongs su srid par bgyid pa dang / gdul ba'i slad du sems can thams cad ni byang
51a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du
51a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can g.yon can 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang
51a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dopa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po byor mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i 'dun pa drag po ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can
51a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs pa kyi gyur dzin bye sa dpa mags so// rdul pa pasarnas pa rgyam tshams la ba ngas su
51a8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni kyang chubs sa pa ga pa rigasas// rgyal ban thasems can gdas mas canamangs su nga byed nga 'gyur ba'i ba
51b1(dkon brtsegs): ni byang ru sengs dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can le lo can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i brtsor 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lag
51b2(dkon brtsegs): so rgyal po rin po sems can rnam par g.yengs pa yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems ca
51b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jal ba'i shes rab can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad sems snyoms
51b4(dkon brtsegs): nga'i byams pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lagaso// rgyal po chen po 'khor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying rje'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen
51b5(dkon brtsegs): po chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa'i dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po rje su 'chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba'i btang stso/
51b6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems
51b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i 'khor lagaso// rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs stsogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'kho
51b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
52a1(dkon brtsegs): lags so// rgyal po chen po tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i bde pa dang / mi nub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so//
52a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po spobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i mi 'phya ba dang / 'bring skad mi bgyid pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po brjed
52a3(dkon brtsegs): nges par mi 'gyur ba'i thos pa'i yo byang stsogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slob dper dang / mkhan
52a4(dkon brtsegs): pol gus pa'i rang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po ched po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pal 'gyur ba'i thos pa 'dzin pa'i ni byang chub sems dpa'i
52a5(dkon brtsegs): lams so// rgyal bzhin po de bzhin gshegs pathams pa kyi na yang dag par 'dzi ni nga chub sems dpa'i 'kho gas// rgyal po chen po dge
52a6(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams pa 'gyu da lags pa mas pa la mas// rnal ba sems pa mas
52a7(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams rgya sa na rlu
52a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi gas la na
52a9(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
52b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po la 'os pa'i ras bcos bu zung stong chos la dga' ba'i phyir nges pa la byin no// nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag la bkur sti dang mchod pa ladzang
52b2(dkon brtsegs): bas 'jal to// gang gis bdag la 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gos ras rul ba'i dum bu brgya btsems pa bdag la mchis kyis/ bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pad
52b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas shing yongasu 'dzin btsas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal to// rgyal po chen po dpyid kyi dus ni ras rul ba'i dum bu'i gos 'di shing gi yal ga la bkal te
52b4(dkon brtsegs): dgung gcig gam/ dgung gnyis sam/ dgung bcu'i dgung brgyar mchis kyang / de la su yang len pa ma mchis shing / de la su yang chags pa
52b5(dkon brtsegs): sems skyed pa ma mchis te/ bdag kyang de bor na sa mi lta bar mchi ba'i dus de mchiso// rgyal po chen po bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / yong su 'dzin pa dang
52b6(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshalo// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpas ni gang la bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang 'dod pa bskyed
52b7(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gos bcad par bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ nges pa gal te de ltar ras bcos bu zung 'di dag khyod mi lenan/ kho bo snying brtse ba'i
52b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir rkang pas rdzis shig/ nges pas lha de bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes smras nas/ ras bcos bu zung de dag la nang pas brdzis te song ngo // rgyal pos smras pa
53a1(dkon brtsegs): / tshang sa ma gyur ba dus pa \u0f7f/ ngas byas smrasapa/ rtul bzhin shAngs na
53a2(dkon brtsegs): sa rkyenazhes smra sa/ gas
53a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bya'o// ras kyis bu zung de dag dbus po de dag gis pa gos ramag tu 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ bdag cag gis nges pa la'i skar 'anas par byasnyam pa las
53a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi phyid kyi bdang sa dang / des pa'o na lam gyi stobs kyis/ de dag gis de snang bas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod pa bzhin du lan ni sar
53a5(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang spos dang thug pa dang // zas sgom nor rnams kyis kyang mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' des bdaga' bar 'gyur// nges pa gos dang rdzas la
53a6(dkon brtsegs): ma ma te/ dang bku suM grags pa 'dod ma yin// nges pa byung chub sems las chos 'did // byang chub sems kyis nges pa dga' bste// de nas dus pa
53a7(dkon brtsegs): zhegs rigs kyi bunges pa dang / rgyal po gas la rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas blon po dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan mad kyi skyes pa dang du
53a8(dkon brtsegs): / du ro dang / srog chags rgya zag pa yod/ maldan nas ngan 'du 'dang // des nas can mo dang/
53b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du lta'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'khor gyi khyams chen po bkra / blta na sdug pa/ yangs shing mthol rgyan thams cad kyis brgya pa 'dig ste
53b2(dkon brtsegs): dang na sum cu cu gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba lta bu ni ga sbrul te/ dbus su shing yangs 'dul ba rtog stsal to// yongs 'dus parol gyi
53b3(dkon brtsegs): du yang / bco ldan 'das kyi gang na seng ge'i khri bkra ba/ bltan sdug cing chu zhing gab pa la lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba mngon par sprul to// byang chub
53b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi stan drug khri dag kyang mngon par sprul to// lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs las stsogs pa lha'i bu mo khri nyis stong yang me tog dang / 'dug pa dang
53b5(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / lha'i tsin+dan gyi phye ma dag khyer nas/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag byed cing / nges pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir
53b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyise ge'i khri brgya nga 'byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye ba'i tshogs chen po de dag 'ong bar thug su chud nas/ gtsugs pa khang nas drung ste
53b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan sa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing / ga de bshams pas bzhugs// de nas rgyal po dri za'i bu gzug zung ldabs sna'i bu me na
53b8(dkon brtsegs): bzlas pa/ bar mgyu // nges pami gangs bya ba'i 'i chun gyi sna dang / bu'i dbyas kyis de bzhi gshegs pa la mayod pabya'o// de nas 'i du mom
54a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam dang thabs cig tu brgyud kyi bsgyur sbyar ba'i rigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod pa/ khyod kyis bskal pa brgya
54a2(dkon brtsegs): ni sngar chad dka' thub sung // khyod ni bsdu bdag dang dul dang sprin la dgyes// khyod kyi sku gsung thugs rnams yongs su dag pa ste// srid gsum 'jig rten ba
54a3(dkon brtsegs): malan 'ad/ phyag 'tshal// khyod ni zab mi mnga' bzod dang byams la dgyes// khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang stobs kyi pha rol gshegs// khyo
54a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bsam gtan blo dang tshul rnams sa dgyes// dri ma gsum gyi zhes pasel la 'dag dag 'tshal// khyod ni 'dod chags ni sdang gti mugasel la dgyes/
54a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni thugs ni gad snyoms lathugs rje ldan// khyod ni sang dag gsung 'i dam pa'i don yang mkhyen// srid pa gsu po ba mdzangs bdag phyaga'as/
54a6(dkon brtsegs): khyed nam yang ba rnams kyi kyi sems pa ma // khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams mtha' dgasal// khyod ni mthong ba rnams sa mchog tu dga' ba mdza
54a7(dkon brtsegs): sa rgyal la sngag gis rgya sumachi bar gyi// bu'i bu ma mtshaga'i dod dgas chags rtsu ba// gang gi mthong de sa ma sa' bar gyur/
54a8(dkon brtsegs): ma dras sa sa
54b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis// legs par btsun pa gsal ba'i yon tan mchog mnga' bya// gsung mchog mi'i dam pa gsung ni yang 'dag/ mtshungs pa med pa'i 'a
