54b2(dkon brtsegs): mnga' khyod la bdag phyaga' ral// 'phags pa 'jam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog phyag mthil sdug/ grub pa'i sku stong seng ge'i 'dra'i dbyung tshe snapas//
54b3(dkon brtsegs): chags legs shing shangs legs rnams skams mdzes// dpal gyi snying pos kyi thub mchig khyod la 'dung// rgyal ba yon tan brgya phrag dag gis rgyas gyur
54b4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs shin tu dga' bskyed mdzad bstod pa yi// bsod nams yon tan mtha' yas bsgrubs pa gang lags pa// de yis 'dir ni 'jig rte sangs rgyas pa
54b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu nges pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag gis yongasu bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ lpags nas/ bcom
54b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos pag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'dug/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rigs kyi du nges pa la khri'u bstan bzang po bdag nyid
54b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin te/ 'di la 'dug shig ces byas nas/ rigs kyi bu nges pa khri'u bstan bzang po de la 'dug go/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang byas pa
54b8(dkon brtsegs): yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lamagri bas phyag 'tshal nas/ rang rang gi stan la 'khod de de na rigs kyi bu gang dag gis nges pasngor ma mthong ba de dag
55a1(dkon brtsegs): / smras / da nga
55a2(dkon brtsegs): sa das / maldan
55a3(dkon brtsegs): nas ma / sa sa
55a4(dkon brtsegs): smra
55a5(dkon brtsegs): ma kyi ma
55b1(dkon brtsegs): shes la gnas kyang mi shes par snor cing / mi shes par ston kyang shes par snang ba 'di ri de'i bkod pa yin no// ye shes mthob pa rnams la yang lus kyi spyod pa dang stsang
55b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis dad pa skyed par byed cing / ye shes thob pa rnams la yang spyod pa thams cad yang dag par ston pas rdzu 'phrul ston pa 'di ni de'i bkong pa yin no// rtag tu sems lang bang
55b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pas ngan cing dbul bar stod kyang tshangs pas kyang mchod pa dang / mchog gi bkod pa la gnas kyang spyi ba pal gyis kyang mchod pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// sems
55b4(dkon brtsegs): car bsdu ba'i phyir ngan cing dbul bar yang nye bar ston la/ sems can rnams mngon par 'byung ba bskyed pa'i phyir longs spyod rgya chen po dang ldan yang / mngon par 'byung ba
55b5(dkon brtsegs): stong pa 'dir de'i bkod pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu nges pas ji srid cig
55b6(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa gyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kur dga' bo rigs kyi bu nges pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa
55b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rdul bu su ma tshogs pa bzod pa gsum thor pa/ spobs pa thob pa/ mngon pa 'ashes pas rnam par bye bar byas pa/ sems can mongs slor par bya bal mi khos pas
55b8(dkon brtsegs): ngan cing dbul bas se cad rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das dran cing dngul ba 'dis sems can ji snyed cig btul lags/ bcoM ldan 'das kyi bas
56a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu'abum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas te/ mi rnams
56a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji srid cig na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
56a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa rnams ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ ming ni ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig tu 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
56a4(dkon brtsegs): ngol tshigs su 'acad de dka' stsal pa/ sems can don la brtson dang brtul zhugs brtan pa dang // grags pa rgya chen dag gis bsam mi khyab byas dang // byang chub yon
56a5(dkon brtsegs): kun gnas pa'i spyod pa'i 'dra ba// ngas ni khyod la bshad kyis kur dga' khyod nyon cig/ 'di na rgyal la mchod mchog phyir ni gus byed cing // dam pa'i chos ni rab tu bsrung
56a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir rtson byed pa// des pa yini spyod pa'i rnam pa mang po gang yin pa// de dag 'dir ni bgrang bar nus par mi 'gyur// pha rol phyin pa 'di dag la ni legs par bslangs/
56a7(dkon brtsegs): 'an par shes dag gis su rtsi byas// tshangs pa'i gdas rnams kyis rimatha' rang byi par song // thabs sa mkhas pa'i slong pa dag la legs par bslangs
56a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni yis 'dus pas skyon rnams legs par mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub kyang ni mngon sum gyur par byas// 'dis ni sems can ji lta ji lta mthar 'gyur ba'i/
56b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid la yang legs par skabs// 'jigs pa med cing blo dang rdzogs dang dran dang ldan// spobs pa dang ni gzungs rnams dang sang ldan pa ste// bdud kyi lpags
56b2(dkon brtsegs): gyan mangs rdzas las des 'byung zhing // sangs rgyas spyong yul ngon cen la ni rab tu gnas// 'jig rten chos rnams pang po dag gis mgos le// chags pa las sogs
56b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis brag ltar yong mi g.yas// su'i drung du mi 'gro 'ang bar byed pa'ang min// na mkha' lta bur bcings dang grol ba med pa yin// snying rjer gnas shing sems kyang
56b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs skyo ba med// shin tu bsdams shing nem nur can la byams sems ldan// sems can kun la bdag dang 'dra'ar sdug par lta// skyon la mi lta 'khrug pa dag dang ldan ma yin
56b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa rnams la gnas// 'di ni ji skad smras pa bzhin du spong bar byed// chos nyid la ni chos kyi tshul gyis legs par bsrabs// stong pa nyid la
56b6(dkon brtsegs): mos shing gnyis las rnam par grol// bzod pa gsuM tho ba skye ba'i spyod yul ma yin te// sangs rgyas tshul dang yon tan dag la rab tu gnas// 'di ni 'jig rten gang du
56b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu bar byed pa ni// der ni skye bo mang po rnam pa 'grol bar byed// sangs rgyas kyi ni sras 'di gang du gnas pa der// de bzhin gshegs pas yul ni stong pa ma yin te/
56b8(dkon brtsegs): de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lus par// ji ltar sangs rgyas bzhin du 'di la gus par gyis// nga ni mya ngan 'das nas nyams pa'i dus pa batshe// des pa 'di ni
57a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa spyad nas/ sngon chad gnas pa mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten khas// mi 'khrugs 'jig rter nyid du phyir yang 'gro bar 'gyur/
57a2(dkon brtsegs): brtan po srog chags rnams la phan par bya ba dang // zhing gi 'byor pa dag ni yongasu btsal ba dang // byang chub tu ni sems can yongs su smin 'phyir// bskal pa grangs
57a3(dkon brtsegs): med gsu du spyad pa spyod par byed// de yi 'og tu de ni skyob pa rgyal bar 'gyur// ming ni 'jig rten rgyal po dbang phyug ces kyang bya// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhe
57a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yi zhing dang ngo'i 'jig rten du ni mtshungs pa yon// 'jig rten khams de legs par stsal pa zhes bya ste// yon tan thams cad dang ni ldan par 'gyur ba yin/
57a5(dkon brtsegs): de tshe'i tshad ni lo khri grub par 'gyur// de yi dge 'dun shin tu mang ste 'grang las 'das// nyan thos theg pa can gyi dge 'dun nyung bar 'gyur// phal cher byang chub don du brtson
57a6(dkon brtsegs): pa byas nas su// de dag thams cad ye shes stobs dang rdzu 'phrul ldan// rnam par thar pa rnams dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med// gcig tu nges par chos ni legs par bshad rnam
57a7(dkon brtsegs): sa 'ag rnam padas de dag tus chen bsgrags par 'gyur// de 'dra rnams rnyed cing srid per chags pa med// de dgams cad yang dpa ga cing rnam pa 'ad/
57a8(dkon brtsegs): de ba gshegs dayongs su su ma ngas byas// son brgya na dgams panisag rnas suyang // deyid ma pa'i chos ni rang tu myo gyur// da
57b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi tshul ni 'khrugs pa med// des pa de gang dag yongasu sbyin byas pa// de dag byang chub bla na med pa'i din du spyod// zhing de'i sems can gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba
57b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams de dag ces cad skyon rnams dang na bral ba yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa'i lung bstan pa bshad ma thag tu// de nas de'i che song gsu gyi snying chen
57b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / rgyan gyi char yang mngon par bab bo// tham cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis kya
57b4(dkon brtsegs): rang rang gi gos rjes rigs kyi bu des pa la bkab po// tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / bram ze brgya phrag mang po dag kyang rab tu byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das la de
57b5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu dbyung bar gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bu rigs kyi bu des pa'i mgo bo la
57b6(dkon brtsegs): phyag gis byugaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu nges pa'i mgo bo la reg ma thag tu gos ngur smrig bgos shing dge slong du snang bar gyur to// de nas bco ldan 'das
57b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis rtse dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo snyigs ma lnga po dus kyi snyigs ma dang / seMs can gyi sdigs ma dang / zhing gi snyig ma
57b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe'i snyigs me dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dris/ ngang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de des pas ji ltar 'dus pa las rnam pa gzhan gyis
58a1(dkon brtsegs): gdul bar mi bya'o// kun dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du sangs rgyas kyi 'dul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar mi byed kyi/
58a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo ni ngan cing dbul ba dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa sdigs pas sems can rnams 'dul byed do// kun dga' bo gal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rangs
58a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis yul gyi chos bstan cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis nye bar bstan du zin na/ sems can gcig kyang 'dul bar mi 'gyur la/ chos kyang rtog par
58a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na des pa ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa de bzhin du/ khyod kyis kyang sems can 'dul bar gyis shig/ kun dga' bo sems can
58a5(dkon brtsegs): dad pa can dang / rnam rtog pa mang bdag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos dang pa rnyed cing / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa'i 'gyur ro// bcom
58a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' des pa dang / byang chub sems dang 'de dag dang / dge slong na
58a7(dkon brtsegs): sa khyo du/ bral po gas rgyas dang / da/ da/ rnams dang / bas pa'i 'ag na sa te/
58a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gsungs pal man pa 'dra // 'phags padag mtshig 'ardzogs pa ched ma chis kyi rnam grangs kyi'i 'i sang drag tumasas
58b1(dkon brtsegs): de sa sus pa'i yi nas byas/ sa pa rdzogs / rgyag gyi ma khan po 'dzin mi dang / su na d+hA/ nuchen gyi
58b2(dkon brtsegs): bcwol gyichos sde las sogs pas bsgyur kyang zhes te gtan la babapa/ rgya gar srad du/ ar bI dang tanga'i bring can ma ma yan su
58b3(dkon brtsegs): bo skad du/ 'phags pa dpas byin gyis nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gcig sangs rgyas dang byang chub
58b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgor meng zas
58b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong gnyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan
58b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grel pa/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag
58b7(dkon brtsegs): gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i sa pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha'o/
58b8(dkon brtsegs): tu son pa/ mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa sha sta ga ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang chub sems dpa' la
59a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugaso// de'i tshe grong khyer chen po mnyan yongon
59a2(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag dpas sbyin zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor che ba bdag dbang ba mang ba dang / nor dang yo byad mang ba/ nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang / bang pa'i tshogs mang ba/ glang po
59a3(dkon brtsegs): che dang / rta dang rnga ma dang ra lug dang / ba lang mang ba/ bran po bran lo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba/ dbyig dang gser dang / nor bu dang mu tig dang
59a4(dkon brtsegs): dr-ibyadang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le snam dang / dbul mang bzhig gnas pade/ khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu 'dus te 'dug par gyu
59a5(dkon brtsegs): tode dag 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe/ ba srabasu 'di lta bu'i gtam brjod do// kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung brnyed par dka'/ mir skye bskyed pa dka'/ ngal pa
59a6(dkon brtsegs): pur su ma tshogs pa rnyed par dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa sa dad pa rnyed pa dka' rab tu 'byung ba rnyeng par dka'/ dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/ nan tan
59a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa rnyed par dka'/ sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes la gang dag byas pa rlung dri yang chung mi gzon na/ mang po la ci smos te/ de dag rnyed par dka
59a8(dkon brtsegs): sa pa sems cadag dag de bzhin gshegs papa bsu pa sa med ni bdedag ces da pa dka'/ de ngas kya sems cad gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstanapa
59b1(dkon brtsegs): ces nan gyis smrab ces rnye pa / de bas kyang sems cad ga dag de bzhi gshegs pa'i bgyu pa la mangs pa de dag rjes rnyed pa dka'/ ba
59b2(dkon brtsegs): la brnyed dka2/ ci bdag cag ca thos kyi theg pas yongs mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'am/ bod tres 'angasangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam/ 'og zag pa
59b3(dkon brtsegs): po bla na med pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya zhes mthun par 'dus te/ 'khod pa de dag thams cad de lta bu'i dpyod pa skyes nas/ bdag cag sreg pa chen po bla ma
59b4(dkon brtsegs): med pas yongs mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni mchog yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma yin nos mo// de nas khyi bdag/
59b5(dkon brtsegs): rabs byin khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu grong khyer chen po mnyan yod nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
59b6(dkon brtsegs): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
59b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim
59b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyed don gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du lhags
60a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag cig tu gzar nas/ pus me
60a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lcang sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
60a3(dkon brtsegs): dus gcig cig na/ bdag cag khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam gcig tu 'dus te/ mchis par gyur nas/ de'i tshe bdag cag 'dus te mchis pa thams cad par skabs su 'di lta
60a4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bka' mchid brjod par 'di 'byung ste/ kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ mir skye ba rnyed pa rnyed par dka'/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed
60a5(dkon brtsegs): nga dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka' ba rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka'/ dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/ nan tan byed pa rnyed par dka'
60a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes la/ gang dag byas pa chung du yang chung mi gzon/ mang po lta smos te de dag rnyed par dka'/ de ngas kyang sems can ga
60a7(dkon brtsegs): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches nas nan tan
60a8(dkon brtsegs): grub pa de dag ches rnyed pa dka'/ de bas kyang sems cad gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mdzes pa de dag ches rnyed pa dka'/ 'khor ba las grol brnyed
60b1(dkon brtsegs): / mas ma / rgyas s+thAswA/
60b2(dkon brtsegs): ngas dus su gangs ma pa gas pa ma na kyim sa// mam ma ma ma sa pa sa smras
60b3(dkon brtsegs): bachen po blan med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bla ba ni mchog lags kyi/ nyanams kyi theg pas ni ma lags so// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma lags pa sam
60b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyid de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos kyi skyes 'di dang rmas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thang du mchis
60b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar bslab par
60b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bde bar gshegs pa'i ltar bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsrung par 'gyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpas
60b7(dkon brtsegs): byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la leg so// zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag rnams legs se legs// khyim bdag rnam khyed 'di lta tha
60b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thang du lhags pa
61a1(dkon brtsegs): khyed yang legs so// khyim bdag rnams de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
61a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pas ji ltar bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgru
61a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba ngas khyed la shad do// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no zhes gsol to// khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag bcom ldan
61a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
61a5(dkon brtsegs): bo blan med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pas/ seMs can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems
61a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed parang / kun tu bsten par bya/ nges par bsten par bya/ bsgom par bya/ mang du bya'o// khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
61a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po des pas lus la chags pa mi bya/ srog la chags par bya/ de bzhin du nor dang 'bru dang / khyim dang / rlung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo nas la chags
61a8(dkon brtsegs): pa mi bya/ bza' ba dang / lung ba dang / bgo bdang / banod pa dang / mal dang / me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / sras dang / phyag pa
61b1(dkon brtsegs): phreng brnanas pa rnags pa ma bya/ yo bya mas la chags pa mi ng+tha/ deci phyi shen/ khyim pa ga rnams sems can ga'i la che lus pa sug
61b2(dkon brtsegs): chags par gyur nas/ sdig pa'i las rnams byed de/ de dag sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags pa de dag ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmus pa
61b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams skye'o// sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ lus dang srog lam chags par byas na bde 'gro rnams su skye'o// khyim bdag rnam
61b4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'o dod pas sems can tham pa'i
61b5(dkon brtsegs): la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de lus la chags par mi bya/ srog la chags par mi bya/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bud
61b6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo rnams la chags par mi bya/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / dgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / sras dang
61b7(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ba dang / byug pa rnams la chags par mi bya/ yo byad thams cad la chags par mi bya/ bdog pa thas cad la yongasu btang bar yongasu btung ba mang ba
61b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa la 'de par bya/ tshul khrims rna pa gsum ying su dag par tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par bya/ sems can thams kyis nyes par byas
62a1(dkon brtsegs): la ji snyal par bzod pa dang / des pa phun sum tshogs par bya/ lus dang srog la mi lta bar brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po bgo bar bya/ rnam par mi
62a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba'i sems kyis sems rtse cig tu bya/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bur lta
62a3(dkon brtsegs): bdang bral bas shes rab kyis rnam par dpyang par mkhas par bya/ des sbyin pa na sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ sbyin pa sbyin sems can thams cad yid la byas
62a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te bzod pa bsgom par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te brtson 'grus brtsom par bya/ sems
62a5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad yid la byas te/ bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag par bya/ sems can thams cad yid byas te/ shes rab bsgom par bya/ sems can thams
62a6(dkon brtsegs): cad yid la byas te thabs la mkhas pa la bslab par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya rtsal de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
62a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni lus la ngas zhing gnas pa lags sa// srog la lha zhing gnas pa lags/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim
62a8(dkon brtsegs): rung bang / bu dang du marnams pa gzhing gnas pa legs/ bza' ba dang / 'dung ba dang / dge dang / pan pa dang / ral dang sras dang 'dug pa dang / 'drang
62b1(dkon brtsegs): drug pa rnams la la zhing gnas pa lags/ yo byad thams cad la lta zhing gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'i ltarang byang chub sems dpa' so sor rtog cing lus la miH/
62b2(dkon brtsegs): ba lags/ bde bar gshegs pa de ltar srog la mi lta ba lags/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / rlung ma dang / bu dang bu mo rnams la molnga pa las
62b3(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / dgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la mi lta ba lags
62b4(dkon brtsegs): yo byad thams cad la mi lta ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gyis khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
62b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus 'di la rnam pa du mar so sor brtag par bya'o rna ba du ma gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus 'di mthar gyis grub
62b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mthar gyis 'jig pa dang / rdul phra rab bsags pa dang / khong stong dang / bgye dgu can dang / bu ga dgu dang / spu'i khung bu nas zag pa dang / grog mkhar
62b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar sbrul gdug pa'i gnasu gyur pa dang / sbrul gdug pa ltar byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ma skyes dgra'i spre'u ltar grog la 'khu ba dang / shi gnyen ngan pa ltar 'drid pa'i bdag
62b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid can dang / dbu ba rdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba dang / chu'i chu bur ltar byung nas 'jig cing 'gyur ba dang / smig rgyu ltar sla ba'i bdag nyid can dang / chu shing
63a1(dkon brtsegs): sngar bshig na snying po med pa dang / sgyu ma lta su pa'i bdag nyid can dang / rgyal po ltar bsgo blag mang ba dang dgra ltar grags su pa
63a2(dkon brtsegs): rkun po ltar yid banan du mi rung bzhag dang / gshed ma ltar rjes tshogs pa med pa dang / mi mdza' bltar mi phan par 'dod pa dang / gsod pa ltar shes rab kyi srog
63a3(dkon brtsegs): go bar chad byed pa dang / phyir rgol ba ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang / grong stong ltar bdag dang bral ba dang / rdza mkhan gyi snod ltar mtha
63a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa dang / s+yong gar mi gtsang bsnga tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang / spang ba'i sdong lta mi gtsang ba zag pa dag dang / sbrul dang mi dang khyi'i ri ltar dri min
63a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ngan sngags kyi khung sa mi gcung ba'i 'drung gnas dang / mtha' ba skyod mi brjod pa dang / zug rdul gnod pa'i bdag nyid ca dang / rje bo ltar bsnyen
63a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ad/ 'ab dang / kha zhi ltar bcos sde lags kyi zhing brten pa dang / kyu ny-i skar bcos legs bya nang srid pa dang / dum bsom padang blta nan te gyi
63a7(dkon brtsegs): byu padang/ thugs pa ma dun pa gang+gA rnaMs su nga dashes pa dang / na'argya gaman zhus pa dang / chuklung che ba'i d+ha ma
63a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi la cu 'dang / zang ngam kyim 'i drug la gas tha ba dang / mgrod med pa gnas ga ma su ru
63b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun srungs lta gsug gis bsgrub par bya ba dang / mtha' 'khob kyi grong khyer ltar rtag tu gnod pard 'byung ba dang / bye ma'i grong khyer lta rtag
63b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can dang / me ga tshig gos pa dang / rgya mtsho ltar dgang dka' ba dang / sbrul gyi gse lta nan tan gyis bag bya ba dang / byas pa
63b3(dkon brtsegs): rlung draltar rtag tu yongs su bskyang dgos pa dang / snod cag pa lar rtag tu bag bya dgos pa dang / yul dang wA nag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / sa dug can la
63b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu yongs su sung bar bye bad 'a tshig dkris pa'i phyi sdod par ma lta bu dang / 'khrur bu'i byi shi rnamal bu yin pa'i di gag tu spros pardung bar bya
63b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim dag na pas gnan mang byang chub sems dang 'bras 'di thog pa ding / mthama'i rgyal so so'i brtag par bya'o// pa ma'i khu chu dang khrag 'dus pa las
63b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ste/ 'di la khu chu dang khrag ni lus kyi thog ma'i rgyu yin/ tha ra'i rgyu ni las 'ju ba la sogs pa ste/ kham gyis bza' ba zas thos mthag tu dang kan
63b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'tshar// 'ad zhin gyi gnas dran nas par kun gyis rgyung rgyang bar te/ na tu mi gtsang bar gyuraro// de'i 'og tu mkhris pa gnas
63b8(dkon brtsegs): ma 'i tshun sun smra gyu/ nga sa ga su gyur// 'us byung gi gnas ca nas rlung gas chogs mamag
64a1(dkon brtsegs): rus pa la rkang ro//
64a2(dkon brtsegs): dngas ma logs shig tu rnam par 'byed de/ tshigs ma las ni gcin dang / ngan skyugs la stsogs te dri ma rnams 'byung / dngas ma
64a3(dkon brtsegs): las ni khrag tu 'gyur te/ khrag las sha'o// sha las tshil lo tshil las rus pa'o// rkang las khu chu'o// khu chu los 'di lta ste/ de ltar thog ma dang mtha' ma'i rgyu mi
64a4(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ba'i phyir lus mi gtsang bar byang chub sems dpa' bsam par bya'o// lus la mi gtsang bar lta ba na byang chub sems dpas 'di lta snya ma du bsam par bya ste/
64a5(dkon brtsegs): lus shes bya ba 'di ni dris pa sum brgya drug cus khog pa baspang ba/ shing ngan pa'i khyim ltar tshigs sum brgya sbyar ba/ rtsa'i dra bzhi brgyas grags pa/ sha s+phar lnga brgyas
64a6(dkon brtsegs): galags pa/ du ma ma drug gis khebs pa/ rtsa bdun rgyas gang ba/ rgyas pa 'dun rgyas 'brel ba/ rgya ba bcu drug brtan pa/ chu ba gnyis kyis khyab par ba
64a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyam 'dod byed dang 'inas nang grol byas pa/ long ga dang po pa dang 'brel ba'i gnyi ma rim pa bcudrug tu 'khyil ba/ rtsa bran nyis song lnga brgyas skar khung byas pa/
64a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis rtson bdun gyis sring dag pan shigazhag 'gyur ba/ sku wang du rmeb brgyad skyong drug rgya brgya nas man 'bas pa/ dbang ba lnga'i dug dgu mod
64a9(dkon brtsegs): gnas bdu dang ldan pa/ migasang ngas yangasug rba/ skad pa sgom pa ga dang / rmil ma pa gang dang / zhagasol pa gsum dang / 'dagan nyim pa drus
64b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rlung gis mkhris pa snyim pa drug dang / rlung gis mtha' dag drangs pa dang / khrag bre gang dang / ngan skyugs phul gang dang / de dag thams cad kyis bang bar cha can
64b2(dkon brtsegs): skang so so yongs su gang ba/ pags pa'i ma ba bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ ro bro ba drug gis gso ba/ lus kyi me la ngan sngags kyi sbyin sreg byed pa/ rtag tu
64b3(dkon brtsegs): mthar 'dzag pa/ lus kyi yan lag de dag thams cad kyis lhan mi sdug pa/ dring brdeg gi rang bzhin yin na 'dil su zhig gus par byed de/ skad cig dgos pa
64b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir snang brnyan ma car du zad pa dang / khur bkur ba'i phyir shing nA lta bu' ba'i zhig yin par chos kyi zlos bzung bar bya'o// del 'di skyed ces bya ste/ 'diltar mi gtsang ba nga
64b5(dkon brtsegs): lus seM ni gzugs mngon rgyam can dag gus byed po/ byis pa'i blo can de ni mngon bzhin du// mi shis ngan sngags bum pa thegs shing 'gro// de mi sA nas nag gos
64b6(dkon brtsegs): // 'anas nas panas byung // tshig rdul mas da skye ban // des sun gas shi rnam pa byed/ rgyas
64b7(dkon brtsegs): sa du// 'do 'ang du zhes byed kyang // dkar pa'i ngas pa ma 'gyur ba 'gyur/ khyis bu byin ci chos pa rgyal can// den ma
64b8(dkon brtsegs): gtsang chu'i tho bras ldan// dalas sus 'di gcang par byas nas te/ bskus phyis 'bab stegs brgya no pa'akhrus byas kyang // 'chi bdag dbang gas
65a1(dkon brtsegs): zang 'gyur gtsang mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang / khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam
65a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
65a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pas rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhis lus la brtag par bya ste/ rnab bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems
65a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus yid du mi 'ong ba dang / rang bzhin gyis mi mthun pa ste smad par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rnag 'dzag ste/ dri mi zhi bar
65a5(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya byang chub sems dpas lus mtha' mar 'jig ste/ snying po med par bya rtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rgyas zlog na res 'brel bas//
65a6(dkon brtsegs): ma chung brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus maM gtsang pa zag pa ste/ mi gtsang bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus yang dag pa ma yin/

65b1(dkon brtsegs): sang gims cig par lag \u0f7f/ byang chub sems dpas lus ga'i mug gi mes ma gro cig 'gyur ba gyur bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus
65b2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnas kyis blartag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi dra bas khebs shing sred pa'i dra bas chung bar brtag par bya
65b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus kun nas bugs yongs su gang bas bu ga'i gan su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus nang bzhin rtsa bzhis gang bar brtag par bya
65b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus srin bu'i rigs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gan su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' las 'chi ba'i chos nyid yin pas mi rtag par rtag par bya
65b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus chos la rmongs pa po yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub seMs dpas lus mthar gyis grub cing / tha mar 'jig pas bum pa lta bar brtag par bya
65b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ses dpas lus mya ngan gyi gnod pa mang pos gang bas nyams thag brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar rga shir 'gyur bas rton pa med par brtag
65b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus g.yo dang / sgyu'i nyes par spyang pa dag gis grags par brtag par bya/ byang chub seMs dngas lus gang dka' bas sal
65b8(dkon brtsegs): gting lta brtag par bya/ byang chub sem dpas dga' bo'i gzugs dang / bde ba'i gzug la zhen pas mo lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub seMs dpas lus 'dod
66a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yod tan lnga po dag gis chog pa mi shes par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rjes su chags pa dang / khong khri bdag gis 'jom
66a2(dkon brtsegs): par brdeg par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus bsti stang dang / gnod pa mang bsanan par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus chu klung gi rgyun bzhin du gzhan da
66a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bas rkyen gzhan dang gzhan du brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tshul bzhin ma yin pa sna tshogs yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis yid kyi sems pa yin
66a4(dkon brtsegs): par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mthamar dur khrod la thug pas mi gzo ngar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus srang ki dang ce spyang dang / khyi rjen napa
66a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi zasu brtag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas lus pa dang / rgyus pa'i pog reg 'brel pas 'khrul 'khor lta ngur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus
66a6(dkon brtsegs): gang ba dang / gci dang / mtshol mdang / srabs dang / dgang/ tshigagis yongs su bkang bas/ bsku ba'i bris ma yin pa ba ga pa gyi/ byang dumams
66a7(dkon brtsegs): sa sa rnam las byung ngas/ ngag 'a rnams pam yin par bdag par bya/ byang chub sems dngas sus mi rtag sde min thang du' nga 'i chos da mi ngos de mapa
66a8(dkon brtsegs): thams pa gagapar dri/ byang chu sas pas sus phyi nos pamang pa'i'abyung ngas dgra bur nag rag/ byang chub sa ma dpas lus pa da yang drug pasam bya
66b1(dkon brtsegs): gsod sa bung bdag pang bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus sdug bsngal gyis gces te/ gsum ga shen/ 'di sa ste/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsam

66b8(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi bcu dra bzhi po de dag gis lus la brtag par bya'o// de ltar rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus la lu su 'dun pa dang / lus la dga' ba

67b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul to// mi rnyed shin rnyed dag ba rnyed pa la// lus kyi phyi na sdig pa ma byed cig/ 'don du khrod pa sa ci sang ngas// lus kyi kyi'i ris ma na
67b2(dkon brtsegs): galazhan sus pa sred pa skyes nas ni// byis pa rtag tu rnam par rmongs te 'khyab// lus 'di byas pa mi gzong ngas yi pas// nyon dang ma 'dusag dasal cher ba myong
67b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu nang 'dri sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor to// lus 'dingar skyugs rnams dang mchil mas gang // bkres dang sgom pas rtag tu mngon par gces// mkhas pa son

68a1(dkon brtsegs): grub par mi 'gyur bas// de phyir dga' ba mi rnyed smos ci dgos// ma bsdams mi rnams kha cig 'di skad du// mi rnyed shin tu dka' ba rnyed
68a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la/ gzhon rtse rtsed mo dag dang dga' ba zhing // nor btsal bde ba myong bar byazhes zer// nor 'tshol ba la bde ba ga la yod// bsrung ba'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong ba
68a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de phyir mkhas pas chags pa yongs spangs la// ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes thob par byos// longs spyod sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs// 'di dge byis pa'i
68a4(dkon brtsegs): skye'i 'drid pa yin// skad cig 'byung zhing skad cig 'jig par 'gyur/ mkhas pas nig longs spyod sred pa skyed// sgyum 'dra ning ga mkhan lta dang mtshungs// dri za'i grong

68a6(dkon brtsegs): sag ba mtshungs med paskyed byas nas/ rgyal po'i mthu mas de dag grags gyur pa// de dgas ni mkhas pa'ang dga' ba skye// bu dang chung med nga da mi 'gyur bar// rgyal
68a7(dkon brtsegs): des nyes pa byung ba'i 'dzugs pa// nyes pa 'di dag de 'dra rig nas su// mkhas pa rnams ni khyim la sred mi skyed// rtog tu ban ba cang yongs spyod 'i tshal byed pa/
68a8(dkon brtsegs): ngo pa dang la mi gas shing // bud chung ma sa yang mi byams par// de dag rtag tu chags sa 'jug pa byu// bdag gi sangs spyod 'gro ba par 'gyul 'ang shes// 2
68b1(dkon brtsegs): mo ng+yas gzo rnams kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// g.yo dang sgyus ni nor rnams rgol byed pa// brnab mo dag la mkhas pa ying mi rton// sems can banab mogaso lngan 'dra ba cang /
68b2(dkon brtsegs): yid zhan sems la tshig gis dga' bar byed// yid brtan kyang ni de la yid mi rtog/ 'on kyang bu 'drar sdug par ston par byed// ses brnab mo 'jig rten gang rgyu ba// slar dang
68b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan bcos dag la mkhas ston cing // smad 'tshong lta bur tshig gis 'drid byed la// khong nas mi bde shin tu rtsub pa yin// brnab mo dag la mdza' bo rnams kyang med
68b4(dkon brtsegs): nyedu med cing snying slobs grogs kyang med// 'on kyang de dag nor phyir sten par byed// skye bo brna ba la mkhas pa yid mi rton// brlab mo longs spyod ched du bya mir byed// shin tu
68b5(dkon brtsegs): mi bzang sos ni kun tu skyed// de phyir mkhas pas yang dag rtogs byas la// ngan ngon gang yang rung bas chog shes chog shes gyis// gser dang mu tig nor bu byu ru drung /
68b6(dkon brtsegs): las dges de dag dbu bu las kyang 'byung // de dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs nas// de dag phyir ni 'thab cing rtsod pa byed// byams pa zhes bya gang zhig 'dir 'byung ste/
68b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'byung ba'i tshe// sa 'dig ser gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur// de yi chen de ni galas 'byung // 'dod po'i yon tan lnga dag 'byung ba'i rmi/
68b8(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa'i chos can 'khrul med rmongs par byed// dper na sos ka'i nyi ma'i gung dus na// smig rgyu chur snang 'dod pa de bzhin no// bskal pa gcig lor nas ni 'jig
69a1(dkon brtsegs): rten 'di// na mkha'i rang bzhin na mkha' 'gyur bar 'ong // lhun po dag kyang tshig cing rnam par 'jig/ de dag gang nas 'ongs shing gang du 'gro
69a2(dkon brtsegs): chu mig mche ba rdzing dang rgya mtsho rnams// de dag med 'gyur skas 'gyur 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod pa stsogs te 'byung bar 'gyur snying po med// mkhapa su zhig de
69a3(dkon brtsegs): la dga' bar byed// mkhas pa gang dag blo yi stobs ldan pa// de dag rtag tu khyim gyi skyor la rtog/ 'di dag ci par ni spong mi byed// 'drer ma'i las kyis longs
69a4(dkon brtsegs): skyong tshol byed cing // bu dang de bzhin chung ma gso bar byed// shin tu sdug bsngal gyur pa de dus na// bu dang rlung ma skyabs su 'gyur ma yin// ji ltar sna chog

69a6(dkon brtsegs): ming na rnams kyis pade phyir de dag blangs// 'di na de dag sdug bsngal mya ngar 'gyur// snying gsum 'dzegs pa 'dzin pa shes kyang med// de bzhin bu dang
69a7(dkon brtsegs): maN+Dalag med// pha mthun dang bu dang rnang ma dang // bra da no dang bral gatshogs kyi rnams// bai nga'i gzhi phyi de dag 'gro ba med// las rnams rjesu 'brang ning byos pa
69a8(dkon brtsegs): khas ni su drang zhing mi ku da // la kyi gnas pa 'jig rten rnams rgya// skye 'dilas kyi bdag nyid rig gyu nas// ma' ba dag ni dge 'a'i las nas byed// man das chen
69b1(dkon brtsegs): dgakyangs minangs/ pa u dang sri phrag blarnams dang // chu gshedunag gi gnyen mas dang // de dag med du mkhas pasdig mi byed// las de yongs padas la gtogs par
69b2(dkon brtsegs): ra'atu mi zad rigs pas mi 'bral// dadu'i drig ngas 'jigs pa'i marnams kyis/ bsgoms te sdig pa yengs spang bar bya// ji lta ra las rnams byas pa ma gtogs dang / zhi
69b3(dkon brtsegs): rje dang ni gshin rje'i rangan dang // mdza' bshes dag dang rtsalag tshogs dang spun// pham bu dang chung ma srung mi byed// khyod kyi mi'i lus ni thong gyur la// tho ba nas sdig pa'i spang
69b4(dkon brtsegs): bam byas pas// kye mang la sdug bsngal mi zad myong // 'di ni mi dge'i las kyi rnam smin yin// las kyi rnam par smin la yid mches// khyod ni rang gi sas can mi dge byas/
69b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di langs ni ci yang ma lan zhes// de la gshi chos rgyal gshin rjes de skad smra// rang gi las byas rang la rnam par smin// rang gi las kyis khyed ni 'dir 'ongs kyis// ji ltar
69b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon cad mi 'dod las byas pa// sdug bsngal do ni nyid kyis myong bar gyis// de che ba ma rang gi chung ma rnams// sdug bsngal nyen pa yongs su thar mi byed// legs pa'i
69b7(dkon brtsegs): las byas bras ni grol bar 'gyur// de ltar khyim ni yongasu spang bar bya// khu sgo dbyug pa ltung gi chad pa rnams// su zhig spong 'dod ni bdon gnyer bas// khyim la 'jigs
69b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyis te spong byos la// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i stan la chos spyod cing // khyim ni raba' bar sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa// sems las byung ba rnas kyis rtag tu 'bar
70a1(dkon brtsegs): meru 'ongs la gas pa bye pal// mkhas pa su nig rnam srid pa skyed// khyim gnas bu dang chung ma'i myangang byed// khyim gnas de bzhin pangs sa
70a2(dkon brtsegs): byed/ nyes pa 'di dang gzhan yang dpag med de// de lta khyim ni yongasu spang bar bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi stan la dga' byed pa// ma btang marmo sa de dang yid bde'i rgyu// sdug bsngal mang
70a3(dkon brtsegs): ngobo rgya gyir bdil// thun pa dga' la mkhas pa gzhan me dga'// lpags bcu rgyas ga bus pa'i lus// 'di ning miyi rgyang ma 'du shes skyed// byis pa rmongs pa'idi zugs skyed par byed/
70a4(dkon brtsegs): dung med sngam lta bu yong rigis// shes 'ang lda pas khyim gyi zhes riganas// de bye 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun sangs te// chos pa dzin gyi 'du shes banag byas nas// mas
70a5(dkon brtsegs): khyimangs mye du 'byung bar gyis// de nas khyim bdag dpas byin dang / khyim bdag la brgya tsam de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa 'gyur
70a6(dkon brtsegs): dag parji kri ba nas mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu pa gyur to// de'i tshe tshig su bcang nga 'ad dag gsal to// sangs rgyas chos pa 'dod gyu nas// gang dag gis seMs bskyed de/
70a7(dkon brtsegs): sa rlos che// 'an rnam du gyi chog/ byang chub sems ni dga' ras// rjes can thams cad pa bkyang ba'o// senas padi sa dag dpa' skyed pa// de pa tshong legs
70a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can sus panang myong pa'i// sems songs rab kyi gyu pa// de dag sems ca thams cad dga'// de dag pa tsha na dag pa gyur// byang chub sems la su
70b1(dkon brtsegs): na / las kyis smras pa // badzas sa par byed pa gyur// byang chu sems sams// sems pan sa
70b2(dkon brtsegs): na na sa dun sumachags// na na ra tani par 'byed// sems ca bad rnams nang nas// byung na pa sams ni ma mi gyid// 'khar bam mag pa

70b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu ni skur bgyis te// byang chub tu ni sems bdud na// mchod pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de la mtha' ni ma mchis// byang chub seMs ni ji 'dra ba// drang srong mchog tu
70b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan mdzad pa// de 'dra'i mchod pa gzhan ma mchis// dpal yang gzhan ni ma mchis lags// sman gyi dam pa nang ma mchis// byang chub sems ni yon tan ldan// nang kun rab tu ni

70b8(dkon brtsegs): bar yong mi 'gyur// gang dag byang chub spyod pa la// dpa' bo sman pa'i rgyal po 'dra// de dag sem can sdug bsngal skyo ba// skyo ba rtag tu rnam par spangs// dpa' bo sangs rgyas chos 'tshas

76b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skyes pa'i sgor rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la yang dag par rab du bshang du gsal/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bang sa'i rgyal po rgyar byed la 'di
76b4(dkon brtsegs): sad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyed legs par nyon la rab du yid la bung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// bangasa'i rgyal po char byed kyis bcom ldan 'das
76b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no// zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po skyes pa'i sbyor gang dag dang ldanan/
76b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa bud med kyi dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyor ni bzhi po 'di dag yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po 'di la skyes pa 'dod pa rnams la chags
76b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cing / de 'dod pa rnams la bag med par gyur nas/ phyir ning bud med la la 'dod de/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram
76b8(dkon brtsegs): ze dag lta bar mi 'dod cing / des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag mthong na spen par mi byed/ ster bar mi byed/ bsnyen
77a1(dkon brtsegs): bkur mi byed pas/ de tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis yongs su spangs pas dang pa las
77a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rnams tshul khrims las yongs su nyams/ gtong ba las yongs su rnams/ shes rab las yongs su nyams shing / dang ba dang bral ba/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / thos
77a3(dkon brtsegs): bcung ba/ ser sA can du gyur pa/ yi dgas kyi yon tan gyi chos la kun tu spyod pa/ shes rab 'tshal ba/ rmal chags pa/ bcog pa'i spyod yul can/ bshul bar gnan pa la
77a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' ba/ mi gtsang ba la dga' ba/ bud med la dang bache ba/ zhi ba yongs su mi tshol ba/ chags pa'i spyod yul can/ 'gro bar bya ba ma yin par song ba/ spang bar 'os
77a5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ mi gtsar ba'i srin bu dang 'dra ba/ snyigs ma len pa dang / 'dod pa la brkam pa/ khrel dang ngon bor ba/ lha dang mi'i chos las nyams pa/ ngan par spang ba'i 'tsho bas 'chog/
77a6(dkon brtsegs): mangs pas ldang ba/ byis pa'i sku ba la sbyin pa/ sdig pa'i bsam padang ldan pa/ sdig pa'i grags pa la zhen pa/ sdig pa la kun tu 'jug pa/ sdig pa la gnol pa/ zang ma
77a7(dkon brtsegs): madrul lagang rlung ba/ zung med kyis 'tshal pa/ bud med kyi dbang dus pa/ bung med la gnol pa/ zung med dang gnas pa/ rba'i sa s+yAd yul can/ rma'i skal gnas pa/
77a8(dkon brtsegs): sa masas pa sams dpa ga dum sa pa sa da sa 'i sbyong tshul ma/ phrag la / phyags sa kyi
77b1(dkon brtsegs): ladang zang bu'i chos spyod pa gnang bas 'tshe ba/ bam la 'bangs par mi 'dzin pa/ dge slong dang blam ze dang / sbyin gnas la 'phangs par mi 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos
77b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge 'dun la dad pa yongs su nyams pa/ mya ngan las 'da' las yongs su nyams pa/ sems nam myal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / shin rje'i 'jig rten la
77b3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs shing gzhol ba/ seng ge dang / nam mkha' lding gi lus la yang dag par zhugs pa/ lcags kyi shing shal ma li mthon po dang / me mamung la gzhol ba/ sems can
77b4(dkon brtsegs): dpral ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdud 'jom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / cha ba dang / rab tu che ba dang / mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por zhugs
77b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni bud med kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag thos kyang bud med la chags shing bud med dang sten pas bag pa dang / ngus pa dang / ca co 'don pa dang / bro brdungs pa dang / glu blangs pa
77b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rol mo byas pa dag rjes su dran par byed cing spro ba mi skyed/ yid byang bar mi byed de/ rgyal po chen po byis pa'i chos la kun du skyed cing / kun du spyod pa de dag dang ldan pa'i
77b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa ni ngan song rnams sa skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa la sten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i smon dang po yin no//
77b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dod pa dring mi gtsang smad par 'os pa dang // mi 'thun 'jigs byed mi las byung sdug
78a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal byed// don med dman par byed cing bung ba yin pas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la sten par byed// bcog pas gang ba'i cha ba khung
78a2(dkon brtsegs): dring lta bu dang / mnam par gyur cing rul ba'i khri rnams ji bzhin dang // shi bdur khrongs na shin tu spang ba ltar// de bzhin 'dodar pa rnams kyang mchog tu spang ba yin// sbrang burma zhig rdzong
78a3(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyug pa'i 'dra dang // bag ni ngan skyug mthong nas rgyug pa'i 'dra dang // khyin sha'i don tu shes 'gro bltar// de bzhin mi mkhas bung med dag la dga' bar byed// grags pa med
78a4(dkon brtsegs): cing mi snyan yon tan 'bri ba dang // de las tshul khrims dam pa nyams par 'gyur ba dang // mtho ris nyams shing dmyal ba dag tu ltung bas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i sgom la
78a5(dkon brtsegs): chags par byed// ci lngar sa la sa la'i dug ni zos pa na// lus dag rgya zhing rmongs bskye bar 'gyur ba lngar// de bzhin 'din byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i rgyas// rang gi lus kyi dbyin
78a6(dkon brtsegs): ga ma gas// ris skum shin tu bska pa pa'i mi nig gis// rnam par 'bral ba'i sems can brgyad gdaga' byed ltar// de bzhin byis pa bdag la na par da pa rnams
78a7(dkon brtsegs): ya mdapa' ba sgralas ngan sa ba tu lda // dus sam sto mo bzang po dang bdag dang // sku thomam ldan pabang po tha dang padag gis// khang pamatshag nas byang
78a8(dkon brtsegs): ma len pa ni// gnang pa rnyed pa yin ning sdug bsngal sogs pa yin// 'dod pa'i dga' la brkam bdag ni gnod yin te// mi gtsang mtshon 'dra rmongs 'gyur dgal bsngags pa
78b1(dkon brtsegs): rjo nang par man pa dag la bsngags shing bser nas ni// dman pa de dag na 'gror rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/ gan pa 'dang pa dag gis sul rnams rab bsags papa
78b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dang pa gnod pa min pa dga' ba'i byis pa rnams// de dag ran ma 'tshe ba rnam par spangs nas ni// mi bzar ga yangs chen po rab tu lung bar 'gyur// ngargyal rmongs pas bam
78b3(dkon brtsegs): skye dgu 'di dag ni// rgya mtsho'i pha rol ma mthong ba yi bya bzhin du// lcags kyi me lce lnga po dag la chags gyur nas// byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'bar zhing 'jam par 'gyur// 'dir byis
78b4(dkon brtsegs): bamos shing shin tu rmongs pa rnams// shel du mi mthong snong mchog yin par sems pa ltar// lam la rnam par rmongs rnams 'dod pa'i ched kyi phyir// rtag tu 'dir gnas 'dir
78b5(dkon brtsegs): nom yin zhes 'dzer// gang phyir rnam pa sna tshogs las dag mi shes pas// 'gro ba thams cad rab nyams gus pa yod min pas// pa dang ma dang bu dang bu mo dag ni// rtag tu 'dir
78b6(dkon brtsegs): don gyis mchod pa mi byed gnod pa thob pa yin// de dag rtag tu bud med 'dris pa brjod byed cing // 'di 'dra las kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug par byed// de dag gti mug 'dra ba sdig
78b7(dkon brtsegs): b.rabasogs shing // ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam yang sngags par byed// mi rnams de dag der chags bde bar 'du shes shing // ba dang ma yang yongs su rab tu spong bar byes
78b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag mchod 'os rnams la mchod pa mi byed cing // smad par 'os pa'i 'dod pa dag ni 'chol bar byed// phan tshun gdung bar 'gyur ba la ni gzhol byed cing // rnam rtog mu yis
79a1(dkon brtsegs): des bcom mi rnams nyon mongs pa// bkur sti yongs su tshol la dga' zhing ma 'phags rnams// chos ma yin pas 'jig rten rab tu 'jud par byed/
79a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhi de las ni mtshon cha dag dang lcags rnams dang // de bzhin bcing ba dang ni 'thab cing rtsod pa dang // nges pa'i 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur// shi 'bas nas ni man
79a3(dkon brtsegs): med 'jigs su rung bar 'gro// tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin sdug bsngal 'byung 'byung 'gyur zhing // nor rnams snying du sdug pa rab tu 'jig 'gyur la mtho ris rnams shing dmyal bar rab tu ltung
79a4(dkon brtsegs): bsan/ mkhas pa su nig 'dod pa'i 'du shes skyeng bar byed// lcags las grub pa'i nags chal sdong po'i khring dag du// mkhas pas bdag nyid rab tu bor bde bla'i// 'ja
79a5(dkon brtsegs): bsku mas yis papang ba byas thal// das gre dag gi zong du la yang bcas tha ning // rab tu ma 'bar thulal bzung ba de thal// de bzhir lcags kyi bulum 'bar ba sa zan/
79a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzo 'jigs su rung ba rnams la reg bla ye// lag pa gnyis kyis ram yang bud med reg mi bya// mis ni ri lnga ji ltar 'dod pa rnams bser ba// de la de lngar bde ba thams cad rab
79a7(dkon brtsegs): grang she/ 'di la 'dang rnams gcig tu sdug bsngal mi bcang bas// 'dod ba sdug bsngal mi babang bdag rnam par spangs// 'dad bsug bsngal kun kye gan 'ar gyur pa dang /
79a8(dkon brtsegs): bye chung gyu byung ba nga/ 'dis bya rnamam tharnams pa rtsi babs// drang ma ngas par badzin pathang ba min/ khrus thugang gis tsham tshul /
79b1(dkon brtsegs): sa ne/ rlung ba mas pa rab tu bas med de 'gyur ba// ngam 'i ga sumama' ris lam yang rnam spangs shing // desa'i kyang cu bangs 'ang ba dang 'am yin// rgyal
79b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhan yang mi'i bam dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin te/ zla ba dgu'am zla ba bcur mngal nas bzungs/ shin du sdug bsngal bar gsas shing / gcin dadabyes yang 'bri bar byed/ nga
79b3(dkon brtsegs): dra blangs nas nu zho byung bar byed/ phung po rnams skyed par byed/ khams rnams gso bar byed/ 'jig rten ston par byed/ 'jam bu gling sna tshogs son par byed/ don tu 'dong /
79b4(dkon brtsegs): phan par 'dod/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod/ 'jig rten la yang phan par 'dod pa ste/ sbyin pa'i gnas yin la bu la ban pa dang / bde bar 'dod pas/ de dag gis rang gi nor gyi
79b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis gzhan gyi khyim nas gzhan gyi bu mo blangs pa dang / de de la chags shing myos la chums shing brgyal ba dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / lhag par zhen cing 'dug par gyur nas/
79b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med de la chags shing mes pas/ sbyin pa'i gnas pa ma dag rgas 'khogs/ gtugs la lus nyams chung zhing mig mthong ba dag la brnyes shing
79b7(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod med pa/ nor med par byas nas rang gi khyim nas phyung skrad par byed do/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar pham dga' ba byed pa sbyin pa'i gnas la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag
79b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bde bas bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ brjed par bya/ mchod par bya ba'i rigs na/ des de'i tshe ba ma dag rang gi khyim nas byung ste skrad nas/ gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bung
80a1(dkon brtsegs): med la bza' pa dang / btung ba dang / gos rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang du byed/ gces su byed/ rim gro byed la mchod pa byed cing yang
80a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed kyi/ pha ma la ni mi byed pa'i mi'i snying brtse ba med pa dang / mi lta ba dang / ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pa la ltos/ rgyal po chen po nges bde 'gror 'gro ba'i
80a3(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yin pa de ni spangs la/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa'i mi de la yang ltos/ rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa rnams
80a4(dkon brtsegs): la sten cing ba mal brnyas pa dang / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyon gnyis pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//
80a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag pa mams pa gas par byed pa ni// de dag rtag tu bde ning yid kyang bar 'gyur la// 'di la lnga dang bcas pa dang ni dbang po dang // de bzhin 'di la tshangs par bcas pa'i rigs
80a6(dkon brtsegs): tha ma/ gang dag pa mnas gas byed pa ni// de dag sa na byi 'ong ba yang grub 'gyur de // tamatshochen po nas kyang bde ning legs 'angs// de ltar byed pa dag ni mam
80a7(dkon brtsegs): rmed pa yin// gang dag pa margas pa gso par byed ba yi// tshong dpon nga dag yan tan kun gyi gcor 'gyur shing // de bzhin ning las 'bras bu phun su mchags 'byungs// bas
80a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams bzang ba'i dzin du 'arjod par mi nus so// gang dag pa margas pags par byed nga ni// dngag zar rnams kyar pa rnga ma rnams dang mang // mang na grang dang bong brangs tu gyu/
80b1(dkon brtsegs): mirnams de dag sra bris la rdzi mi 'gyur// gang dag pa margas pags par byed ba ni// de dag chu borab med dang ni mi mu dang // su bris dang ldan pa la yang min la te// dadag
80b2(dkon brtsegs): khra bskal bzung bar yong mi 'gyur// gang dag pa mags pa gso par byed ba ni// de dag nor dang 'bru ni mi rung ba dag dang // chung ma pra dang bu mo ngam bdag dang yang // bai DU dang
80b3(dkon brtsegs): rin che na sa le sbram yang rnyed// gang dag pa margas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag rab 'phrul lha'i pho brang dag dang ni// chung 'gyur dang ni 'dres pa'i chal yang mthong 'gyur te/
80b4(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams du mas rtag tu mdun du bdar bar 'gyur// mi'i gtso bor gyur cing lha'i lhar gyur pa// thub pa chen po 'di 'dra'i gsung ni thos 'gyur na// rgas shing dbang po shin tu nyams
80b5(dkon brtsegs): chung gyur pa yi// bam sbyin gnas nas ba su zhig gso mi byed// rgyal po gzhan yang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las byed cing / log par ldab la
80b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba gang yin zhes bdag gi don mi shes shing mi brtan pa yin pas/ skye bo mang po rnams mi dga' zhing / byis pa'i skye bos
80b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dag gis rmongs par gyur pa dang / skyes bu 'dzangs bdag gris smad pa dang / khro bas zil gyis non cing
80b8(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i las byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang / longs spyod kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang / ser sna can du gyur pa
81a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la gnod par mngon par dga' zhing / chos sgom pas mi dga' ba yin te/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las la
81a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' zhing / skyes bu dam pa'i las la mi dga' ba de la ltos/ rgyal po chen po 'dod pa rnams kyi gni sten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyon gsum yin no// de nas
81a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dod pa rnams kyi gzhis ni skyes bu rnams nyams shing // gzhi de las ni sdig pa dag kyang rab du byed// log
81a4(dkon brtsegs): par lta bas rmongs nas 'dir mi khyam 'gyur zhing // de ni rnam par 'khrul pas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ log dang ldan pas yon tan kun gyis rnam spangs shing // de ni rtog pa mang cing
81a5(dkon brtsegs): tho yang nor pa yin/ gang dag chu klung dag tu ud pal na tshol ltar// log par lta bas yongs su 'khor bar byed pa yin// bde ba'i don du bdag nyid yongs su srung byed cing /
81a6(dkon brtsegs): chos ma yin la chags pa'i nirnams mang pod dag/ de bzhin pade ba'i rgya phyir 'dod pa rnams chol pa// de dag ga'i mug rmongs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro// gang dag 'dod ba nan
81a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi na dunag du ni// de bzhin sems la chags pa'i skyes bub ma dang // 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can dang skye bo sdig can dang // 'du shes log bdag la bde bgal yod// me rnams
81a8(dkon brtsegs): byas pa mig pa sdig sa shing // rang brnam rnams rgyal 'tshas gus dam ba dang // 'gags pa'i tshogs kyis nag turnam par spangs pasam// dmyal ba yod pa ma
81b1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'jigs su rung bar ltung // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang chags pa'i mi rnams ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mkhas pa mi mchod cing // log par lta bas chos kyang nyan par mi rnyed
81b2(dkon brtsegs): la/ lan 'ga'a'ang dge 'dun legs par mchod pa mi byed pas// 'phags pa nam spangs ngan song ltung bas na// de byer mi'i sred pa 'dir ni rnyed pa la// spyir dul yang dag sdom la ngas par
81b3(dkon brtsegs): sen cig dang // de las byang chub dam pa mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes pa ni bzo gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed
81b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yi ge'am rtsis sam/ grangs sam/ lag rtsis sam/ lag mtshon cha'am/ rgyal po la no shas 'tsho ba 'am/ zhing las sam/ tshong byed pa'am/ b.lang
81b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba 'am/ de lta bu'i bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed cing / 'di lta ste nor gyi phyir lam ma yin par yang 'gro bar byed/ lam ngan par
81b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar byed/ gcong rong dang chu klung can gyi lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ mtshon cha'i lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ rgya mtshor 'jug par yang 'jug par byed/ grang ba'i dus ra yang
81b7(dkon brtsegs): lhags pas gnod par byed/ dro ba'i dus na yang tsha bas gnod par byed cing / bkres pa dang / bsgom pa dag gis gnod bzhin du/ 'gro ba la yang spro bar byed de/ longs spyod yod
81b8(dkon brtsegs): su tshol ba na de lta bu'i sdug bsngal ba dag gis longs spyod yongs su btsal nas kyang rang gi 'tsho ba dag gi phyir nye bar sgrub par bya bas/ dge slong dang bram ze dag dang bkren pa dang
82a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug 'phongs pa dang / spongs mo padag la sbyin pa sbyin par mi bzod cing / bud med rnams kyis thul 'og du chud pa dang / bud med rnams krol ba dang bud med
82a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byams pa de nyid kyis bud med de dag nyid gsol ba'i phyir sbyin pa spyir ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi nus shing / de de la chags la bud med kyis spros par byed
82a3(dkon brtsegs): cing / bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang / bltas pa dang / brgyad bdag kyang bzod par byed de/ de skyes par gyur kyang zad kyis bsdigs pa dang dung len cing / mi dga' ba med par de'i
82a4(dkon brtsegs): ngor lta bar byed pa ni/ 'dod pa'i gnyis bud med kyi dbang du song ba yin te rgyal po chen po bud med la snyan cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa bud med dgal bdam 'i
82a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan skyugs kyi sgrol gdu ba dang / mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang / shes pazhin med par spyod pa'i skyes bu'i sbyor bzhi pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po sgo de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni
82a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du 'gro ba yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dod pa rnams ni 'tshal ba na// rab tu mos pa gal
82a7(dkon brtsegs): gnang ba man pa rnams sten pa// de ni gang gis bde' bar 'gyur// sras grangs pa ma yin pa'i// lam rnams byed cing mi sdom la// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags tshol byed pa/
82a8(dkon brtsegs): ga mas rgya ba ga/ yi mas gang ga mi mams pa// dam ba ba chos chu tshong// zung bang bathong ba sregs pa// nga rgyags gnas la pa gdams
82b1(dkon brtsegs): ga kyis bzlas sas / 'ad ma tsha me ca yang // pa'i phyir rnams nga ga// sa'i sa na/ mas phyi pas smra
82b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug/ byis pa 'dod rnams sten pa dang // khyid ba wa rnams ji bzhin no// s+pha d+hi ro dang reg rnams kyis// gang las sa'i skye bo rnams// byis pa'i 'khor
82b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs 'khor ba// ste'u rnams pur la btags pa bzhin// byis pa ma rig khebs pa rnams/ mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs gyur cing // bud med rnams la chags pa ni/ me gcang
82b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas la bas bzhin no// gang gis ngan 'gror rab 'jug pa// de ni bdud kyi spyod yul yin// ro myang 'du shes chags gyur pa// ngan skyugs gnas la srin bu bzhir// bsang pa'i
82b5(dkon brtsegs): gshed ma rnams kyis ni// ji ltar mi zhig bor ba ltar// shes nas thar pa thob 'gyur zhing // bud med dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur// 'dod pa bud med lnga byed pa'i// kun tu sbyor las
82b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa skye// byis pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams// 'dod pa'i sred pa rab tu 'phel// sos ka'i dus na mi zhig ni// dgon pa chen por song 'gyur nas// byis bsal na tshwa'i
82b7(dkon brtsegs): chu 'thungs nas// skom pa'i phyir ni rab skye ltar// de bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba'i// byis pa rmongs pas 'tsho ba rnams/ 'di na byir zhing bud med la// 'dod ba'i sred pa brtan
82b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// ji ltar mi lus mjeb can la// srog chag rnams ni za ba bzhin// 'dod kham so so'i skye bo rnams// de bzhin bud rnams kyis zos// mi gtsang bum pa khra bo ni/
83a1(dkon brtsegs): kha dog lnga par snang mod kyi// ngan na ha la ha la'i dug/ drag po chen po yod pa ltar// de bzhin bud med rgyan pa dag/ gang dang gang na snang ba yang /
83a2(dkon brtsegs): gcin dang phyis sa gang ba yi// rgyal ba rlung gis bkang ba bzhin// 'bru mar gyis ni bdar ba'i mtshon// gos kyis dkris pa ji bzhin du// de bzhin bud med brgyan pa yang /
83a3(dkon brtsegs): ral gri gling pa g.yogs pa bzhin// ji ltar me dong gang gyur la// dub med cing 'bar ldan lngar// bud med de bzhin me 'dra zhing // srin bu gtum po bzhin du g.yo// bsreg
83a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bskal pa 'dir byung na/ sa ni kun tu 'bar 'gyur la// rwa dang gel ba 'jig 'gyur zhing // chu klung dag cing sems par 'gyur// 'byung ba chen po'i gnas gyur pa/
83a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya mche yang ni skams 'gyur zhing // ri bo chen po rnam bsreg la// de bzhin lhun po'ang 'jig par 'gyur/ rgyal chen 'byung po 'dzin pa yi// sa 'di'ang rnam par 'jig 'gyur zhing /
83a6(dkon brtsegs): zag chen rnams ni 'jig 'gyur yang // skyob par byed pa yod ma yid// ji ltar me yis rings bcas dang / rgya mtshor bcas pasreg bltar// de bzhin bung med mi 'dras/
83a7(dkon brtsegs): ni gyim tham sa ba cang // skabs pa mchil ma rgya // bang \u0f7fsa rnam 'i slang bdang // lus las d+hA+e gdus/ zang ba rnams ni sngang ci bzhin/ 'grus
83a8(dkon brtsegs): ga ba gang grags la sngags pasags shing // nga bzhin sras 'i 'azas 'das/ rdzi skang par byas pa yin// mi gas ma tshogs gang ba nga 'azlas ni smin par byu
83b1(dkon brtsegs): ska rak+Sha grus 'di mi gtsang ba// sna tshogs rnams kyi snod yin no// mun gsemam cher ba dang / grobs gang ni ma khal ma dang / khrag dang mkhris pas gang 'gyur la/
83b2(dkon brtsegs): grang rgyas kyis ni blang ba dang // khong ba'i nang ni sri bu'i rigs// brgyad khri po dag gnas myur kyang // gti mug dra bsgribs pa yi// byis pa rnams kyis mi mthong ngo // rmas
83b3(dkon brtsegs): dgra nas rtag tu ni// mi gcang rul ba zag gyur kyang // sla ba gang dag lta ba la// byis pa rnams ni mtshan mar 'dzin/ gang zhig kun gyi spang ba'i yul// chags pa rnams kyis
83b4(dkon brtsegs): byis mi shes/ mi gtsang spyod yul byis pa rnams// snabs dang mchil ma za bar byed/ spad par 'os la chags byed pa// sbrang bu rnam kyis mthong bzhin// mtshan khung dag nas
83b5(dkon brtsegs): rdul 'dzag cing // spang ba'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur// byis pa sdug bsngal chags byed pa// de dag bdag la gnod phyir g.yo'o// des ni myur du 'phongs 'gyur te// nya rnams chu nas
83b6(dkon brtsegs): bton pa bzhin// 'jigs rung lag na mtshon thogs kyis// ji ltar mi zhig gtses bltar// mtsho 'dra'i bud med sdig can gyis// 'dod la chags rnams de bzhin no// rnam rgyal
83b7(dkon brtsegs): lagan mtshon thogs pas// ji ltar rgyal po gces pa ltar// 'dod chags me dang 'dra ba yis// 'dod la chags rnams de bzhin sreg/ bshan pa'i gnas la khyim rnams
83b8(dkon brtsegs): lhar myang bar 'du shes byis pa rnams/ ji ltar sgra yis bsregs pa ltar// myur du sdug bsngal bsreg par 'gyur// rang gi las kyi zhes pa yis// de la skyob pa med
84a1(dkon brtsegs): bltar/ de bzhin bdag gi nyes pa yis// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ de dag sangs rgyas chos spangs nas// bud med rnams kyi rnag la sten//
84a2(dkon brtsegs): sems ni rol chags gyur ba// de yis ngan 'grer 'gro bar 'gyur// ji ltar sne'u zhig shing las ni// shing gzhan du ni rgyu ba'i che// de ni gnas der gces gyur na// de nyi du ni sdug bsngal
84a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de bzhin 'dod la brkam pa dang // sdug bsngal 'dod chags bsten pa dang // gti mug rgyal la thogs pa rnams// dus ni yang dang yang du'ada'// mi bkres rnams nigs
84a4(dkon brtsegs): shing la/ rab tu bcug nas 'phyang ba ltar// de bzhin 'dod la chags pa rnams// shal ma ri mtho la 'phyang // ji ltar mon sran sde'u dang gre'u// lcags zangs rnams su drug byas nas
84a5(dkon brtsegs): mes ni rab tu bsregs pa na// dbu bar bcas shing khol pa ltar// de bzhin dge ba ma mthong zhing // 'dod la chags pa'i skye bo rnams// shi nas ngan song 'gro 'gyur zhing // lcags
84a6(dkon brtsegs): 'angs rnams su btso bar 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i// sems can gang dag sdig byed pa'i// sems can sdig pa rnams kyi gnas// bangs de bye ba drug cu dang / 5
84a7(dkon brtsegs): yang bzhi po pa dag yin no// zas nis so re rel// chad ni dmyig su yod min zhing // me'i phung por ldan rnams su// bskal pa dra mar btso bar 'gyur// kha cig zangs rnams de dag rtsa
84a8(dkon brtsegs): rang gi las kyis bskal brgya'am// nis brgya sum brgya chang bar 'tshod// yang na bani brgyar bcas par 'gyur// wa san rnon po rnams kyis ni// bzung zhing yang dang yang smrabs
84b1(dkon brtsegs): bas/ de dag shan yod mi zhing // drang lngar dkar ba rnams su 'gyur// lcags kyi gzhong bar 'dug nas ni// rab tu zhing 'dren pa med/ gzhing ga ning skye 'gyur te// nga shems
84b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis gnas par 'gyur// gang tshe dmyal ba'i spangs rnams kyis// ngan pa'i mi rnams de dag ni// gtun la sogs par brdungs pa na// sha rkang rus pa bye mar 'gyur// de yi tshe dag
84b3(dkon brtsegs): la/ shin tu grang ba'i rlung yang ldang // des ni dmyal ba'i sems can rnams// sdug bsngal gyur pa de las 'tsho// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// gdun bu drag po rnams kyis
84b4(dkon brtsegs): 'joms// sta re rnams kyis gshegs pa dang // de bzhin gsal shing gzugs par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i// sems can rnams kyi lus la ni// lcags
84b5(dkon brtsegs): mdur rtse mo bzhi pa dang // rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga 'bab// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// ral gri mchu can khwa rnams kyis// mgo dang klang ba gtogs gyur cing // wa dang sbyang gi
84b6(dkon brtsegs): zos par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// ngan skyugs rul bar dring zhing // kun gyis smad par ldang 'gyur la// spu gri chu klung rnams su ltung // mi rnams gang dag sdig
84b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ rab tu cha ba bsregs par 'gyur// dra 'bod dang ni dri 'bod che// thig rag tu yang sreg par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// thig nag tu ni skyes nas kyang // yang
84b8(dkon brtsegs): dang yang du me mur dang // spu gri chu klung rnams su ltung // gang che lcags kyi zangs mo cher// mi rnams de dag 'tshed pa na// khyi rnams kyis ni gces 'gyur nas// de dag bde ba 'tsha
85a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/ dmyal ba drag po chen por ni// lhung nas dpung gnyen yong min ning // lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur/
85a2(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// lugs las grub pa'i brag chen dang // mi sdug ri bo rnams kyis ni// de tshe kun nas lus 'joms byed// des ni rang gi las byas pa'i// 'bras
85a3(dkon brtsegs): bu de 'dra tho ba gyur cing // de yis tshor ba myong ba ni// de la skyeb pa 'ga' yang med// ji snyed bsnyen pa thams cad ni// bdag gi mdun der 'ga' yang med// der ni mgon med bdag
85a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu/ sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar byed// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngon cad nges par sbyang byas kyang // pa ma de dag de ring ni// rnam par dgrol ba'i mthu yang med//
85a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan chad nges par spyod byas kyang // bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams// de ring bdag la 'grel mi nus// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan chad ce
85a6(dkon brtsegs): bar snang byas kyang // 'jab zhes ni du de dag kun// rnam par 'grel par yang mi nus// gang dag pade pyir don min par// sngan chad shes par sbyang byas pas// bdag gi cha las
85a7(dkon brtsegs): de gsun// de ring 'brel bar mi nus so// 'did pa man pa rnam smin cing // dman pa'i chos rnams smin nas nAM// nyes pa'i las rnams byed pa dag/ de mis ngan 'thar 'a
85a8(dkon brtsegs): gas ra 'tshal ba me bang // mings sug pasngal tshar bgying // sangs rgyas rnams kyis zang med nga/ khyi'i drin mamam par bslags/
85b1(dkon brtsegs): dman pa rnams dang ni// dman pa'i bung med rnams sten pa/ khyim pa 'di ni byis 'i// rgyal ba bzung nas gnas pa yin// ci 'dra'i las kyi byed pa lngar/ de 'dra'i 'bras bu 'tho chu
85b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ rgyal ba yin chad pa dang // sdug bsngal bcing ba'ang mong bar 'gyur// bud med pani las skyes pa'am// gas dang bcing ba myong 'gyur ning // dmyal spangs rnams kyis
85b3(dkon brtsegs): bsregs pa dang // nges par 'chi ba'ang myong bar 'gyur// bud med rnams la brkam pa yi// blong na de dag bde mi 'gyur// gsal shing mngon po rnams su ni// bcugs zhing
85b4(dkon brtsegs): chung yang bcug par 'gyur// sa yi ser gar bcuganas ni// de bzhin ral gris gdab par 'gyur// de 'dra ba dag thos nas ni// de dag yi chang bde mi 'gyur// rmongs pa phung med
85b5(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu// yang dang yang du 'du 'ji byed// sdug bsngal 'dod pa rnams sten cing // smad pa rnams kyang slu bar byed// rmongs pa rnams kyis chos thos pas// dge bar gsung
85b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes brjod byed kyang // de'i sems bud med byi zhen song // byi ba la ni byil bzhin// rgyal ba gsungs pa pos gyur nas// yud tsam zhig ni yid byang yang // ngal du la'i drag 'a
85b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i/ 'dod chags kyis ni yang 'jug/ ji ltar bag ni mung car zhig/ dngangs shing skrag pa byung gyur kyang // des ni phyes mthong ba na// chags pa skyed par byed pa ltar/
85b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin byis pa bde 'dod rnams// rgyal ba'i bstan pa spangs nas ni// 'dod pa dman pa rnams bsten pa// des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams la chags myos nas/
86a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu sdig pa'i las byas shing // tshul khrims can dag spus byas nas// phyis ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab can gyis dal rnyed cing /
86a2(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i chos ni thos gyur nas// 'dod kuran spangs nas 'di las ni// mkhas pa mdor byung rab byung shig/ rgyal po chen po skyes pa la bsnyen pa'i skyon ni de dag yin te// 'dod pa
86a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhi dang / 'dod ba'i rgya dang / 'dod pa la phrag par rten pa rnams ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po lba bas ma khyod kyis rtag par rgyun tu
86a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// khyed kyis lus su gtogs pa'i sems rjes su drar ba sgom par bya'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dasa'i rgyal po 'char byed la
86a5(dkon brtsegs): lha re lngar chos bstan pa mdzad de/ chos bstan pa des bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dag bathob par gyur te/
86a6(dkon brtsegs): des ma lda das la 'dasa'i rgyal ba 'char byed kyis 'din ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'dasa'i tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra tsam pa mang /
86a7(dkon brtsegs): dzagapa pa'i mas rgyas gyis/ rnam pa dang / za med mas kyis sno mal kyis zin pa she gnadas ngasas nga/ legs pa gsungs pad
86a8(dkon brtsegs): / bcor ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/ mtshan cha grangs shing dbug pa spangs la ngo ma mchis shing /
86b1(dkon brtsegs): zag chags 'byung babams cad pa spong brtse bar bzhugs pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dge btsun du bdung drugs la/ com tha 'das kyis ngas bas pa
86b2(dkon brtsegs): skal nas/ bdas 'i rgyal po 'char byed dang dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten mi rangs na/
86b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las/ bad sa'i rgyal ba
86b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chang byed kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mitra dang / sra renA po d+hi dang / nu ma dgye la ru dngan
86b5(dkon brtsegs): de ye shes spel sregs pas bsgyur cing nus te gtan la pab pa/ @#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sum ti dA ri ka bring na na ma ma ha yA swar+tha/
86b6(dkon brtsegs): bongs dang / 'phags pa bum blo gris bzang pos nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
86b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong sdong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
86b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por/ khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bu mo blo gros
87a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang ba zhes bya ba/ bcas nas lo brgyad len pa'adra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bltan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog
87a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rna ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas
87a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig 'dug pa de/ de 'khor dang bcas par bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
87a4(dkon brtsegs): ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lar gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug ste/
87a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba// gal te skabs bye bdag gis ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa la// bya
87a6(dkon brtsegs): sems pa'i sru ga cu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yid la ci 'di thams cad ni// thum khyod kyis dri ba gyis// byang chub sems dpa'i spang gran/
87a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du byeng la bstan par bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la bumo blo gros bzang mos tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ gang gis sa ni mdzes par 'gyur// gang gis ner ni che bdang /
87a8(dkon brtsegs): mi byed 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur// thub pas 'di ni bdag la gsungs// chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni// gang gis rdzus te skye 'gyur zhing // 'dab ma song ldan padral// mchis
87b1(dkon brtsegs): bar mang ni ganga' ba dang / zhing rnams bye bar ba g.yas par/ sangs rgyas phyag bgyir mchi bayi/ rdzu 'phrul ba rol byin 'gyur ba'i/ spyong brgyal bas lung bstan gsol/
87b2(dkon brtsegs): dgra tha ma mchis gang gis 'gyur/ tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa ma mchis dang / bdud kyi las kun ma mchis dang // 'chi ba'i dus ni bgyid pa na/
87b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // de las chos rgan pa dang // sdug bsngal tshor ba myong mi 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bramo blo gros b.rang
87b4(dkon brtsegs): mol 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la
87b5(dkon brtsegs): bzung shig dang / ngas bshad do// bram bro gros bzang mos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lngar gan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis del
87b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ than dgral yang khro bar mi byed pa dang /
87b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa la gnas pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mdzes par
87b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa'i rtsa ba khro ba 'phel mi byed/ khyams la gnas par byed dang chos 'dod dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas nas ni//
88a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par 'gyur te blta par 'os pa yin/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan danor che bar gyur te/ bzhi gang nen/ 'di lnga ste/ dus su sbyin pa
88a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sbyir ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re bar sbyir pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na nor che bar 'gyur ro//
88a3(dkon brtsegs): del 'di skad ces bya ste/ dus su sbyin dang 'gyod pa med pa dang // yid 'ong sbyin dang rnam smin mi re ba// dpa' bo rnams kyis las 'di byas pas na// rtag tu longs spyod chen po thob pa yin/
88a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor mi byed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ phra ma'i tshig spangs pa dang / sems cad log par lta ba rnams yang dag pa'i
88a5(dkon brtsegs): lab yang dag par 'dzid du 'jug cing 'dzeg par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos spang ba dang / sems can dmas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par ba na
88a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 'khor mi byed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zam de bzhin log par lta ba spong/
88a7(dkon brtsegs): ngam chos 'jig pa'i chen srung bar byed// semam can byang chub yang dga' dzin 'jug na/ 'khor rnams mi byed bur sum tshogs par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bani
88a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan das rnams kyi thang du/ rin po che chen po'i pad+malas rngus te skye bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang nen/ 'di las/ bye ma'am/ me tog u t+pa la'am/
88b1(dkon brtsegs): bad+ma'am/ ku prang 'am/ bad+ma dkar pos lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rjer la dbul ba dang / gan dag la yang gnod par
88b2(dkon brtsegs): mi bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs parda'i gdan la bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la res brgya rer mos paste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sa
88b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thar du rin po che chen po'i pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phye ma me tog bkang ster dbul ba dang /
88b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems sreng zhing sku gzugs byed pa dang / mos brgya chen po ni gnas byed na// rgyal ba dag gi thad du rdzus te skye// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs
88b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag chos mnyan pa la bar chad mi byed pa
88b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi
88b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba dag gi bar chad mi byed dang // gzhan gyi chos gtam dag la mi smod dang // rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la
88b8(dkon brtsegs): mar me 'bral/ shing 'dzin bsgoms pas de ring du 'gro/ bum byang chub sems dpa' chos pani dang ldan na/ dgra tha med par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang ne na/ 'del sa/ mi gapa'abar
89a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bzhes gcer dgal bsnyen pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la ser sa mi byed pa dang / gnar gyi rnyed bral dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsa
89a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnas pa thams cad la khro bar mi byed cing / mi skrun pa mi sgrogs pa ste/ bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dgra zla med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces byas/ dge
89a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la de g.yo med// gzhan gyi rnyed la dga' zhing ser sna med// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mi slong na// rtag tu dgra zla med par spyod par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems
89a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhid nga ldanan/ tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad sbas pa de bzhin byed pa dang / mdza' bo dag la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab pa dang / klan ka me tshol
89a5(dkon brtsegs): bar ches nyan pa dang / gzhan chos smra bdag la 'baskur mi byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad
89a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa pa byed pa dang / ya la med pa bzhin ma cha cing // lan se la tshas nim can byedan// 'jigs med cing tshig cang brgyan par gyur// thal byang chub ma
89a7(dkon brtsegs): tsham pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa med pal chu shing sangs su dgapa la zung rnagapa \u0f7f/ ni ga nan/ 'dzim pa/ lpag 'ibs sa pa bsgrub bamarnam
89a8(dkon brtsegs): mam 'a mams 'a pa gas byu /
89b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam na/ 5ra bya chu ba sa bdas rnam na shA sa gapa pa gyu // ngas sa su
