89b2(dkon brtsegs): del 'di sad ces byaste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas snyam pa gsum la gnas// mdo sde ma pa me rnams la rtag tu mes/ sangs rgyas sras la khams cad mkhyen ma ma// sems cam tho
89b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pas dga' bar 'gyur// bramo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud kyi las med par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sgom pa
89b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pasgom pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldanan bdud kyi las med
89b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// chos rnams la ni chos kyi tshu la rtogs la// brtson 'grus gnas shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran// yongs su bsngo zhing bshags dang phyag btsal ba/
89b6(dkon brtsegs): del bdud kyis grags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// bram byang chub sems dpa' chos pazhi dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi me mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing / de las chos kyang mnyanal/ srug
89b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ gzhan dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa bkod pa
89b8(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs ni bsgrub pa dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la brtson pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag du ldan na 'chi ba'i dus kyi che/ mdun du sangs rgyas bcugs
90a1(dkon brtsegs): shing de la chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de ni gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed cing // mos pa dang ni
90a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa rgya che ba// mkhas pa de ni rtag smin par byed// de phyir de mdun de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bu mi blo gros bzang mos 'di
90a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bsrab pa ji skad bcas pa 'di dag la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis
90a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bcu po ji skad bka' stsal pa/ 'di dag las chos gcig cig ma sbyang na yang / bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bslus par gyur cig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi
90a5(dkon brtsegs): bu chen pos/ bu mo the gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so// bumo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'ams 'og du chung bar dka' na/ khyod 'di lta bu'i yang dag par
90a6(dkon brtsegs): la bar byeng na/ de khyod kyis sems la bang thob pam/ nges ces smras pas/ bram tho gros bzang mes che dang ldan pa madrugal rtse bu chen pal 'din ces smras sa/
90a7(dkon brtsegs): dathun pa mo nugal gyi bu bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gis thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshigangs srung gsum
90a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi spong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos te/ lnga'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig/ ma dkrol bar yang lha'i sil sran gyi sgra 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas
90b1(dkon brtsegs): so// de nas bu mo blo gros pa'ang mas de ltar bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas mthag tu/ de'i mong la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ 'di rnam badrug tu g.yas na//
90b2(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i me tog gi char babacing ma krol bar yang lha'i sil sran gyi sgra byung bar gyur to// btsun pa ro'u gal gyi bu bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis ngad ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
90b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag la bdud 'byung
90b4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med pa dang / bud med kyi skyon rnams med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa tshig des 'khor 'di ga ser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig/ bu mo blo gros
90b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i mdo la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po bstan las
90b6(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas/ bcom
90b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jam
90b8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so// blo gros bzang mo khyod chos gang la gnas te bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di byas/ blo gros bzang mo
91a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma mchis pas de la gnas par mi nus te/ 'di la dri ba ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
91a2(dkon brtsegs): gros bzang po byang chub ces bya ba 'di gang gis tshig tha dgas yin/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba ni/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so//
91a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ blo gros bzang mo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig tha dgas yin/ blo gros bzang mes smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'
91a4(dkon brtsegs): shes bgyi ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// langam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo cing bzhin gshegs pa yang byang chub kyi byer spyad pa mdzad ngam/ blo zas
91a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang mas smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na smisdig rgya ba dang / brag cas byang chub kyi phyir srung ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir smad do// 'ar ma dpal gyis
91a6(dkon brtsegs): sa pa thazas padang mamyod gyi kyi las bsams te 'di ska ces smras/ thegs pazang mas smras pa/ la yang sal 'dil chos dga' mang byamam pa'as bas ma pa thalags
91a7(dkon brtsegs): mamachisas// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ thogs pabang mi bsam bdeg bu yin du zinan/ bris pa thams cadakyang byang chub tu 'gyur ro// blo gros bzang mas smras pa/ 'a
91a8(dkon brtsegs): da' ma du gangs rgyas mas kyang gnas masaparnam pa gan te/ byang chub kyang gag pa ga zigags sa/ mang dunas 'asas
91b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul du 'di ni dbyings gcig ba lags te/ zang ba ma mchis zhing dor ba ma mchis la/ sgro btags pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ blo gros par
91b2(dkon brtsegs): mo bshad pa 'di'i don zhes pa ji snyed cig yod/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa 'di den 'chal pa ni sgyu ma skul ba'i sems dang sems las 'jam dpal byung
91b3(dkon brtsegs): baji srid mchis pa de srid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo sprul pa nyid kyang med na/ de'i sems dang sems las byung ba ga la yod/ blo gros bzang mas sbas pa/
91b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni mchis pa yang ma lags/ ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gnon
91b5(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bu me blo gros bzang mo'i 'di zab mo bzod pa dang ldan pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
91b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas bskal pa sum cu lon pa'i 'og
91b7(dkon brtsegs): gtong ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// khyod kyang bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di nyid kyis mi skye ba'i chos la zhugs pa byas so// de nas 'jam
91b8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la phyag byas nas/ tshig 'di skad du bdag gis slob dpon yun ring mo zhig mthong ngo zhes kyang smras so//
92a1(dkon brtsegs): blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ma rtogs shig re ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyiraro// 'jam dpal gyis smras
92a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ci'i phyir slob dpon gyis bud med kyi lus dpung ma bsgyur/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ni bud med do// 'di ni skyes pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs pa ste/ 'on kyang
92a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis the tshom med par bya'o// bden pa gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bden pa des
92a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag skyes par gyur cig/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i mod la de'i bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas skyes par red de chos gos ngur smrig gyon
92a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ des 'di skad du bden pa gang gis byang chub thob pa na/ dge slong chur shog ces byas pas rab tu byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud kyang 'byung bar
92a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan seng gi ming yang med pa dang / brang med gyi stor rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag dag slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas la
92a7(dkon brtsegs): led pa'i sbyong 'ama'i 'dra ba de la bur gyur cig ces byas so// byang chub sems dpa' thogs pazang bas tshig de smras ma pag rba/ de'i mang la dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs rnas
92a8(dkon brtsegs): sumathu lani pa'i spyong lam 'i 'dra bangs bur gyur to/ 'jam dpal bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can rnams kyi lus gsang kyi'ang/
92b1(dkon brtsegs): bur gyur bdang / bsams pas bza' ba dang 'drang ba grub par gyur te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byung gyi lha rnams kyi longs spyang dang / yongs su spyad pa'i la ba bzhin du gyur dad /
92b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nang nas gsum yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ba dang / rin po che sgra bdud gyi shing ldan pa dang / rin pa che'i drabs yongs su bskor cing / rin po che sna bdu
92b3(dkon brtsegs): bad+ma dag gis rgyas la/ seng rin po che'i blar zes te/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji 'dra ba kho na dang mnyam zhing mi lhag pa de lta bur 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig nges
92b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig ces smras pas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig re skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i mdo la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
92b5(dkon brtsegs): de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to// de nas zla ba'i lha rnams kyis lha'i lus kyis gcig nas gcig tu sbags shing skad kyis go bar byas te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
92b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po blo gros bzang po byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa ni de lta bur 'gyur/ zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam
92b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gnon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
92b8(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang nabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
93a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das yon tan rin can dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'bya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal
93a2(dkon brtsegs): pan/ srog chags bye ba phrag sum na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas par gyur to// lnga bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni chos
93a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ srog chags brgya steng gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par 'gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
93a4(dkon brtsegs): 'i dge slong byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par 'dod pa lnga stong tsam yang byang chub sems dpa' zo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam bathogs shing / dge ba'i rtsab ches
93a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong nas/ de dag ngang gi grags bcom ldan 'das kyi skul gsol te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sus nas/
93a6(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di ga du bapom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smras so// dge slong de dag gis/ dge ba'i na
93a7(dkon brtsegs): rngan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos mthag cu 'argal pa dgra bcu'i 'khor ba bskul te/ bor nas thar meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byi rje
93a8(dkon brtsegs): ldag par gnas par gyur te// de dag thams ca kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spang bsan no// rajam dpas dge slong da dag ni bskal pa bcu bzhi man/ brgal pa drim ma pa'i
93b1(dkon brtsegs): bal de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ning 'jig rten gyi khams 'o gzer can du bskal pa gcig la than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa
93b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i rgyan ces bya bar thams cad ming mthun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs
93b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la rdzu 'phrul chen po byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa gang gis
93b4(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa sdong gi bar du thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad la/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas/ zla ba byed kyi bar du lan re klags na/ bsod nams
93b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po snga ma ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe' dang / rgyar
93b6(dkon brtsegs): yang mi bzod do// 'jam dpal de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la gtad kyis/ khyed mthun par gyis la sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mdo lta bu 'di
93b7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bzung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig shod cig/ klogs shig/ ston cig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ 'jam dpal dpe
93b8(dkon brtsegs): na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ji srid du gnas pa de srid du rin po che sna bdun med par mi 'gyur la/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po shi na rin po che sna bdun med par 'gyur ro// 'jam
93b9(dkon brtsegs): sa mags sa tsung pa sgyu ba nga su da
93b10(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ste phyogs kyi rgyas kyi tshul thams cad med par mi 'gyur la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dil bu 'di ming par 'gyur na/ dam pa'i chos nab par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal bas na mang
93b11(dkon brtsegs): rin po che 'di la bu 'di yi ger grib pa dang / lung 'jog pa dang / dbang ba dang / grags pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya che rab tu ston pa'i phyir/ bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
93b12(dkon brtsegs): rnams brtson 'grus brnam par bya'o// 'di ni de'i rjes su bstan pa yin no// byis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ 'di ni rigs kyi pra'am rigs kyi bu ma byang chub 'dong pa dras bstan pa yin no//
93b13(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
93b14(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang / me dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pal mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog
93b15(dkon brtsegs): gas pa chen pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u snang drug brgyab las/ bram thezas dbang mas nus pa'i le'u zhes byas/ sram bcu ba rdzogs sa// rgyag kyis
93b16(dkon brtsegs): po dzin mi ca dang / su len po d+hi dang / shachen gyi la tsA pa ban+de ye shes sdes nus te gtan la bab pa/ @// chag ska nga/ u gang
93b17(dkon brtsegs): bal banir gshegs pa bzhed par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ning 'jig rten gyi khams 'ad gaper can du 'azhal pa gcig la man med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub cu mdzun
93b18(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i rgyan ces bya bar thams cad ming mthun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs
93b19(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la rdzu 'phrul chen po byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa gang gis
93b20(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa sdong gi bar du thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad la/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas/ zla ba byed kyi bar du lan re grags na/ bsod nams
93b21(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po snga ma ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi bod/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe' dang / rgyur
93b22(dkon brtsegs): yang mi bzod do// 'jam dpal de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la gtad kyis/ khyed mthun par gyis la sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mdo lta bu 'di
93b23(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bzung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig shod cig/ klogs shig/ sngon cig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ 'jam dpal dper
93b24(dkon brtsegs): na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ji srid du gnas pa de srid du rin po che sna bdun med par mi 'gyur la/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po shi na rin po che sna bdun med par 'gyur ro// 'jam
94a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa la de ban chos ma grangs 'di la bu 'di dgan nu srid du byung ba srid du/ da zhin shegs pa'i byung chub kyi na lag na pa ma du
94a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi tshul thams cad med par mi 'gyur la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bu 'di med par 'gyur na/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bas na mad sde
94a3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che 'di la bu 'di yi ger zab pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / bcang ba dang / klags pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i phyir/ bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
94a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams brtson 'grus bajam par bya'o// 'di ni de'i rjes su bstan pa yin no// byis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ 'di ni rigs kyi bra'am rigs kyi bu me byang chuba'adang ba dras bstan pa yin no//
94a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
94a6(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang / med pa/ lAm yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pal mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog
94a7(dkon brtsegs): sa pachen pa chos shinam grangs 'i 'u byung zug brgya ba las/ dus thams babang mas byas pa'i ledugs byas/ bram bcu rdzogs sa//
94a8(dkon brtsegs): po dzin mi rba dang / su len po d+hi dang / thu chen gyil tsA ba ban+de ye shes sngas nus ci gtan la bab pa/ @// rgyag sa nga/ Ar+ya gang ga
94b1(dkon brtsegs): ta ra na ma ma hA yA swa tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa gang+gA'i mchog gis nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal la/
94b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te// de'i tshe grong khyer chen po
94b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyan yod na dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba zhig gnas so// de nas dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog mnyan yod nas byung nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
94b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ra ba ga la de seng sde byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ phyogs cig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen
94b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog la gang+gA'i mchog khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs shes smras so// gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gis sprul pa la dris te/
94b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod da bzod gang nas 'ongs shes de skad smras ne/ ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa la ni 'greng ba med/ 'dug pa med nal
94b7(dkon brtsegs): ba med/ 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/ 'chi 'bo med skye ba mengan 'di nas 'ongs shes de ci zhig son bar 'gyur/ gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad sprul pa
94b8(dkon brtsegs): lta bu lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog de de bzhin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal de chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ gang+gA'i mchog khyod nga bzod gang nas
95a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs shes ci'i slad du rma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa ni ngan song du mi 'gro/ mtho ris su mi 'gro/ yongs su mya ngan las
95a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das par mi 'gror/ cigang+gA'i mchog kyang ngan song du mi 'gro// mtho ris su mi 'gro/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro 'am/ gna'i mchog gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'ang
95a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag gis dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags par mthong na ni/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog ngan song du mchi ba'am/ mtho ris su mche
95a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags so// zhes bdag sprul pa dang bsnyun tu yang mi rang lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dge bsnyen ma ga
95a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags par ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis ma thos na/ dge snyen gda'i mchog ngan seng du mchi ba'am/ mtha ris sa
95a6(dkon brtsegs): mchi ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba zhes ji skad ces bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de lnga lags kyis kyang / g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang /
95a7(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa dang / spros pa mchis na/ 'disam du bdag du ba dgang nasang du 'gro ba'am/ mtho ris su 'gro ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i skam du mams
95a8(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mya nganams 'das pa'i byings ni rnams kyang ngan sang du mchi ba 'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchebs
95b1(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen ma gna'i mchog kyang de lta bu'i dbyings can lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ garda'i mchog khyod ci yongs su ma
95b2(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par mazhugs sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das su nig gis mi skye ba la dris te/ khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhugs sa pa de sang smras na
95b3(dkon brtsegs): ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas yin na de ci zhig lan 'deb
95b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal ba/ gang+gA'i mchog de de bzhin te/
95b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags na/ gang+gA'i mchog khyod yongs
95b6(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sapa zhes de ji zhig smras te/ bcom ldan 'das su zhig sprul pa la smras te/ khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par
95b7(dkon brtsegs): mazhugs sam zhes de skad bgyis na/ ji skad lan 'debs ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'o// gsol pa ci bcom
95b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa dang / bcas pa'i smra bas spras lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med mod kyis/ 'on kyang 'khor 'di na rigs
96a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu'am rigs kyis bu lo 'dul ba dag yod de/ de dag dod chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir dris so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang+gA'i mchog de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos
96a2(dkon brtsegs): zhid ces bya ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na/ gang de las byung ba'i chos yongs su mya las 'das pa la gnas pa wa ga la zhig yod/ gsol ba gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis
96a3(dkon brtsegs): chos nying ces bgyi ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs margyas te/ de las byung ba'i chos ltag la zhig mchis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi skad du'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang
96a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par bsgrubs lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang+gA'i mchog gang dmigs pa de ni dge' ba'i rtsa ba ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni gang gis che
96a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrub pa'i tshe de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro// gang gi che yang dag par mi sgrub pa de'i che yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nying mi 'dor ro// gsol ba bcom ldan
96a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pasas kyis me khya ba la/ bas makyis mi khyal nas bgyis/ 'i slang du/ bsam chis mi grub pa la bams gyis me sgrub pa zhes brtse/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
96a7(dkon brtsegs): sbrul ba/ gda'i mchog chos di ni sems pazab par bya ba ma zhinaH/ sems pas theb par byar nus po// dacoM'i phyi nan/ 'di lta ra de la ni sems nid kyang mi semaman
96a8(dkon brtsegs): gang sems las rab tu byung ba'i chos de la ga la yang / gan mchog sems mi dmigs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byung bar mis
96b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni thob par ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin/ shes pa ma yin/ mngon sum du byas pa ma yin te/ de ni thos par bya ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang
96b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ga'i mchog 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar nges par thugs su rud de/ gna'i mchog chos thams cad ni
96b3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po med pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ram mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po mchis pa lags ra/ bcom ldan 'das
96b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzugs shes btags pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes btags pa dang / phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye
96b5(dkon brtsegs): mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang /
96b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa zhes btags pa ji lta ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag bdag ces 'dogs kyang / bdag gang yang
96b7(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gang+gA'i mchog ngas gzugs shes btags te/ gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
96b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes btags te/ rnam par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / zag pa
97a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba yang ngas btag
97a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang mi dmigs so// gna'i mchog 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu rnams la ni chu yod med de mi dmigs so// gang+gA'i mchog de bzhin du ngas gzugs shes bya
97a3(dkon brtsegs): babatags kyang gzugs gang yang mi dmigs gang yang mi dmigs so// ngas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba bdags kyang rnam par
97a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yang mi dmigs so// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / kun
97a5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bab dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ngas btags kyang / don dam par na de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so// gang+gA'i mtsha
97a6(dkon brtsegs): sa chos la mchog tu 'dzi ba med par tshangs par spyad paskyed pa lnga bu ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par skyed pa lags pa yin no// gang+gA'i mchog mngon pa'i
97a7(dkon brtsegs): dal ban gnas dmigs nas tshangs par sbyang ba sring pa de dag gis rangs par myong ba den yongs su ma dag par nas ngasra'o// gang dag tshangs par snang ba yongs su mangs par
97a8(dkon brtsegs): dgani sab ma chud chad pa'i chos 'dim bu 'ad thams cad ni/ dngas skrag par 'gyur te/ de dag suM ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / skye sngags 'dzin pa nga /
97b1(dkon brtsegs): drug bsngal ba dang / yid me bde ba dang 'jug pa rnams las yongs su mi 'phel te/ de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi skal bcan du 'gyuraro// zhes mi snang// garda'i sa rtogs
97b2(dkon brtsegs): rab 'das pa'i byin yang rung ste/ gang dag zab mo rgyan chang ba 'di la bu chos ston pa de dag la mig gti mug padag gsod pa pa'i 'du shes sbed par 'gyur te/ de ltar ni mi rje
97b3(dkon brtsegs): mug pa de dag log par zin pas/ gsang ba'i zhe sdang bskyed nas/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i
97b4(dkon brtsegs): slad du rgyun chad ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang+gA'i mchog chos 'di ni rgyun gcad pa 'am/ dbye ba 'am/ rnam par gzhig pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir
97b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyun chad pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyun ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom
97b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo ras 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsong ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi
97b7(dkon brtsegs): kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas te/ 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du
97b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par byung ste/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos brag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
99a1(dkon brtsegs): langs la bcugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bdud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to/
99a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis pA r+ya 'jum pa mi mdzadar/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
99a3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ kun dga' bo ngas mngon par shes te/ sa phyogs 'di ni du de bzhin gshegs pa stong gos gang ga'i mchog ces bya ba kho na'i dge bsnyed ma sha stag las brlams te/ chos
99a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di bshad do// dge bsnyen pa de dag thams cad ni rab tu byung nas phung po meng pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas bcom
99a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa kun dga' zhes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'as
99a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyinamagrangs 'di ni dri ba zhes bya ste/ 'di ni drim med pa zhes bya bar byung shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pan/ dge slong
99a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dun brgya dang / dge slong ma ba ni brgya len pa med pas zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas 'dang ban spyod pa dang / gzugs na skyed pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis
99a8(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi rgyam ma nga phrul / man rnams na sa/ cheg 'jig ces 'des byeng bye ma me pa/ rig pa sa thams
99b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bden gshegs pa nga lda cig sa yang 'i lus ngam pa mar mi 'gyur ba dang / rimam ma gang ba'i mchog 'di sngon mi rgyal ba la lhag par byababyas shing dge 'a pa bskye
99b2(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas dge ba sbyang ba dang / yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ 'di ni ngo mtshar to zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
99b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal ba/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ yun ring du tshangs par sbyang ba/ yun ring du tshangs par sbyang ba la gnas pa'o// bcom
99b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis
99b5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog rtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ gang ga'i mchog gis nus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/
99b6(dkon brtsegs): sumacu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi khan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dAn shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos
99b7(dkon brtsegs): te gtan la bab pa// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya a sho ka dang ta bya ka Na/ na ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/
99b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
100a1(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod bang po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
100a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brgyad stong thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pasgrub pa la mkhas pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa/ stong banyid la
100a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon pa med pa la gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa/ mi gnas par chos ston pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan
100a4(dkon brtsegs): pa sha stag 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems
100a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rin chen seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgreng dang /
100a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' nag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'dzum zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang rgya
100a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri chen sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen po/
100a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dga' ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' la la sbyang dang / byang chub sems dpal lal rgyar chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa
100b1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / skyes bu dam pa brgyad la 'di lnga sa/
100b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang ba'i
100b3(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya lnga'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros yangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros khyad par car dang / byang chub sems
100b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' blo gros 'phel dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
100b5(dkon brtsegs): chen por gnas shing bzhugs pa la/ rgyal po chen po ma skyes dgra dang / rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs pa dang / blon po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / zhang blon gyi bu
100b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhabs drung na 'khod pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
100b7(dkon brtsegs): pa byas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgyad stong du mas yongs su bskor cing // mdud kyi bltas nas chos ston pa 'di lta ste// tshangs par spyod pa/ thogs mar
100b8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba rab tu ston to// de nas
101a1(dkon brtsegs): ched nga ldan pa shar dra te'i zu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mthugal gyi thachen po dang / changang ldan pa 'ang srung chen po dang / cha dang ldan par ba'abyer dang / cha nga ldan
101a2(dkon brtsegs): byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa na thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan par mgru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kAr dga' bo dang / tshe
101a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ma gags pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang nan thos chen po rab du mang po rnams snga dro'i dres kyi tshe/ chos gos dang sham thabs gos nas ltung bzed thugs / rgyal po'i khab
101a4(dkon brtsegs): zong zer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de nas nyan thos chen po rnams rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing / mthar gyis rgyal
101a5(dkon brtsegs): bom skyes dgra'i pho brang ga la bder dang sde lpags nas/ phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do// yang de'i tshe rgyal po skyes dgra'i pho zang na/ bu me mya ngan med byin pa zhes bya ba
101a6(dkon brtsegs): bcas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ ldan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba lpag par bya ba byas pa/
101a7(dkon brtsegs): dge pabeche pa bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas song mang bal bsnyen bgrar byas pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las byer mi ldog pade/ rang gi ba'i 'ang bzangs mkhrigaser kyi nang pa can mang
101a8(dkon brtsegs): la ga gyu// de sa kyi kya mang kyis phyi pasananam sa can pa dang ma nas/ 'a las ma 'angs pa/ bkra ma mi sa rgyag kyang ma byad/ ma
101b1(dkon brtsegs): zar sman yang mi 'dings/ bsad snyoms kyang me 'bral bar kha rog sde 'dug go// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs shes thos nas
101b2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi bang bzangs kyi sku gang gal ba der song ste byin nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag la mchog tu sdug par 'dzin pas/ mngon par dga' zhing sran yang gding ngo // rgyal po ma
101b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgra'i bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du kha rog ste 'dug par mthong nas/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo
101b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/ che ba nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa/
101b5(dkon brtsegs): zag bzad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam
101b6(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ snying brtse ba can yin te/ 'jig rten la snying rtse ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi phyir rgyu bar khyod kyis mi shes sam/ cin khyod kyis de dag
101b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong la mthong zhin du/ khri las kyang mi ldang / bsra bar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan mi 'dren/ dang pa dang / gus
101b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yang mi bskyed par ci'i phyir ma gus pa ston cing kha rog ste 'dug/ khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong / de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas rang gi ba
102a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ma skyes dgral 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ci snyam du dgongs/ ci 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal bran la ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi ba/
102a2(dkon brtsegs): yang gas na nam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ ya ba ci'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin lnga gzhan dag la ldang 'am/ bskur mchi'am rgyal pos smras pa
102a3(dkon brtsegs): bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ ya ba ci mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lnga gzhan dgal ldang ngam/ bsur mchi'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bra mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras
102a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ yab ci rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang / mche'u dang / mtsho bran dang / lteng ka dang / khron pa la phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no//
102a5(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ ya ba ci ri'i rgyal po ri ra ba ri nag po gzhan dag la 'dud pa'am/ phyag 'jal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos sbas pa/ bra mo de ni ma yin no// thams
102a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ ya ba ci ma dang / tha ba dang / sar ma'i tshigs srin bu me khyer gyi 'ang 'dod pa gsan tam gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu le ri ni ma yin no// thams smras pa la
102a7(dkon brtsegs): ridags kyi rgyal po se dgel la ldang ba'am bsrung mchi ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ tha ma rin ma yin no// thams smras pa/ yang de bzhin dus nis
102a8(dkon brtsegs): zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub cu sems bskyed nas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags la/ dman pa la mas pa'i can thos mas tha
102b1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur stir bgying pa'am/ ya ba chos kyi rgyal po chen pos
102b2(dkon brtsegs): nig chos kyi 'khor lo than med pa bskor tam/ sar bar bgyid pa ni rgan thos dman bzhan pa/ zhum pazhi che ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba'am/ 'jung ba
102b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ yab lnga'i bdag po lha'i dbang po lta bu sbyin rnam par dag pa'i bdag po don tu gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lnga bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dor ba'am/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang
102b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ sur mchi bar bgyid/ ya ba mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'di 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i snga gang bla na med pa/ don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i tshangs
102b5(dkon brtsegs): ba lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ ldang ba 'am/ sur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ ya ba su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang
102b6(dkon brtsegs): mnam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba na ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i bran thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ srar mchi ba'am/ phrag
102b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du gnyer ba na/ yungs 'dul bu'i
102b8(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / ldan pa'i nyan thos dag la ldang ba 'am/ srar mchi ba 'am phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dud pa 'am/ 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ ya ba su zhig sangs rgyas
103a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba nyid shes rab dang / bsod nams dang ye shes dang / yon tan nim dang / zla ba'i sdang ba dpag tu med pa lnga bu thos nas/
103a2(dkon brtsegs): srin bu le khyer gyi 'od lnga bu rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa/ gzhan gyi sgra'i nyan thos dag gi rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su
103a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das kyang rgan thos rnams la phyag mi 'tshal na/ bzhugs bzhin du la ci smos/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ su nig zla ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btang ste srin bu me khyer la
103a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab gang can thos la bsten pa ni/ nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / bsnyen na thams cad
103a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa rin pache'i sems bsrung ba dang / gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes drags/ bram mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar bu ma ngas
103a6(dkon brtsegs): thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du mi ldang zhing srar mi 'grol/ phyag mi 'chal zhing bsrer bkur mi byed de/ 'di dag sman dang bsod snyoms la spyan mi 'dren pa ni bu mo khyod ldag pa'i
103a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal can zhigs// de skad ces sbas pa dang / bra mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas rang gi brgyal po ma skyes dgral 'di skad ces smras so// yaM ba bdag ni lhag pa'i brgyal canas
103a8(dkon brtsegs): lags so// de ci'i slang duzhe na/ ya ba khyod grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la me bzhengs/ srar me bzhung/ sran mi gding bas na/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i rgyal can lags bskam
103b1(dkon brtsegs): bcang do// rtsal zas smras pa/ bram de dag ni dang drangs pa ma yin no// mas smras pa/ yab de bzhinar du byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa nan thos da
103b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags sa rgyal pos sbas pa/ za mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa spangs te/ sems can thams cad la 'dud ci
103b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal bar mi byed do// bu mos smras pa/ yab byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khon tu 'dzin pa dang / za ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spang ba dang / dge ba'i
103b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba yongs su srir bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// ya bzhan thos chen po 'di dag la ni 'khon tu 'dzin pa dang / za ba dang / khro ba dang
103b5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems dang / nyes pa bsal bar bgyi ba yang ma mchis/ spangs par bgyi ba dang / dge ba 'phel bar bgyi ba yang ma mchis te/ yab zhan thos thams cad la ni sangs
103b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'bum gyis zlos kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji sbed pa dang / shes rab ji snyed pas chos bstan du lags kyang / yab de dag la ni tshul khrims kyang gal
103b7(dkon brtsegs): mchi/ ting nge 'dzin kyang galas mchi/ shes rab kyang galas mchi/ rnam par grol ba yang galas mchi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang g.yas mchi/ yang 'di
103b8(dkon brtsegs): lnga ste/ dper na bum pa chab kyis bltam pa'i nang du char ba ban chab kyi thigs pa cig kyang mi len la der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro// yang de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la gal te
104a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bshad du lugs kyang de dag yang 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur la/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab
104a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang / de dag la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro// ya ba 'di lta ste
104a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rgya glang thams cad dang / char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing der gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i srang du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni ched ma mchis pa'i
104a4(dkon brtsegs): srad du'o// ya ba 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/ chos bstan pa'i chuthams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing chos
104a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
104a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi stong de ni mnyam pa dang mjam pa'i slad du'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur pa ni// mya ngan med byer yon tan gzi brjid brgyan/
104a7(dkon brtsegs): byas baH ga'i lugs kya dbang // de lu nA klu d+hA byi ni ma langs/ ma skyes dbu'i dril smras pa ni// bu seM na 'di las mnyan par gyis// khyod kyis
104a8(dkon brtsegs): khan thos sde brgya mthong bzhin du// phyag bya'i phyir na tso byer ldeng mi byed// bra mo myang ni ming kyis byin na re/ nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na// ci byir byug
104b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ngasam payi skye ba/ bdag mchis la cig ciganigs na par gsal// dbedun mi zhig rgya mchod mchis nas kyang // rin chen 'byung zang nas ni gcigs zungs/
104b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bdag cid can thos thams cad kyang // ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blang snyam bgyid/ dper na rgyal ponar gying dbang byug bo// sa ba dga' bar las bsgyur ba mas
104b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyis nas// kar sha pa ni gcig tsam gsol na ni// de'i sa rgyal po bsnyen pa don ma mchis// gang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas// bye ba phrag slong gsol
104b4(dkon brtsegs): ba bgyis na ni// ngas ni dpral mang nor dang ldan par bgyid// des na rgyal po legs par bstod pa lags// kar sha pa ni spong ba'i mi bzhin du// gang zhig sangs rgyas
104b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mtha' yas/ thob nas theg pa dman la 'dod skyed pa// nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid// nor rnams sgrub bgyid mi ni ji lta ba// byang chub sems dpa'
104b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de 'dra ste/ rgyal po chos kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing // byang chub sems dpa' reg nas sems can 'dul bar bgyid// dper na nad pa nar rgyas gzir rnams
104b7(dkon brtsegs): sman pa yis// grol bgyid de bzhin gyi sgra phyir 'brang ba'i nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar
104b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa btang nas ni// sos gyur sems can la ni sra zhig 'dud par bgyi// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gar
105a1(dkon brtsegs): ba na/ sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/ ji ltar bgyid/ ji ltar nad pa sos par 'gyur ba thams cad la// sman pa dag gis gso bar
105a2(dkon brtsegs): nus par mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin nyan thos thams cad ses par gyur pa la// sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi sod ngo // 'di na sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la// gas
105a3(dkon brtsegs): bar sems kyis sems can gzhan lam lags te// de 'dra'i bdag nyid 'gengs par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal ni// sran pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed// sman pa gang zhig snying rje
105a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bdag nyid ji lta bar// de bzhin par la rnams kyang ngan las grol bgyid ba// de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten kun gyis 'dung bar bgyisanas
105a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang lags// gang zhig ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas// bdag nyid dgrol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags// de ni sman pa bdag ni dgrol bar bgyid bltar/
105a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas bdag gis mchod pa bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags// gang nig me shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs kyar nas// sems can grangs med sdug bsngal las grol bgyid pa/ ngengs
105a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chubs chog la 'dun pa skyed pas// de ni 'jig rten can kyis bsngags par bgyid ba lags// me na 'i shing sdong mdzes pa ma lags so// de dag rnams kyi ze ma
105a8(dkon brtsegs): 'angs pa pa lags te// oM na 'da'i shing 'dunan pas thams cad kyi// rnam par rnam pa'i thebaman par srid ma lags// canan mchog gi slong can dgagi cha ba'is/ 'a
105b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skye bo rnams kyi nye bar bsten pa lags// de bzhin bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gi don bgyi snyam// ba lang rmeg rjes tshun
105b2(dkon brtsegs): yangs ma lags// tshabs bdungs bzhi par mi bgyid la// gang+gA'i klung ni sems can bye ba spong // tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi// ba lang rmig rjes chu 'dra'i nya
105b3(dkon brtsegs): thos kun/ sems can kun gyi cha bzhi mi bgyid// gang+gA'i klung 'dra byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid// ji ltar rin chen char na
105b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bab pa ni// dpral po dag ni 'gron bu len par bgyid// gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas ni// sems can dbul po nor dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas rin chen chos 'char 'bas
105b5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen las// chung ngu 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can don srang mang du len par bgyid// ji ltar sems can dag ni ri rab kyis/
105b6(dkon brtsegs): drung du mchis na gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur// ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na// gser gyi kha dog can du yong mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab bzhin
105b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mthus na ltar bcas skye dgra rnams// rnam grol don tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dor mi bgyid// ya ba cig ji ltar rwa bran rtse mo'o/
105b8(dkon brtsegs): zil ba'i thigs pas lo tog rgyas mi bgyid// rab tu 'gengs pa'i sprin gyis sa stengs 'di// tshim par bgyid cing lo tog 'phel bar bgyid// nyan thos thams cad zil 'jig
106a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin/ byang chub sems dpa' rab 'gengs sprin dang 'dra// snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni// stong gsum rnos chu yis
106a2(dkon brtsegs): tshim par bgyid// kar wi ra'i me tog dri mchog min// des ni skyes pa bud med dga' mi 'gyur// tsam pa ka'i me tog dril dga'/ ut+pal par shi ka'ang de
106a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// rgan thos kAr wI rari'i dri bzhin te// de dag shes pas skye dgu dga' mi 'gyur// kun mkhyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la// lha dang mi rnams rab tu
106a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur/ gcig bramachi bde la mtshar ci mchis// gang zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa zang // nan thos mi rang gcig bu mchi ba bzhin// khya
106a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dag ni de dang pon 'dra// mthor zhig gzhan gyis bas dpa' tshal ba dang // skye bo kun la stsol bgyi dgun ma gror bzhin// skra 'thang nyan thos kun ma/
106a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ma/ byang chub sems dpa' kun la 'gron 'gyid bzhin// gzings la brten pas chub chen po las// gzhan dag bskal par nus par mi 'gyur /
106a7(dkon brtsegs): bdan bu'i nang du zhugs na ne// sems can bye ba mang po skal bar bgyid// rgan thos gzings la rten pa lta zla ste// sems can gzhan dag stsol bar rdzi war nas/
106a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub grar grags byang chub sems/ sdug bsngal mtshoms sems can bskol bar bgyid// ji lar g.yul dang bong bu nonan ni// dgralas
106b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi// glang chen na dang shing rga non pa ni// g.yul du lhag pa'i dgra rnams choms par 'gyur// rgan pos rnams ni bong bzhon pa bzhin/ brang
106b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' glang che mnon 'draste// sems can kur la ban byed srad du// de dag shing rta dbang du bdud kyang 'joms// ji ldar bar snang ska mas rgyas gyur pas// de ga
106b3(dkon brtsegs): gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur// zla ba rab tu rgyas bshar bas ni// mtshan mo mkhas la thig le bzhin du mdzes// yab cig zhan thos 'di dag skar ma'ang// rgyal po
106b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' phra ba bzhin// gang dag sems can kun la sman srad du// ye shes shar bas skye bo sdang bar bgyid// ya ba cig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis
106b5(dkon brtsegs): las rnams la ni 'jug par mi nus kyi// 'jam gling 'di na li ma'i 'od rnams kyis// bya ba sna tshogs brgya dag bgyid par 'gyur// nyan thos 'di dag srid bu me khyer 'dra
106b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam grol zhi ma ny+dzu bu me// shes rab me shes kyis ni sems can 'brel// ya bcig la brgya gagis na
106b7(dkon brtsegs): byang yang // ri dgas tshogs rnams 'dzegs par mi 'gyur gyi// seng ge'i skad gyis grangs chen ri dgas dang // byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs su dbyer bar 'gyur//
106b8(dkon brtsegs): yab cig de ltar nyan thos wa 'drar gzigs// de dag skad kyis bdud rnams skrag mi 'gyur// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyad pas// bdud dang de bzhin brda
107a1(dkon brtsegs): ris skrag par gyur// ya cig tu 'di dag gis mthong bas na// theg pa dman pa dag la 'dod mi skyed// su zhig bla med byang chub spangs nas ni// 9
107a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid// gang dag byang chub dam pa yongs spangs nas// theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid// de dag mtsho dor rnyed pa thob ma gyur// de dag mir skyes
107a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni nyes par mchis// gang dag ltar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du// byang chub sems mchog 'dun pa skyed par bgyid// de dag legs mtsho rnyed pa legs par rnyed// de dag mi
107a4(dkon brtsegs): lus thob pa legs par mchis// gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // 'jig rter sman srad las bgyid yid kyang ner// gang dang rtag sems can sman slad brtson/
107a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag u dum+ba ra'i me tog bzhin// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag thos nas cang mi sba bar gyur /
107a6(dkon brtsegs): sa da na pa 'i bu'i sam du sems te/ rtsom bu'ang sdebs pathegs pa ba dgen/ ci bzed batho 'am/ mdzub pa bdag gis 'di ltar bdags par
107a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams// sa che na pa nga ba tha ma meng gyis rkyen pal 'dzin ces snus pa/ zas byang rnams kyi gag pal yang dag pa zugs pal/
107a8(dkon brtsegs): sa rgyam gyi ga pa la ma ga zug pal rnam pa ma/ na pa ya ma gags par bya/ mas tha
107b1(dkon brtsegs): bratsun za sha ri'i bu gal te bdag chos 'ga' zhig don du gnyer na ni bdag seng ge'i sgra ci yang mi sgrog bzhig na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar bdag ni gang yang don du mi gnyer te/ de'i phyir
107b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so// btsun pa sha ri'i bra yang gang 'di skad du/ ri bu mo khyod theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa sha ri'i bus chos gang mngon par 'dra
107b3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i chos de la/ cican thos shes bya ba'am/ rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i theg pa rnam par 'azhag pa yod dam/
107b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas brdan shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de la ni theg pa rnam par bzhag pa med de/ chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan zhing med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// bu mos sbas pa/ btsun pan
107b5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la don du gnyer ba ji zhig yod/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de la ni don du gnyer ba ji yang med do// gnas brtan shA ri'i bus bu mo mya ngan med kyi
107b6(dkon brtsegs): byin pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ji yod/ bu mos smras pa/
107b7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ri'i bu sdong bzhing dang / dben pazhid la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bye brag med cing tha dad dung dbye ba ci yang med do// bu mos snyas
107b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang dper bzhid la ji ltar bye brag med cing tha dad dung ci yang med pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa shA ri'i bus sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so sa
108a1(dkon brtsegs): skya za'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dang dbye brag med do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ nam mkha' dang thag pa med pa la yang
108a2(dkon brtsegs): brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba
108a3(dkon brtsegs): ci yang med do// gnas brtan shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bu mo mya ngan mod kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo mi myong
108a4(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces zer ba las na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ni shin tu ches lhag pa zhig du mthong la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams ni shin tu dman par mthong ngam/ ci khyod nyan thos chen po rnams/
108a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong na ldang bar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ bsung yang mi 'gro// gtam yang mi zer/ sman dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan 'dren par mi byed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bram
108a6(dkon brtsegs): myang na skad kyis byin pas gnas brtan mthu 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
108a7(dkon brtsegs): ba gams gdags pa'i 'a ga yo gsasam/ mjugal rabs smras pa/ rnams par rnags nini se zas dngas shes kyi/ ma skams pa
108a8(dkon brtsegs): ga pa sa
108b1(dkon brtsegs): ga rdzam na dag pa ma das padang/ ma'as padang/ dam byung brnams sa bya mas kyi snang mdang bcas ma yang ba maH
108b2(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jig rten gyi mas gcig tu rtogs pa'i sems rnarnams kyi la ci mas te/ bluthun pa ma drug la kye ze chen tha 'a na de pa'i gshegs pa dang / phan pas rnams sde sang pa
108b3(dkon brtsegs): dzi pa dang chung bya ba yin no// btsun pa mjugs rtse bu chen pa zugs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni'i sreng cig yod/ chags ba'i sna
108b4(dkon brtsegs): yod shes sam/ mjugal gyi zas sbas pa/ bra ma de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa po'u gal gyi bu chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa ni ji snyed cig
108b5(dkon brtsegs): yod/ ma 'ongs paji snyed cig yo dang lngar bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u gal gyi bus smras pa bum de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u gal gyi
108b6(dkon brtsegs): bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa ji snyed cig yod zhe sdang la spyod pa'i snyed cig yod/ gti mug la spyod ba ni ji snyed cig yod/ cha mnyam pa la spyod pa ni'i sbed cig yod
108b7(dkon brtsegs): shes sam/ ma'u gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig
108b8(dkon brtsegs): yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi
109a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes so// brams smras pa/ btsun pa mo gal gyi bu cher po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji skad cig yod/ rang sangs rgyas
109a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba ni ji snyed cig yod/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos sbas pa/ btsun
109a3(dkon brtsegs): ba me drugal kyi bu chen po yang dag pa cing du nges pa'i sems can ni'i sted cig yod/ log pa ning du nges pa'i sems can niji skad cig yod/ ma nges pa'i sems can niji snyed cig
109a4(dkon brtsegs): yod shes sam/ mo'u gal gyi bus sbas pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni de dag dang gzhan yang de'i gong
109a5(dkon brtsegs): dra gang zhan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen na/ sems can gzhan dag gi lnga ci smos te/ btsun pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin
109a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tha mar yin no// btsun pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khyong rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyis mchog tu bstan gyis/ btsun pa mo rug
109a7(dkon brtsegs): pal la kyil bal bya sa gags pa gsas pa masas thas ban ma 'a'
109a8(dkon brtsegs): gar zugs / 'a zhi gnas sa byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchos ca gan pa'i sangs rgyas kyizhing re shing ldan parnams thams cacan phrul gyi gang sa
109b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyad par du 'gyur ba'i sras kyi ngang ldang ba yod pa der song shig/ gnas brtan mo'u gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ming
109b2(dkon brtsegs): yang khe zas gzod thos na sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/ de nas bu mo myang med kyis byin pas khri de las ma langs pa nig du tshig 'di
109b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras te/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
109b4(dkon brtsegs): cad zil gyis gnon pa ldan/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des de bzhin gshegs pa sros rab du 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer des bdag nyid dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos
109b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di dag la ston par 'gyur cig/ tsan+dan gyi dri de dag kyang nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis tshor bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshig 'di
109b6(dkon brtsegs): bskad ces sbas ma thag du/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab du 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer gyis de zhing kyi tshe/ 'od gang gis
109b7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer
109b8(dkon brtsegs): de ston cing bzhugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos ston pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so// tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri ngas kyang 'jig rten gyi
110a1(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed 'di khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa sros rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer des kyang gsung gi yan lag drug cu dang ldan
110a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed ma
110a3(dkon brtsegs): bag tucan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas pas can
110a4(dkon brtsegs): sbrul gyi snying po'i dri tshor nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das banan sbrul gyi snying po'i'adri 'di ga las byung lags/ de skad ces gsol pa
110a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'dis nyan thos
110a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra spags te/ des nyan thos chen po dag la bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin
110a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa sas rab tu 'byed pa'i 'ad gser byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos sngon cing bzugs pa yang bstar/ 'jig rten gyi khams sum
110a8(dkon brtsegs): na phrul gyi snying po dzings kyang 'jig can gyi kham pa 'di rgyab par byas pa// de nas bum bya nga med gyis byed pas me dang ldan pa ma thugal gyi gyi chen po la yim
110b1(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rang du
110b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam/ thos na car thos dman bzhan pa zhum bzhi che ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la ldang ba'am/ bsrar 'gro ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed
110b3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de ci tsam du thag ring ba shes sam/ mo'u gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so bums sbas pa/
110b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po lag te khyed 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul can/ sha stag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ dper na bu ram shing gi 'tshal lam/
110b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od ma'i tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'bras sA lu'i shing bzhin du tshams med par gang bar gyur nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bskal par brtsis kyang 'jig
110b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na 'dug pa grang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan
110b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer gyis 'od dag mi snang bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan
110b8(dkon brtsegs): nga'od srung chen pos bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pal 'di skad ces smras so// bu bo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
111a1(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/
111a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas/ gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong // gang dag nga la slar shes pa// log pas spong bar zhugs pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong // sangs rgyas
111a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni chos nyid blta// 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku// chos nying shes par bya min pas// de ni rnam shes mi nus// shes ma gsungs sam/ btsun pa 'od srung chen
111a4(dkon brtsegs): po gnan yang bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcol pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa sngor mthong ngan zhes de skad zer ba ni/
111a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa'od srung chen po bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mod kyi/ sha'i mig gis ma yin te/ gzugs snga ma yin no// wa'i mig gis ma yin te/
111a6(dkon brtsegs): bar ma yin no// shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du shes su ma yin no// chos kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du byed du ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma
111a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ rnam par shes par ma yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gnan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong sa/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa
111a8(dkon brtsegs): srid pa la srid pa mthong ba bzhin no// btsun pa 'ang srung cher po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ngang 'dzin pa
111b1(dkon brtsegs): 'a na mthong ba bzhin no// gnas banan 'od srung chen pas smras pa/ tha la 'di sar ma rig pa dang / sred pa la sred pa dang / ngang 'dzin pa dang / nga yid ban
111b2(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di gnyis ni med pa yin no// chos gang med pa de ni blta bar mi nus so// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no// chos
111b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni med pa yin te/ de dag ni bkra par mi nus so// 'ad srung chen pos smras pa/ bra ma ci sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang med dam/ thams sbas pa/ gnas na
111b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par 'dod dam/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni
111b5(dkon brtsegs): za mo'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yongs su grub par mi 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta ci smos/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos gang dag yong
111b6(dkon brtsegs): su grub pa med pa'i chos de dag ci yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo med pa de dag ni med pa yin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun
111b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'ong srung chen po de bas na chos thams cad ni med pazhid do// med pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lta ba rnam par spyad par bya ba med do// btsun pa 'od srung chen po rigs kyi
111b8(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lnga pa rnam par spyad par 'dod pas ni/ bdag la lta ba rnam par spyad par bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag la
112a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ji ltar rnam par dag pa 'gyur/ tha mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe bdag rang bzhin/ med pa'i phyir chos thams
112a2(dkon brtsegs): cad rang bzhin med pa nyid du mos na/ de tsam gyis na bdag la lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag gi rang bzhin ci yin/ bu mos
112a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do// bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag dben pa yang yin no// rang bzhin med pa des bdag
112a4(dkon brtsegs): dben na/ rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis su las chos thos na 'di ltar khyod kyis yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes
112a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// bu mo yang lta ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis yod do// gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las 'byung ngo zhes de
112a6(dkon brtsegs): skad gsungs so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa'i shes rab can de dag ni gzhan gyi sgra dang / rgyal bzhin du so sor rtog
112a7(dkon brtsegs): b.las la ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'dzeg pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyis ma tshol lo// btsun pa 'od/
112a8(dkon brtsegs): grangs chen po'i gar na dge slong rgyal bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ 'ang srung chen pos smras pa/ bram gang gi med ge slong 'i skang sa pa'i chos rnams kyi denaman
112b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog par byed pa de lar na/ dge sang rgyal bzhin du zhugs pa yin na// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ phra mo ji lar na byang chub sems dpa' rtul bzhin du nags pa yin tha sa
112b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad lhan cig gnas kyang sems can du 'du shes skyed par mi byed pa de ltar na/ byang
112b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyab sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos 'am
112b4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni byi ba'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no zhes/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba de
112b5(dkon brtsegs): wa bus sbyar bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bral chos dngag la ji ltar sbyor bar bya//
112b6(dkon brtsegs): tha mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid la sbyor ba yang med mi sbyor ba yang med par mthong ba de bzhin du/ chos thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o//
112b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung smin pos sbas pa/ bu mo'i ltar mthong na chos thams cad mthong ba yin/ bri mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos thams cad la gnyis su med pa
112b8(dkon brtsegs): pa pa kyad sa ma ya ya na// mas pa sa rgya nga ma tha
113a1(dkon brtsegs): dang srung can pas sbas pa/ brab bdaga'i la sa par bya/ thams smras pa/ bathun pa'od srung chen pos 'i yang mthong ba bzhin du ma par bya'o//
113a2(dkon brtsegs): su can pas smram pa/ bram pa pas de bdag dang bdag gi sa mamang // thams smras pa/ btsun pa 'ad srung chen po'i ltar bdag me med bdag gir meng ba de bzhin du
113a3(dkon brtsegs): sa pa ba par bya// ga pa skad pa pa nangs sugs pan ba byung gyis tham ma na med shes byin pa la dzind ces smras sa// bram byung rjes bas
113a4(dkon brtsegs): na kyis na pa lags pa me nga// rdum ldan phreng kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun par ba 'byor rnyeng pa las ni srabs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis se yang ma nga
113a5(dkon brtsegs): ba srabs pa dang ldan ning gang gis nang ram bI la'i mang mi dmigs pa de slongs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bram gang ma rnyed pa spobs pa dang ldan
113a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang gis bdag ma rnyed cing gzhan ma yin/ dge ba yin mi dge ba ma yin/ kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/ zag
113a7(dkon brtsegs): pa banas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa ma yin 'dus byas ma yin/ 'jas ma byas ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig nan las 'das pa ma yin/ kun nas canamangs
113a8(dkon brtsegs): ngam les rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ 'khong bdang mya ngan las 'das pa ma nad pa/ sa sa'i spyi ba'i chom mi dmigs zhing bags pa'i chos kyang mi migs pa/ sa
113b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyims par med migs na/ bathun par ba'abar nga sar na gang gis mi yang ma rnyed pa sgrubs pa dang ldan pa yin na// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de lar sabs pa
113b2(dkon brtsegs): la zums smras pa/ brtsa par bu 'byer 'i ltar rdzas thams cad marnyed pa de bzhin du slob par 'gyur ro/ chos kying 'dren ni dgang gis gnas banan na mongs
113b3(dkon brtsegs): bamed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid de ci brjod cing slar rung ngam/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang / chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la/ ci stobs bci yang
113b4(dkon brtsegs): yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang / de bzhin zhid ni bstan pa 'am/ brjod par mi nus so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
113b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin na/ khyod kyis bu mo khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// zhes bya ba de ci lta bu yin/
113b6(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar med pa'i spobs pas ston to// bu mos sbas pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor chos thams cad la zag cha lta zar mos
113b7(dkon brtsegs): sam/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ bu sems so// bu mos sbas pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ci brag chal spob bci yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
113b8(dkon brtsegs): bu ma doni med de/ bram rgya dang rkyen tshogs pa las spa 'byung bar zad do// bu mos sbas pa/ btsun bar ba 'byor brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang min pa del ni rang bzhi
114a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis grub pa ci yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang brten nas byung ba de la ni skye ba ci yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras
114a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bu mo chos thams cad ni rten nas byung ba'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// rab 'byor gyis
114a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin/ sgra bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'das te gshegs
114a4(dkon brtsegs): sa de bzhin gshegs pa bad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gar+b+ha'i klung gi bye ma srid ni da ltar bzhugs so// nes ci'i phyir
114a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor mi skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni/ skye ba'am/ nub par 'gyur ba mi
114a6(dkon brtsegs): 'do ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa don dam pa'i tshig ston to// za mos smras pa/ btsun par ba 'byor bstan pa thams ca
114a7(dkon brtsegs): ni bas na med pa'o// de ci'i phyir bstan pa thams cad bstan du med cen/ de ni bskur kyang rung / ma bstan kyang rlung / dngos po ma yin te/ dngos po med pa dang /
114a8(dkon brtsegs): brjod da meng pa'i mtha' mi spong ba'i khyer ro// rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ bu mo khyod khyim na gnas bzhin du/ 'dis bu'i chos la gnas shing / 'dis bu'i rnam papa
114b1(dkon brtsegs): bu 'din dmanar te/ brams smras pa/ btsun parab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni khyim pa'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes 'azung bar mi bya/
114b2(dkon brtsegs): da ba'i phyir de na/ de dag ni bsam pas bye ba yin/ shes rab kyis bye ba yin/ ye shes kyis bye ba yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun par rab 'byer byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
114b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod kyis shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shod cig dang kho bos mnyan to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
114b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro// brgyad
114b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang
114b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ro// sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa yang yin no// 'jig
114b7(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i dga' ba dang / spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa yang yin no// lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i btang snyoms la gnas pa yang yin no// long
114b8(dkon brtsegs): su bsngo ba la mkhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa yang yin no// lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba
115a1(dkon brtsegs): yang yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba tshol ba la brtson pas chog mi shes pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa pa yang yin no// bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i
115a2(dkon brtsegs): byer ma bstan par shes pa yang yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad pa de dag dang ldan na/ khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba zhes ma
115a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis phra mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces
115a4(dkon brtsegs): smras so// bu mo khyod mal khri ga ser gyi rkang ba can la 'dug cing / skan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug nas rgan thos chen po dag dang gtam yin par gnas pa yin no// bu mo min par snyan
115a5(dkon brtsegs): mthon po la 'dug pa la/ stan dma' ba la 'dug pas chos bshad par mi bya'o// zhes bya ba ci khyod kyis mthos sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas
115a6(dkon brtsegs): ched ldan pasgragacan zin la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pasgrag can zin 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba yin/ 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba ma yin bakhyod kyis shes sam/
115a7(dkon brtsegs): sgrug can ber gyi sbas pa/ bum la bag shes te/ gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slo bcing bslab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// 6
115a8(dkon brtsegs): ma papa 'il gal par byed pa ga ba pa yi na ma thag/ thab rgya namang kyis byed pas rnam pa bathun pasgrag me pa yang ga pa sa
115b1(dkon brtsegs): rgu na pa gang dgakyisar babs pa'i bslab pal slob pa dngag ni rung ba ma yin pan// deci'i phyir na/ 'dimar ga ni dag ceng rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa sngags
115b2(dkon brtsegs): rje na gang dag mi rtogs cing rnam par mi rtog pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa sgra gcan pin rung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong dgra bcom bzag babad pa rnams kyi cig bla dgas
115b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de dag ni bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni bslab pa las yang dag pa'i byer te/ de dag ni byer yang bsdu
115b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'dod pa ma yin pas de dag ni rung ba yin no// de dag ni khams gsum du phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ de dag ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/ mi slob pa zhes bya'o//
115b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar de dag gi bslab pa ni mi dmigs te/ khams gsum pa brtag pa tsam du shes so// de'i phyir de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// sla gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo rung ba dang
115b6(dkon brtsegs): rung ba ma yin pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pasgra gcan zin 'di lta ste dper na/ gser dngul rgyan du byas pa dang / rkyen dus byas bral tha dad
115b7(dkon brtsegs): dbye ba ci zhig yod/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo tha dad dbye ba ci yang med do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin de bzhin du/ rung ba dang rung ba ma yin bal
115b8(dkon brtsegs): yang yi ge'i tha snyad ma'am banyid kyi phyir tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ci dang yang bral ba'i phyir de/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas non mong
116a1(dkon brtsegs): pa can ma yin no// btsun pa sgra gcan zin yang 'di skad du stan shin tu mthong ba la 'dug ste/ chos mnyan tam zhes zer ba la byang chub sems dpa' ni rtsa
116a2(dkon brtsegs): bting ba la 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin no// sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis khyod de skad smra/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pasgra gcan zin 'di ci snyam
