116a3(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sa gang la 'dug ste byang chub thob par gyur/ skra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rtsa bting ba la bzhugs nas byang chub thob bo// bu mos smras
116a4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ btsun pasgra gcan ben ni byang chub sems dpa' dra bting ba la 'dug pa la stong gsum gyi khams na/ tshangs pa'am/ brgya byin nam 'jig cer skyeng ngam/ de las gzhan pa
116a5(dkon brtsegs): 'og min man chad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyi lus 'dud de/ thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' zhabs la gdug par byed dam/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bum
116a6(dkon brtsegs): brten te/ khyod kyis pa skad smras pa bzhinano/ thams smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin de byir rnam grangs des kya nga ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
116a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya bter bal 'dug kyangs shin tu mthol la 'dug pa yin gyi/ nan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nang 'jug pa ni rna ma yin par rig par bya'o// de nas rgyal ba ma sbas pa
116a8(dkon brtsegs): tham rtsa pa'i gyis bye pal dem pas rnas pa// bram ca pa yo na mthams thub pa mi kyim sa me sa/ mas pa 'a sa
116b1(dkon brtsegs): ma / sa kyis rkyen pas smras pa/ yab zang gas / dem can parnas na sum na sa pa rnam
116b2(dkon brtsegs): ma ma na// dedags kyi kyil ba song ga'am pas byed pan 'dags paltam+b+ha/ la skyes par byung pa rnam yang ga t+yA/ gzigs sam/ rgyal bas smras pa/
116b3(dkon brtsegs): das med no// thams smras pa/ ya ba ba nan/ de bzhin gagags pa sang ga'i rtsal la zas gshegs pa dam pa'i chos kyi' khar las sbyar ba'i nabs 'bring ba nas
116b4(dkon brtsegs): zas mdzes par lags so// ya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang yin nas yang dag pa'i skabs gang sman/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ong yir na zhes de dag yang dag par
116b5(dkon brtsegs): skabs smra'o// yabade lnga bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su khas len par 'chal bas ni tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o//
116b6(dkon brtsegs): gtam 'di brjod pa'i skabs su rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo'i 'khor nas btsun mo nyi shus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lnga'i bu bcwa
116b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bra ma do'i seng ge'i sgra 'dithos nas tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad du bdag cag 'di rnams 'das pa dang /
116b8(dkon brtsegs): byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sras su khas len to zhes kyang smras so// lha'i bu de dag gis 'di ltar bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la
117a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lnga'i me tog gis mngon par gtor to// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byir pa khri gser gyi
117a2(dkon brtsegs): kang pa can las babs te/ nyan thos chen po de dag gi rkang pal mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / bzhi pa dang / bya bar bya ba bsod pa mang ba
117a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis bkur stir byas te/ dad pa dang / gus pas rang gi sa lag nas nyan thos chen po de dgatshim par byas nas/ 'di skad du btsun bdag rang dgar slad dro bcom ldan 'das la chos
117a4(dkon brtsegs): na du bzhud cig/ btsun pa dag bdag kyang mchi bar 'tshal lo// zhes kyang sbas so// de nas bu mo mya ngon med kyis byin pa pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang / skye bo bal po ches
117a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal de song sa byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// rgyal po btsun mo
117a6(dkon brtsegs): sa bangs rnams chen pas la ga sa gra sa nas gas gzugs kyi la 'ang// mas 'a lams sa kyi
117a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan das kyi bas pa mgri sa braga'amal ste/ phyogs cigaca 'dir// de nas ma ldan 'das la ched nga ldan pa ga bras 'dig ces gsams/
117a8(dkon brtsegs): sa tham bya kyis byin pa'i gribs pa ni mtsha mags so// ma rnamams sa pa'i phrul pa// ring thatha ma 'di'i migs thaMd cung chu su
117b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye ba zag khrig phrag brgya cu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bskyed do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bu mo 'dis bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur/
117b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la bud med do snyam du sems na de ltar me balnga'o// byang chub sems dpa' dag ni
117b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyis bdag nyid bung kyi gzugs su ston to// de nas de'i che bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byir gyi brlabs byas te/ bden
117b4(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs gang gis chos thams cad skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa ldan bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i lus su gyur cig/ thams
117b5(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang mthong bar gyur cig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bud kyi mtshan ma mi snang bar gyur to// skyes pa'i mtshan ma byung bar gyur nas/ steng gi bar
117b6(dkon brtsegs): snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal/ shA ri'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med
117b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa steng gi bar snang la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
117b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa
118a1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos ni
118a2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i dge 'dun ri byang chub sems dpa'a' ba'i shig tu 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba brag sum
118a3(dkon brtsegs): cucu gnyis yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de yang bai DUr+ya las grub pa rin po che sna bdun gyis bkra bar byas shing mig mangs ris su bres la/ rin po che'i madra khebs pa dang / ngan song
118a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod dag kyang khyang par med de/ shA ri'i bu dga' ldan gyi sgra rnams kyi nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod ji lta ba
118a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du mi rnams kyi yang der de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i mab ma sres dgra'i btsun mongs pa rdzibacan zhes bya ba des thal ma snar
118a6(dkon brtsegs): bas bzhud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di dgung zla dgur/ ru mar bzung ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs pa
118a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed lagasas// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyis te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams
118a8(dkon brtsegs): drin med pa'i 'dod ci nga / 'di'i 'og tu blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'a tshang rgya bar 'gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
118b1(dkon brtsegs): gari'i bul bka' stsal pa/ kA ri'i bu sring mo bcan 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
118b2(dkon brtsegs): kari'i bu rgyal po'i bcud pi zla bcan 'dini 'di nas shi 'bas nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lharnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par 'gyur zhing lnga'i bu rin cen mchog ces bya ba
118b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ rgyal po dung zhes bya ba'i bu rgyal bu gzhon nu mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur nas de
118b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la mchod pa byas te/ rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dam pa'i chos thog ma dang bar dang tha ma'i bar du 'dzin par
118b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing mchod par 'gyur ro// de mthar gyis de
118b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pas byang chub thob pa na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin ces bya bar 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa dag byas nas sangs
118b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu de nyid du za na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od gzer ces bya bar 'gyur ro//
118b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can gyis bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal brgya sdong ri ba phral te/ tshangs
119a1(dkon brtsegs): par spyod par rgyal po'i btsun mo gang zag nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi dag bzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas
119a2(dkon brtsegs): lngas bral ba'i me tog man+ta ra ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor thams cad la gtor do// de nas bar snang las babs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshig 'di skad du
119a3(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis bdag gis byang chub thob pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad rdzus te skyes zhing chos gos ngur smrig gyon la rin pa
119a4(dkon brtsegs): che'i bad+ma dag la kyil mo grang bcas te skye bar 'gyur bar ldan/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des dper na dge slong bsten par rdzogs nas la brgya lon pa'i stong la ma'i lta ba bzhin
119a5(dkon brtsegs): du/ bdag gnas par gyur cig ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas ma thag tu dge slong gi
119a6(dkon brtsegs): smad lam dang ldan par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas brgyal po ma sres dgral 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di lar
119a7(dkon brtsegs): mams na nas sa te/ rnam thang bskams pa she par gnas pa mtshan da dang yongs su bdags thalas dam pa med shin du ga marnangs pa
119a8(dkon brtsegs): sa/ ma tshar pagagasas zheg / deng gzugs sa nam pa'i rimathags phra yangs sa/ ga pa drim kyang kyis gags
119b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la dge slong gi gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs na 'di la gang yang dag pa'i gzugs lags/ rgyal po chen po de ltar na ya ma brla'i chos thams cad la 'di na kha cig lta ba'i
119b2(dkon brtsegs): kun nas bkris pas kun nas grags shing mchis te/ rang gi brgyad la mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis yongs su sreg ge/ yongs su bsregs pas chos 'dul ba 'di
119b3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal te/ 'gyod ba ma lags pa la 'gyod par sems so// rgyal po chen po de ltar na khyod kyis bag yod par mdzod la/ rgyal srid 'am ngan bzhugs bzhin du/ rtag tu bcom ldan
119b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis thang du bcud cig dang // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khyod kyi yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log las byung ba'i 'gyod pa sel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po khyod ni bya ba
119b5(dkon brtsegs): mang byed pa rang ba lags kyis bzhud cig/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / btsun mo zla ba can dang / btsun ma'i 'khor thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems
119b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bgyi ba
119b7(dkon brtsegs): mang ning bgyid pa mang ba lags kyis bdag cag mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig ces bka' stsal
119b8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcun mo zla ba can la sogs pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
120a1(dkon brtsegs): bor dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam
120a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di bzung shig/ chongs shig/ klogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu sngon cig/ kun dga' bos gsol ba bcom ldan
120a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzang lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ci ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
120a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar
120a5(dkon brtsegs): bzung shig/ gzhan dag la yang sngar cig/ kun dga' bo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang
120a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa byin pa pas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ban rnalamadu zas na ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed na/ gang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par
120a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / srang de skang thog pa bzhin dunan tan du srub bal ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis desad ces bka' stsal
120a8(dkon brtsegs): / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / na pos chen po rangag dang / ska dang mi dade/ phram yin dang / dri ba
120b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po
120b2(dkon brtsegs): rnas kyirnam thangs 'dus brag brgya ba las/ mad med kyis byin pa grang bsan pa zhes bya ba'i lems/ sram pa drug pardzogs so// chag la
120b3(dkon brtsegs): na mi tra dang / su len dra bo d+hA dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes gtan la ba bapa// / rgya gar skad du/
120b4(dkon brtsegs): Ar+ya bi ma la dang ta pa ri pri datshan ma ma hA yA na suH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
120b5(dkon brtsegs): bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
120b6(dkon brtsegs): tu yod pa na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' bar na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/
120b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam
120b8(dkon brtsegs): bar grol ba/ bar shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gis don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu stong ba yongs
121a1(dkon brtsegs): su zad pa/ yang dag par 'du shes pa sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig
121a2(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu pa la cher thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag
121a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'di lnga ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rin cen 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zag
121a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu cher tho ba dang / byams pa dang / mya ngar med kyis byin dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gom
121a5(dkon brtsegs): ba der bdon yod dang / mthong ba den yod dang / ngan song spong dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang yon tan rin po che'i me tog gis nag tu brgyan pa dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba'i 'ong
121a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis dpal can dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thogs med dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang yang ba
121a7(dkon brtsegs): ga go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i brang nga/ tshe dang ldan pa mthugs gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa'o srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan par sa
121a8(dkon brtsegs): 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / rje dang ldaran pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po brgyung ba de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'angam
121a9(dkon brtsegs): dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spring dang rin po che tog dang / mthong bdon yod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags baspyan ras gzigs dbang sa
121b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' gom pa dor ba don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad pa de dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang / chos gas
121b2(dkon brtsegs): bgos nas ltung zed thogs te bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du zhugs nas/ de dag lam gyi bar du btam 'di skad ces gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis
121b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam thos par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la skems par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o zhes brjod par gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras
121b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gang gis grong khyer du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi shes rab thogs pa med de de dag gi shes rab la mun pa mun gnag med par 'gyur ba rnam par
121b5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la bdud kyi las
121b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin de la kho bo skems par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pas/ ci nas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang /
121b7(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'jo ba dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag grong khyer na 'khod pa de dag sdig can gyi lta ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ding nge 'dzin la khe bo snyoms pa zhugs de/
121b8(dkon brtsegs): tha~M kyi du 'dug par bya'o// dang ldan pa' sus chen pa bzlas pa nas kyang ba chen skyes pa dang / bud me dang / khye'u dang / bral gang dag bdag cag la gsang rnams sbyid pa ba pa me na
122a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yangs su ma ngan las las pa la thug gi par du langs smad dang mishes brnyed par 'gyur ba rnams delta bu'i ting nge lan la khab sems bcugs te/ khrong khye du 'ag pa
122a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo sgom pa zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan
122a3(dkon brtsegs): banam nus smras pa/ gang gis grang byer duskya pa'i tshigs thams ca kyis ti nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba rnam pades bu'i ting nge 'dzin la khe bo sems pa zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par byag/ tshodang ldan pa ma thagags pas rnas sa
122a4(dkon brtsegs): smu ga ng+gA da kyi rgyu 'i sa sa da med pa 'di ba ba pa bu rje rnas la brtsams pa mas gra ze du dag par phyag ci nga ldan pa sprin dgang pos smras pa/ gang shes phreng kyi rgya
122a5(dkon brtsegs): sa ma da dzin thas pa ma na man su byung banam pa das du lenas kha ba rnams pa zugs grad kyi du la yum ba gas sa rnas gsagag shes kyang rgyan nas
122a6(dkon brtsegs): su sasu sa sas su sa smra d+ma smra sa
122a7(dkon brtsegs): smra sa sa sa sa sa
122a8(dkon brtsegs): su sa
122a9(dkon brtsegs): sa mas sa sas mas kyi sa kyis sa da na na sa
122b1(dkon brtsegs): srung ba rnams pades bu ngas pa pa khengs pas pa par 'o/ nga dub sems dnga' sgrib pa thams par rnam pangs la bas smras pa/ gang gim mthan yong kyi zung khye chen pa skye ba'i tshigs thams cad kyi sgrib
122b2(dkon brtsegs): brnas pa lnga ba dag rnam pa sel bar 'gyur ba rnams pa de lta bu'i bsam pa khe bo bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ ci nas kyang phreng khyer na sems can
122b3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bcings pa dang / gsad par sgri ba de dag thar pa dang / 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur pa rnams pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bas bsam pa bya'o// byang chub sem
122b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sdum pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis sla bar 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa
122b5(dkon brtsegs): yang thob par 'gyur ba rnams pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' khong gom pa 'dor ba den yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang
122b6(dkon brtsegs): dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par
122b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de nas can zas can po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gtam 'di brjod cing mnyan yang kyi grong khyer rjer pa byin to// yang
122b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe yul ko sa la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu me dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba las lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i ra ba bskyed pa/ sangs rna
122b9(dkon brtsegs): mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa chas thob ma la bzod pa dang ldan pa/ mngon pa shes pa lnga po rog thob pa zhig med de/ bu ma des khwa'i mig dag pa mi'i las 'das pa byang gyi
123a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag mthong zhing de dag lam gyi bar skabasu gtam ci brjod pa de thams cad kyang thoso// bu mo de yang gzugs bzang ba
123a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa bltan drug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa ma dang nang mi la byams pa/ bcas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa ste/ de dpyid zla tha chungs tshes brgyad/ skar ma rgyal gyi/
123a3(dkon brtsegs): nyin par/ pha mas dge mtshan dang / bkra shis byed du gnang nas/ bram ze zhig dang / rtsa ku sha dang / me tog dang / yam sreg shing / mar dang / bum pa thogs pa lnga brgyas yongasu bskor te/ khru
123a4(dkon brtsegs): bya bar khrid la las/ bram ze de dgis byang chub sems dpa' deg dang nyan thos chen po de dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bkra mi shis so snyam pa'i 'du shes gnas par gyur te/ de nas
123a5(dkon brtsegs): bram ze de dag nang nas/ bram ze ches 'grangs tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba des/ bu mo dri med kyis byin pa la/ 'di skad ces smras so bu mo dge slong dag mdun na 'khod pa ni bkra ma shis
123a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ de dag mthong na dgos pa 'am/ nor ram/ brtul zhugs sam/ mchod sbyin nam/ bkris kyang rung ste/ mi 'grub kyis grong khyer du slar bcung do// de nas bu mo dri med kyis kyi/
123a7(dkon brtsegs): pas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha'i de la tshigs bcad de smras pa/ 'di dag chags med mchog tu dag shes pa// skye ba'i mang po'i sdig pa 'jig par byed// 'di dag rnam par dag cing bden pa ni man
123a8(dkon brtsegs): dral la grol bar gyur cing mnyam par bzhag/ 'di dag nang gcis dam pa bsod nams zhing // 'jil yon tan phral mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di la yon phul 'bras bu 'chim
123b1(dkon brtsegs): byin nas sems can ngan 'gror 'grom 'gyur// tshul khrim dang ni dul bar ldan pa yin// 'dod las rga la cing sdig med re ba med// 'di dag sman pa mchog ste 'jig rten rgya// sdug bsam nan
123b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i srog chags thar bar byed// sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje// de'i sras 'di dag rdul med nyon mongs med// 'di dang byang chub sems dpa' gnan yang mang// zhes rab
123b3(dkon brtsegs): mis 'di dag ci ltar spong // 'di dag brdul zhugs spyad cing 'dod chags ni// bkra shis gyur cing mkhas pa sbyin char pa ba// 'di dag rnams la bkur sti rlung byas kyang // mi rnams
123b4(dkon brtsegs): chos dang de bzhin nor yang grub// 'di dag mtshan rnam yongs rdzogs dge shes ldan// 'di dag ning mchog rnam dag sems dang ldan// bram ze 'di la su nig dang byed pa// de ni bsad nam
123b5(dkon brtsegs): mang po skyed par 'gyur// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bu mo dri med kyis byin pa la tshigasu bcad de slar smras pa/ byis pa'i sems kyi dbang du ma bzhud cig/ mchod sbyin de 'dir dge slong
123b6(dkon brtsegs): ma gzig shig/ dur smrig gos can de bzhin mgo breg pa// dag don 'dod pas ni blta mi bgyi// ya ba dang yum yang dgyes par mi 'gyur zhing // bdag kyang mkhas pa rnams kyisra/
123b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ khyod kyang mchod sbyin 'grub par mi 'gyur gyis// de bas dge slong rnam ni shin tu spongs// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bram ze tshang ba'i lha de la tshigasu bcad
123b8(dkon brtsegs): de slar smras dpa// yon tan ldan pa 'di dag ma btog par// pha dang ma yang kho mo'i sku bra ma yin// gnyen gyi cho ga dang nor dang lang 'tsho min/ 'dig 'khor bar bying ba rnams kyi skabs/
124a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' bas lung btang zhing // de bzhin srog dang longs spyod rnams kyang btang // dkon mchog gsum nyid skyabs yin ma gtogs par// kho mo'i skyabs
124a2(dkon brtsegs): rten sems can 'din med// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'ang skad ces smras so// bu mo bcas nas khyod kyis sngon sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs// sngon chos kyang
124a3(dkon brtsegs): ma gsan/ sngon dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur yang mdzad na/ khyod ci'i slad du sangs rgyas la dad par gyur// bu mo dri med kyis byin pas smras pa// bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na/ tsan+da
124a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khang bzangs kyi nang na/ gser gyi khril bzhag pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu lnga brgya steng gi bar snang la 'dod pa kho mo mthong ste/ de dag rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ chos dang dge 'dun
124a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsngags pa brjod pa khoms zos so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gi nang nas gang gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba gcig po de la lha'i bu rnams kyis dris pa/ grogs po de bzhin sa
124a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ngom 'dra ba zhig/ de ni ji lngar shes par bya/ danas lha'i bu des kho ma'i bsam panas nas lha'i bu de dag kyang dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// de'i dbus drim
124a7(dkon brtsegs): snas ny-i mdzes// gzang lam g.yas sa 'tshal ba'i srung mangs// nam mngag pad+ma'adab ma brgyab ma// thags na mo ma khar mangs pa bzhis// da'i mdzad su la bams mangs
124a8(dkon brtsegs): smin mtshams par nas 'khyil cing shin tu mdzes// da yis 'khor rnams zil gyis gnon te 'dug/ rgyal ba'i zhal yang shin tu mdzes par byed// mi dbang spyan mdzes 'tham pa
124b1(dkon brtsegs): 2sems skabs mi chu tshams mnyam pags kyang babang // kha sngags casas kyang kyil 'bar 'bas// dedzin pa ma rnam par mangs// nga gsang na sa
124b2(dkon brtsegs): cig tu ba spangs shing po 'byed sdig pa med// skye bo dpag tu med pa dang mdzang cing // 'grol pan phyir rgyal ba gsungs yang sngags// da'i mthar ni drang dang mtshungs shing 'adz+ra/ da ma
124b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug gi sor mo ring // de'i phyag ni glang chen sna dang 'dra// zang yangs dri med lte ba gnod cing zab// rtag mchog lta bur 'joms kyi sra bcu ba// de bzhin spu'i thang bu gsar dab
124b4(dkon brtsegs): brla'i dbyibs ni glang po'i lag dang mtshungs// zhabs ni legs gnas byin pa in+ya'i 'dra// thub pa'i dbang po bden gsung rgyags pa'i skyon dang bral// ngan ltas bcom pa rnams kyi
124b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i lta ba 'jig/ 'khor gyi nang du dri ba bye ba dris byas kyang // 'khrug med skyon dang bral bas sems can kun 'jim mdzad// gya gyu med dang tshig gis lus ni tshim mdzad cing // mya nga
124b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa bang mchog yid 'ong yang dag ni/ skye ba kun gyi yid 'ang mya ngan 'das ston cing // mtha' gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang ston// de ni rang gis sangs rgyas gyurapa
124b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cid nal cing pha rol rnams kyang sgrol// 'gro ba'i skyo ba dang skyabs dang gre sko shing // 'jig rten kun la thugs brtse phan pa mdzad// snyan pa de'i yon tan 'di dag dang /
124b8(dkon brtsegs): gnams mtha' mas khams ngas brjod// bris nas lha rnams yid dga' dang gyur nas// rgyal pas ni dad pa'i yid kyang rnam nas bu ma tha med kyis phyin par chags sa
125a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag smras nas/ bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhalta bdun lo ga nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam pa 'di
125a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dag thos so// mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis gnon par ma gyur to// nam yang 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sem
125a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma byas so// mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang bal dga' ba 'am/ ma la dga' ba 'am
125a4(dkon brtsegs): mang po la dga' ba 'am/ spun la dga' ba 'am/ nye du la dga' ba 'am/ nor la dga' ba 'am/ rgyan la dga' ba 'am/ grogs la dga' ba 'am/ lus la dga' ba 'am/ srog
125a5(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba 'am/ grong khyer la dga' ba 'am/ skye mched la dga' ba 'am snyed kyi/ bram ze gzhan du na sangs rgyas nyid rnam par rjes su dran no// bram ze kho mos ni gsu
125a6(dkon brtsegs): sems la yod la bya ba yid la byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs gangan bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su ma bskor ba khams
125a7(dkon brtsegs): nam yang ying sa byas par mgyur// khams nyin mtshan gang du yang sangs rgyas pa mtha
125a8(dkon brtsegs): chol mdzang ba dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur to// zam pa khams na sangs rgyas la bas pa dang / chos lamacan pa dang / dge 'dun ma bstan bkur bya bas chog mams
125b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mam pa ma#// ma tha mam / sa ma
125b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rgyal ba dang bdun mal gsol to// bla ma drim med kyis byon pas kyang ji ltar zam ze tshangs pa'i lhas sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
125b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tusems babyung ba desar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brdad pa chos dang dag 'dun gyi bsngags pa brdad do// de nas bu ma dzam med kyis byin pa zhing rtalas babs nas bram popa/
125b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems dpa' dgra dang / nyan thos chen po de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas pa
125b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der logasu thal mo sbyar bas bdud de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di skad ces smras so// shA ri'i bu bud med ni sheras
125b6(dkon brtsegs): sor gnyis pa/ nyon mongs pa drag pa/ bag med pa mang ba/ dman pa la mos pa/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du mchi ba lags na/ bdag la thugs nye bar ba
125b7(dkon brtsegs): cirnaMs bdag sa su rung ba na dan dang / sman pa dang / bangade bar 'gyur ba'i sang du/ btsun pas de ltar bdag la chas lags par bstan du gsas gas pa'i rnas pa gsas
125b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis gtam byung ba 'ang dang bram ni'i chog zas nas myur ba'i tshul gyis phyogs der phyin te/ des can thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyag byas nas/ rang gis bra
126a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod na re kho nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis gnon par ma gyur to// nam yang dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed na
126a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes par ba/ de ltar khyod bde ba dang / yid bde ba la brtson nam/ 'on te 'di ltar yid byung ba'i tshig gis spras/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rang gi bu mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
126a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi gzugs byang lha'i bu mo mtshungs shing 'dra/ rgyan rnams kyis ni chos pa'i cha byad 'jim/ ji ltar khyod ni nam yang gnyid kyis ma gnon// ci phyir bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dra'i yid byung gyur/
126a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rgyal sring rgyas shing shin tu legs par 'byor/ ma ni rtag tu khyod kyi dbang du gyur pa yin// bu mo dga' ba de las ci 'dra gzhan yod na// de yis khyod kyi lus ni dga' ba rlung ma
126a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur// su gcing 'phangs la yid du 'ong ba ste// skye bo kun la dga' ba bskyed yin na// yon tan brgya phrag dums brgyan pa khyod// ci'i phyir ma khyim 'dir dga' ba med// bu mo khyod kyis
126a6(dkon brtsegs): m+b+ha nga/ ma nga na 'di gar yang mi dang // yongs su rnams shing yang byung sems sa gyul// khyeng kyi 'ang paci 'drang sa zlas// dngas tham rlom meng gis na
126a7(dkon brtsegs): ma pasasu N+Dal 'chimasas pa de smras pa// ya bcig grang sa dmigs da ma / chos pa skyor rnams thugs sa ma chung dang/ khang ba'i gas na ga
126a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs/ 'tsho ba'i 'jig na mi gnas 'jig rten 'jig pas// sbrul gzugs nang ni gnas pam tsham 'jam// gcing dang 'dad pa'i 'dud pa gas mchis/ khams 'di dgan sa
126b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam ldan ste// sad pa sems pa bang bgal mchis// ma mnga' tshogs kyis rab tu gargyas gyu tshang // dgan par byin ladasa' bag la mchis// kun nas canam sa
126b2(dkon brtsegs): mangs bskon// ji ltar bde tho brgyal po bka' stsal cig/ drag 'brangs pa la bde ba ga la mchis// gsang bar sgril dga' ba la mchis// g.yangs tshe 'dir sra nig yid rton bgyid
126b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten dadang mtshungs// blo ngan dag gis lus rnams bor ba ni// rir ba tsam gyi phung por gyur to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pas dpe ni bka' stsal na// 'dus byam sa
126b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la su yid rton// pha dang ma dang sdug dang ming po dang // bu dang rtsol gnyen tshogs 'gro ba kun// 'dus byas thams cad mo long gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'di 'dra'i mi sdug gang la su yi/
126b5(dkon brtsegs): rtom/ gang che bdag gis rang byung rgyal ba mthong // de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam sems kyang skye// byang chub sems dpa' bag med 'gyur ba ni// ya ba cig bdag gis ma mthong ma thos so//
126b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba lta 'tshal 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos// rgyal ba rgyal po'i sras po 'di dag mthong // ya ba tsag ji ltar 'dod pa bsnyen par
126b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i tshig thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur te// de nas bu mdza ma med kyis byin pas rang gi bcang mi smra bar gyur par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa na rje/
126b8(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod la nu ba zhus// thugs brtse bar dgongs te lan gdab du gsol// 'di ltar brdzun pa shA ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab
127a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags/ ci shes rab de 'dus byas lags sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas lags/ de gal te 'dus byas lags na de bzhin
127a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas 'dus byas thams cad ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// nas bka' stsal to// ji ste 'dus ma byas lags na 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la ma mchis pa de
127a3(dkon brtsegs): la ni 'brang ba ma mchis na/ 'phrad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyis/ ji ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab chen po zhes bgyi de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan
127a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bul 'di skad ces smras so// shA ri'i bu mos dris pa'i lan tho ba shig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mon 'dus byas mi 'dri'o// bums
127a5(dkon brtsegs): ni skye ba med pa dris te de ni lam gdab par mi nuso// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyi byin pas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa mo'u gal gyi bu
127a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags ma ci che dang ldan pa sems can du 'dzugs pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul snyan tam/ 'on te chas sul
127a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul som/ gas te sems can du 'dzugs pa la gnas kyi stonam/ sems can nemachis bste/ dalta bas nardzu 'phrul de yang sa mchis par 'gyur pa//
127a8(dkon brtsegs): su 'du shes pa la gnas sto ma chos nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o/ 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa dal ni rnam par rtag pa mchis ma/ rnam par martog pas rim che dang ldan
127b1(dkon brtsegs): tha drus 'thang ba gyu yangadang ldan pa ma rnams ca pa yang nga mi smra par gyur te// nganas byam sa ma'i tha gang pa mdang ldan pa lags kyi macan pa'i 'di ga pas rnam pa
127b2(dkon brtsegs): gas gyo thu chen po bums dris pa'i lan tho ba zhig/ mo'u gal gyi bus sbas pa/ bu mo ni 'gyur ba mi 'dre tha mas ni 'gyur ba med pa dris te/ 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par mi rtog parjing /
127b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa'i byangan pa yin pas dmi lan gdab par ma nus sa// de nas bram dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di sa tshe dang
127b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ba chi dang ldan pa dmig pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston tam/ 'on te dmigs pa ma mchis sdom gal te dadri
127b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcas pa'i chos sngon na ni khyod byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i slad du ste/ de lta bas na bcu
127b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi chos rnams dang ma bral ba lags// ci ste dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston na mi/ cho smra ba nyid dngos po ma mchis par 'gyur te mi 'thad /
127b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang ba yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// gang po bu mos dris pa'i lan tho ba shig/ tshe dang ldan
127b8(dkon brtsegs): pa gang pos smras pa/ bu mo ni kun rdzob mi 'dri'i/ bu mos ni don dam pa dris te/ de ni lan gangab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos
128a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun po 'od srung chen po rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par zhugs nas langs te/ gzhan dag la chos ston cing / gang dag lus pa
128a2(dkon brtsegs): gzar bu gang tsam gyi bsod snyoms yongs su blangs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ de ci btsun pas lus kyi sbyin pa spyod dam/ 'on te sems kyis sbyin pa spyos
128a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te lus kyis skyong ma lus ni bems po g.yo ba ma mchis pa byed pa ma mchis pa ste/ rtsang shing dang rtsig pa'i chos lta bu mig g.yor dang mtshungs pas des kyang skyong bar mi nus
128a4(dkon brtsegs): so/ ci ste sems kyis spyod na/ sems ni sgyu ma lta bu gnas ma mchis pa ste/ des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so// ji ste las dang sems kyi phyi rol gyis skyong ni ma mchis pa ste ma mchis pas
128a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar skyong bar bgyid/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan tho ba shig/
128a6(dkon brtsegs): grangs chen pos spras/ bu ma ni len pa ma 'dra'i/ bu mos ni len pa med pa dzes shing yang dag pa'i 'dra bas/ don lan gdab par mi nus so// da nas bu mo drim med kyis byin pas gnas
128a7(dkon brtsegs): gan rab 'byor la 'di sad daces smras so// 'ad sar btsun pa rab 'byung na bcom ldan 'das kyis nyamamangs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags ma/ ngartson mangs pa
128a8(dkon brtsegs): bdangs pas rab tu bye ba lags sam/ 'on ta chos nyid kyis rab tu bye ba lags/ gal te dngas pos rab tu bye ba lags na ni 'dus byas su 'gyur ro// dza sa chos nyid kyis rab tu bye bas
128b1(dkon brtsegs): skyabs mnas pa man da dang gas pam mtsham pa'imatsham pa// sgra byam mtshas pa dnga' gsapas mtsham pa mtshan cad kyang lags par namanyam bcing
128b2(dkon brtsegs): btsang gang lags pa ngan bzhin cing nga// de banan cid gang lags par ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags deni tha stang ma mchis pa'o// tha skang ma mchis
128b3(dkon brtsegs): ba gang sags pa dan bsam thos mi khyab pal// bsam gyis ma khyab pa gang lags pa ni bstan tum mchis pa'o// bsun dum mchis pa gang lags pa ni dngas pa ma mamamam
128b4(dkon brtsegs): dngas tham mchis pa gang lags pa ni ma byung ba'o// ma byung ba gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa rnams ma ston te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas ci dang ldan pa
128b5(dkon brtsegs): nam grus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di sad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bu mos dris pa'i lan tho ba shig/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa// 'di la brjod pa ci yang med// cang mi smra ba pa/
128b6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob byed// spros pa med pa'i chos 'di dag/ bu mo yongs su 'dri bar byed// ji srid dngos po skye yod pa// de srid skyon gyis gos par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings ni tha snyad med// 'di ni nyon mongs med
128b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan pa rnams kyi mchog du bstan pa la/
128b8(dkon brtsegs): ma ci sems la gnas ta bsam gtan mngang dam// 'on te sems ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mngang// gal te sems la gnas te bsam gtan mngangam// sams ni sa
129a1(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis shing sgyu ma lta bu ste// yang dag par ma yin pa kun brtags pa lags pa lags na// ci yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa ma mchis/
129a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam/ ci ste sems ma mchis pa nas te// bsam gtan mdzad na ni// rtswa dang shing dang / rtsig pa dang / rdo la sogs pa byung ba dang / zhen pa de dag
129a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin tu 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni sems ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// tshe dang ldan pa nam gru yang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan
129a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nam gru bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ nam grus smras pa/ bu mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
129a5(dkon brtsegs): yul yongs su 'dri ste// de ni nyan thos rnams kyis bstan par mi nus so// bu mos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang gzhan
129a6(dkon brtsegs): 2/ nyan thos rnams kyi yang gzhan 'gags sam// gal te chos kyi dbyings gzhan lags na ni// tha dad du ni 'gyur ro// de bzhin ni gnyis sa ma mchis te// de bas na de ba
129a7(dkon brtsegs): dang gnyis ni b+he brag ma mchis ma// ci'i srad du tshe dang ldan pa nam gru de skad du gsang // nam gru yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bram drim med gyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa
129a8(dkon brtsegs): pa gas pa sa
129b1(dkon brtsegs): sa pa par // ngag sa pamam #
129b2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gags pa yang cang mi smra bar 'gyur to// da nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di sa ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa bu mam
129b3(dkon brtsegs): dris pa'i yan tho bshig/ tshedang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/ bums na shes rab kun tu 'joms pa dris pas// de ni lan gtab par mnus sa// de nas bu mo dri ma meng kyi byin
129b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags sa// ji skang du na
129b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid de don du blta 'am// 'o na de'i tshig 'brur blta// gal te don ni brjod du ma mchis shing bsnyad du ma mchis pa ste// de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi bam lags pa
129b6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste rnam pa de lta bu gang legs pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o// nga sa tshig 'brur ldan ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dang rten pa yin na
129b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru rton pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pas de bas na// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mang du zos pa nyid ni rton pa mang lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang cang mi sna
129b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bu mos dris pa'i la
129b9(dkon brtsegs): thob shig/ kun dga' bos smras pa// bu mo ni yi ge dang bral ba ste// de ni sbas tshig par byed mi nus so// bu mo ni sems dang bral ba'i
130a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid 'dri ste/ slob pa rnams kyis ma yin na ji ltar bstan par bya ste/ chos kyi mnga' bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu dgos pa'o//
130a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas du mo dri ma med kyis byin pas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pas zab mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
130a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas khyod zas pa'am/ 'o na de ngo bo nyid zab pas zab gal te rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas
130a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod zab na ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i chos gang yang mchis so de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni song ba lags/ 'ong ba ma lag
130a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni mig gi rnam par shes par bgyir ma lags pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags shing gnyis su ma
130a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis la kun tu 'byung ba ma mchi ba'i slang du'o// ji sa ngo ba nyid zab pa'i za ba na ni// ngo bo nying gang yang sus kyang brtag par mi nus so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bram
130a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' theb pas kho zang po// bu mo dri ma med kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma legs te/ de'i slad du rnam par shes pas 'chal/
130a8(dkon brtsegs): bam lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs su med pa'i chog bla dgas so// bu mo drim maud kyis byin pas smras pa/
130b1(dkon brtsegs): 'a ma dpal dmigs su ma mchis pa ni gang gis tshig bla dgas kyang ma lags te/ dmigs su ma mtshas pano chog blang gas las yang dag par 'das pa ma lags so// 2
130b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ dra mo 'di ji ltar gzhan dag la bstan par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub ni bstan pa las yang dag par 'das pa
130b3(dkon brtsegs): legs te/ brjod pas bstan pa mi nus sa// 'jam dpal yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bra madri ma med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dan yod la 'di skad ces smra
130b4(dkon brtsegs): so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa'am/ bud mod ngamakhye'u 'am bu mo gang dag kho bo'i mig laman snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi de bzhin gzhe /
130b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam bya'o// zhes gsungs pa de ci de bzhin gshegs pa zugs kyi skur mthong bar mthong bar mdzad dam// 'on
130b6(dkon brtsegs): de chos kyi skur mthong ba mdzad// gal te gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na// de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma lags te// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di skad du// gang dag la
130b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs su mthong // gang dgang la sgrar shes pa// 'dod pa 'dod chags ldan pa ste// skye bo de dgang mi mthong // zhes gsungs so// ji ste de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
130b8(dkon brtsegs): srur mthong bar mdzad na/ chos kyi sku ni bstan du mi nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni mig gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag
131a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'das pa ste/ blta bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o// mthong ba don yod kyang cang smra bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po che rtog gis smras
131a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rtog gis smras pa/ mthong ba don yod du mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo ni dngos po med pa 'a
131a3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de ni bstan par mi nus so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ bdag ni dngos po ma mchis pa mi 'dri'o bstan pa spobs la de nas ston cig/ mthong ba don yod
131a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang grong
131a5(dkon brtsegs): khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pade/ ci zang zing dang
131a6(dkon brtsegs): bcas pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad dam/ 'on te zang tshang ma mchis pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad/ gal te drang zing dang bcas bos pan 'dogs na ni/ byis pas sa sa skye za
131a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'dogs pa dang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du rten/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dgu 'ang ni zang rdzing dang bcas pa'i slad du'o// ji sa zang
131a8(dkon brtsegs): ri mamachis pas na 'dogs pa mdzadan/ zang cing ma mchis pa ni bsgrub dum mtshos pa lags so// rin po che chog kyang cang mi spang byung // de nas du mtshan med/
131b1(dkon brtsegs): man pas byung chu bsams dpa' nas spong la 'di skad ces smrasas// rigs kyi du khyod kyis 'di sad dugang gis zong khyer 'dzin sems can rnams kyi las nas myong ba
131b2(dkon brtsegs): lha med parang za thaM sa na rgyang du rung bar 'gyur brnam pa la bu'i bsam pa khe mas pas maper bya'o nas gsungs pa de bzhin gzhags pas las ni sa
131b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis ma khyad pa nyid du bstan te/ de ni khyod kyis kyis bsam par mi spyad do// gal te spyod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ji ste bsam par ma
131b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod na mo mkhyen bzhin du mang por 'byung ba'i las che 'di la yang ning tshung ngu myong bar ri ltar mdzod de/ bdag po ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la bdag po rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal
131b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar ma dzadang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ngan song spong gis smras pa/ kho bo ni smon lam gyi dbang gisam du myong bar 'gyur ba'i las nyung ngu myong bar
131b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar byed do// bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur du mi nus lags so// gal te nus par gyur na sems can thams cad
131b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'da'a'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri re'i dgongs pa de smon lam gyi dbang gis ji ltar mi 'grub ste/ rnam grangs 'di'i ni smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur mi nus par
131b8(dkon brtsegs): rig par bgyi'o// ngan sa srong yang car mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu madri mi med kyi byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so//
132a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye ro'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam
132a2(dkon brtsegs): nga kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de nyi ting nge 'dzin de bdag pa rag las pa lags sa maM/ 'on te gnan la ga las pa lags// gal te bdag la rag las pa lags na/
132a3(dkon brtsegs): ni/ mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags te/ ji ltar khyod sdom par zhugs pas gzhan gang gi sgrib pa rnams rab tu ni bar mdzad/ ji ste gnan la rag las pa legs na ni/ ting nge 'dzin de
132a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi ma lags so// gang khyod kyi ma lags pa des ni gnan la mdzad par mi spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ bre mo kho ba'i sbyor ba
132a5(dkon brtsegs): 'don byams pa sngon du 'groba'o// bu ma drim med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang byams pa laM gnas pa lags na/ sangs
132a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ni rnams na sems na dag la skyed pa rnams kyis gnong pa meng ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' ste pa rnams sna rnam pangs la ba sa nga mis pa byung // denas
132a7(dkon brtsegs): drim gyi me kyis byin pas byang chubasams dpa spyan sa gzigs dpang byug pa 'di skad ces smos so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du cinas kyang / thong khyer na sems
132a8(dkon brtsegs): can par dag cings pa dang / bas par sgo rang dag tha pa dang / 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pathod par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa tha zas pa
132b1(dkon brtsegs): pa na nas gsungs pan/ rgya kyi sbyong ba 'dil na pa dang babs pa lags sam/ chan te yin pa mamachis pa lags/ gas stor ba na pa dang
132b2(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang len pa dang bcas pa lags te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de ltungs na de yang mi rigs so// ji ste sbyor ba de lan
132b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa lags na ni/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags te/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni nye bar bsgrub pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ris gzigs
132b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// sbyar
132b5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs dbang phyug dra mas dris pa'i lan thob shig/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo ni skye ba de 'gag pa mi 'dri s+t+wa~M/ de ni lan
132b6(dkon brtsegs): gudab par mi nus so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni dri ba ma mchis sa
132b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo gang na skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa de ni yi ge 'jug 'dug pa med de/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jug
132b8(dkon brtsegs): nga ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni mkhas pa dag yi ge dang 'jug pa mi ston te/ yi ge rnams la mi chags so// chags ma mchis pa ni chos
133a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings te/ de la ni rtogs par gyi ba'i slad du chags pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang ma
133a2(dkon brtsegs): smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ gang gi
133a3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun tshigs su bcad pa 'di dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ba rnam
133a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de khyod kyi spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pa gang lags pa de ci rnam par rtogs pas bskyed pa lags sam/ 'on de rgyum
133a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa las byung ba lags/ gal te rnam par bskyed pa lags na ni/ 'dus byas thams cad kyang rnam par rtog bskyed pa lags te/ de lta bas na rnam par rtog pa ni nga
133a6(dkon brtsegs): ni bar mi 'gyur ro// ji ste rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba legs nani/ ma byung ba la sgo 'dogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' stongs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/
133a7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo sems can gang dag kha bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad spobs pa thob par gyur cig byas pa'i kho bo'i smon lam 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas brdung
133a8(dkon brtsegs): ste btab po// bu mo dri ma mod kyi byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems bskyed pa gang gis smon lam btab pas sems skyed pa de mchis sam/ 'on te ma mchis/
133b1(dkon brtsegs): bal mchis nan pa pa lta pa lagasas// dzas mamatshas na chud par lta pa lagasate/ degasu nam byung kyi bsung ba log pa lags sa// rgya chung sems
133b2(dkon brtsegs): pa brtsegs kyang chung mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu madri med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa'agom pa 'dor ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi du
133b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can pang dag ba ze'i mige lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byo \u0f7f/
133b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ ci byang chub de mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi'am/ 'on ma mchis pa
133b5(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bgyi/ gal te mchis na ni rtag pa ste/ yod pa'i mtha' 'dzin pa lags so// ji ste ma mchis na ni chad pa ste med pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so// byang chub
133b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/
133b7(dkon brtsegs): ci ye shes de skye bas rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on te zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags/ gal te skye bas rab tu phye ba la gas na ni/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa
133b8(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba 'dus byas su 'gyur te/ shes pa de ni byis pa rnams kyi lags so// ji ste zhi pa'i rab tu phye ba las na ni de la dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang la dmigs pa
134a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa de la 'dun sa sa 'a gyur ro// ni ba'am/ nyan thosas na'am/ rang sangs rgyas sa nas ma/ byang chub sems dpa' nas 'a
134a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas so nas rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni byang chub la rnam par rtog ste/
134a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams ni mi rtog pa'i slad du'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'gom pa 'dor bdon yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis byang chub
134a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dga' 'di skad ces smras so// bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du 'jug par mi bya'i slar 'dong ngo // de ci'i phyir ne na deng du mo dri ma med kyis byin pa las chos
134a5(dkon brtsegs): thos pa gang yin pa 'di ni mkhas pas zas yin pas chog par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ chos kyi zas bza' bar bya'o// de nas bu madro ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan
134a6(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor ba 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rang 'byor bar ni gdag pa med pa dang / gnag pa med pa la khyod kyis can ga rgyal bar sems/ bdun pa
134a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor sbyong gi tshul ni spros pa mamachis pa lcags kyi/ smos pa la dga' ba ni ma lags so// bdun par bya 'byeng dge sbyong po chos ni gnas pa ma ches po/ na
134a8(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyi ba ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul na mo'i khrugs pa lags so// 'phags pa dkor mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo/
134b1(dkon brtsegs): steHma'o
134b2(dkon brtsegs): bam ma pa/ de nas nyan rdzas chen po brgyung ba dag / byung chubs sa dpa' brgyang 'o da/ tham
134b3(dkon brtsegs): tsam po de dag dang / bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / de las gnan pa skye bo phal po ni rnams bcom ldan 'das gal de deng ste phyin nas/
134b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bu mo dri ma mid kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das la lan
134b5(dkon brtsegs): stong bskor ba byas te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgros nas bu mo g.yas pa'i lha ri sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
134b6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis nu ba nus pa/ ting 'dzin stobs ldan grags pa mtha' yos mnga'// 'jig rten mgon po bdud rtsi dga' stsol ba// mtshungs med
134b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes radi gshegs khyod la na// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar spyad pa spyod// ji ltar shing dbang drung mchis bdud rnams 'jom// ji ltar ri bcasas rnams gam
134b8(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid// grags pa mtha' yas ji ltar 'od zer gtong // byang chub spyod tshul legs par bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas nor gyi gzungs ni ji ltar 'thob/
134b9(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin ni dadam pa ji ltar sgom// mi yis rdzu 'phrul stobs ni ji ltar 'gro ba// sems can rin chen rnams kyi spyod pa gsungs// gang gis dran dang rtogs dang blo gros
135a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ spobs pa mdzes dang ldan par gang gang gis 'gyur// gang dang rab tu ldan na 'khor du// skrun cing shin tu mdzes pa smra bar bgyid//
135a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mi ni che rabs dran par// dri ma mad mchis lnga'i mig kyang thob// lha rna 'thob cing pha rol sems tshul rig/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni zhing rnams brgyar yang mchi//
135a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar sbyin pa gtong la brtson par 'gyur// rtag tu tshul khrims dag cing bzod la dga'// ji ltar brtson 'grus bsam gtan mkhas par 'gyur// shes rab la yang ji ltar shin tu
135a4(dkon brtsegs): brtson// mngal gyi gnas ni ji ltar rnam spangs nas// pad+ma las ni rtag tu rdzus te ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar mchis par bgyid// bdag med stong pa nyid kyi sgra lang
135a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod// ji ltar de'i dga' dang mi dga' mtshungs// sred pa spangs shing tha ba nas sdang spong // mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems ma mchis// sems brtan g.yo ba ma mchis
135a6(dkon brtsegs): ri ring margyas// nid dang marnyed grags mngam grags dang // bstod dang sbrang dang bdi dang sdug bsngal dang // ji ltar 'jog rten chos rten chos rnams tshal gnan nas// 'jig rte
135a7(dkon brtsegs): kun+da d+ha ro lta bur spyod// ngar ma mchis rgyal 'chos g.yom mchis// ji sar rngul rgya'i rgyags pa spong // ni dang rab tu ni dang ni gnas brtson// rdo ldan ji ltar ya nas ma/
135a8(dkon brtsegs): chu gyur/ rmyi mdum mang sa dag 'amachis// nges rabs mdza'amal mngon pa dga'/ rtag tu byangang ma tshungs shing tha ba dang // jis rgyas kyi ladag ni mas/
135b1(dkon brtsegs): rlung margyas kyings rba d+hA dang mchus// mkhas pa dzi nar medang 'dra bar 'gyur// rtag cu ci yang ma mchis mdzag lags/ mnyam pa nyid ya gA 'amanam
135b2(dkon brtsegs): rdo lja rtag tu chos ni spang mi bgyid// bdag 'dor bgyid kyi chos mchog yongs mi gtong // 'jig rten dag tu ston pa'i sems bskyed nas// dzA ltar gnas byung ru /
135b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// ning gi bkod pa ji ltar gnas par 'gyur// dge 'dun dag par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar dus gsum du yong chos thos shing // ji ltar tshe rings
135b4(dkon brtsegs): can bde bar 'gyur// rtag du sred pa 'gog pa'i pha rol son// dgra bcom 'dru bar bden pa ni ji ltar mthong // sems can brgya dag byang chub 'jog bgyid par// spyod cing rna
135b5(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' mos ji ltar 'gyur// gang gis shin tu mdzes par 'gyur// rdzus te skyo bar gang gis 'gyur// longs spyod che dang shes rab che// kun mkhyen rtogs par khong du chud /
135b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu 'thob// bsod nams kun la mkhas pa lags// spobs pa gang gis skye bar 'gyur// zhing ni ji ltar dag
135b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lags// dge slong dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// gang tu de'i smon btang ba// der ni ji ltar skye bar 'gyur// tshe rabs dran par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar sangs rgyas
135b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam dang mjal// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur lags// rnam par 'dren pa ji ltar na// mdog dang gzi brjid snyan grags 'thob// stong
136a1(dkon brtsegs): dang mthu dang brtson 'grus rnams// ji ltar thab par mi 'gyur lags// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos dang yang // dge 'dun la ni skyabs su mchis//
136a2(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog ni gtong bgyid kyi// de dag chos ni 'dod mi bgyid// byang chub spyad pa spyod bgyid cing // the tsom ma mtshos ji ltar 'gyur// 'gyod pa thams cad spangs nas
136a3(dkon brtsegs): su/ srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston// khyod la mi mkhyen cang mi mnga'/ thub chen khyod ni thams cad mkhyen// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang lags/
136a4(dkon brtsegs): go rims bzhin du bstan tu gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo dri med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo legs so
136a5(dkon brtsegs): legs so// du mod bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu dri dar sems pa ni khyod yang legs so// bu mdo'i phyir legs par rab tu non la yid la brdung shig dang bsha
136a6(dkon brtsegs): ro// bu ma dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das legs so nas gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// du mo byang chub sems dpa'as
136a7(dkon brtsegs): bci ldan pa 'dul bar byed/ banig shir/ gzhan gyi dang pas phrag dog zang dang / gyig yongs su su dang / skye ba me bdag pa
136a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i byams pa sgom paste/ bu mo d+ha chub sems dpa' chos bani po de dag dang ldanan bdud 'dul byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phrag /
136b1(dkon brtsegs): ma d+ya pra ma s+tha tsa bya// skye bo mang po dge ba rnams la sbyar/ phyogs bcu rnams su byams pa bsgom byas na// bdud 'dir brgyal nas byang chub reg par 'gyur// dra mo d+ha
136b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung sems dpa' tshas pani dang ldanan/ sangs rgyas kyi ning mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed de/ ba ni gang ne na/ ji skad sta pa de bzhin pa dang / chos zab mol mos pad
136b3(dkon brtsegs): yi dmal brtan pa dang / skye bo mang po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos pa me dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi ning mtha' yas
136b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag g.yo bar byed de/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji snyed smras pa de bzhin byed/ mkhas pab mo'i chos la zod// yid ma yang shin tu brtan// dkar po'i chos la 'dzud
136b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed// rdzogs pa'i byang chub du med la// skye bo mang po dga' bar byed// de ltar chos bani de dag gis// zhing rnams bya ba g.yo bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'
136b6(dkon brtsegs): chos pa ni dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od gzer dag gtong ste/ mar me sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems
136b7(dkon brtsegs): can pag med par gyur cing mi khom par gyur pa rnams kyi gan du song ste chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la rin po che'i dra ba 'gengs pa ste/ bu mo byang
136b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bani po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste mar me byin pas 'od ni rnam par
137a1(dkon brtsegs): dag/ zad pa'i dus chos yongs su 'dzin// bag med gyur pa rnams la chos sbyor byed// mchod rten dag la rin chen 'dra ba 'bul//
137a2(dkon brtsegs): des na bye ba bsam yas ning 'gro ning // byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong bar byed// reg nas sems can bde dang ldan par 'gyur// mkhas pa bla med byang chub
137a3(dkon brtsegs): don tu gter// du mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na/ gzungs 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyan sna tshogs gtsang ni dag pa sbyin pa dang / du ma
137a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te 'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ma
137a5(dkon brtsegs): du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ gzungs 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sna tshogs byin pas gzungs ni thob
137a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// slong ba rnams le du mo bar+d+han de sbyin// rgyun ma rgya par sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod// rdul ba'i ye shes don tu zhes rab bsgom// ces ban
137a7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis ni gzungs thob 'gyur// bskal po brgyar nga thos pa chud mingache// phyogs bcur de be nin gshegs pa gang 'chad po// de dag thams cad dran pa'i sto
137a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dzig// drim byang chu sems dpa' rjes pang ldan nga 'dzin rdzob pa/ rngon gang nan/ 'a' bal pa yang byung ba mang ba dang / gcig pur ku tu sa/
137b1(dkon brtsegs): sa pa / btsun grus parnams pad/ sa kyi ma ma na ngas sum pa tsun pa / dran d+han sas pa sa shA
137b2(dkon brtsegs): ldanan ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ srid pa'i 'gro kun la yid kyang byung // bse rul bu gcig pu spyod la dga'// rtag tu shi tu
137b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras brnams pa yin// de'i las rtag tu shin tu mthar yang byun// rtog tu chos pani dag la zhugs nas su// byang chu ba spyod pa ni bsgyur tsa byung /
137b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin la gor 'thob// rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul byang chub rtogs// bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bani dang ljin na rdzu 'phrul 'tho
137b5(dkon brtsegs): bani gang zhe na/ lus yang ba dang / sems yang bdang / chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / khams bzhi nam mkha' dang mnyam po nad du byin gyis
137b6(dkon brtsegs): rlob pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lus yang bdang de bzhin sems kyang yang /
137b7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la gnas pa med pa nyid// nam mkha' khams dang mtshungs shing 'dra nyid du/ khams bzhi po dag byin gyis rlob par byed// chos pani 'di dag
137b8(dkon brtsegs): nges par brten byas na// blo ldan de'i yis rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas 'thob// skad cig gcig la zhing rnams stong du'o// sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyang ma
138a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bani dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur te/ bani gang ne na/ khro ba med de rtsod pa dang / thab pa dang / zhe sdang dang bral/
138a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten phyag rten phyag par mngon par dga' ba dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams shing chur shog/ legs par 'ongs so nas rtag tu smra ba dang /
138a3(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba rnams la khro gnyer dang bral zhing zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
138a4(dkon brtsegs): ces byaste// gzhan la khro dang khon du 'dzin mi byed// nga rgyal rgyags dang tha ba zhe sdang bral// rtsod pa med la dga' zhing snyan par smra// gus par rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyag/
138a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed// de ni tshul khrims rnams gartag tu srung // do rtag tu legs par 'ongs shes smra// chos sgra rnams la de ni thob med// de'i sems ni rdo rjer
138a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs// drung mi byang chub sems dpa' chos don dang ldan na rdzas ti skye bar 'gyur te/ ba ni gang na na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i steng na bcu
138a7(dkon brtsegs): pa byed du 'jug cing me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la
138a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'thor ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po meng zhing mang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshul can dang / gzhan dag gi sbyar mo 'dzin pa dang / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cadasan
138b1(dkon brtsegs): can mas ca sa phan pa dang / 'dra bar bya bab phyir sangs rgyas kyi byung chu tu yongs su bsngo bar byed ba ste/ dum/ byang chung sems dang tshas ngan par ga
138b2(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas sku gzugs pad+ma'i mchog bzhugs byed du 'jug/ rgyu skyes me tog la gapa bkang sna 'bral bar byed/
138b3(dkon brtsegs): dgol dga' bskyed pa'i tshig kyang ste/ dga' byed la mngon par btsun gyi spyan mi 'dzin// sems kyin kun la phan phyir bsod nams yongs su bsngo// dru mchog rnams
138b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa shes// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i yon zho 'di ba ni bsten na te/ rgyal ba mchog rnams drung du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur// du mo byang chub sems dpa
138b5(dkon brtsegs): chos pa ni dang ldan na longs spyod chen por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ brnyes pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can dang / chags pa med par dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang / mos pa
138b6(dkon brtsegs): mang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
138b7(dkon brtsegs): nges pa brnyas pa med par sbyin par byed/ de ni dngos po kun la rtag du 'dzin pa med// rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog la mos pa bskyod byas na// de ni phyir ning longs spyod chen po thob par
138b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// dang dang ldan par 'gyur ning g.yo med sgyu yang med// pha rol dag gi skyon ni 'dzin par yong mi byed// lhag pa'i bsam pas gang gi lte badrang gyur pa// des na de
139a1(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod bzang po rnams dang ldan/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan shes rab chen por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos
139a2(dkon brtsegs): la ser sna mi byed pa dang / mi mthun par mi 'jug pas 'gyod pa gsol ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdams ngag sdod pa dang / stong pa
139a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid bsgom pa la mang du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa rnam
139a4(dkon brtsegs): yang ser sna yod mi byed// mi mthun 'jug pa med pas 'gyod pa sel// yang dag rab ldan gdams ngag ston par byed// rgyal ba'i spyod pa gang yin stong nyid bsgom/
139a5(dkon brtsegs): chos pa ni 'di dag nges par sten byas na// rgyal bas bzhed pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob// sangs rgyas rjes su bstan la bslabs byas nas// rkang gnyis dam pa sangs
139a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas de 'gyur ro// bra mo byang chub sems dpa' chos pani dang ljon ni che rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bzhig shen/ lung 'ong ba dang / kha ton la brtson pa rnams lu
139a7(dkon brtsegs): mnos pa dang / gdams rig brjed nas yun ring du lan te gsol ba 'debs pa la lung 'jog cing dra bar byed pa dang / 'di ltar kun dga' ba'i tshig gis gan
139a8(dkon brtsegs): dgal pa ldang ba dang/ se so 'i mug jisamams ngas par drung bdang rtsa mas 'das pa'i ma tho bar bye phyir gnan dasamachim ma
139b1(dkon brtsegs): su bsgru zhan tu na bya ma ma ma khas pas/ bum byeng chub mams sa tsham nas byu smra smras
139b2(dkon brtsegs): dela'adi skad ces bya ste/ lung ma nas laton brjed 'dran par byed// gnan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang stogs// skyo ba med par chos kyang brjod par byed
139b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa sgom pa'i mtshan ma lags par 'dren// rgyas pa ni 'di dag nges par sten byas na// thub chen ldan pa che rabs dran par 'gyur // bskas pa skyong rdzog pas ma
139b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran// rnam par 'dren pa'i bdag nyid myur du thob// du mo byang chub sems dpa' chos pa ni dang ldanan// sangs rgyas rnams dang 'brang ba 'byo ba ste/ bzhin
139b5(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos mi spong bri dang / srog gi byor yang sdig pa'i grogs pa rnams dang mi snyan pa dang / srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos la sbrar ba mi
139b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting 'dzin sgom pa ste/ bumo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas rnams dang 'phrang bar 'gyur ro//
139b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub gya tsam spong mi byed// chos smra ba la skur pa yong mi 'debs// nges pa sdig pa'i grogs rnams rnam par spong // g.yel
139b8(dkon brtsegs): med par rtag tu sangs rgyas dran/ chos bani po 'di nges par bsten byas na// bde gshegs rnams dang 'phrad pa des 'thob bo// bla med byang chub ma thobs par du yang
140a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa ga la zhugs pa der de skye// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ skyes chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag thob ste/
140a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rin po che sbar gyis 'tho ba dang / 'bru mar dri zhim po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
140a3(dkon brtsegs): rten 'khru bar byed pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / sil skan sna tshogs 'dul ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 'khor gyis mkhan po dang slob dpon la bsnyen bkur bya bas
140a4(dkon brtsegs): rim gro byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag thob po// 'di la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mchod
140a5(dkon brtsegs): rten la ni sbyar gyis dbyig rnams 'thor/ dri ni ma 'bru mar rnams kyis mchod rten la d+d+ha// me tog spos dang sil snyan sna tshogs 'dral// yid du 'ong bas mkhan pa
140a6(dkon brtsegs): slab dpon snyan// de'i lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// rab tu mdzes shing yon dan kun dang ldan/ gang gis shes rab mchog ldan rgyu la mdzes pa/
140a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis skye mched mtshan tu 'gyur// bu mo byang chubasems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na dpe byang bzung po brgyad cu po dag thong ste/ bani ga zhin/ stan rgya sna tshogs
140a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sa rgya'i bul ba dang // gzhan la bsti stang byed pas mi skyo ba dang // chos sba bel 'brab mo mnol pa // sems ca na rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'ju/
140b1(dkon brtsegs): ba bu mo byang chub sems dpa' tshas bani po de dag dang ldan na// dpe' byang bzung po ban cu po dag 'thod bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stan rgya sna tshogs
140b2(dkon brtsegs): ni sa 'drub ba/ gzhanas bsti sdang byed pas sna med// rjem sna loH ma mtshamal// sems can rnams ni byung chu ba 'dzin du 'dza /
140b3(dkon brtsegs): lus la dper byad bzang po rnams// 'di ni de mi sbed par dga' ba med// yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bskyon byas na// byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin durtun par 'gyur
140b4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' tshis bzhi dang ldan na stobs pa 'thob ste/ bani gang zhe na/ byang chub dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa dang // nyin mtshan du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi
140b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs kha ton byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'jig rten thams cad mi mthun pa skye ba med cing 'gag pa med par nges pa la mchog tu dga' ba
140b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas 'dzin pa dang / lus dang srog dang yo byad rnams la mi lta ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ spobs pa 'thong bo/
140b7(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni// nyin mtshan rab tu 'don par byed// 'jig rten kun dang mi mthun pa// skye ba med par tu sgrogs/
140b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba rnyed gyur nas/ mchog tu dga' ba rnyed gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin par byed// lus dang srog la mi lta bar// de ni byang chub lta bar byed/
141a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag bsten byas na// de'i spobs pa 'phel bar 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// sna tshogs 'phreng
141a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das tshim par byed// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs su dag pa 'thob pa ste/ ba ni gang zhe na/ phrag dog med pa dang /
141a3(dkon brtsegs): sir sna med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / 'khor dang 'dre ba med pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bani pa de dag dang ldan na sangs rgya
141a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi ning yongs su dag pa 'thob ngo bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi rnye la nam yang phrag dog med// mthong nas dpa' bar gyur te ser sna med// sems can kun la
141a5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang snrums 'khor dang 'dre ba 'di ni yong myong byed/ chos pani 'dis ni nong gi bkod 'thor cing // myur du byang chub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur// bum byang chub sam
141a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan dge 'dun phun sumatshogs pa 'thong ste/ ba ni gang nen/ gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byong pa nga / mi mthun pa rnams kyi snrums byed pa dang / lus
141a7(dkon brtsegs): nod pa dang / kha'i drung du 'jug pas pan 'dzegs pa dang / bra 'a tshig yongs su snangang ste/ bu ma byang chub sems dpa' ches ngan pa de dag dang ldan na dge na
141a8(dkon brtsegs): tshas / del dis sa byaste/ gam tshal ba na ma yang yangs byang / myi mamadun das 'dum par byed/ srin pa pa
141b1(dkon brtsegs): la yang dga' jung// pha rol dag la dbyen gyi tshig mi smra// chos pa ni 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// dge 'dun rgya che rnam dag thob par 'gyur// dge bas dge 'dun
141b2(dkon brtsegs): par sbyang ba'i phyir// mkhas pas rjes 'di rtag tu brten par bya// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tu sems bskyed pa ra
141b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gang zhe na/ gzhan dag gi shes kyi khye dang // rnyed pa la phrag dog mi skyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su dag pa yongs su tshul po
141b4(dkon brtsegs): da d+ha chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed de/ rgyun sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bsti snar byed pa dang / nas kyi che
141b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir tshul tshis pa med pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye'o// de la 'di skad ces
141b6(dkon brtsegs): byaste/ gzhan la mtshad pa mthong na phrag dog med// phal phyin pa dag yongs su tshol// byang chub sems dpa'i ston par rtag tu sems// shes khe bde ba'i ngan
141b7(dkon brtsegs): du rgyal 'chos med// yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten byas na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de 'phrang 'gyur// zhing gang dag tu smon lam btab byas pa/
141b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa bzhin du ning der skye bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ga la bder bcom
142a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bdags pa 'di dag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas par ma bgyis na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
142a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag thams bslus par gyur cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
142a3(dkon brtsegs): chen pos/ budri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod 'di skad smra ba ni ngo mtshar de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i
142a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod par sbyang par dka' bar mi shes sam/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa'i gnas brtan mothu 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa
142a5(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bdag dang bden pa'i tshig gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa bzhin du/ de bzhin
142a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdags pa'i chos 'di dag kyang yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur
142a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des stong gsum gyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos par gyur cig/ sems can gang la yang
142a8(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa med par gyur cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bdags pa'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs de gnas par
142b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur nan/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tsho ga des lha'i me tog gi char mngon par bab par gyur cig/ mang krol bar sil snyan bye ba zug khrig brgya song sgyu 'byin par gyur/
142b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang bud med kyi lus 'gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus su red cing lo bcu drug lon pa 'dra bar gyur cig/ smon lam de skad btab cing bden pa'i byin gyi rlobs 'di byas
