142b3(dkon brtsegs): mthag tu/ de nas de'i mdo la stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yas/ mdakrol ba'i sel sran bye ba khrag khrig brgya sno
142b4(dkon brtsegs): gi sgra yang byung / lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab po// bu mo dri ma med kyis dra ni bud med kyi lus mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas lo bcu
142b5(dkon brtsegs): drug lon po tsam gyi gnon 'dra bar snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bya
142b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngo mtshar chi ba legs so// bcom ldan 'das dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub
142b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di'i bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi rgyu 'di dag so sor yongs su rdzogs pas/ bu mo dri ma med
142b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa 'di ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di ltar mthu che ba legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma
143a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gal gyi du de re n+do// ji skad smras pa bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin no// dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub
143a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang sbyin gnas yin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /
143a3(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid do// gang gi tshe 'dzum
143a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad pa de'i che/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od gzir kha dog du ma sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang /
143a5(dkon brtsegs): le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa

143a8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ lnga dang tshangs pa'i sgra dang mi mdzad bdag pa'i spring dang 'brug spar dbyangs ldan pa// mgon po lngas
143b1(dkon brtsegs): yid 'od ldan ning 'dod chags ni sdang ni bar mdzad papo// gti mug spong ba 'jig rten dgan dga' ba bzang po gnal yas skyed mdzad pa// stobs bcu
143b2(dkon brtsegs): tan rgya mam minga' ba gang gi don tu 'od bsten tu gsol// ri ces nags tshal bcas ning chab dang bcas pa'i sa rnams rnam pa drug tu g.yos// lha rnams nam mdar
143b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing lha'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char pa 'bebs// seng ge'i wa pham bgyis pa bzhin du khyod kyis mu stegs gzhan kun pham par mdzad// dpa' bo gang rga
143b4(dkon brtsegs): don tu 'od kyi ltas 'di bstan pa mdzad pa bka' stsal gsol/ nyi rna bye ba stong gis 'od rnams bkye dang glog dang nor bu rnams 'od dang // lnga dang klu dang
143b5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dag gi 'od rnams 'bar ba gang lags pa// shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas dge zhing dag pa'i 'od byung ba dang mjal gyur nas// 'od rnams thams cad mog mon
143b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyis te sangs rgyas 'od ni phyogs bcu rnams su mdzes// khyod kyi smin mtshams par gyi mdzod spu rab tu mdzes dkar dri ma ma mchis bzang // 'bar zhing pad+ma'i
143b7(dkon brtsegs): rdza dang dung dang me tog kun 'dra ba'i phyogs gsal bgyid// thams cad mo chog bgyis nas gdugs kyis srin du me khyer bzhin du rgyal ba mdzes// mom
143b8(dkon brtsegs): seng ge thub bde gang gis don chen bzang por der 'gyur bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
144a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dpa' bo khyod kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di byin gyi brlabs gang gis bud med kyi dngos po med
144a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob par 'gyur ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i dri ma med kyis byin pa
144a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag brgyad cur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyad de/ bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag drug cur spyad nas/ phyis
144a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji 'drang 'dro ba'i byang chub sems
144a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' brgyad khri dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de 'dra ba dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa'o sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
144a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig du 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'o 'gal gyi bu chen pos byang chub sems dpa'adri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yun ring du/
144a7(dkon brtsegs): rnga med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub kyi phying spya na/ ra byud kyis de'i gyi drung meng kyi dngos po ma bsgyur/ byang nab sems dpa' dri ma mang kyis byin pas smras pa/
144a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pacan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ btsun pa khya po'i phyir skyes pa'i lus las mi sbyar/ gnas brtan mo rug
144b1(dkon brtsegs): na ma smra bar gyur // de nas byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnam med kyis byin pas/ mo rung 'gal gyi bachen po la 'dis ces smramaso// bcu pa
144b2(dkon brtsegs): la gyi du chen ba smras pa lus kyi sems kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba yang ma yin/ bud med kyi lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyang yang ma yin
144b3(dkon brtsegs): cir gyu nin/ byang chu ni ma skyes pa s+ho/ de ni lus sam sems kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgyu dar mnus pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byu

144b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med gyis byin pa 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu'i thad na tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//
144b6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms so// bskal pa brgyad cur mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bsgoms so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i zab
144b7(dkon brtsegs): 'i tshul dang ldan pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas byed phrag brgyad rdul na bza' dang nal zas kyis bkur sti byas sa/
144b8(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ 'di yang yongs su dris so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jin
145a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
145a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan dam/ 'dzin dam/ 'chang ngam/ klog
145a3(dkon brtsegs): gam/ kun rung par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston na 'di ni de bas bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsgrub pa 'di ni byang chub thob
145a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i byor ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos kyi rnams 'di zung shig
145a5(dkon brtsegs): chongs shig/ klogs shig/ kun chud par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gnon nur
145a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ji lags/ 'di ji ltar zung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol
145a7(dkon brtsegs): baM/ 'jam dpa' de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spongs pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa zhes bya ba zung shig/ gzungs kyi rdo rje'i tshig ces bya bar yang zung shig
145a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig/ dri ma med kyis byin pas nus pa bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
145b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa na lnga dang mi'i skye dgu las/ srog rgyags khrag khrig phrag brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
145b2(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa ji srid cig na/ blan med
145b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi du byang chub sems dpa'
145b4(dkon brtsegs): drim med kyis byin pa 'dir skal pa brgya stong phrag grangs med pa/ bgrang ba las 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi ning nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams med pa/
145b5(dkon brtsegs): me'i chad dpag med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i longs spyod pas shin tu lhag pa dang ldan pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod
145b6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas band cing 'dzum pa dri ma med pa'i tog gi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang
145b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dang 'dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des tA la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid du rnam
145b8(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad brgya
146a1(dkon brtsegs): khri ba ni sdong yod pa byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che'i gdugs des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khebs so//
146a2(dkon brtsegs): des yang nam mkha' de nyid na rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la bstod cing phyag 'tshal te/ bsti stang byas nas
146a3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' de las rabs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha las stsogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po
146a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis byang chub sems dpa'adri ma med kyis byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yang mthong / lung bstan pa de yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga'
146a5(dkon brtsegs): nas bde de dang skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das gal bde logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas/ sgra skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/
146a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sangs rgyas chos skad du// blo ni shin du nges gyur pa// de dag rnyed chen po rnyed// sngon chad sdig pa'i las bgyis pas// bdag cag bram ze'i khyim du skyes/
146a7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i na thos mthong byer ni// bkra' mi nas shing tshig tu brjod// sangs rgyas skye se dag mthong gyur na// bkram shes shes dgyis pa ma// tshig hU~M rjod
146a8(dkon brtsegs): pa ga ma mchis pa// btsun pa nongs pa bshags par bgyid/ tshogs kyi rgyal po mchog byung ba// sangs rgyas gang dag ma mthong ba// ming dag gis pan
146b1(dkon brtsegs): brna dadag 'das na la la// ji ma byen pa'i mtshad sbyin da// bdag cam mthun tubs par gyur// ston pa'i nyan pos rnams mthong nas//
146b2(dkon brtsegs): pas ni sdod cing mchis// de la bdag cag rnams kyis dris// khyod kyis 'dren pa gang na mthong // des smras bcas nas lo bdun na// kho mos sangs rgyas mtshan
146b3(dkon brtsegs): mchi/ de yis sangs rgyas bsngags mngab// de bzhin gzhan du mi 'gyur brjod// de'i tshig thos bdag cag kun// byang chub mchog du yang dag zhugs
146b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag sngon gyi bas rnams dang // sangs rgyas zhes bgyi'i sgras bskul bas// shAkya seng ge'i nangs la ni// phyag dgyi'i slad du lpags pa lags
146b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong phyagar gyis// chos kyi dam pa thos par 'gyur// rkang gnyis dam pa 'di mthong bas// bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grom
146b6(dkon brtsegs): skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// chos gang bshad pa mdzad pa rnams// sangs rgyas chos kyi don skad du// bdag cag de la slob par bgyid// sangs rgyas chos tho
146b7(dkon brtsegs): baM gyi slad de// byang chub spyod pa thos gyur nas// bdag cag yang dag nan tan gyis// spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang dang
146b8(dkon brtsegs): lam dang sgo yang bstan pa 'o// nan tan gyis ni gnas par bgyid// 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog rten 'gyur// de dag lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/
147a1(dkon brtsegs): thub pas de tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// thub chen lung bstan mdzad gsol zhes// sangs rgyas la ni kun dgas nus// bcom
147a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze lnga brgya 'di dag dang // bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de dang // de kun bskal pa gcig gi che// rnam par
147a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs rgyas lnga brgya zlum pa la// tshe rabs snga mar mchod pa byas// de nas phyin chad spyod ci yang // sangs rgyas bye
147a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur ni// de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// de dag bskal pa'i re la 'ang // sangs rgyas bye mthong bar
147a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de dag bskal pa bcig de la// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog 'gyur te// 'od byed ces bya'i bskal gcig la// tshangs pa'i sgo nas bya bar 'gyur/
147a6(dkon brtsegs): dedage che chung nachungs 'gyur te/ bskal pa bye ba'i rgyang du thug/ ning mtshungs dge 'dun mtshungs 'gyur ro// dge slong bye ba brgyad cu yong// sems ni
147a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi don sgyu cing // chos 'di la yang spyang byas nas// de dag thams cad mthar gyis su// mya ngan 'das pa ni bu 'thong // bcom ldan 'das kyis
147a8(dkon brtsegs): gad ces paka'i stsa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spongs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa dang // 'jam dpal gno nur rgyar
147b1(dkon brtsegs): ga/ la tha gas pa rgyal dang / na sa chen pa dag dang / wadang / mi nga / ma tshan pa sa
147b2(dkon brtsegs): ras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskud do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen pa'i rgyas
147b3(dkon brtsegs): rnamathangs la snang phrag brgya la ste/ drim med kyis byin pa'i nus pa zhes byang ste/ lebrams cu rtsa gnyis brdzogs sa/ rgyag
147b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o// gnyis nus/
147b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyag sa na/ Ar+yA g+ni nga nas dgu sa maH/ bong skad du/ 'phags pa yon narten pa rgya'i ma tog kun tu rgyas pas nus
147b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes byang theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gtsug na/ bcom
147b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod sbyangs pa'i ril dge sbyong srong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang
147b8(dkon brtsegs): po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' chen po grong khyer yangs pa'i l-i tsa byig no nu yon tan rin can me tog kun tu
148a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin cen me tog kun du
148a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bstan las langs te/ bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar bas
148a3(dkon brtsegs): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas nu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skyabs dbye bar gnang na/
148a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig nu lags so// de skad ces gsol
148a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin cen me tog kur tu rgyas po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan byin ma cho
148a6(dkon brtsegs): kun d+hargyas pa khyud/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa c-i nga 'dod banus ni ga dang / nub dang nyid kyi lung bstan pas/
148a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin cen me tog kun tu rgyas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
148a8(dkon brtsegs): gas pato// bam ldan 'das de la na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan das na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa gas te/ 'tsha ning bzhes pa de rnams kyi ma
148b1(dkon brtsegs): brdung na/ rigs kyi du'am rigs kyi bu ma myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta bdag banugs lags
148b2(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po yon tam rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
148b3(dkon brtsegs): man na cer ma tog kun+na d+ha rgyas pa lcags sa legs so// yon tan rin can me tog kun d+ha rgyas pa khyod da ltar dang ma 'angs pa'i skye ba mang po la dran pa dang /
148b4(dkon brtsegs): bamang pal ba dang / 'jog rten la snying brtse ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir khyad de ni
148b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la don 'di nupa sems pa ni yon tan ni chen mi cig kun tu rgyas pa khyod yang legs so// de'i phyir yon tan rim chen matog kun tu rgyus po khyod la sa
148b6(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
148b7(dkon brtsegs): po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan rin cen
148b8(dkon brtsegs): me tog kun tu rgyas pa shar phyogs ni chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
149a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan rin cen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba ni gang ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ba
149a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yod do// bskal pa de'i ni rgyas pa thams cad kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o// de nas sems can rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu med do// bcom ldan 'das de'i
149a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor dpag tu med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon
149a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan rin cen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mdad pa can ni bskul pa stong phrag drug rtsi
149a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bskul bar byedado// tshe rjes nas kyang slob pa med par ston pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ning bye ba phrag brgya rnams kyi
149a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis spobs pa nye bar sgrub par mdzad do// chos ston pa na bag zang yang med par 'gyur ro// del 'di skad ces bya sa/
149a7(dkon brtsegs): me bar sangs rgyas mtshan 'di bad+mod byed pa// de la yon da ni 'di rnams myur bar byung // de la bla med byang chung dka' ma yin// yon tan rin can me tog kun tu
149a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa// sde phyogs ma yon tan rin rtson bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni de banin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan tan don chen
149b1(dkon brtsegs): dang la babad pa bze rdad kyi rgyal pas du zhes bya ba ni gang ltar bzhugs te 'tshonang gnas pa yang // sprul pa don yon tan rgyas pa zhes byar// bcom
149b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gzugs pa dag tsam pa yang dag par rje gas pa'i sangs rgyas yon na na chen pa la bkod pa'o baN+Di brjid kyi rgyal po la bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi drung
149b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mdod pa can ni tshe rjes ma thag tu/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtha' snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ning yon tan dpa' tu
149b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhi pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// tshe rjes ma thab tu skyes bu chen pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thong par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang
149b5(dkon brtsegs): smon lam 'debs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba gcig gis thogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzon
149b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// stobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di dz+haiMng byed pa/
149b7(dkon brtsegs): de la ting 'dzir pasamalas de sbyi nang // srim cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan lngas stong la// de ni byang chub sdu ba gcig thogs 'gyur// yam man can mo tog kun
149b8(dkon brtsegs): rtsa rgyas pa/ nub phyogs na mya ngan dang mur pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
150a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spongs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba ni ga da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhes pa yod do// bskal
150a2(dkon brtsegs): pade ni shAkya mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad
150a3(dkon brtsegs): la stobs pa bkod pa'i dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// dug gis ma yin/
150a4(dkon brtsegs): chus ma yin de/ mes kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rdzus te skyo bar yang 'gyur ro// tshe rjes ma thag tu shugs brgyad zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par
150a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'od rje byed// 'dil mi de yi lus mi 'chi zhing mtshon kyis byin chus min dug gis man/
150a6(dkon brtsegs): don rdzas ste 'or 'gyur// yom narin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa/ byang phyogs na mun pa dang rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
150a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhini gshegs par dgyu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs pa pa ga tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa'i'o blo zhes bya ba ni gad ltar banags
150a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ning gnas pa yod do// bskal pa de ni thags pa chen po 'dzin pa nis bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gzhigs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
150b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas spangs pa dpa btund pa bkod pa yang dag par ltung ba zla bamaman 'dzan mas kyi bu' rigs kyi num sa pa sa zub
150b2(dkon brtsegs): phrag bcu mnyes par byed par 'gyur// thams cad du rjes su spong ba ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// zang mi shes pa'i zam dog ces bya ba'i brdung
150b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang thod par 'gyur ba nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// ngan song gsum po rnams su
150b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa na sangs rgyas kyi ning gang dang gang tu skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der ngan song du skye ba'i sems can rnams yongs su
150b5(dkon brtsegs): thar bar byed do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan
150b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di brjod byed pa// de'i yon tan bgrang myi nus shing // de ni byang chub thob par the tsom med/ de la the tsom par gzungs skye'o// yon rin chen me tog kun tu d+h+ya sa
150b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ shor lho'i mtshams kyi phyogs na shin tu mdzes pa bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
150b8(dkon brtsegs): 'brug stong pas grags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho ning gzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya/
151a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal
151a2(dkon brtsegs): po de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang pa can de ni tshe rjes ma thag du mi 'jigs pa ni thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob par 'gyur
151a3(dkon brtsegs): / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos btsong rgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi
151a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji 'dra ba de lta bu 'thob par 'gyur ro// bud med kyi tshe rjes nas skyes pa'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
151a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di 'dzin byed pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dang gzhan// bsam gyis mi khyab rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems
151a6(dkon brtsegs): dpas sangs rgyas mang po mthong // yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa// lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs na bkod pa dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin
151a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gosar mchog 'od yul zhes byang ba zhig dgar bzhugs te/ 'tsho na gnas pa ladang/ bskul pa dzin
151a8(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yang dag par bskyed pa nas byar// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa mdza dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gas mchog 'ang dpa
151b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i mtshan 'dzin par rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mdad pa can de'i mtshan thos pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag dgu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// sems
151b2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rgyu gang gos sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed ces byan na/ rigs kyi
151b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ chos ston par 'gyur zhing / de chos ston pa na ting nge 'dzin de'i chos nyid thob pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
151b4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
151b5(dkon brtsegs): yid 'ong gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sems can rnams gcig tu bde ba dang ldan zhing / sems can ngan song skye ba thams cad yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ de dag de dag
151b6(dkon brtsegs): nas yongs su grol nas lha dang mo'o lus thob par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba bzhin no// de la 'di skad ces bya
151b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gser mchog 'od dpal gyi ni mtshan 'dzin pa// de'i gzi' brjid dpal tog stobs dbang po// tshe rabs kun tu rnyed par dka' ma yin// de la blo thogs
151b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa mtha' yas 'gyur// yon tan rin cen me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs na sdig pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhi gshegs
152a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas garje badz+rad rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang ba zhes bya ba ni gad ltar bzhugs te 'tsham
152a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhes pa zhig yod do// bskal pa de ni khyim rgyas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
152a3(dkon brtsegs): gzi' brjid rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi du ma dad pa can den che rjes ma thag tu spongs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes
152a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// tshogs chu dus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi ning gi
152a5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dkod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i chos ston pa yang thos par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
152a6(dkon brtsegs): gang ni brgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'di 'dzin pa// tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas ning du // de ni tshe dpag med ldan chos shes 'gyur// skye ba gcig gis byang chub rdzogs
152a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung rgya// yon dan rin can me tog kun rgyas pa/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs na mya ngan thams cad las rnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gzigs padaH
152a8(dkon brtsegs): 'acom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nganal pa bye bzangs mang par byang chub ma dag par srung ba zhes bya ba ni ga dgar bzhugs te/ 'tshan banas pa mang/
152b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa don spangs pa bkod pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pabye ba blangs me par/
152b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yang dag par bstabs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe rjes ma thag tu rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi spobs pa phun
152b3(dkon brtsegs): sumatshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas byed phrag bcu la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sbrang byings yan ma
152b4(dkon brtsegs): drug cu phun tshogs ldan// de ni kun tu shes pa'ang pha rol phyin// rgyal ba bye ba brgya cu mchod byed pa'o// bsod nams gang yin pasam las des 'thob 'gyur/
152b5(dkon brtsegs): yon ton rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ steng gi phyog son yon na dpag med pa bkod pa'i gzing brjid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nad bzhin bshegs pa dgra bcom pa la
152b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do//
152b7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa de ni tshad med len ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang nam mkha
152b8(dkon brtsegs): par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni kha tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su spyod par
153a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// ti nge 'dzin gyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang shes rab kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa dang /
153a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro// sa nas sa yang thob par 'gyur ro// spobs pa bral ba med pa pur tshogs pa yang
153a3(dkon brtsegs): 'thod par 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// yi ge dang sgra'i brdal yang 'thob par 'gyur//
153a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs mthon pa dang rigs chen yang 'thob par 'gyur ro mngon par shes pa lnga yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par co brgyad kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro//
153a5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang ni ga rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa/ de'i yan lag brgyad dbyangs phun sum 'thob/ de ni sangs rgyas bral bar yang mi skye/
153a6(dkon brtsegs): ming mi thogs byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ 'og gi phyogs na tha dadang med pa nyid la dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin
153a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba ni ga da ltar bzhugs te/ @
153a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhes pa med do// bskal pa ni ma shes kung nas bsdus pa nas byag// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
153b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i garje brjid kyi 'od dang mtshan thos pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma dad pa can de ni ma rjes mthag tu sangs rgyas langs
153b2(dkon brtsegs): su zung pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro// skye ba gcig gis thogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar
153b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya
153b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sangs rgyas mtshan 'dzin sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rnams kyi chos bstan thos 'gyur zhing // skye ba gcig thogs blan med pa yi// byang chub
153b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'chang rgyur 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen matog kur+m+ma d+ha rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
153b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen thams cad dang ldan pa'i spobs pa'i skad kyi gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub dpa'abye ba khrag bcu phrag bar+d+ha nus bla na med pa yang dag
153b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'o sa 'thob bo// lha dang mo'i skye dgu sum khris ni bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
153b8(dkon brtsegs): byang bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan
154a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
154a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yod tan rin chen me tog kun
154a3(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyas pas nus pas le'u zhes bya ste/ sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / prad rnam
154a4(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / nu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde las spogs pas bsgyur cing nus nas gtan la phab pa'o// / nyes nus/
154a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar snyed du/ ar+ya a tsin+tu bud+d+ha bi sha ya nir de sha nA ma ma hA yan sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyi
154a6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// dam po dang pa'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
154a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos padus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyinal mngon med zas sbyin rgya kun dga' ra bar/ dge slong srung du chang pa
154a8(dkon brtsegs): dge sung gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpal khri dang thangs gcig tu btsugs te/ 'dod pan spyang pa ning / gzugs na spyad pa'i lce'i bu rnams dang /
154b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas mang ma'i lba'i du rnams dang lang thabs cag sa// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du ma'i yongs su bskur te/ mdun gyis bstan nas chos bstan to// ya
154b2(dkon brtsegs): da'i ci 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das
154b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpalangs khyod la bskul gyis khyod kyi spyan du ldan pa'i gtam la rtsoms te/ lha'i khor 'di dang / byang chung
154b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'di la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci las brtsams te/ spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom
154b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul las rtsoms te/ spobs par gyis shig/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul
154b6(dkon brtsegs): nigang mig gi yul ma lags pa dang / gzugs kyi yul ma lags pa dang / rna ba'i yul ma lags pa dang / sgra'i yul ma lags pa dang / sna'i yul ma
154b7(dkon brtsegs): lags pa dang / dri'o la ma lags pa dang / lce'i yul ma lags pa dang / ro'i yul ma lags pa dang / lus kyi yul ma lags pa dang / reg bya'o yul
154b8(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa dang / yid kyi yul ma lags pa dang / chos kyi yul ma lags pa ste/ de sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yul khyad par ma
155a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi yul khod du chud
155a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal bas khong du chud nga mchis pa'i tshul du/ sangs rgyas kyi yul de ltar khong du chud par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ba
155a3(dkon brtsegs): pA'i yul rtsi labs/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal lta bar gyur pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid ni ngas byang chub thob pa'i yus so// mtshan ma mnyam pa mi
155a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir margyan ma med pa ni yul lo// khams gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir smon pa med pa ni yul lo// 'du byed mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni
155a5(dkon brtsegs): dril pa// 'dus kyis mam pa zhid kyi phyir skye med pa dang / 'byud med pa dang / 'du byed pa mang po ni tshul// gosem par ma ldan 'das 'as
155a6(dkon brtsegs): ma gyes kyi yul gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems med pa ni 'dus ma rgyas kyi sul so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems ma
155a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa nas dus rgyas kyi yul lags te/ des brjod pa ma mchis lags na/ brjod pa ma mchis pa la bstan pa ma mchis lags so// bstan par
155a8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa la mngo par rje pa ma mchis lagasas pacom ldan 'das mdzan par brjod pa mamachis par lu nasangs rgyas kyi yul lagasas// bka' stsal /
155b1(dkon brtsegs): la ma pa la sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du sal bar bya/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyi yul ni sems can thams cad rkyen mongs pa rnams las yongs su
155b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongasu rtogs pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
155b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi yul ma lags kyi/ gang 'di sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags pa'i slad du'o// ba/
155b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa yod dam ci/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams
155b5(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su btsal/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'jug pa ma mchis/ ldog pa ma mchis lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
155b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gal te sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa med cing / ldog pa med na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su she/
155b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul ma mchis shing / ldog pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang lags pa de yang 'jug pa ma
155b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis shing / ldog pa ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs
156a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ni dmongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin lag so/ bcom ldan 'das gal te nyon mongs pa rnam
156a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin kyang / gzhan du gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin kyang gzhan nig lags na ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzog
156a3(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas so nas kyang bstan par mi 'gyur ba zhig ma bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi
156a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes ston lags so// bka' stsal pa/
156a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i dgang gang gi gnas pa shes sem/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'tshal legs so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
156a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byis pas so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas nas/ 'dod chags
156a7(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sda dang / gti mug ku tu 'byung ba'i mnyam pa nyid nges de bzhi gshegs pa gnas lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byis pas sa'i sna
156a8(dkon brtsegs): ma da pa / nas yug tu tu ju mas/ snang pa dang / mnam mchis bam
156b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi mnam pa zhed de bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci stong pa nid la/ 'dza
156b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mchis pa gang gis stong pa nyid mchis pa'i mchis pa des/ 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang /

156b4(dkon brtsegs): mug rnams yod/ gsol pa yi ge dang skad dang sgra dang brjod pa'i mchis pas stod pa nyid mtshos lags so// yi ge dang skad dang / s+tha dang / brjod pa'i mchis pas/
156b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang / gti mug rnams mchis lags so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba
156b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma byas pa dang / mthas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/ dge slong dag pa skyes pa dang / ma byung ba
156b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni med pa ma yin no// dge slong dag pa la te ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang /
156b8(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa med du zin na/ ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byos pa dang / mngon par 'dus
157a1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba ni gan/ dge slong dag 'di ltar ma sku
157a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ma byung ba dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod do// de'i phyir skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang /
157a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags so// zhes bka' stsal po de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong pa
157a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma mchis su lags na/ 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang / gti mug gis nyon mongs pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bcom
157a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni mchis te/ de'i slad du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams las 'byung bar gdags lag so//
157a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyed kyis ji skad bstan pa de de lta yin du zi rin/ gang su dag stong pa nyid la gnos pa de dag thams cad
157a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang / ni sdang dang / gA'i mug la gnas par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor spyod pa gang / 'dod chags dang / ne snang
157a8(dkon brtsegs): da gti mug las gud du stong pa nyid tshal bden rnal 'byor la mi spyod pa lags te/ rnal 'byor ma lags pa'o// de ba'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
157b1(dkon brtsegs): 'do chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las gung du stong pa nyid bajam dar bgyi ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / naswA
157b2(dkon brtsegs): gti mug nyid stong pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci 'dod chags dang bcas/ ne sdang deng bcas/ gti mug dang bcas pa yin nas/
157b3(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'dod chags dang bral ba ni sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang /
157b4(dkon brtsegs): mug rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de dang bdag mnyam ste/ gang mnyam pa zhid de thob pa de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ 'dod chan
157b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba yang ma lags/ ne sdang dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ ne sdang dang bral ba yang ma lags/ gti mug dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ gti mug
157b6(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dge' sbyong dang bram ze gang dag bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bram
157b7(dkon brtsegs): bral ba yang dag par rjes su la zhing pha rol la/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang / zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su/
157b8(dkon brtsegs): bde dag ni lta bar gyur pa gnyis la chags pa lags so// gnyis gang lags she na/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba lags so// de ci'i srad
158a1(dkon brtsegs): ne na/ gang bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bral bar rjes su lta bde ni de dag gi chad par
158a2(dkon brtsegs): lta ba lags so// gang pha rol la 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag gi rtag par
158a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba lags so// yang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge slong ni pha rol dman pa dang / bdag khyad par du 'phags par yang dag par rjes su mi lta lag so//
158a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de/ gang tu zhugs pa yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang yang dag par zhugs de ni/ gang tu yang
158a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de la ma zhugs pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang lam la zhug/
158a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa lags te/ gang 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa de mnyam pa nyid du gal 'gyur lags/ de ci'i slad du na na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus
158a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyis ni ste ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa dang ldan pa'i srang du'o// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus ma byas la grangs gang yang yang dem/ gas
158a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis la grangs gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus ma bgyis la grangs mchis par gyur na/ de 'dus bgyis ci
158b1(dkon brtsegs): du kye/ 'dus ma brgya ma lags sa// bka' stsal pa/ 'jamangs la gang 'dus ma byas thob ba'i 'phags pa thams ca sa grangs pa yang yad par 'gyur ba
158b2(dkon brtsegs): zangs yod dang / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams la grangs gang mang ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams ni blangs ma mchis pa/
158b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin nam/ 'on te 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tshis dang ldan pa yin/
158b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa ma lags so// ci gang bcom ldan 'das
158b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis sprul pa de 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags sam/ 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sprul pa
158b6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin no// gsol pa chos thams cad sprul pa lta ba'o zhes bcom ldan
158b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis ma bstan lags sam/ bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal de lta'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags
158b8(dkon brtsegs): pas bdag kyang de'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags te/ de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan
159a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpa' khyod cingang ldan/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas
159a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba dang ldan lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul rnyed dam/ gsol pa gal te bcom ldan 'ang
159a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnyed nas/ bdag kyis kyang rnyed lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gnonar gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de bzhin
159a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi yul ma brnyes sam/ smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi yul ga yang rnyed dam/ smras paM/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa
159a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med yul nad pa yang med do// smras pa btsun pa rang 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med/ rdul
159a6(dkon brtsegs): brnyed pa yang med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ni rjes su bsrung ba med par chos ston to/ khyod ni las dang po pa rnams rjes su mi srung ngo // smras pa/
159a7(dkon brtsegs): de bstan gnas brtan la yongs su dris khyod kyis ji skar brjod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ btsun pa gar ba 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems// gang snyan pa yongs su
159a8(dkon brtsegs): srung shi kha dang / sbyar ba dang / ma nga'i slar ma byin na/ cings nang pa de la nad med pa'i bde babyin pa yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jim dpal denam
159b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan// snyas pa/ btsun parab 'byor ban du gang rnam sa bas las dang po sangs su srung zhing zab mal ga ma ngas gam sa na
159b2(dkon brtsegs): nades de yang dang yang 'chi ba las thar bar byas par mi 'gyur/ shin tu ba ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu banag par mi 'gyur ro// bstan pa 'di na
159b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ dge slong lnga brgya len pa pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha'i bu brgyad brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing rjem dang bra
159b4(dkon brtsegs): brnam par dag go/ sna'i bu bdur brgya 'jam dpal gnor gyur pa'i spobs pa bzlas nas/ 'dod cing lhag pa'i bsam pas d+ha na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i
159b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tusems bskyed do// yong dang ldan par 'gyur kyis ma dpal gnonu pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod na rjes kyi zug skye sems can
159b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dral na/ byung na rdzas kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun par buM 'byor zab na ldog pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtsol de/
159b7(dkon brtsegs): spyan du rab 'byor kha bon nyan rjes kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang min/ khe be ni du sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang mnan// btsun
159b8(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni theg pa chen pos rnam par grol ba'ang yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci nyan thos sam/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas sam// 'on te yang dag par
160a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos yin te/ pha rol las mnyan pa'i sgral
160a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyor bar brtson pa ni ma yin no// kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas yin te/ snying rje chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa dang bral ba ma yin no// kho bo ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
160a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yin te/ bya ba'i rgyun bcad pa ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar nyan thos yin/ smras pa/ chos ma thos pa mnyan pa sems can
160a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la thos par byed de/ des kho bo nyan thos yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar rang sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ kho bos chos thams
160a5(dkon brtsegs): cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rtogs/ des ma kho bo/ sangs rgyas so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci ltar na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/
160a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ khongs chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par khong du chud de// des na kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rnaMs sa/
160a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod nan thos kyis 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am// 'dod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'am// sa gang la des
160a8(dkon brtsegs): paM yin par bzung bar bya/ sbas pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo nis thams cad la nges pa yin par zung zhig/ sbas pa/ 'jam dpal khyengs sar skye
160b1(dkon brtsegs): sal yang nges par bzung bar bya 'am/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin na// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor rgyas thams cad ni yang
160b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du nges pa'o// nges pa der sems can thams cad kyang nges pa ste/ ngo bo yang nges pa der nges pa nyid do// des nakho bo so so'i skye bo'i sal yang des
160b3(dkon brtsegs): par bzung bar bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa yin na/ 'di ni so so skye bo'i sa'o// 'dzin
160b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi sa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// zhes rnam par gnag
160b5(dkon brtsegs): gdags par 'gyur/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na// phyogs bcu yi nam mkha' la// 'di ni shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'o//
160b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni lho phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni nub phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni byang phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni shar lho'o'o// 'di lho nub kyi'o// 'di ni nub byad kyi'o/
160b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang shar gyi'o// 'di ni 'og gi'o// 'di ni steng gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'o// zhes brjod kyang / phyogs cha la tha dad pa yod kyi nam mkha' lan
160b8(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa med do btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du/ chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thabs la mkhas pas 'di so so
161a1(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i sa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas
161a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sa'o// zhes sa rnams par 'jog kyang sa rnam par gzhag pa la tha dad pa yod kyi yang dag dag pa nyid du nges pa la ni tha dad pa med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang
161a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs sam/ smras pa/ zhugs pa yang yin la/ byung ba yang yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na khyed zhugs pa yang yin pa
161a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba yang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab ni rab 'byor 'di ni skyes du mkhas pa kha cig
161a5(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa'i don dpes shes par 'gyur ba yod do// de'i phyir khyod la dpe' bstan par bya'o// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon chen po zhig
161a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba/ lhan sdug pa'i bu cig pa zhig kyang yod de la mo sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba byor rgol ba zhig kyang yod pa las nges bu cig pa de thag ring ba
161a7(dkon brtsegs): la mi gol ba'i phyog pa'i phyogs shig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du don dadags phyir rdol yin no snyam du sems skyes te/ des de byas dpa'i phyir mad
161a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs nas 'a'angs mthag du du cig pa yin pa'i 'du shes skyes te/ de srim sems par byas pas shin tu brgyags te/ mnga' de bu cig pa'i lus lam phog pa'i
161b1(dkon brtsegs): rdul ga gis 'dzin pa 'dzin do rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir/ dper byas pa'o// 'di la don du lta ba gang nen/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'phong gi slong dpon nas bya
161b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig rngu dgas so// btsun pa thor ba 'byor du cig pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la byang chub sems dpar du cig pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'dzun
161b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// gsod pa'i phyir rgol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshig du dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i nas
161b4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon gyis mda' 'phangs la du cig pa'i lus lam thob par shin tu
161b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyugs te 'dzin pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas 'du shes byed thams cad skye ba med par
161b6(dkon brtsegs): sar rtog go// yang dag pa nyid du des pa la rnam par bltas nas/ snying rje chen po dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs bskyed pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byed
161b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jud do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal
161b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yul yin/ smras pa/ btsun par 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten na yang spyod la 'jig rten gyi chos
162a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis kyang mi gos shing 'jig rten na yang snang la/ chos thams cad la snang ba med pas/ rab du phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
162a2(dkon brtsegs): dag gi yulo// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dgas thams cad la yang snang la/ sa ngan pa la yang mi gnas pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub
162a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir yang brtson la/ chos kyi dbyings zad par ni yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba dang / btsun pa rab
162a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byor byangar chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus byas las kyang bstod la/ 'dus ma byas kyang yang dag par ma rnyed pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ga
162a5(dkon brtsegs): dge'akhor ba la sted mos chal dang / gzhal med khang du yang 'du shes la/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang don du mi gnyer zhing bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / btsun
162a6(dkon brtsegs): parab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag med pa'o bzod pa yang thong la/ sems can yongs su smon par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson pa dang / btsun pa rab
162a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa 'bang dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi nong yongs su dag par bya la yang brtson pa dang /
162a8(dkon brtsegs): btsun parang 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par yar mthongs/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung da
162b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyi rgyan hU~M phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo// smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems spyad pa 'di ni 'dzin
162b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su shes pa dang ldan yang / 'jig rteran gyi chos
162b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba la rloms te spobs par
162b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/ ji ltar byang chub dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da'/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o//
162b5(dkon brtsegs): lha gang zhen/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i byung ba'o// de la gzugs ni dbu brdol blta bu'o//
162b6(dkon brtsegs): tshar ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o// 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o// 'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// dbu ba dang chu'i chu bur dang /
162b7(dkon brtsegs): sdig rgyu dang / chu zhing dang / sgyum gang yin pa la 'jig rten yang med/ 'jig rten du gdags pa yang med/ phung po rnams kyang med/ phung por gdags
162b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med par gang phung po'i rang bzhin la de ltar smos pa de ni yang dag par zhugs pa'o// gang yang dag par zhugs pa de ni 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres
163a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// gang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa de 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'a'o// btsun pa rab 'byor
163a2(dkon brtsegs): gnan yang phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa de la gnyis su med do// gang gnyis su med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med// nga yin
163a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med do// gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de la chags pa med de/ chags pa med pa rnyed pa ni 'jig rten las yang dag par
163a4(dkon brtsegs): 'da'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rkyen la rag lus pa'o// gang dag rkyen la rag lus pa de dag rag lus pa med pa'o// gang dgar galus pa
163a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa de dag bdag po med pa'o// gang dag bdag po med pa de dag bdag gi bamed pa'o// gang dag bdag gi ba med pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o//
163a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la 'thab pa med do// gang la 'thab pa med pa de la rtsod pa med pa'o// gang la rtsod pa med pa de dag dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa'o//
163a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dpe sbyong gi chos mi rjod pa de dag nam mkha' lag pa mtshungs te/ chos thams cad nam mkha' lag pa dang mtshungs par shes nas 'jig rten las yang dag
163a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'a 'o// sun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga rnams kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyang dbyings med ste/ gang dbyings med pa
163b1(dkon brtsegs): de la tshig gi khams med do// gzugs kyi khams med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// rna ba'i khams med do// sbru khams myed do/
163b2(dkon brtsegs): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// sna'i khams med do// dri'i khams med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// lce'o khams med do//
163b3(dkon brtsegs): ro'i khams med do// lce'i rnam par shes pas khams med do// lus kyi khams med do// reg pa'i khams med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
163b4(dkon brtsegs): med do// yid kyi khams med do// chos kyi khams med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// gang khams med pa de la sa'i khams med do//
163b5(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams med do// me'i khams med do// rlung gi khams med do// nam mkha'i khams med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// 'dod pa
163b6(dkon brtsegs): khams med do// gzugs kyi khams med do// gzugs med pa'i khams med do// 'dus byas kyi khams med do// 'dus ma byas kyi khams med do//
163b7(dkon brtsegs): gang khams med pa de la bdag med// sems can med med/ srob med gsob med/ gang zag med/ shed las skyes med// shed bu med de/ gang gis
163b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag rjes su rtog pa med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa de 'jig rten las yang dag par gda'o// bstan po 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de nas
164a1(dkon brtsegs): slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de dag sems sems rnam par thol nas/
164a2(dkon brtsegs): rang rang gi bla gos kyis 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa la bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad du gang chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la// mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag ni thob pa yang
164a3(dkon brtsegs): med/ mngon par rdzogs pa yang med do zhes 'dzir to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces tsa smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gis
164a4(dkon brtsegs): nig thob cing / ci zhig mngon par rtogs/ dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong ni thob pa med pa// mngon par rtogs pa med
164a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba nyid do// mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba de ni rlom sems nyid do// g.yo ba dang rlom sems gang yin pa de ni
164a6(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las so// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni bdag gis thob // bdag gis mngon par rtogs so// zhes 'di lta bu 'di dag gi tshul du rnam par rtog par
164a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams shes sam/ sbas pa/ com ldan 'das mkhyen pa dang ldan pas mkhyen
164a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dig ni ri sa sug bsnga 'gyim chen ming migs par bdag pas sdug bsngal yongs su shes sa zhes slar lhag pa'i rgya la chen du dag par bya na /
164b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i mtshan med dang // 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang // 'gag pa'i mtshan nad dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gis sum bsnams ca/
164b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes sna balhag pa'ing rgya lakun du rig par bya'o// snyamam// de cir phyir nen/ sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang / kun 'byung ba'i ma med dang /
164b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skyed med pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid myed pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par rlom
164b4(dkon brtsegs): nga'o// chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid do// de la ni gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes so// ga 'byung ba spong ngo // gang 'gog pa
164b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon du byed do// gang lam bsgom mo zhes bya ba gang yang mi dmigs ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di thos nas skrag pa de lta bu lhag pa'i nga rgyal car yin
164b6(dkon brtsegs): par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byen te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
164b7(dkon brtsegs): slong 'di dag gis ji skad bstan pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor dge slong 'di skad gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs gi sung rab la/ 'jam dpal gno ru pa nyid
164b8(dkon brtsegs): las/ zang mo'i chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos pa ste/ chos zab mo mnyan pa de nyid kyi rgyus 'di ltar mngon par shes pa myur bar gyur to// zab mo'i chos
165a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di la yang rjes su mthun par gyur ro// mthun pa ma yin no// rab 'byor rnamagrangs das na/ theg brtson
165a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa rnams gtogs par gang dag nga'i gsung rab 'di la chos zab mo bstan pa 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang / lhag par mos pa de dag thams cad
165a3(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la 'dus pa gsum gyi grangs su gtogs par rig par bya'o// gang yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
165a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni bzod pa yang rung ba thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod
165a5(dkon brtsegs): d+hun tu 'ja m+bu'i gling na chos ston dam/ 'jam dpal dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzud ngo do// der dga'o ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la chos bstan du gas de na sna
165a6(dkon brtsegs): bu sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa dag yod de/ de dag yul phun sum tshogs pas bag med pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das
165a7(dkon brtsegs): dang khyod la chos nyan tu mi 'ong bas na/ de dag chos mi nyan pas gyur te/ de dag khyod las chos thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam
165a8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gnor gyur pas de'i tshe gang gis lnga'i bu dpal bzangs dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dga' ldan gyi gnas su rung par bdag nyid kyis shes dang
165b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang / nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang / nyams dpa' ba'i rdzing dang / nyams dpa' ba'i steng pos tshal dang / rim pa bdun
165b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyad bcu dang / ni shu ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ bsil khang dang / bag ma dang / stegs bu dang / rtababs dang / sker khung dang ldan pa de dag kyang snang
165b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / lha'i bu mo rkang lag 'jam ning mnyen pa gser gyi dra ba ltar 'od rnam par dag pa sprin ma legs pa 'bral ba legs pa/ bzhini legs pa/ mig
165b4(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa sngon po lta bur mdzes shing dri ma med pa shin tu yangs pa// 'dod pa'i sems skyed pa zla ba ches pa ltar mngon par dga' ba bzhin 'dzum pa
165b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa de dag rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / s+tha skan dang / 'khar ba'i sil khrol dang / phe ga dang rnga zlum dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga snyan pa dang /
165b6(dkon brtsegs): gling bu dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / gar dang / bzhad gang dang / 'jo ba dang / dga' ba dang / rtse bas rgyags shing / dga'
165b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod pa dag kyang snang ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par byas so// de 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs so//
165b8(dkon brtsegs): de ras lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis rang gi gnas rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa yang mthong ngo // rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams kyang mthong // mthong na
166a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang de ngo mamar du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag cag 'di ltar myur du dga' ldan
166a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas su phyin te/ nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba dag dang / zhes bya ba nas dga' ba dang / rtse ba dad/ dga' mgur spyod pa dang / bdag gi rang gi gnas
166a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang rang gi g.yog ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar te/ 'di dag snad bango mtshar to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu dpal bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so//
166a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu khyod ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos la dga' ldan gyi gnas su ya la phyir te/ lha'i bu'on kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di ga
166a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / lha'i rwa kha cag kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyi shes pa de ni 'jam dpal gnon
166a6(dkon brtsegs): zlar ba'i rdzu 'dul rnam par 'phrul pa'itsho 'phrul dang / ring 'dzin gyi byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lnga'i bu dang la brdungs kyi
166a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dis na bas pan// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gan du byur ba'i rdzu phrul rnams par 'phrul pa'i skabs dang / na gyi byin gyi rnams
166a8(dkon brtsegs): skabs 'dor babam gyis mi bya ste/ 'dim thams cad dang ldan po'i 'kho 'dis nas gang nas gang tu yang ma g.yas pa 'di snyam du bdag cig dga'
166b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas su phyin to// snyam pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha'i ru 'jam dpal gno dung gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul ba ji skad cin
166b2(dkon brtsegs): ngas shes pa las khyod kyis cetsam zhig shes te/ lha'i bu 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa ni 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang
166b3(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad ning gcig tu yang dag par ston to// sangs rgyas kyi ning gang+ge'i klung gi bye ma skyed gang dag yod pa de dag gtsug phud kyis byed kyi/ snying gi 'ang
166b4(dkon brtsegs): sna gi nam mkha' la 'jog go// sangs rgyas kyi ning de dag na rgya mtsho chen por gyur pa'i chu'i phung po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gci du blugs
166b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang rgyu'i sems can rnams la gnod pa med do// thams cad kyang rang rang gi rgya mtsho chen po na gnas par bdag nyid kyis so// sangs rgyas kyi ning de dag na ri'i rgyal
166b6(dkon brtsegs): po rib gang dag mong pa de dag thams cad dri tha gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ ri de dag yungs kar gyi 'azla'i nang de drug kyang ri rang la gnas pa'i lha de dag la
166b7(dkon brtsegs): gnong pa med de/ thams cad kyang ra nga gi gnas na 'khod par bdag nad kyis shes so// sangs rgyas kyi nong de dag ni 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can gang drug ma
166b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du banag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar sbyang bci 'drang de
167a1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dag de dag la sgrub bo// gang yang sangs rgyas kyi ning bad+hA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed sreg par byed pa'i ma de dag thams cad mar me
167a2(dkon brtsegs): snying po gcig gi me lcetsam gyi mer byin gyis brlob ste/ des byang byed pa gang yin pa de byed do// sangs rgyas kyi ning gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na tshim dang
167a3(dkon brtsegs): zla ba'i 'od kyang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig gi 'od kyis zil du brlab par byed do// lha'i bu'ajam dpal gno nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam pa
167a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul las brtsams nas nga bskal pa 'am bskal pa bas lhag par yang chos ston te/ 'jam dpal gnonur gyur pa ni rdzu 'phrul deng byon gyi brlangs
167a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs bsam gyi mi khyab pa 'di lta ba dang ldan no// / 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa
167a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mdo// dam po gas/ de nas bdud sdig can 'khor demed du 'dus par gyur nas/
167a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug ste ngas bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su byin gyis brlang nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal na// bcom ldan 'das 'dzem dpal gan rung
167a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de bdag gis blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das tshig tsam du gsungs pas ci sman gyis bdag la
167b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brlang sdig can du mkhyen bzhin du/ sems can nAd med pa de dag gi dge ba'i dru ba rnams smras pa
167b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ 'jam dpa langs khyod la bskul bskal gyis khyod kyis 'khor 'di dgal rang gyi rdza phrul gyi sto
167b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / cho 'phrul ston cig dang / sems can chad med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa bcomaldan
167b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bskul bar shes nas/ chos thams cad sems kyis dbang gyur pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ding nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
167b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gno nur gyur pas chos thams cad sems kyis dbang gyur pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thug tu/ de nas de'i mdo la thams
167b6(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa de bzhin du mcha
167b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ma ldag pa dang / mi mang bar mthong ngo // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis cho 'phrul de mthong nas ngo mtshar tu gyur te/ sangs rgyas

168a1(dkon brtsegs): ched du brjod
168a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'jigarten du 'byung ba mnan// cho phrul dus ma gyis ni khyang pa 'di yang 'jig rte na snang ba ldan ni nas nid du brjod/
168a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bdud sdig can gyis cho 'phrul de mthong ste/ ngo mtshang du gyur nas thal ma sbyar te/ 'jam dpal gno nur pa la phyag 'tsha'i zhing rig 'di skad smras so//

168a5(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar che bar bdag gis bsam so// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdud sdig can pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma srid du gyur kyang de ltar mos pas sems can de la hA
168a6(dkon brtsegs): chad bgyi ba'i rngo ma thogs lags so// bco ldan 'das dadung sdig can de dag ni rtag tu d+hAr mi cad par de bzhin gshegs pa la glags lnga ning sangs tshol
168a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can rnams la yang gtso bar sems pa dang / brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi dge ba'i rdza ba'i bar chad bgyi ba'i slang du yang zhugs pa lags
168a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das deng sran dang zong dang / zong rngus dang / rtsAngs pang / ruphe la nga dang / po drang la khor nachos kyi rnamagrangs 'dirab tu stong pa
168a9(dkon brtsegs): khor lor yug du dpag chad brgya chun chad du mig gis ma rtsol bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag ma mchi bar bdag yod dam re lA ru drang bgyi'o// gang dag 'cha
168b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'cha pa dang / snyan pa dang / ma mang nag dang / sgrub pa de la ldan pa la brgya ba ltar bus pa bstud par bgyur// bcom ldan 'das 'am
168b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang / bdag kyis 'khor bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i bar chad bgyi ba dang / btsun pa rnams g.yengs bgyi ba'i slad du bzhugs pa dag mchis na/
168b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag chad pas dgum pa'i slad du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyi'o// dad+ya thA/ a ma
168b4(dkon brtsegs): ma le/ sni tre/ a ka la pa ni dzi ta shwa tra/ dza ye dza ya be ti/ d+hu tA mA ti sha me shAn+ti/ ad+ya me/ phu pu me/ !a khe mkhe/ kha khaM/ mi si laM/ a ga rma
168b5(dkon brtsegs): phul le/ phu la/ phul/ phu Tu shu shu maM/ d+hid+hi ri/ an ba te/ swi ti t+te/ kri tai the/ kr-ita bid d+yA/ bai rots+tsha tAn/ sad d+harma d+hA/ Nako s+ya su s+ya d+ha /
168b6(dkon brtsegs): Ar+d+ha mu g+ne/ e ba su 'ur+ya swA/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba gang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de la bdud
168b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bar chad bgyi ba ni gnas ma lags shing skabs ma lags te/ de ni gnas ma mchis kyi steng du del gos dang / zas dang / mal che dang /
168b8(dkon brtsegs): na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub pa dang / spo bar bgyid pa dang / spobs par bgyi bar spo bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs
169a1(dkon brtsegs): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod nas g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i rgyud kyi gdugs mtshan 'das
169a2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa de dag lnga rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto
169a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur de/ de dag la sngar rgol ba'am/ mdza' ba gang gis glags bltas kyang thugs rnyed par
169a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la legs so zhes bya ba byin te sbyin te sdig can legs so legs so// 'dir khyod kyis gas
169a5(dkon brtsegs): sngags kyi tshig bstan pa brjod pas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ khyod kyi spobs pa thams cad ni 'jam dpal gno nur
169a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i byin gyi brlabs su rig par byur// 'jam dpal gnonu mra'i rdzu 'phrul ba'i tshe 'phrul dang / byin gyi brlabs 'di bstan pa dang / bdud kyi ga
169a7(dkon brtsegs): sngags kyi stobs dang / re sngags kyi stobs bstan pa na/ srog chag so nyi khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur/
169a8(dkon brtsegs): ris 'a ma dpal pal gan nar gyur pas rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs la 'disad ces smras// lho'i buM gyung dpa ldan gyi senas
169b1(dkon brtsegs): song la/ dga' ldan gyingos kyi lha'i bu rnams spangs shig dang / kho bo yang der nga // de nas lnga'i bu dpal bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gno ru p+ta'i wA
169b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyan te bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gno nur byur ba dang / byang chub semasna pa'i dge 'dun thams cad dang / nyan rdzas kyi dge 'dun la bskor ba byas
169b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas par 'khor de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ de nas lha'i bya dpal bzangs kyis dga' ldar gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la sbas pa/ grogs po dag shes
169b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gno rur pA'o bu cag la snying rtse ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong gis de la dga' ldan rigs kyi lha khyod dga' ba dang / rtse ba la bag med pa
169b5(dkon brtsegs): 'on te/ bag yod par gyis la/ 'jam dpal gnon pa la chos nyan du shegs shig/ de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gno rur gyur
169b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi dbus su lha'i yid las byung ba'i rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams chung shar nu
169b7(dkon brtsegs): dung dpag tshad sum khri nas spong yod la/ nang lho byang du dpag chad khri drug stong yod pa byas te/ der seng ge'i khri sna tshogs lta na sdug pa/ lha sa
169b8(dkon brtsegs): bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/ stong phrag du ma byas so de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dag dang /
170a1(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i khri rnams kyang byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'jam dpal gno nur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'khor kyi khams
170a2(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa bgyis legs na/ de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na gshegs su gsol// de nas 'jam dpal gno nur pa byang chub sem
170a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khri nyis stong dang / nyan thos kyi mchog lnga brgya dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu yongs su bskor cing mdun

170a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed dang / bdud kyi ris rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa tshangs ris kyi lhanas bzung ste'om man gyis la rnams kyis bcig nas gcig tu smra thos pa'i

170b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba dag go// bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshul khrims la gnas pa'i thos pa dang / bsam gtan la banas

171a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug ste/ yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis ji ltar 'jug ces na/ 'di lta ste lus dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug
