171b8(dkon brtsegs): de la rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa'i rnam pa yongs su dag pa dang / khams
172a1(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / rten cing 'byed par
172a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la mkhas pa'i rnam yongs su dag pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /
172a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la mkhas pas yongs su dag pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas bkris pa dang / lta ba'i thams cad yang dag par 'joms papa
172a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag go// grogs po rol rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa
172a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrub pa med par gzugs thams cad mthong ba'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa med par sna
172a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad thos pas lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis sems kyi spyod pal rnam par lta bas pha rol gyi sems shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /
172a7(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med cing chags pa med cing chags pa med par sngon gyi mtha' rjes su dran pas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yong su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
172a8(dkon brtsegs): nor mtha' yas par 'gro bas rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba yongs su dag pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad pa shes pas bsal zhing / dus ma yongs su spangs pas zag
172b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mas su das pa dang / gas pa rnamamamam thams pa dang rnal pas ngas pa' thabs ma par smras pa sangs su ga pa /
172b2(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas nyams 'og tu chung bar byed pas shes pa brtan pa yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag na
172b3(dkon brtsegs): grags pa dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste phung po lnga yongs su shes pas bsdug sus zhes
172b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa dang / srid pashin du spong bas kun 'byung ba shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / rten nas skye ba la skye ba med par so sor rtog pas 'gog pa
172b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas lam shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / las dang bya ba dang
172b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gal bas rgyu zhes pa yongs su dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / rkyen zhes pa yang
172b7(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / 'khor gsum yongs su gcod pas dus gsum du shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ye shes thams cad la 'jun
172b8(dkon brtsegs): pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag go// grogs po dag de la rnam pa
173a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa dang / rnam pa brgyad kyis yongs su dag pa ga she na/ 'di lta ste/ na nye bar
173a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi bas yongs su dag pa dang / phyi rol tu mi rgyu bas yongs su dag pa dang khams gnas la mi gnas pas yongs su dag pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /
173a3(dkon brtsegs): mthun pas yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba med pas yong su dag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang / chos
173a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis shin tu mi 'khrugs pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs
173a5(dkon brtsegs): po dag 'di ni rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa'o// grogs po dag 'di ni rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa'o//
173a6(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bag yod pa yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang nin/ 'di lta ste rgyal khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas mangs
173a7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / thos pa yongs su byang bas yongs su dag pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan de la chags pas yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab dang /
173a8(dkon brtsegs): gsung rab kyis yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa las mnyams pas yongs su dag pa dag pa dang / ye shes kyi rlom sems med pa'i yongs su
173b1(dkon brtsegs): dab pa dang / nges par sems pas rtsod pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba'i chos chung mi za bas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag rnam pa
173b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyad po de dag gis bag yod pa yongs su dag go// grogs po dag de lta bas na khyed bag yod par gyis shig/ bag yod pa la rton pa'i byang chub sems
173b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams ni bde gsum las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta skye lha'i bde ba dang / bsam gan gyi bag yod par/
173b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'o// ngan song gsum las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba dang / dung
173b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten te gsum po de dag go// sdug bsngal gsum gyis 'phogs par mi 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ skye
173b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdug bsngal dang / rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal te/ gsum po de dag go// 'jigs pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar
173b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'tsho ba med pa 'jigs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i 'jigs pa dang / 'khor la ba ga cha ba'i 'jigs pa ste/
173b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum po de dag go// srid gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i srid pa dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / gzugs med pa'i srid
174a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// drim gsu spyod ste/ 'dod chags kyi drim dang / ne sdang gi dri ma dang / gti mug gi rloma'o// bslab pa gsum/
174a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab bo// yongs su dag pa gsum thong
174a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa'o// bsod nams bya ba las byung ba'i dngos po gsum
174a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'o// rnam par thar sgo gsum sgom par
174a5(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// rigs gsum rgyun mi btsod de/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang /
174a6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gyi rigs so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gsum gsum rab tu spyong ste/ ser sna'i dri ma dang / ser snang kun du sbyor ba dang /
174a7(dkon brtsegs): gdong ba dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'dul pa'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims las zlog pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan rnams la sna pa dang /
174a8(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems dang / bzod pa las rdog pa dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams la spang ba dang / la mdzong / brtson 'grus las zlog pa dang /
174b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / gsam gtan las zlog pa dang / bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams la snang ba dang /
174b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab las bzlog pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la snang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ston pa gsum sum gyis
174b3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar ston te/ gsum gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi rig pa dang / byang chub tu bsdo
174b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / nul khrims dag par len pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / bzod cing nges pa dang / 'dag
174b5(dkon brtsegs): dang gnan rje su srung ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / brtson 'grus gces pa mi dor ba dang / byung ba med cing dor ba med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs
174b6(dkon brtsegs): su bsngo ba da / bsam gtan nyi ngar yin pa dang / mi gnas par bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / shes rab kyi snang ba dang /
174b7(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba ste/ grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rten pa 'di
174b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum gis nye bar rten do// grogs po dge de lta bas khyed cag yod par bgyi shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang de las gnan pa
175a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i byang chub kyi chos par yin/ bdag kyang bag yod pa'i rdzob bo// thugs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
175a2(dkon brtsegs): ni tshigs chung ngus dran pa nye bar gnag pa bani sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa ba ni bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang la lus kyi gnas
175a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / tshor ba'i gnas med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa dang / chos kyi gni med pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi gnas med cing rten med pa 'di na dran/
175a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o// tshegs chung ngus yang dag par spong ba bani bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ yang dag pa'i spong ba snyam pa
175a5(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs po dang / gzod pa nyid nas ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / mthon mtho ba dang / mngon par ma grub pa yang
175a6(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog cing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod pa skyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus brtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin /
175a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad la las kyi rnam por smin pa med pa yangs sor rtog cing sems gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mi dgra
175a8(dkon brtsegs): nga chos thams cad spang ba tsher/ 'dun pa skyed cing 'bangal brtson 'grus brtsom 'ing sams rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa
175b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'byung la/ brtson 'grus ma rtsom ning sems rapa 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /
175b2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad rnam par grol bar yang yid ches te/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba dang / nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba dang / phyir ning 'bal
175b3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'i phyir mthun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus brtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab du 'jog la/ chos thams cad la rlom pa med cing rdul ba
175b4(dkon brtsegs): med par yong mthong bste/ yang mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de la chos gang gi skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa yang med/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa'o//
175b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bani bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang lus dang sems las su rung ba ste/ desam
175b6(dkon brtsegs): las su rung bas dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yang mi 'dor la/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spong ba'i phyir yang mngon par brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su
175b7(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang brtsom la/ brtags nas kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs
175b8(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor la/ sems sgyu ma lta bur yang rab tu shes pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos tshul bzhin du yang
176a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod la chos rnams la gnas par yang mi byed cing mngon par rten pa yang med pa'i/ de dbang po lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
176a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ dbang po drug la rten par mi byed cing sems can thams cad kyis dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ shes pa yang gtong la/ gcig tu gnas pa
176a3(dkon brtsegs): yang thob par 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyi dad pas kyang mi 'gro ba dang / thams cad kyang yongs su thong la/ blang ba yang med cing dor ba med pa dang / thams cad du
176a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i lam la yang rmongs pa med la/ dran pa yang med cing yid la byed pa yang med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rjes su yang song la rtag tu mnyam par yang bzhag
176a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cing / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / rang rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang thob par gyur la/ spros pa ya dang /
176a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par chad pa 'di ni de'i dbang po sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi brdze ba dang /
176a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis bdud thams kyis thub par dkar ba dang // dran pa'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems cad du mi'i phrogs
176a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sgrib pa rnams kyi zil gyis mi gnon pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas lta bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par
176b1(dkon brtsegs): nan pa yang pas/ de ltar snabs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun snum pa yongs par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi nas
176b2(dkon brtsegs): bskul pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge ba'i chos thams cad mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgrub pa dang /
176b3(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mthun par bya ba'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi lam las mi ldog par bya
176b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag kyi sgom pa dang / zang zing med pa'i chos la dga' ba rab tu myong bar bya ba'i phyir dga' ba yang dag byang chub
176b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag sbom pa dang / lus dang sems kyi g.yo ba dang / bral ba'i shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan log sgom pa dang / snang pa nyid dang / mtshan
176b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / smon pa med pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dog byang chub kyi yan lag sgom pa dang / mthon dman med pa'i btang snyoms
176b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub kyi yan bsgom pa zhes bya'o// grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub ni tshigs chung ngus
176b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lam bsgom pa gang ne na/ gang 'di rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral ba
177a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i lta ba bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba
177a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i rtog pa bsgoms pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pa'i yang dag sgom pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / khags ga dang / gnog slongs
177a3(dkon brtsegs): dang thob kyi mjal ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba sgom pa dang / lus dang sems nyams chung ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' bsgom pa dang /
177a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag la bstod pa dang / gzhan la smod pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i tshul bsgom pa dang / gti mug dang rmongs pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i dran pa bsgom pa dang
177a5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom ste/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o//
177a6(dkon brtsegs): des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang / de las gzhan pa'i dge byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag kyang ba g.yod pas thob ces byas
177a7(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag de ltar na bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar byang chub kyis chos cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag la 'jug go// zhugs nas 'du byed thams cad kyi
177a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das las rgal lo// rgal nas kyang rnam par bya ste/ rnam par bltas na ma mthong ngo // mi bar ro// shin tun par nis/ rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do//
177b1(dkon brtsegs): tan pa ni gung na nA gdun par masgrubs pa ma byas par// glang ma byas par byung ba mang bar// gang byung ba med pa dul gdags pa ma nga/ dang
177b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nad pan min dun brnyan pa'o// bstan pa 'di bcad pa na/ lha'i bu khro nas sur chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul ma zeng rje ma dang bral ba rnam par dan
177b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dngul bzangs kyis/ gzhan yang 'jam dpal gan nu gyur pa la 'das kyis smras so// 'jam dpal byang chubadas sems dpa' gyur mam bsnam sa
177b4(dkon brtsegs): baMlha'i bu byang chub sems ni 'khor ba yang mi srung la 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams kyis kyang migs so// 'dus ma byas su mi snang la/ 'dus ma byas kyi
177b5(dkon brtsegs): tan rnams kyang myong ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam yang snyom la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la yang snang ngo // lho'i bu gnan yang byang chub sems
177b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi lam ni stong pa nyid kyis rnam par dag pa yang yin la lta bar gyur ba la yang mkhas cing lta bar gyur pa la mngon par nar pa yang med do// mtshan mtsha
177b7(dkon brtsegs): pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/ mtshan ma la yang mkhas shing / mtshan ma la mngon par zhen yang med do// smon pa med pas rnam par dag pa yin la/ khams
177b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa la yang mkhas shing / khams gsum la mngon par chen pa yang med do// skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/ skyengs
178a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa la mkhas shing / skye ba dang 'jigs pa la mngon par zhen pa yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems/
178a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems nges par sems rnams ni sems can chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam pa'i lta bar gyur par zhugs pa'o// lta bar gyur pa bag la nyal bar bya ba
178a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la lta bar gyur pa de dag kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ngo // de bzhin du sbyar de byang chub sems dpa' sems nges
178a4(dkon brtsegs): par sems pa ni man na ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / byung ba med pa'i chos thams cad la 'byung
178a5(dkon brtsegs): bdang / 'jig pa'i rjes su mthun pa 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa bag la nyol bar byas pa rnams kyi byung ba dang / 'jog par lta ba spangs pa'i chos kyang sna
178a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa de yang 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa med pa nyid du mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa nas bya/
178a7(dkon brtsegs): sna'i bu gzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba'o// de ci'i phyir nani/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni sems can
178a8(dkon brtsegs): kyai bsam pa rnams pa'o// 'ong ngam sa so ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa skyed pa'i phyir
178b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi nang du skye ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'phags pa'i lam du'o// 'ong ba ni 'phags pa ma yin pa
178b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba na bzod pa de sems can gyi khong du chud par
178b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni'i byung ba la mkhas pa la'o// 'ong ba'i ni 'byung ba ma yin par 'byung ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems
178b4(dkon brtsegs): dpe'i 'gro ba ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro// 'ong ba'i ni 'khor ba ni sems dpa' can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ro'i ri gang tu yang
178b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med par so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ong ba ni chos khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni rnam par thar
178b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni rnam par rtog pa gsum spang ba'i chos spyod pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba na
178b7(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa brtan par byed pa'i phyir/ 'ong ba ni dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro
178b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'ong ba ni byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i phyir te/ lha'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba zhes
179a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// de nas lha'i bu dpal
179a2(dkon brtsegs): dazangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gnonur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bgyi ba ni ga thos
179a3(dkon brtsegs): na 'jam dpal 'dri na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon dan thams cad kyi 'od de phyogs gang na mchis de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba ni gachos
179a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi ning gang+gA'i klung cu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od
179a5(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang ba zhes bya ba chos ston to// 'jam dpal bdag zhes 'jim
179a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams man tan rnams sa kyi 'do dang / de baning gzhags pa dag bcom pa yang dag pa 'dzugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzung ba de bal bgyir// denas
179a7(dkon brtsegs): dpalagano byung bas de'i na/ nem med pa'i 'a ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzim pa snyoms par zhugs sa// 'jam dpal gan n+ye pa snyoms par bzhugs mthag tu lus las
179a8(dkon brtsegs): rang mdzur po'i 'i dbyung 'didis sangs rgyas kyi nang brjod grang bcu gnyis kyi khyim gang po dngas sdang bar byas nas 'jig nyi gyi khrims mam thams cad kyi 'a ngas
179b1(dkon brtsegs): yang snang ba chen pas khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang ba dang sangs rgyas kyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rgyas pa nan
179b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od mthong nas ngo mtshar tu gyur te/ thal ma sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nus pa bcom ldan 'das 'od 'di ltar yongs su dag pa 'di gang nas mchis// bcom ldana'
179b3(dkon brtsegs): des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
179b4(dkon brtsegs): mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 'tsho'o nas/ chos kyang
179b5(dkon brtsegs): ston to// de na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa zhes bya ba dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i
179b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab po// des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyab po// ga
179b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang / 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa
179b8(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa las 'od gzor bkyes
180a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag sangs rgyas kyi ning bad+mang kyang bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir snang
180a2(dkon brtsegs): chen pos snang bar byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
180a3(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tsho gas thams cad kyang mthong
180a4(dkon brtsegs): ngo // byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de mthong zhing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
180a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
180a6(dkon brtsegs): ba kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag der chos kyi gtam chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na khyed kyi nang nas 'jig rten gyi khams ma
180a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzod der 'gro bar stob su yod/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes ston ma 'dzin ces bya ba der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das de la gso
180a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi bar spo lags so// bcom ldan 'das nis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu da
180b1(dkon brtsegs): dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes sngon ma 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su
180b2(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing mdun tu bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas de/ dpe
180b3(dkon brtsegs): na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskums pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi ning de nas
180b4(dkon brtsegs): mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa'i mdun gyi steng gi bar snang la gnas pa'i khang pa
180b5(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs par phyin to// de'i g.yog 'khor de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs par gnas pa rnams su phyin to// de dag rang rang gi stan las langs nas bral mo sbyar
180b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so// 'jam dpal bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
180b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang ba des khyod la lta ba dang / phyag rgya ba dang / bsnyen bkur byang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzidi
180b8(dkon brtsegs): btang ngo // khyod kyis 'od bkye ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bya
181a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma 'di ltar myur du 'di ltar myur bar 'od gzer 'jig rten gyi khams da
181a2(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa dang / 'di ltar myur bar byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa 'di ni skyes bu dam pa de dag gi mngon par shes pa'i rnam
181a3(dkon brtsegs): por 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dziran gyi byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab po nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'jam dpal rgan
181a4(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pas lha'i 'khor chen po de ltar 'dus de la ci nas kyang lha khrag khrig phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis bsam pa theg pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
181a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems skyes pa de ltar chos bstan to// de nas 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa ji srid du/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su lnga rnams kyi don bya ba de srid de byas
181a6(dkon brtsegs): byeng ba sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu pa de dag dang ldan cig rang gi ltar dang sbyi chog brgya rkyen dang rnangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba lta'i bu dang bcas pa dang
181a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan cig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sems kyi 'gyur ba tsam rnaMs/ bcom ldan 'das rgya sbyar sngar phyin nas de dag gis bcom ldan
181a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi nabs sa mig pas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das pa la ma du bskor bzlas nas/ phyogs pa chog tu dag snyan ma lakhod /
181b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang / lhan cig lpags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bas
181b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la
181b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam bcung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang / bde ba la reg par gnas sam
181b4(dkon brtsegs): srung gsol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chos kyi gtam kyis yang dag par mdzad/ yang
181b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzer bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// yang dag par dga' bar mdzad cing / yang dag par 'dzin du btsucun
181b6(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par gzer bstod de/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag skyes bu dam
181b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag dang / 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi brla
181b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi spongs sems can sdud pa dang / yongs su ldan par byed pa dang / thabs dang / rigs pa dang / ye shes dang / shes rab kyi rab tu dpyod dang / spobs pa sazhem/
182a1(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bskal pa grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams pa
182a2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gnas pa dag go// sems can gang dag gis dbang po drug po dag la skyes bu dam pa 'di mngon par 'gyur de dag ni byos bdud kyi yul la gnas par mi 'gyur ro nas
182a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgor ma 'dzin dang lhan cig tu 'jog rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa de dag
182a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las ltos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang/
182a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi steng chen po
182a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar bgyid na/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams der
182a7(dkon brtsegs): // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshod du ldan pa kun dga' rol bka/ 'a stsal pa/ klur dpa' ba byung kyis rgyas kyis rnams rnangs 'di bad+mang shig/ 'a
182a8(dkon brtsegs): shig/ klogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gnan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung
182b1(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ 'di'i mang ci skad bgyi bar brdung bar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal gyi
182b2(dkon brtsegs): le'u dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar bzung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i bu dpal
182b3(dkon brtsegs): brdungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi ras
182b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodado// 'phags pa dkon brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/
182b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa sa sa rgyas kyi yul bsam mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// rgyab
182b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po 'dzin midza / dan shI la dang / mu ne war ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa bo ban+d+hayi shes sdes bsnur cing nus te/ sad gas rabacad kyis kyang
182b7(dkon brtsegs): rnas gamam pab pa'o// rmu gar snad du/ ar+ya su sti ma ting bapung du pa
182b8(dkon brtsegs): pri tsananA ma ma hA yan sAtra/ dod skad du/ 'phags pa lnga'i bu blo thos rab gnas kyi zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'i mdo/ dam pa dang /
183a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
183a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i kha ba na/ bya rgod pa po'i ril/ dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pas dgra bcom pa sha stag dang /
183a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal dang / seng ge'i tog la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' ba mi dz+ra nyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / snun ngas
183a4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen rdzong dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / lhun po btsugs pa dang / spyan pa'i rgyal
183a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / rab tu mi sbrul dang / donar ba sems dpa/ legs par bsam pa sems dang/ sems dpa' ba dang / sems kyi bla gas dang / sems brda
183a6(dkon brtsegs): nga/ nor bu brtsegs dang / ri 'joms rgyal po dang / lag ma rin po che dang / sems pa rin po che dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtog tu lag bdag brkyang
183a7(dkon brtsegs): tu brnyan pa sems ca sa nga / btsur 'grus pa sa ni zung pa slongs pa gas dang /
183a8(dkon brtsegs): mam ming spang ngo // rtsib kyi ma
183b1(dkon brtsegs): rdo rjes rnam par gan dang / mtha' las rnam par gnon dang / dpag med rnam par mnan dang / mo g.yo gnas kyis rnam par gnan dang / nam mkha' ma
183b2(dkon brtsegs): da blo gros dam pa dang / khyad par blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel dang / 'gro 'grub dang / sa 'dzin dang / zla 'od dang / zla ba'i tog dang / 'od
183b3(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / 'od dpal dang / snang thob pas rnam par gnon dang / seng ge ltar rnam par gnon pas/ mngon par spags pa'i nga ro dang / spobs pa thogs med
183b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / spobs pa bshad pa dang / spobs pa dpa' ba dang / rnam par gnon dang / nyi zla'i 'od gzer mog mog por byed pa'i 'od dang / dmigs med dang / blo gros
183b5(dkon brtsegs): dpe med dang / rtag tu band dgyes dbang po dang / nor bu dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / bud mod rnam bsgyur go cha dang / rab tu snang ba dang
183b6(dkon brtsegs): par snang byed dang / mis sbyin dang / tshogs chen rab mchog rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs zab mo dang / de dag la stsogs pa
183b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bani khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mdzad
183b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag dang gnan yang lha'i bu drug khri tsam dang yang thabs cig go// lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / lha'i bu mtshan bzangs dang / lha'i
184a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg/
184a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu bdun khri sum stong dang yang thabs gcig go// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi bdag
184a3(dkon brtsegs): po lhun po dang / de dag la stsogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha ma yin gyi bdag po nyi khri dang
184a4(dkon brtsegs): yang thubs cig go// klu'i rgyal ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de dag la stsogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sem
184a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po drug khri dang yang thabs gcig go// de dag dang gnan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
184a6(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
184a7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag dang / yang thabs gcig ste/ de na bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis
184a8(dkon brtsegs): bltas chos ston to// de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa rang gi gnas na 'dug pa gcig pu dben par gyur cing nang du yang dag 'jog la btsugs pa/
184b1(dkon brtsegs): nan mangs pa med pa sems med cing sems dang bral bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'jam dpal gnonur gyur
184b2(dkon brtsegs): brngam ning shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs sa// 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa langs ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ning dpag
184b3(dkon brtsegs): mang bdag rnam pa drug tu grams so// de nas 'jam dpal gno nur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'dunas kyi/ rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa'
184b4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu 'di skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni brgyal brgya la ma na ste/
184b5(dkon brtsegs): 'a lta ste dper na/ u dum wa ra'i me tog brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ba de bzhin du/ gang dag skye ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir ni
184b6(dkon brtsegs): gsal brtag tu med pa rtog ge/ dang bral bzang pa/ shes par dka' ba'i chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
184b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya la man 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na ni chos mnyan pa yang med na/
184b8(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan med na no/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad pa yang med pas/ bdag de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kyi spyan sngar/
185a1(dkon brtsegs): rlu sa smras mams kyi dag sa rdung pa shA pa dang/ chung sams ga sa sa
185a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyi tshe khyab bdag la ni ma nur med cing the tsam med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can
185a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ 'dod chags che ba ne sdang na/ gti nag che ba/ dkar po'i chos dang bral ba/ mau dge bo'i chos dang ldan pa/ glen pa blun pa/ mi gus pa/ sangs rgyas dang bral ba/ chos dang
185a4(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun dang nga/ shastag yin pas ci nas kyang sems can 'di dag gis rgyas thos nas shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'byung ba wu dra'i nu ba nu'o// skam ma nas mang
185a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gno nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang /
185a6(dkon brtsegs): gang drag zeng me bzod pa 'di la lus kyis mngon du byed par 'byung ba 'drum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas de
185a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gco nur byur ba/ kun tu steng ba dri med bkod zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin snyoms par btsugs so// 'jam dpal gnonar gyur pa kun
185a8(dkon brtsegs): tu snang bajim bkod pa'i da 'dzin pa snyoms par bzhugs thag tu de nas de'i mngani phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyai nong ga
185b1(dkon brtsegs): nga rgya ga na/ 'a pa/ rnam par dag pa 'a stsal / nga/ yangs su ga na nga
185b2(dkon brtsegs): khyab par tse// 'di dang snang ba chen pomo gsal bar 'jog rtenapa 'jig rten gyi mun pa muban ga dang / ra ma
185b3(dkon brtsegs): rang khor yug dang / bdang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / ri rab dang / lhun po chen po gang dag yod pa/ de dag thams cad sna brten pasems
185b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gan+d+ha'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag bcugs te 'tshonang gnas pa de dag pa
185b5(dkon brtsegs): rang rang gi bsnyen bkur bdag gis nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sgron ma mthos pa'i 'od 'di ltar yid du mche ba/ 'di ltar 'od gsal ba'i sdang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig
185b6(dkon brtsegs): rten du byung ba 'di/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'dis bdag cag sems dang ba dang / lus sim pa chen po dang ldar
185b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing / sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag kyang kun tu mi 'byung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkye ba 'di su
185b8(dkon brtsegs): mthu lags/ 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsnyen bkur ba de dag la cang mi gsung bar gyur to//
186a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyiran gyi sna dang / lha ma yin gyi sgra dang / rnam
186a2(dkon brtsegs): kalding gi sgra dang / dri za'i sgra dang / mi'am ci'i sgra dang / lto 'phye chen po'i sgra dang / mi'i sgra dang / mi ma yin pa'i sna dang / bya'i sgra dang / ri dgas kyi sgra gang dag
186a3(dkon brtsegs): yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur to// rlung gi sgra dang / chu'i phung po'i sgra dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i shugs kyi sgra dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / glur byang
186a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur te/ 'ga' yang sgra mi 'byin cing / thams cad ni ba dang rab tu ni bar gyur to// yang sangs rgyas
186a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsal to// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
186a6(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i drung / sman pa dang ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi 'od 'di lta bu bkye ning des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag
186a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad snang bar gyur pa/ 'di su'i mthu lags pa bshad du gsol/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi na gad+hA'i k+Shang bye ma snyed dag gis
186a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus nas/ gsung gi 'phrin pa
186b1(dkon brtsegs): brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin gsung zhing de dag gi 'phrin las sna dbyangs gcig tu bsdus
186b2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu des bsnyen bkur ba de dag la bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gsung brjod pa/ des sangs rgyas kyi na
186b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur te/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang sgra mngon par 'byin cing rol mo sgra
186b4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgyu grag par gyur to// rol mo'i sgra de dag las mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i sna
186b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung zhing stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung zhing stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral
186b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / sbyin pa
186b7(dkon brtsegs): s+yAd de/ tshul khrims kyi sku dang / bzod pa'i sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi s+thA dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang /
186b8(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i spang / phan pa'i dngos pa tsha sgra dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang sems kyi snga dag dang / des
187a1(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun pa'i chos kyi sgo 'bum phrag du ma dag gi sgra byung bar gyur to// sgra byung ba de dag gis sems can bye ba khrag
187a2(dkon brtsegs): khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / nyan thos nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / brgya na
187a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su 'grub pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas
187a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag gis bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyed la ci rtog byas thong zhis
187a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od 'di na ci tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / ci tsam du bsam gyis mi khyaba'i sbyor ba'i tshogs dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa
187a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yin te/ 'din nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnam
187a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis ma yin no// gal te bzhin gshegs pas 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ lha'i dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad 'dil rloms
187a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// 'di 'dzin byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang sems thams cad kyis yongs su bsgoms pas/ yongs su
187b1(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed pa ste/ 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par yang bsngags pa brjod pa mthar byed par nga
187b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de lta mod kyi 'on kyang legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang / khyod la bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom
187b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
187b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsam
187b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig
187b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi 'jed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang
187b7(dkon brtsegs): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig mkhyen pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha li bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi stan
187b8(dkon brtsegs): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing zhes pa de snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas par 'dod chag dang /
188a1(dkon brtsegs): ne sdang dang / gti mug gis gzir ba'i sems can mgus pa/ dbang potshul ba shes pa dang / tham yo pa mas sa
188a2(dkon brtsegs): sa pa'i sems pa mas kyis macas kyi zhing du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas chos sen // rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
188a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sakyi thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed den/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gnon dur gyur pan
188a4(dkon brtsegs): b+ha ba mthu che ba/ shes pa che ba/ brtson 'grus che ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par sod par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ byang chub
188a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams yang dag par gzeng so pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par bdu dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ag byengad pa/ byeng chubamims
188a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rnams kyi me dge byed pa/ chos thamasas kyi gni bdu babyed pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chags pa med pa shes rab kyi tu byed pa thob bathogs pa med pa 'i srangs pa nga ldan pas
188a7(dkon brtsegs): sa byang chungs pas pa'i man na bsas kyis margyab pa ldan pa nig g+sa dade/ 'dzin thamams ca da kyi shi zing yangasasu gru bar byu dang / byang dub mams
188a8(dkon brtsegs): gas # tsho #
188b1(dkon brtsegs): par / rigs pa byang chub semam dpa dpal ba me dur byung pa byang chub sems dpa' ba mas dran pa nga
188b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu nas bsdu ba'i phyir 'od 'di bkye ste/ rigs kyi bu dag sdang ba chen po 'jig rjer du byung ba 'di'i rgyu ni med rkyen ring yin no// de skad ces
188b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gnod dur gyur pa de
188b4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas/ 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin kun tu snang ba dri med bkod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gnon dur gyur pa deng
188b5(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzid de la gnas nas/ 'od 'di lta bu 'di 'gyed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di ltar gsal ba 'di ltar rnam par dag pa/ 'di lngar lus dang
188b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i 'od 'di lta bur 'byed par mi mdzar lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / byang chub sem
188b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rtag du pi 'chad pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ning dpag du med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang+gA'i klung bye ba'i byer sdeng dag na/
188b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ning re rengs kyang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag byed ba zag khrig 'dum phrag dpag tu mer grangs med bsam gyes mi khyang ba dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de sa ma
189a1(dkon brtsegs): ba sangs lhags nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gnapas pa dag pas phyag 'am sasacas bcom lda ga pa 'dzi ces
189a2(dkon brtsegs): gsal do bam ldan 'das sngon pa thong ma thos pa'i yin dan dum dang ldan pa'i 'od 'dim bu dang snang ba 'dis dra rang 'bar ba 'das bu 'dagal sa mchis/ 'i bdapags/ desad ces
189a3(dkon brtsegs): bdas sangs kyis com lda 'das de gagis byang chu sems dpa' dag la 'din ces bka' spel to// rigs zu 'a'i rjed gyi 'ams sa ma ces ba me / ma
189a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin shegs pa dag com pa yang dag par rdzogs pades ngas rgyas grub pa zhes bya 'dugs te/ 'tshen zhes chis ca songasa'o// de nas byang chu sems dpa
189a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gnon su nur gyur pa zhes bya ba nig 'jug pa nges 'di lnga ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir 'onga' bar ba 'di lta bu'adi bkye'o// da srad ces bka' stsal
189a6(dkon brtsegs): dadang bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di sa ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
189a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzos pa sangs rgyas khrub pa de la bas pa dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / btsun pakur dgyi'adang / nubang du thug bathe ba dang / byang chubasems dpa' 'ang ma dpalagan du gyur pa
189a8(dkon brtsegs): pa byeng chupa mas ma sa pa kyi'i ma mem ma // yulas rigs kyi pa dus sa papa shes nga po ma
189b1(dkon brtsegs): med 'argyags pa'i byeng chub sems dpang thegs dra bye zas ga 'bru rdza ga dpa ga du me gradas med/ bsam gyis mi tha ba pa ga gang rigs gsu la sod+dAs/
189b2(dkon brtsegs): na mi sobs po tsho'i lag pa bskums pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang lngas bsams patsam la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi ning dag nas mi sdang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lpags
189b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// der byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
189b4(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa gal ba der lpags so// la la dag ni phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog 'phreng dang / spos kyi char dag dang / me dog ut+pal dang / pad+ma ma dang / ku mu nga dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / tsam+ba kas
189b5(dkon brtsegs): a ti mug+ha ka dang / s+ya snar dang / da nu ska ri dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / bar shi ka dang / bar shi ka chen po dang / man+da rab dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / ba ru sha ka dang / b.rug rnon po dang / zla mdog dang
189b6(dkon brtsegs): zla mdog chen po dang / zla mdog rab mdzes la sogs pa me tog gi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dag dang / spos kyi char dag dang / phreng ba'i char dag dang / phye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu
189b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lpags so// byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni sel
189b8(dkon brtsegs): sran 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu gsil zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so// byang chub
190a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lal dag na de bzhin gshegs pa la bsong ba'i skang dbyangs de res kyang stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su
190a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis gabor byed cing lkugs te/ de lta bu'i bkong pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa
190a3(dkon brtsegs): pags pa de sngags sa// byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi 'di lhags ma thag du/ de nas de'i mngal 'dres/ byang chub sems dpa 'di dag gis
190a4(dkon brtsegs): khrus/ sa gsum gyis chen pa'i 'ag rten gyi khams 'din/ sems can dbul ba dang / drad 'gro'i gyi gnas dang / gzhi rje'i 'jig rted kyi khams kyi sems can de srid ma
190a5(dkon brtsegs): pade dag thams cad nye bar ni bar gyur ro// sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med/ ne srung gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ nga rgyal gyi ma yin/ phrag dog sa
190a6(dkon brtsegs): mayin/ se sas pa 'a/ 'a ba bas ma ya// khabs pa yin/ yongs su gdang bas ma yid de// sems can thams cad dbyams pa 'i sems dang / mcheg du ga' da sa
190a7(dkon brtsegs): nas pa // des kyang chu sa dran ya ya meng / ngas ma sa ba dag ma sa na
190a8(dkon brtsegs): gas kyis pang pa sa ma cam pa ma sa sa lda sa de da gags pa sa ma ma sa@
190b1(dkon brtsegs): ba sangs rgyas tha pa dbas pa mam pas byag 'tshamate/ bam ldan 'das la lan 'asum pas rang byas nas sangs pa mang 'gras med pa byas /
190b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig pa nas bya ba dang nge ba na la sems par bdugs nas rang rang po sman lam las byung ba'i pad+mal regs tshogs 'dab ma 'bum drag dum dang ldan pa'i b.rab sring po
190b3(dkon brtsegs): la skyil mokrung bcas de 'dug par gyur to// de nas gnas brtan 'od srung cher pos chos kyi tshe 'phrul chen po de mtshar rmad du byung ba de dang / me dag gi mar dang / spos kyi char dang / bye ra'i
190b4(dkon brtsegs): rbar de dag dang / sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po sgra 'byin pa de dag dang / snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dag gis pus mo rubatsam
190b5(dkon brtsegs): khebs par gyur pa yang mthong / 'khor phal po che lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
190b6(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsrer dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur snang ba dag kyang mthong ngo // de ras gnas pas
190b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig du gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba
190b8(dkon brtsegs): bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin du dri ma med pa'i nal// me'i dam pa sobs bcu po ngan
191a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya gangs bsags pa// bsam las gan lam mchis yid gnas mun pa selab po// sa wa yul rnam par chub khyo dang mtshungs ma mchis
191a2(dkon brtsegs): ngasal pa zag zug brgyar sbyin dang ngul ba legs par spyad// bde gshegs kyang kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis/ bzang sangs na du sangs dang na
191a3(dkon brtsegs): pasangs bcu'i stobs ldan po// yon tan mnga' ba 'jam mdzad bdag gi ji tso ma stsal du gsol// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas bsal pa brgya dag rnam sa kyang /
191a4(dkon brtsegs): spong ba mi mnga' dgyes pa gzhal du ma mchis brnyes// sras dang sras mo btsun mo rgyal srid spya dang sna tshogs btang / sbyin dgyes thams cad gtong ba bdag gi the tshom gas la drags pa
191a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sngon chang tshabs dang glang po shing rdang pung chung rtsal/ gdong la dgyes pas dpung dang na bza' khrag khrig brgya yang bdang // thub pas nal zas gsang nan de bzhin pho brang 'khor
191a6(dkon brtsegs): kya la/ sbyin ga ba ga tu byas da gzigs khyod ngan/ zang na rnams nges par spyod zugs pa lag sa dgangs pas// rdul bral su lus gdangs
191a7(dkon brtsegs): zug pa ma nga/ skye zhes na pa du 'drur du zhes pa'o// man sal/ da
191a8(dkon brtsegs): ngas sa sa rje ga shi ni kyi migs men// grangs ra gyi sa das pab sring parang gyu /

191b2(dkon brtsegs): ma la/ smra sa du tu

191b4(dkon brtsegs): zhin tu gnas pa bdag gis skyabs gyur cig/ rdus zal byed kyi sa las dum bu dum bur bcad cing ni// srang la btsal ba mdzad cing dam dum lkug ros ma lus par/ kun nim
191b5(dkon brtsegs): btang ste phrag nor phra gu cig ma bdang // rdul bral 'ong mdzad thugs rje mnga' bathe tshom gcang du gsol// lha tshogs gnas pa'i ri bo g.yos shing dgur ni rje 'gyur la// lha ma yin kyi
191b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi gnas mal rgya mtsho bas gyur cing // mkha' la gnas shing rgyu ba'i dgung snga dogs sar lhung gyur kyang // rgyal ba grags pa mdzad pa khyod ni log pa'i tshig mi gsung // de nas
191b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bskong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba
191b8(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'jig rten du byung ning ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan rgya chen po 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
192a1(dkon brtsegs): ched ldan 'das pa 'od srung chen po la 'dis ces bka' stsal lo// 'od srung 'di la bu'i gdam dzes pas/ khyongs chen ga byas mthong zhe
192a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dre ni can thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan par gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dil tshu
192a3(dkon brtsegs): shing bslad par bgyi'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhiran gshegs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang pal bde ba'i srang du gsol// de skad ces gsol
192a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid lazung shig dang bshad par bya'o//
192a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar can pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung 'a
192a6(dkon brtsegs): nAng ma dpal gnan nur gyur pa kur sdang ba dris med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ni nga 'dzin la stoms par nags te/ de'i tshe mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi nang gang+gA klung
192a7(dkon brtsegs): ge bye ba'i byems dag 'od kyis snang bar byas nas/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag b+he ba khrag zig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs mid
192a8(dkon brtsegs): sa ma gyis mi rgyab sa ga yang dag par drul ni/ 'dzig rten gyi rnams pa dzang di grags nas// de dag giseng ba zeng nang pa la mag pas byag 'am
192b1(dkon brtsegs): sas pamar babyas nas/ yang sa pa ga sa ma na bdus pa nga// danas patsam ldan das la med kun pa srung pas
192b2(dkon brtsegs): gsaman/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'adi dag se mthus me dag gi char 'du pa ra btubab cing babs kyi char dag dang / byen ra 'a dag ra btung
192b3(dkon brtsegs): las la sran 'bum thag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sla 'byen lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'ong srung da de bzhin no// byung chub sems dpa
192b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi mthus me rtog car 'dis bu 'di dgar ba dubabacing bapos kyi char dang / phye ma'i cher 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la se las ni 'bram phrag mang ba dag kyang ma rnas
192b5(dkon brtsegs): bar sgra 'byin te// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang mi gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de dag ni nyen
192b6(dkon brtsegs): thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung 'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
192b7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po gang dang / byams pa chen po gang dang / phan par 'dod pa gang dang / spyod pa gang la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa dang / tshul khrim
192b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gang la gnas pa de la mi gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang la spyod pa'i lhag pa
193a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa de la yang me pyod pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa'adi dag ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin sa smonas
193a2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhugs pas de dag nanan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis bag par ma nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs pa khonar dang do// 'od srung rigs kyi dri
193a3(dkon brtsegs): da / 'di sa ras la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa rnams dang / theg bra la gas dra nags pa'i byung chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sheg sa the na/ rkyen thos dang /
193a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// de skad ces gsol bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos
193a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du ngag dang spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji la bu dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus

193b2(dkon brtsegs): pathams cad yangs su gdong ba dang / chogs da ga du med pa yongs su 'dzid cing / tshigs des rlomasems med pa dang / smon pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson du
193b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa yongs su 'jogs par byed cing pha rol du phyin pa de dag la rtog pa med pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos
193b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bkod nas phyis byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar bya'o snyam yang sems can rnams dang / byang chub mi dmigs pa ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
193b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnams par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtar 'od srung chen pos
193b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas nam yang sems can 'ga' yang
193b7(dkon brtsegs): ma skyed pa'i legs par gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos rnams la yang dgod par bgyen/ sangs rgyas kyi
193b8(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams lnga smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de lta bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis lus thams cad rnams par 'jig
194a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mi nus te/ ting nge 'dzin de'i ming yang mi shes na/ spoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta ci smos de de na
194a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dang /
194a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dpa pade lta bu 'di dag mthong bar bka' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od sru

194a5(dkon brtsegs): srung de la mod kyi khyod nyid ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi gnas thob pa yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ci lta bus gnas pa rtogs shig/ de nas gnas brtan 'od
194a6(dkon brtsegs): sbed chen pas com ldan das kyi ma na das/ byang drab sams dpa' de dag slong la mdzem bus gonas pabs thor/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang po

194a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / rab tu gnas pa yang mashes ni byed pa dang / ci son pa dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad dum shes ma mthong ngo // de nas byang chub com ldan 'das la gnas

194b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa // bde bar gshegs pagan du de mchar de// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag dadung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthob par de ltar ni de'i ding nge 'dzi
194b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pas kyang de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dag la spos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bung rigs kyi
194b4(dkon brtsegs): mo su nig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i de

195a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa la mchis par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bsar te/ bdag ni ba'i ding nge 'dzin rnams thab pa lags pas/ ma
