199a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na sngar bdag su dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstar pa bshang bar bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gni rnam
199a5(dkon brtsegs): shes par dka' ba'i gzhi rnams dang / gnas med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / spros pa med pa'i ga ni rnams dang / brjod du med pa'i gni rnams dang / bstan du med pa'i gan rnams
199a6(dkon brtsegs): dngulab mo'og ni rnams dang / bden pa'i ga'i rnams dang / chags pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / mi byed pa'i gni rnams dang / song banyid kyi ni rnams dang / mtshan ma med pa'i
199a7(dkon brtsegs): mas dang / sro med pa'i rnams dang / de bani dung bskur pa ga ni rnams dang / yang dag pa'i mdza ga ni rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings kyig ni rnams dang / mdungs pa
199a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams dang / rlung med dag rnams dang / rang ba ring ba'ig ni rjes dang / sangs rgyas kyig ni rnams dang / chos kyi pa rnams dang / dge' du byas rnams
199a9(dkon brtsegs): rishes 'angs pa rdzogs pa 'tho ba pa'i ga ni rnams dang / khams gsumam rnam pa meng kyig na rnams dang / chos thams cad mi legs pa'i gzhi rnams dang / tshas thams cad kyi
199b1(dkon brtsegs): sa mas dang / yang rnams dang / da rnam rnams dang / pa med pazhag ga pas / nga gyur ba sa /
199b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpa la phyir pa 'di sems te/ lha'i bum gros rab gnas 'dini sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba lhag par byas paza mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spongs pa dang ldan pa yin gyis/
199b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag 'di dang lhan cig tu dri ba bsan pa bshad par bya'o snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i
199b4(dkon brtsegs): bu khyod ni zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kho bo dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad pa nus sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang
199b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal de khyod gsung bar mi mdzad/ brjod par mi mdzad/ 'dod par mi mdzad cing
199b6(dkon brtsegs): yi ges yang mi brjod/ sgra yang mi gsan par ldan/ bdag gis de bzhin bstan par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te khyod can par mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/
199b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed/ sem par mi byed/ reg par shes mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ gtong bar mi byed cing thos nas kyang gzhan dgal
199b8(dkon brtsegs): ston par mi byed pa ldan/ kho bos kyang de bzhin bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yi ge med pa/ sems med pa/ sems dang bral ba ste/ ming gis
200a1(dkon brtsegs): brjod cing ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lnga'i bu 'di dag ni rtsong las chos bsad pa stan par 'anal gyis sa
200a2(dkon brtsegs): myogs 'di ci khyod ce pa bu dag la chos sde ga ba ci gsung ga/ 'jas dpal gyis smras pa/ ske bu ban na ra 'dod pa rnams skyon par ma byed de 'dzin par
200a3(dkon brtsegs): brnams la yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ lha'i bu bdag tu 'dzin na can 'dod par 'gyur la/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin na can 'dod par
200a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang yer 'dzin pa yod pa de ni 'di snyam du 'di ni ston par byed pa'o// bdag ni can pa'o// bdag ni bshad par bya'o snyam du sems pas dran
200a5(dkon brtsegs): rdugs pa gsum gyis chags pa yin te/ gsum gang rten/ bdag tu dmigs pa dang / sems can du dmigs pa dang / chos su dmigs pa'o// lha'i bu gang yang 'dzin pa dang papa
200a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dilam dus su la byad rnas rnas pa ma du/ rnams rnas smra
200a7(dkon brtsegs): pa / sna ma
200a8(dkon brtsegs): sa pa pa sa ma ma ma 'aM/ l+r-i sa sa kyis lum pa 'a
200b1(dkon brtsegs): canas kyangam ldog pa cing kyisrang du bsan pa bshad pa legs sa sogs so/ 'jam dpas kyis smras pa/ 'e bu nu rnam par mdog ga/ byang chubasams dpapag rdzog paran
200b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chung mngon par rdzogs par bachad ste/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'angam dpal gdalas ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu 'dod rtags las spong ma
200b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes sngang las ldog go// gti mug las ldog go// sred pa las ldog go// ma rig pa las ldeg go// 'khor bar skye ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi bar las ldog go// chu las ldeg go/ lta ba las
200b4(dkon brtsegs): ldog go// ming las ldog go/ gzugs las ldog go/ 'dod pa'i khams las ldog go// gzugs kyi khams las ldog go/ gzugs med pa'i khams las ldog go// nyan thos kyi spyod pa las
200b5(dkon brtsegs): ldog go/ sangs rgyas kyi supyod pa las ldog go/ rtog pa las ldog go/ 'dzin pa las ldog go// mtshan ma las ldog go/ dngos por 'dzin pa las ldog go/ chad par lta ba las ldo gau go// rtag
200b6(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba las ldog go/ bladra ba las ldog go// dor ba las ldog go// bdag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go/ sems can du 'du shes pa las ldog go/ srog tu 'du shes pa las ldog go// gang zag
200b7(dkon brtsegs): du dushes las ldog go// ying la byed pa dag las ldog go// chags pa dag las ldeg go// phyin log dag las ldog gi// 'deg chags pas ldog go// 'dreg cegs la lba ba las sdug so/
200b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzo tshogs kyi ba las byung ba las lwa ba'i rnam pa drug cu cu gnyis las ldog go/ sdeb bdag las ldeg go// phung por lngar 'dzin pa dag las ldog go// phyi nang gi skye mched thams ca sas
201a1(dkon brtsegs): ldog go// khams rnams las ldog go// sangs rgyas su 'dushes pa las ldog go// chos su 'du shes pa las ldeg go// dge 'dun du 'dushes pa las ldags
201a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// bdag ches sen par 'gyur ro// bdag sems can grol bar byed par 'gyur ro// bdag bdud 'dul bar 'gyur ro// bdag shes thob par 'gyur
201a3(dkon brtsegs): ro// snyam pa'i 'dushes de dag las ldog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcul rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rtog par mi byed do// dbang po
201a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do// mtshan rnams la ni rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi ning gi bkod pa rnams la rdog par ma byed de/
201a5(dkon brtsegs): nan thos kyi dge 'dun phuran sum tshogs pa la rdog par ma byed cing / rdog pa thams cad las ldog ste/ lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang de las ldog pa de ni ma ldog pa yin
201a6(dkon brtsegs): thug pa/ 'a ma das gra na rdze/ ma dngas nyis smras pa/ 'dzim/ sangs cas kyi gas pas ma ldog go// sa pa sa kyi ldogs mtsha ma med pa
201a7(dkon brtsegs): shi sas ma rdzog na sa ci bye sus ma ldanan ba'i sa mi ga / du su pa las mi gas+ho/ dus smras pa/ 'ams
201a8(dkon brtsegs): de ga ces byang chub sems dpa' gang rig padang rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rdeg pa'i chos de dag las ldog pa de ni ris na ldeg pa zhes bya'o// nis gsung ba ci ga las
201a9(dkon brtsegs): ni pa med pa las mi ldog
201b1(dkon brtsegs): ldag pa sa dag mchis pashesasas/ 'o tem mchis pa zhis sam/ 'on tem mchis pa dang ma mchis pazhigags/ 'on de mchis pa yang malags/ masnatshas pa
201b2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags panig lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag ni/ yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa dang med pa yang ma yin/ yong
201b3(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na gang las ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / legs pa ma yin pa
201b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / log par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de 'dzin par mi byed yongs su gtong bar mi byed/ mtshan mar me byed pa de'i phyir ldog pa zhes ste/ de ni yod par yang bstan par mi bya/ med par
201b5(dkon brtsegs): yang bstan par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te yod pa dang med pa las ldog par gyur na/ de ni skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te yod pa las ldog par gyur na/ rtag
201b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur la/ med pa las ldog par 'gyur na chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa dang chad pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
201b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni rtag pa'i phyir yang ma yin/ chad pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// lha'i bu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sngon ma byung bar 'gyur ba'o zhes 'du shes kyis yod pa ma yin
201b8(dkon brtsegs): par yongs su shes par zad kyi/ de la ni chad pa yang med/ rtag pa yang med de/ lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa yin no// bsan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu khris mi
202a1(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal
202a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dang / zhu ba dang nu blag bgyi ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bcud kyis gshegs so// 'jam dpal
202a3(dkon brtsegs): byes smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa lam pyod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin to// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de gang na bzhugs/ 'jam dpal
202a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu deni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni mi gda'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal de khyod kyis thams cad mthong na/ nges reb
202a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// lha bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa' ci'i srang du/ de skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bas blangs zin to// de ni kho ba'i mdun na bzhugs so zhes gsung da
202a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ bu 'do sa ma du se mas/ 'o ba mdun nis bya btsunag mnas ma/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'ang mdang nam pa phekhams lags so// 'a ma pas kyis smras pa/
202a7(dkon brtsegs): du bzhini gshegs pa yang 'dres ste/ rnam 'i khams me no// de ci'i phyir chen/ chos thams cad rna ma'ang dang mnyam pa'i bar nam mkha' ces bu yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa yang de lta ba
202a8(dkon brtsegs): yin bas rnam ma' dang de bzhin gshegs pa den gnyis su med da gnyis su bya mad pa'i byor ro// ng+ge'i bre / pas sa byed de bzhin gshegs pal par 'ad ra/ mtha' 'di bang du drung ba
202b1(dkon brtsegs): ni lung ba kyang dam par brtag par meba'o// de nas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa de'i rmi bar pa badregs bgru ba rdes pa bani pa/ cha mnam bzhin du 'bres pa yangs pa/ badz+ra man
202b2(dkon brtsegs): bsum khri cis stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag du rin po che'i khri stan lha'i dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyi bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing / khre bsan re re la mA
202b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dag sprul to// de nas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas ji lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs byin gyis brlab
202b4(dkon brtsegs): na 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyi rlabs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dir/ rnam par rgyu ba'i pad+ma gang dag yin pa de dag dang / khang pa
202b5(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar sngang la
202b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar byed cing phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar 'khod do// de nas pad+ma dag la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa gang dag yod pa
202b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang khang pa brtsegs pa dag na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la/ sgra dbyangs gcig tu tshigs bcad 'di dag gis
202b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsod do// gang+gA'i bye snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas bye brag mang khyod kyis mchod// byang chub mchog gis spyad pa btsal mdzad pas// de skang mi mchog khyod ni
203a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa lags// thub pa mtshan gyis yongs su spras gyur pa// sku mchog srid pa gsum na lA de ste// 'dren pa gang la mi dang srog dang ni// gang dag
203a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis chos ni 'grol ston// rnam par 'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad// bzod pa brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gangar bsten// khyod kyis shes rab sring gsum thogs ma
203a3(dkon brtsegs): mnga' yegs mthar byes byed la phyag 'tshal lo// gang nag chos rje lnga dang mas mchod pa'i// 'jig rter 'dren pa la ni 'dun 'gyur ning // seng pacing la mos par byed pa yi// min
203a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rjen dag gi 'dren par 'gyur// gang dag sngon byung de bzhin gshegs pa dang // gang dag phyogs rnams bcugs pa'i 'dren pa dang // de dag gis ni mtshan med steng pa'i chos/
203a5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin mtshan nyid med pa dag tu bsgoms// 'di la rang bzhin sems can gang yang ni// skye dang 'chi ba dmigs su yod zin ning // 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba yod min de// chos rnams
203a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad nam ma' 'ji bzhin no// je ltar ma yis snyam pas gyur pa// srang yang de bzhin cang du yong min ldar// de bzhin chos rnams sgyum 'dra ba dang // rmilam lnga bur bde bar gsheg
203a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas sas gang dga' las brje byes kyi// 'jig ches khams rnams 'di ni sbyid byas dang // 'dus byas snang par bzong pa gang min pa// babad pa den sbyin las kyang par rabs
203a8(dkon brtsegs): bya 'das kyi du sa tshas// nal bye sa sa/ yi mas da sa mam sa/ nga ra mi mchigs sa rgya mi nga sa/
203b1(dkon brtsegs): gang ba med thor na// gang dag med pa 'a mas 'das/ ches nam de la 'dags pa bzod bam pa/ dems mi rnamam ngam par chad pa'is// gang ma ma dadag ga tu
203b2(dkon brtsegs): yod bsal pa bye ba mang por snyam dang // shing na dpung chung khri stan sbyir byas kyang // des ni 'di la grol ba mi 'thob bo// mi mchog gang dag mya ngan 'das pa dang // de dag gis kyang sems
203b3(dkon brtsegs): can mang bkrol ba// mkhas rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa yis// chos rnams de ltar mkhyen pas rnam par grol// sangs rgyas 'byung dang yul du gnas pa dang // de bzhin
203b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan la dad pa thob par dkar// mi yi srid pa'ang rnyed par dka' bas na// rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la legs brtson gyis// mi khom brgyad pa thams cad rnams spangs shing // khom
203b5(dkon brtsegs): ba phun sum rnyed dka' thob gyur la// bde bar gshegs bstan la dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i// mkhas pa rnams kyis rigs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod// sgral 'chel cing 'dug par ma byed par/
203b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thos gyur nas rtag du nan tan gyis// khyod kyis rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas bsten la// des ni mi rnams dam par 'gyur bar byos// chos smra'i dge ba shes gang yin bsnyen
203b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis la sdig pa'i grogs la lan 'gang ma sten cig/ sems can kun la sems ni mnyam gyis la// sems can de la nam yang ma rlom shig/ tshul khrims ldan dang mang du
203b8(dkon brtsegs): thos kyis la// rtag tu brag ngam zed dang bsod snyoms spyod// g.yel ba med par shing drung srin gyis la// brkus te bor ba mchog lam sdod cig/ 'dus byas 'di dag thams
204a1(dkon brtsegs): cad 'dus byas man// mtshan cing gtsu pa'i sreg tu 'drug yin// dam pa'i don gyi mub ci ga shes byas la// myung duganan yang byang chub dag pa
204a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ drang po lnga rnams snum bzhin du ltos// nang gi skye mched drug dang phyi'i drug/ de dag grong srong 'dra bar gsungs pas na// de la nam yang sen par ma byed cig/ 'dod chags ni snga
204a3(dkon brtsegs): rang ba nin stong pa nyid// gti mug nga rgyal yongs su rtog pas bskyed// rtog pa de yang ma byung byung med par// de ltar shes na 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur// de nas sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su
204a4(dkon brtsegs): bcang pa de gasdus pan/ 'khor de las srog chags se ze'is song bla meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// dge slong lnga brgyani len pa med par zag pa rnams pas
204a5(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par brel lo// dge slong sum brgya na chos rnams gachos rtse mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slongam sum stong yang chos rnams pa chos kyi mag rdul me
204a6(dkon brtsegs): drim dang thal ba rnam par dag go// dge bsnyen bdun sang dang / dge bsnyen ma snang dang // khwa'i bras ze bdun sang rang chos rnams sa chos kyi mi ga rdul med ci rjem dang thal pa rnam pa ga
204a7(dkon brtsegs): byang rlabs mas dpa sum brgyas de 'i sle chos pa bab pa ba 'o// sang ga sum gyis chen pa'i 'dig na gyi khams 'dis ma 'dre 'dug mes te/ gams ra
204a8(dkon brtsegs): ba du dub sa// 'gul ra bral/ su tu bcu 'ayul/ ldes rab cwa rjes/ brar cu chu 'o// danas bcom ldan la yul banas par pa bus 'dis kyis pas ma'o//
204b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ldan sa pa kyis so bsum gyi song chen po'i sa na gyi 'ams 'drenam pa dra du badrug yos pa dang / byang chub sams dnga'i rjes brnags pad+ma gdas
204b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag na mchis pa 'di rnams ches pa mo'i de lta bu ston par bgyid pa dang / 'khor 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang / wa'i bu bye brag 'di snyed ngus pa dang / byang chub sems
204b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bye ba brag mang po 'dus pa 'di dag su'i mthu lags/ de dag skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bul 'dis ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu
204b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'jam dpal gnor nur gyur pa'i mthu yin te/ des bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun du snang ngo // de ci'i phyir ne na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar deng de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam dpal
204b5(dkon brtsegs): gnon nur gyur pa/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam
204b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs su ni 'u brag byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di
204b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ga non nur gyur pa de 'khor 'dus pa 'din mi gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu khyong re zhig slong sas
204b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de de'i bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bkod pa chen pos de bzhin
205a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa pal bde 'a bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'ang sa dpal gan dung blang ba du la mas na/ sa par mams bye nas
205a2(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur ba bdud sde dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i ding nge 'dzin la sems par shugs mang ga drang nas
205a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i mdo la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud gnas bye ba brgya phrag ji sred pa de dag thams cad mgo mig por gyur to// bdud sdig can de dag kyang rang rang gis
205a4(dkon brtsegs): lus nas shing 'khogs la nas bzer bar gyur nas/ lag pa khar bal rte cing 'gro bar 'gyur to// de dag gis lnga'i bu mo rnams kyang rgas shing 'khegs la nas bzer bar gyur pa dang /
205a5(dkon brtsegs): rang nga gi gzhal med 'ang dag kyang rnyings gang rab tu 'jigs la sman mun nag du gyur bar mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdug can de dag skrag cing dngangs la ma ched cing snang lugs/ skul
205a6(dkon brtsegs): bra zhes byed par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du rnam par rtog sde gang dgis bad cag badrung kyis nas rnams 'das bu gnas skabs su gyur ba 'de'i rgya ni gang rkyen nigang man/
205a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di don me la shU sdu'o// de dag nam pa sa pas skye pas nas la gzhi gyu pas pa
205a8(dkon brtsegs): mas / 'i sa kyi ma // sa pa
205b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'angam dpal gnon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba deng ltar bdud snye kyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dang nge 'dzin la sems pa shug ma
205b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i mthu yin te/ khyed la 'che ba 'ga' yang 'byung bar 'gyur gyis/ ma skrag shig lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis sgra de
205b3(dkon brtsegs): yang thos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming yang thos nas yang rgya cher dngangs shing skrag de/ bdud kyi gnas de dag thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas bdud na de dag gi
205b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sprul pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs ngag yongs su skyobs shig/ grogs po dag yongs su skyobs shig/ de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag
205b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ khyed cag deng nal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
205b6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gal ba der song shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje dang ldan pa de ni sems can 'jigs par gyur pa rnams la ma 'jigs pa stsol bar mdzad de//
205b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam tha bstsal pa gsus cig sa susmras nas/ 'ang du mi snad ya rgya// dadas bdud ste 'bar ca byam ma mdu ma nga ma
205b8(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cirigs gra la logs la gnas ze cing lag pa lakhar ba la nin pa zhin du 'dob ning skad cig tharang cig lung tsam gcig la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
206a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas grub pa gal bder dang sa lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'thams cad lngas sa na sa
206a2(dkon brtsegs): / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di la bu 'di dag las yongs su bsu bdugasol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag yongs su bskya bajugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das sa
206a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa ni mi dngo ma lags kyi/ 'jas dpal gnon nur gyur pa gcig klu'i ming ni de ltam lags so// de tse'i slad du can/ 'jam dpal gnon du
206a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i mang thos na/ bdag cag 'jigs shing dang ngas la skrag par 'gyur te/ 'che 'pho bsam du 'chas cing ma mchis par 'gyur bsam du 'tshal ba'i slang du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
206a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis bdud sdig can de dag la 'dis ces bka' stsal to// sdig can dag de de bzhin no// ji sad smras pa de banid de/ ji ltar 'angam dpal gnad dur gyur pas yongs su smin pa dang /
206a6(dkon brtsegs): bar dbye ba med par sems can rnams kyi dor byas pa dang / byed par gyur pa de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba brag 'bum gyis kyang sems can rnams kyi rinam mdzad pas mi mdza ba sa
206a7(dkon brtsegs): b+he n-i lnga 'a ma pa la gan nur gyur pa pa cag bu'i ming yongs bsgrubs pa des sangs rgyas bye zla 'dum gyi mtshan yongs su bslags pas na byeng cag sdug bsngal ma
206a8(dkon brtsegs): pa rig par mi 'gyur ro// denas bcom ldan 'dasas dzang rdzo bdi dag gis ngas kyis gsopa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'ang 'dim grus papas seM 'as
206b1(dkon brtsegs): mags pas/ bam ldan 'das pa tsun padag zhes padas rgyas par gyur ba gang lags badren pa 'tsha lagasas// ma rdza das kyis ga'asu /
206b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ongs kyi bar du re shig 'di ning du sdod cig dang / de khyod cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di las yongs su thar bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gnon du
206b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ting 'dzin de las langs te stan las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'a bum phrag du mas kyang yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar / lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang / klungangan
206b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i bum phrag du ma sil skan 'bum phrag mang po dag tu gsil ning me tog ut+pal la dang / pad+ma dang
206b5(dkon brtsegs): ku mu dang dang / pad+ma dkar po'i char dag rab tu 'bebs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bkod pa chen po dang rnam par rtse ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
206b6(dkon brtsegs): song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan
206b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
206b8(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug gam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snyoms par 'jug lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byed kyis deng che
207a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di sgrub pa de de bani ni gshegs pa gang las pas// khyod kyis ti dun bslabs nas srong gsan/ 'a ma pa' tshas gsalas/
207a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang gi che bdag gis ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pa de bas shing bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs pa de'i chen/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub chugs srid par yang mgyur lags
207a3(dkon brtsegs): so/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis gang las ting nge 'dzin pasgrub pa de thos pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan/ 'jam dpal gyis gsolapa
207a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bsam gyis me khyab pa'i yang ces bsam gyis me khyab pa/ grangs ma mchis pa'i yang ces grangs ma mchis pa/ 'das pa ro'i tsho
207a5(dkon brtsegs): dus na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+dA ra ba'i dri zhes bgyi ba rig pa dang nabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa yang dag
207a6(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyi son pasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byungs/ de ting nge 'dzin pasgrub pa de gsung bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las bdag gis 'dud bye dkyil 'khor bamasas
207a7(dkon brtsegs): ngan par 'ag par brjid pa di'i dzin pasgru pa gyis pa ma so// bam ldan 'das kyis dag sum pa/ 'jam bul bsgrub pa da ga pang med/ 'ang pa ba mams
207a8(dkon brtsegs): mas med ma tha na/ du la ma ca ma pa mangs pa dzin mings/ kris sags mes ma
207b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dis byang chu ba sams dpa' dang rag sdu'apa par bas cing dang chags kyi sems rnam par 'arig par babyed pa dang / shesang rnam par 'dig ci ni sung gsems rnam par
207b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyir pa dang / ga mus rnam par 'jig cing gti mug gi sems rnam par 'jig par bamed pa dang / phrag dog rnam par 'jig cing phrag dogags mis rnam par 'dreg par
207b3(dkon brtsegs): padang / nga rgyal rnam par 'jig ci nga rgyal gyi sems rnam par bgyid pa dang / 'chab pa rnam par 'jig cing 'chab pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyed pa dang / khro ba rnam pa
207b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig cing khro ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / yongs su gdung ba rnam par 'jig cing yongs su gdung ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / 'du shes rnam
207b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig cing 'du shes kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / lta ba rnam par 'jig cing lta ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / rtog pa rnam par 'jig cing rtog pa'i
207b6(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / len pa rnam par 'jig cing len pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin pa rnam par 'jig cing 'dzir ba'i sems rnam par
207b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par bgyid pa dang / mtshan ma rnam par 'jig cing mtshan ma'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / srid pa rnam par 'jig cing srid pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa
207b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa rnab par 'jig cing rtag pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / chad pa rnam par 'jig cing chad pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / phung po rnams rnam par
208a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig cing phung ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par babyed pa dang / khams rnam par 'dzabacing khams kyi sems rnam par 'arig par bgyid pa dang / ma
208a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig cing skye mched kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / khams gsum pa rnam par 'jig cing khams gsum pa la dmigs pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa
208a3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'i shu pa de dag dang ldan na ding nge 'dzin de 'thob po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/
208a4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de 'theb ste/ ba ni gang lags she na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug dang / g.yo ma mchis pa dang / zab pa dang / bdeg pa thams cad yongs su gding bas
208a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' tshas pa ni ba de dag dang ldanan/ ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan// ti pe na
208a6(dkon brtsegs): de banig lags shen/ bsrub ma mchis padang / de dzin pa'i tshig gis dan bcu' bu dang / 'dregs kyang bang gi stong ba yul ma lags pa dang / ches thams cad pa rje
208a7(dkon brtsegs): bste bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos pani pong dag dang ldanan ting nge 'dzin de 'thob po// bcom ldan 'das gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos pa ni de nga ldanan
208a8(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ bani gang lags she na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pa sring ba dang / sbyangs pa dang / tshul khrims dang yo byad bsrungs pa dang
208b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / 'du rjemamachis pan myong pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' tshas can pa de dag dang ldananas/ ting nge 'dzin pa ma bya// sa
208b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ches pa ni dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ bani gang lags rten/ tshul khrims mthams pa dang / tshul khrims maram ze dang / chum
208b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims mi rjen pa dang / tshul khrims nag nog ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das
208b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ bzhi gang lags she na/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spong ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la
208b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag par mi dmigs pa dang / bzod pa la gnas pa dang / sems can rlom sems ma mchis skye/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ ding nge
208b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ ba ni gang lags she na/ stong ba nyid kyi chos sgom ning gang
208b7(dkon brtsegs): zag la rlom sems ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pasgom ning mtshan ma yongs su spong ba dang / smon pa ma mchis pasgom zhing smon pa'i sems yongs su spong ba dang / chog
208b8(dkon brtsegs): cir dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang bzhi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa de dag dang / chos de dag dang ldanan bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam
209a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin de 'thor po// bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me dag mnar dzes/ ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa der ba
209a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de las ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos shing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me teg mnA ra'i dri de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs
209a3(dkon brtsegs): bdagra bcom pa yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ nor bu dang rin po che dang / glog dang nyi zla thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od ze ces bkye ba byung bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'ad
209a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' khris ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs so// de nas
209a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol gto// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas ci tsam du deng nge 'dzin de legs par bsgrubs shing ding nge 'dzin
209a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pas/ badrang sdi ldan 'a ga sug pa'i rnam pa 'dis rung bkyis bded na // des thos pacos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis me dang ldan pa na bral 'don
209a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'aba' zhig gi bdud sdig can 'di dag 'di ltar mi sdug pa'i rnam par byas so
209a8(dkon brtsegs): sngams ri'is cid kyis de sar me bka'o// de tso'i gror nen/ shA ri'i bu 'dis ste/ 'ja ma dpal gzhon dur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi ni
209b1(dkon brtsegs): klas byas med pan/ bdud sdes gang dga' ba pa de dag thams ca ca 'di ma pa'i gnasas pas ma gyur par byer ro// denas bcom ldan das ces pa yang rdzu/
209b2(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs 'di mthong la/ ci nas kyang bdud sdig can 'di dag sngon gyi kha dog rgyas pa dang ldan par 'gyur bar gyis zhes
209b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi brlabs de btang ngo // byin gyi brlabs te btang ma thag tu de nas bdud sdig can de dag sngon gyi kha dog rgyas pa dang ldan par gyur to//
209b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can de dag dang / bdud kyi 'khor de dag la smras pa/ sdig can dag gang la mig gis 'du shes dang / gang la mig tu lhag par
209b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / gang la mig gi mtshan ma dang / gang la mig gi tu lhag par dmigs pa dang / gang la mig tu mngon par chags pa dang / gang la mig gi rlom sems dang / gang
209b6(dkon brtsegs): la mig bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / gang la mig gi rten dang / gang la mig la mngon par zhen pa dang / gang la mig gi spros pa dang / gang la mig gi nga'i ba nyid dang / gang
209b7(dkon brtsegs): lamig kun du srung ba dang / gang la mig bsgom pa dang / gang la mig blang ba dang / gang la mig dor ba dang / gang la mig tu rdog pa dang / gang la mig tu sems pa dang /
209b8(dkon brtsegs): la mig yongs su 'grub pa dang / gang la mig 'gog pa dang / gang la mig skye ba dang / gang la mig tu 'dzin pa dang / gang la mig yod pa de la ni khyed bdud kyi las bar chad

210a6(dkon brtsegs): chos 'ong ba yod pa de la ni khyed bdud kyi las par chad byed pa'i yul yod// sdig can dag gang la mig med pa dang / gdal mig gis 'du shes med pa dang / gang la mig dus
210a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dzin pa med pa dang / gdul mig gi mtshan ma med pa dang / gang la mig du mngon par chags pa dang / gang la mig gi rlom sems med pa dang / gang la mig bdag gir
210a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa 'a pa dang / gang la mig gan med pa dang / gangal mig sa mngon pa zhin pazed pa dang / gings tshig sa smras pa meng ba dang / gang la ma ga 'i rnyed med pa dang /
210b1(dkon brtsegs): lam ga kun du spang ba med pa dang / gang la mig bsgom pa med pa dang / gang la mig blang ba med pa dang / gang la me gdor ba med pa dang / gangal mig du rtog pa med pa dang / gang las
210b2(dkon brtsegs): sems pa med pa dang / gang la mig yongs su grub pa med pa dang / gang la mig 'gog pa med pa dang / gang la mig skye ba med pa dang / gang la mig tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / gang la mig 'ong
210b3(dkon brtsegs): bamed pa de la ni khyed kyi gnas med de// yul med do// bdag po med do// stobs med do// dbang phyug med do// mthus gzung ba med do// sdig can dag de bzhin du gang la rna ba dang rtswa
210b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / lce dang lus dang / yang dang / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang chos med pa dang / gang la chos kyi 'du shes med pa dang / gang la ches su lhag par 'dzin pa med pa

210b7(dkon brtsegs): bdang gang la chos kun du srung ba med pa dang / gang la chos bsgom pa med pa dang / gang la chos blang ba med pa dang / gang la chos dor ba med pa dang / gang la chos su rtog pa med pa
210b8(dkon brtsegs): dang gang la chos su sems med pa dang / gang la ches yongs su 'grub pa med pa dang / gang la chos 'gog pa med pa dang / gang la chos skye ba med pa dang / gang ches su 'dzin pa
211a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / gang la chos 'ong ba med de la mi khyed kyi gnas med do// yul med do// bdag po med do// stobs med do// dbang phyug med do//
211a2(dkon brtsegs): mthus gzung ba med do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de lta de ltar chos bstan pa des bdud kyi 'khor de la bdud khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
211a3(dkon brtsegs): tu sems bskyes so// bdud kyi 'khor de las bdud brgyad khri bzhi stong na chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas bcom ldan
211a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa 'di mchis lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
211a5(dkon brtsegs): cag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i slang du'o// de nas bcom
211a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dpal 'khor 'di phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lta bar 'dod kyis khyod kyis
211a7(dkon brtsegs): smin cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' chos dang / chos 'phags dang / chos kyi grogs dang / nyi ma dang bdud kyi mtshon cha dang / 'jam
211a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdig pa bzhi dang / zhi bsrung ba dang / rnam tshul srung dang / chos rgyal rnam bsgrags dang / de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' gnan dgal sbas pa/ rigs kyi bungs
211b1(dkon brtsegs): sa sanas na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gi rdzus rgyu ba sa bus bye sa ra ma gi bram sa sa/ 'jam dang la gan gyur
211b2(dkon brtsegs): tshog 'di sa ces smras ma thag tu/ de nas de'i med la byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de la sa langs te/ langs nas kyang rang rang gi lus dag bstan no// dranas
211b3(dkon brtsegs): zung chubs pas dpa'agab cig gi lus nai re ra ba tsam mo// kha cig gi lus ni dpag chad brgyad khritsam mo// kha cig gi lus ni dpas chang 'dum ze dang / drug khri dang /
211b4(dkon brtsegs): ze dang ba ni shrI dang / gsum zi dang / gi ze dang / waM tsam mo// kha cig gi lus ni dpag tshad lnga stong dang / bzhi stong dang / gsum stong dang / nyis stong dang / stong tsam mo//
211b5(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gi lus ni dpag lnga brgya dang / bani brgya dang / sum brgya dang / nyis brgya dang / brgya tsam mo// kha cig gi lus ni dpag tshad lnga bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / sum cu dang /
211b6(dkon brtsegs): dang bcu rnam mo// kha cig gi lus ni dpag tshar lnga dang / ba ni dang / gsum dang / gnyis dang / gcig tsam mo// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi lus ni 'jig rten gyi 'am
211b7(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed 'di'i sems can rnams kyi lus ci tsam par khru phye dang bzhi tsam ste/ de dag gi lus de la bu dag kun du nong ngo // de'i chen stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte
211b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'dir gang du byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba sha stag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs ni than 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtes tsam sa
212a1(dkon brtsegs): med de/ byang chub sems dpa' di dgra gis 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ning dbye ba phrag 'bram dag sang bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal
212a2(dkon brtsegs): gnon nur gyur pa bstan las langs te/ bla gos brag pa gcig tug par nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i stangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal
212a3(dkon brtsegs): masbyor ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te nus nas nu b.lung bstan sla du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar
212a4(dkon brtsegs): gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag rab 'phyogs 'ga' ni gzu'o// de skad ces gsol
212a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpa' khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la lung cu sa
212a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ngas nus pa de dang de nyid kyilan gdab pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces dka' stsal ce sprul pa dang / 'jal dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
212a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams padang ldan pa'i ba das ma ldan 'das kyis mnan nas/ com ldan 'das la'adas kyis gsalan// com ldan dus byang chub sems dpar bya
212a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' zhes byin/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i srang du byang chub sems dpa' nas pa rtse/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jas dpal gnon nur gyur
212b1(dkon brtsegs): bal sa sem pa 'phrul/ 'ang mdapa ma tshas thams ca rdzogs pa'i byer byang chub sems dpa' nas bya'o// la ma pal ga gnags pa
212b2(dkon brtsegs): dpar byang chub sems dang 'ashes bya ba chos thams cad po de dag gang she na/ 'jam dpal 'disal byang chub sems dbus ma ga regs par byed do// rlub rtogs par byed do/
212b3(dkon brtsegs): sna rtogs par byed do// lce rtogs par byed do// lus rtogs par byed do// yid rtogs par byed do// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mig rtogs par byed / delta
212b4(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid rtogs par byed ce na/ 'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mig rang bzhin gyis song / zhes bya bar rdzogs par byed kyang rtogs so/
212b5(dkon brtsegs): skam du rnam par mi rtog go/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar rtogs par byed kyang rtogs so snyam du rnam par rtog go/ gzugs
212b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / sgra rnams dang dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar rtogs par byed kyang rtogs so snyam du ni
212b7(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog go/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag rtogs par byed do// ji ltar rtogs par byed ce na/ stong pa dag tu rdzogs
212b8(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ mtshan ma med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do// smon pa med pa dag tu rtogs byed do// 'dod chags dang bral ba dag tu rtogs byed do// zhi bdag tu rtogs par
213a1(dkon brtsegs): myed nga/ dben pa dag zhu nags par byed de/ dngos pa med padrug du rtags par byeng du// gam pa med pa ga tu rdzogs par byud do// sgrub ma
213a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu rdzogs par byed de// ring ba med pa dag tu rdzogs par byed do// 'gro ba med bdag tu rdzogs par byed de// rdo'i tshong med ba dag rtogs par byed de// bdag pa med pa /
213a3(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs par byed do// rnam par rig pa med pa dag tu rdzogs par byed do// shes pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do// mthong ba med pa dag du rtogs par byed do// ma smras
213a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu rtogs par byed do// spros pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do// bdag gi med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do// rtog pa'i kun nas bsrang ba dag tu rdzogs par byed
213a5(dkon brtsegs): do/ rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslang bdag tu rtogs par byed do// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa'i rna dag tu rtogs par byed do// snum bu dag tu rigs par byed
213a6(dkon brtsegs): / rmi lams bu dag tu rtogs par byed do// mig yor lta/ bu ga tu rtogs par byed do// brag cha la bu dag tu rtogs par byed de// chu shing gi sring ba lta bu dag tu rtogs par bye
213a7(dkon brtsegs): ri dumi gnas bdag dang / sring po med pa ga dang / gsagangs dang / gas bdag tu rtags par byed de// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'ad sa
213a8(dkon brtsegs): gas par byed // zhesang rigs par bye // ga zug zigs par byed // ga rdzogs par byed che/ 'di chags dang / shesang dang / gnyisu sa sa ni mangs
213b1(dkon brtsegs): ga nas pasapa pasan pa sa par byed / yangs su mas pa dngas kyang meng ba dag dang / med padag dang rnam pa med bdag dang/ skyes pa med pa sa du
213b2(dkon brtsegs): par rig gyi drag tu rtogs par byed de// 'jam dpal gnan yang byang chub sems dpas 'dod pa'i khams rtogs par byed do// gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khyams
213b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed de// je ltar rtogs par byed ce na/ bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed do// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
213b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi spyod pa rtogs par byed do// ji ltar rtogs par byed ce na/ sems can 'di dag 'dod chags spyad pa'o// 'di dag ni zhe sdang spyad pa'o// 'di dag ni gti mug smad
213b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ 'di dag ni cha mnyam pa snyam pa sbyang ba'o zhes bya bar rtogs nas/ spyod pa la mkhas pa rtogs par byed do// gang gi shes pa'i rnam pa bstan pa gang yin pa de yang rtog
213b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing rtogs nas kyang ji ltar de dag rnam par grol ba de lta de ltar chos ston to// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems cad thams cad rtogs par
213b7(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ ji ltar rtogs par byed ce na/ sems can thams cad ming tsam ste/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa dang / sems can 'di dag thams cad ni sems can gcig ste/ sem
213b8(dkon brtsegs): can de yang sems can med pa dang / de ltar yang rnam par rtog pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rtogs par byed pa de'i tshe byang chub rtogs par byed
213b9(dkon brtsegs): sa bya'o// gang gi tshe byang chub sems
214a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin// de sad ces byas/ mig dang na bdedun ni// rang banin snang par rtogs byed kyang // thugs su rdzogs par ma byed ba/ byang chubasam
214a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// snga dang lce yang rang bzhin gyis// dngos po med par rdzogs byed kyang // rtogs snyam rtog par mi byed pa// byang chub sems dpa'
214a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes kyang bya// shes rab can gyis lus dang ni// yad ni stong par rtogs byed cing // rtogs nas yang dag sred dbyed pa// byang chub sems dpa' nas kyang bya// gzugs
214a4(dkon brtsegs): dang sgra dang dri dag dang // ro dang reg bya yid 'od rnams// thams cad stong par rtogs byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// gzugs dang tshor ba rdzogs byed
214a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes kyang ning bzhin te// 'du byed rnams dang rnam shes ni// sbrum lta bur rtogs par byed// lnga phung rmi lams bu dang // mtshan ma nying med par mtshan gcig par/
214a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang rdzogs sam ma rtog pa// byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// nang ni drung ba ma yin to// smos pa med cing 'dus ma byas// de dag lang gis bstan pas// mi da ngas
214a7(dkon brtsegs): yodam man// 'dod chags ne sang kun rtog gis// kun nas bslang bar rtog par byed// rtog pa de yang byung min te// gtan tu dngos po med po med pa yin// gangs
214a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag las byung // rnam par rdzog brgyalas rtse/ rgyu yang skabs bskyed pa sa// lnga pa de yang dmigs su med// khams gsum thams cad sang ba sa// denani med par
214b1(dkon brtsegs): / ngasas 'a / ma pa / 'as su rgyu / smras
214b2(dkon brtsegs): med de badzin te// de ngag mams car med ma yin/ 'did chags myang dang ni rdzang sring // de bzhin gtisug sbyong ba dang / sems can myed pa gang yi pa// bams ma
214b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog par byed// sems can thams cad sems can gcig/ sems can de yang yong min par// shes rab can gyis de rtogs kyang // sems can de la rlom sems med// chos
214b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun gyi 'byung ba ni// phyin ci log las skye ba ste// gang dag phyin ci log rdeg pa// de ni log pa'i mtshan nyid do// shes pa kun la mkhas pa ni// gang gi sgra la'ang chags pa
214b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa rtogs gyur pa// byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// rang gi sha rnams gtong byed kyang // de la gnas pa yod min ning // ji bzhin rjes rtog su gyur pa// byang chub sem
214b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhes kyang bya// tshul khrims pha rol byin gyur kyang // tshul khrims la ni rlom sems med// sangs rgyas tshul don gang yin pa// skye med 'byung ba med pa yin// byams
214b7(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can khyab byed kyang // sems can dmigs su yod ma yin// sems can don ni rjes rtogs pa// de ni ming gis bskur po yin// 'dus byas kun la rnams sa
214b8(dkon brtsegs): nga'i// brtson 'grus bcom la gnas gyur cing // 'jig rten song bar ring gnas ni/ byang chub dam pa rtogs par byed// de ni bsam gtan bsgom byed kyang // del
215a1(dkon brtsegs): rten pa yod min ning // gnas med dmigs pa yod min pa de ltar mkhas pa sgom par byed// bag chags lnga ba'i nyon mongs rnams// shes rab
215a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gyis gcod byed kyang // chos kyi dbyings la bye ba dang // bcad pa'i rlom sems yong ma yin// bam po gsum pa// / de nas bcom ldan
215a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po gzhi nas bzla ba dang ldan pa sems dang po gzhi nas
215a4(dkon brtsegs): batha ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyed/ bcom ldan 'das tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po gni las bzla ba dang ldan pa zhes ban+de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar
215a5(dkon brtsegs): ma kyang du sangs su ga sa gas pa sa du nga yangs sa / sems na las ma rnam
215a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// la ma dngul gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis rgyal bltar na// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'dod chags gnalas
215a7(dkon brtsegs): sapadang / bra gzhis rnas pa dang / ga zugs nims brnas pa nasems dang po gnilas pacwa bad ldan pa nas pan+de'o// de nas kyi tha thams rabasas
215a8(dkon brtsegs): sa la ma la ban du gyur pa dzis phrums/ la mdas ma ny-id nga chags dang / ne sda dang / ga mug dag ga nilas bzlas pa/ byang chubs
215b1(dkon brtsegs): dngas pas zhims ng+gA lags na// deg byas pams na skye rnams kyang sems dang zags pas ca da na pa lags par 'gyur ro// ts+tsha na
215b2(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'jam dpa' 'ad ltar de dag na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gni las bzlo bar bgyid pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bresa'i
215b3(dkon brtsegs): sa so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gzhi las bzla bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ lha'i bu 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang /
215b4(dkon brtsegs): mug dag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang / ra thos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldeg pa rnams kyis gan las bzlas pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/
215b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jab dpal 'khor 'dis khyod kyi dgongs pa'i gsung mi rtogs shing ma 'tshal na/ the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur gyis rnam par phye ste bstan du gsol/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
215b6(dkon brtsegs): ba lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems// 'dab chags bya steng gi bar snang la chu ba de gzhi las 'das sam/ 'on te 'dug sngam/ lha'i bus pa smras pa/ 'jam dpal gni las
215b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das so// 'jam dbar kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bon de las pas mangs de skad ces/ gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gni bzlo bar byed pa de
215b8(dkon brtsegs): dag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams zhes bya'o// zhes sngon ta lnga'i bu gang
216a1(dkon brtsegs): la rten med pa de ni gzhi las 'da' ba yin no// gang la lhag par chags pa med pa de ni gni la 'da' ba yin no// gang la mngon par zhen pa de ni
216a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhi las 'da' ba yin no// lha'i bu gang la rter med pa dang lhag par chags pa med pa dang / mngon par zhen pa med pa de ni gzhi las 'da' ba yin te/ gni las 'da' ba nas
216a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de nig ni med pa yin no// gni las 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni brtag tu med pa'i gzhi yin no// gzhi las 'da' ba zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba med pa'i gzhi yin no// gan
216a4(dkon brtsegs): las 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i gzhi yin no// gni las 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni dngos po med pa'i gzhi yin no// gzhi las 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni 'ong ba med
216a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzhi yin no// gzhi las 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni 'gro ba med pa'i gni yin no// gni las 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni skye ba med pa'i gzhi yin no// gzhi las 'da' ba zhes
216a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni dmigs pa med pa'i gan yin no// gzhi las 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni rnam par rig pa med pa'i gzhi yin no// gzhi las 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni rdul med pa'i gan
216a7(dkon brtsegs): ba nisas nga pas bya ba ni rnams pas med 'i// yin no// gshems 'da' ba zhes bya bdeni sring pogani yin no// gnalas 'da' banis bya bar ni nga
216a8(dkon brtsegs): da nga'i gni yi no// gnilas nga shes bya ba 'i bye pa'i ga yod ro// gzhims 'ad sa zhes bu'i rin mog med pa'i gni len no// gnams sa
216b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni ga zung ba med pa'i gni yon no// gshesas 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni gnas med pa'i gni yin no// gni las 'da' ba zhes bya ba deni grang ba med pa'i gnayo na/
216b2(dkon brtsegs): las 'da' ba zhes bya ba den dor ba med pa'i gni yin no// gan las 'da' bde ni phyir mi zlog pa'i gzhi yin no// lnga'i bu chos de la rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par ne
216b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ shes par mi byed/ lta bar mi byed/ nyan par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ gtong bar mi byed/ skyed par ma
216b4(dkon brtsegs): byed bgog par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po gni las bkra ba yin no// lnga'i bu de lnga bsar/ byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang chos kyi
216b5(dkon brtsegs): dbyings de dang / mnyam pa nyid de dang mtha' de dang thabs la mkhas pa des 'dod chags gzhi las par bya'o// zhe sdang gti mug gzhi las bzla bar bya'o// mig gi rten gzhi la
216b6(dkon brtsegs): bzla bar bya'o// yid kyi rten gyi bar du gzhi las bzla bar bya'o// gzugs la lhag par chags pa gzhi las bzla bar bya'o// rnam par shes pa las lhag par chags pa'i bar du
216b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhi las bzla bar bya'o// ming gnyis las bzla bar bya'o// gzugs ga ni las bzla bar bya'o// rgyu gni las bzla bar bya'o// lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad gzhi las bzla bar
216b8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// ma rig pa gzhi las bzla bar bya'o// srid pa'i sred pa gni las bzla bar bya'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'jug pa'i bar du gni las brgya
217a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga gnilas bzla bar bya'o// khams gsum pa la mngon par rten pa gnilas 'tha bar bya'o// ngar 'dzin pa dang /
217a2(dkon brtsegs): ra mi badzin pa gni las brda bar bya'o// 'jig tshogs gni las bzla bar bya'o// 'jig tshogs la lba pa ga ni las bkra bar bya'o// lba ba'i rnam padrug cu cu gnyis gan \u0f7f
217a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa dang / chos su 'du shes pa dang / dge 'dun du 'du shes pa gnalas bkra bar bya'o// bdag tu 'du shes pa dang gnan du 'du shes pa gan
217a4(dkon brtsegs): bzla bar bya'o// sar 'du shes pa gni las 'azla bar bya'o// chur 'du shes pa dang / mer 'du shes pa dang / rlung ngu 'du shes pa dang / nam mkhar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par
217a5(dkon brtsegs): bgani las bzlar bar bya'o// byin ci log bzhi ga ni la bzla bar bya'o// sgrib pa lnga dang rnam par shes pa bzhi dang / log pa ning brgyad dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam no/
217a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhilas pa/ bar bya'o// zhwa'i bu ma do na byang chub sems dpas rtog pa thams cad dang / yongs su rtog pa thams dang / rnam par rdzog pa thams cad dang / mtshanam pa
217a7(dkon brtsegs): ca dang smras pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cadangasa'adzin pa thams cad dang / mngon pa rten pa thams cad dang / 'du shes thams cad dang / rlom sems pas
217a8(dkon brtsegs): bdadang chags pa thams ca dag ni las bzla bar bya ste/ lha'i bu rnam grangs des na/ khyod kyis 'di sa chos de la mngo par rin pa med pa dang / skrag par chags pa
217b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa gang yid par gnams 'das panas pa pa yin par rig par byar// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'ang sa dpa' ga da gyur pa lags panas tsu
217b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gang gi phyir khyod kyis 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ngang
217b3(dkon brtsegs): po gzhi las bzla ba 'di bstan pa 'di legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'jam
217b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal gnor dur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po dang gzhi las bzla ba 'di bstan pa'i sems gzhi las badz+ra 'di ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ba dang mtshungs
217b5(dkon brtsegs): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de sar smras pa de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis ngal bram ze'i rme
217b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes lung bsnun
217b7(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i tshe/ shA ri'i bungs sems gzhi las bzla ba 'di dang bral bar gyur te/ shA ri'i bu de ni ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
217b8(dkon brtsegs): dang po gni las bzla ba de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'ji skad bstan pa 'di yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba'i dod
218a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems gzhi las bzla ba thams cad ni sems dang po gni las bzla ba lags so// de ci'i slad
218a2(dkon brtsegs): duzhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sems gzhi las bzla ba thams cad ni skye ba ma mchis pa lags la/ skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang pog na
218a3(dkon brtsegs): las bzla ba lags pa'i srang du'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni khri sum song gis mi skye ba'i tshes la bzod pa thob bo// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med pa
218a4(dkon brtsegs): bag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lnga'i bu dung phyur phrag drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'du
218a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ganas pa na 'a srung chen pas 'dis pas na no// bcom ldan 'das de// ra'ajam dngalag nor du gyur pas/ ches bstan pas sems can 'din kyi na
218a6(dkon brtsegs): ngani la mdapal bzhin du gyur pa / 'ad btsang ba lags sa// ma bam gyis sbrus pa/ btsun pa 'ad srung rdu pa'i bani garang byed pa ma med de// ma bya
218a7(dkon brtsegs): na bdun pa'adi srung chen po chos thams cad byed pa med pa la byas pa byang med pa yin pas/ khri ba dzas dga' yang mi byed 'jig par ma byed pa'i phyir ro// la phen sems
218a8(dkon brtsegs): ga ya sa nga ma ba gyi kyi do/ sem dme pa tsho 'dud pa'i das ci bzhin me mamam pa phrul gyi
218b1(dkon brtsegs): mthanas pa ba un par byung napapa pan dka' byed pam ma te/ dbanan gzags pa yangs mes datha ma pa rnams pa ma / sa
218b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// bcur pa 'od srung chen po gang dag byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dka' ba byed pa yin no// zhes yang dag par smra ba brjod par gyur na/ de dag ni yang dag par sla bo brjod
218b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// de ci'i phyir ne de/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma bskyes mi brnyes pa ches par ma 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / kan thos thams ca
218b4(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma rnyed mi rnyeng rnyed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung chenu pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal
218b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad kyis ji zhig ma brnyes/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag ma brnyes so// sems can ma brnyes so// srog ma banas so// gang zag ma
218b6(dkon brtsegs): brnyes so// rtag pa ma brnyes so// chang pam brnyes so// phung po rnams ma brnyes so// khams rnams ma brnyes so// skye mched rnams ma brnyes so// ming ma brnyes sa so gzug
218b7(dkon brtsegs): ma brnyes so// 'dod pa'i khams ma brnyes so// gzugs kyi khams ma brnyes so// gzugs med pa'i khams ma brnyes so// rdeg pa dang yongs su rdeg pa dang / rnam par rtog pa
218b8(dkon brtsegs): dang rgyungadang sme ba rnams sa brnyes so// phyin cilag rnams ma brnyes so// 'dod chags dang ne sdang dang / gti mug dag ma brnyes so// 'jig rten 'ad dang / 'jig rten pa sa

219a3(dkon brtsegs): ma ze gyi ba mas pang ldan pa rnams kyis rnyed par byaste// de bring dgan dkab babyed pa le // sangs rgyas rnams kyis mam ba gang yin pa dang
219a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas pa gang bya de yang byis pa sa so'i skye bo rnams byed de// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal je rig byed/ 'jam dpal

219a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dung ba byed de// btsun pa 'ong srung chen po sangs rgyas com ldan 'das rnams kyis ma da mi mdzang / mdzad par mi 'gyur ba chos pang dag min pa de dag rgyas pas
219a8(dkon brtsegs): lce rnams byed pas na/ po bo de dag med byed pa yi ni// de nas bcom ldan 'das la'aja ma dpalas mo nur gyur pas 'dis ces pas pa'o// ma rnam
219b1(dkon brtsegs): mtho'i chos la bzod pa thob pa skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes dgyi bde ni pang lags/
219b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas na ci zhig thob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam ngal thob pa ni yang med pa'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos la rjo
219b3(dkon brtsegs): bathob pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa de ni thob pa med pa ste/ thob pa med pa/ thob pa dang bral ba/ ma thob pam bshig pa yin pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal mi ste rje
219b4(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba/ bzod pa dang chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa zhes bya ba bzod pa dang / chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa zhes byang

219b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba bzod pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par byang ba med pa zhes bya ba bzod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
