224b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams zhes bya bar rtogs cing lhag par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / ches dang / dge 'dun
224b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar rtog cing lhag par byed pa dang / 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ba'o zhes bya bar rtog cing lhag par byed pa dang /
224b7(dkon brtsegs): kun nas can mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'thab pa dang 'bras bu dang / mngon sum du bya ba nas bya bar rtog cing ldog par byed pa dang /
224b8(dkon brtsegs): rgya chugs rang ngas dra nga / ma sa rgya ming pa'i grus pa dang/ byeng 'i ba sa ma tsho pa bangs rgya thongs/ sangs rgyas
225a1(dkon brtsegs): bar rtog cing lhag par byed pa dang / 'di ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rig pa rnam par grol ba dang / 'dod cha/
225a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'o zhes par rtog cing lhag par byed de/ lha'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams ni/ lhag par bya ba de lta bu de dag la rtog cing lhag par byed do//
225a3(dkon brtsegs): mi gti mug can de dag rtogs par bya ba'i chos la sgro 'dogs shing yongs su rtog par byed de/ de dag gi sgo 'dogs pa la 'dogs pa la 'dun pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
225a4(dkon brtsegs): bldag par bya ba med pa ston par mdzad do// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba ste/ 'jam dpal legs sa
225a5(dkon brtsegs): legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis lhag par bya ba med pa 'dri bshang ba legaso legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa legs so zhes bya ba
225a6(dkon brtsegs): byin te/ 'jam dpal leg so leg so// gal te bstan par bya ni de skad bstan par bya'o// gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smraso//
225a7(dkon brtsegs): mal la zhig tu 'byung ba'i phyir 'i ba da du ngas na/ dmal pa dzes ma gas kyi thag sa te/ grod bskyen pa ga par ma byed padesan myong rab tu byung bamanan nas
225a8(dkon brtsegs): 'o/ 'i sarnas pa/ las thas khyo sa ngos nyi sa rtson/ masadasas rgyas sa pa/ tho maldan das kyis bsnyen rdzogs parjo ga nyis mam
225a9(dkon brtsegs): mamam pa rgyang zhes bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang bag tu 'dzi pa dang / rlug pa dang mang bdang/ dardul dang / log pas 'dus
225a10(dkon brtsegs): bdang / shA dang / gtitsug tu nyung ba dang / 'dod pa'i las dang / gzus kyi khasasnyed pa'i khams lung ba dang / lhag par 'dzin pa dang / rloms ses dang ge ba du len par srung bste/
225a11(dkon brtsegs): bu mngor na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad du snang ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rnams kyi lag tu ltung ba dang / nges par 'byung ba mi shes zhing yongs 'dzin por byed po gang yin pa de ni lngarje
225a12(dkon brtsegs): bu mi mnyam par bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin no// de la mnyam par bsnyen par rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ gang mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / smon pa
225a13(dkon brtsegs): mamed pa mnyam pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid de/ lha'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag mngon sum du bya yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin smra ba cing rtog
225a14(dkon brtsegs): bzeng pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / kun du rtog pa med pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa gang yin pa de ni lha'i bu mnyam par bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin no// lha'i bu
225a15(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mang 'dod chags sel bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang sel bar byed pa dang / gti mu ga sel bar byed pa dang / med pa dang marig pa dang / 'deg tshogs dang 'jig
226a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi lung las byung blta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis sel bar byed pa dang / byin ci log nas sel bar byed pa dang / nyes par spyong
226a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum dang / log pa nyid brgyad dang / kun nas min sems kyi dngos po dgu dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sel bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par bsnyen
226a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa gzhi la rten nas sa bon thams cad skye ning rba dang / gel ba dang / sman dang nags chal
226a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam kyang skyel de dag 'phel bar rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// gA'i bu de bzhin du gang dag bstan pa 'di la rdzogs par byed pa de dag kyang / bsnyen par
226a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa ni sa pa'o// lha'i du 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen pon thams cad kyi rten yin te/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin du bal
226a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ tshul khrims la bananas chos mngon pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro// desangs po dpas dang / da sman
226a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dul pa la rdzogs pa nos bya ba bzhin du tshul khrims dang / dang pal rten pa'i byang chub kyi phyobs dang mthun pa'i chos thams cad skyezhing rdzogs pa
226a8(dkon brtsegs): / 'i bu ma 'i mi gsus ba da ga sa pa ma da pa bags da sa pa mangs pa
226b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bca lda das rnams kyi thos thams cad kyi bsnyen par rdzogs payind// bu'i du ga bsnyen par brdegs par byed
226b2(dkon brtsegs): mang dge bar bsnyen par rtogs par byed pa yin gyi ma mnyam pa' ma yin do// lnga'i bu gzhan yang de lta rab tu drang zhing / de lta bsnyen par rdzogs pa la khom
226b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ad skad ces/ rigs kyi thugs de khyod bslab pa len par mi byed pa de ltan/ khyod bslab pa'i ding pa yin no// zhes rjes su bstan pa
226b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jal dpal gyis smras pa/
226b5(dkon brtsegs): dri chos thams cad ni ma blangs pa yin pas lha'i grwa gang tshul khrims len pa de ni khams gsum len pa yin no// lha'i bu
226b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems/ bslab pa de gang yin snyam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gang lags pa'o// 'jam dpal
226b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang gang yin/ lce'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sngo pa zhes bgyi ba ni lus sdom pa dang / ngag sdom pa dang
226b8(dkon brtsegs): yid sdom pa ste/ de ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhe bgyi'o// 'dza dpal gyis smra ba/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyed semA/ lus dang ngag da dkyi ma pa mi byed par mi 'gyur ba'i lha gang yin pa de la sngon
227a1(dkon brtsegs): po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ btsod ka 'am shel gyi kha dog lta bu'o zhes gdams par nus skam 'am// lha'i bus smras pa/
227a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu'o na ji skad brjod par bya/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa zhes brjod
227a3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ste/ de ni lus kyi las sam dag gi las sam/ yid kyi las zhes gdags par rngo ma thog go// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ji snyam du sems/ gang mngon par 'dra
227a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med pa de blang bar nus snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam 'apal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de'i phyir kho bo ni de las bsams nas de
227a5(dkon brtsegs): rmad ces pang bslab pa yin par mi byed pa de bsrab pa 'dod pa yi no// zhes gyun to// lha'i bu lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang /
227a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa'i shes rab kyi sgrupa pa zhes bya ba yin par yang mtha' dend kyis chog par byas/ rgyal khrigs par migs pas lhag pa'i tshul rnams kyi bsgrub pa zhes byal/
227a7(dkon brtsegs): tshags pas rnam pa'i sems tho bas pa pa zhes bya'o// shes dbu ma mags pas zhug pa'i gas rab kyi bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// sems rnaMm pa med pa dang / rnamapa
227a8(dkon brtsegs): ma pa yas rnam par ma pa med pa dang / ba mad pas byag pa'i thams kyi zab pa zhes drus/ tshul mi sa rnam pa song ba dang / rlo sems mdapas rnam par
227b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi brlab pa zhes bya'o// shes rab rtog pa med pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / zla ba mnganas
227b2(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gang gis sems ma rnyed pa de tshul khrims su rlom sems mi byed do// gang tshul khrims su rlom sems mi byed pa nges/ ting
227b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin mi dmigs so// gang gis ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs pa des shes rab mi dmigs so// gang gis shes rab mi dmigs pa de la the tshom thams cad mi 'byung ngo // gang la
227b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mi 'byung ba de bslab pa ma len to// gang bslab pa mi len bde bslab pa 'dod pa zhes bya'o// gang bslab pa 'dod pa de phyir mi 'ong ba'o// gang gi phyir
227b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'ong ba de rnam par dag pa de bral ba'o// gang bral ba de zag pa med pa'o// gang zag pa med pa de yang dag par zhugs pa'o// gang yang dag par zhugs pa de la bcos pa
227b6(dkon brtsegs): med do/ gang la bcos pa med pa de nam mkha'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ni bcos pa med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang de ltar slob pa de ni slob par mi byed do// gang
227b7(dkon brtsegs): slob par mi byed pa de ni slob par byed do// gang la slob ce na ci la yang mi slob ste/ gang gi tshe ci la yang mi slob pa de ni yang dag pa'i bslab pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o// gan
227b8(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu de ltar rab tu byung zhing de ltar bsnyen par rdzogs pa de la kho bo 'di
228a1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces rigs kyi bu gal te khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khyams thams cad kyi dang pa byin pa yongs su longs spyod bar byed cing mang
228a2(dkon brtsegs): su srung ngas par ma byed par la khyong rdul rnams yongs su dag pa yin no// zhes sgra'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las dgongs te desang smom/ 'jam ripal gyis smras pa/
228a3(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i bu ga len par byed ba dang/ ba bar byed pa de ni myong par byed do// gang dmigs par byed pa rani spyod par byeng ro// gang sems sa byed bar ngani stong bar byed do// gang rdzog par bye
228a4(dkon brtsegs): pade ni sbyong bar byed do// lha'i bu gang len par mi byed pa dang / bde bar ma byed pa dang / dmyigs par mi byed pa dang / rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / rtog par mi byed pa deni tsi
228a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyong bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni gtan dag pa phyir ro// lha'i bu de lta bas na/ so so'i skye bo rnams ni dad pas byin pa sbyong bar byed kyi dgra bcom pa dag ni ma yin no// de ni myo
228a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ sa so'i skye bo rnams ni len par byed/ bde bar byed/ dmigs par byed/ rlom sems su byed/ rtog par byed cing bdag ni len pa yin no snyam du rtog par byed// 'dzin ston
228a7(dkon brtsegs): ma gyung ba ba tshanam tsug par byed pas de dang na byung bar byung ba yin pa gyur/ sa nga ba gyu phyi mang pa 'gro bar skye ba 'grub par byer cing der ltung bar byed // sa
228a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa dag ni song pa gzhan du gnogs pa'i lus gzhan dga' yang 'grub par mi byed pas de dag no tso mang srung bar mi byeng // dedas paso sgoms de len pa na mang 'khor su
228b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pas len to// lha'i bu 'khor sum yongs su dag pa de yang gang zhe na/ len par byed pa'i bdag gang yin pa yang mi dmigs// sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa po gang yin pa yang
228b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs/ blang bar bya ba'i bsod snyoms gang yin pa yang mi dmigs pa ste/ lha'i bu de ni 'khor sum yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gang de ltar dag pa de ni yang sbyong bar byed
228b3(dkon brtsegs): bAr/ kho bo ma las bsams nas de skad ces gang stong gsum gyi srong cher po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dang pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed cing yongs su stong bar mi byed
228b4(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni 'jig rnyed du sbyin gnas kyi 'os yin no// de ni legs par rab tu byung ba yin no zhes ston to// gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces
228b5(dkon brtsegs): smras so// lha'i bu de ltar rab tu byung zhing de ltar bsnyen par rdzogs pa de la kho bo 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu gal te khyod dgon par gnas shing grong du ma yin/ thag nye bar ma yin/ thag ring bar ma
228b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ lam gol bar ma yin/ gcig pu ma yin/ skye bo mang po dbus su ma yin/ 'du 'dzi nang du ma yin/ dben par ma yin la/ bsod snyoms spyod par yid mi byed/ 'gron du yang
228b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gro// phyag dar khrod pa yang mi byed/ smad pa'i lhung gzed dang / chos gos kyang mi 'chang // blag pa med yang mi byed/ 'dod pa chung bar mi byed/ 'dod chen che bar yang mi byed/ chog
228b8(dkon brtsegs): shes par yang mi byed/ rab tu dben par yang mi byed/ rab tu dben par yang mi byed/ shing drung pa yang mi byed/ gnas khang du yang mi gnas/ sman bkrus te bor ba yang mi sten/ ma gas
229a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang skang rtsi yang mi rten cing / rigs kyi bu gal te khyod sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi chos tham de lta bu thams cad yang dag par blangs te 'jug par byed pa de lta na khyod sbyangs
229a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa yin no// zhes smrasa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu gang 'di ji skam du bdag ni phyag dar khrod pa'o// bsod snyoms pa'o// shing drung pa'o// bdag ni sman bkus te bor bas
229a3(dkon brtsegs): chog shes pa'o// bdag ni 'dod pa chung ba'o// bdag ni chog shes pa'o// bdag ni dgon pa'o// bdag ni bla gab med pa pa'o// bdag ni sbyangs pa dang ldan pa'o snyam du sems pa de
229a4(dkon brtsegs): dag na mngon pa'i rgyal cas kyi rnam par g.yo ba yin pa'i phyir ro// wa'i bu yang dag par zhugs pa la ni lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo ba de ngas mi 'byung ngo // che tso'i phyir nam/
229a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de la rnam par rtog pa med pas/ bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams su dmigs pa lnga ni smos te de ni gnas med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu de lA bas nA gang
229a6(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i man tan de yan tan de dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug cing rtsom sems su ma byung / rnam par rtog par byed pa de ni sbyangs pa dang ldan no zhes pa ba sla'o// ne tso'i phyir
229a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dge slong gang 'dod chags sbyong ba dang / zhe sdang myong ba dang / gnyi mug sbyong ba dang / khams gsum stong pa dang / phung po rnams sbyong ba dang / nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye ma
229a8(dkon brtsegs): drug pa nga byung bar byang cing cinas kyang ma 'am ma'ang / migs/ mthil/ rnam pa mal pa mar myong bar byung pa byung bdang ldan nags labasmra pa pa gyu ro// bub
229b1(dkon brtsegs): yang de ltar rab tu byung zhing de ltar bsren par rdzogs pa de la kho bo 'di skad ces rigs bu gal te khyod bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yang mi sgom/ yang dag pa
229b2(dkon brtsegs): spong ba ba ni yang ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa ni yang ma yin/ dbang po lnga yang ma yon/ stobs lnga yang ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
229b3(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad pa'ang mi sgom zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang mi sgom/ mngon sum du mi byed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yang mi sgom mngon sum du yang
229b4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa de lta na/ khyod byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i rnams sgom pa yin no zhes smra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu de ni mi skye bo'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa zhes bya ste/ de ni bsgom
229b5(dkon brtsegs): par byar med cing mngon sum du byar med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye ba ni mngon sum du byar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba ni chos
229b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dran pa med cing yid la byed med pas de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya'o// lha'i bu dge slong gang 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi gnas/ gzugs kyi kham
229b7(dkon brtsegs): la yang mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams la yang mi gnas/ pa de ni gnas med pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhes bya'o// ji ltar sgom zhe na/
229b8(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang sgom par mi byed 'jig par mi byed pa de ltar sgom par byed pas de'i phyir sgom par byed pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun pa
230a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyor ro// lha'i bu gang gi tshe dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pas chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de'i tshe na// rlom sems su mi byed
230a2(dkon brtsegs): / gang gi tshe rlob sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe// sgom par mi byed do// gang gi tshe sgom par mi byed pa de'i tshe mngon sum du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi phyir phyogs dang mthun pa
230a3(dkon brtsegs): chos sum chu chu bdur zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ming tsam ste/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa/ rkyen las skyes pa/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa brjod kyang rung ma brjod kyang rung // ming gi yongs su
230a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa gang yin pa de dmigs su med pa'i phyir te// byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sumacu rtsa bdun yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni dben pa mthong ba yin no// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam
230a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal rnamarnal 'byor spyod ba zhes bgyin// ji ltar ma dge slong rnal 'byor pa lags// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe rnal 'byor spyod pa 'di lta ste// chos thams cad skye ba med
230a6(dkon brtsegs): ba drus kya tshul ky-i m+b+hir bang rkyen pa'i byor nal 'byor byung bzhes byal tshal yang ma sbyid na pa'i byung 'byang spyad pa nas rgya'i/ tshal mi spyo can/ 'das
230a7(dkon brtsegs): chang yang ma yin pa'i phyir/ 'jig nad 'dil mi skrod // 'jig rten pa rol la ma spyong/ khams gsum la mi skyed// de'i b+hir rnal 'byor spyad ba zhes bya'o// lha'i glang gis na tshe rnal 'byor skye
230a8(dkon brtsegs): bas pa' ma byung ba ma byen// de'i byor rnami 'byung gyung ba zhes bya'o// de sa bar rnams dge slong sung rmag mang pa pa'ang sum dri tsam ldan 'das de zhin shegs pas rnam pa
230b1(dkon brtsegs): sa rgya mas # [ऽ] mangs su pa' sa sa dub
230b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba 'dis bkag par gyur ma/ 'das dpal gnon byas bstan pa 'di ltar rung ste/ chos bstan po 'di 'gal pa 'am ci tu mgyur cha skam du 'i tsam gyi sems skyes par 'gyur ro ma
230b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rdog pa sems kyis shes nas/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la smras pa// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyong ni de bzhin gshegs pas mid
230b4(dkon brtsegs): ches pas dad pa dang ldan pa// shes rab chen pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yi rnam btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe khyod kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mngon sum du byas pa de
230b5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pas bden pa bzhi po dag dmigs pa'am/ mngon sum du byas pa 'am/ bsgoms pa 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang thug mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i so gsum
230b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag dmigs pa 'am/ mngon sum du byas pa'am/ bsgoms pa cig yod dam/ shA ri'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal de ni med de gang mngon sum du bya ba 'am/ bsgom par bya ba'am/
230b7(dkon brtsegs): rnags par bya ba'i chos de ni 'ga' yang dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir ne ma/ chos thams cad ni blang du med pa/ ma skyes pa rnam par rig pa med pa spong pa yin pas stong pas stong pa nyid man
230b8(dkon brtsegs): sum du mi byed pa'i phyir ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong sum sum stong len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// // bam po bzhi pa ste/
231a1(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'byed par byed do/
231a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal de ni 'di lta ste/ bye bas go bzab mo la bzo
231a3(dkon brtsegs): pa stong pa nyid la gnas pas bstan pa lags te/ legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni phye bas go ba ma yin gyi/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni byi bas
231a4(dkon brtsegs): go ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni 'byed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// ci zhig 'byed par byed ce na/ sems can dmyal ba 'byed par byed do// shin rje'i 'jig rten
231a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byed do// khams gsum pa 'byed par byed de/ de ltar 'byed pa rnams dang / kun du 'byed pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon na// lnga'i bu byis pa rnams ni 'dod chags
231a6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu 'byed b+h+yo// zhwa sdang kun tu 'byed par byed do// gang mug kun tu 'byed par byed do// khra ba kun du 'byed par byed do// ming dang gzugs sram du 'byed par byed pa/ 2
231a7(dkon brtsegs): bus sa rgyas rnams ni phyibs gopa ma yin no// nyan thos rnams kyang ma yim rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams kyang ma yin gyi/
231a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i byes pa rnams ni bye bas go ba yin no// lha'i dus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'on co khyod rnam par smos ma/ ga~M ba lags sam/ 'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ lha'i bu
231a9(dkon brtsegs): nam/ khwa'i bus smras pa/ lam dpa' 'an bkri pa lags sa pa/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nam yin no// zhwa'i bus smras pa/ 'jam pal
231b1(dkon brtsegs): lhur len pa lags sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ kho bo ni tshig lhur len pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs de ska
231b2(dkon brtsegs): ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni yi ge gcig dang / tshig gcig las kyang mi g.yo la yi ge de nyid dang / tshig de nyid kyi don dang / tshul dang
231b3(dkon brtsegs): sgo dang / lam yang yang dag pa'i ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes par byed de/ 'di ni stong pa'o zhes bya bar shes par byed do// 'di ni dben pa'o zhes bya bar shes par byed do//
231b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bya bar shes par byed do// 'di ni skye ba med pa'o zhes bya 'a bar shes par byed do// ci nas kyang rnam par shes par mi byed/ rig par mi byed/ tshor bar
231b5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa de ltar shes par byed pas de'i phyir tshig lhur len pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam
231b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal de ni 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob pas bstan pa yin te/ legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzungs thob pa ma lags sa/
231b7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams ni gzung thob pa lags kyi/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzungs thob pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o//
231b8(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams ni 'dzin par bgyid pa'i slad du ste/ ji zhig 'dzin par bgyid ce na/ bdag tu 'dzin par bgyid do// sems can du 'dzin pa dang
232a1(dkon brtsegs): srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par bgyid do// chang par 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug 'dzin
232a2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid do// ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa dang / phung po lnga dang / 'jig tshogs dang / khams bco brgyad dang / nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug 'dzin par
232a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid do// rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa dag 'dzin par bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das de lhag lags pas/ byis pa rnams ni gzus
232a4(dkon brtsegs): thob pa lags so// rtogs ge ba rnams mi rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa dag pa 'dzin par bgyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slang du byas
232a5(dkon brtsegs): parnams ni ga zung thob pa lags so// tsa'i gyi slang du nam/ byis pa rnams chos gang ga 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rnams 'dzin par mi mdzad ma
232a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kya mi bad/ ra smra sa rgyas rnams kyang chu byed/ bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mi bgyig/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mi bgyid pas tha'i ma
232a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams ni gangasathab pa lags sa/ 'tsha'i ma du dis byas pa rnyam rnamams par man pa ma lags pa/ 'dzin par
232a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ma mdzad/ man thos rnams kyang mi bgyid/ rang sangs kyis rnams kyang mi bcing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mi bgyid pa'i srang dur// ngon
232b1(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i bu blo thos rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal te ltung gzungs thob pa ma lags na/ 'angs kyang nas
232b2(dkon brtsegs): babral ba lags sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bud de bzhin te/ ma zan rtogs pa bul ba yin no// na ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bram za na rtogs pa gangs
232b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mi mkhyen pa de tsam du bral ba'i rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro//
232b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu byis so so'i skye bo gang dag yin pa de dag ni rtogs pa bral ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni mngon par chags pa'i rdzogs pa can yin
232b5(dkon brtsegs): la/ mkhas pa rnams ni rtogs pa bral ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis re shig mngon par chags pa'i rtogs pa can du ston na/ byis pa so so'i skyes
232b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ lha'i bu de lta bas na/ kho bo ni rtogs pa bul ba yin gyi/ gzungs thob pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bos ni gang gang gzung
232b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba cung zad kyang ma rnyed pa'i phyir ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de la dge slong lnga brgya tsam chos kyi rnam grangs te spangs shing 'gal bar byas nas/ rang rang
232b8(dkon brtsegs): gi lus de dag nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su lhung bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ga ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smrasas/
233a1(dkon brtsegs): par so
233a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal dge slong lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag chos kyi rnam par grangs 'di ma rtogs te spangs shing 'gal bar byas nas/ rang rang gi lus 'di dag
233a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su lhung bar gyur kyis de lta bu'i gnas zab mo dag ma ston cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod
233a4(dkon brtsegs): martogs shig/ gang sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i chos de lta bu 'ga' yang dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad skyeb med phyir ro// btsun pa
233a5(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang de dag ces so so'i rtogs ste/ sngon cig ces zer ba ni/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bdag tu lta ba la rjen pa 'am/ sems can
233a6(dkon brtsegs): du lta ba la rten pa 'am/ srog tu lta ba la rten 'am/ gang zag tu lta ba la rten pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong
233a7(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig la ci sring 'tsho'i bar du ba'i mo byang thams cad kyis baman bkur byas pa dang gang gis chos bab ma shes par
233a8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jig rten thams cad dang ma mthun pa 'di lta bu 'dams cang chos snang pa dang / mAnanam myong ba smo pa med pa dang / zhi tshang pa dang baben dpa sgrub med pa dpa
233a9(dkon brtsegs): can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas spangs te/ sems cad dmyal ba rnamasu ltung bar gyur pa ni/ phun
233b1(dkon brtsegs): sa tu tha laphags kyi thumabyas pabam 'bas nas spangasas sems can dpa' 'a rnas su 'ang bar ches myur bar dang gnas ldang rnam par thar par gyur gyi gas ca
233b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phatshams kyi bum bdag du ldang larnyed pa chos 'di mabyas par de bani na gsheb par tha bcom par yang dag par rjeg pa'i sangs rgyas bad+ma thu'i khyim skad la bsnyen bathar byas padzan rnam sa
233b3(dkon brtsegs): den bcoM ldan 'dakyis 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la legs ni bya ba byin te/ 'dza dpal leg so leg so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rdzo ba 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra'o// sa pa 'di ni rgyun tu thum pa'i 'jam
233b4(dkon brtsegs): bu dang 'dra'o// sa pa 'dzin lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// rdob 'din phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// thos pa 'di ni dgra btso pa nying dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu lta ba la rten pa dang / dmigs pa can
233b5(dkon brtsegs): lanathob pa 'ag/ mngon par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// den bco ldan 'ad kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag mi sem can dmyal ba de dag na ches myur bar sngang
233b6(dkon brtsegs): nig yongs mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyi/ 'din mi gti mug can dmig pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa the tshom du gyur pa gang dag de bzhin gshes pa la mchor ba byed pa de dag ning lA ma yin no// shA ri'i bu
233b7(dkon brtsegs): de lta ma kyi ni de ngag gi yongs mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgyun 'gyur ba yin te/ myur du rnam par thar par ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos zab mo dag ma thos pa'i phyir ro// shA ri
233b8(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag rna blags te/ chos zab mo 'di mnyan nas ma rtogs shing spangs te/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba de dag ni ches myur bar rnam
233b9(dkon brtsegs): bsar pa gyur gyi dmigs pa can ze tshim dugyur pa gzhan dgan ri la ma yin no/ nas lha'i bu thothos bag kyis 'dzi pa la gagadu byur ba'i 'di nad ces snga so 'ang pa'i rtso
234a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ri spong par byed
234a2(dkon brtsegs): ngas par mtshungs par spong band dam/ lajam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bugal te khyod tshangs par spyod pa mi len cing tshangs par spyad paskyod par mi byed padi lcam/ kho ga khyod dang chungs
234a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par myong // sa'i dus sbas pa/ la mngapal khyod ci las dgongs te de sang seMn/ lam dpal gyis smras pa/ sa'i bu gang len par byed kyi gang len par mi byed gdo
234a4(dkon brtsegs): ci yang spyod par mi byed ngo // lha'i bu gang tshangs par spyad pa dmigs par mi byed pa de ni spyod par byed kyi dmigs par mi byed pa de ni ci yang spyod par mi byed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
234a5(dkon brtsegs): 'on ci khyod tshangs par mi spyod pa lags sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ kho bo ni tshang par mi sbyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo ni tshangs pa yang ma yin la/ skyong
234a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin pas de'i phyir kho bo rnangs par mi spyod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dngal 'dil ste// thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pas bstad bya lags te legs so leg sa
234a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te kho bo grags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par gyur na ni de ltan thogs par yang 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ cinam du bdag gi yod
234a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ci tsam du mngon par zhen pa yod pa de nam du thogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// gzhan yang 'jam dpal gnon dur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so/
234a9(dkon brtsegs): 'i bugs ti bying sams can thangs cang srog dang bral bar byed cing chen marang thogs par mi byed/ ral mi yang ma yin/ thong ba yang ma yim dbyug pa yang rdzogs par ri
234a10(dkon brtsegs): ma la pa sa mams pa phre dang / pa shi ra mal ches rnam pa ma
234b1(dkon brtsegs): na byu canag me pa shes kwa'i dus smras pa/ 'a ma dpa ma sems cad sems cad ces brtse ba'i 'dis pa/ ring ma dang yin pa'i sa ma marnams
234b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sna'i bu de la bas na/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes bsad par bya'o// sems can du 'dzin pa'i 'du shes pas par bya'o// srog tu 'du shes pas

234b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sa rab kyi mchod gyis bsad par byaste/ shes rab kyi mtshon des kyang ci nas kyang 'dzin pa med pa dang / gcod pa med pa de ltar gzung bar bya zhing de ltar gsang
234b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// lha'i bu rnam grangs desar khyod kyis 'di ltar gang gis bdag gi 'du shes dang / shes rab kyi mtshon des kyang ci nas kyang 'dzin pa med pa dang / gcod pa med pa de
234b6(dkon brtsegs): war bzung bar bya ning de ltar gsad par bya'o// sems cad kyi 'dushes pas pa des sems can thams cad bsad pa yin par rig par bya'o// gzhan yang 'jamadapal ga tur byung bas
234b7(dkon brtsegs): thams ca la'i bu gal blo gros rab gnas la 'od skad ces smra so// lha'i bu gal te khyod mi dge bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rang dag pa blangs te/ 'jug cing nag po'i phyogs thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
234b8(dkon brtsegs): sa ka phyogs byams cang ba dag par blangs te 'dug par byed pa de lan lab rgya dang ngas pa mang par byung 'do// 'i dus smras pa/ 'dum dpa sa khyod cims dgongs de srang so 'am sa
234b9(dkon brtsegs): sbas pa 'i budag po'i phyogs kyi ma nyamang nyid gang yini pa des demanyam pa nyid du 'jug pa de lan khro khyed dang mangs pa mtshungs par myong 'dodong / lha'i bu'adi tir du se ma
234b10(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa 'ang
235a1(dkon brtsegs): / nag po'i phyogs kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin sngam/ lnga'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal bya ba ma mchis pa dang / lhag par bya ba mi bgyid pa lags so// 'jam dpa'
235a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs zhes bya ba gang yin snyam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / rnam par thar
235a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgo gsum sa/ de ni dkar po'i phyogs lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyis sgrib par nus sam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lag
235a4(dkon brtsegs): so/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de'i phyir kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces gal te khyod nag po'i phyogs thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis dkar po'i phyogs thams
235a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis dkar po'i phyogs thams cad yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par byed pa de lta bur/ kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyong 'dod do// zhes son /
235a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lnga'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lnga'i bu gal te khyod bsad pa dang po phyir byung ba de'i mgo la mtshon gyis 'dres
235a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa de ltan/ kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dong / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad do/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bugs
235a8(dkon brtsegs): pa gsong pa zhes bya bde gang nim/ wa'i bu 'dod chags ni bas pazhis bya'o// nasrang dang kyi mug ni bas pa zhes bya'o// ngargyal dang khro ba dang 'chang pa dang / tha ga dang / byung
235b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye sna dang / mug par 'dzin pa dang / mnam nga skye bar med pa dang / 'dushes dang / ma pa ni bas pa zhes byas/ sa'i bu de dag ni bas pa yin par gsum
235b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ni la'i byor spyong pa gang 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed de/ zhi bar byed/ rang du ni par byed pa de la ni stong par snang bas mi sdug pa la 'jug par mi byed par sengs
235b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dig las skyes/ gang tu 'gag yul gang la chags par 'gyur/ gang gis chags par 'gyur zhes 'dod chags kyi sems de nyid kyi 'byung ba dang / 'dzegs pa la sa sar rdzog
235b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ de de ltar so sor rtog par byed pa na/ 'dod chags kyang mi dmigs/ gang la chags par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis chags par 'gyur ba de yang mi dmigs so// gang gi tshe
235b5(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa de'i tshe mi len to// gang gi tshe mi len pa de'i tshe mi 'dor ro// gang gi tshe mi 'dor ba de'i tshe ma 'dzin mi spong ste/ de ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// zhe sdang dang gti mug dang

235b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sbyar te/ lnga'i bu gang bsad pa de lta bu skyes ma thag tu bsod par byed pa de ni bsad pa dang po phyir phyung ba de'i mgo la mtshon gyis 'debs pa zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir kha ma
235b8(dkon brtsegs): de las bsams nas de skad ces ston to// gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu gal te khyod sangs rgyas
236a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par mi byed/ chos mnyes par mi byed/ dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de ltar kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do// lnga'i bu

236a6(dkon brtsegs): chos bgyi ba 'i 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang / chos nyid la gas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang
236a7(dkon brtsegs): chos nying mnyes par byar nus snyam 'am/ lha'i bus sbas pa'am/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas
236a8(dkon brtsegs): de sad ces gal te khyod chos mnyes par mi byed pa de ltar/ kho bo chung dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyong 'dod nas son to// lce'i bu dge 'du shes bya ba chen ga yin pa shes
236b1(dkon brtsegs): khwa'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa nyan thos rnams ni 'dus ma bgyis kyi rab tu phyogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'dus ma bgyis leg su
236b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dus ma byas mnyes par nus sam 'am/ lnga'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis
236b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces/ gal te khyod dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de ldan/ kho bo khyod dang mtshungs par spyod do zhes stor to// lha'i bu
236b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang grang sangs rgyas su dmigs pa de ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed do// gang chos su dmigs pa de ni chos mnyes par byed do// gang dge 'dun du dmigs pa de ni
236b5(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa kho na yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des de dag ma dmigs pas na/ des mnyes par ma byas pa'i phyir// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang dag sangs rgyas
236b6(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa dang / chos la chags pa dang / dge 'dun la chags pa de dag gis sangs rgyas mnyes par byas/ chos mnyes par bya/ dge 'dun mnyes par byas pa yin no//
236b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis sangs rgyas ma dmigs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas la chags pa med pas de dag gis sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// gang dag gis chos ma dmis
236b8(dkon brtsegs): pade ni chos la tshugs pa med pas de dag gis chos mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// gang dag gis dge 'dun ma dmigs pa de dag ni dge 'dun la chags pa med pas de dag gi
236b9(dkon brtsegs): du mi mnges par rdzo lta sa pa sa rgyas sum mams pa sa su mi migs pa ma me sa mamams rgyas mams par margyas mam
237a1(dkon brtsegs): las sasams mams sus las thamasasaca na sa masamamam ma byams ma sams masamamamams cad masasacam mas
237a2(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// lha'i bu mnyes par ma byas pa mnyes par ma byas pa zhes bya ba de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas yin no// de ni kun
237a3(dkon brtsegs): du sbyor ba dang bral ba'i gnas yin no// de ni rnam par bshig pa'i gnas yin no// de ni sems dang bral ba'i gnas yin no// dra ni pa byung ba'i gnas yin no// de ni rnam par nges pa'i
237a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin no// de ni yid byung bar ma byas pa'i gnas yin pas de'i phyir mnyes par ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ kho bo na byes pa mi gzo ba yin gyi byas pa gzo
237a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byis pa rnams ni rnam pa gzhan dang / gzhan dag byed pas na
237a6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rnams ri gzhan dang gzhan dag gi byed pa ste/ gang gi phyir lta ba'i rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pa de'i phyir de dag ni byas pa gzo ba zhes bya'o// lha'i bu yang dag par zhugs
237a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs kyi bu dag ni bya ba 'amam bya ba grang yang mi byed de/ gang gi tshe mi byed pa de'i phyir de dag ni byas pa mi gzo ba zhes bya'o// ji srang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'di
237a8(dkon brtsegs): gas chos thams cad ni bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ lhag par byed pa med pas/ mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' la gzhan men par yang mi byed/ bya ba gzha yang mi byed sa
237a9(dkon brtsegs): mamam pa nyid pe rogs gsungs pas ma de'i phyir byas pa mi gzong zhes bya'o// lha'i dus spras pa/ 'jam dang la khyod bzod pa'am/ 'od chos nyid dam/ gang la gnas
237b1(dkon brtsegs): sa rnaMs ng+yas u byu 'od pa la yang sa yin nas da la yang mayind/ sa'i dus rnam pa yangangs tshan kyang gang la gnas ma
237b2(dkon brtsegs): ma gyis smras pa/ skya'i bu skye ma'i gyis bu'i lus gang la gnas pa lngas/ sna'i dus smras pa/ lajam dpal sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus gal gnas/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
237b3(dkon brtsegs): na'i bu sgyu 'i skyes du'i lus ni dri bzhin nyid gang la gnas pa de la gnaso/ lha'i bu gzha ni yang de skad ces khyod bzod pa'am 'on tengs chos nyid dam/ gang lu gnas de nga sangs
237b4(dkon brtsegs): ces ze nga ni/ zhwa'i bu bzod pa zhes bya ba ni ming ste/ ming la ni gnas par mi nus so// chos nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rtog pa med pa ste de la yang gnas med do// lha'i du
237b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad gang la gnas te/ ston par byed pa de nyid la bzhugs te/ ston par mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la
237b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te sngod la/ sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ste/ sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
237b7(dkon brtsegs): yin du'i bzhi nying de ni gnas su me pa'i phyir 'o// de nas lha'i bu blo thos ra pa gnas kyis 'jam dpal gnon dur gyur pas la 'di skad ces smras s+ho// 'dum dang yang ge sbyong
237b8(dkon brtsegs): bram ze zhes partsin/ jitsam gyis na dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dge sbyong yang ma yid bram ze yang ma yin pa de ni dge sbyong dang drim rje
238a1(dkon brtsegs): nes bu'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khams la ga yang mi chags/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams la yang mi chags pa de ning gi
238a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no// nas khro bo spu ning lha'i bu gang la mi 'dzag/ rnga ba las mi 'jug snga las mi 'dzag lce las mi 'dzag lus las mi 'dzag yid las mi 'jug pa de ni dge sbyong yin no zhes zhe
238a3(dkon brtsegs): bo sprul/ lha'i du gang la gnas pa med cing gnas par gdags pa med pa dang / kun du gnas pa med par cing kun tu gnas par gdags pa med pa de ni dge sbyong yin no nas
238a4(dkon brtsegs): khob snga ba'i phyir dang / lha'i bu gang las kyang kyi mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro la/ rma med cing rma dang bral ba de ni bram ze yin no zhes kho ba smra ba'i phyir ro// gang dge sbyong yang ma yin
238a5(dkon brtsegs): bram ze yang ma yin pa de ni dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba'i tshig de'i bstan pa ni de yin no// de nas 'khor de nyid byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gni sgom pa
238a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa lnga zhig 'dus par gyur pa de dag da dung bzod pa thob pa ma yin pas/ gnas shing snyoms par 'jug par byed/ gnas shing rnam par ldang bar byed de/
238a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa 'di dag gis sngon pa nga sa pa dang ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bas pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran ning dag la las kyi rnam par srin pa de'i las
238a8(dkon brtsegs): legs 'ong pas de dag sems yongs su gdung ba des chos zang mo ga la me bzod cing / bdag nyid ma rten cing rnam par rig pa kho nar byed de/ de dag gis 'dis se
238b1(dkon brtsegs): pas nas spang ba dernam par gan par mnus so// de das bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'alnga ba// de sa gdul ba'idi bang gi sbyi/
238b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gnon dur gyur pa'i sems bsdu ba mdzad do// de nas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa sman las langs te/ bra gos zag pa gcig tu bzar nas lag pa grams pa
238b3(dkon brtsegs): gri blangs te/ legs par bdar nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su brgyugs sa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di sad ces
238b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal nga ni bsad zin cing legs par bsad zin gyis thong shig/ 'jam dpal nga ni bsang zin cing legs par bsud zin gyis thong shig/ de ci'i
238b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal skyes bu gang zag gis gang gi tshe bsad do samA pa'i sems skyed par byed pa'i sems skyes pa yun ring po nas bsad zin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub
238b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lnga po dag 'di lta skye sam du sems te/ chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste 'di la/ bdag gam sems can nam/ srog gam gang zag gam/ sheng las skyes
238b7(dkon brtsegs): sam shed bu ni 'ga' yang med do// 'di la pa yang med ma yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med chos kyang med/ dge 'dun yang med do/ 'di la gang mtshams med pa byed
238b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni mkhas pa 'dzangs pa/ yid gzhungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa
239a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa zab mo la bzod pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la byang ba lhag par byas pa/ chos
239a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa yang dag par smra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang bcas pa yin no mtshon rnon po thogs te/
239a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ga la bdar rgyug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa yang de skad ces/ 'jam dpal nga ni bsad zin cing legs par bsad zin gyis thong shig ces gsung ba'i phyir
239a4(dkon brtsegs): galal te 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / chos zhes bya ba dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang / ba zhes bya ba dang / mA zhes bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba ji chos
239a5(dkon brtsegs): zug tu gnas pa 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par gyur nA ni/ mtshams med pa 'dzin pa de la nges par 'byung ba yang yod par mi 'gyur zhig na/ gang gi phyir chos de dag ni med pa log
239a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag pa mgrin par bdud ba/ song po sgyum lta bu yin pa/ de'i phyir 'di la gang byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ gang la byed par 'gyur ba'i byed pa 'ga' yang med do sam mo// byang chub sems
239a7(dkon brtsegs): ra gal po dag gis de lar dgas pan/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag dga' ba dang / ma ga tu dga' ba de nyid kyis tal bdun srid cam du nam mkha' la
239a8(dkon brtsegs): gas de pa lags nas com ldan 'das mtshigs su ca dpa 'di ga gis mdza ba ga/ chos ku rgyalas bu me// 'angs su rtogs pas kun nas coM/
239b1(dkon brtsegs): ma dzub pa mdis me/ sa sems cad stong ba legs// bdag tu 'ad shes rmongs parnams// mig par yongs su rtogs pa brjid// yor gyi nam dbang pa'i na// rdzug
239b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa de 'dra// tshe rabs sngam rnams su ni// pham sbyin gnas bkur gyur cing // dge slong dgra bcom bkum pa yi// shin tu mi bzang sug las bgyis// sug las de'i rnam smin kyi
239b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal tshor ba myong gyur cing // 'gyod pa skyes par 'gyur ba ni// chos thos rnam par dag par gyur// grags ched drug rngu 'byin pa'i// bdag cag 'gyod pa gsal mdzad pa sa
239b4(dkon brtsegs): gang la tshon mongs ma mchis pa'i// chos dbyings rjes su rdzogs par gyur// sangs rgyas thabs la mkhas pa ste// thub pathabs kyi mkhyen pa mnga'// thabs de sems can thams/
239b5(dkon brtsegs): da kyi// 'gyod pa dag ni rnam par bstsal// chos rnams rang bzhin stong pas na// 'di la sangs rgyas chos dang yang // dge 'dun mi dmigs 'di la ni// pham ma mchis dgra bcom
239b6(dkon brtsegs): min// 'di la dgum pa ma mchis te// bsad pa 'ga' yang mchis ma lags// mnyam nyid ji bzhin byung ba ste// de ni chos rnams mtshan nyid lags// 'jam dbyangs shes rab chen po/
239b7(dkon brtsegs): pa// chos rnams pha rol phyin pa yis// mtshor cha rnon po thogs nas ni// sangs rgyas ga la bzhugs par brgyugs// sangs rgyas ji bzhin mtshon dri bzhin// de dag gnyig mtshan nyid
239b8(dkon brtsegs): gcig gyi byung ba ma mchis pa// 'di la dgum pa 'ga' ma mchis// mtshon thogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi dang bad+ha'i gung gi
240a1(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing sa chen po g.yos pa yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas
240a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing dreng gan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/ tshe ning gzhes pa de dag la/ rang rang gi bsten bskur ba de dag gis nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis
240a3(dkon brtsegs): dogs chen po g.yos pa/ 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten rjer gyi kha
240a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des bya ba chos ston to// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dran
240a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'dil ste/ byang chub sems
240a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gnan dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir shes rab kyi ral gri mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su brgyags so/
240a7(dkon brtsegs): mas sacas bkyim ldan 'das de dag gis shes rab kyi mtshan las brnams kyi/ nas kyang sengs ca dpag med pa dag g-i ma pang dag pa dang / sems ma
240a8(dkon brtsegs): grol ba dang / bzod pa skyes padang / byang chub la tsugs par gyur pa/ de sa des chis bca pa// ringams sargyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang 'kho ngas
240b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang po / dge padzin brdung ba dam par rdzog pa mang ba yang dag 'khod pa de dag gis mtshod de mi mdzod ning chos bstan pa de dang mthos pa de ltar phyi ts+li'i bas
240b2(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlabs so// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'dri skad ces smras so// 'jam dang la khyod kyis ston par rmongs pa'i phyir/ 'artul ba
240b3(dkon brtsegs): las mi radra ba mngon par 'dus byas pa de khyod la gang tu rnam par smin par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhir te/
240b4(dkon brtsegs): bos las mi bzad pa de lta bu ni byas na/ de gang tu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i gnas mi shes so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de lha mod kyi sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i las gang du rnams par sdid
240b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba der kho bo'i yang rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bA ri'i du sgyu ma'i skyes bu yang mi rtog rnam par mo rtog la chos thams cad kyang mi rtog pa
240b6(dkon brtsegs): par mdzog phyir ro// btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de btsun pa nyid khyod ji ltar bzod pa de ltar skyen cig/ btsun pa mtshan dmigs su yod dam/ bA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de
240b7(dkon brtsegs): nim yid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa las dmigs su yod dam/ shA ri'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal nga ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa/
240b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa dmigs su yod dam/ bA ri'i dus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu mtshon yang med las kyang mang rnam
241a1(dkon brtsegs): srin pa yang med na/ don las de gang tu rnam par smin par 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi bsam pa des bstan pa ltar na las de ni gang du yang
241a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad las med pa rnam par smid pa med pa'i phyir ro de nas bcom ldan 'das la gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
241a3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ci nas kyang bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu mchi zhing
241a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing de dag tu chos ston par 'gyur ba de ltar thugs spo ba mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'dri skad ces smra so
241a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag rje rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su lto shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su
241a6(dkon brtsegs): bltas so// bltas pa na phyogs cu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang ga na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku brnyan yang thos/ 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom
241a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngan 'dug cing / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid dra ba la/ chos kyi rnam grang ston pa dang / de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de se
241a8(dkon brtsegs): dang lnga'i du 'dus pa de snyed kyang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kyang mi g.yol/ thams cad du yang ngo //
241b1(dkon brtsegs): sa ma du sa na sa/ de ma sa mas sa 'du
241b2(dkon brtsegs): sti bung dag 'di la se dper na/ sgyumam lana'i sgra shin tu baspangs pa'i phyir san las kyang mi gagrol/ gzugs rnam par satshogs drag kyang sdod par byed do// de ban du na med
241b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes sgyu ma rnams lagrin tu bslabs pa yang sangs rgyas kyi ning ji snyed du de bzhin nye bar son par 'dod pa de snyed du stsal pa dag sprul bar byed de/ de co'i phyir ne na/
241b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ste chos 'di sgyum lta bu rig pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma rnams la shin du bslabs pa yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du de bzhig nye bar son par 'jam dpal gnod
241b5(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam zangs 'di thos par ni rgyur 'azhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'jam
241b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes kyi rnams thas 'di thos pa de ri lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'i/ chos kyirnamazangs 'a thos pa
241b7(dkon brtsegs): dri ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'dra ste/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri la mos shing yid ches pa dang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni 'dra ba yin no// 'jam dpal
241b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin lags te/ de ni stong pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni sngon
242a1(dkon brtsegs): du du ga sa nga sa myung du lagasas ma kyang kyis ma
242a2(dkon brtsegs): me dang dag pa'i dzi masasas/ do pa ma nyid rjes pa de sar 'dra ba lags so// de ma par thob de la ba de lar 'dra ba lags so// de na ben pa
242a3(dkon brtsegs): srub de la 'dra ba lags so// denas bcom ldan 'das mal mdapal basnronu myur dus 'dris ces gsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjerjes kya
242a4(dkon brtsegs): sa pa'i dus lnga bcu thu mar gyur bar spyod par 'gyur zhing / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gi rdu lAm du grag par 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlang
242a5(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ de nas de'i tshe sngo gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lnga dang mi rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ma dkrol bar smra grag cing shing ljon
242a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las kyang me dag sna tshogs rab tu rgyas dri lhag par gyur to// rdzing bud gnas kyang pad+ma mang po dag rab tu 'thon par gyur to// seng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
242a7(dkon brtsegs): 'anas 'di dang / rnam pa btu btu g.yos shing da du bachen dus rgyu bye ra gyur dus/ nga zlab 'di dag kyang mi rudu bar gyur te// sa bye ba 'dum phrag mang
242a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang dag 'a ding mgul yid rangs te/ phreng gi bar spang la'i ling nas mi dag gi ra mi dzin pa rab tu phebs shing / byem dang sris / mi ga 'phreng dang / byug pa'i nga/
242b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu bebs so// silas na dgar btu gsul zhing lnga'i sa dbyangs pang po dag kyang bsgralas nas/ rnams cad kyis thal lo ltung ba bdud de la 'thun pa cig 'did
242b2(dkon brtsegs): ces mal la 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas bstan pa'i chos/ a la lachos al la chos/ 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis bu sor ba yang mthong ngo / sems can ga
242b3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no// gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
242b4(dkon brtsegs): nas skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba lhag par byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa yin no nas kyang smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gnod
242b5(dkon brtsegs): dur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang byin gyis brlabs pa'i srad du snga las 'di dag byung ba la sen/ 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus
242b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangasra 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i slad du snga ltas 'di drag byung ba yin/
242b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi bya'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdon pa'i byin gyi brlabs par
242b8(dkon brtsegs): mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la brten nas/ rnam
243a1(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'i bded pa/ bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga rgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa
243a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gis bdag ma mchis pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa dang / srog ma mchis pa dang / gang zag ma mchis pa dang / shed la
243a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes ma mchis pa dang / shed bu ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi
243a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bded pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang drag 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang / zhe sdang ma mchi
243a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gti mug ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / gzugs pa mchis pa dang / rgyu ma mchis dang / lta ba ma mchis pa dang / srid pa ma mchis pa dang / srid pa
243a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'tshal pa ma mchis pa dang / lus su gangags pa ma mchis pa dang / sems ma mchis pa dang / sems su gangags pa ma mchis pa dang / dran pa ma mchis
243a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dran par bgyid pa dag ma mchis pa dang / dran pa nye brla gnag pa dag ma mchis pa dang / gnag pa ma mchis pa dang / nye bar gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang / gzug
243a8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba ma mchis pa dang / 'du shes ma mchis pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang / mig ma mchis pa
243b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs pa mchis pa dang / dbu ma mchis pa dang / sram mchis pa dang / skam mchis pa dang drim mchis pa dang / khrel mchis pa dang / rom pachis pa dang / lus
243b2(dkon brtsegs): padapa reg bya ma mchis pa dang / yid ma mchis pa dang / chos ma mchis pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang / gzugs kyi khams ma mchis pa dang / gzugs
243b3(dkon brtsegs): mamachis pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang / 'di la rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / mchad pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden du'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang ma 'ongs
243b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus lnga brtsam man spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang badren pa'i tshi ga gang gis rgyun tu zhugs pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma
243b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / ra myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / dgra bcom
243b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma mchis pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma
243b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis pa dang / ye shes ma mchis pa dang / rnam
243b8(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa ma mchis pa dang / stong pa nyid ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ma mchis pa dang / rang bzhin
244a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / 'thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon gsum bu ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa dang / rig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par
244a2(dkon brtsegs): grol ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gram ma mchis pa dang / pha rol ma mchis pa dang / tshu rol ma mchis pa dang / thar pa ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / ming du gdags pa
244a3(dkon brtsegs): mA mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang
244a4(dkon brtsegs): gis chos bstan pa 'das 'ga' yang ma sbyar ma grol/ mi sbyor mi 'grol ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i cho ga des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la nga
244a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis/ sngor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis
244a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'ga' yang ma bkrol/ yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas/ de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma brnyes/ mashig chos 'ga' yang ma bskyed pa/ ma bkag
244a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par ma bshig pa bstod pa dang / mdongs pa'i de bzhin gzigs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng dag sems can 'ga' yang 'grom/
244a8(dkon brtsegs): ba mi gyul/ yongs su mye las rdzobar mi 'gyung/ dadag gis sems can 'ga' yang shes par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par 'gyur/ chos dga' yang byed pa
244b1(dkon brtsegs): gyu/ 'gog par mi gyur/ rnam par 'jig par myi 'gyur/ byud par mi 'gyur bu dang / ral dbyung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
244b2(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can 'ga' yang mi 'grol/ yongs su mya ngan las mi zlo/ de dag sems can 'ga' yang mi brnyes mi 'jig/ chos 'ga' yang
244b3(dkon brtsegs): skyed/ mi 'gog rnam par mi 'jig mi spyod pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma len spyod par gyur cig
244b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'di la/ cung zad kyang ma smras/ ma brjod/ ma bshad/ ma bstad/ ma brtags/ ma bsngag
244b5(dkon brtsegs): ma bsdad/ ma spos ma bzlas bring / chos bstan pa 'di la yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod la/ chos bstan pa 'di gang gis kyang ma mnyan/ 'ga' yang nyan par mi 'gyur
244b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang ma 'ong ba'i dus lnga brgya tha mar 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par
244b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'di la/ tshul khrims ma mchis dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma mchis
244b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas mi mchis pa dang / shes rab ma mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ma mchis pa/ rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grom
245a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'dim 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma
245a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sbyid pa stsol bar mi bgyid/ tshul khrims srung bar mi
245a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid / bzod pa sgrub par mi bgyid/ brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bgyid/ bsam gtadan rnam par sgom par mi bgyid/ shes rab spyod par mi bgyid/ byang chub don du gnyer
245a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ma bgyid/ yang dag pa la 'jug par mi bgyid/ byang chub thob par mi bgyid/ spobs rnams thob par mi bgyid/ mi 'jigs pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ dbang ba
245a5(dkon brtsegs): rjo par bye bgyid/ sos yang dag par rig pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ chos kyi gzang ma thor badrami bgyid/ sems cad grol bar mi bgyid/ smra bar mi bcid pa'i
245a6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i ga des chos kyirnamagrangs 'din 'ongs pa'i dus ra lnga brnam par 'jam bu'i glingang myong par gyur cig/ de nas de'i tshe song gsum kyi dong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams pa
245a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam mjug du rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dgas cher g.yos
245a8(dkon brtsegs): ra gyur pa 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyed ni gang lags de da ces gsom pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'dis kyis bka' stsal
245b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan byams pa dman pa la mos pa'i sems can 'di dag 'dzin par mi 'gyur na/ ma legs kyis thong shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sem
245b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don gyi slad du banang du gsol/ bcom
245b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nis phyogs 'di dag tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa ba nis bsar te/ thams cad du yang
245b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jab dpal gnon nur gyur pa dang / lnga'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis nus so// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sA'i bu bro gros
245b5(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ ji srid cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rigs kyi bu'am 'di dag gis bskal pa grangs med/
245b6(dkon brtsegs): pa phrag 'bum 'das pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas me tog mngon par 'phags pa seng ge rtsal gyi yon tan phung po zhes bya ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so// chos kyi rnam
245b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'ad bshad pa na sems can grang gA klung bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de'i nyis gyur snyed kyis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa
245b8(dkon brtsegs): thob bo// de'i nyis gyur rnyed kyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnams par dag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong nga
246a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / ji ltar 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha'i bu de dag dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri
246a2(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
246a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lha'i bu blo gros rapa gnas kyis nus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u sa sum cu cu drug pa rdzog
246a4(dkon brtsegs): s+ho/ cog klu ban de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing nus/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u song phrag brgya pa las
246a5(dkon brtsegs): sa ma su rtsa bdu pa ste/ seng ge'i nus pa/ bamango byed / rgya ga swA hA/ Ang+ku sid par midun mam tha ya na sut+ta/ grongs dang/ 'phags/
246a6(dkon brtsegs): bseng ga'i nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyaga'i tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan
246a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das rgyal po'i khabs bya mod kyi phung po'i ril/ dge slong srong gnyis brtsa lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dgi 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa
246a8(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig go// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzig/ rgyal ba gang zag mtshungs pa med// rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu// seng ge'i des ni grag
246b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa rgyas sa su / rgyas gsu sa ma sa su
246b2(dkon brtsegs): / gsas ma rgyas kyi nga mams// pas mam tho pas du la la// lu pa gdu ga ma 'du
246b3(dkon brtsegs): chub da dun gas rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mthu yis ni// de dag sangs rgyas mi 'jigs kyis myur nas// seng ges bral mo sbyar te// rdzogs sa sa rgyas nus pa'i/ khyod /
246b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo'i byung pa 'ang// dris chen pa'i bang ga la gyisungs// gang gis mdzes par 'gyur ba legs// gang gis rdzus skye bar 'gyur/ sde bdu pa shA ma
246b5(dkon brtsegs): nam// de ga zug bsams mas kyis ma khyed rnams sa sa lung bam pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ga so// khyo sangs pa 'dag
246b6(dkon brtsegs): da'is mangs par 'gyur// rangs yis ning su dbyas brdzus bya// chos kyi sbyid pa rtse bajam// gnod du dag shes par bcis// gang gis su su gnyis
246b7(dkon brtsegs): dang byang bzang po brgyad rgya dang // gser mdog 'dra ba'i lus 'gyur zhing // de mthong sems can dga' bar 'gyur// sbyin pa chen po'i mtshan tu 'gyur// byams pas de bzhin
246b8(dkon brtsegs): dpe byad bzang // sems can kun la sems mnyam pas// rgyal ba gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur// gzung ni gang gis thob par 'gyur// gang gis ting 'dzin skye 'gyur lags
247a1(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba'i tshig tu gang gis 'gyur// thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol// chos la bzod pas gzungs rnams thob// sems bsgoms pas ni ting 'dzin ste/
247a2(dkon brtsegs): kyal ba'i tshig rnams spang byas na// gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur// dran dang ldan par ji ltar 'gyur// thub pa ji ltar blo gros ldan// ji ltar chos spyod 'gyur ba lags/
247a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa mkhas cis 'gyur// g.yo med pas ni dran ldan 'gyur// don la sems pa blo gros ldan// gus dang bcas pas chos spyod 'gyur// chos kyi mtshan nyid rtog
247a4(dkon brtsegs): nga mkhas// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// las gang gis ni skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mngon gsum du// nub nu bar ji ltar 'gyur// gang ni gachos
247a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sbyin pa la// nam yang bar chad mi byed pa// de ni des myur rab tu// 'jig rten mgon dang phrad par 'gyur// gang gis ma kham song bar 'gyur// gang gis bzang 'tsho
247a6(dkon brtsegs): mchi 'gyur lags// skye ba kun du skye bar// bag mchis par ni ji ltar 'gyur// dad pas ma khom spong bar 'gyur// tshul khrims kyis ni zang 'gror 'gro// stong pa nyid ni ban
247a7(dkon brtsegs): byas na// rtag tu bag dang ldan par 'gyur// thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams// ji ltar las rnams dag par 'gyur// ji ltar bdud kyi rjes mi thogs// ji ltar chos
247a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis phongs 'gyur song // rnam par grol bas las rnams dag/ brtsor 'grus kyis ni bdud 'dul 'gyur// ci sbas de bzhin byed pas ni// chos 'phongs pa song ba
247b1(dkon brtsegs): 28/ kAs ka'i saspyan dang // tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'dar ji mar 'gyur// thub pa mos pa sna tshogs kyi// sems can rnams ni gang gis dgal// bden par
247b2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i dbyangs// ngag rtsung spangs pas sbas 'gyur// rgyal pa'i tshig dang bram rnams// spangs pas sems can dga' bar 'gyur// ji mar tshe ring 'gyur ba sa
247b3(dkon brtsegs): zod darung bar ji ltar 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa gang yis na// g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur// gsod pa mi byed tshe ring 'gyur// miche bas ni nang nyung 'gyur// mi
247b4(dkon brtsegs): mthur pa dag bsdams byas na// g.yog 'khor rnams ri mi phyed 'gyur// don rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur lags// gang gis longs spyod mi nyams 'gyur// gang gis
247b5(dkon brtsegs): gang de skye ba der// dbang cher grags par ji ltar 'gyur// chags pa med pas don rnams 'grub// ser snga drapas longs spyod 'phel// gang dang gang du skye ba dang // phrag doH/
247b6(dkon brtsegs): med pas dbang cher grags// ji ltar la mi mi gathob 'gyur// lA yin pa ji mar 'thob// sems can 'chi 'pho skye ba dag/ 'dren pa gang gis 'tshal bar 'gyur// pa
247b7(dkon brtsegs): byi ngas mipa 'thob 'gyur// ram ma snga mis da bdag/ 'che ba sre zhes 'gres kyis// de dag de sar 'grub par 'gyur// 'dren pa byung chub sems dpa' gi// zag
247b8(dkon brtsegs): gos bsad par 'gyur// zerabs snga dran cis 'gyur lags// rdzu 'phrul ci yis 'thob par 'gyur// bzhin pa byin pas rdzu 'phrul 'thob// rnan pa bsgoms pas rjes su
248a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam mtha' gnyis rab tu sangs byas na// zag pa zang par reg par 'gyur// gang gis ning ni phun sumatshogs/ cis na dge 'dun phun sumachogs
248a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis phun sumachog 'od 'gyur// gang gis phyogs bcur lnga der gda'// smon lam gyis ni phur sum ning // bsdu bas dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// 'dir ni rin cen
248a3(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dul bas// phyogs bcur lnga der snang bar 'gyur// chos rnams thams cad bsdu ba ni// chos gang gis na thob par 'gyur// glang dang gang du skye bar// byang chub sems
248a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dga' ba thob// sems can thams cad thar bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu sems btud pa// des na chos rnams bsdu ba 'thob// des ni dga' ba'ang thob par 'gyur// bslab
248a5(dkon brtsegs): bci 'dra bsrabs pa dang // sems ni ci 'dra bsdoms pa yis// thub pa chen po khyod 'dra ba'i// ston pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// sems can ma lus thams cad la// mnyam
248a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems cid pas bsupa dang // mnyam par sems ni bsgom pas na// thams cad zil gdon rgyal bar 'gyur// skye ba kun tu byang chub sems// me lam na rang sems deni
248a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dor bri 'gyur na mnyal che// sras ci 'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur// grong dang grong khyer rnams su 'am// gang tu gnas pa'i yul rnams su// byang chub la dri yang dag 'dzub
248a8(dkon brtsegs): nges na sems 'dor mi 'gyur// gang dang gang du skye ba yang // ji lar spobs ni cher 'gyur dang // rtag tu mthus 'phags pa dang // bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs 'gyur/
248b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzi zhing po sa byed zhing // sdug la mi 'jigs byinan ni// gang dang gad skyes par yang // des thabs ni ra 'gyur te// gang dum dzu yis 'phags pa dang // bdu rnams
248b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mi tshugs so// byang na pa sems dang byung ba de// 'jig rnye mgroran gyi ngo sum du// lung baman pa'i gyis nas su// seng gi yi ni dga' bar gyur// de ga rdzas
248b3(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig du// 'di sad kyi ni tshig sbas te// sdod pa bstan pa 'di la ni// bdag cag rjes su bslab par bgyi// de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum mdzad de// stong gsum po yang g.yos
248b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// ma ngam pas ni sangs rgyas la// ci ni ga slad du 'dzum mdzad pa// thung rjer lung bstan gsol zhes nus// de skad nu ba zhus pa dang // ma ngam pa las sangs rgyas kyis
248b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di sad ces da bka' stsal te// gang gi phyir ni 'jur mdzad pa/ me mang las 'dir nyin cig/ sangs rgyas byi ba brgyang chung ngo // gnan yang bye khrag khrig phrag bcul/
248b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub don du 'dus na ni// mi yi 'dren pa rnams la mdzod// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du// bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag rnams
248b7(dkon brtsegs): nga yis yongs su srin par byas// snang ba che zhes bya ba yi// bskal pa mdzes pa'i byang 'gyur te// de dag bskal pa gcig de'o// rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ste// shes rtag
248b8(dkon brtsegs): gi rgyal mtshan zhes// 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur// 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa ltar// de dag gi yang de 'drar 'gyur// byams pa nas ni bzung nas su// bskal pa
249a1(dkon brtsegs): sum brgya tshang bar ni// de'i bar du dus kun tu// rtag tu sangs rgyas phrad par 'gyur// 'di dag byang chub thob pa yi// ming ni gang sus thos pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'jig
249a2(dkon brtsegs): rten du/ kun mkhyen gang zag mtshungs med 'gyur// gang zhig lung bstan 'di thos nas// mos pa skyed par byed pa ni// 'jig rten gsum po 'di dag na// de dang mtshungs pa bsod nams med
249a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bsal pa drug stong du// sangs rgyas ning rnams thams cad du// rin chen rnams kyis bkar byas nas/ khyad chub phyir 'dir byin pa pas// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di// thos nas
249a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'jug na// sngar spos bsod nams kyis// grangs dang chur yang mi bong ngo // chos 'di bzad pa'i tshen ni// 'jig rten mgron po'i mthu yis ni// lha rnams me tog char pa 'bebs// stong gsu
249a5(dkon brtsegs): po yang g.yos par 'gyur// seng ge rdzogs dang bcas pa yi// mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas// lan bdun par du mchod byas te// bsan pa la ni rab byung // de dag kur gyis ti dzin thob// zang mi
249a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i gzungs kyang rdzog// sems can rnams kyi don byed de// sa sa rgyas chos la gus par byed// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa// sems cad byed phrag brgyad du/ byang chub mchogs na
249a7(dkon brtsegs): so/ com ldan 'dus kyis des braka' stsal nas// seng ge grogs dang bcas pa dang // sradang mi dngas ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa ngas te// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
249a8(dkon brtsegs): pamam ma bas pa/ bdags pa sa ma sa gas pa sam chun drug brgyam las// seng ge bus pa'i ma lus byas/
249b1(dkon brtsegs): gas so/ rgya gar sim khan pod dkri sa dang su'i brda dang / tsu ci grub par de 'i ses kyis pasgyur ci byas te// sang gas gas kyis kyang bcosanas na
249b2(dkon brtsegs): laphab pa malog drug ci'o// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ gsang rjen thabs la mkhas pa la'u su
249b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ro// ra gas ma rgyag ma dang / ya su da pa / sa na/ na dus
249b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas dang/ 'phags pamasas byas thams cad kyi gas mi thangs la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs dam pas zhus pa'i le'u sa bya ba breg chen po'i ma / sung rje dri
249b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di sang bdag gis thos pas dus gcig ma/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyir lu mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun ngasan
249b6(dkon brtsegs): rab na slob pa dang ni mi sponga'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri drug song thams kyang mngon par shes pa gzungs thob pa// slob pa thogs pa/
249b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa mngon par shes pa bsru bas bral mo khas pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan 'bum phrag dum dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dang 'gra sreg dang / thangs gcig tu rnams
249b8(dkon brtsegs): tede nas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma med kyi dus kyi cha nang du yang dag 'dzag las bzhengs nas 'ang ma lon par 'khor 'dum phrag dums ngas su bzor cing dngu gyis las nas cam na
250a1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa/ srog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ thamapa dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa
250a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su byang ba yang dag par bston to// de'i tsher byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus de 'dug par gyur po/ de nas byang
250a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ldeng sa la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
250a4(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhu zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
250a5(dkon brtsegs): laskabs dbye bar gnong na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' ni gzhu lags so// de skad ces
250a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yi shes dpapal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod cing ci 'dod pa de bzhin pa ce
250a7(dkon brtsegs): ngal dris shig dang / dus dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
250a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po ye shes ram pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gyis thabs la mkhas pa zhes bzhi
250b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas ma khas pa de bang lags/ bdun pa ma ldan 'dus dri la ran byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' rme mongs la mkhas pa lags des ces gsol pa
250b2(dkon brtsegs): ma ldan das kyis dung chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i gis dam pal 'dimad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs sa legs so// rigs kyi du zang
250b3(dkon brtsegs): mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi skye rol po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / nga lnga dang ma'os
250b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes pa rjes su yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / 'das pa dang
250b5(dkon brtsegs): mabyod pa dang / dgar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/ rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub
250b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dri bar sems pa ni/ rigs kyi bu yang khyod legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyor la tshul ba'in
250b7(dkon brtsegs): yid la zung shig dang / ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa khyod la bshang par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
250b8(dkon brtsegs): po ya shes dam pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ji ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
251a1(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni zan kham cig tsam yang sems can thams cad la sbyin par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen
251a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ gang gis rje dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa la zan kham cig tsam sbyin par byed na yang /
251a3(dkon brtsegs): de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin par byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya bar
251a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro// de rgyu gnyis kyis na sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang / yongs su bsdu
251a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas de nyid kyis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa
251a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas la rjes su yid rang bar byed cing / rjes su yi rang nas kyang sems can thams
251a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo na bdang ste/ yongs su bsngo bar yang byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i
