251a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par byed la/ len pa po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnod par byed de/ rigs kyi bu yang
251b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dren pa'i rtsibs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thobs la mkhas par phyogs bcu
251b2(dkon brtsegs): dmi dog gi ging ljon pa dang / sras kyi gang ljon pa dang / mdog dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / sdes dang / bye ma dang / byug pa bdag gir ma byas shing yongs su ma brdung bgang sring
251b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung zhing yongs su bsdus nas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'dul bar byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad la gtong ba
251b4(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ yongs su btang nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do// phyogs bcud ga na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / spos kyi sring ljon pa dang / me tog dang me nyos
251b5(dkon brtsegs): phreng dang / spos dang phye ma dang / byug pa bdag gi dang bcas shing yongs bzung ba dang bcas pa gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi dri rung gis btab pa'i dang de dag kyang byang chub sems pa
251b6(dkon brtsegs): blangs la mkhas pas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa bang ma
251b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rdzab des tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes
251b8(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa thob par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
252a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar
252a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad bsdus te/ chags par byed cing 'di ltar
252a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gi lus la 'bab par 'gyur zhing sems can de dag bde bar gyur cig ces go cha gyon par yang /
252a4(dkon brtsegs): byed do// phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa de ngag yang
252a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par bsdus te/ rjes su yi rang bar byed cing rjes su yi rang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad
252a6(dkon brtsegs): rab du zhi bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba dris sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu
252a7(dkon brtsegs): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni da bzhin
252a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ sangs rgyas
252b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ldan 'das rnams chos kyi byings gcig las nges par 'byung du dang / tshul khrims gcig pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gcig pa dang / shes rab gcig pa dang / rnam par grol
252b2(dkon brtsegs): ba gcig pa dang / rnam par grol ba yi shes mthong ba gcig pa dang / yigs gcig pa dang / rig pa gcig pa yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do// des de ltar so sor bzugs
252b3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dir shes par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur sti byas/ dra mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas/ bsnyen bkur byas pas ni de bzhin gshegs
252b4(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / bkur sti byas pa dang / bla mar byas pa dang / ri mo byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// snyam du shes par byed do/
252b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rjes bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mchod pa'i byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bsam pas
252b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs
252b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gnyid yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thebs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe blo rtul bar sbyar na yang / de bdag nyid khyad du gsod par mi byed cing nub par mi byed pa
252b8(dkon brtsegs): di ni than tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam la yang 'jug par byed cing de 'di ltar so sor rtog par yang byed de/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig po 'di'i don gang yin
253a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni gsung rab tu gshos pa thams cad kyi don yin no zhes so sor rtogs par byed do// des de ltar tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig kha ton du bslang
253a2(dkon brtsegs): nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po bskyed de/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags pa 'dod pa med pas glong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i
253a3(dkon brtsegs): pho brang 'khor dag tu skye bo mang po la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed cing / 'di ltar smon lam 'debs par yang byed de/ sems can gang su
253a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis bdag gis tshig bzhi pa'i rigs su bcad pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad blan mong pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces rmad la
253a5(dkon brtsegs): 'debs par yang byed do// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa des sems can thams cad kun dga' bo ltar mang du thos par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi
253a6(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gnan yang byang chub sems
253a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bas la mkhas pa ni gal te brgyal brgyal man dbul por gyur ma/ yang desun gnan gyi las kyang byas te/ kha zas rnal the gang tsam yang byas
253a8(dkon brtsegs): nas rnam pa med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun na ma gang zag la 'bul bar yang byed do// phul nas kyang nge 'dir mar so sang rdzog par byed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems pa/
253b1(dkon brtsegs): sa mye myed sa sus pasam 'as bdam sa tshu bya ba'i ma dzi du ma / sa ca sa rgyu da kyi sangs kyi rgya
253b2(dkon brtsegs): drag mang ngar 'gyur ros ma dus sa rtag par byed de/ dems cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems cad dong par gyur pa nges la zas dal ze ba mam pa de sbyin par byed cing bdag ga ge ba'i
253b3(dkon brtsegs): khra 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'dal sa dper na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gsags pa ma bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sams pa kya mub pa jil ba
253b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhid du skyes bu chen po'i mngan ro bro ba'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur zhing / lagan rin po che 'grub par gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo bar byed do// de dge ba'i rtsab thams cad mkhyen pa
253b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid yongs su brjes pa des byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang bil gyis gnon par 'gyur la// de dge
253b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur la/ lag na rin po che yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang #
253b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te nyan thos da
253b8(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams rje dang / lhan cig gnas par gyur kyang de dag la dga' bar mi byed cing / gal te byang chub
254a1(dkon brtsegs): sems papa la bas la mkhas pas na pas dang rangs sa rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yong la/ bdag la des ma yin par mang na yang de drum
254a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdag la rtog par byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
254a3(dkon brtsegs): las nges par byung ba ni la thos dang rangs su rgyas rnams yin nosam du bdag nyid lnga rtog par byed cing / de 'di ltar so sor rtog par yang byed de/ 'di ga la bsen bkur lhag pa
254a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dir ni bdag shin tu mchog dang shin tu gtso bo yin gyi 'ang dag ni ma yin no// 'di dag ni bdag gi pa'i nor gyi phung po la yongs su spyod par byed pa yin pas
254a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'di dag la dga' bar yang mi bya la/ 'di dag la phrag dog kyang byi'o// so sor rtog par mi byed do// des lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed par bdes gang gis
254a6(dkon brtsegs): de byin pashegs pa la bder ba byas kyang khengs par mi 'gyur la/ bsen pa kyi ma byas kyang num par mi 'gyur ning / sems can thams cad 'thugs mnyam nyid sa
254a7(dkon brtsegs): na par snang palta bu'i rjes su chags pa dang / 'od khro bsangs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bud yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs sa
254a8(dkon brtsegs): yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni sbyir ba sbyin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs
254b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba/ ri'i yongs su rdzogs par bden/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa'i gang gi tshe spongs mo po mthong ma de thams cadas
254b2(dkon brtsegs): da la dmigs teser bu'i sangs pa gcod par byed cing gtong ba chen po rang spel bar byed la skyed nosam pa'i sems kyang byed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i skyid pa'i ba
254b3(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa yin no// tshul khrims yang dag par drangs cing tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa gang yid pa de dag rdul khrings la
254b4(dkon brtsegs): 'god par byed cing sbyin pa byin nas/ 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'grod par byed pa grang yin pa de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/
254b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang / le lo med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa sems dang /
254b6(dkon brtsegs): brims pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / btung ba dang bldag pa dang / myang bdag
254b7(dkon brtsegs): mamangon par gus pa yang dgra par sgrub par byed cing rtsol bar byed pa dang / lus kyi rnal ta byed pa dang / sems kyis zhal dbyed pa dang / 'ang ba dang / 'gro ba dang /
254b8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// byin pa gang yin pa de la sems rtse gcig pa nyid dang // yid bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba
255a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba med pa la gang yin de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// sbyin pa byin nas chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag
255a2(dkon brtsegs): par gnol bar byed de/ sus byin su la byin/ ji zhig byin 'di'i rnam par sbyin pa sus myong bar 'gyur nas chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gnol bar byed cing des de ltar
255a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btsal nas kyang gang gis byin pa dang / gang la sbyin pa dang / ji nig byin pa dang / de'i rnam par smin pa myong bar byed pa gang yin pa'i chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs
255a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa sbyin pa sbyin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug
255a5(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
255a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa gang gis sems can rnams kyang 'khor ba las yongs su 'dzin
255a7(dkon brtsegs): par bcid la/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs
255a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
255b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni thabs la mkhas pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sbyin pa chung yang chen por byed la chen po dpag tu med pa dang / zangs red par
255b2(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yi shes dpo pa lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal ro// rigs kyi bu gnan yang byang chub se
255b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' sems chen po thobs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya la brgya lam na sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang ngam/ sems kun du rmongs pas zhes byung na yang de 'di ltar mo
255b4(dkon brtsegs): sor slob ste/ gal te bdag phung po dang khams dang skye mched 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na ni/ de lta na bdag gis yongs su gdung bar bya dgos
255b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur bas/ bdag gis 'di ltar go cha bgo bar bya ste/ bdag sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor bar 'khor bar bya ba
255b6(dkon brtsegs): la/ bdag gis sems zhum par mi bya/ 'jigs par mi bya/ sems skrag par mi bya/ yongs su gdung bar mi bya zhing / ji la ji ltar 'khor ba na 'khor ba 'gyur ba de
255b7(dkon brtsegs): lade ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / nyes par 'di yang chos bzhin du phyir bya zhing / phyin cad kyang nyes po ma 'byung zhi bar bya ba dang / bdag gis sems can
255b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang nyes pa la dbyung ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes go ca gyon par byed do// rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu
256a1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba na/ gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi po thams cad byung bar gyur na yang thabs la mkhas pa des sel bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'
256a2(dkon brtsegs): la nyes pa med ces smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
256a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rmongs pa dang bcas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i
256a4(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa la slob par byed na/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu zer byed cing sems can thams cad kyi legs par bya smras pa ltar/ nyes par smras so chog bzod par
256a5(dkon brtsegs): byed du zin kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gnas par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i nyes pa lci ba zhes
256a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di la se dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rtsa ba'i nyes pa byung bar gyur na phung po dang khams dang skye mched de dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
256a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i sel pa bye ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma shes ma spangs kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
256a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med cing / sangs rgyas kyis 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skal pa med de/ de ni gnas med do// de nas bcom
256b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshe dang lda bkun dga' bos 'di gang ces gsol to// bcud pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags pa/ mi mabyed pa ma
256b2(dkon brtsegs): ma gzigs pa'am/ thugs sum chung pa'am/ mngon sum du ma mdzad pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' la gas mong sde/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'das ces dge slong gis nyes
256b3(dkon brtsegs): babyung ba mthong na bcad par mi bya dar tshangs pa mtshungs par skyed pa gzhan dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar smos shig ces bka' stsal lagasangs/ btsun par
256b4(dkon brtsegs): ldadri 'das nyan yod na gyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mthor chags su bsod snyoms kyi srad du mchis pa na grong khyer gzhir zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can ba mchog rgyal
256b5(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bgyi ba khri'i steng na bud med cig dang lhan cig mchis pa mthong ba de dag byams pa dang ldan pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lags
256b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig de skad ces gsol nas ring po ma lon par de nas de'i modo la sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub se
256b7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'a tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar seng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags te 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces
256b8(dkon brtsegs): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa par snang la 'dug pas snyam 'am/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni mi
257a1(dkon brtsegs): nus so byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa 'di la rnga
257a2(dkon brtsegs): lngar na byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa dris shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yul yul por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/
257a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gtso bo chen po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongs su glengs pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa la
257a4(dkon brtsegs): nongs par chags shing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa gang lags pa de nongs pa la nongs par yongs su bzung du
257a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal po/ kun dga' bo khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bung/
257a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag la nyes pa'i 'du she snyam skyed cig/ kun dga' bo 'dri lta ste dper na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i 'du shes gang zag gcig pu zla med par ni gnas kyi gnas pas gnas
257a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa ni/ zag pa zang 'i mngon sum du bri ba lnga bar chad med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thobs la mkhas pa
257a8(dkon brtsegs): cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi sems dang na pa rung med kyi 'khor dam pa'i nang na 'dug cing dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed par byed pa yang thams cadas kyis
257b1(dkon brtsegs): cingal bar drugatsang pa med par rig par bya'o// deci'i phyir den/ kun dga' ngo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ dkon mchog gsum
257b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang nan/ sangasaN+Das dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / bladan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bgrod
257b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i g.yog 'khor gang yin pa de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi rdum
257b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang dga' ba dang / dga' mgur spyong par byed pa mthong na/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis skyes
257b5(dkon brtsegs): bu dam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu'i dbang po lnga dang ldan ning gnas pa yin par shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal
257b6(dkon brtsegs): so khri gcig gi steng bud med dang lhan cig 'dug par gyur pa yang nyon cig/ kun dga' bo bud med de ni 'das pa'i dus na tshe rabs lngar brgyar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rang
257b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/ de sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu de la lhag par sems kyis 'brel bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rang
257b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog rgyal po de'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang / tshul khrims kyi stobs bskyed pa mthong nas gnas ngan len gyi tshig rjod par ma nus nas/ de gcig pu dben par 'dug pa na 'dis
258a1(dkon brtsegs): bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po de bdag dang lhan cig khri steng na 'dug par gyur na/ bdag gis
258a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o sam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos sring mo de'i sems kyi yongs su
258a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa sems kyis shes nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / lnga dro'i dus kyi reg mthangs dang chos gos bgros te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod
258a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na sring mo de'i khyim ga la ba der zhugs nas/ nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i
258a5(dkon brtsegs): khams gang yin pa'i sa'i khams gang yin pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni/ gcig pa yin pa'i chos kyi sgo 'dis des sa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis lag pa g.yas pas sring mod bzung
258a6(dkon brtsegs): me/ khri gcig pa 'khod do// 'khong mthag tu des de'i mtshigs su brjod pa 'dri yang smras so// sa sargyas 'dod pa bsngags mdzad// de byis pa'i snod yul yin// 'dod la sred
258a7(dkon brtsegs): pasang byas na// mi mchog sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur// kun dga' bo de nas sring mo des tshigs su bcad pa thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ khri de las babs
258a8(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod gang sangs rgyas spang pa dag/ slan cad don/
258b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyer mi bcing // 'dod sred pasangs bcas nas// mi mchogasangs rgyas su bkur cig/ bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams pa'i// nongs pa de khyong lachags// srog chags su
258b2(dkon brtsegs): nang mang du/ bdag byang chub 'dun pa snyed/ kun dga' bo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal nges thabs la mkhas pa des sring mo bla med pa yang dag par
258b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ yang dag par bzed bstod/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par rab tu banag nas stan las langs te song ngo // kun dga' bo de'i lhag pa'i bsam nga'i khyad du
258b4(dkon brtsegs): par la ltos te/ kun dga' bong ni sring mo dro 'di nas shi bos nas/ bud med kyi lus bsgyur te/ bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gsheg
258b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang bra'ang zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nges byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas
258b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi ning de na yang sems can mi dge ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar lung son te/ kun dga' bo rnams grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang
258b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'khor gang bzung na log par ltung ba'i chos su 'gyur ba de lnga 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po sa
258b8(dkon brtsegs): snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsud pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub
259a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' di/ thabs la mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag ni 'di snyam du gal te/
259a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i srad du/ 'di lta bu'i nongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nongs pa ji lta bu byung bas bskal pa
259a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bum gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg par 'gyur yang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sa ni nongs pa 'byung ba de dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug
259a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal de la spro bar bgyi lags kyi/ sems can gcig po de'i dge ba'i rdzab yongs su btang bral ni ma lags so snyam du sems lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
259a5(dkon brtsegs): sengs gas ga rgyal du la legs nas byung / skyes dri sa pa legs sa mi gas pa/ khyod sems da che pa sbyi sa
259a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la nyes pa thams cad spong bar yang byed do// de ci'i phyir 'om rigs kyi bungs mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs
259a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya chung / dpag tu med pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i khye'u sar ma zhes bya ba ni ga byung bar 'gyur te/ des lo dran rna
259a8(dkon brtsegs): nga gi bar du dgas 'ad ba dag tu/ tshangs par srung bsrud nas/ de la bas dri nyis song po de dag 'das pa dang / rgyal ba'i ba drang legs 'byor ces bya bar tshugs sa// de grong
259b1(dkon brtsegs): nathang zhugs par 'tshang dro kyi bu mig gis bram ze'i khye'u gzugs pazang ba mdzes pa pasnga sdug pa de thong nas/ de'adang pal 'dod chags kyis ku nas pas
259b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyi/ bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun rab tu brgyugs te rkang pa la gtugs so// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma des bu mo de la 'di sad ces sbas so// sring mo del
259b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci 'dod/ des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u kho ma ni khyod la 'tshal lo// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo kho bo ni 'dod pa rngabs don du gnyer ba ma
259b4(dkon brtsegs): na gyi mi thon tshangs par srid pa yin naM/ des de la 'di nang kyis smras so// zam ze'i khye'u gal te khyod dang lan cig tu 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba ltang bdag 'gum par 'chu
259b5(dkon brtsegs): lags so// de nas byang chung ma ze'i khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ bdag gis lo ni khri'i skyong gi bar du tshangs par spyad pa sbyang nas deng tshul zhugs gzhig pa'adi
259b6(dkon brtsegs): ri bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no sam nas/ des bu mo de mthus spangs te/ bor nas gom pa bdun bor ba dang / de gom pa bdun pa ba la gnas pa'i tshe/ snying rje skyes pa
259b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis brtul zhugs bshig ste/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur kyang / bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyurab
259b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzod par bya ning / bu mo 'di bde bar 'gyur ba dang / 'chi ba'i dus bye bar mi 'gyur bar bya gor ma chagasum mo// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u sar ma ringaras phyir log
260a1(dkon brtsegs): lag pa g.yas pas bu mo bzung nas/ de la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang mo longs shig dang / kho bas khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o// de nas bram rje
260a2(dkon brtsegs): khye'u skar ma de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyim na gnas nas/ yang mngon par byung te/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhin skyed nas/ de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du/
260a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur to// rigs kyi bu dri'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tsom za bar gyur/ khyod kyi de ltar mi bltan
260a4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhen/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba der gyur to// shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma re de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur to// rigs kyi bungs
260a5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des/ cung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor ba spel cing spangs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu
260a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar
260a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba ma// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pa'i shes dpral la 'din ces bka' phrul to// rigs kyi bugs te dge nga
260a8(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu dag thabs la mkhas pa yid par gyur na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dpral bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir nan/ rigs kyi bu
260b1(dkon brtsegs): mdza par 'ashes pa'i phyir te sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhir gshegs par dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung ba la dge slong drimi
260b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chos snga ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de dgon pa'i phug gcig na gnas so// de dang hacang yang mi ring ba na drang srong lnga brgyani grwa kyang gnas te/ de'i tshen dus su yin pa'i sgon chen po
260b3(dkon brtsegs): dus ning char chen po bab par gyur to// de nas bud med gnyis zhig grong bar gyi lam na 'dug pa de gnyis char pa de bskyabs pa'i phyir dge slong dri med gnas pa'i phug tu zhugs te/
260b4(dkon brtsegs): zug de nas phyir byung ba dang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bud med de gnyis dge slong dri med kyi phug nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsom po de dag
260b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du/ e ma'o dge slong dri med 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa mi tshungs par spyod pa yin no snyamA nas tha dang zhe sdang gi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// de nas dge slong dri med kyis drang srong
260b6(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ de'i tshe steng gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun srin tsam du mngon par 'phags te/ 'dug pa drang srong de ngag
260b7(dkon brtsegs): gis mthong nas de dag 'dri snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi bstan bcos dag las ni mtshangs par spyod pa ni steng sa par snang la mngon par 'phags te/ 'jug par mi nus /
260b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes 'byung ngosam nas/ de dag gis de'i modo la dge slong dri med kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas btugs te/ nyes pa la nyes rab bshegs so// rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong /
261a1(dkon brtsegs): dri med de/ de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te/ 'dug par mgyur na ni/ drang srong lnga brgya tsham po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmal
261a2(dkon brtsegs): ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tsom tha
261a3(dkon brtsegs): khar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir ner/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong dri med ces bya ba der gyur to// rigs kyi bu rnam
261a4(dkon brtsegs): grangs des ni khyod kyis 'di ltar gal te/ dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis po de'i tshe steng gi bar snang las mngon par 'phags te/ 'dug par 'gyur na ni// dge slong ko ka
261a5(dkon brtsegs): li ka yang sems can dmyal bar gro bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i yeshes
261a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'a' pa den nyan thos dang rung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'dil ste dbyer na/ srang rtsod ma stuN+Dal drug cus bani'i bya bzhes shing legs
261a7(dkon brtsegs): ra longs pa ni 'og tu nor 'dod pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du 'dzin nas kyang bdag cid yongs su ga/ nga ning dga' so ba dang / ji srid du skyes bu de las don thams cadam bsnyungs
261a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar du de la yo byad thams cad kyang sri bar mi byed pa de lta de ltar gnas par byed do// de nas don bsgrubs zin pa'i 'og tu dmis mi sems par spong bar byed cing nge gni las 'azod pa
261b1(dkon brtsegs): sems gcig sapa dang 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu drang du ba sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang zabs ma mkhas dres sems can 'di ga yongs su sri par bya'o nas byab shes
261b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ rnamazangs des sems can de dag gi bsam pajis pa bzhin du drung du sbyor bar byed cing / de dag la lo byang thams cad kyang mi sred par byed do// sems can rnams kyi dge ba lang ma
261b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyang yongs su gdong bar byed kyi yo byad la dga' bas ni ma yin no// gang gim kye ma sems can 'di ga ni dge ba'i rma byas par gyur pa dag ste/ 'di dag gis phyis yongs sunyam par
261b4(dkon brtsegs): byed mi nus par shes na ni/ de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la mi lta bar spangs te 'gro ning de de dang 'brel pa'i sems la gnas par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di la ste dper na
261b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni kha dog yongs su nyams pa med la/ myu gu 'byung ba'i skal pa ni med pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang song ba nyid
261b6(dkon brtsegs): rang mtshan ma med pa dang / sngonang med pa dang / bdag med dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gdungs na/ de 'dod pa'i ga' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed kyang / log par
261b7(dkon brtsegs): lung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyis kha dog la yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'ang la ste dper na/ dung 'gro'i skye
261b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas su song ba'i srog chags bung ba ni me tog thams cad las dri sdom zhing ro myang bar byed kyang gang la yang rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par mi byed/ gnas kyi sred pa skyed par mi byed cing / de dag
262a1(dkon brtsegs): las dri dang mdab pa dang / sdong bu dang / me tog 'phrog par mi byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs
262a2(dkon brtsegs): su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo thams cad la yongs su longs spyod par byed kyang / de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes gom par yang mi byed/ gnas kyi sred pa
262a3(dkon brtsegs): skyed par mi byed la/ bdag kyang sbas par mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang sbas par mi 'gyur bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nya ba shin tu legs par bslabs pa ni srang
262a4(dkon brtsegs): bu gcig la gzan btags te mchil pa byas nas mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro// de srad pu legs pa gcig pu des gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na mtsho chen po nas mchil pa de
262a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang / stong pa nyid dang / me tog mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med
262a6(dkon brtsegs): gis rab kyi rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas sems thams cadam khyed pa nyid la brgyan par gta ngas/ 'dod pa'i dam chen por 'jug par byed b+ha
262a7(dkon brtsegs): dethams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa des/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i rjen/ 'dod pa'i khams spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do//
262a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ skyes bu rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba ni rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bzung ste/ nags pa lnga'i 'chings pas bcings par gyur kyang
262b1(dkon brtsegs): nga brang gi 'gro bar 'dad pade'i ma/ riganags dang gsang sngags kyi bas bskyed pa gcig gis mangs pa dang gathams cad bcang nas par tu'agro bar 'dong de das
262b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'athabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon dar lnga po dag gis dga' ba rjo
262b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed cing de dag dang 'dra bar gnas par byed kyang / de gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i chen// shes rab kyi rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi sa pas bskyed pa dang / thams ca
262b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad rab tu bcad de/ de bas shi 'phros nas tshangs pa'i 'jig
262b5(dkon brtsegs): rten du skye bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phong gi spobs dpon legs par bslabs pa ni ga ral gri rnon po rwas bcos bus dkris pa gcig thogs te/
262b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dron pa mang po skal bar byed pa de na/ sems can mi mkhas pa 'bong gi shes pa'i bya ba mi shes pa'i bya ba mi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'bong gi slob dpon de la snying rje ba
262b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ban pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed cing tshig 'di skad ces/ gzhu yang med ral gri yang med/ dong ba yang med/ 'khor kyang med pa 'dis ni 'dzin pa 'di dag bsngal
262b8(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus te/ 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar bar byed mi nus na/ 'dron pa thams cad bsngal ba dang / chom rkun pa'i sde pham par bya ba lnga ci smos te/ de ni gnas med pa'o/
263a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer bar gyur la/ dengs 'phong gi slob dpor de 'brog dgon par song te/ chom rkun pa'i tshogs lpags
263a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na mnga' gzhu thogs te/ go ra sra ba bgos nas mtshon cha dag zas te/ chom rkun pa rnams la 'debs par byed cing des chom kun pa de dag thams cad srog dang bral nas
263a3(dkon brtsegs): yang mtshon cha la ga tu len par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sa rab kyi
263a4(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te/ thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba dang rtse ba dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed pa de na nyan thos kyi
263a5(dkon brtsegs): theg pa pa gang drag de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i shes pa de khong du chud pa de dag gis de mthong ba'i cha/ de dag de lam dad pa dang / snying rje bskyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces
263a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bag med pa'i gnas pa 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar byed mo rus na/ sems can thams cad bskal ba ri la ji sros shing bdud kyi sdeb pa par byed par lag la 'gyur
263a7(dkon brtsegs): doni gnas med pas 'drin tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro nas kyang zer mong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'athabs la mkhas pa dang shes rab kyis lags par yongs su
263a8(dkon brtsegs): nga ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i chen/ shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad dral cing rab tu gtubs nas/ shes rab dang lhar cig tu sangs rgyas kyis zhing bung
263b1(dkon brtsegs): meng dang dram pa dang / 'khrig pa dang bral bzhin tu yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do// grang sa 'di brjod par gyur pa de'i cher byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
263b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' byed ces bya ba mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod nams kyi phyir zhugs par gyur te/ de nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod sams sbyong ngam chong por rig mi
263b3(dkon brtsegs): khyib du byur ba dang / tshong dpor de la bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog ces bya ba phyugs chung ni ga yod par gyur pa/ khang ba dngas kyi steng na 'dug pa des dge slong de'i srang thos
263b4(dkon brtsegs): bam snyoms thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed ga la ba der song ngo // de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog gi byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed mthong ma thag tu
263b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis dpe byad las byud bzhin dang / sgra skad dang / kha dog gi ma bzung ba dang / de 'dod chags kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang /
263b6(dkon brtsegs): de 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems kyis bsregs pa
263b7(dkon brtsegs): mus rnam par gyur nas/ bzeng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dgar byed kyang bu mo nga la yon ta can gyi mchog mthong bas/ tshul bzhinapa
263b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyes par gyur nas/ yud tsam nig na de la dran pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/ chos gang la
264a1(dkon brtsegs): chags par gyur pa'i chos de gang yin/ ci mig la mig chags pa/ mig ni chags pa ma yin te/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ sems pa med pa/ 'dus byas pa
264a2(dkon brtsegs): rim pa bdun pa shA ri'i bu yin te/ mig de ni rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir sems par mi byed/ tshor bar mi byed do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dang / pags pa dang
264a3(dkon brtsegs): mdog dang sha yang de dang 'dra ste/ des rkang mthil yan cad klad man cad kyi bar la so sor brtags na/ na nga dang phyi rol na gang chags par 'gyur ba 'am/ ldang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs
264a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' yang ma dmigs so// des ma dmigs nas 'dod chags kyi sems deng bral gyur cing / des sems kyis yang dag pa jil ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas/
264a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ma skyes par rig nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis seng gi bar snang la ta la 'dun srid tsam du mngon par
264a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags te/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po ldan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ nam mkha' di nyid las rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song
264a7(dkon brtsegs): ma pa gces pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga'abyed seng gi bar srang las rang pa'i rgyal po lta chags pa med par
264a8(dkon brtsegs): ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snga
264b1(dkon brtsegs): las dang pa'i rgyal po lngar chags pa med par 'ong ba mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phral pa/ ku dag
264b2(dkon brtsegs): ngo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed 'das ni 'dod chags kyi'i sems la brten te/ chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas/ bdud kyi sde 'dul cing chos kyi
264b3(dkon brtsegs): mkho longar du bskur to// de nas du mo dang la yon can gyis mchog 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bud med kyi lus spangs te/ mtho ris kyis rjen du skyes pa'i lus theg cing sum
264b4(dkon brtsegs): masum pa'i rnarnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so// skyes mthag tu de la 'ad pa tshes bdud las byas pa'i gnal med khang dpag chad bcu gnyis pa yang byang sar gyur/ de'i ma
264b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i bsnyen bkur ma lha'i bu mo khri bzhi stong yang nye bar gnas par gyur to// de'i mod la des bdag gis las ji ltar zhig byas shing bsags pas 'dir skyes par gyur snyam du bas
264b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de 'dis ma du gyur te/ bdag ni mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po'i tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa las den bdag gis kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
264b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dga' byed la bltas pa dang / bdag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyi 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bud med kyi lus rjes sute bdag gis 'dir skyes pa'i
264b8(dkon brtsegs): lus tho ba cing / bdag la 'byor ba dag tu byed pa 'di dag kyang byung bar gyur to snyam nas/ sngon gyi las rjes su dran pa bshis pa yang skyes par gyur to// de nas lnga'i bu de 'di snyam du sems
265a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi sems las kyang rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis dad pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la
265a2(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas shing / bsnyen bkur byas na lha mos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag 'dod pas dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang dga' dgur spyod cing bag med pa'i gnas pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma
265a3(dkon brtsegs): yin zhing / mi rigs kyis bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der 'gro bar bya gor ma chag skam mo// de nas lha'i bu de
265a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dag thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
265a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' byed ga la ba der song nas/ kha dog shin tu 'phags pa la shin tu 'phags pa'i snang ba chen pos rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal snang bar byas te/ lha'i bu me tog dang spos dang / me dog
265a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
265a7(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun partsa
265a8(dkon brtsegs): 'byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi kun sngar bral mo yug phug por gyur nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab// byang chub
265b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas su ng+yas mches/ 'di shegs rnam rgyardzas byung bam pa rgya lags che rnams kyi pa 'ang bsam sa / ni
265b2(dkon brtsegs): por gyur// tshong dpon bu mo dpal yon mchog ces brtse// mdzes shing thog mar phyugs chung gyur pa lags// pha ma'i gro bar mchi zhing rab tu byams// sangs rgyas sras po rje
265b3(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur pa// mthu chen dga' byed ces bgyi gang lags pa// bsod snyoms spyod cing mnyan yod rgyu ba'i tshe// de ni bdag gi pha ma'i khyim du mchis// sang stan yid du
265b4(dkon brtsegs): bathos gyur nas// bdag chags sems skyed bsod soms ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po gang lags pa// dga' byed mthu chen gol mchis par mchis// mthong
265b5(dkon brtsegs): mthag tu dadag ni 'dod chags dang // ldan batshul bzhin lags sems skyes de// gal te de ltar bsams bzhin ma mjal na// srog la mil 'gum pa'i dus bca sa
265b6(dkon brtsegs): rdul bzhin pa lags 'dod pas rab gdungs nas// de la bka' mching brjod par bgyi ba dang // bsod snyoms stsol ba'i rngo yang mthog nas// rdul byung dar ni 'greng
265b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gum par gyur// bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi 'phor ba'i tshe// skad cig dri la bud med lus spangs te// shi 'phros mtho ris 'jig rten skyes pa nyid 'ang thob// rin chen snga
265b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs blta na stug pa yi// gzhal med khang mchog mdzes pa grub 'gyur cing // bdag gi g.yog 'khor lha'i bu mo ni// khri dang bzhi stong chang ba'ang byung bar gyur
265b9(dkon brtsegs): mabadag ma dzong gas
266a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la sems bzang byung bar gyur pa ni// sug las gang gi rnam smin 'di 'dra ba// rjes su dran nas ngan bu 'di sam bgyid// chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di
266a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ste// dga' byed yin dga' 'od gsal mkhas pa la// chags bcas sems kyis bdag gis bltas gyur pas// sug las de'i rnam srin bzang po des// ngan bu gzi brjid mthu
266a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs 'di 'dra ba'i// chags bcas sems kyi rnam sprin 'di 'dra na// gang gis de la mchod bgyis ci smos te// gang la bde bar gshegs mkhyen par 'jug 'gyur ba// de ni nyan thos
266a4(dkon brtsegs): rang rgyal sA mA lags// ngan bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar ni// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog ra ba dang // bskal bral gang 'ga'i bye steng spyang bgyi bar// bang gi dam bcas
266a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sang mi gyi// dge ba'i shes gnyen dga' byed dam pa la// chos kyi mchod pa mchod pa mchog gis mchod par bgyi// gang dag byang chub 'tshal ba ma gtogs pa// gzhan gyis
266a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dil 'dren rnams mchod mi 'gyur// dud med gang dag 'dod chags sems kyis ni// bdag la rtogs pa bud med lus bsgyur nas// de kun 'jigs med skyes bathob 'gyur bar
266a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub spyad mchog dam pa srung bar bgyi// lus rdul zhi bar gyur pa mthong nas ni// bu mo'i pi mchod 'de bas byed cing // dge slong de yis byang stem byas sam ste// du ning dge slong rnams
266a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe mi sbyin brjod// sangs chos mthu yis lnga'i bu do// bsod nas pa ma dgal tshig sbas pa// dge slong mini ni sdang khror byed// yun ring sdug bsngal 'gyur ba ma byed cig
266b1(dkon brtsegs): dzu mo pa la yon ci 'phos gang yin te// sum bcu cu gsum sbal pa mnyam gyur cing // des ni bud med sus kyang spangs pas te// de ni lha'i bu bo 'od gas la zur// bde bar gnams
266b2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen sngar khyed reng la// khro ba'i sems kyi nyes pa 'di rtogs shig/ sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni mi rtogs par// sems can rnams kyi dpung nan gnas gzhan med// 'jigs
266b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo yis legs par bskul byas pas// pa ma gnyis kyis sangs rgyas spa thos nas// nye du'i tshogs dang ldan cig 'thogs gyur te// shAkya thub pa'i spyad sngar du 'dong bar gyur//
266b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khro ba'i sems kyi nyes par bshags byas nas// dri bzhin gshegs la gus dang byas te// bde gzugs rang byung la ni'u rus pa// ji tsam gyis
266b5(dkon brtsegs): na 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// chos dang dge 'dun ji ltar mchod pa lags// zhus pa de yi la ni stsal tu gsol// thos nas de bzhin gnas bgyi gzhan ma legs// rgyal bas de dag
266b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dag mkhyen nas// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad mchod 'dod pa// de yis bstan par byang chub sems skyed cig
266b7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo'i pa dang ma dang nye du ni// lnga brgya tshang ba nyung ba ma yin pas// skyes bu khyu mchog de'i gsung thos nas// byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bsan par bskyed// rgyal bas kun dga'
266b8(dkon brtsegs): bzang la bka' stsal pa// kun dag 'ji skad bshad pa 'di nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam yas te// shes rab thabs la mkhas pa'ang de bzhin no// dga' byed smon
267a1(dkon brtsegs): lam yang dang yang 'debs pa// bud med gang dag chags pa'i sems kyis ni// bdag la rtog pa bud med lus spangs nas// de dag myur du skyes bu 'jig
267a2(dkon brtsegs): med shog/ bud med gcig min gnyis dang gsum min te/ bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po rnams// gang dag dga' byed la ni chags gyur pa// de dag thams cad shi 'phos
267a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur// kun dga' 'dod chags bskyed pa gcig gi ni// sems can gnan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur ba// de yis dpal rnams mtho ris 'gro 'gyur zhing // skyes
267a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i yon tan de 'dra ltos// lha'i bu gang gis nga la mchod byas te// gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog zhugs pa// des ni sangs rgyas bye mang mchod byas nas/
267a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba blta na mdzes zhes bya bar 'gyur// lnga brgya gang dag byang chub zhugs gyur pa// de dag mi mchog rnams su 'byung bas// gang la dang byas bde ba bsam yas pa'i/
267a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon la su nig gus mi byed// gang dag nyon mongs rnams kyang bde sbyin na// gang dag gus byed de la ji smos pa// grags chen sran gyi rgyal po lta bu'i// byang chub
267a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams la su snang myeng // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'dri skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper brtson/
267a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am// dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ chos kyi bar du bcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang
267b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mngag/ ri'i tshul pa'i rab kyi drung du mchis na/ de dag thams cad 'din te// gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par gyur bde bani du/ btsun pa ma ldana'as se
267b2(dkon brtsegs): can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ chos kyi bar du gcong pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dan
267b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na yang de ga thams cad 'angs sde rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid bye la dog tu sems gcig tu 'gyur ba lags pas/ brgyan pa
267b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan char byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ri'i rgyal poro rab dang 'dra bar 'dzin lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste dper bgyim/ srad
267b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi rigs chen po blta mdzes bgyi ba mchis te/ sems can rab tu ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can bro nad sna tshogs kyis thethabs
267b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang la la dag gis de mthong na/ de dag thams cad kyi bro nad rnams rab tu ni bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sem
267b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'am/ rang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / nyin mas
267b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bro nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/ kun dga' bo ji skad sbas pa de bzhin te/ legaso
268a1(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de das bcom ldan 'das lnga me dang mun pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
268a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar ni ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas pa dag gis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ sems can rnams la snying
268a3(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba'i srad du/ 'dod pa'i khams na yang kun tu gda' ba dang / song pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / spon pa mchis pa dang / mngon par 'dub gyi ba mchis pa'i chos
268a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang reg par mi bgyid pa dang / snying rje chen po yang kun tu skyed par bgying la/ thams
268a5(dkon brtsegs): nga mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la yang 'jug par bgyid pa de ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar lags te/
268a6(dkon brtsegs): ba bar gshegs pa ni mchog tu cher legs so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dgachags pa rnams cad srung bar
268a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di sa sa/ gzugs dang / sA dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya'i chags padag la skyed par bcid kyang / de dag la chags par yang mi 'gyur pa de dag ni thibs lam
268a8(dkon brtsegs): babasam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te/ dpe' zhig
268b1(dkon brtsegs): thubs leg so// bde bar gshegs pa srangs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyad spongs par gyis shig/ 'odus
268b2(dkon brtsegs): thos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di sa sa dper na/ 'grog dgon pa chen po nig mchis par gyur la/ 'jig dgon pa chen pa de la rang sring pa mong
268b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i ra ba mchis par gyur cing 'jog dgon pa chen po dang yang srog chags 'bum phrag dum ni gzhugs par 'gyur la/ 'brog dgon pa chen po de la yang
268b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgo ni gcig cig mchis par 'gyur cing / 'brog dgon pa chen po de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ grong khyer chen po 'byor brgyas pa/ gsang lo legs pa
268b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo dang ma mang pos kun tu bltam pa nyams dga' ba zhig kyang mchis par gyur la/ grong khyer chen po de la yang chab ste ni gcig mchi bar gyur cing / gang dag grong khyer
268b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po der zhugs par gyur pa dang ga ni/ rga ba dang 'gu ba ma mchis par gyur la/ zong khyer chen po de na yang mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi rdul shin tu dog cing nyam pa zhig kyang
268b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis shing de'i g.yas g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yangs chen po dag kyang mchis par 'gyur la/ de nas 'brog dgon pa chen po de'i dbus na sems can ma
268b8(dkon brtsegs): pa nib pa gro ba gzhungs pa/ sems can thams cad la don du 'gyur bar 'tshal ba/ spad par 'tshal pa/ bde' bar 'tshal ba/ grub pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba/ srad
269a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal ba/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig byung bar gyur nas/ des 'brog dgon pa chen po der 'di skad ces/ kye grogs po dag kho bo ni
269a2(dkon brtsegs): khyed cag gi yongs su skyob pa yin te/ 'brog dgon pa chen po 'di nas ha cang yang mi ring ba na grong khyer chen po 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba zhig yod de/
269a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag der zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni/ rga ba dang / 'chi ba med par 'gyur ning sems can dpag tu med pa rnams skye ba dang / rba ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las yang dag par 'ad
269a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos ston par yang 'gyur bas/ sems can shes pa dang ldan pa ga tshur sheg/ grong khyer chen po der dong ngo // zhes spa bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar bgyis par gyur na/
269a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan sems can dben pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'di skad ces/ bdag cag 'di nas kyang mi g.yo bar gdams shing / rjes su bstan
269a6(dkon brtsegs): pade yang 'tshal la bdag cag 'dun gnas bzhin du zong khyer de na mchis pa'i yon dran de dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur cig ces mchi lags so// sems can rgya chen po la mos pa sa
269a7(dkon brtsegs): nang lags pa de gni 'din ceste/ bdag cag ni khyod rim pa bzhin du thong khyer de nas rmi lags so// sems ca pasad rnams rlung badrag lags pa de ga
269a8(dkon brtsegs): na cing thos nas kyang dad pa mi bgyid cing / skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin rten du mchi bar mi bgyid lags te/ de nas skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de 'brog dgon po chen po
269b1(dkon brtsegs): sa su byung ba dang / des nanul de yang mthong bar gyur/ des mtho gang tsam gyi shul zhin 'dog nya mang ba de yang mthong bar gyur/ shul de'i grayas g.yon ma thu 'dum tham mchis par
269b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yangs chen po de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas/ des g.yas g.yon gyi g.yangs de dag rtsig pa dang srang leb kyis bkum ste// lag banis 'phye zhing shul de las 'da' bar bgyid la
269b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yas gsod su yang mi la bar srang bzhin du phyir rgol bsdu 'byedan cing 'jigs pa ston par ga mchi yang slar mi ltal skye ning ying byung ba yang ma mchis par phul der mchi bar 'gyur ba
269b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / ji la ji lar mchi bar 'gyur ba de la de ltar grong khyer de mthong bar yang 'gyur la/ ji lta ji lar mthong ba de la de ltar de'i 'jigs pa drang 'jigs su rung ba dang thams cad kyang ma
269b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis par 'gyur zhing / grong khyer der zhugs na rga ba dang 'gum pa dang / brond pa mchis par 'gyur la/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don brjid cing skye ba dang /
269b6(dkon brtsegs): rga ba dang bro 'tshal ba dang / 'gum pa las yang dag par bsrad du chos ston par yang bgyid pa zhig mchis/ btsun phra bcom ldan 'das de la 'brog dgon pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de
269b7(dkon brtsegs): ri'akhor ba'i dgon pa'i tshig blo dgas lags so// sred pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i rab zhes byadren ma rig pa dang srid pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// 'jog dgon pa chen po de
269b8(dkon brtsegs): yang rmugs 'bum phrag du ma zhugs par gyur la zhes bgyi de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi tshig blang gas lags so// 'brog dgon pa chen po de la chabasgo ni gcig cig ma
270a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur cing / zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni bgrod pa gcig pa'i shul blta bar bgyi lags so// skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba
270a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams blta bar bgyi lags so// sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can gnas de las kyang
270a3(dkon brtsegs): mi gsol/ zong khyer gyi yon tan yang 'tshal pa de dag ji lnga bde bzhin du ni can thos dang / rangs sar+b+bas thams cad balnga bar bci lags so// sems cad rgya chen po la mos pachig
270a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bdag cag ni khyod ci lta ba de bzhin du/ grong khyer der mchi lags so zhes mchi ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag
270a5(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bgyi lags so/ sems can bsod nams chu nga sra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun du rgyu dag
270a6(dkon brtsegs): gicig bla dgas so/ 'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba zhes brtsi ba ji la ba de bzhin du ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par bsngos pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus
270a7(dkon brtsegs): brnams pa dal pa kyi gas s+ho// mjo gang rdzas gyi do tul nas pakyi de la pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings blta bar bgyi lags so// goms gdon ma khra dus tsham
270a8(dkon brtsegs): nga'i bayangs chen po zhes bgyi ba dejil bde bani du ni nyan rdzas dang rangasangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnams bas par bgyi lags so// de'i galas g.yon gyi g.yangs de dag ni/
270b1(dkon brtsegs): dar leb kyis bku sde zhes bgyi bde ji lta ba bzhin du ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas par lta bar bgyi lags so// lag bzhis 'phyi na du yul dems
270b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ra' bar bgyi ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po nis sems cad dpag tum mchis pa rnams sud cing yang dag par ngor bgyid pa dge balnga
270b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi lags so// srad pazhir du phyir rgol bsna 'byir cing 'jigs pa sdod pa dag mchi yang nis bgyi de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni bdud dang bdud kyi ris Sh+ya'i bu rnams kyang blta bar bgyil
270b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhinar du sems can sdug pa'i mngon par zhin pa yongs su nyon mongs pa can gyi las kun du spyod par bgyid pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'phyang dang rtsod par bgyi
270b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag kyang blta bar bgyi lags so// slar yang mi lta la zhes bgyi ba de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa sems bskyed pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so//
270b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yas g.yon su'ang mi lta bar nyes bgyi ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sA la mi dga' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// grong khyer
270b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshe bla dgas lags so// ji la ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur de la de ltar grong khyer der mthong bar yang 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba de ring
270b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gshegs pa bsnyengs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshig sa dgas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang /
271a1(dkon brtsegs): le shes la nges par rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la shin tu legs par slob pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so
271a2(dkon brtsegs): jil ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar dri'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba thams cad kyang me mchis par 'gyur zhing zhes bgyi ba de ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa ma mchis shing
271a3(dkon brtsegs): the tshom dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i tshig bla dgas lags/ grong khyer der zhugs na rga ba dang 'gum pa dang / bron dam mchis par 'gyur ning sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don
271a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid la skye ba dang / rga ba dang bro dang 'gum pa las yang dag par zla ba'i slad du chos ston par yang bgyid ces bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
271a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// brgyan pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yeshes dang ldan pa lags pa btsun pa cod ldan pa
271a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad le phyag 'tshal lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byid /
271a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung legs so lags so// 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spo bskyed pa ri/ yang khyod kyi lags ste/ 'od srung khyod kyis dpeng
271a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzong ba des su dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags khri nyis bong gis bla me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sengs
271b1(dkon brtsegs): ngasal pa 'as sems pa sa pa ma ma du bdu pa na pa nga sa sas sa
271b2(dkon brtsegs): mgad par 'gyur ba'ang/ gzhanal 'and par 'gyur ba de la bu las mi byed cing chug gang gis bdag dang gzhin la gdung bar 'gyur pa del bu'i cig kyang mi ga
271b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol po/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis
271b4(dkon brtsegs): de skad du/ byang chub sems dpe' ni tshig gang gis bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur de lta bu'i tshig mi smra'o zhes bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'on ci'i slad du/
271b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pas bram ze'i khye'u 'od gsor 'phreng zhes brtsi bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma bcom pa yang dag pa
271b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par me mdzad kyi gsung rab 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la dzin ga bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas// dge
271b7(dkon brtsegs): skyong mgro reg la byang chub ga la yod ces gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces gsungs pa ngaci las dgongs te gsungs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
271b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
272a1(dkon brtsegs): myong ba'i tshar rab tu rnam par dbye bas khyod la ci bya thong shig/ de ci'i phyir ne ma/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs lam
272a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam kyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas skyes bu dam dang ga ni ji lta ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de lta
272a3(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi 'on kyang legs par rang du nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bcung
272a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mer me mdzad tshun cad du thabs la mkhas pa bsam ci mi
272a5(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa gang yin pa de dag las phyogs tsam nig bstan par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
272a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos ladzod pa thob pa'i bar der byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khrul pa med pa dang / caco med pa dang / brjod pa med pa dang / sem
272a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams par g.yengs pa med pa nga yin te/ rigs kyi bu mi skye ba chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de 'dod na nag bdud kyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa
272a8(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyab yang 'gyur/ 'don brdal bas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'amang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'didzin bsal pa brgyas kyang byang chub da pa rdzogs par la
272a9(dkon brtsegs): shes rab nyams pa mer
272b1(dkon brtsegs): nga ma 'du cu chu du rdzags pa la rgya 'ju/ byang chung sems dpa sangs sa rgyas su na
272b2(dkon brtsegs): mams pad snyi pa ci ma par byed/ don rnaM pa la khas pa dang / shes rab kyi thapas byed pas pa sa me
272b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed cing 'dod phyi ma'i mtha'i bur thug pa'i bas la bcu phyug mang por yang yid yongs su kyo ba med par gnas byed de/
272b4(dkon brtsegs): rinis byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ca rjes kyang bani pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag la bsgoms par 'jug la/ byang chub sems da
272b5(dkon brtsegs): nga ban padzi'i nge 'dzin dpa ma thams par 'jus tshang lung bar byed mangs payo bar yang nge 'jur/ sems gso pa yang 'gyug
272b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba kho nar shes par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ni ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po banis sems can
272b7(dkon brtsegs): bsku' ba'i brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par yang byed la/ sems can rnams yongs su srid par byed pa na sing rje
272b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par byed/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ni 'don dga' ldan gyi gnas na
273a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'dug bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang nus mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/
273a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyis ni chos/ mnyan pa'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'dzeg par mi nus la/ lha rnams kyis ni chos mnyan par phyir 'dzam bu gling du 'bab par nus so/
273a3(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jam bu'i gling du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu
273a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shrI 'phos nas ma'i mngal du mazhugs shing / mngal gyi dri ma'i ma reg kho nar de'i skad cig ma de nyid la byang chub mngon
273a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar yang nus mod kyi/ de la sems can kha cig 'di snyam du 'di lnga 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ sprul pa ni gam 'di
273a6(dkon brtsegs): ga las 'ongs pa zhig snyam du nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tshom skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tshom skye bar gyur na/ nyon mongs pa yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir
273a7(dkon brtsegs): chos nyan par mi byed/ shes par mi byed/ brtson 'grus bcom par mi byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pa bstan pa'i rgyu ni de yin rkyen ni de yin no rigs kyi rtsa
273a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal gi gnas su zhugs sonam nas khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir nen/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin drim med pazhes
273b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ad / byang dub sems dpa' dag 'dun gyis panas na gnas bzhin du dem rnams par zugs pang yongs su bden nas/ ting nge 'dzin de las pal sa dzug
273b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas nyid nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug mod kyi/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis de na de ma mthong bus/ byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin las langs so snyam du sems par
273b3(dkon brtsegs): zad do// byang chub sems dpa' ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi g.yo bzhin du sprul pa dag gis 'pho ba dang mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' bsnong ba'i bya ba thams cad kun tu song
273b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed / de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa dag gis kun tu bstan pa yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' di kun du spyod pa
273b5(dkon brtsegs): bayin pas phyir mngal gyi gnas su mi 'gro ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' glang po che thal kar du bskur
273b6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal du 'jug pa ston par byed ce na/ de ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshig bla dgas yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad las khyad par
273b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa yin pas na/ des ni ji nas kyang lha 'am mi gzhan gang la yang med pa de lta bu kho nas mngal du 'jug pa bstan par bya ba dgos pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa'
273b8(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas shing dgur ma yin zhe na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du kye ma gnon nu 'di mdapa
274a1(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i dus yongs su ma rdzogs pas dbang po ma mtshang bar gyur to snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom bcad pa dang / mngal gi dus dang dbang po yongs
274a2(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas kyi dgur ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas
274a3(dkon brtsegs): pan yang lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur zhing de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas
274a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod rin po che bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa lha'i longs spyod thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa mthong nas/ lha'i bu sa ya phrag gnyis dang /
274a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems/
274a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ma'i mtshan brtol te mngal gyi gnas nas 'byung ba kun tu ston par byed ce na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni pa dang ma'i mer mer po las skyes pa yi
274a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi bsdus de skyes pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom gcad pa'i phyir ma'i mtshan brtol te/ mngal gyi gnas 'byung ba kun tu bstan to// byung ma thag tu
274a8(dkon brtsegs): yum b+him sgyu 'phrul gyi lus la yang tha med cing so med la/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pa'i chi yum la mo sku 'phrul gyis bde ba myong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de la du
274b1(dkon brtsegs): da bachung ni sngon nam yang ma reg cing / smon nam yang myong ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ ci'i phyir byang chung sems dpa' dgod par cas shing mong du ma
274b2(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa ni dun ring po sa dag pa'i bskams med pa dang / dbed pa la dga' ba dang / du byung ba g.yang ba dang / zong du sanalagu dang 'dod
274b3(dkon brtsegs): phyim dang / spos dang me dag 'theng dang / byag pa dang mengag ngag gis shin tu 'dags pa'i mtshad pa byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / ser rtswa'i gnas kyi zong khye ni gnas du mi nga
274b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyags pa dang / bag med pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ gang gis phyir byang chub sems dpa' gon par bcas shing grong du ma yin pa'i rgyu ni nga yin rten ni yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub
274b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i yum gyis shing blag ga'i yal ga la gzung ste/ bad ma la ma byas par byang chub sems dpa' bcas par byas zhe na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul ni
274b6(dkon brtsegs): ltang bud med gnan dag bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg cing / byang chub sems dpa' bcas so snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gis the tshom bcad pa dang / bde bar bcas
274b7(dkon brtsegs): bkun tu btsun par byas pa'i phyir lha mo skye 'phrul gyis ba zla ba wa'i yil ga la bzung ste/ rang ma lam byas par byang chub sems dpa' bcas par byas so// ci'i phyir byang chubs
274b8(dkon brtsegs): dba'i ma'i mtshan g.yas pa brtol te/ dran pa'i bang shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas kyang ma yin/ lus kyi phyogs gnan ras kyang ma yin nem byang chub sems dpa' ni kung dum
275a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gtsang ba dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir sems can dman pa gzhan dag
275a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ma'i mngal la rten cing gnas pa ma yin pa dang / btsa ba ma yin pa de ltar skye ba bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan g.yas pa brtol te dran
275a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas byung zhing byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi mtshan yang rma med cing sdo med par gyur te/ de byang chub sems dpa'i thang
275a4(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bcas mthag tu/ lnga'i dbang po brgya byid gyis bzung la/ mir gyur pa gzhan dag gis ma yin nes/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba
275a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'ab bas lha rnams 'dun par byas pa'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' bcas mthag tu gos rin po chos bzung bar bya'o// zhes srin lam btab pa'i phyir de byang
275a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las rgya chen po la brtson par byed pa yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bcas mthag tu yongasu
275a7(dkon brtsegs): sa bzung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la/ drug kyang ma yis brgyad byang ma yin nes byang chubasems dpas de'i lur gnan sus kyang sdom bsan pa del bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi brtson 'grus chen po dang
275a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis du 'i la ga mapa par dun gyung thos pa nga gos pa na b.rabs semams dag gi gi rgyang gas pa de gzhi dgapa rje kyang sems sa
275b1(dkon brtsegs): du da ma ma sa sa sus su sa
275b2(dkon brtsegs): 'o 'an ga dis shes pani ma da ma bye ga pa dpa pa la la 'ang byas bya gas shes shes yul tho sa
275b3(dkon brtsegs): kwa'i bung dbang che bar grags pa dang che bar grags pa dang / 'dus par gyur te 'khod la/ nga rgyal gyis khebs pa de dag 'di dag 'di sngam du/ bdag cag ni ches lha ma yin gyi/ byang chung ses dpa' 'di ni mngod
275b4(dkon brtsegs): ma du sems ning 'dud par mi byed/ phyag 'tshal bar mi byed ba tu phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pas ra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di sam du sems te ba phyi dang mangs pa dang / lha'i bu 'di dag yur ring bong daded sa
275b5(dkon brtsegs): gdod pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur ro snyar nas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na thu bo yin// nga ni 'jig rten dgatso bo yin te skye ba dang dbang par
275b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o// zhes smras te/ tshig gis sgra des stong gsum gyi song chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar gyur nas/ lha'i bu gang dag der ma lhags pa/ de dag kyang sbrad thos nas lhag pa
275b7(dkon brtsegs): byung cing de nas/ l-I'i bu de dag dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag yid byung ba skyes shing / ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas thal mo phug phug por sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la mngon pa
275b8(dkon brtsegs): 'du cing phyag 'jal bar byed/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshig 'di sad ces ni 'jig rten gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o// zhes smras nga'i druni de yin na 'ab
276a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig de ni yang dag pa yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bcas ma thag tu gang ma cher dgod par byed cen rigs kyi bu byang chub
276a2(dkon brtsegs): sengs su mas ma gas dpa na cig skyes pa'as/ de nga dang ldan cig skyes pa'ang/ gdi mug dang ldan cig skyes panod pa'i gang mos yang med/ gang dung song pa yang med meng gyi shin kyang byung chub sem
276a3(dkon brtsegs): 'didu dungems pa byang chub sengs dang 'dzang dag gis ni bdag nga lhan cig tu byung chub dusems bskyed pa las bdag gis ni byang chu bathob par gyur gyi sems can 'di sa ni le lo dbang gis 'khor ngas
276a4(dkon brtsegs): / popor gnas par gyur pas/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i chos thams cad la brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bde pa yin no// zhes de ltar snying rje chen po bskyed na/ sems can de
276a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin par rig la/ bdag cag ni dman pa dang bag med pa yin par rig nas de dag bdag la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i phyir
276a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang mo cher dgod par byed de/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dang 'dri ma med pa bcas mthag tu brgya byin dang tshangs paras
276a7(dkon brtsegs): sa la khru bar byed cen/ rigs kyi bu de ni brgya byin dang tshangs bdag mchod pa yang yin la/ 'jig rtenan yang khye'u dag bcos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar khrus byed pa dag yod pas/ byang chub sems dpa
276a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'jig dzin pa'i rjes su gdon mi za bar 'jug par bya dgos pas ma/ don gyi dbang de mthong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bcas mthag tu brgya byin dang / tshangs padag gis 'khru bar byed de/
276a9(dkon brtsegs): phyiphyir sIng rjes 'gro pa
276b1(dkon brtsegs): de byang chu ba sems dpa'i chos la mkhas brjinam/ 'i byi byang chub sems dpa' dgan par btsas mazlam panas/ byang du bzhing bar 'gro bar 'i byi tshong dul du sa
276b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su srin pa kun tu bstan pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bya ba kun tu bstan pa dang / dga' ba dang rtsed mo ngag kun tu bsan nas kyang gling chen po bani la mi lnga bar spangs te/ mngon par 'byung ba
276b3(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bstan par bya ba dang / 'di ltar sems can gzhan dag kyang bdag gis rjes su slob pa na 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / longs spyod dang 'khor rgya chen po dag spangs te rab tu byung ba'i
276b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par bcas mthag kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar grong du zhugs nas mngon par 'byung bar/
276b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas nag bdun lon na/ yum lnga po sgyu 'phrul
276b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur cen/ de la ni byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa'i nyes pa med do// yum la mo sgyu 'phrul nyid che zang dus las 'das pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa nyes pas
276b7(dkon brtsegs): yinate/ 'di sar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa nyid kyi chen lha'i bu mig rnams par dag pas/ yum lngam sgyu 'phrul
276b8(dkon brtsegs): so sor brtags na/ byang chub sems dpa' yum la mo sgyu 'phrul gyi cha'i lhag ma ni zla ba bcu dang / zhag bdun las ma langs parashes nas de'i 'og
277a1(dkon brtsegs): tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs pa yin pas/ rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar
277a2(dkon brtsegs): yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid tshe zad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa'i nyes pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs
277a3(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / bstan bcos dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu'i
277a4(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang / 'gyed stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang / skar ma'i dipyad dang / dga' ba dang rtsed mo dag legs par bslabs she na/ 'jig rten dang rjes su mthun par
277a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas dang po nyid nas gang la legs par bslab pam bya ba'i bzo 'am/ gsang sngags sam/ rig sngags sam/ bstan bcos
277a6(dkon brtsegs): sam/ bro gar ram/ glu 'am/ rol mo'i sgrubam/ bzhad gang dam/ 'jo sgeg gam/ dga' ba 'am/ rtsed mo kun tu bstan par bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i mi ma
277a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams na 'ga' yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ni bcas ma thag kho nar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas thams cad/
