370b6(dkon brtsegs): pas ma yin pa ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sbyin gnas bla
370b7(dkon brtsegs): mas bsgo bzhin mi byed dang // bzhin dag la yang the tsom nyer sgru ba dang // sems can gang dag byang chub nye zhugs pa// de la bsngags min mi sta smra ba dang // sgyu dang g.yo dang
370b8(dkon brtsegs): ban la dor byed pas/ gzhan la bsnyen gyi bsam pas ma yin pa// chos bani 'di ga kun tu bsnyen byas no// sangs rgyas byang chub semam mchog nyams par 'gyur/ deH
371a1(dkon brtsegs): bas na chos 'di sten byed na// byang chub mchog las de ni ring bar 'gyur// de las bzlog pasten par byed ni// byang chub mchogar ba bcwa
371a2(dkon brtsegs): b.reg pa reg par 'gyur// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu/ byang chub kyi sems mngon tu 'gyur te/ byang chub
371a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar meder brjed par mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ srog gi phyir ram/ thun bzhad gad kyi phyir yang brdzun gyi tshig mis
371a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo med par sems can thams cad kyi drung na/ lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes
371a5(dkon brtsegs): sbed cing de dag gi yang dag pa'i bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod pa dang / nye che ba'i theg pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir/ sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed
371a6(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ 'od srung chos pa ni po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang
371a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor brjed par mi
371a8(dkon brtsegs): r-i de la 'di skad ces bya ste// srog gi phyir yang brdzun tshig mi smra zhing / rtag tu dzin dang ldan pa'i tshig rnams smra// sgyu dang g.yo ni chag tu rnam spangs
371b1(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pas rtag tu sems can lnga// sems can dag pa byang chub gang zhugs pa// byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par sems/ bston pa
371b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes nye bar gzhag nas kyang // de dag bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod par byed// sems can gang dag yongasu smin byed pa/ khyu med ye shes ya /
371b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin tu 'jug/ chos de dag la rab tu gnas pa rnams// byang chub sems ni nams kyang brjed mi 'gyur// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
371b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
371b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gi tshig tshol ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur stil lhag par zhen pas khyim la lta ba dang / byang chub sems
371b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la rnam par sdang zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang / ma thos pa dang / ma zin pa'i mdo sde rnams spongs ste/ 'od srungs byang chu sems dpa' chos bzhi de dag
371b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
371b8(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ nga rgyal gyis mi 'jig rten rgyang phan tshol// rnyed kyi phyir ni khyim la sbyor bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas sras la sdang // de dag
372a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags min kun tu smra bar byed// de ni mthos pa dang ma zin mdo// bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa sbyong bar byed// chos 'dir/
372a2(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan par gyur pa ni// dge ba'i chos kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// de ltas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yis// chos bzhi 'di dag rgyang bsrid rnam par smra
372a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag srin nas byang chubar ba ring ste/ gnams rings pas shin tu ring bar 'gyur// 'di srung byang chub sems dpa' chos pa ni dang ldan na/ khyad par du 'gro bas
372a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di m+b+ha ste/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod che ba la brtsa
372a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ legs par thos pa tshol gyi// nyes par thos pa mi tshol te/ sems can thams cad la de rgyal med pa'i phyir sems khyi dang 'dra ba yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas chog par
372a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin te/ log pas 'chol ba thams cad yongs su spangs shing / 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba yin/ gzhan dag gi ltung ba byung ba dang ma byung ba'i gles
372a7(dkon brtsegs): gzham ngag gi 'khrul pa gzhan dang gzhan mi 'tshil ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi mchos zab mo gang dag de'i zlos mi rtogs pa de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chuban
372a8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas shing / sems canams pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen gyi/
372b1(dkon brtsegs): sa nas sa
372b2(dkon brtsegs): ma su /
372b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub swA~M snang btsun// ngargyal med pa mi byi 'cha ba mi sems kyis su// sems can ku ming brgyal bcig pa yin/ chos dang 'byud pa'i rnyeng bayin
372b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba yongs 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas// gzhan gyi 'thub 'tshol bar mi byed cing // gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed do// gang la de'i rlom
372b5(dkon brtsegs): ni mi rdzogs pa// de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum ste/ bdo gshegs bshad pa'i byang chub mtha' yas// rgyal bas mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi zhes sgo/
372b6(dkon brtsegs): nArdzu bzhi 'dri ga rlig par gyur pa ni// ye shes rjod pa'i 'phags mchog sems mi 'gyur// chos 'di dag la rab tu gnas pa ni// rgyal bas
372b7(dkon brtsegs): na nanan sa nga / dug sa
372b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyam tsha 'dzi pa lam ma ma
373a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chab pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod par sems pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa rnams la zag dog dang / ser du byed pa dang /
373a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dgra ni
373a3(dkon brtsegs): gya rgyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces byas ste// chos rnams la ni som nyid yid gnyis
373a4(dkon brtsegs): byed/ sems can rnams la nga rgyal rgyags khro ston// gzhan gyi rnyed la ser sna phrag dog byed// rgyal ba la ni rnams kyang dad mi byed// mi mkhas rtag tu byang
373a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' la// bsngags pa min dang brjod min mi snyamadzod// g+ha g+hu can gyi sems de ni rnams spang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sems can
373a6(dkon brtsegs): dasbyin/ snod srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'ajing po'i drang ba'i mtshan med yin te/ bani gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ snang ba byung ba rnams
373a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa pa sa su ba
373a8(dkon brtsegs): ma sa kyi
373b1(dkon brtsegs): skur ba dang / mtshad 'dra ba dang / slong ba dang / gzhu dag dang / sdig pa dang / rdeg pa dang / bsong pa nga/ snying bzed pa'i rjes pa ma ts+tsha
373b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis par sems shing // las kyi rnam par smin pa la ston pas/ gzhan dag la mi 'khrug cing 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa yin/ de dang pa la rab tu gnas
373b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ thams cid dad par mi 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dad pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni bya
373b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' drang po drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// lung ba byung ba 'chab par mi byed kyi// rjod cing rnam par 'byed de nyes
373b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dor/ nor dang rgyal srid phyir dang sgrog phyir yang // 'du shes bsgyur te brdzun pa'i tshig mi smras// skur dang smod dang bshung dang gsod pa dang / bdag
373b6(dkon brtsegs): gIs nyes sems gzhan la 'khrug mi byed// las ni bdag gir bya bsa'i khon mi 'dzin// de ni bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub dang // dang lA gnas
373b7(dkon brtsegs): shing bsam pa dgu ldan la// 'di dag drang ba'i mtshan du sangs gsungs// sems can mchog gis rtag tu bsten par bya// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chu
373b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' du nang ngo // 'azhi ga ma 'das so// zas pa la gces pa 'ad ba'i chams sangs shi tsam kyi 'dun pachichos bsdus thams
374a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin/ rjes su bstan pa la bces pa 'dor pa'i chos su gnas shing slob dpon dang / mkhan po la sri zhu mi byed pa yin/ dam
374a2(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa lA kun spyod de// dad pas byin pa ldog par ltung bar byed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes
374a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams mthong na/ mi gus shing du brgya 'dzin pa yin te/ 'od srung bzhing po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pa
374a4(dkon brtsegs): rgod par gnas par byed pa yin// rjes su bstan pa'i chos nyid rtogs mi 'gyur/ de ni chos kun gces pa 'drir bsten// 'dags pa rnams lanam yang hUM
374a5(dkon brtsegs): klu med/ dum brgyas rnams kyang dang bas bying ba yin// khazas rnams la de ni rtag tu zla// byang chub sems dang 'acung shes thob pa dag/ ma bar gyur na grus par maH
374a6(dkon brtsegs): tshing mu rgod de ning rgyal 'phel bar byed// byang chub sems ripa'ang rgyal bcag mo ster// 'di dgang pu rgod bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// de dag rgyal zas
374a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis yongs su sdud// 'od srung bzhi po 'di ga ni byang chub sems dpa' cang zhes pa ste/ bzhi ga nanA/ 'di lnga ste/ legs par thom pa can cing de la nam
374a8(dkon brtsegs): du byed do// don la tshon gyi tshig 'phrul mi non pa yid/ gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la 'thun par 'dzin cing bka' blo ba de la legs par byed pa'i las byed cing /
374b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams sri nu bya batshar phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin las ma sems te/ 6nga shes pas zas za ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul shes
374b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzangon gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par de la gnol de 'bab de la bab cing // de'i yon tan 'dod pa yin te// 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
374b3(dkon brtsegs): cang shes so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang mnyan de ni legs par thos par byed// chos don snying por byed cing nan tan gnas// rjes su bstan pa 'thun par 'din
374b4(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / chos 'dod bka' blo bde bar ma sten// tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin la rtag gnas shing // tshul khrims bsdams nas de'i bza bab/ gus dang bcas
374b5(dkon brtsegs): shing zhe sar bcas pa yin// de la gzhol zhing drer 'ab ba yon tan 'dod// rgyal sras gang dag cad shes tho bgyur pa// de dag la ni rtag tu dga' bras lnga bde ba
374b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bstan pa 'di bzhi ni/ bde gshegs sras po cang shes thob pa yin// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ bai ni gang
374b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa rnams la yid rton pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can snod du ma gyur pa rnams la
374b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi tshib tu can po son pa// byang chub sems pa'i 'khrul pa dang / rgya chen po sems pa'i sems chen rnams la theg pa dman pa ston pa/ byang chub sems
375a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can yang dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyes shing
375a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos can kun tu sdud pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dge ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa'o//
375a3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// yongs smin ma byas rnams la yid mi badz+ram// snod min rnams la rgya chen chos mi bshad// rgya chen sems can rnams la theg pa dman
375a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mchog gis bshad mi bya ba yang ngadag gnas shing tshul khrims yon tan ldan// dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas mi bya// tshul khrims 'tshal
375a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs mi bdud// sdig pa'i chos rnams yongs su spang bar bya/ 'jal pa'i chos pani 'di dag shes gyur na// byang chub sems dpas rgyang srid
375a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par snang // 'dri dge bsnyem byang chub bcang mi rgya// de lta bas na mdzes pas chom 'di skang // 'od srung ba ni 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam ste/
375a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sems can+da thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos btsun pa dang / semasas can
375a8(dkon brtsegs): bang sangs rgyas kyi mi shes yang dag pa 'dzin tu 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad ma yang dag par dza~M hU~M/ 'od srung ba ni po 'di dag ni byang chub sem
375b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i lam mo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can rnams la rtag tu sems snyoms bya// sangs rgyas theg mchog yang dag 'dzin tu 'jug/ rgyal bas
375b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa'i chos ni bsnun par bya// sems can kun drang ba'i sems su bya// yang dag sbyor ni nan tan byed par gnas// sems can kun la mtshungs par
375b3(dkon brtsegs): spyad par bya// chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal bas rab bsngags te// rgyal sras rnams kyis de dag rtag tu brjed// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
375b4(dkon brtsegs): dpe'i bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs ngan pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spong bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa zang/
375b5(dkon brtsegs): la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang phan pa gsang tshig sna tshogs kyi spobs pa cam
375b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang la brten pas 'jig gyi zang zing kun sdud par 'gyur gyi/ chos kun mi sdud pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen
375b7(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa/ grogs po ngan pa ste/ de dag byang chub sem dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// nyan thos gang dag bdag pa na brtson pa dang /
375b8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rab tu byung nas rnal 'byor snang // rang sangs rgyas pa gang dag byed nyung zhing // bdag rnon tu 'du 'dzin rnams par spong // byis bzang dag
376a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rgyang phan klog/ ji ltar bstan bzhin gang dag 'di rtsod byed// gang la bsten na zang zing kur sdud kyi// chos ni nam yang
376a2(dkon brtsegs): sdud par byed mi byed pa// de bzhin byang chub sems dpas rab spangs nas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhi la bsten par bya// 'di dge bshes gnyen ngan dang
376a3(dkon brtsegs): grogs ngan tu// rgyal bas gsungs te thag bsring yongs su spang // 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ bzhi ga
376a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi lam ston pa'i phyir slong ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / thos pa'i shes rab rten phyir chos smra ba byang chub

376a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin// chos don smra ba thos dang shes rab byed// dge la shes gnyen yin par bde bar gshegs gsungs// gang dag rab byung
376b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag padi 'jug pa// de ga dges padzin bas pa zhis gnyen gsungs// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i laman na pa'i tshar// sangs sa
376b2(dkon brtsegs): sras kyi bshes// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bami pa 'di dag ni// bude gshegs pas kyi dge ba'i bzhes gnyen te/ 'dri dag bskyen cing rngag tu dgas ma
376b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs bsnan pa'i byang chub semam thob par 'gyur// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar 'chos pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnyed
376b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bkur sti don du gnyer gyi/ chos don tu gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / brjod pa'i sna tshig su bcad pa don tu gnyer gyi/ yon tan ngon du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang
376b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag bde ba don du gnyer gyi sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal ba don gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / 'khor gyi tshogs don du gnyer gyi dben pa don tu gnyer ba ma yin
376b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'od srung bzhin po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyed pa don tu gnyer gyi chos 'dod min// brjod pa don ga
376b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan don gcer min/ kha dag bde rtag tu don tu gnyer byed cing // sems can sdug bsngal bsil ba don mi gnyer// 'khor tshogs don du gcer gyi dben mi
376b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod/ bde la chags kyi yon tan ma chags pa// gzhi po de dag bcos par gsungs pa ste// de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang // 'od srung bzhi po 'di
377a1(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan te/ ba ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa 'i
377a2(dkon brtsegs): layang mos la/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang yid ches pa dang / de bdag med par yang bzod la/ sems can thams cad la yang snying rje rje ba dang /
377a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gnas la/ sbyor ba 'khor ba na yang gnas pa dang / de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i
377a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa yang mi re ba ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan no// de la 'di
377a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams snang ba nyid du rtog mos kyang // las kyi rnam par smin pa la'ang yid ches so// bdag med bzod pas mnyam nyid gnas
377a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed// de'i bsam pa rtag tu mya ngan 'das lags// de'i sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yin// yongs smin bya phyir ts+tsha
377a7(dkon brtsegs): basbyin byed kyang // las kyi rnam par smin ba med// 'ong chung rje ni po 'di ngag mi byang chub sems dpa'i gter chen ba rnyed pa ste/ bzhi ga nim
377a8(dkon brtsegs): ga/ sangs rgyas byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug mnyan pa dang / chos smra ba la khor khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lta ba dang bkra
377b1(dkon brtsegs): mdabang dpon pa la gnas par mtshan duga' ba ste/ 'od srung bani za dag ni byang chub sems dpa' gter chen po rnyed pa'o// de la 'di sa
377b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ tsherabs kun tu sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// pha rol byin pa drug pa rnams kyang zhan// chos smra bra la sems ni rab tu dang // mthong na nag tu gus
377b3(dkon brtsegs): srid par byed// rtag tu bag yod gyur nas dgon par gnas// de ni de nyid la yang rtag dga'// bzhi po 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi// ga
377b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos te// bzhin
377b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang / lta bar 'gyur ba thams cad rdzogs pa dang /
377b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mi brnyes pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos so// de la 'di skad ces bya
377b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ byang chub sems ni yongs su gtong gi byed// sems can rnams la khong khro rtag tu spang // lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dor byed// sems can tshogs la
377b8(dkon brtsegs): brnyas par yod mi byed// bde bar gshegs pas bzhi po 'di dag ni// bdud las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos su gsungs// 'di dag bsten ma rgyal ba
378a1(dkon brtsegs): rjer ba/ gser 'dra'i sgra mnga' mtshungs pa med par 'gyur// 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos
378a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba ste/ bani gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ rdul 'chos pa med par nan pa na gnas dang / lan tu par 'dogs par re ba med pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po ma
378a3(dkon brtsegs): ljongs sems can thams cad la lus dang srog gtong zhing / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'chol ba dang / thos pa dang don gyis ngoms mi myong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang
378a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par sdud pa'i brtson 'grus gos te/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
378a5(dkon brtsegs): dgan par gnas shing 'tshul tshes rnam par spros// rgyal gsungs bsdu ba sems can rnams sa byed// dam chos yongs su btsal ba brtsam byas nas// lus dang thog kya
378a6(dkon brtsegs): su gtong bar byed/ dge ba'i rtsa bzhin du mi ltung ba// yang dag bsgrib phyir rtag tu chom mi byung / ge ba'i chos rnams yang dgra bsdu ba'i phyir// chos poni 'di dag bdes
378a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gsungs// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag mi byang chub sems ripa'i za so rnams kyi ma tshogs ngag tu med pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing med
378b1(dkon brtsegs): pa sa/ lung dran brjod ni byang chub sems dpa'i bas mams chags ga tu med pa'o// del 'a smye /
378b2(dkon brtsegs): patsha thams kyis su// chos kyi sbyin byed rgyal bas rab tu bsngags// tshul khrims mi ldan pa la snying rje tshe// bcan ngag byang chub phyir ni sems skyed 'jug/
378b3(dkon brtsegs): rlung rnams la bzod pas dang tu len// 'di ni dge chos sdung par gsungs pa ste// 'di dag bsten na rgyal bar 'gyur bas na// byang chub sems dpas de dag rtag tu
378b4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen/ 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'dzem par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la hU~M/
378b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sgron ma sbyin pa dang / zan 'dris pa rnams la yang sbyin pa ste// 'od
378b6(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'jom par byed pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshul khrims sdom pa yang
378b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'dzin byed dang / dam pa chos 'dzin dang sgron ma sbyin byed dang // de bzhin tha na 'dris la sbyin byed cing / mkhas pa ma rigs las rnam par 'byed// 'od srung
378b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang / dam chos yongs su
379a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan dag la mi brnyas pa ste/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sgri
379a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang dag byang chub la ni sgrib byed pa// sdig pa'i bzhi po bcu po rnams spangs nas
379a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas de bzhin bcu gnyis gzhan bsten na// 'chi med reg nas byang chub thob par 'gyur// sems can dam pa gang dag chos tshul 'di// 'dzin tam
379a4(dkon brtsegs): klog gam rab tu ston byed pa// de dag bas nams mtha' yas rgyal ba gsus// de'i chang ni rgyal ba rnams brjod do// gang gis zhing ni gang gA'i bye ma snyed
379a5(dkon brtsegs): rin men pagang ste rdul la phul bas// gang gis 'di las tshigs bani tshigs bcang klog/ bsod nams 'di'i grangs su'ang mi phong ngo do// 'od srung
379a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni ming tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya yi/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' tsham snang ba dang / snyoms par rnyed pa dang / deni /
379a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la gnas 'das na pas rkye mas sa rnam 'di srung sems pa 'tshas sum cu rtsa gnyis dang l+h+wamam
379a8(dkon brtsegs): sems ma kyis sa yang me / mtshod ma dza / 'angartsa pa'i grag pa'i bam
379b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dud pa dang / bdag ci'i zhes yongs su 'das ning / gzhan gyi shes pa la ma stong ba dang / rgyal ma
379b2(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang / bcos ma ma yin par byams pa dang / mdza' pa dang mi mdza' ba ba la sems snyoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das
379b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i bar du gtan tu mdza' ba dang / tshig ngan cing cing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gsong por sgru ba dang / khur blangs pa rnams la sgyid lug pa med pa
379b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la snying rje chen yongasu ma bcad pa dang / yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / dam pa'i chos yong su tshol ba'i phyir thos pa de ngon kyis
379b5(dkon brtsegs): mi myong ba dang / bdag gi 'khrug pa rnams la skyon du lta zhing / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la mi gshe bar bsgo ba dang / spyod lam thams cad du
379b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems yongs su sbyor ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i gtong ba dang / srid par 'gro bar skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrim
379b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can thams la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs
379b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i khams rnams pade bsal ba'i bsam gtan dang / thabs mkhas pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / rab tu ldan pa'i thabs kyis zin
380a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la gnyis su med pa'i byams pa dang / gus par
380a2(dkon brtsegs): byas te chos nyan pa dang // gus par byas te dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dgal ba dang / 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs rnams la mi dga' zhing / 'jig rten
380a3(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mngon par dga' ba dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod cing theg pa chen po phan yon du lta ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su
380a4(dkon brtsegs): spong zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsen pa dang / ye shes la rton pa dang //
380a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa dang / log par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams mi gtong ba dang / gcig tu chad par smra ba dang / bden pa gces su byed pa dang / byang chub
380a6(dkon brtsegs): sems sngon tu 'gro ba ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa'i chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de la 'di skad
380a7(dkon brtsegs): / sems can thams pa na dang bde bya'o// lhag pa'i bsam la mam par byed pa yin// kunam khyim zhes la ni sem+b+has grol cing // ribram mi rim
380a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag la ngo// smon pa med cing lhag pa'i nga rgyal med / bsam pa btam ning bcos pa med par byams// mnga' dang mi mdza' rnams la sems kyang snyoms
380b1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' la thug par du/ sems can rnams la gtan tu rab tu mdza'/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis 'jam par smra bar byed// khur blangs pas
380b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod lug zhum pa myed// sems can dgal snying rje yongs su bcad// dam chos yongs su tshol la skyo ba med// thos pas mi ngoms bdag gi mardul
380b3(dkon brtsegs): lha gzhan la gshe bas gdung bar byed pa med// stsol ma rnams su sems ni rab tu stong // gtong ba rnam par smin la re ba med/ tshul khrims srid par
380b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas ma yin// sems can rnams la bzod cing khong khro spangs// dge ba yang dag smra kha'i brtson 'grus dang // gzugs med khamamra spangs pa'i
380b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang // thabs kyis yang dag zin pa'i shes rab dang // bsdu ba rnam bzhis yang reg zin thabs dang // khrims ldan khrims med gnyis med byas
380b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gus par byas te dus su chos nyan dang // gus par te dag ma ni gnas pa dang // 'jig rten sna tshogs dga' bar mi byed dang // theg pa dmanal
380b7(dkon brtsegs): dgra' bo mi byed cing // theg pa che la 'dod pa srung ba dang // sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spong byed cing // dge ba'i gshes gnyen nag tu skyed pa dang /
380b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas pa bzhi la sgom pa dang // mngon shes rnam lngas rtag tu rtsen pa dang // ye shes rjes su rtag tu 'brang ba dang // sgrub dang ldan pa gtong bar mi byedad/
381a1(dkon brtsegs): sgru ba dang mi ldan gzhan yang mi gtong dang // gcig tu chad par rtag tu smra ba dang // bden la rtag tu gus dang bcas pa dang // byung
381a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems ni sngon tu btang ma su// rgyal bse bsngags pa'i chos ni sgom par byed// bde gshegs gsungs pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis ches// 'di dag bde gshegs
381a3(dkon brtsegs): sras kyis bsten par bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang yin de dag ni// chos 'di ldan zhes bde bar gshegs sapa gsungs// 'od srung dpe nyes rna bgod bstan
381a4(dkon brtsegs): ba gang dag gis byung rgyu sems dpa'i yon tan rab tu shes par byed pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa khyod la bstan par bya'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na chen po 'diran sa
381a5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste/ 'gyur ba med cing lan tu phan 'dogs pa la re ba med do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa
381a6(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub kyi snying po la thig gis bar du sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'jigs par re ba med do// de la 'di ska
381a7(dkon brtsegs): / dpor na 'di skye bo na // lan+da lA mi ri bgyur bzeng pa ba zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' thon mar sems gnas pa// rgyal mchog blam med pa
381a8(dkon brtsegs): thams mgyur bar ma seM 'dzi 'i thur ba mau'i tha~M nga na kyi chungs par ma / byang chu tshag
382a1(dkon brtsegs): da srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i bsum bsra pa dang / sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub bo// des
382a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste// dper rlung ni sangs rgyas dgongs pa bzhin/ rnam par sna tshogs zhing rnams blar sgru ba// de bzhin rgyal sras rnams kyi thabs mkhas kyang / bde gshegs
382a3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i chos mchog rnam par sgru ba// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na bdud sdig can gyi dpung gyi chos yan lag bzhi ni 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis zil gyis gnan pa
382a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ yongs su zad par bya bar mi nus so// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa yang bdud thams cad gyis zil gyis gnan pa 'am/ yong su zad
382a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya bar mi nus so// 'od srung 'di lnga ste dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngol zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skye zhing gang bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
382a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yongs su dag pa yang dkar po'i chos thams cad kyis rdzogs shing rgyas par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang ngo la/
382a7(dkon brtsegs): kyai zhing yod su gang 'gyur 'ji mi 'gyur// de bzhin pas mngang byang chub sems dpa' yang// dkar po'i chos kyis tshig tu rgyas par 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper
382a8(dkon brtsegs): me 'i ma'i dkyil 'khor las lan gcig gyur ba'i song gapar rnams kyis sems can thams cad ma snang bar byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
381b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'izhis tu 'dag zer rnams kyis kyang / sems can thams cad lazhes pa'i ltung ba byed do// des 'di nad ces bya'i/ dbe na gyil sa spyan dacig byung ba'i
381b2(dkon brtsegs): zung zer rnams kyis sems can snang bar byed// de bzhin rgyal nas ye shes chung gzer gyis// sems can rnams la shes rab bsnang bar byed/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dpenan/
381b3(dkon brtsegs): rig nas kyis rgyal po makri ni grilas gar 'gro ba rnams cad du mi 'jigs mi skrag pa nyid du 'gro'o// zang srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thas pa dang/ tshug ma
381b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bslab dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes la gnas pa yang ga las gar 'gro ba thams cad du mi 'jigs mi
381b5(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa nyid du 'gro'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ri dgas rgyal po seng ge ral pa can// 'jig pa med par gang tu 'dod par 'gro// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' tshul
381b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang // thos dang ye shes gnas pa dga' dgur 'gro// 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bal glang blang glang po chen shin du dul ba ni/ khal thams cad khyer khas yongasu
381b7(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba med do// bod srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems shin dul ba da / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phung po lnga'i khur khyer pas yongs su skyo ba med do// de
381b8(dkon brtsegs): la'adi skad ces bya ste/ dper na rab tul stobs ldan glang ba che/ thod srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten du skyes kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos//
382b1(dkon brtsegs): des 'di ska ces bya ste// dper natha dang phyugs kyi chu klung rnams// rgyamatshan pa par gcig 'gyur ba bzhin// tha dad spronas dge ba bsngags byas pa/ byang chub
382b2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyang ro gcig 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen pa ni'i rig dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni ri ba la gnas so// 'ang srung de bzhin du zur
382b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rdza ba la gnas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /
382b4(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gsum la rtogs ri rab gnas// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dger gnas te// thams cad khyen nyid tho ba nam chos rnams ston// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na
382b5(dkon brtsegs): blun pos yongs su zin pa'i rgyal po rnams ni/ rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad byed do// 'ang srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin
382b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste dpor na/ blon po ldan pa'i rgyal po rnams// bya ba thams cad rtag tu byed pa
382b7(dkon brtsegs): lha/ thabs ldan byang chu sems dpa'i shes rab kyang // sangs rgyas don nams rtag tu byed pa yin/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sprin med cing nam thad pa'i nam mkha'i la ni
382b8(dkon brtsegs): char 'bab pa'i rgyu med do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa nyung ba la yang dam pa'i chos kyi char bab pa'i rgyu med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dge
384a1(dkon brtsegs): na sprin med namathang nam mkha' la// char 'bab rgyu ni rnams kyang mi dmigs so// de bzhin pa byang chub sems dpa' thos nyung la// chos ston
384a2(dkon brtsegs): nam yang dmigs par par mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin chen po las byung ba'i char gyi rgyun ni lo tog thams cad la mngon par 'bab bo// 'od srung
384a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang / mang du thas pa'i chos sprin las byung ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi char yang sems can thams cad la mngon par 'bang ga
384a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya'o// dper na sbyin chen grog dang bgag pa las/ rnam cu bas ma ni t+ta ga dmas par byung // de bzhin byang chu ba sems dpa' ngamatsham ci//
384a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rgyun sems can tshim par byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sbyar bya'i rgyal po gang tu byung ba der// rin po che sna bdun yang byung ro// nad srung
384a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang tu byung d+hi/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun che'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag 'thung ngo // de la 'di skad ces byi ste// labar mis
384a7(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ba'i rnal po gang drung ba// der ni dri mtshan chen sna bdun 'byung // byang chub sems dpa'i gang tu byung gyur pa// ba ma ri'i byang chub yan lag 'byung // ma
384a8(dkon brtsegs): dis phreng ser na/ ga na nar bu rim po dren rgya 'thung ze'i sgom ma mgapa' pas brgya zu mang po'i byung ba 'i na ma dang// mang mung ni brjid tu ga na byang chu
384b1(dkon brtsegs): mas dpa' 'byung baman mang bden/ mthas dang rang sangs rgyas 'bum thas mang ba 'byung ba'i zla ma dang // de la 'diskad cel bya ste/ dpe na dang dun
384b2(dkon brtsegs): chen 'byung // der ni kaR+sha pa Na mar 'gyur la// gang tu rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems 'byung ba// der ni nyan thos mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di 'asrung 'di la ni
384b3(dkon brtsegs): na sum cu rtsa gsum ze'i lha 'dres pa'i tshal du zhugs pa rnams kyi long spyod dang // yongs su spyod pa rnams ni mtshungs po na gnas so// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub
384b4(dkon brtsegs): mas dpa' bsam bdag po'i sbyar ba yang sems can thams cad kyi rgyu baM thams cad la mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// dper na 'dzes pa
384b5(dkon brtsegs): tsal gnas sgra rnams kyi// lung sprid rnams ni mtshungs par gas pa yin// de bzhin bsam dag byang chub sems dpa' yang // sems can rnams la rtag tu leg
384b6(dkon brtsegs): par sbyor/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ sngags dang sman gyis yongs su zin pa'i dug gis ni 'chi bar byed mi nus so// nod srung de bzhin du ye shes dang / thangs
384b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i dug gis kyang log par ltung bar byed mis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dben sngags kyi
384b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zin pa'i dug/ skye bo rnams la nyes pa byed mi nus// de bzhin byang chub sems ye shes can// nyon mongs rnams kyis log ltung byed mi nub// 'od srung
385a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar ste dper na/ grong khyer chen po rnams kyi lung gang yin pa de ni khur bshing gi zhing dag dang / rgun gyi zhing dag la phan par gyur pa yin no// 'od
385a2(dkon brtsegs): srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i lung gang yin pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par gyur yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na grong khyer nas
385a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mi gtsang lud// de ni bu ram shing gi zhing la phan// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs lud// de ni rgyal ba'i chos la phar pa byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phong rtsa
385a4(dkon brtsegs): ma bslabs pa las mtshon thabs slob pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' thos pa nyung ba las/ dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / dpyod pa dang / don 'dzin pa'i
385a5(dkon brtsegs): shes ra lta'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ som btang ba'i sno rnams la mi rnga mkhan gyis me chen po gnang dgos so// 'od srung de bzhin du shes rab ma smin pa'i sems
385a6(dkon brtsegs): rnamam pa yang byung chu sems dbyas sa sargyas c+doMs kyi mche mo gtsor gros par banam// nad pung sa chu ba thams papa dan mchog partsigs pa ma
385a7(dkon brtsegs): ma blangs 'di la slob par 'dod pas/ nus bzhin du tsam la rab tu sbya bar zag/ 'ong su rim rgya chub sems da ba'i nul bzhing du chos lnga rab tu sbyar ba gang ches
385a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dig ste dbus ma'i lamatshos rnams la yang dag par ma mi tshogs pa'i/ zong srung dbu pa'i lamachos rnams la yang dag pa ma mir rtog par gang zhe na/ 'a srung gang sa zang /
385b1(dkon brtsegs): med ma ma 'apor rtog pa dang / sems cha med pa dang // srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / skyes bu med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / shed las skyes med pa dang / shed
385b2(dkon brtsegs): du zad par po sor rtog pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbus ma'i lam chos rnams la rnam dag par ma sar rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i la mchos rnams sa
385b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pangs mar rtog pa ni ga gzugs sa rtag par yang tha mar min pa/ mi rtag par yangs mar minag pa'ang byung de bzhin tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
385b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa la gang rtag par yang sa sor mi chog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/ bod srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya
385b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par sa sor rtog pa ni/ gang sa'i khams la rlag par yangs sar mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang sa sar mi rtog da
385b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rgyu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha' khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtag par yang so par mi rtog/ mi rtag par ma
385b7(dkon brtsegs): so sor mi rtog pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par
385b8(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog pa ni/ gang mig gi skye mched la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtog par yang so sor mi rdog pa dang / de bzhin du rnam pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang
386a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gang chag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// mi rtag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// mtha' de
386a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa// bstan tu med pa// bstan tu med pa/ rten ma yin pa snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste
386a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rdog pa zhes bya'o// tshad srung ba dag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// bdag med ces bya ba de nim
386a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis so// mtha' de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dbyang du myed pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med gra nas med pa ste/

387b7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams mngon par 'du byed pa med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / gang ma skyes pas chos rnams ma skyes par mi byed de/

388a7(dkon brtsegs): des nga'i nang thams cad bskrad de// sman ljon 'jug pa de cing mi 'byung / srung mdzi ni'i snam du sems/ mi ni nad de las thar bar 'gyur ram/ mamam

392a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ag ma/ mal bas myu mamyo // lta bar gyur ba mas rbad+d+ha/ sems byung ba byu byeng // rtu

392a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag pa rgyal ba'i sas nasad+ha/ nas / slong mas dper na/ lha kha las snang ba'i
392a7(dkon brtsegs): na ldan tha na smra sa/
392a8(dkon brtsegs): mas ridag la la la ma pa'i rmil lamam rgya tho srung pa/ nags pa'i
392b1(dkon brtsegs): banyan thos bye ba brgya snang de dag gang yang byang chub sems dpar de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'du shes mi skyed de// de la 'di skad ces pa ste/ dbeng
392b2(dkon brtsegs): na ming dgargyal po'i sras stong po// 'ga' yang bu yi mtshan dang mi ldan na/ de phyir drug gces byed mi nus pas/ de la mi mchog pu yi 'du shes med/ de bzhin
392b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tham ring bye ba mang / 'ga' yang byang chub sems dpa'i ma yin na/ de na byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' med phyir/ de la 'di gshegs sras su
392b4(dkon brtsegs): dgongs mi mdzad/ 'od srung 'di lta steng per na/ 'a'ar los sgyur ba'i rnal pa'i bcum mo dam pa'i mngal du/ gzhon 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa chags rnag pacug bdun rtsi
392b5(dkon brtsegs): te 'byung ba chen po mer mer por 'dug kyang shin tu stobs dang ldan pas/ de la lha rnams re bskyed kyi/ gzhon stobs la mgyogs pa'i shug dang ldan zhing mthu rnyed pa deg la ni yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
392b6(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rigra mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa/ dbang po yongasu ma smin pa nyon mongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po mer mer por gyur pa/
392b7(dkon brtsegs): bana'i 'or zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag pa'i sgrub pa yang shin tu stobs dang ldan pas/ de la sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams re bskyed kyi/ dgra bcom pa rnams par thar pa
392b8(dkon brtsegs): brgyad la bsam gtan pa de dag la ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro// de la 'di skad ba ces bya ste/ dper
393a1(dkon brtsegs): / dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo mchog/ de mngal bsod nams mtshan ldan sems can chags// stobs dang ldan pas lha rnams re bskyed// gzhon mthu thob rnams la ma yin ltar/
393a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rje gcig sem+b+ha gnas/ 'khor bar gnas te byang chub 'tshol byed pa/ de la skra dang klu rnamA re bskyed/ rnam thar brgyad po bsam gtan byed la min/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po
393a3(dkon brtsegs): dergyag ci gis 'ching bu nor bu'i phung po ngas ma zil gyis gdon te// 'od mung de bzhin rgya ma sems dpa'i sems drung po gre mas kya can thos dang ngasangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyim pan
393a4(dkon brtsegs): / de la 'dri mad ces bya ste/ dper na 'od gsal rin chen bai DUr+yas/ 'ching bu'i nor bu mang po zil gyis gnon// byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pas// nyan thos stong yang de ltar zil gyis gnon/
393a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lnga ste dper na/ l+ya kA la bing+ka'i phru gu sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ mig ma phye ba yang 'di smra ste/ rbab cing snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnan to// 'od srung de bzhin drung cu
393a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i srubs na 'dug pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa dang / rab 'irib kyi seng rtog gis mi rgyu khebs par yang 'di sa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bcoM
393a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi slan kyis can ces dang nges sa rgyas thams cad pas kyim mnan na/ 'ad pung 'dis pa pa na/ mtshangasas skur po'i rgyas pa'i btsun mo ngam pasas rgan tshun ma mas sbyar ba'i man
393a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la ma pa ba das tshangs kyi ma dngag / yus gyi sernams cad rgyal tharnams cad phyag 'das par rgya // sung nga zhing cung chu thams dpa' sems byed
393b1(dkon brtsegs): byas 'angs da sa pa'i 'jig mas lal lo// ma tshang na sa kyi// dpe nas padas chen rgyal pos/ man kyis sus mas nas da rnam
393b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzong byer mi dang rgyal phran thams cad 'drang / de bzhin du byang chub sems ni bskyed ma thag mdzan ldan rgyal ba'i sras po de la ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tshas ning / da pa'i sems kyis da
393b3(dkon brtsegs): cas par 'dzid/ 'od srung 'dis me dper na/ ri'i rgyas po gangs ril snyan gang dag skye ba de dag thams cad ni nga'ir bya ba med/ ris su chad pa med/ rnam par dag pa med de/ nad gang la gtan
393b4(dkon brtsegs): nad de rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyis sman gang yang dag par sgrub pa de thams cad rnams par mi rtog par sgru ba cing / sems can thams cad la sgom
393b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis gso bar rab tu sbyor ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na ri rgyal gangs kyi ri bo la// sman myos de dag mi rtog dar 'dzin med/ gang la btang ba de kun zhi bar byed/ kha cig nang dang /
393b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang sel bar byed// de bzhin nul pa'i sras po legs sman// yang dag sgrub pa'ang rnam par rtog spangs nas// sems can pan phyir thams cad yang dag sgrub// snyoms pa'i sems kyis sem
393b7(dkon brtsegs): can gso bar byed// 'od srung 'di sa ste dper na/ zla ba tshes pa la phyag 'tshal ba sbyar/ nya ba la ni ma yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du gang dag nga la rab tu dad pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa
393b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams sa phyag rtsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sa ni de su ma yin no// tso'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni bzhin gshegs pa myong de ba ni dgesu pa thun thos dang
394a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zla ba tshes la thams cad phyag 'tshal gyi// zla ba nyal de ltar phyag mi 'tshal// de bzhin sa
394a2(dkon brtsegs): dgang dang de dag gis// rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' phyag tshol cig/ 'od srung 'di la ste dper na/ yi ge phyi mo rnams ni bstan chos thams cad 'dzin pa shes pa'i sngon du 'gro'o//
394a3(dkon brtsegs): srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs thams cad 'dzin rtse shes bla na med pa'i sngon du 'gro// 'od srung
394a4(dkon brtsegs): lha steng dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bdang ste/ su yang sar ma'i gzugs la nam yang sngon phyag ma byas so// 'od srung de bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdag
394a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa dang gzhan la phanapa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ nga'i bslab pa la zhugs pa btang ste/ nyan thos lanam yang phyag mi 'tshal lo// de la 'di skad ces byaste/ sus kyang zla ba rnams
394a6(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas su// ska ma'i tshigs la yang phyagam byas// de bzhin bslab la zhugs panam du yang // ngasras btang ste nyan thos byug mi 'tshal// 'od srung 'di sa ste dper na/ lhang
394a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'ching bu'i nor bu byi dor byas kyang / 'ching bu'i nor bu rin po che baiDUr mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du nyan thos tshul khrims dang bsrab pa dang / sbyangs
394a8(dkon brtsegs): nga'i yon tan dang mo byang bsrungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan pa yang byang chub kyi sring po la 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
394b1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dang rtswa bar nam mang mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di sad ces bya ste/ dper na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis// 'ching bu'i nor bu byedor byas kyang ni// 'ching brang gse ba rnan ma
394b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra de nyid dang de'i rang bzhin yin min// de bzhin nyan thos khrims dang thos pa dang // ldan zhing sbyangs pa kun ldan yang // byang chub snying por 'jug sde bdud btul nas/
394b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chu ba ga sde ba gegs 'gyur ba med// 'od srung 'dis ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che ba chung byeng byes ste/ dekar babi na ma stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// 'ongs rje
394b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi byi ngor byas na/ de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rin du bu ni spangs
394b5(dkon brtsegs): byas na// dkar sha pa na mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas sras kyi sbyangs byas na// nyan thos mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi tshedang
394b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung yul gang du srin bu rnga mo dung ka zhes bya ba mgo nag gan kyal du nyal ba byung na/ yul de 'jigs pa dang bcas/ 'tshe ba dang bca
394b7(dkon brtsegs): dzinan mongs pa dang bcas/ 'khrug pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// 'od srung gal te yul der byang chub sems dpa' byung na/ yul de 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba medas
394b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la brtson par byas te/ des dge ba'i rtsa ba
395a1(dkon brtsegs): mas ca yang dag par bsgrubs par bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa brnams cad yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ sems camams cadal btang bar bya'o// ma
395a2(dkon brtsegs): sman gang tshol ba des phyogs gzhir song ste/ sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i gso bya'o// yang dag pa'i gso bas sems can rnams gso bar bya'o// 'od srung de la yang dag
395a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gso ba gang zhe na/ 'dis ste/ 'dod chags la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / sra bar gyur ba thams cad la stong paci
395a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan ma'i dmigs pa yid la byed pa thams cad la mtshan ma med pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med
395a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams thams cad la gnas ba sangs pa'i phyir/ smon pa med pa dang / phyin ci log thams cad spangs pa'i phyir byin cim log pa gzhi sa/ bzhi gang zhe na/ martag pa la \u0f7f
395a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'du shes pa la/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa la/ 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du
395a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ma chos thams ca la bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa la mya ngan las 'das pani bas gas pa dang / sgras dang / tshar bdag sems dang sa
395a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ de la lus li lus kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / lus kyi rjes su lta bar mi ltung ba dang / tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i

395a(d)3(dkon brtsegs): 3 gra la la
395b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / tshor ba'i rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / sems kyi rjes sla
395b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / chos kyi rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung bas gso ba dang / yang dag pa'i sgo
395b3(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhi ni/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad sbyong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes ni lus dang sems la ril
395b4(dkon brtsegs): bor 'dzin pa 'dor bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lngas ni ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes bzhin med pa rnams gas
395b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ni chos la shin tu rmongs shing / mi shes pa gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bas ni 'chal pas shes rab dang / ngas
395b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams gso ba ste/ 'od srung 'di ni yang dag pa'i gso ba zhes bya'o// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' gso ba 'di la
395b7(dkon brtsegs): par brtson par bya'o// 'od srung 'dzam bu'i gling na sman pa dang / sman pa'i slob ma ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na/ 'tsho byed ni mchog ces bya'o// 'od srung gal te stong gsum
395b8(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can ji snyed pa de dag sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed dang 'dra bar gyur kyang / de dag la la la zhig gis lta ba dang / 'gyod pa la gnas pa gso
396a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sman gang yin zhes dris na/ de dag gis shes pa 'am/ bstan pa 'am/ bsgo bar mi nus so// 'od srung de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du
396a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni 'jig rten gyi sman tsam gyis chog par mi bya'i/ bdag gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman yongasu btsal bar bya'i/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang legs
396a3(dkon brtsegs): par yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o// de la brtags nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang tshol ba des phyogs bzhir song la sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i
396a4(dkon brtsegs): gsob bya ste/ yang dag pa'i gsopas sems can rnams gso bar bya'o// 'od srung de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang zhe na/ 'di la ste rgyu rkyen la 'jug pa shes pa
396a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos rnams la mos pa'i shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs
396a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnams la mi sdang ba dang / sems yongs su rgol ba'i brtson 'grus so// 'di ltar sems yongs su tshol te/ 'dod chags par 'gyur ba'am/ zhes sdang bar 'gyur/
396a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'am/ gtimug par 'gyur ba'i sems de gang yin/ tsa 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung bzhig yin nas/ de la sems 'das pa gang yin pa de ni med pa'o//
396a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni mabyin pa'o// da ltar byung ba ni gnas pa med ngos ma mo// 'od srung sems nang na yang med/ byorol na yang med/ gcig med pa la yang mi dmigs so//
396b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sems ni dpyang du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa'o// 'od srung sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
396b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyur ro// log par zhugs pa'i 'du shes las chos rnams 'byung ba ma gtogs par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzan/
396b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu ba ci 'dra bar blta zhe na/ 'od srung sems ni rgya ma dang mtshungs te/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i skye ba rnams
396b4(dkon brtsegs): mang po yongs su 'dzin to// 'od srung sems ni 'bab chu'i rgyun dang mtshungs te/ mi gnas pa/ skyes nas 'jig cing 'jug pa'o// 'od srung sems ni rlung dang mtshungs te/ ring
396b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro zhing gzung du med par rgyu ba'o// 'od srung sems ni mar me'i 'od 'phro ba dang mtshungs te rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i 'od srung sems ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ nye ba'i
396b6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa blo bur rnams kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa'o// 'od srung sems ni glog dang mtshungs te/ skad cig tu 'jug cig ci mi gnas pa'o// 'od srung sems ni spre'u dang
396b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs te/ yul thams cad 'dod pa'o// 'od srung sems ni las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ri mo mkhan dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni nyon mo
396b8(dkon brtsegs): batha dad pa 'byung ba'i phyir mi gnas so// 'od srung sems ni gnyis pa mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i phyir/ gcig pu rgya de gnyis su med pa'o// 'od srung sems ni chos thams cad
397a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sem mi mirnas pa las par 'du shes pa'i khyi ma pa mtshungs so//
397a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed pa'i phyir rgyal po dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni sdug bsngal thams cad skyed pa'i phyir mi mdza' ba dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni dge ba'i
397a3(dkon brtsegs): be thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i phyir/ bye ma'i khang pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyir nyi'i mchil pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs
397a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyir rmi lam dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i phyir spang ma sngon po dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni
397a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa rnam pa mang po byed pas phyir rgol ba dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni rtag tu klan ka tshol ba'i phyir gnod sbyin mdangs 'phrog pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni rtag
397a6(dkon brtsegs): glags lta bas dgra dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang ldan pas rtag par mthon dman can no// 'od srung sems ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams/
397a7(dkon brtsegs): cad chubs chom rkun dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni gzugs la dga' bas phyi byi zho mig dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni sba la dga' bas yul gyi rnga dang mtshungs so//
397a8(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sems ni phag mig gtsang ba'i dril dbang ba bzhin du dril dga' ba'o// 'od srung sems ni ro la dga' bas zas kyi lhag ma za ba'i phra mo dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sem
397a9(dkon brtsegs): ni rig pa la dga' bas sdang ma 'bru mar gyi snod la chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srung sems ni kun btsal na marnyed do// gang ma rnying pa de ni mi dmigs pa'o// gang ming mi/
397b1(dkon brtsegs): pade ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// gang 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de ni dus
397b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o// gang dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa de ni yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no// gang yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin/
397b3(dkon brtsegs): pade ni ma skyes pa'o// gang ma skyes pa de ngo bo nyid med do// gang ngo bo nyid med pa de la 'byung ba med do// gang 'byung ba med pa de la 'gag pa med do// gang 'gag pa med pa de la
397b4(dkon brtsegs): ba med do// gang 'bral ba med pa de la 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ 'chi 'pho yang med/ sde ba yang med do// gang la 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ 'chi bo yang /
397b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa de la 'du byed gang yang med do// gang la 'du byed gang yang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// gang 'dus ma byas pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs so// 'phags pa rnams
397b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rigs gang yin pa de la brlab pa yang med/ bslab pa las 'das pa yang med do// gang bslab pa med/ bslab pa las 'das pa yang med pa de la rgyu ba yang med/ mi rgyu ba ma
397b7(dkon brtsegs): med rab tu rgyu ba yang med do// gang la rgyu ba yang med/ mi rgyu ba yang med/ rab tu rgyu ba yang med pa de la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med do//
397b8(dkon brtsegs): gang la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med pa de la/ las kyang med las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med do// gang la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam
398a1(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa yang med pa de la/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med do// gang la bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs te/
398a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la ni las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// gang la las kyang med las mngon par 'du byed pa yang med pa'i rigs de la/
398a3(dkon brtsegs): ni lus kyi las byed nga med de/ ngag gis ma yin yid kyis ma yin no// rigs de la tham dang 'bring dang mchog tu rnam par gzhag pa yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs de na nam
398a4(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o// rigs de ni chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir khyad par med pa'o// rigs de ni lus dang sems dben pa'i phyir dben pa'o// rigs de ni
398a5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'thun pa'o// rigs de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'o// rigs de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'idi 'dzin pa med pas nga'i
398a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o// rigs de ni yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa yin pa mnyam pa las byung ba ste/ mi mnyam pa med pa'o// rigs de ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin pas bden pa'o// rigs
398a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni gtan du ma skye ba'i phyir mi zang pa'o// rigs de ni rtag tu chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyir rtag pa'o// rigs de ni mya ngan las 'das pa mchog gi phyir bde ba'o// rigs do ni
398a8(dkon brtsegs): na patham dungs med pa'i phyi dge ba'o// rigs de ni bdag yongs su bcal tem rnyed pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o// rigs deni ba tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi ma pa dag pa /
398b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung nang du yongs su tshol la phyi rol du ma rgyug shig/ 'od srung ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong khyi rdol snyegs pa dang chungs pa dag 'byung ngo // 'od srung ci ltar na dge slong kyi rnam
398b2(dkon brtsegs): skyegs pa dang mtshungs bdag yin zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la ste dper na/ khyin rngos 'jigs la/ rdong nyid kyi phyir skegs kyi/ rdo sus 'bangs pa de la ni mi stegs so// 'ongasu
398b3(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin du 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig gzugs dang / skra dang dri dang / ro dang reg byas 'jigs shing skra gnas dgon pa'i gnas rnams na gnas zhing / de gden gci rje/
398b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med par lus rab tu dben par 'dug ste/ chags par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams snang bar gyur pa na/ de dag de la btang snyoms su
398b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jog cing / gsod nyams su sbyor ba dang ldan pa ga gan nas ga ca nan gag yan na nas nas su nas das kyin/ nag zhag su mas cad cad cad dan tu ga ga da tsha gas/
398b6(dkon brtsegs): ka zhan // dgon pa na gnas pa las 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ 'jig rten pa'i sdom pa la gnas pas de dag mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ der
398b7(dkon brtsegs): yang de dag lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis gnod par 'gyur ro// de dag de nas shaphos nas ngan song nas bzhi las yongs su ma grol bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dis
398b8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye nas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin dang / 'od de ltar na dge slong khyi rdol snyegs pa dang mtshungs pa dag yin no//
399a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung ci ltar na khyi rdol snyegs pa dang mi 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'od srung gang gshe yang slar mi gne khros kyang slar mi khro// mtshang brus kyang slar mtshang
399a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dra/ brdegs kyang slar mi jig sdigs kyang slar mi sdigs kyang slar mi skrod cing / nang du sems la so sor rtog ste/ 'di la gshe ba'am/ khros pa 'am/ brdegs pa 'am/
399a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ mtshang thus pa de dag gang yin snyam du so sor rtog pa'o// 'od srung de ltar na dge slong khyi rdol snyegs pa dang mi 'dra ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dpe/
399a4(dkon brtsegs): mabyin rdobs skrag gyur kyang // sus 'phangs mi snyigs rdo la sregs par byed// de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze la la dag gzugs las stsogs pas sba gnas dgon par gnas/ dengs
399a5(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa de la gnas gyur kyang // gzugs la sogs pa sdug pa mthong gyur na// btang snyoms 'jog cing nang gi tshul mi shes// de yi nyes las byung ba gang yin pa// mi shes pa/
399a6(dkon brtsegs): na slar yang grong du gnas// gzugs la sogs pas der yang gnod par 'gyur// 'dir yang lha'i longs spyod spyad gyur te// lha dang mi las kha cig gi 'phos nas// de dag
399a7(dkon brtsegs): songasar ni srung bar 'gyur// thun po de dag gi 'phos sdug bsngal 'gyur/ de ltar sdug bsngal brgyad ldan de dag ni// khri rdo stegs pa 'dra zhes bde gshegs gsungs//
399a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi gshe brdegs kyang mjig dang / su zhig slad kyang spod par mi byed dang // de bzhin mtshang brus mtshang 'jum byed dang // khros kyang nges pa khro bar mi byed cing // nang gis/
399b1(dkon brtsegs): na na po gyung bdag/ rol zhing ming bzhin dran dang ldan gyur pa// de 'dra'i tshul khrims bcu la tshugs ldan pa ni// ngosogs kyim 'dre shes rgyal ngas gsungs/ 'od srung 'dzin
399b2(dkon brtsegs): lding bodang/ rtswa'i 'dul skyong la mkhas ngas ni gang dang gang du ga yo byed cing ma byang ba de dang der rab tu myong ngo // 'od srung de bzhin du dge slong spong ba yang gang dang gang du sems 'gyur na/
399b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba de dang der rab tu sbyor ba la 'dug ste/ de ci'i nas phyis 'khrug par mi 'gyur bar de ltar sems rab tu chos so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rta'i 'dul sbyong ma khas
399b4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig/ byang zhing g.yo mong tshul du rab tu 'dul// rnal 'byor pa yang sems ni 'gyur mthong nas// ji ltar phyis 'khrug mi 'gyur de ltar 'chis// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ lkog
399b5(dkon brtsegs): nad lha gor gyis ni srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi nang na bdag tu 'dzin pa'i lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi nang na bdag tu 'dzin
399b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i labs chos kyi srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lha gor srog gi dbang po la// gnod cing de la bde basbyin pa min// de bzhin ltar
399b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur nang na bdag lta ba/ de ni chos srog rnam par 'jig par byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi ni gang dang gang du bcings pa de dang de nyid las dgrol bar bya ba yin no// 'od srung
399b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rnal 'byor myong ba'i sems gang dang gang la chags pa de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi ni gang du bcings gyur pa/ de dang nges
400a1(dkon brtsegs): dgrol bar bya ba yin// de bzhin sems rmongs gang dang gar chags pa// rnal 'byor pas ni nga nge las dkrol// 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i na/
400a2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la yongasu chags pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig yongs su tshol ba dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos / paste 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ce
400a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ 'jig rten rgyang pan goms byed brtson pa dang // lhung bzed chos gos lhag par 'chang byed pa// 'di gnyis nam mkha' la ni chags pa ste// de dag byang chub sems dpa' spang bar bya/
400a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i 'ching ba dam po ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ lta bar gyur pa'i 'ching ba dang / sked pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i 'chang ba ste/ 'di ga
400a5(dkon brtsegs): so// de la 'di sad ces bya ste/ lngar gyur 'ching dang rnyed dang bkur sti dang // grags pa'i 'ching ba rab tu byung ba yi// 'ching ba ngam zhes 'phags pa rnams kyis gsungs// de dag
400a6(dkon brtsegs): rjeg du byung bas spangs/ 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i bar du gtsang ba'i chos te/ // 'phags pa'i phyogs la gnod par sems pa ste/ 'di gnyis sa/
400a7(dkon brtsegs): nges sa ces byaste// khyim pa'i phyogs la sbyin par byed pa dang // 'jigs pa'i phyogs la rnam par slong bye ga// 'di ga cis rab byung bar chang thugags byed yin// byang chub sams
400a8(dkon brtsegs): dngas de dag rnam par sang // 'od srung 'di ga nyis ni rab tu byung ba'i drim ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa la ma mdzad pa dang / mdza' bo'i khyim dang / zas ster ba'i khyim lo/
400b1(dkon brtsegs): sra nam ste/ 'jiganas so// de la 'dis ces byaste/ rab tu byung brtson mongs mi 'jed dang // mdza' gro'i khyim dang zas ster ba khyim stenapa// de gnyis dri mar rgyal ba'idabang ngos gsu
400b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas de garnam par spangs// 'od srung de gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i ser pa 'bab pa ste/ gnyis gang she na/ dam pa'i chos stong ba dang / tshul khrims las nyams kyi
400b3(dkon brtsegs): dad pas byin pa yongs su spyod pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces byas ste/ dam pa'i chos ni spong ba dang // tshul khrims nyams kyang spong ba ste// ser ba 'bab pa 'di gnyis ni//
400b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyalams rnams kyis spang bar bya// 'od sung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i ma min te/ gnyis gang she na/ pha rol gyinyes pa las so sor rtog pa dang / bdag gigis pa 'chab bste/
400b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// bdag gi skyon ni 'chab byed dang // pha rol nyes la rtog byed pa// 'di gnyis sa dug gi me dang 'dra// rtog pa rnams kyis rma 'di spangs// 'od
400b6(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i yongs su gdung ba ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rnyog pa dang bcas pas sems kyis dur srog 'chang ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan
400b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa las bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro bya bdag gir byed pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyog dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ngur smrig 'chang ba dang // bsnyen
400b8(dkon brtsegs): bkur rim gro byed dang sra ba dang // tshul khrims ldan rnams sten par byed pa dang // chos gnyis 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ba yin// 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i
401a1(dkon brtsegs): zug rngu ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ sgrub pa'i gzhi las gal ba dang / sring po ma blangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed ste/ 'di gnyis so// 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu/
401a2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i nad gsor mi rung ba ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sems la nges par sems pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams kyis 'dun
401a3(dkon brtsegs): bzlog pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal sems la nges sems dang / sangs rgyas theg pa las ni 'dun pa zlog/ 'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i
401a4(dkon brtsegs): nang zhes// gang zag mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal bas gsungs// 'od srung dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ci tsam gyis na/ dge slong dge sbyong zhes bya zhe na/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni/
401a5(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs kyi dge sbyong dang / chog srung zhing tshul chos pa'i dge sbyong dang / brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong dang /
401a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong ngo // 'od srung de la kha dog dang rtags dang / dbyibs kyi dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong kha dag dog dang / rtags kyi dbyibs pa
401a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyur te/ chos gos sam sbyar gyon cing / mgo thigs te/ lag na lhung bzed thogs mod kyi/ de lus kyi las yongasu ma dag par spyod/ ngag gi las yongs sum/
401a8(dkon brtsegs): bzung / ming kyilas yongs su ma dag par myor cing / mdul ba/ mazhi ga sungs pa/ mabyung ba/ 'tshab yongs su ma dgapa/ banang bri ma mtshan/ tshul rnams la
401b1(dkon brtsegs): / srog pa bcos can man te/ 'od su rjen pa dog dang / nags dang / dbyibs kyi dge slong zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la srung nying chul chos pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'ong srung 'angs na/
401b2(dkon brtsegs): snod kha cig chog dang spyod yul dang / slong ba phun sum tshogs shing / slong lam bzhir shes bzhin du stong la/ zas dang skom ngan pa za 'thung / 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi pa de ngag
401b3(dkon brtsegs): gis chog par 'dzin pas/ bas mtha' gnas mal la mngon par dga'/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dres la tshig byung zhing sku bkrung mod kyi/ de'i spyod las nge ba
401b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul chos pa dang / khagasag gis yongs su brtags pa yin te/ sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin
401b5(dkon brtsegs): dmags par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas shing / stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la g.yang sar 'du shes pa yin/ spong ba nyid
401b6(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i dge slong rnams la yang dmar 'du shes ma yin te/ 'od srung de ni cho ga srung zhing / tshul chos pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyod/
401b7(dkon brtsegs): 6/ kha cig sar ngag tshul khrims dang ldan par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam driso sor brtags nas tshul khrims srung / ji ltar mang du thos par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur dus so/
401b8(dkon brtsegs): rtags nas/ thos pa 'dzin/ ji ltar bdag dgon pa par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas/ dgon pa la gnas shing so sor brtags nas/ 'dod pa chung la
402a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog shes pa dang / rab tu dben par gyur te/ 'di ltar gzhan la snyan pa'i phyir gyi/ 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'gog par bya ba'i
402a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ dge sbyong gi phyir ma yin/ tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma
402a3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ 'od srung de ni brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcang ba'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge slong gang zhe na/ 'od srung gang lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba la/
402a4(dkon brtsegs): narnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams thos na dga' zhing de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa yin/
402a5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dod pa med par sbyang ba spyod na/ khams gsum pa la mngon par dga' ba lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid du lta ba yang mi 'dod pa yin na/ bdag dang sems/
402a6(dkon brtsegs): can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag tu lta ba lta ci smos don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par thar
402a7(dkon brtsegs): banang mol ma/ rgya 'i phyug pa ma yin/ chos thams cad shin tu yongs su ga cing rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa thong bas bdag nyid skyabs yin te/
402a8(dkon brtsegs): byangasas sa de bzhin gshegs pa 'tshas cid du mang mas na/ gzugs kyi sus na thos/ chos la 'dod nags dang thal bar yang mi sam sla pa'i tshig gisas nas brjos
402b1(dkon brtsegs): cho sa/ 'phags pa 'dus pa byas pa'i dge 'dun la yang rnam par mchog na/ mang po 'dus par sa ci sros/ chos gang spangs par bya ba'i phyir brtson par ma yin/ bsgom par
402b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyi ma yin/ 'khor bar yang mi ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mngon par dga' ba ma yin/ thar pa yang mi dmigs/ bcings pa
402b3(dkon brtsegs): mang ma yin pa/ tsas thams cad ro bzhin gyis/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig nas/ kun tu ma 'khom yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yin te/ 'od srung de nas
402b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srung yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur bar brtson par bya'i/ ming gis gnod par mi bya ste/ 'od srung dge sbyong ni bzhi po 'di
402b5(dkon brtsegs): dag go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig lus dang ngag dang sems ma dag/ ma dul ma srungs ma byang 'dod cen can// mgo bregs chos gos lhung gzed la ga na thogs
402b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni dbyibs rtags dge sbyong yin zhes bstan// cho ga spyod pa la sogs ldan gyur cing // kha zas ngan za tshul chos la sogs sten// 'du 'dzi rgyang ring yongs su spong byed cing
402b7(dkon brtsegs): slong lam 'phags pa'i rigs dang ldan gyur kyang // de yi de kun dul bar byephyer min// niphyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min// stong pa mtshan mod g.yang sar 'du shes pa//
402b8(dkon brtsegs): gsung zhing tshul chos gnyis pa yin// tshul khrims ting 'dzin sbyangs pa'i yon tan thos// gzhan dag ngo mtshar 'dzin du gzhug par byed// ni phyir ma yin spro bar bya phyir min//
403a1(dkon brtsegs): brjod dang grags 'dod dge sbyong gsum pa yin// gang zhig lus srogadon du mi gnyer zhing // rnyed dang bkur stil ni rgyab kyis phyogs// rnam par tharapa
403a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i sgothos nas// srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad don mi gnyer// chos rnams shin tu stong par yongs brtags nas// mya ngan 'das dang ma 'das mthong mi 'gyur// chos
403a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'di chags bral bar rab tu rtog/ ma byas chos rtogs mya ngan 'das pa 'gyur// 'od srung 'dis skyed per na ming bul po nig la mdzod 'byor ba zhes ming btags na/ 2/
403a4(dkon brtsegs): srung 'diji snyam du sems/ mi dbul po de dang ming de mthun pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung/
403a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du gang dge slong dang bram ze gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze'i yon tan dang mi ldan pa de dag ni gsungasar ba 'di las me dbul po zhes ngas bshad do// de la 'di ska
403a6(dkon brtsegs): byaste// dper na dbul por gyur pa'i mi zhig la// mdzod ldan ming btags de la mdzes ma yin// dge sbyong nyams la dge sbyong ming mi mdzes// dbul la phyag ces btags
403a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dade'angang mtshungs// 'od srung 'di sa me dper na/ mel la zhig rgya mtsho'i chu chen pos khyer la/ nus sgom bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung 'di
403a8(dkon brtsegs): sadage slong dang bram cig chos mang po rjengs te/ kun chu par byas kyang / 'dod chags la sred bam sil/ zhe sdang 'i seng pa mi sel/ gti mug la sred pam mal pa
403b1(dkon brtsegs): ga chos mas gyur la/ nyon mongs pa'i gom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ ngan 'thor 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces byaste/ dper nam nag rgyamatshan
403b2(dkon brtsegs): chus khyer la// de ni sgom bzhin 'chi ba 'dus byed gyur// de bzhin chos mang sred pa'i bag med pa// chos kyi rgya mtshor gnas kyang ngan song 'gro// 'od srung 'di la steng dper na/
403b3(dkon brtsegs): sman pa sran sgrogathogs te/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rgyu bde nad cig gis btab nas/ nad de gsom nus na/ de'i sman de ni don med pa yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du ma
403b4(dkon brtsegs): du ngos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du blta ste/ gang mang du thos pa des bdag nyon mongs pa'i nang las gsos mi nus na/ de'i mang du thos pa de ni don med pa yin no// de la 'das
403b5(dkon brtsegs): ces byas ste/ dper na sman pa'i sman sgor bcug pa'i sman// 'jig rten kun du yongs su rgyu byed kyang // nad kyis btab pa zlog par mi nus na// de'i sman de don med gyur pa yin/
403b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin dge slong yon tan tshul khrims ldan// thos dang ldan yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'o// nyon mongs byung ba'i nang ni mi sel na// de yi thos la brtson pa don med yin/
403b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi nad pa zhig la rgyal po la 'os pa'i sman btang la/ cho ga bzhin ma byas pas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung gang mi sdom pa des 'chi
403b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus byed pa de yang mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du blta'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal po 'os pa'i sman btang nas/ chog ma byas mi shi bar gyur/
404a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gang mi sdom pas 'dir shi ba// de ni mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs na// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung na spang
404a2(dkon brtsegs): 'kho bar mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du mang du thos pa rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i gtsang ba'i nang du lhung bar lta ste/ ci yang med pa la lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di
404a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ dper na rin cen mi gtsang lhung ba srang // ji ltar sngon bzhin de ni phyis ma yin/ dge slong mang du thos par gyur pa yang // bkur sti'i mi gcang srung bde 'drar bshad/
404a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi ro'i mgo la gser gyis btags pa de bzhin du/ tshul khrims 'chal pa ngur smrig gyon par blta'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi ro mgos
404a5(dkon brtsegs): gser 'phreng ngam// yang na me tog 'phreng ba btags pa byas// de bzhin khrims med dur smrig gyon pa yang // mthong nas de la yid ni dang mi 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong/
404a6(dkon brtsegs): dngon kyi bu zhig legs par khrus byas te/ legs par rnam par byugs la/ swa dang sen mo bregs nas/ gos dkar po bgos te na na mchog gis bsdus pa'i mgrol/ tsam pa/
404a7(dkon brtsegs): mag 'a byed bathags pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung tshul khrims dang ldan zhing mang du thos bdur srog gyon par blta'o// de la 'di sad ces bya ste/ legs bzlas legs par byug
404a8(dkon brtsegs): bame tshong dpon bu yi mag bol// tsam pa g.yo ma tog 'phreng // ji zhim mi 'ong btags pa mdzes// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan gyur cing // mang thos tshul khrims dranas/
404b1(dkon brtsegs): sa// rgyal da'i nas btsun man// de 'dur chug de bzhin ma rjes// 'od srung ban pa 'di dag na rgyal khrims 'tshal pa// khrims dang na sar bas pa / nan/
404b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di la dge slong kha cig tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams shing gnas// cho ga dang skyong yul phun sum tshogs// kha na mtho ba thar ba rnams
404b3(dkon brtsegs): la yang 'jigs par la/ yang dag par blangs te bslab pa'i bzhi rnams la slob cing / lus kyi lus dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gnas
404b4(dkon brtsegs): pas 'tsho ba yongs su dag kyang de bdag tu sra ba yin te/ 'od srung de ni tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar ba bcos pa dang po'o// 'od srung gzhan yang 'dil
404b5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong kha cig 'dul bar na cing / 'dul bzhugs te/ 'dul ba'i tshul la gnas pa yin yang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba las ma bskyed pa yin te/ 'od srung de ni tshul
404b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal ba/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa gnyis pa'o// 'od srung gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig byams pa la gnas pa yin te/ sems can la
404b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa yin yang / 'du byed thams cad la skye ba med pa thos na skrag ste/ kun tu ngas bar 'gyur zhing / kun tu rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ba de ni/ 'o
404b8(dkon brtsegs): srung tshul khrims 'chal ba/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa gsum pa'o// 'od srung gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag
405a1(dkon brtsegs): par blangs kyang / dmigs par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa la gnas pa de ni 'od srung tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar chos
405a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa yin no// 'od srung tshul khrims tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni gang la bdag med pa dang
405a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag go ba med pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / mi bya ba med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / byed pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rgyu ba ma yin pa dang / mi rgyu ba yang ma yin pa dang / rab tu
