405a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa med pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang / ming med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rab tu zhi bam
405a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / rab tu ma zhi ba yang ma yin pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa yang ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa
405a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can du 'dogs pa med pa dang / tshig med pa dang / tshig tu 'dogs pa med pa dang / sems med pa dang / sems su 'dogs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten med pa dang /
405a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rten med pa dang / rten med pa yang ma yin pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims la mi stong pa dang / gzhan gyi tshul khrims la mi spong ba dang / chu
405a8(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyis rlom sems su ma byed pa dang / tshul khrims la mchon pa yin te/ den 'phags pa rnams kyi tshul khrims zag pa med pa/ gtogs pa ma yin pa/ khams/
405b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa dang bral ba/ rten mas cad med pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag gsungs so// tshul khrims dang ldan 'dzum me
405b2(dkon brtsegs): yang med// tshul khrims ldan pa rgyags pa med de rten pa med// tshul khrims ldan pa mun pa med cing 'tshe ba med// tshul khrims ldan la rdul rnams med de nyes pa med// nab
405b3(dkon brtsegs): tu ni blte bar zhi ba'i yid// rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral zhing nyon mongs med// g.yo ba dang ni rlom sems kun dang rnam bral ba// de ni 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan tshul
405b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan// lus la mi lta srog la 'phangs par 'dzin mi byed// srid pa rnams su skye ba kun la 'dod pa med// yang dgazhugs shing de nyid tshul la rab gnas pa//
405b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// 'jig rten ma gos 'jig drug la gnas pa med// bdag tu 'du shes med cing gzhan du 'du shes med// 'du shes yong
405b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pas tshul khrims rnam par dag/ gang la tshu rol med cing pha rol gnas kyang med// pha rol tshu rol dag nams kyang mi chags shing // bcings dang chags med tshul/
405b7(dkon brtsegs): chos med cing zag pa med// de ni 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// ming dang gzugs rnams la ni chags pa med pa yin// de ni nyams par mnyam gzhag
405b8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dul ba'i sems// gang la bdag med bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa ni// de tsam gyis ni tshul khrims gnas zhes brjod pa yin// so sor thar pa slob pas rlom sem/
405b9(dkon brtsegs): shirme da
406a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med// des ni 'di na de la chags par mi 'gyur te// de yi gong du 'phags pa'i lam rnams tshol byed pa// de ni tshul khrims rnam par dag gi
406a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma'o// tshul khrims gtso bor ma yin ting nge 'dzin der chags med// de yi gong du shes rab sgom pa yongs su 'tshol// dmigs pa med pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs
406a3(dkon brtsegs): yin te// tshul khrims de ni bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bsngags// 'jig pa'i tshogs la lha las rnam par grol ba'i yid// de 'di rang dang nga yi snyam du gyur pa med// sad
406a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas spyod yul stong pa nyid la lhag par mos// de yi tshul khrims de ni nyams pa med pa'o// tshul khrims la ni gnas ting nge 'dzin kyang thob// ting nge 'dzin rnams thob nas
406a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab shin tu som// shes rab kyis ni ye shes rnam par dag pa thob// me shes rnam par dag pas tshul khrims dran sum tshogs// tshigs su bcang ba mngon par bsgrubs
406a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gsungs pa'i tshe/ dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med par byug pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags sum khri na chos rnams la chos kyi mag rdul
406a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral zhing drim med pa rnam par dag go/ dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgyan chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos pas spyan las langs te dong ngo //
406a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'dis ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga bcu po 'di dag chos bstan pa 'angam/
406b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ma 'jug ste/ martogs ma mos pas stan las 'das te mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phral pa/ 'od srung 'di sar ge slong mngon pa'i thal na ma
406b2(dkon brtsegs): khrims rnam par dag pa zag pa med pa 'di la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtog mi mos shing sA ga ste/ kun tu dadangs kun du rab tu dngangs so// 'od srung tshigs su bcang ba mngon par
406b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa zab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub zab ste/ de la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang / mos pa mim
406b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mos par mi nus so// 'od srung dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag ning bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis gsung rab la mu stegs can gyi nyan thos su gyur te/ de dag gshegs
406b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'od srung las rgal ba'i bsam pas chos snyan pa gcig thos so// thos nas dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed de/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
406b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jam zhing snyan par gsungs pa ngo mtshar to// snyam mo// de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dang pa'i sems rnyed pa des/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
406b7(dkon brtsegs): nang du skyes so// de dag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes te/ rgyu de nyid kyis nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ste/ 'od srung dge slong lnga brgya po lta bar bying ba 'di dag ni chos
406b8(dkon brtsegs): pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtogs mi mos shing skrag ste/ kun du dngangs kun du rab tu dngangs so// yang 'di dag ni chos bstan pa 'dis yongs su sbyang ba byas ste/
407a1(dkon brtsegs): byis ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan par
407a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byor la bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor khyod song la dge slong de dag kun shes par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di dag la bshad na yang ma/
407a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyid na/ bdag la la smos kyang ci tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong de dag lam gang nas 'dod pa'i lam der dge slong gnyis shig sprul pa sprul to// de nas
407a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong lnga brgya po de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de gnyis lam gang nas 'dod pa'i lam der song te/ phyin pa dang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'dod/ de gnyis
407a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag na dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rig par gnas par 'dong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bas/
407a6(dkon brtsegs): pagang yin pa'i chos bstan pa de la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtogs mi mos shing skrag ste/ kun du dngangs/ kun du rab tu dngangs par gyur pa nas/ kho bo cag dgon pa'i gnas rnams su
407a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o// dge slong lnga brgya po dag gis 'dis ces smras so// chedang ldan pa dag kho bo cog kyang bcom ldan
407a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos bkang pa la mi 'jug ste/ martogs ma mos shing skrag ste/ kun du dngas/ kun du rab tu dang sa gyur to// de'i phyir kho bo cog kyang dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam
407b1(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o// sprul pa dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag cag yang dag par 'gro bar bya'o// tsong dur
407b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rtsod pa med pa lhur len par ni dge sbyong gi chos so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gang 'di yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i rma
407b3(dkon brtsegs): dgang / lus 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye po 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes pa 'am/ sheng bu'am/ gang yongs su mya na
407b4(dkon brtsegs): las 'da' bar 'gyur/ gang zag pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'dod chags zad/ zhe sdang zad/ gti mug zad pas so yongs su mya ngan las
407b5(dkon brtsegs): 'da'o// sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yod pa yin nam cin de zad par bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ de dag
407b6(dkon brtsegs): ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka med pa la yang mi dmigs te/ de dag ni yongs su ma brtags pa las kyang mi skye'o// sprul pa gnyis kyi smras pa/ tshe
407b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag de ltabs na ma rtog rnam par mi rtog shig/ ni dang ldan pa dag nam mchog rnam par mi rtog pa de ni chags par yang mi 'gyur/ chags pa dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur na
407b8(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba yang med pa gang yin pa de zhi ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag tshul khrims na mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o// tshe dang
408a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan padag ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / mi 'khor zhing yongasu mya ngan las
408a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'da'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag chos de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston na/ chos de dag kyang stong pa dben pa bzung du med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste/ mya ngan las
408a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i 'du shes spong shig/ 'du shes la yang 'du shes ma byed cig/ 'du shes las 'du shes kyi yongs su shes par ma byed cig gang 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongasu shes
408a4(dkon brtsegs): par ma byed cig/ gang 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongs su shes pa de ni de'i 'du shes kyis bcings pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par
408a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa la zhugs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las gong du bya ba med do zhes sla'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i
408a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de dag sems rnam par grol nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags par/
408a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi rnabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas cidang ldan pa rang 'byor gyis dge slong dag la 'di sad ces sbams/ cha dang ldanapa
408a8(dkon brtsegs): dgagar dong / gang nas lpags/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang du yang 'gro ba med pa dang / gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ba/
408b1(dkon brtsegs): tosbas pa tshe dang ldan pa dag khyod kyi ston pa gang yin/ smras pa gang ma skyes shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'o// sbas pa khyed kyi'i ltar chos/ sbas pacing ba'i phyir yang /
408b2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ mthar pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// sbas pa khyod sus btul/ smras pa lus med cing sems med pas so// smras pa khyed ji ltar brtson/ sbas pa ma rig pa spangs pa'i phyir
408b3(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin no// rig pa bskyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// smras pa khyed ji ltar rnam par grol/ smras pa sbyor ba'i phyir yang ma yin no// spangs pa'i phyir yang ma yin/ smras pa khyod su
408b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos/ smras pa gang gis thos pa med cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med pa'o// smras pa khyed kyi tshangs pa'i tshungs par spyod pa gang / sbas pa gang dag khams gsu
408b5(dkon brtsegs): na mi rgyu ba rnams so// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag ci srid cig na yongs su mya ngan las 'da'/ smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' na'o// sbas pa 9
408b6(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su shes pas so// smras pa khyed kyi nyon mongs pa zang ngam/ sbas pa chos thams gtan du zad pa'i phyir ro// smras pa khyed kyis bdud btul
408b7(dkon brtsegs): lam smras pa phung po'i bdud mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// smras pa khyed kyis ston pa las bsnyen bkur byas sam/ sbas pa lus kyis kyang ma byas/ ngag gis kyang ma byas
408b8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis kyang ma byas so// sbas pa khyed kyis sbyin pa'i gnas kyis sbyangs sam/ smras pa 'dzin pa med cing sdud pa med pas so// smras pa khyed 'khor ba las rgal tam
409a1(dkon brtsegs): sbas pa chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa'i phyir// smras pa khyed sbyin pa'i gnas kyi sar zhugs sam/ sbas pa 'dzin pa thams cad las rnam par gro
409a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'gro// smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrol pa gang du bzhud par ro// de ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yongs su dris te/ de
409a3(dkon brtsegs): slong de dag gis len btab pas/ 'khor de'i dge slong brgyad brgya'i len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags sum khri nyis stong na/
409a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing / drim dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du/
409a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa de ldan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de/
409a6(dkon brtsegs): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di sa ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la srog
409a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji sar bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu narab cang nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan te/
409a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin skyes bungs pa nan tan snying por byed pa rnams kyi don chen pong 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'dis ste dper na/ mal la zhig khang pa'i glur zhugs te/
409b1(dkon brtsegs): mar ba tul 'dod par gyur na/ rigs sa byung snyam du sems mangs 'dra ba'i bcom 'azlas kyis chu mal bar byas// gsas pa bcom ldan 'das stobs
409b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyis brtse'o// de ci'i srang du zhe na/ bdag ni chub chen po'i nang du zhugs kyis/ bdaga' ma mdum phyin par bar mdor gru zhig tu 'ang snyam dus/
409b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun du snang ba de ltar byang chub sems dpas de bas kyang ches stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos kyi po
409b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di la bslab par bya ste/ stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o// kye ma'o lus 'di ni mi rtag pa
409b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ bdag gis snying po ma blangs par mdor 'chi ba'i dus byas su 'ong ngo zhes yid la byed pa de lta bus bdag ni chu bo chen por zhugs nas/ chu bo bzhir zhugs pa'i sems
409b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams chu bo chen por zhugs pa las bskal pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos kyis gru gang gis sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mchos khyer ba thams cad bskal bar bya ba'i ma
409b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi gru chen po sbyar bar bya'o// kun tu snang ba de la byang chub sems ngas pa'i chos kyi gru chen po sbyar bar bya ba de ci 'dra zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la
409b8(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam pa nyid de/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' yas par brtsams pa/ tshul khrims kyi snam gyis sbyar ba/ sbyin pa'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsam
410a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas bcing bsra bas dam por spel ba/ bzod pa dang nges pa dang / dran pa'i sbyor khar legs par sbyar ba/ byang chub
410a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag bdun gyi tshogs can/ brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyi shing gis yang dag par sbyar ba/ bsam gtan gyi sems kyis las su rung bar byas/
410a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dul ba dang zhi ba dang cang shes kyi dge ba'i bzos lags par zin par byas pa/ shin tu mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can/ snying rje chen pos yang dag par 'dzin pa/ bsdu ba'i
410a4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po dang dpa' bar 'gro bas pas rab/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi phyir rgol ba legs par bsrungs pa/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par brtsegs pa/ legs par byas pa
410a5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis legs par yongs su sbyangs pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi legs par rnam par bsdams pa'i lus kyis bsten pa/ yang dag pa'i spong ba'i/
410a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob rngu 'phrul gyi rmed pa'i mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ dang po legs par brtags pas lce bangan pa'i gang yon po med pa/ stobs kyi thugs sang dag par
410a7(dkon brtsegs): khas par zhigazhig gis 'grobs rnam pa dag pa/ btsugs can gyingasazhon mongs pa'i bdud pa lam 'dor bar byed pa/ pha rol gyi rigs su byin par byed pa/
410a8(dkon brtsegs): segs 'do pa byeng ba/ sheganas pangs par sems pa bsanas/ sugam thong gas stong ba/ mdza' gnyis sa mdas par 'jug pa/
410a9(dkon brtsegs): ra pa
410b1(dkon brtsegs): mang ga pa ldanapa/ sgra sngags pa/ yangs nang rgya chel mi dang cing / chang meng pa/ rgyar nogangs pa'i rgya chen po mya ngan las 'das pa'i mong khyer du 'gro ba/ bad ba 'tsha
410b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med par 'gro ba/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba 'dor bar zhugs pa/ tshu rol gyi 'gram nas pha rol lta ba thams cad sel ba/ brtse ba mang ba med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa/
410b3(dkon brtsegs): myur du song shig ces phyogs bcur smras go bar byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yongasu mi skyong
410b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos kyi chen po 'di 'dra ba de sbyar bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos kyi gru 'di tshul sa khyer ba'i sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o// kun du snang
410b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// kun du snang ba de la 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa myur ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di sems can thams cad la bcos ma ma yin pa'i sbyor ba ste/ bsam
410b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag pas rab tu 'dun pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas dge ba la 'dun pa dang /
410b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thos pas mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes brtan par bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
410b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / lus dang sems dben par dgon pa na gnas pa dang // skye bo mi srun pa rnam par spangs pas 'du 'dzi med pa dang / don dam pa la
411a1(dkon brtsegs): nanangs chos dron du gnyen bya dang / shin du mi 'khrugs dus so zhes kyidon dang / ye shes don min pas nas kyi don dang / mi khrugs pas dben
411a2(dkon brtsegs): don dang / yang dag par sbyor ba byas pas stong pa nyid kyi don dang / shin tu nye bar ni ba'i don yin pas dben pa'i don te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'dir byang chub sems pa'i mngon par rtse/
411a3(dkon brtsegs): dmyur ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di theg pa che
411a4(dkon brtsegs): po slong dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngomanarata/
411a5(dkon brtsegs): bam ldan 'das dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi nam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pacig ma bsnyen na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum de bsod nams
411a6(dkon brtsegs): phung po tsotsam skyed par 'gyur/ des ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung rigs kyi bu'am ri/
411a7(dkon brtsegs): kyise mo gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA krung gi byes sted rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar cas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
411a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams pa sbyin pa byin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gna'i glang gi brim med rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri'i gtsug lag khang napa che sna bdum
411b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa gda'i klung gi bye ma snyed brtsigs pa dang / sachus bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu
411b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag la bsal ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sred du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi mchod
411b3(dkon brtsegs): rten rin po che sde bdun las byas pa pas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang pa dang ldan pa gzhan gang gis/ dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis
411b4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcing ba cig tsam lung mnos te/ lung mnos nas kyang mi spong na/ de ni bas ches bsod nams mang du sreng ngo // bud med gang zhig lung 'bog na/ de nam yang
411b5(dkon brtsegs): log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no// sa phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa 'am/ bstan pa 'am/ yi ger 'bris pa
411b6(dkon brtsegs): yi ger bris nas/ glegs bam du byas te/ gzhag pa'i sa phyogs de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// su zhig chos smra ba las chos kyi
411b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di gan pa'am/ 'dzin pa 'am/ yi ger 'bri ba de la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du gus par bya'o// 'od srung rigs kyi bu'am rags
411b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos spa bal bkur sti byed pa dang / btsun par byed pa dang / rimo byed pa dang / mchong ba byed pa de lang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
412a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas kyang lus kyi las yongs
412a2(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa bcu 'thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshor bas sems kun tu ma zin par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang / de mig 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba dang / lag pa g.yo ba
412a3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa dang / rkang pa 'dra bar mi byed pa dang / gcin mi stor ba dang / phyis mi'i 'byung ba dang / de'i snying kar rdul mi 'byung ba dang / khu tshur mi 'chang ba dang / nam mkha' la mi rnyibs pa/
412a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ba ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// ngag gi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob
412a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gdangs snyan pa'i tshig dang / mnyen pa'i tshig dang / 'jam pa'i tshig dang / dga' ba'i tshig dang / snum pa'i tshig dang / slar zlog
412a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i tshig dang / gzung bar bos pa'i tshig dang / btsun pa'i tshig dang / lha dang mis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig dang / sangs rgyas kyis yongasu bzung ba'i tshig dang / dus
412a7(dkon brtsegs): mas su sa byung de gastong ba gyu/ 'a kyilas mangs su gapa myo par 'gyul/ mu ga na/ 'din skyel bar mi tha sa/ mkhan du lam
412a8(dkon brtsegs): la 'am pa 'bya / pal mngag / 'dan nas mam ga 'bang/ 'dunas rgya tshulag tum rjer ba
412b1(dkon brtsegs): bam pag yong par 'thar ba dang / mA num pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyis zhing yongs su dag pa 'dzin pa dang / nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal med par sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
412b2(dkon brtsegs): cang mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba ste/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu de dag thod par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshor bas zhen cing 'chi ba'i
412b3(dkon brtsegs): dus mi byed// de'i mig la khrul bar 'gyur ba med// lag pa mi g.yo ba dang 'bra mi 'gyur// de'i nang gshang gci stor bar yong mi 'gyur// de'i snying kar rdul yang 'byung bar 'gyur/
412b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug bzhin bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed de// lus las yongs su dag pa 'di bcu 'thob// gdangs snyan phun gsum tshogs shing 'jam mnyen tshig/ sbrum zhing yid 'ong de bzhin dga'
412b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// gzhan gyis slar mi bzlog cing gzung 'od tshig/ skye bos btsun par bya ba'i tshig tu 'gyur// de yi tshig ni lha dang klu dag dang // mi 'am ci dang de bzhin rgyal ba'i bsdu
412b6(dkon brtsegs): nges bshad pa yi don kyang 'dzin byed de// de ni ngag las dag pa de dag 'thob// khro ba med cing khon du 'dzin pa med// bstan pa 'chab pa med cing 'tshig pa med// nyes la mi dga'
412b7(dkon brtsegs): khon gcugs dga' ba med// de yi 'du shes phyin ci log mi 'gyur// bslab pa yang dag blangs la sems mi 'dzum// spong ba la ni bag med mi 'gyur te// zhus pa med pa'i sa
412b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis zhing spyod byed// nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal yongs spangs nas// ting 'dzin 'byor pa thams cad mngon bsgrubs dang // yid kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i chos rnams thong
413a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams 'di dag ldan par 'gyur ba la// sangs rgyas dngos po dkon par mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung gang la la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis ngal
413a2(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti byed par 'dod pa dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'dod pa des dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ yi ge
413a3(dkon brtsegs): bri bar bya/ bsreg par bya/ bcang bar bya'o// 'od srung de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bla na med pa byas
413a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sde
413a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs nas 'dus pa de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
413a6(dkon brtsegs): 'amangon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa rten pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las/ 'od srung gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes
413a7(dkon brtsegs): sde ba'i bcas gsum pa rdzogs so/ chu'i le'u sbyor las kun nas sdang gi le'u zhes 'byung / rgya gar rgya khan po dzin mthangang / shi lin+d+ra
413a8(dkon brtsegs): de dang / shu chen gyilab pa ban rjes shes sdes bskur cing nus te/ skang gas cang kyis kyang btsas nas gtan la phab pa// @/ zug sa /
413b1(dkon brtsegs): mad+ya radwa dgi num ma hA ya na swA tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cangs/
413b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i 'dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod po'i ril/ dge slong brgyad song tsam gyi dge slong gi gu 'a
413b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa
413b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod par sha stag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos
413b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces
413b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// 'od srung dge slong zhes bya ba ni/ zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / cang shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa zhes
413b7(dkon brtsegs): pas dge sbyong zhes ste/ shes rab dang ldan pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i snying po lhur len pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la som nyi med cing / the tsho meng pa'i 'ja
413b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bsgom pa
413b9(dkon brtsegs): rje tsam bgyin dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bgyi
414a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa dang / dang pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad pa mi byed pa dang / chos la dad pa mi phyed pa dang // 'dun la dad pa mi byed pa dang /
414a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus
414a3(dkon brtsegs): brtsams pa dang / srid pa bcom pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin la mkhas pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa dang / shes rab kyis lhag ma
414a4(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa dang / stobs lnga dang ldan pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mis mi rdzi ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsam gtan pa dang / chos rnams
414a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi brten pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam la mkhas pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag
414a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba sgom pa la mkhas pa dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / don la non gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa dang /
414a7(dkon brtsegs): shes na rnam par gas pa la mngon pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo spel nan gyi drang ba'i don gyi mang sgril marten pa dang / chos nyid 'atsun gyi gang bgal man pa /
414a8(dkon brtsegs): bdung bzhi'i mam las gniH'das pa dang / phung po yongs su shes bsrung ba dang / nyon mongs pa bsel bdang / tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa dang / 'chi bdag gisas/
414b1(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sdug bsngal yang dag par yongs su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum dubya ba la zhugs dang /
414b2(dkon brtsegs): lam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mthong ba dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / ston pa'i bstan pal bya ba byas
414b3(dkon brtsegs): padang / zag pa zad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba dang / sngon gyi spyod pa dang /
414b4(dkon brtsegs): pasum tshogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'phags pa'i rig pa la gnas pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa dang / tho mu gyu med
414b5(dkon brtsegs): ba deng / rab tu byung nas khyim gyi gnas dang / mi 'dri ba dang / bse ru ltar gcig pu rgyu ba dang 'du 'jis 'jigs skrag pa dang / khams gsum las rnam par grol ba
414b6(dkon brtsegs): bdang / rtag tu 'jigs pa'i ying dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi tshul la gnas pa dang / thams cad la 'dod pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad
414b7(dkon brtsegs): po rnyeng pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / bstod pa dang / smod pa rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
414b8(dkon brtsegs): sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjes su bsrung ba dang / 'khrul pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / yang da/
415a1(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la de'i sems mi chags
415a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'ching ste/ dper na nam mkha' la lag mthil bzhin du mi chags mi 'ching ba yin te/ 'od srung dge sbyong gi chos rnam pa de lta bu de dag dang ldan na/ dge sbyong dge
415a3(dkon brtsegs): skyong zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
415a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi yon tan 'di dag phrar rab tu bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus
415a5(dkon brtsegs): na/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa nub par bgyid pa dge sbyong ma lags la dge sbyong du mchid
415a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'che zhing / tshangs par spyong ba ma lags par tshangs par spyong ba mchid kyis 'chi ba'i dge slong la la 'byung bar 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
415a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'od srung nga dang khyod dang nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
415a8(dkon brtsegs): du ngong nas bstan pa 'di rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba ni tshig gis snyan par mi nus so// 'od srung de la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ sems
415b1(dkon brtsegs): ma pa mams pa/ shes rabs pa sgoms pa byis pa nan pa/ glen pa mongs parab tu ma zhib/ mdul ba/ kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi yodang / snru / mdza ba
415b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bya gya dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi skyon rnams brjod par bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong gi dri ma rnams gang zhe na/ 'od srung de la dge sbyong gi dri ma rnams gang
415b3(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ 'od srung sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi jo ma ste/ de dag spangs na dge slong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog
415b4(dkon brtsegs): bdage sbyong gi dri ma dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par 'che ba'i rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag la stong pa dge sbyong gi
415b5(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang / gzhan la brnyas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mi mthun pa'i rnyed pa kun du tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dang
415b6(dkon brtsegs): babrin pa chung gson pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / ltung ba 'chab pa dge sbyong gi rngo ma dang / khyim pa la sten pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rab tu byung ba dang bsten pa dge sbyong gi
415b7(dkon brtsegs): dris dang / 'du 'jil mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyong pa yongs su ma grub par rtogs pa dge slong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi rnyeng pas chog par mi 'dzin pa
415b8(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong dri ma dang / pha rol bsod nams kyis rnyed pa la phrag dog dang / ser sna byed pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / pha rol gyi rnyed pa la 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi
415b9(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yongs su tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / so sor thar pa dang / 'dul ba mi srung ba da/
415b10(dkon brtsegs): skyong gi dri ma dang / kha ltar mu cor smra ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / ma gus pa dang / rgod pa dang / khengs pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / lta bas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /
415b11(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mthar lta ba la gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi drim dang /
415b12(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i sang tshig 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / sgrib pas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong
415b13(dkon brtsegs): dzam dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skyug pa dge sbyong gi drim dang / chos zab ma song ba dag sbyong gi drim
415b14(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dkon mchog gsum la mi gus pa dge slong gi jom ste 'od srung sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag ni dge slong gi rnam
415b15(dkon brtsegs): / de gas nas dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o// 'od srung bcang po 'di dag na dag sbyong gcos kyi sgrub bas/ bcang byung nan/ 'dis setham rnams la mi gas pa
415b16(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams la ris tho sa padang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i mings byed ba dang / mdzes pa'i mang song ba dang / bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog me /
415b17(dkon brtsegs): ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa byis pa dman pa/ glen pa rmongs pa rab tu ma zhi ba/ ma dul ba/ kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi lo dang / spu dang / mdzang pa
415b18(dkon brtsegs): dang / gya gyu dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi skyon rnams brjod par bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong gi drim rnams gang zhe na/ 'od srung de la dge sbyong gi drim rnams ga
415b19(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ 'od srung sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi ji ma ste/ de dag spangs na dge slong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog
415b20(dkon brtsegs): bdage sbyong gi dri ma dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag la stong pa dge sbyong gi
415b21(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang / gzhan la brnyas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mi mthun pa'i rnyed pa kun du tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dang
415b22(dkon brtsegs): pa byin pa chung gson pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / ltung ba 'chab pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / khyim pa la sten pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rab tu byung ba dang bsten pa dge sbyong gi
415b23(dkon brtsegs): d+his dang / 'du 'jil mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi drim dang / rlong pa yongs su ma grub par rtogs pa dge sbyong gzis dang / bdag gning pas tshig par mi 'am
415b24(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong dri ma dang / pha rol bsod nams kyis rnyed pa la phrag dog dang / ser sna byed pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / pha rol gyi rnyed pa la 'dod pa dge sbyong gi drim dang / bdag
416a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yongs su tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / so sor thar pa dang / 'dul ba mi srung ba /
416a2(dkon brtsegs): skyong gi dri ma dang / kha ltar mu cor smra ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / ma gus pa dang / rgod pa dang / khengs pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / lta bas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /
416a3(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mthar lta ba la gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi drim dang /
416a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i sang tshig 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / sgrib pas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi
416a5(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / chos zab mo song ba dge sbyong gi drim
416a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dkon mchog gsum la mi gus pa dge sbyong gi dri ma ste 'od srung sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag ni dge sbyong gi drim
416a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag sangs nas dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o// 'od srung brgyang po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gcos kyi sgrib paste/ brgyad grang zhen/ 'di sa ste bla ma rnams la mi gus pa
416a8(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams pa ris meng padang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i ming la byed ba dang / mdzes pa'i ma spong ba dang / bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/
416b1(dkon brtsegs): zag med pa'i chos kyis skrag pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos snyan pa la mi 'jug gi/ 'dus byas nyid kyi rjes su stegs pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma skyes pa zhes thos nasan/
416b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mi skyes pa zhes thos nas g.yangs chen por ltung bzhin du lhung ba ste/ 'od srung brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste/
416b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba'i de dag yongasu spang bar bya'o// 'od srung dge slong ni kha dog dang / rtags kyi dbyibs kyis kyis dge sbyong zhes nga mi 'chad kyi yon tan gyi chos la yon te
416b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i dge sbyong ngo zhes ngas bshad do// 'od srung dge sbyong gis ni rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyi lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung rnyog
416b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa langs dur smrig gnang gi 'od srung gang rnyog pa dang bcas pas lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bde dag thams cad ni ngur smrig tshig pa'o zhes bshad de/ bsam pa
416b6(dkon brtsegs): mos pa rnams nim gtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin pa'i phyir te/ skye zhing 'dod chags dang bral bar spyod pa rnams
416b7(dkon brtsegs): gos 'di dag ni nye bar zhi ba'i rjes su 'thun pa byams pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o// 'od srung de la 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan gang zhe na/ 'od srung bcu ga nyi
416b8(dkon brtsegs): bo 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'od srung tshul khrims 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ting nge 'dzin
417a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / shes rab 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal
417a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / rna bar grol ba ye shes mthong ba 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bden pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rten cing 'brel par
417a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bsam gtan bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / tshad med pa bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal
417a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / skyon med pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/ zag pa
417a5(dkon brtsegs): zad pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/ 'od srung bcu gnyis po de dag ni 'phags pa rnams rgyal mtshan no// 'od srung gang la la rgyal mtshan 'di dag dang mi ldan par
417a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i rigs gos ngur smrig dag 'tshang ba de na nor ba'i chos la zhugs pa'o zhes ngas bshad do// chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa zhes bshad do// de bzhin sa te/
417a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsan pa las ring du gnas pa zhes bshang do// mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs kyis mthun pa'i phyogs la gnas pa zhes bshad do// 'khor ba'i phyogs dang 'thum
417a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pad do// dargyal gyimachil pas zin pa zhes pag // snying po sa grangs bshes padang // chos las nyams pa zhes bshad do// nyams ba'i las pa
417b1(dkon brtsegs): son pa'i 'du shes dang /
417b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung de lta bas na dge slong gi lus la ngur sreg dag bcang blta na rnyog pa med pa'i sems su bya'o// gal te nges 'bras buthob par mthur ma de
417b3(dkon brtsegs): gus pa brgyad kyis lus la ngur sreg dag bcang bar bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mchod rten gyi 'du shes dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'du shes dang / byams pa'i 'du shes dang / sarje
417b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes la gus pa'i 'du shes dang / khrel yong ba'i 'du shes dang / rnyog pa med par bya'o snyam pa ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa'i phyir gus pa brgyang po dag gis lus
417b5(dkon brtsegs): la dur srog dag bcang bar bya'o// 'od srung gang dag lhod cing yang dag par mi ston pa dang / dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi chos 'di dag las nyams par lus la ngur smrig dag
417b6(dkon brtsegs): bcang ba rnams ni gus pa 'di dag mi skyed do// 'od srung dge slong gi kha dog dang gzugs can la gnod pa byed pa/ zhes bya ba zhi tse ba'i sems can dmyal ba yod de/
417b7(dkon brtsegs): spang zhi tso ba'i sems can dmyal ba der dge sbyong gi gzugs su 'gyur bzhin du gos 'bar ba dag dang / mgo 'bar ba dag dang / lhung bzed 'bar ba dang / mal cha
417b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gnod pa byed de/ de dag gi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar te/ kun du rab tu 'bar la/ de mir
417b9(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi kha dog dang / gzugs kyis gnod pa de dag myong bar 'gyur ro// de ni phyir zhe ma/ 'di skar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa
418a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa de dag gi 'gro ba yongs su ma dag pa nyid du 'gyur ro//
418a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung dge slong ma yin la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la/ tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba gang zhig tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang /
418a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis phyag byas pa bdag gir byed na de mi dge ba'i las nges brnyas pa brgyad 'tho ba ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ bems po ltar bur 'gyur ba dang /
418a4(dkon brtsegs): gong ka' zhing le lo can du 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang pos ba gang pa'i bud med du 'gyur ba dang / rang dbang med cing bran du 'gyur ba dang / mdog ngan cing mi sdug par 'gyur
418a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / mdog ngan cing dbang chung bar grags par 'gyur ba dang / de la su yangs cu bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sbyin gnas rnams la mgu bar mi byed pa ste/ brnyas pa brgya/
418a6(dkon brtsegs): bo de dag thob po// 'od srung de lta bas na/ bzang po ma yin pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dgra thos nas/ dge slong sdig pa can gyis phyag gzhan gyis phyag byas pa bdag gir ma
418a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'od srung gang dge slong ma yin la/ dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba ni/ thA nas chen po 'di la mchil ma'i thal pa tsam 'dor sa
418a8(dkon brtsegs): de mang nges rnyed par mi 'gyub/ gam pa 'deg pa dang / 'jog pas tsa spos/ de 'i'i phyir nan/ 'od srungs chen po 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal po rnams kyis tshul khrims dang /
418b1(dkon brtsegs): na nungs dang / yon na dang ldan pa rnams dang / sbyin gnas rnams la kun du byung ba'angad myal pa'i gyur// 'od srung ngelas thun pa na gis 'dzu pa
418b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzer ba gang yin pa de thams cad kyang dad pas byin pa la mi dbang bzhin du gom pa 'dor zhing 'jog pa yin na/ dge 'dun gyi 'am phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi khri'am khrin
418b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am 'chags 'am gding ba 'am/ gnas khang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi 'am/ yongs su spyang pa 'am/ lhung bzed ngas/
418b4(dkon brtsegs): gos sam/ bsod soms sam/ mal cha'am/ na ba'i gsos sman nam/ yo byad kyang rung ste/ thams cad dad pas byin pa la mi dbang bar stong pa yin pa la ci smos/
418b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o// 'od srung dge sbyong ma yin la/ dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la/ tshangs par
418b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod par khas che bas ni dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang yongs su dag par bya mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni ngas rgya chen po lta bu dang /
418b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi zhing dang / sbyin gnas rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung bram ze'am/ khyim bdag dang pa gang dag de la yon 'bral ba de dag tshad med pa'i
418b8(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes kyis 'bul ba de la 'od srung mi thun po tshul khrims 'chal pas na/ skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i ma tsam zhig dang pas sbyin pa yongs su spyang na yang sbyin pa pong
419a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bdag de'i yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i ma tsam ji snyed la spyang ba de snyed kyi las kyi mtsho chen po sogs par 'gyur ro// 'od srung
419a2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na tshul khrims yongs su dag par dad pas byin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i
419a3(dkon brtsegs): slong nyis brgyas bstan pa 'di thos nas/ rab tu ngu ste mchi ma zag cing chog 'di skad ces bdag cag ni gum yang rung ste/ 'bras bu ma thob kyi bar du dad pas sbal ba'i bsod
419a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms gcig tsam yang yongs su spyad par mi bgyi'o zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so// ngo tsha shes pa dang /
419a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba rnam pa 'di lta bu dag gis gsung rab 'di mdzes so// 'od srung ngas dge slong gcas
419a6(dkon brtsegs): mdad pas byin pa gnas ste/ gnyis gang zhen/ ldan pa dang grol ba'o// yang gnyis te/ gang 'dra byed rnams cang la mi rtags par lta ba dang / gang yang sems nan/
419a7(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa bya'o// dge slong de dag de la dge slong ldan pa rnam 'byor spyod pa/ nga'i bstan pa la zhugs pa gang zhig sbyin pa po dang /
419a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag lam chis pas dang/ bas byams dang / mal dang / ranga'i gsas sran dang / yo byang dmas yongs su sung ngas/ 'khor ba'i tsun 'du bye
419b1(dkon brtsegs): cang ma rtag par mthong / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar rmeg/ chos thams cad la bdag med par mos/ myang na las 'das pazhi bar rtogs pas ni ri rab rtsas kham sa
419b2(dkon brtsegs): gis dang ngas byin pa yongasu spyad kyang / de'i yan shin tu yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang dag las dad pas byin pa yongs su sbyang ba de la de dag gi bas
419b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rnam par smin pa rnal 'byor pa chen po dang / phan yon chen por 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag rdzas las 'byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnam pas
419b4(dkon brtsegs): gang byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa de mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// dge slong dag dge slong gang zhig sbyin pa po/ sbyin bdag gi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /
419b5(dkon brtsegs): mal ra dang / yo byad rnams yongs su spyad nas/ sems rnam par grol ba tshang bra la snyoms par 'jug na/ sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de'i rnam par smin pa yang tshad med pa
419b6(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya'o// 'od srung stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yeng ba'i rgya mtsho chen po rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de'i sod nams kyi rgyu
419b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa ni yongs su zad par gang yang mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung gang zhig sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gi dang pas sbyin pa yongs su spang nas/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims ces
419b8(dkon brtsegs): log par ltung ba byed na/ gti mug pade gnod pa ji tsam gyi phyir zhugs pa la ltos/ 'od srung de lta bas na dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi skyon dang / dge sbyong gi mi
420a1(dkon brtsegs): drang ba dang / dge sbyong gi g.yo dang / dge sbyong gi sgra dang / dge sbyong gi gya gurnam pa de lta bu de dag ni dge sbyong bsam bdag pas yongs su sang
420a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'od srung dge slong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ni/ gang mi gnas mi zag cing rna ba nas ma yin/ snga nas ma yin/ lce nas ma yin/ lus las ma yin la/ yid nas kyang mi
420a3(dkon brtsegs): zag pa rtse/ de'i byor dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// skyemached drug rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rjes su dran badrug dang ldan pa dang / dam pa rnams la gus
420a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / pha rol tu 'gro ba'i chos drug la gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// dge sbyong gi len ste dang po'o// 'od srung /
420a5(dkon brtsegs): slong dge slong zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong zhes bya'o// bdag tu 'du shes pa bcom pa dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang /
420a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol bar 'du shes pa dang / gang bag tung du shes pa dang / skyes par 'du shes pa dang / bud med du 'du shes pa dang / khye'u 'a shes pa dang / bu mo 'du shes pa
420a7(dkon brtsegs): / de'i phyi dge slong dag slong shes bya'o// lus bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims pasgoms pa dang / sems bsgoms pa dang / shes rab bsgoms padang / 'gas
420a8(dkon brtsegs): skrag med pa dang / sring pa'i chu po rnal ba dang / 'byung ba dang 'jig pa las pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i lam lags
420b1(dkon brtsegs): bama' slong dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o// 'od srung gang la la zhig chos 'di dag dang stan ma/ bdag ni dge slong ngosam du khas 'chen bsam pas mos pas gtogs da
420b2(dkon brtsegs): nga yang de'i ston pa ma yin la/ de yang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no// 'od srung sdig pa can gyi dge slong dag pal cher nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par 'gyur te/ 'od srung ya mtshan dgu/
420b3(dkon brtsegs): bcun lnga dang / bas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis ni de'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed ma nus so// gzhan du na nga'i bstan pa 'di las mi gti mug pa nges par mi sems pa
420b4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis nga'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge shi ba'i shal gcan zan nam/
420b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis kyang za bar mi nus kyi/ seng ge'i ro de nyid las srin bu gang dag 'byung ba de dag ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sha la za'o// 'od srung de bzhin du nga'i bstan pa
420b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyid las mi blon po brkam pa chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ chos ma yin pa la lta ba/ nges par mi sems pa/ spong ba brdzun du sla ba/ gang dga' byung ba de dag
420b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro// 'od srung chos bzhi dang ldan na sdig pa can gyis dge slong du rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang
420b8(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal te bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khengs pa dang / mu chosmra pa dang / bya kha lta bu dang / tshig 'chal
421a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ste bzhi po de dag go// gan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgod pa dang / pho theg can dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa ste/
421a2(dkon brtsegs): bde dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ g.yon can dang sgra can dang / mi mthun pas 'tsho ba dang / mi gtsigs par sla ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/
421a3(dkon brtsegs): yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa la srid pa dang / sngon byas pa mi dran pa dang / mdza bo la 'khu ba yin te bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang
421a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ dang bas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims mi srung ba dang / so sor thar pa khyad du gsod pa dang / 'dul ba mi srung ba ste/
421a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag tu smras pa yin/ sems can du smra ba yin/ gang zag tu smra ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan
421a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la migus pa yin/ chos la mi gus pa yin/ dge 'dren la mi gus pa yin/ bsrab pa rnams la migus pa yin te/
421a7(dkon brtsegs): bde dag go// gzhan sang bzhiste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge 'dun 'thun pa la mi dga' ba yin/ gtsug lag khang la dga' ba mi rnying pa yin/ 'dra 'jil mngon par
421a8(dkon brtsegs): / 'dzi da chung dru gas rjo pa dzin te/ bzhi pa dag go// gzhan yang banas/ bzhi ga zhen/ rnye ba 'dod pa man/ grags pa da /
421b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyen pa zhes 'dod pa yin/ chos la mchog tu dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin te/ bzhi pa de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdud kyis zin pa yin/ bdun
421b2(dkon brtsegs): non pa yin/ rmugs pa dang gnyid mang ba yin/ 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la mI gnas pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ du
421b3(dkon brtsegs): rul cing brgyan pa dang / nyon mongs pas snang ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis ltas pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa med pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang
421b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs
421b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/
421b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ las ngan pa la gnas te/ 'byung ba mi mthong ba yin/ ser sna can du gyur te/ kun mi bged pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ tham
421b7(dkon brtsegs): cad yongasu 'dzin par 'dod cing / chog mi shes pa yin/ ngoms mi mang zhing thos pa'i nan tan dang / bral ba yin te/ bzhi pa de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/
421b8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ mun par gzhol bas mun par 'gyur ba yin/ rmongs pa la gzhol bas rmongs par gyur pa yin/ log pa'i chos kyis dkris pas chos ma yin pa mchod
422a1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin// mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo bcod pas 'khor ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bani
422a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ lus kyi tshul 'chos pa yin/ ngag gi tshul 'chos pa yin/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa yin/ spyod lam gyi tshul 'chos pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/
422a3(dkon brtsegs): de la lus kyi tshul 'chos pa ni/ dal gyis 'gro bar tshul 'chos pa yin/ mgo spyad par tshul 'chos pa yin/ gnya' shing gang tsam du lta bar tshul 'chos pa yin/
422a4(dkon brtsegs): chags legs par gyon par tshul 'chos pa yin/ dgon pa la gnas pa'i yon tan ma tshol bar dgon pa la gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ gong bur 'du shes pa mi se/
422a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bsod snyoms len pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel pa'i rjes su mi 'jug par phyag dar khrod 'tshang ba ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par
422a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la mi 'jug par ri dring dang shing drung du gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ chos bdud rtsi'i spyan mtshol bar bkrus te bor ba'i sran tshol bltar tshul 'chos pa
422a7(dkon brtsegs): na te/ 'di ni lus kyi rgyal 'chos bzhes bya'o// de la ngag gi tshul 'acos pa gang zhe na/ me ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo mgron tu bos te/ kho bos gang 'dod pa rnyed
422a8(dkon brtsegs): nga bkyi srid du byas nas tshang / kho bos bzang po med / kho bos lan mang du rnyed / khro bos mang du thos/ kho bo tshul khrims dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i chos ca
422b1(dkon brtsegs): min kho bo na bong par 'os pa yin/ kho bo ni srir lan gdab pa'i 'os yin/ kho bo ni nus pa dang ldan zhing sal ba yod la mthu yod pa yin/ kho bo ni rnam par nges par
422b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la mkhas pa yin/ gang che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo la 'di skad ces smras te/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras nas/ tshar bcad de spobs pa zhes par byas
422b3(dkon brtsegs): kho bos 'khor mgu bar byas/ kho bos legs so zhes bya ba thob/ kho bos de las mgo ba thob/ yang 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir kho bo mgron du gnyer ces bya ba ste/
422b4(dkon brtsegs): srung nges par mi sems dang ldan pa las tshig 'chal pa de lta bu gang ci 'byung ba de thams cad ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa ste/ mi rigs pa rnams kyi yin gyi/ rigs pa rnam
422b5(dkon brtsegs): kye ma yin te/ 'di ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la sems kyi tshul 'chos pa gang zhe na/ gang sems kyi 'chos pa gang zhe na/ gang sems kyis
422b6(dkon brtsegs): chos gos dang / bsod snyoms rnyed kyang rung bar yongs su rtogs la/ tshig gis bdag la ci yang mi dgos so zhes zer ba dang / gang sems kyis rnyed par 'dzi/
422b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa nyung ba skad du smra ba 'di ni sems kyi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems kyis rnyed kyang cim rungasam/ sems// tshig
422b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag la ci yang dwagos mongs// med pa'i ngo bo'i yid kyis de sbas te// nam yang de bskyed par 'gyur ma yin// sems kyi tshul 'chos bsam pas lha rnams
423a1(dkon brtsegs): dang // klung ngadu sgyu mag can rnams bslu bar byed// sbas pa'i sems kyis rnams kyang dag mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun rjes
423a2(dkon brtsegs): de mkhyen to// 'od srung de ltar na/ dge slong chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can rnams kyi cho ga ma yin pa'i slong yul la spyod pa 'di lta bu gang yin pa 'di ni sem
423a3(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dge slong gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
423a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de la dge slong gdol pa lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ gdol pa ni rtag tu drar khrod stong pa yul ba yin te/ shib la re ba dang / byams pa med
423a5(dkon brtsegs): mig gis 'gro ba la lta ba dang / shi ba la dga' ba yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang / rtag tu mdza' shes kyi khyim dang / spong bster ba'i
423a6(dkon brtsegs): khyimal 'dra ba yin te/ de nas rnyed pa dang / bkur stis nye bar 'tsho zhing / khyim pa de dag chos sam/ 'dul ba yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa dang / de rnyed kyi
423a7(dkon brtsegs): cid du 'dris par byed kyi/ na gyi cheng du ma yin pa dang / mnga' ba'i sems med cing steng du rnyed pa la re ba mdzod/ 'od srung 'di ni dge slong gangs pa lta bugs bya/
423a8(dkon brtsegs): chung 'dis med per na gangs pan tshong po dang / khrim padag dang / rgan po nga / khams kyi rgya la dang / bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang / grong ngas mang/
423b1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyis rgyas sa sa sa gyu rnams can/ gangs par gnas lag nga ba pasam bar yongs su zung // 'od srung de na dun
423b2(dkon brtsegs): gdom pa sa bu yang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i 'os
423b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ dge slong gdol pa lta bu steg pa'i chos kun du skrod cing / tshul khrims 'chal par rig nas/ zag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo // 'od srung
423b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper ni/ gdol pa'i kha phyis sam/ gos sam/ yongs su spyad pa de thams cad la ni skye bo yA rabs rnams mi reg cing / yongs su ma sbyong ngo // 'od srung
423b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i lhung bzed ngam/ chogos sam/ yongasu spyod pa de thams cad na mo mthun pa'i 'tsho bar yongs su btsal ba/ lus dang sems spang bas mau
423b6(dkon brtsegs): su btsal ba yin pas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa dag de la mi rig cing mi spyod do// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ gdol pa ni kha byis thogs te/
423b7(dkon brtsegs): zhum por byas nas/ gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong ba lta bu yang zhum zhum por byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod la phyag 'tshal lo//
423b8(dkon brtsegs): zhum zhum por byas nas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro'o// zhum zhum por byas nas gtsug lag khang dang / gnas khang dang / gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o// zhum zhum por byas te
424a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / 'jug pa dang nyal bar byed da// 'od spyang de ltar nas nas por zas du'i sdig pa 'chab sa/ rang spyong 'am yang min pa de ga pa
424a2(dkon brtsegs): cung ni rung ba ma yin pa las yongs su btags pa'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ gdol pa'i sems ni bde 'gro'i skye ba la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar derang
424a3(dkon brtsegs): gaM las kyis nyes pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i sems kyang / bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mi gnas shing / de'i 'jig rten pha rol rnam
424a4(dkon brtsegs): par zhigs la/ de ngan 'gro gsum du gnas par sgrib pa med do// 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong rul pa gang zhe na/ 'od
424a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lnga ste dper na/ rgyal po la 'os pa'i btung ba ro mchog dang ldan pa las gang skying ku mchog bcas pa de'i lhag ma ni rul cing mi gtsang bar gyur pa ste/ myang bar bya ba ma/
424a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong rul bu yang chos kyi mchog gi snying ku'i ro bro ba dang bral ba yin te/ dring ba dang yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i 'os yin/ nyon mongs
424a7(dkon brtsegs): padang / gso m+bu 'dzin pa dang / 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims kyi drim ni ma pa dang ldan zhing tshul khrims kyi dang bral ba yin/ nyon mongs pa'i dris bskos pa yin te/ de ba
424a8(dkon brtsegs): dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du yang bdag la ngan pa'i phyir zhugs kyi/ gzhan ma phan pa'i bring ma yin te/ 'od srung 'dzin dge sbyong rul pa zhes bya'o// 'od su
424b1(dkon brtsegs): sa nan/ rnam pa zhes bya ba n-i gang zlas padang 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa gaphags pa den tshul cing tshang ba yin te/ stu ga la rabs byams kyang kyis yongs su
424b2(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du dge slong rul ba yang gzugs pa dang chungs te/ lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi kun du spyod pa yongs sum dag par
424b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i skye bos yongs su srung bar bya ba yin te/ 'din dge sbyong rul pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ sa bon rul pa gang yin pa de nis chen po las
424b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi rung ngo // 'od srung de bzhin du dge slong nul pa yang sangs rgyas kyis spyan pa 'di la ma skye zhing / 'phags pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i sa bon nus pa ma yin la/ 2
424b5(dkon brtsegs): bu 'thob par mi 'gyur te/ 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong rul pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong bam tog lta bu gang zhes na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ ba ma tog
424b6(dkon brtsegs): gi phyi rol shin tu byi dor byas la/ nang mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba zhig yod pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung dge slong za ma tog lta bu yang dge sbyong ltar 'chos shing
424b7(dkon brtsegs): rol gtsang sbra smod par gyur la/ nang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gang ba yin te/ 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong ba ma tog lta bu zhes bya'o//
424b8(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de la dge sbyong kur nad ka lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ ku ran da ka zhes bya ba'i me tog ni kha dog blta na sdug la/ reg na rtsub pa/ lci ba'i sgra
425a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dri mnam zhing shil dur ka'i rtsa ba'i dri mnam ste/ mkhas pa 'dzangs pa rnams ni me tog de lta bu la mi len mi snom gyi/ gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can
425a2(dkon brtsegs): dugyur pa/ de'i skyon mi shes pa de dag ni me tog de lta bu len cing sdom mo// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong kur na da ka lta bu yang dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur kyang rmi
425a3(dkon brtsegs): nges pa yin/ tshig brlangs pa yin/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa yin/ spyod pa nyams pa yin/ lnga pa nyams pa yin te/ 'dzangs pa mkhas pa
425a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni kur nad ka lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la sten pa 'am/ skyen pa 'am/ bsnyen bkur mi byed kyi/ de'i tshul rigs pas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo // gang dag
425a5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa de dag ni kur na dag lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la sten cing / spen la bsnyen bkur byed de/ ku ra na ka'i me tog byis pa'i lag na 'dug pa bzhin du de da
425a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa nyid du gyur te/ 'od srung de sa chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong gang zhes 'od srung 'di sa ste dper na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mig yon can gyi rang bzhin can nag tu
425a7(dkon brtsegs): chags sel gyis non pa/ bdag gi ning ngas chog par mi 'dzi ma dang / gzhan gyi nongs rab rdog shul can dbyug pa dang / mtshan mdang glan thogs pa/ ngom med pa sa/
425a8(dkon brtsegs): rjemeng pa/ rtag tu bdu ci rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni gang gi ma mang bar ma/ grongangs/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul du 'jug pa de'i che/ 'dimam
425b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gnor gyi phung po gang yin pa de dag gir gyur na/ re skyes snyam du sems shing / de zin du 'ong zhes mkhyen bu mthun bur rgyu ba yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du chom lta bu'i
425b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong yang rtag tu btum pa/ chags pa'i zil gyis non pa bdag gi rnying pas chog mi shes pa/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la re ba yin te/ de gang gi tshe grong bar ram/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram
425b3(dkon brtsegs): grong rdal lam/ yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe/ de rnyed pa'i phyir 'jug gi chos kyi phyir ma yin te/ spong lam thams cad kyang chom rkun lta bur ston pa yin/ 'chab cing med pa yin te//
425b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag dge slong gzhan gyis tshul khrims 'chal par shes na mi rung ste/ shes rab gyur na so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las bskrad bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas rtag tu 'jigs te/ smyod
425b5(dkon brtsegs): lam thams cad kyang g.yos spyod pas/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag gis chom rkun 'ong ngo // chom rkun 'gro'o// chom rkun 'greng ngo // chom rkun 'chag go// tshom
425b6(dkon brtsegs): rgan 'dug go// nyal lo// chos gos len te/ chom rkun grong du 'gro'o// grong nus byung ngo // chom rkun za'o// chom rkun 'thung ngo // chom rkun sra 'dreg go zhes rig par
425b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro// 'od srung de ltar na mya dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri ba rnams kyis de'i myong lam gang yin pa de thams cad rung ba yin la/ yongs su brtags pa yin par rig par
425b8(dkon brtsegs): te rig nas kyang de la snying rje chen po skyed cing / kye ma 'di mtshar cig sdig pa can gyi dge slong 'di lta bu dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa nub par 'gyur ro zhe
426a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra zhing mi snyan par zer ro// tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ rnam pa ni lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri rnams kyang 'di dag ni snyan pa yongasu
426a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'o zhes gus pa cher bskyed do// 'od srung chom rkun lta bu'i dge slong bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba ni skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems gcig kyang mi skyed na/
426a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu thob pa lta ci smos kyi/ de ni gnas med do// 'od srung 'di ni chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong shin tem gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste/
426a4(dkon brtsegs): dper na 'bru'i nang gang dag ma smin pa dang / mi srung ba dang 'ongs med cing 'bru 'dra ba de dag ni shin te ma zhes bya'o// 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong shin te ma yang / yang ni
426a5(dkon brtsegs): mthung la bdud kyis zin pa/ bdud kyis non pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis 'phyogs pa/ rlung gis g.yengs pa lta bu ste 'od srung dge sbyong shin te ma zhes bya ba de ni dge
426a6(dkon brtsegs): slong tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa can rnams kyi tshig bla dgas te/ de dag ni ngas dge sbyong shin te ma zhes btags so// 'od srung de la 'as dge slong sun par byed pa sa
426a7(dkon brtsegs): zhem 'od srung 'dis ste dpe na/ nas kyi ldang bu branas mtshogs pa'i nang na/ nas la gnong pa zhig skyes nas/ de ltung ba'i kha dog tu zhing / rtag pa dang dbyibs
426a8(dkon brtsegs): bas lanas kyi bdag dga' sam du di gathams pa mis yin no rnam pa'i 'du shes rnyed pa las/ gang gcinas kyi lding bu las skyem byung bar gyur
426b1(dkon brtsegs): tshenas la gnod pa de la nas kyi 'du shes mi 'byung ngo // 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong sun par byed pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa yang tshul khrims dang ldan
426b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang ldan pa sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams dang / kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs 'dra bas de la sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag dge sbyong skam pa'i 'du shes
426b3(dkon brtsegs): skyed ba dang / sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed pa lA/ de nas gal te ti mug pa dge sbyong ma yin la/ dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la/ tshangs
426b4(dkon brtsegs): par srung bar khas 'che ba/ nang rul cing zag pa de 'khor gyi nang nas byung ste/ 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/
426b5(dkon brtsegs): dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ de sems can dmyal bar skyes par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang mi gti mug pa 'di ni sngon dge sbyong gi
426b6(dkon brtsegs): gi kha dog dang / gzugs kyis sdig pa'i las byas pas/ nga sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te/ nas la gnod pa la nas kyi yon tan med pa ltar 'di la yang dge
426b7(dkon brtsegs): skyong gi yon can gyi 'bras bu med do zhes snying rje chen po skyed de/ 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong sun par byed pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong ltar 'chos pa gang zhe na/ 'od
426b8(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di sa ste dper na/ ra gan chen po zhes bya ba'i lcags shig yod de/ shin tu yongs su spang ba byas shing / shin tu yongs su dag par byas na/ gser 'drab
427a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ 'on kyang gser mi rin thang dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / bdar 'phrod nga / s+yAng la gtsal ba'i lcid 'dra ba ni ma yin no// 'od srung de
427a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ dge sbyong ltar 'chos pa'i dge sbyong yang lus shin tu bkrus shing / gos bzang po mdzes pa gyon la dge sbyong gi phyi rol pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/ 'gro ba dang
427a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba dang / mdun du lta ba dang / gas g.yor lta ba dang / bkum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / chos gos sngam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa shin bzhin du spyod kyang
427a4(dkon brtsegs): de 'dod chags kyis bcom pa dang / zhe sdang gis bcom pa dang / gti mug gis bcom pa dang / nyon mongs pas bcom pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur stis bcom pa dang / nga rgyal
427a5(dkon brtsegs): dang che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang
427a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i 'khol pa dang / bsnyen bkur lhur len gyi chos lhar ma len pa dang / lus cha bar sbyor ba la brtson gyi/ tshul khrims kyis rga bar sbyor ba la mi brtson pa dang /
427a7(dkon brtsegs): da sa gyur ldan gyi/ 'phags pa'i chos sgyur mo yin pa dang / 'jig rten pa rol tu la nam thobs 'jigs pa mi khyA dang / tshe 'di gyur len gyi gyi ma gyur mi len pa dang /
