427a9(dkon brtsegs): kyi la myi mthal la mator
427b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang rdungs pa'i sems dang ldan pas bde bdag gis kyang bde zhing / sdug bsngal dag gis kyang sdug bsngal ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khrobs bcom pa yin te/ de che
427b2(dkon brtsegs): skyong gi chos dang / spyod lam thams cad dang / sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
427b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhol ba yin zhing de dge sbyong gi rin thang dang / ri ba dang / dge sbyong gi srang ka dang / mi mnyam pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong ltar 'chos pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la ji ltar na//
427b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gzi 'phrogs pa yin zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes pa 'am bud med dam/ khye'u 'am bu mo gang la la zhig mi ma yin pas gzi phrogs par gyur na/ dengs
427b5(dkon brtsegs): chung bar grags shing / mdog ngan la mi sdug par 'gyur te/ de ltar mdang 'phrogs pa rnams la ni sman tam/ gsang sngags sam/ rig sngags rnams kyis mi smon te/ de 'chin
427b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ma gtogs par tha mar gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du/ dge sbyong gang la tshul khrims kyi gzi med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gzi med pa dang / shes rab kyi ni
427b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzi med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i gzi med pa dang / byams pa'i gzi med pa dang / snying rje'i gzi med pa dang / dga' ba'i gan
427b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / btang snyoms kyi gzi med pa dang / sbyin pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa'i gzi med pa dang / dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi gzi med pa dang / 'phags pa'i rig
428a1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa'i gzi med pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gzi med pa dang / lus dang ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa'i
428a2(dkon brtsegs): gzi med pa 'di ni/ 'od srung dge slong gzi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ste/ 'od srung gzi 'phrogs pa de lta bu rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba'i sman gyis mi tshugs te/ 'di lta
428a3(dkon brtsegs): ste 'dod chags la mi sdug pa'i sman dang / zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa rnams la tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang /
428a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jil dben par dga' ba dang / 'dzin pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir dgon par gnas pa dang / gsum bsdam pa'i phyir lus dang ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / sems
428a5(dkon brtsegs): su rung bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'i sman/ de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba 'di lta bu 'di dag gis de la mi tshugs te/ de shi nas sems can dmyal ba nyid du
428a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de'i tham gzhan du 'gyur ro// gang dag yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sran 'di lta ste/ phung po shi pa dang / khams shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang / rten cing
428a7(dkon brtsegs): 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes par 'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyan 'di lta bu 'di dag gis kyang de la mi tshugs te/ de shin
428a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal bzhid du 'gyur gyi/ de'i tham gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong rnal 'byor srung ba lnga brgyas bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma ngan
428b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du dad pas byin par gyur na/ mi rung zhes nyams par byas te/ slar khyim du dong ngo // de la dge sbyong gzhan dag cig 'di skad dge slong che ba'i bdag nyid can rnal 'byor spong ba
428b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bstan pa las nyams pa ni shin tu ma lags so zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyed 'dis dang / dge
428b3(dkon brtsegs): slong che ba'i bdag nyid can 'di dag 'di ltar bstan pa las shin tu ma legs so zhes ma smras shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag mngon par mi dga' nas/ khyim na gnas pa 'dzin
428b4(dkon brtsegs): dang can rnams kyi chos yin te/ dge slong dang pa dang / mos pa mang ba 'gyod pa dang ldan pa 'di dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag tshul khrims yongs su ma ngag bzhin dag bzhin du
428b5(dkon brtsegs): dad pas byin pa yongs su sbyang na mi rung ngo zhes nyams par gyur to// 'od srung nga lung ston te/ dge slong 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyurate/
428b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa'i grangs su chud bar 'gyur ro// dge sbyong 'dol pa lta bu'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// /
428b7(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa sdem ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tsho dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'dis ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam du
428b8(dkon brtsegs): zhal tabakyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung ngas zhal dbya bar gnang ba'i dge slong gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dge slong yongs su dag pa 'gro/
429a1(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol tu kha na mtho bas 'jigs par lta ba/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa/ 'dzem pa dang ldan zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang / gang yang zag bzad pa dgra
429a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom par gyur pa ste/ 'od srung dge slong ma nyams pa 'di gnyis zhal ta byed par gnang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rigs sna tshogs
429a3(dkon brtsegs): las rab tu byung ba sems kyi mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ spong ba'i phyir rnal 'byor sna tshogs la gnas pa kha cig ni dgon pa bzhi pa'i mal snyan la mngon par dga' ba/ kha cig
429a4(dkon brtsegs): ni glong mang ba na gnas pa/ kha cig ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/ kha cig ni mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa/ kha cig ni chos sla ba/ kha cig ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ kha cig ni mas
429a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa// kha cig ni grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas/ chos ston pa ste/ sems can gzhan dag gi sems kyi spyod pa rnam
429a6(dkon brtsegs): bsru dka' ba'i phyir ro// 'od srung de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi sems mgu bar bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong dgon pa pas mtha
429a7(dkon brtsegs): mam ldan gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong nal byed pas yo las su bskor bar mi bya'o// nal ta byed pas dge slong dgon pa de dag bsrung bar bya ste/ dus ma yin par gsol ba
429a8(dkon brtsegs): dus ma na pa gtang bar mabya'o// 'od sung dgal te dgon pa pa la dge 'dun gyi phra bar gtogs pa slob pa'i las nges pa'an/ dge slong zhal 'byod pa des las de bdag ci
429b1(dkon brtsegs): / pa nga ge slong gzhung zhig pasgos pa la de byed du banag ste/ dag sung gan pa pas gnang bar sa bya'o// 'od srung de sa ge su sgoms myong ba blang sbyin pa des na sa
429b2(dkon brtsegs): thalang byed padas khabs gsol ba bgo ban bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong na la 'gyur skyong ba gang min pa de dag la dge slong nal dbyed pas/ 'thun pa'i 'tshogs cas dang /
429b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gso slan dang / mo byang rnams sbyin par bya'o// dge slong rnal 'byor spyong pa des phyog sas dge slong zhal ta byed pa po des snga chen po dang / srang drag po ma zhing byed du yang ma
429b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhug go/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong rnal 'byor skyong pa de bsrung zhing mal cha yang sbyar bar bya'o// kha zas gsod pa dang / yi gang 'ong ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa
429b5(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa'i za ba dang / bza' ba rnams sbyin par bya'o// dge slong de la dge slong 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa brtson pa'i phyir gnas pa yin te/ de la bdag gi rjes su
429b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yo byang thams cad mang du sbyar bar bya'o// sum du shin tu rangs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa gang yin pa de dag
429b7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong zhal ta byed pas lung nos shig/ klogs shig/ kha ton gyis shig/ kho bo ni khyod kyi rim gro byed pa yin gyis/ khyod ni lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa de lta de lta bur dge slong
429b8(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun mdzes par gyis shig/ 'dug la brjod par mdzes par gyis shig/ bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyang mchog tu 'gyur bar gyis shig ces spo bskyed par bya'o// 'od
430a1(dkon brtsegs): srung de la dge slong zhal byed pas de dag tu ngus ma yin par gting bar mi bya/ las su bsgo bar mi bya'o// dge slong nal byed pa des dge slong mang du thos
430a2(dkon brtsegs): bde dag bsrung bar bya'o// 'od srung de la chos smras pa'i dge slong gang yin pa de dag dge slong zhal 'byed pas las su mi bsko bar bya'o// grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul
430a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug tu bcug la/ chos 'chang du gzhug go/ chos nyan pa dag bsgo bar bya'o// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par bya'o//
430a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bral ba'i chos kyi gtam gyi phyir dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya'o// chos smra ba'i dge slong la de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas bzlog par bya'o// dge slong zhal ta byed pas chos sgra
430a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dge slong la nagatubasu par bya/ legs so zhes bya ba mang du bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag gi gan dung po
430a6(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa de song la/ ji ltar na bdag ma med cing / mnyams pa dang ci ltar na bang galtung ba med pa'i chos kyis zhal tabya zhes yongs su dri bar bya'o// de nas 'dul ba
430a7(dkon brtsegs): balcib dang / mamo 'azhi pa'i dge slong de dag gis dge slong nam byed pa de'i bsam pa rig pa rda'i bya ba dang / 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / byed pa gang yin pa de bsas/
430a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// dge slong zhal ta byed pas 'dul ba 'dzi pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag la phangs par bya ba dang / ngad pa dang / gus pa dang / zhes rab tu bskyed par bya'o//
430b1(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gyi skyed pa gang yin pa de dge slong zhal ta byed pas/ dus dus su dge sbyong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'i/ dge 'dun la rnyed pa rdzogs shings par mi bya ste/ dzin
430b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin sbyin par bya ba sa bskul bar sbyin par bya/ gnod pa med par smin par bya'o// des 'dren pa dang / ne sdang dang gtimug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro bar ma tha'o//
430b3(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun la rton par bya'o// khyim pa'i phyogs la non par mo bya'o// dge 'dun gyi bya ba la rton par bya'i/ bdag dga' bar bya ba la rton par mi bya'o// dngos pogang
430b4(dkon brtsegs): la yang dbang bya ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'i/ bya ba ji tsam chung ba yang dge 'dun gyi gros bzhin bya zhing / rang dgar mi bya'o// dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge
430b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi 'am/ mchod rten gyi yo byad gang ci yang rung ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya/ dge 'dun gyi phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang / bsre bar mi bya'o// phyogs
430b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnying pa yang dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa mchod rten gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// mchod rten gyi
430b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed nga yang dge 'dun gyi dang / thogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang / bsre bar mi bya'o// gal te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la 'brel 'khongs su gyur la/ dge 'dun mi rnying pachod
430b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ dge slong nal ta byed pas dge 'dun thams cad sdus la gros 'thun par gyis te/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa de las phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bzhugs par bya'o// gas
431a1(dkon brtsegs): te de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig rab tu gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/ dge slong zhal ta byed
431a2(dkon brtsegs): par dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad sdus la 'gros 'thun par gyis te/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa mchod rten 'di ni zhig ral du gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs
431a3(dkon brtsegs): bani'i dge 'dun gyi nang pa ni che bar gyur ni/ gal te tshe dang ldan pa rnams la gnod pa med cing dang ba dang ldan la/ bzod cing gnang na bdag gis dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs pa na/
431a4(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gyi rnying pa 'di las dngos po cung zad cig khyer te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'di bcos par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te dge 'dun gyis gnang na
431a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong nal dbyed pa des de bzhin du bya'o// ji ste dge 'dun gyis ma gnang na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag rnams la gsol ba thob la/ deng na
431a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mchod chen ga so bar bya'o// 'od srung gal te mchod rten gyi rnying pa ci lta mang du gzin kyang dge slong zhal 'byed pas/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i da
431a7(dkon brtsegs): snum bzlugs par ma sde'o// phy-i zhen/ dang nga dadu ba mang ba dag gis mad rten ma bral ba ldan sa kyi kha cha rag ciganas pa sbyin pa mang lta dang sa
431a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzi na gyi mchod chen yin na/ rin po mengs/ rin po cher smos pa dgas spos kyang ci dgos/ mnod rten la gos bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
431b1(dkon brtsegs): na pa rlung dang / sa dang / char pas dngas kyang bla'i mchod rten dul ba'i gos dbyig gam/ dbyig gan du bstar bar ma bya'o// da tsu phyir zhen/ sa rgyan
431b2(dkon brtsegs): tha zung ba kyang me la mchod rten na ces kyang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung dge slong zhal dbyed pas de ltar mongs su dag par byaste/ des dkon mcho ga sum gyi
431b3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'phags par bya'o// bdag gi ning pas chos shes par bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyis brlabs pa'i dngos po rnams la bdag gir 'du shes mi bya'o// 'od srung ngas
431b4(dkon brtsegs): slong nal dbyed pa rab tu snang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa sbyin gnas rnams la sems khros sam/ dbang byed cing
431b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgo blag byed na/ de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi'i 'jig rten du 'ongs na yang bran dang gzhan gyi las byed par 'gyu
431b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / khu nar dang thakhrag dang / lag cha gnyem pas brdegs pa dang / 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung gzhan yang dge slong nal ta byed pa dge 'dun gyi bya ba la 'das
431b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ rang dgar dge slong rnams la dbang byed cing sko ba dang / chad pas gcod pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa dang / sdig pa dang / dus ma yin par bsgo ba byed na/
431b8(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i las nges nyi ci'i sems can dmyal ba phur pa mang po zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur te/ der skyes nas lus la lcags phur brgya stong zug cing de dga' bar
432a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu'abar la kun rab tu mched cing 'bang bar 'gyur ro// des rgyal khrims dang ldan pa/ man tan dang ldan pa/ ma
432a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams su gas nga galas bdugs rnam dar byar ma yin skyes nas rje'i gang po'i ljo pes chang brtsa par 'gyur no/
432a3(dkon brtsegs): bang drod la thugs pa rab rgya mong rab tu 'ab bcing / ded gsang 'a ba rab tu bar/ kun du rabatu 'bar la/ kun d+ha ba tu mched cir 'bar te mer
432a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des bsdigs shing dag gi las gdug pa smras par gyur pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung dge slong zhal 'byed pa gang la las dge
432a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun ci rnying pa 'dus shing 'dus par gnag ste/ drus dus su ma sbyin ning tho brnams la gtses nas sbyin pa dang / kha cig byin kha cig la ma byinan/ de sa
432a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las nges la dgas kyi skye gnas rbag 'jing byin pa cu ba ces bu bder skye bar 'gyur ro// deder skyes nas yid gas gzhan gyis khams sbyangs te/
432a7(dkon brtsegs): bstanan/ de bsan pa pa'i rlo mig gnyig mi 'dzums par byas de la sa ning bkres pa dang bsgom pas nyen po'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi lo brgya stong du yang
432a8(dkon brtsegs): de mi bang mi 'gyur ro// rimi brgyal brgyal mam mas ngo thob kya ngan sngags dang / nag khrag du 'gyur ro// ci'i phyi zhen/ 'dis des tshul khrims dang /
432b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin gnas rnams mgu bar ma byas shing / rang gi sreng pas chog mi shes par gyur pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung dge sbyong nal dbyed pa gang lal
432b2(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gyi'am/ phyogs bzhi dge 'dun gyi 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'chol bar byas nas de'i rnam par smin pa ni ngas bskal pa grangs pas kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo // 'od
432b3(dkon brtsegs): srung dge slong zhal tabyed pa gang la las nyes dmigs kyi gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas/ khro'am gshe 'am/ gnod par sems sam/ khong khro bskyed na/ de ni sor mi rung ngon
432b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas bshad // 'od srung de lta bas na dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas lus dang ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par bya'o// bdag
432b5(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan bsrung bar bya'o// 'od srung dge slong zhal ta byed pa rang gi shal za yang bla'i/ dkon mchog gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhung bzed dang /
432b6(dkon brtsegs): gos sam/ bsod snyoms sam/ na ba'i gsos sman nam/ yo byad yongs su spyad par ni mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad
432b7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis lhod pa rnams kyi lhod pa'i chos dang / 'dzem dog mchis pa rnams kyi 'dzem dog gi chos rnam bka' stsal to// zhal dbyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
433a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dag slong dgan pa gang dag bdag dgon pa pazhes med na/ bcom ldan 'das tshitsam gyis na/ dge slong dgon pa pa lags/ citsam gyis na dge slong bse sems pa'ags ma
433a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis slong pa ga dang 'a pa gas/ dgad ces gsal pa dang / bcom ldan das kyis medang ldan pa'o sung den pa la 'dig ces bkang stsal to// 'ad su 'di la dge slong dben pa dang / nabs chal gyigs
433a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bas mthar gnas mal bca par bya'o// tshe mdun dang / gnag rje dang / brags rdzi med pa sdig sbrul med pa/ ridags dang byas mang pa med pa/ sbrang bu dang / baspang nyung dang / snung ba/
433a4(dkon brtsegs): tshenyung ba/ de lta bu'i dgon pa pas mtha' dag tu gnas par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas den gnas pa ni/ yid la byed pa brgyad bskyed par bya ste/ brgyad gang zher/ lus la mi lta bar bya ba dang / srog la
433a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga bar bya ba dang / rnyed par dang bkur sti la mi lba bar bya ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams cad la mi lta bar bya ba dang / dgon pa dag tu ri dgas 'chi ba lngar khas blang bang bya ba dang / dben par dgon pa'i yan tan yang dasan/
433a6(dkon brtsegs): brangs te gnas par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'jobs 'arob/ leg pas 'chongs ma yid par bya ba dang / zang zing dang rtson mongs pa med pa'i 'tshe ba'i bache bar bya ba ste/ yidi la bab brgyad pa de dag pa skyed sa/
433a7(dkon brtsegs): dan pa'i gnas su gnas par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gdas den gnas pan/ sems can thams cad la byas pa'i rnams pa brgyad bskyed par bya ba ste/ brgyad ga shes/ phan pa'i byams pa dang / bde ba
433a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byams pa dang / gnang ba med pa'i byams padang / yang dag pa'i byams pa dang / thadad pa med pa'i byams pa dang / na gnas kyi byams pa dang / ches la nges par sems pa'i byams par/
433b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yangs su dag pa'i byams pa ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa brgyad pa de dag bskyed par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas de nas gnas par/ 'di ldang bdag sems bskyed par byang du
433b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dithar bdag ni lam ring ba nas 'dir 'das la/ gcig pu gnyis su med pas/ legs par byas pa'am/ nyes par byas pa'i bskul pa'i grags ni gang yang med kyi/ lba dang klu dang gding nang /
433b3(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bdag gi sems kyi bsam pa zhes pa dag ni yod do// bdag ni dgon pa'i gnas ni gnas la/ mi dge ba'i sems kyi dbang du song na
433b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag lam ring po nas 'ongs shing gcig pu gnyis su med de/ len pa med/ spen pa med/ bdag gi med/ yongs su 'dzin pa med la/ gal te/ 'dod pa la rnam
433b5(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pas rnam par rtog/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog/ 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtogs pas rnam par rtog gam/ mi dge ba gzhan la rnam par rtog pas rnam par gyur na//
433b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'du 'dzi dang / 'dul mngon par dga' ba'i/ sems can rnams dang bye brag med par 'gyur te/ bdag gis lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams la bslus par 'gyu/
433b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mi mnyes par byas par gyur gyis/ ci nas kyang bdag la lha rnams 'phya bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dgyes
433b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas pa'i de na gnas pa na/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdam par bya/ tshul khrims kyi phung po shin du kun du bsrung
434a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / tshul 'chags pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang / 'jo ba yongs su dag dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis ma/
434a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon du bya ba dang / jis thos pa'i chos la rjen pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang rab tu ldan pa dang / yid 'byung ba dang / 'dod rags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las
434a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la gzhol ba dang / 'khor bas 'jigs spags pa dang / phung po ni gshed mas dbyir rgol bar rig dang / khams bzhi la myur du gdug pa'i bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /
434a4(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug la grong sdong ldar mos pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'jug par mkhas pa dang / rtag pa dang chad par lta ba yongs su spangs pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sreg
434a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / gsob med pa dang / gang zag med par rnam par skyed pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan ma med pa spyod yul ba dang / smin pa'i sems sel ba dang / khams
434a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum la nag du 'jigs pa'i yi dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu ma go dang gos la me'ang 'brunin du brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / btsun pa'i mi 'dod pa dang / lus kyi sbyin la 'ang das pa 'i sar
434a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnams ga pa dang / sems kyi sti pa dang / 'jig pa lca dang / ga bsngal mes sukris pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / kunas 'byung ba rnams med kyi phreng pa srangs pa/
434a8(dkon brtsegs): dang dgagapa ya na sum du bya labum pa dang / mam pa rnam pa'i rnam 'byor la brtson pa dang / pa'i snying du 'dran pa gzhag pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / mi dge pa'i chis dang bral pa/
434b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos la mngon du phyogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i sring ba la shin tu gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mngon par gyur pa dang / dbang ba lnga dang ldan pa dang / spobs lnga'i thugs
434b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dang / skabs byang chub kyi lag bdun la bsam gtan dang / 'phags pa la mi yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / zhi gnas la gnas pa dang / man/
434b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong gis blta bar bya ste/ 'odi srung de lta bu'i go cha 'di dag bgos nas/ nam ma gyi cha steng dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal zhing / rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / rtag tu khrang
434b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du 'gro bar/ dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas par bya'o// de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas lus brgyan par sbyor ba la brtson par mi bya'o// mal chas brgyan pa la brtson par mi
434b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos gos kyis brgyan pa la brtson par mi bya'o// des rtswa rnying pa ste blangs la 'chags pa dang / 'dus legs par bting ste/ dge 'dun dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun
434b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dang ma 'gags pa dang / bdag gi gos gyes ches shes par dgon pa'i gnas der gnas par bya'o// 'od srung dge slong dgon pa pa gang gi tshe lus gso pa dang / 'phags pa
434b7(dkon brtsegs): lamanye bar brtan pa'i phyir grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du bsod nams kyi phyir 'jug pa na/ des sems 'di ltar bus dgon pa'i gnas de nas 'gro bar bya ste/ ma rnyed
434b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang yongs su yi chad par mi bya/ rnyed kyang dga' ba bskyed par mi bya/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yid la bya/ bsod nams la nyi ma par brtan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la bya/
435a1(dkon brtsegs): ba bsam ning / des gro dang / grong khyer dang / grol rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug par bya'o// de grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du bsod snyoms spyod
435a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nA chos kyi go cha bgos la bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o// de la chos kyi go cha gang zhe na/ mig gis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams mthong na/ rjes su chags par mi bya'o// yid du 'ong
435a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzugs rnams mthong na/ yang khong khro bar mi bya'o// de bzhin du smre dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba rnams rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bar mi
435a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// dbang po shin du bsdams pa dang / mig g.yeng ba dang / gnya shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / dul ba dang / cang shes kyi sems dang / sngon yid la byed pa'i chos mi 'dod pa
435a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / zang zing gis ma 'gags pa'i rgyud kyis bsod snyoms srung bar bya'o// mthar chags su bsod snyoms blang bar bya'o// gang nas bsod snyoms rnyed pa dor rjesu chags par ma
435a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gang nas mi rnyed pa der yang khong khro bar mi bya'o// khyim bcur bslangs pa las khyim bcu gcig pa las bsod nams rnyed na yang yongs su yi chad par mi bya'o// de 'di snyam du bram
435a7(dkon brtsegs): ze dang / khyim bdag 'di dag ni bya ba mang bdag yon pas/ de dag gis bdag la sbyin par nges pa med de/ de dag bdag la sems pa'ang ngo mthar rjen/ bsod skams sbyir pa lta smras
435a8(dkon brtsegs): dgos snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par byas ste/ des de ltar yongs su yi chad pa med par bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o// sems can gang dag de'i mig lam du snang bar gyur pa skyes pa/
435b1(dkon brtsegs): du chung dang / khye'u dang/ bum dang / dran du 'tha~M'i rnaMs gnas nu sang pa dag pa yang byas padang / tshang rje'i sems bskyed pa rgyag/ shes pa sa na ga ga hA
435b2(dkon brtsegs): bseng sams sbyin pa de dag mtha'is su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// de ltar brtson par bya'o// des bsod snyoms ngan yang rung bzang yang rung / drangs te phrengangs/ grong khyer ma/ phreng rdal 'di ni dag gi seng snyems
435b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di las bdag gas bgo bab byang ges pa'i sems can dbul pa su yang snyam du gas pa'i kun du balba par ba'o// ga'adi sems par dngul pa ni mthong na/ nges pased thams dengs bgo pa / gsam
435b4(dkon brtsegs): ca dus pa ma mthang ma des 'di ltar gang dag bdag gi mig 'am du snang bar mgyur te/ mi snang ba'i sems cacan de dag la bsod sems kyi theg ma chas pa sbyin gyis byi nas mer ba dag yesas myed pa ldam
435b5(dkon brtsegs): du sems bskyed la/ de la bsed snyoms de khyer te/ dgon pa'i gnas der song la/ lhung bzed dang / lag pa dkyus te dge sbyong gi spyad pa dang / chog dang / ldan pa'i skyed pa bzang pos byin gyis brlabs la des skyil ba snang
435b6(dkon brtsegs): bcas te bsod snyoms des bza' bar bya'o// mchags pa dang / gnod sams med pa dang / mi rkam pa dang / mazhen pas zas zos nas/ 'di snyam du lus 'di la srin du'i rigs brgyad khri yo pa dag 'di'i mthus bde ba
435b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'agyur cig/ dag ni 'di dag zang zing gis bsdu bar bya'o// byang chub thob nas ni chos kyi bsdub bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te yang de'i bso na snyoms ngan bar gyur na/ des 'di sam dus /
435b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par byaste/ kha zas ngan pas ni bdag gi lus yang bar 'gyur/ spang ba bzod par 'gyur ro// bdag gi bzhang gici 'byung bzung por 'gyur/ bdag la dang pas byin pa chung bar 'gyur/ bdag gi lus yang ba dang sems
436a1(dkon brtsegs): yang bar 'gyur// bdag rmugs pa dang / gnyid chung bar 'gyur/ bdag la 'dod chags kyi sems kyis kun nas dkris par mi 'gyuraro// snyam du yid la bya ba 'di dag bskyed par bya'o// gal te des bsad
436a2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms mang zhig rnyed na/ de la yang ran par bza' bar bya'o// dor ba'i chos nyid du yang bya ste/ bsod snyoms de las rjel ba gang yang rung ba'i steng du gter la/ 'di snyam du gcan zan dang bya'i/ tshogs gang la la zang zing gi zas
436a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa byin nas/ len pa de dag 'di la zos shig snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// des zas zos nas lhung bzed dang / lag pa dkyus te dgon pa la brten nas gnas par bya'o// sngon yid la byed pa'i chos de nyid kyang mi 'do/
436a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// 'od srung gal te dge slong dgon pa 'bras bu ma thob pa so so'i skye bo'i drung du sbrul dang / gcan gzan gtum po dag 'ongs na/ des de la 'jigs pa dang / skrag par mi bya'i/ des 'di snyam du bdag thogs ma nyid nas
436a5(dkon brtsegs): lus dang sreg par te/ dgon pa'i gnas su 'angs kyis/ 'di la bdag gis 'jigs par mi bya/ skrag par mi bya'i byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya/ zhe sda rnam par bya/ 'jigs pasrang bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed pa
436a6(dkon brtsegs): gal te nga ng+yas nas smras dang ban ca de dag gis srog bcad cing zan mang de yang dig mdu gcan gzar 'di dag la bdag gi zang zing tsam gyi tshim pa byed mi nus kyi/ de dag gi bdag gin thos na bde ba dag paganas par lung
436a7(dkon brtsegs): labadag gi kyang stong me nga'i dus las snang po blangs par gyung ba ni bdag gis rnyed par legs parjod/ da ni dag zang ring gis bsdu bar dri'o// byang chub phre nas ni chos kyis bsgrubar bye'o/ ma dus ngas pas+ho
436a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ mu da pas gnas ge phreng gi su dang sreg la mi lu ba dgon par bya'o// gal te dben pa gnas de gnas pas ma ma yin pa 'asam mad rdzus kyang nga mdag mi rdzu kya rung / de gas
436b1(dkon brtsegs): smras sa pa nga na na su pa masas ma sa sa sa na ma gas
436b2(dkon brtsegs): mas mas pa sa rgyu mes byas pa/ 'dzin kyis ma rnas pa sa sa par sa sa kyi rnam nas pa
436b3(dkon brtsegs): ba gyu na ci 'i sa na dris pa thams cad kyi la dgang papar bya'o// bdag ni ngas nyan pa yi gyis/ khyed nubyas par cigazhig/ sa brjod par bya/ 'a srung dge slong dgon pa das de sar snang dag pa gapar byam
436b4(dkon brtsegs): zung gzhan yang gi sring dge pa pa dben pa la gnas pas dgan 'dra shes shin du bsgom par byaste/ de lus 'di ni dang / shing dang / cig pa dang ba padang ga yong sa buste/ bdag med pa/ bdag gi sengags su r+thi
436b5(dkon brtsegs): pa di 'i lus dil bdag sems na dang / srab dang / gang zag med kyi/ rje 'didag ni nyin cing 'bril ba byung ba rgyud rkyen pas byang ning byed tutshigs pa las byung ba ste sbyin pang ba dgagasu 'thu na
436b6(dkon brtsegs): cad 'byor ba de yang bdag gi nul bzhin se sor brtag pa bya'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa'i ni byang rgyun mi 'chad par 'di'i bu'i snyam du de la bya'o// dben pa'i gan pe gan pa des/ rtsa deng shing gis
436b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang slad du nags rgyal de dag ci ltar 'byung ba dang / ji ltar 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / jithar phyi la gyi dngos pa 'di dag padag pa med pa/ bdag gi mid ge/ sa su 'dzin pa med pa/ de ba g.yong med cing byed na
436b8(dkon brtsegs): med de yang ba'i du ni pa gsul di ga bye ba byed 'gag pam byed pa ba nam drung sa de bani du rus 'dis du dang dag zhigs pa dang meg 'tha pe bdag midag da sas rnam
437a1(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las 'byung gi/ rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang na ni mi 'byung ba ste/ 'di la don dam par skye ba dang /
437a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa'i chos gang yang med da snyam du mtshan ma bzung bar bya'o// 'od srung de ltar dge slong dgon pa pas chos kyi yi dam gyi spyod pa 'di lta bus dgon pa la gnas par bya'o//
437a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa de nyan thos kyi thog pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa zhig tu myur du khyad par mi 'gyur ro// gal te nyan thos kyi
437a4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa par gyur na ni/ de myur du 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// ji ste de las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs te/ 'bras bu thob par ma gyur na yang de zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
437a5(dkon brtsegs): bral gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis sam gsuMlas mi 'da'o// gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur na ni/ de myur ba nyid du rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro//
437a6(dkon brtsegs): galas byang chub sem pa dpa'i theg par gyur na/ ro'i cha 'di nyid la ma skye ba'i chos lnga bzang pa zab par 'gyur na/ de slob bzad pa yang sargyas mthang bar 'gyur ro/
437a7(dkon brtsegs): bapa med par sa sa rgyas mdzang nas/ m+'ud du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyu bar 'gyur ro// dgan pa pa'i
437a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di bgang pa na ge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dganab pa'i la'u sa lnga pa'o/ 'ad grang
437b1(dkon brtsegs): dadag spang bsad rnams srung ba yin nan/ 'du byung 'dil dge sung bas rnams spyad papa 'di ltar bdag bas rnams kyi khams la gnas te/ thegs par 'du
437b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung la/ bdag ldan gyi sman lam dang dam bcas pa la gnas par byar snyam du bsapa par bya'o// dge sung bas rnams snang ba lag
437b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang ldan pa zhes me brnam pa dang / rgyal 'chas pa med pa dang / khags pa med pa dang / mthun tu zang pa thams cad kyi sems pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dang /
437b4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'bags pa dang / yi dmal brtan par bya'o// des khar zas bzang ba rnams la ro bro ba'i 'du shes thams cad kyi thams cad du bskyed par mi bya'o// des 'a
437b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar bdag gis gdol bu lta bu dang / lus dang sems gtsang bar bya'i/ kha zas kyis lus gtsang bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zas bzang po ji snyed cig zos
437b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang de thams cad ni tha mar rnag tu zag go/ tha mar mi mthun no// tha mar dri nga ba'o// de lta bas na bdag gis bzang 'dod par mi bya'o snyam du bslab par bya'o//
437b7(dkon brtsegs): de ma zhin tu nges par sems pa'i sems kyis zang ngam/ zang khyer ram/ grang rdal du bsad sems kyi phyir 'jug pa na/ mthar chags su bsrung bar bya'o/ des
437b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag la skyes pa bsad snyoms ster gyi/ bud med ni ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag la bud med bsod snyoms ster gyi skyes pa ni ma yin
438a1(dkon brtsegs): na ne'am/ bdag la khre'u bas rnga skams ser gyi bu mo ni ma yim man 'am/ bdag la bu mo bsad snyoms ser gyi khye'u ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag gis paH
438a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnyed kyi ngan pa ni ma yin no zhe 'am/ bdag gis bsti stang du byas nas rnyed kyi/ bsti stang du ma byas par ni ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag gis bde blag tu rnyed kyi/ thang bar ni
438a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin na ne 'am/ bdag la skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khra' dang bu mo bcu par 'gyur ro zhe 'am/ byin ma thag tu sems par 'gyur ram/ bdag smad dgos par 'gyur ra/
438a4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu bsdogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ram/ bdag gis kha zas bzang por sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnyed par 'gyur gyi/ dbul po'i zas lnga bu ngan pa ni rnyed pa ma yin na snyam
438a5(dkon brtsegs): du des mi dge ba'i yid la byed pa thams cad bskyed par mi bya'o// 'di lta bu'i go cha bgo bar yang bya ste/ rnyed pa ma rnyed kyang yongs su yi chad par mi bya ba dang / ngan pa
438a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bzang ba'i 'dra shes bskyed par mi bya ba 'di ni dge slong bsod snyoms pa dag gi chos nyid de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can pal cher ni ro la brkam ste/ zas kyi
438a7(dkon brtsegs): ma pa'i las rnams byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su ste'o// gang dag chas shes pa ma brkam pa ma zhen pa/ rol ma bsdu ba/ lce'i dbang ba chaganas
438a8(dkon brtsegs): ba bas ngan ngana'i tsam gyis 'cha ba de dag ni 'tsho 'bas te/ shi ba'i dus byas nas mtharas sa skye bar 'gyur/ sra dang mi rnams kyi nang dri bad 'bra' 'gro bar 'phrul
438b1(dkon brtsegs): byas nas 'dungs pa par 'gyur ra/ 'ang blang dam na pas mams snang ba'i das mngagasar la med pa bzlag sa/ sam sangs par sems pas snang ban nas bdun 'du
438b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma par mtha'/ dpe 'gyunan na/ lum gas pa dang / 'dagos pa'i lama'i chags bsgrug pa 'din tu bdag gis bas pa sams pa'i phyiraro/ 'di srung ban
438b3(dkon brtsegs): gis 'ang babar du 'as pa/ nga bab du rdu ga/ cas dang ldan pa/ sa kyis dang pa chams pa ma ngas par byung pa'i dag kyang dgadu na
438b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' bar byal/ 'ad srung gal bdag mang ba ra dgram sa snad pa na bar gyur te/ nad galag mang la ba sad rnams la 'jug kyang mnas na/ rab 'dis ma du brdzu
438b5(dkon brtsegs): thugs med pa/ bdag ni gcig bra gnyis su med pa/ bdag ni rab tu byung ba/ bdag gi grogs ni chos yin te/ bdag na chas la rngon pa yin la/ bdag nim
438b6(dkon brtsegs): ba zhing drug bsngal la/ rab tun pamade bzhin gsags pa ma chas kyi sbyin gsungs pa gang yin pa de ji ltar thos pa bzhin du/ rgyas de dag bdag gis rdul bani
438b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag par bya'i sam dumams bsrud par byur/ 'ad byung na la gang thas 'di la yang dag bangan pa bzhin dum par nag pa 'di ni chul bzhin la sbyar ba'aM/
438b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di la sran tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma mar nag pa na/ tshul bzhin la zhugs pa de sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur zhing / dran pa dang ldan la shes bzhin nga ldan
439a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ bsam gtan dad po bskyed pa'i gnas gang yin pa de yod par 'gyur te/ des bsam gtan thob nas/ bsam gtan gyi bde ba 'dod pa na/ nyi ma ga
439a2(dkon brtsegs): gam nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma gsum nas nyi ma bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i zas kyis gnas so// gal te 'di ltar rnal 'byor la zhugs pa bsam gtan
439a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi nus na/ de ltar brtson zhing rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong chos la gnas pa de la/ mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dag kha
439a4(dkon brtsegs): zas 'bral par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni rnal 'byor stong pa rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa ste/ des las yongs su bzung ba rnyed pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung gal ti sI ni 'dus
439a5(dkon brtsegs): ying char ba bste/ bas gams spyad pa'i dag spang bsad skams la 'jug mi nus pa'i dus kyi tshe/ byams pa'i zas kyi ga pags te/ chas sems pa yin la byed pa langan
439a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mag sanams mnag gsum zhig zan cha na/ 'di ltar mi dgas gzhon rje'i 'jig chen pa rnas par byed pa'i las byam pa gang dgas brgyar yang mtshal ma nga
439a7(dkon brtsegs): 'a' bar nga nga/ ma ra ba pa na [ऽ] nga ba sna
439a8(dkon brtsegs): mabyas/ ba sa pa nirnas pas mams pa tha'/ 'jams pa 'alas bas pas batshan nas tshu ma 'di bar bya'o// mam du 'dugs bzung par byas
439b1(dkon brtsegs): nga ba zung bas grams snang pas tsam dras pa dang / rgyas pa 'dres pa dang bud med 'das pa dang / khre'u 'das pa dang / bra ma 'das par mi b+har// khyim pa ngan pas
439b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams gsangs byung ba'i khyim der san la 'dug na/ bas skams gcang ma byed pa yin gyi bar du mam ci gtam brjed par bya/ denas pas skams de blangs la
439b3(dkon brtsegs): sminam pa yang sa te'ag bar tha'o/ 'a srung bsad bums byung pa 'dag nang gis ma dang par ma bya/ kha gsags zla/ rdzal 'chas par ma tha'o// dal ma 'ang ba
439b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ gad gnan dgal tshig 'di skad sgru ba ste/ bdag gi bsad rnams ni ngan pa'o// bdag gi bsad skams ni rtsub pa'o/ bdag gis sngon 'di lta bu dang ma
439b5(dkon brtsegs): 'drangs par ma zos so// bdag gis bsad snyoms ni skye bo mang po dang thun mang du byas so// bdag gis cung zhig zos te bdag ma 'drangs pas bdag gi lus nyam chung
439b6(dkon brtsegs): nas zla ba ste/ 'di ltar 'khang pa'i mtshan ma gang mo yang rung ba 'di lta bu 'di ni sems tshul 'chos pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong bas snyams pas de dag thams cad rma
439b7(dkon brtsegs): byal gang lhung bzed du 'angam pa ngan kyang rung bzang yang rung / cung yang rung mang lang rung / gcang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/ de bza' bar zla'o/ mangs sa
439b8(dkon brtsegs): gadrang ba med pa dang / bsam pa yangs su dag pa dang / chos nges par sems pa mang ba dang / lus gso pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam nye brtan pa'i phyir des bsang
440a1(dkon brtsegs): byugs du ga sung bas sums srung ba 'a ma/ dang thar ram/ yang rdul du bsad rnams pasangs pas rnye pa
440a2(dkon brtsegs): bza bkrus pa bamam du byar drung da sa bzhin gshegs pa yang 'grus so/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsad nams kyi gzi brjid kyis brjod pa/ 'bar las sbyar ba'i
440a3(dkon brtsegs): rnab tshangams nas/ rab tu d+h+r-i ga tu g+hA nga / gnang spyan dang / drums kyi tshang ba/ mi dag pa'i chom thams cad spangs pa/ dag pa'i chas thams ca dad na
440a4(dkon brtsegs): rnamangs pa thams cad dang zil pad thaM 'ang dri pazang sems kyi tshang gshegs na yang / dza sar srung bzad bkrus pa bzhin du skar gshegs na/ bdag tu bugs
440a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams chung bdag du'i sa bla ma bskyed pa gyi sang lhung bzed bzlas pa bzhin du byar byung bab/ ci'abyur la cad par bya/ ci'i phyir nan/ dge pa'i chab ma
440a6(dkon brtsegs): bas kha zas bzang po dag mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro/ gal te bdud kyi las sam/ bdud kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag bdag la bsod snyoms ma
440a7(dkon brtsegs): sprer na/ sems bdud ba n+de las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba de ltar bla'o snyam du bsam mo/ de ltar de'i nan tan lags
440a8(dkon brtsegs): bdes bdu nga bdud kyi ris kyi sa rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ 'ad srung dag zung bas snyoms pa me dkar 'phags pa'i tshigs rnams yangs su srung ba

440b2(dkon brtsegs): nan/ nga ma shes pa dang / khrel yang pas galag pa'i sems su bya'i// cha sags kyis tsha bar sbyor ba la btsun pa'i sems kyis ni ma yin no// rlung dang nyi mi dang sgra
440b3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang sha sbrang dang sdig sbrul gyis reg par 'gyur ba yongs su bslab pa'i phyir gyi/ lus brgyan pa'i phyir ni ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nan tan
440b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis gnas pas gos gtsang ma la mngon par dga' ba med de/ des phyag dar gyi phung po las phyag drar khrod pa blangs la 'du shes gnyis bskyed par bya ste/ gnyis dang
440b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ chog shes pa'i 'du shes dang / mgu zla pa'i 'du shesas/ gnan yang 'du shes gnyis bskyed par b+ha ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa'i 'dra shes dang / 'phags
440b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rigs la gnas pa'i 'dugasas/ gzhan yang 'du shes gnyis bskyed par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ lus brgyan pa dang / sems gtsang bal/ 'od srung gal po ga
440b7(dkon brtsegs): srang phyug dar khrod pas phyag dar gyi phung po las phyug dar khyad pa len pa na/ sa phyogs de na sngan gnyen pa zhes su gyur pa'am/ sngon gtam 'dres pa'am/ bebs par sla ba de

441a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no zhes ngas bshad da/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong phrag dar khrid pa pas rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang / rdo rjes bu'i sems kyis dogs pa med par/ phyag dar khad
441a2(dkon brtsegs): bablang bar bya ba'i phyir ro// des phyag dar zad pa de blangs nas/ legs par bkrus te shin tu gtsang zhing dri ma med par byas la/ chan gcal te kha legs par bsgyur la chas gos sngam
441a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyar la brlan par bya'o// de phyis 'jig par mi 'gyur bar legs par klan legs par sbyar legs par btsems te bgo bar bya'o// 'od srung dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pas la/
441a4(dkon brtsegs): chags nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ mi sdug pa yid la bya ba la gnas la phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o// zhe sdang nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir byams pa'i sems

441a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad snang ba'i phyir/ rtul bzhin yid la byed pa la zhugs pas// phyag mdzad pa dag lus la bag par bya'o// skemached drug mangs su shes par

441b2(dkon brtsegs): ma gnam ma dgas pa/ gzhan gyi ngar blta me dgas pa/ gzhan la rag ma las pa phya ga dar k+Sha bur bar ba ste/ de'i sbyor phyag dar khyad pa phyug dar zad pa zhes bya'i 'din

441b8(dkon brtsegs): bar zhugs pa de la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten snang ba rnams kyang thal ma sbyar zhing rkang pa la gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa ni/ lha gzhan phyag 'tshal

442a8(dkon brtsegs): nas pa sang sems blangs te/ mtsham dras par song ba dang / mchi na gnas pa'i lhade dag gis de mtsha mchog 'dir kha zas thos nas/ lhags par na mtsha mchog ma

442b7(dkon brtsegs): srabasrab par bya'o// 'di srung 'di lta bu'i dus dang 'di lta bu'i stan yad de/ 'dra skad cham gas ngan padzin pa/ gas na na gyis chag par 'dzin pa blangs

443a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur snyam ste/ ngas 'khar las sbyar ba'i rgyal sa spangs nas rab tu byung ste/ gshe ba phra ma dang du gu la'i ras dang / ke tam pa'i ras dang / dang sa

443b4(dkon brtsegs): zhus pa bskyed pa dang / tshasags dang / bsad sems kyis sdud par byed pa dang / gus par smra zhing phyag 'tshal la ldang bar byung ba ste/ 'di srung 'di ma khyam

445a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di chas thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa zhes phra bar zung shig/ 'phags pa'i rigs spangs pa'i yon tan gyi gnas dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa langs su
445b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / rdul khrims 'chal pas gang ba dang / rin pa che brtsegs pa dang / rin pablang ba dang / rin po che bcugs pa dang / rin pa che chos kyi skam lan na
445b2(dkon brtsegs): zla bar drang shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang / lha dang me dang / lA ma len
445b3(dkon brtsegs): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsnyad do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos

445b5(dkon brtsegs): brdeg pa chen pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ le'u spyong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u dun bcu rtsa lnga pa ste/ bla gros mi zad pas nus pa/ bam pa gcig /

445b7(dkon brtsegs): At+palaya ma nye pa'i badrin ma ma hA la na swAtra// bar skad du/ 'phags pa b+hu gras mi zod pas nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mad// sangs rgyas
445b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ma dpa'i sem na la mag 'tshal la// 'di na bdag gis byas padus gcis na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba khab na/ than
446a1(dkon brtsegs): ri la dag spang skang nyis bcwa lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' skang la 'di sa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
446a2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes tag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rtag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

446a6(dkon brtsegs): bdar te/ 'khor de nyid du 'dug par gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa zla gras mi zad bstan las langs te blugs phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bram
446a7(dkon brtsegs): gam pa'i ljang sa la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal bar lags su thal ma sbya ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'dasas rin pa che rna chags kyim rtag ge gdugs dang /
446a8(dkon brtsegs): sa gi tha mas mtshang nas/ bcom ldam dasal 'di sang pas gsasas// bcom ldan 'as byang chub sesems byang chub kyi sems shes brtsa ba/ bcomaldan lam
446b1(dkon brtsegs): zung na pa na nga na mag/ bas rnamams thang mas gang lags/ bam mamams zang na bldan
446b2(dkon brtsegs): thams dpa' ma dmigs ma dmigs dmigs par mi 'gyur ra// byang chub las gud na yang byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs te/ byang chub ni brjod du ma mchis/ sems ni
446b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ma mchis/ bstan tu ma mchis/ thogs pa ma mchis/ rnam par rig pa ma mchis shing sems dpa' yang mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar tshas 'di dag gi na
446b4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par bkri/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub ni brda' 'am/ gdags pa 'am tha skad du mi dmigs shing / byang chub las gung na
446b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ste sems kyang mi dmigs la/ byang chub ni brjod du med/ sems ni gzugs med/ bstan du med/ thags pa med/ rnam par rig pa med de/ sems dpa'
446b6(dkon brtsegs): yang me migs sa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni brjod du med pa ste/ byang chub ji lta bar sems kyang de bzhin no// sems ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no//
446b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dang sems ji lta bar sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin no// sems dpa' rnams ji lta bar 'das pa dang / ma 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad
446b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa' ming 'thob bo// chos thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i
447a1(dkon brtsegs): / sems de ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o// byang chub ni 'das pa dang / ma 'das pa dang / dkar byung ba yang ma yin te/ sems kyang de bzhin no// sems
447a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de bzhin no// chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di la ci yang rnyed pa med de/ byang chub kyang med/ byang chub tu gdags pa yang med/ sems can yang med/
447a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can du gdags pa med/ nyan thos su kyang med/ nyan thos su gdags pa yang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang med/ byang chub se
447a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang med/ byang chub sems dpar gdags pa yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang med/ 'dus byas kyang med/ 'dus byas su gdags
447a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med/ 'dus ma byas kyang med/ rtswa 'dus ma byas su gdags pa yang ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs par mi 'gyur med kyi/ rigs kyi bu 'on kyang dper na/
447a6(dkon brtsegs): ri rab kyi tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i sems dang po ste ste/ de la rmA ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa gnyis pa
447a7(dkon brtsegs): nachos thams cad kyi bya ba'i gnas kyi tshul gyis sa lnga bra ba la ste/ de lan+d+ha ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni 'jigs pa med
447a8(dkon brtsegs): bdas pas sa bayang ba dang / ba med pa'i sus thal dgas kyi rgyal pa meng gi sa pa cam gyi la dra bsas/ das rgyani badzan pa'i bar btu phyin pa
447b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya pa na pa tu ma sa mang mang gyi bu'am dang/ sa dang zlag sa dang / bcan 'phrub dang / rgya pa / thar ga / rdzun
447b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gras tsha ba rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni bsad nams kyis chag mi shes pa'i tshul gyis dge bsna chags kyis yang dag par 'phags pa lta brang ba lta /
447b3(dkon brtsegs): de la rgyu ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni mun nag chen po sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba lta bur balnga ste/
447b4(dkon brtsegs): desan+ta shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa'o/ sems bsred pa badron pa ni de dpan mdzad chen pas drug pa ltar 'khar ba'i 'grag dgon pa la bskal ba'i tshul gyis pas mi
447b5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad langs su rdzogs par byed pas legs par brgyan par blta ste/ de la rgyu ni thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni
447b6(dkon brtsegs): zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i dpe'i tshul gyis sgrub pa thams cad rnam par dag par yongs su rdzogs par blta ste/ de la rgyu ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin
447b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ sems bskyed dgra pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yangs su dag pa'i yan tan gyi rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khar gyi tshul gyis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
447b8(dkon brtsegs): byed par blta ste/ de la rgya ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni yon tan dang ye shes dang chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar dbang bskur
448a1(dkon brtsegs): ba zab pas 'khor los sbyar ba'i mtshan gyi dpe'i tshul gyis nam mkha' dang mtshungs par blta ste/ de la rgyu ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rigs kyi phra
448a2(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// don dam par na 'di la byung
448a3(dkon brtsegs): chub kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub kyi sems kyang med do// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
448a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sman tu 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa brgyaste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang za sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pastan tu 'gro ba dang / lkug pa'i bsam pa ldan
448a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po sngon tu 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten sngon tu 'gro ba dang /
448a6(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i dngas pa stan tu 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa sngon tu 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bra byung chu
448a7(dkon brtsegs): na me dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pa 'dra zin pa 'di'i sngan tu 'gra bcos rnam pa bcul/ rigs kyi brangal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi
448a8(dkon brtsegs): ra rtsen pa'i mamadus pa'i chos rnam pa bcuste/ bcug zhan 'dil na/ tham mamal mngam grangs pa ldan latha pa dang / ngag galas yangs grangs/
448b1(dkon brtsegs): sman tu 'phra ba dang / yad kyi las yangs su dag bsngan tu 'gro ba dang / rnam par mi 'che ba sam du 'gro ba dang / ngan pang thams cad rnam par spang brdzun tu 'dra bdang
448b2(dkon brtsegs): ma kham pa brgyad rnam par spong ba sngon tu 'gro ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las bzla ba sngon tu 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la dgod pa
448b3(dkon brtsegs): sman tu 'gro ba dang / bsam pa langs su rngugs pa stan tu 'gro ba dang / sngon lam yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
448b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul khrims kyi pha ral tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon tu 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzang ba'i pha rol tu dran
448b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sngon tu 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rjes su chags pa spong ba sngon tu 'gro ba dang / khang khro ba spang ba sngan du 'gro ba dang /
448b6(dkon brtsegs): lus le mi lta bstan du 'gro ba dang / sreg la ling mi rton pa stan tu 'gro ba dang / mos bstan tu 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba sngon du 'dra
448b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byams pa'i stobs sngan tu 'gro ba dang / zab ma'i chos la bzad pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rgya chen po la mas pa sngan du 'gro ba dang / ma shes pa bas
448b8(dkon brtsegs): ba bstan tu 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba chos rnam pa bsur/ rigs kyi
449a1(dkon brtsegs): bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon tu 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sem
449a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam bsngon 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid mngon par sgrub pa la rjes su yi rang ba sngon tu 'gro ba dang / zhum pa med pa
449a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bsdu ba thob par bya ba sngon tu 'gro ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba sngon tu 'gro ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sngon
449a4(dkon brtsegs): tre 'gro ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dgra gdul ba sngon tu 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad kyis dben pa sngan tu 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba
449a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon tu 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pa ral tu zin pa
449a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i sngon tu 'gro bcos rnams pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon tu 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa
449a7(dkon brtsegs): bcu ste/ bcu gang zhin 'di la ste/ dge ba'i tshab la gnas pa stan tu 'gro ba dang / ting te 'dzin ldan tu 'gro ba dang / skams par 'jug pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / yang
449a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sngon tu 'gro ba dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang ba ldan tu 'gro ba dang / pes
449b1(dkon brtsegs): sa pa ldan tu 'gro ba dang / sems sa namams cad kun na mangs bzang bstan tu 'thab dang / ting nga 'dzin gyi phreng ba langs su rtags par byed pa na la
449b2(dkon brtsegs): dang dam pa'i chos yangs su bsrung ba sngan du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chom
449b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa'i rdzun du 'gru ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen 'dis
449b4(dkon brtsegs): zung ba la mkhas pa san tu 'tha ba dang / khams la mkhas pa sngan du 'gro ba dang / skye mched la mkhas pa sngan du 'gro ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkha
449b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon tu 'gro ba dang / bden pa la mkhas pa sngan du 'gro ba dang / lba bar gyur pa thams cad bsal ba sngan tu 'gro ba dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ldan du 'gro ba dang / mi
449b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la bzod pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba sngun tu 'gro ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba sngon tu
449b7(dkon brtsegs): ban+de/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi tu bu de la byang chub
449b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon tu 'gro ba chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi bsas bad/
450a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / sems can la rten pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje sngon tu 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par
450a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba la mi skyo ba sngon tu 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / khyad par gyi ye shes mthong ba khang du chud pa sngan tu 'gro ba dang /
450a3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa yangs su byung bar bya ba yangs su spar pa ldan tu 'gro ba dang / dngas pa ji lta ba bzhin du yangs su rtag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems kyi skabs nye bar sgrub
450a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldag pa'i sa yangs phra thob par byed pa sngon tu 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'ang/
450a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi slan lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon tu 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcugs
450a6(dkon brtsegs): nen 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i thabs pa nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i thabs po nye bar
450a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba shes pa sngan du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang ba thabs pa nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mas
450a8(dkon brtsegs): badzubs pa zhi bar bya bags pa ldan du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mas pa'i thabs pan par chu ba shes pa sa/
450b1(dkon brtsegs): / ma khams pa da pahA/ khamam gamamathakhasapas par rgyu thams pa ldam 'thab dang / thams pamamams bdam pad
450b2(dkon brtsegs): tha thams pan par chub shes pa stan du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi'ab pa dang / bzabs pa nye bar rdza bzhes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams
450b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad phung ba gsum du rnam par gzhag pa'i thabs pa nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dbang ba mi sngo ba'i sems can yangs su smon par bya ba shes pa sngon du
450b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi tha byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sman lam gyi pha ral du byin pa 'di'i sngun du 'gro ba'i chas rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'
450b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi skabs kyi par la du zin pa'i sman du 'gra ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ gzu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chas thams cad gzang ma nas byung ba med pa snun du 'gro ba dang /
450b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad gzad ma nas mtshan nyid med pa sngan du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzad ma nas skye ba med pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzid ma nas yod ma
450b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa sngan tu 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzad ma nas chags pa med pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad 'jug pa bstan tu 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ldag pa
450b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan tu 'gro ba dang / chos chos thams cad dngas po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sngan tu 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad kyi thag ma dang bar ma dang tha ma mnyam pa nyid sngon tu 'gro ba dang /
451a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa rtag pa dang / rnam par rtag pa med pa sngon tu 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skabs kyi
451a2(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon tu 'gro ba chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon tu 'gro ba'i chos rnam
451a3(dkon brtsegs): pa badz+ra ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ chos thams cad rnam par dbye ba la shin tu rnam par brtags pa sngan tu 'gro ba dang / dkar ba' chos shin tu yangs su rdzogs
451a4(dkon brtsegs): pa sngan tu 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi tshogs bstsags pa dpag tu med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su gzung ba sngan tu 'gro ba dag
451a5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po langs pa khong du chud par bya ba sngon tu 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi khams dang /
451a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan mangs pa'i spyad pa la 'jug pa sngon tra 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpyod yul la 'jug cing rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / skabs
451a7(dkon brtsegs): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs shing kun shes par bya bstan na'abrab dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchag dang ldan pa
451a8(dkon brtsegs): thamag cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bskur ba'i sa 'thab pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha ral tu byin pa 'di
451b1(dkon brtsegs): hru ba nas pa gyul/ dal bar 'atutsun pa 'angan gang nAn/ ltung ba'i thad par sangs surnags par byed pa'i nganam par 'duthun pa'anganan/ ma
451b2(dkon brtsegs): bcad rgya che ba yangs su rdzogs par byung ba 'dun ni la la tu phyin pa'i dran no// 'dum byas dang 'dus ma byas la chags pa med pa don ni pha ral tu phyin pa'i dran na//
451b3(dkon brtsegs): mthar ba'i nyes pa rgyu ba bzhin du nags pa 'daman pa ra tu blun pa'i dran na/ ts+tsha ba mi mkhas pa rnam khang du chud par byed pa'i ngan ni pa ral tu phyin pa 'dunan
451b4(dkon brtsegs): nas kyi mdzad zad ma shes pa yang dag par ldan pa'i dun ni pha rol tu byin pa'i don no// sgrub pa med pa rnam par thar pa yangs su rdzogs par byed pa'i ngan na
451b5(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sems can gyi khams rab tu shes par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu
451b6(dkon brtsegs): byon pa'i don no// tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid yangs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don na// bzad pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i
451b7(dkon brtsegs): ngan na pa ra latra sbyin pa'i ngan nu// btsun 'grus mnyam pa nyid langs su rdzogs par byed pa'i ngan ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i dan no/ bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid mang
451b8(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par mkhas sa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i danani par ma
452a1(dkon brtsegs): / zin pa 'angan na/ chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed pa 'don ni pha rab tu phyin pa 'don na/ maskye ba'i chos la bzad pa yangs su rdzogs par byed pa
452a2(dkon brtsegs): don ni pha rol tu zin pa'i don na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang dag par thob par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbar ba'i don ni
452a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ral tu zin pa'i ngan na/ sems can thams cad smin par byed pa'i don na pa ral tu phyin pa'i danan// byang chub kyi snying po sangs rgyas kyi la shes yangs su chags
452a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bdud thams cad 'dul bar bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su myed
452a5(dkon brtsegs): par sman ci sprul ba'i don ni pa rol tu ston pa'i ngan na/ yan tan thams cad kyi pha ral du 'gro ba'i don ni pha rol tu zin pa'i ngan na// bas kyi nal ba thams ca
452a6(dkon brtsegs): ra bachar po 'danan par sa tu phyin pa'i nganan// skabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas tshanas ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad mangs su chags par
452a7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhin nan// ma sbyin smra la sa nag su nga byu shAdun smra rgyan pa dun// bla mang pa sa
452a8(dkon brtsegs): rnamam pa'i byang ba 'ang dag papa yang du chud par byed pa' ma la brgyan pa'angs 'i nyis ma pa'adan
452b1(dkon brtsegs): // smra smra nga sa rgyu par byu rgyu mam
452b2(dkon brtsegs): ga byu ban pa gam mas thagang par ma nga/ ma zad la byang chub sas pa dpa mas dpa' can pa 'byung
452b3(dkon brtsegs): dba'is gnas pa'i snga lngas ni gang kyang gsum gyi mang chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mdzal su bur gyur la/ rin pa che bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang du mam las
452b4(dkon brtsegs): par brtan pa mthong // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'i sngasbas ni/ bdag med dpa' zhings
452b5(dkon brtsegs): cha dang / go chas pa thags nas pas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul bar mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sem dpa'
452b6(dkon brtsegs): ma ban pa'i sngags ni grags pas nas rlung gi dkyil 'khar ba na sa rnams cad dang ldan pa'i sa dkyil 'khor rjen pa lam thog sa chags kyang mang natra 'thangar bar mdzang
452b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rags kyi bu la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rten pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sel pa'i skalas ni ldan thams cad kyis brtan pa'i bud med kyis mag
452b8(dkon brtsegs): la me tog cam pa ka'i 'thong ba 'dags par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'i snga las ni
453a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzing bu them skas bzhi dang ldan pa gser gyi bye ma brdal pa dag pa med cing dang la/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yangs su gang ba me rtag
453a2(dkon brtsegs): ud la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar bas brgyar pa'i chu mthong ste/ de la bdag nyid rtse dga' yongs su spyad par mthong ngo / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
453a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa badran pa'i snga las ni phyogs g.yas g.yon gnyis na sems can dmyal ba'i g.yangs mthang na/ de nas padas
453a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma sbas ma rnams par slar ldog pa mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa'i snga lngas ni
453a5(dkon brtsegs): zag pa gnyis na ri dgas kyi rgyal ba seng ge ral pa can cad pan thags pa gcan gzan bla ma thams cad skrag par byed cing 'dug par mtha dang / rigs kyi bu de la
453a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i sngags ni 'khar las sbyar ba'i rgyal ba mthang ste/ skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgyas
453a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams sangs sa panas las na padu 'ab 'dun pa nga
453a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub pas ma pa' thal ba dpa' can pa'i thang dumamam pa pa'i mi 'acwa pa'i ma na bzhin gshegs pa ma sa// ya ga gas
453b1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa gang ba/ rnangs pa zla ba khrag zag pa rgya snang zag dums yangs sa bzar cang / mdum gyis bzlas nas cham ldan pa mthangs/ rigs pa zas bcub
453b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu'i snga las yin no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa
453b3(dkon brtsegs): sa dang pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa la ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin
453b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gnan to// sa gsum pa la ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa bzhi pa la ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa lnga pa la ni bas
453b5(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnan to// sa drug pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa gnon to// sa bdun pa la ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnan /
453b6(dkon brtsegs): sa brgyad pa la ni sman lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnan ta// sa dgu pa la ni stobs kyi pha ral tu phyin pa gnon to// sa bcu pa la ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu zin pa gnan na/
453b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang po ni rin po che yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzung ste skye
453b8(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa gnyis pa gnas pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni rab tu mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'ang
454a1(dkon brtsegs): / su bzung ste gyur/ sems bskyed pa bani pan byar me ldag pa'i 'dzin gyis mangs su bzungs m+bar/ sems bskyed pa lnga ba ni rin pa kyim mdzag ma
454a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung sde skye'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni don
454a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngangon tu bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su
454a4(dkon brtsegs): bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni ye shes skar mda'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
454a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung ste skye'o// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
454a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la khyad par gyi byin gyi brlabs shes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa gnyis pa la gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya
454a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzungs skye'o// sa gsum pa la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa bzhi pa la gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzung skye'o// sa lnga pa la yon tan sna tshogs nas
454a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i gzung rtsi'o// sadrug pa la me shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sman ma zhes bya ba'i gzung ste'o// sa bdun pa la khyad par dra 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i gzung bya'o// ma brjod
454b1(dkon brtsegs): ma la ma ma [ऽ]
454b2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gra sa dang bathams pa cang pa sa thabs sa rnam / cas rnams kham
454b3(dkon brtsegs): sa ma ma rnams sa sangs rgyas kya pa dang/ yan tan mams cad bsgrub par gyur par mtshar// batsham 'an sa thos pa 'phrul pa/
454b4(dkon brtsegs): 'drar na gang thar ba de bzhin de/ lha'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thas ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byi
454b5(dkon brtsegs): ldog par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum phyir mi lhag pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs
454b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos pa yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyi rna lam du yang grag par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos btsam
454b7(dkon brtsegs): byas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum dag sug pa'i bsam pa mangs su dag cing sangs rgyas mthang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang ma 'bral bar ju
454b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ma #'i ma sa ma sa sa
455a1(dkon brtsegs): bdang smad pa dang skal 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur// nyi ma'i dzag snang ba'i gzungs dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i thag snang ba'i gzungs
455a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ma 'phrul bar 'gyur/ kun nas spang ba thams cad rnam par gnan pa sgrub pa'i gzungs dang me 'bral bar 'gyur/ da ji ltar sra zhing brtan pa'i ri rnam par 'jam
455a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ brjod du med pa'i don bstan pa la yang dag gzhol ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshig dang spyod pa dang sna thams
455a4(dkon brtsegs): sma la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'jal bar 'gyur/ rnams pa'i da kyil dzam med pa'i bsgrub pa'i phyag rgyas btapa pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
455a5(dkon brtsegs): 'am sa sa \u0f7f ma na
455a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul nas chos ston tsa// chos nyid las kyang mig yo la/ 'gro ba yang med 'ang ba yang med do// sems can rnams yongs su ston par byed kyang sem
455a7(dkon brtsegs): can da migs pa yang med du// chos pan kyang la ga mnyam pa nyid las gal pa med// 'phe' ba dang skye bsamakyang 'bra ba yang med skye ba yang medade// chas thamasas
455a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa ma pa'i thar/ 'ang byed rnams gang gyi bsangs jam gang nam 'ang tha yang ma gyur ma mas carnamams 'di ba gang pa na/ byang chub
455b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bum gang gis mi smra ba chos la bzad pa zab par gyur te// sems can chad med pa rnams kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
455b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa bla bras mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de
455b3(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / dge sdang de dag dang / lha'i bu seng gtag gi 'ad gzer snang ba thogs pa med pa dang / lha dang mi dang lda ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/
455b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsnyad do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/
455b5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mi zad pas nus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi bsartsa lnga pa rdzogs ste/ rgya gar gyi mkhan pa su ren+d+ra po de dang / zhu chen gyi los ba ban de ye shes
455b6(dkon brtsegs): sdes nas tI gtan la bab pa// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong zag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa ste/
455b7(dkon brtsegs): gtsug na rin po che nus pa/ bam po dang po'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ranUT pa ri pring+ga/ na ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gtsug
455b8(dkon brtsegs): na rin po ches nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
456a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi brang po'i ri la/ dge slong
456a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bcugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan
456a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par bral ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba
456a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam grol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam
456a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa brgyad khri ba ni snod dang yang thabs cig ste/ thams
456a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang ste ba gtsug gis thags pa dbang bskur ba zab pa/ dpa' bar 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ pad+ma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zab pa/
456a7(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor cing nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse ma'i dpung rgyan gyi nying de 'dzin gyis rnam par rim pa/ rdo ji la bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tun
456a8(dkon brtsegs): payan tan 'byung gnas btang ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa shin tu gtan la thebs pa/ sangs rgyam mchis thams can mngan tu gyur pa/ byang chub kyi snang par
456b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnal pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa/ mi zad pas bstan pa'i gzungs rab tupa
456b2(dkon brtsegs): thams can thams cad kyi dbang ba chem par byed pa'i srabs par ba tuzab pa/ mi 'jigs pa me ga'i sapas kyis 'bar thams cad gnan pa la sa ngas pa
456b3(dkon brtsegs): tshig bstan pa la snang bas ngan yang par bsal ba'i bar du lung snyan pa/ gzugs kyi mtshan bzang bas legs par brgyan pa/ 'dus pa ngan pa'i chags pa
456b4(dkon brtsegs): tshal rgol ba yang dag par rab tra btsam pa/ grags pa dang brjod pa'i sgra mthun pa phyogs bskur grags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags
456b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bkur ba/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dpag tu med pa las byung ba/
456b6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya skang grangs med par shin tu snang ba byas pa/ sems can thams cad rkyenan mangs pa'i nad yangs su shes nas/ sa sa kyi rin
456b7(dkon brtsegs): bar chos kyi sran gtung ba/ rgyun las byung ba'i chas zab cing gting dpa ga dka' ba la 'jug cing mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa dang / zag pa dang car pa
456b8(dkon brtsegs): yangs su sangs pa dge ba dag cing dri ma med pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yangs su dag pa sems can thams cad yangs su smin par bya bas
457a1(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba dang / kun rig pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/ rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba/ sems dpa' zhing brtan la rdo rje ltar mi byed pa/
457a2(dkon brtsegs): dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu dang / gzungs dang / smon lam la rab tu yang dag par zhugs pa/
457a3(dkon brtsegs): yan tan dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i blo namakha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs rnam par
457a4(dkon brtsegs): lha zhes bya ba dang / rtag tu rnam par lha dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen tho ba dang / seng ge dang / seng ge blo gros dang / seng ge'i skabasu 'gro ba dang / sa
457a5(dkon brtsegs): ge'i snga mngon bsgrags dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / rdo rjes rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom
457a6(dkon brtsegs): pas rnam par gnon dang / 'jig rten gsum gom pas rnam par gnon dang / mig bzangs dang / pad+ma mig dang / pad+ma bkod pa dang / rin po che bkod pa dang spobs
457a7(dkon brtsegs): bachen pa dang / mthab che dang / rin can 'khar ba dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / yon tan gyi rgyal ba snang dang / bka pa'i
457a8(dkon brtsegs): bzung dang / bsang pa'i rgyal pa dang / yang gnyis rnam par 'joms dang / blag gi snang bas brgyan dang / nam mkha' mdzad dang / dbyangs dang / sman dbyangasas/
457b1(dkon brtsegs): darma du / dbyas rnam par dag du/ rnam par dag pa'i thazas dang / bzang kyang la zhugs pa skyes bungs pa bcunag dang / 'jam dpal 'azugs pa zang drub
457b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'ad ba med pa drug cu dang / sras kyi snang po che la sngags pa dag pa'i sems can sum su ca gnyis dang / byams pa la sngags pa thams cad kyang bskal ba bzang brje/
457b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba sha stag go// lha'i bu bdud las rgyal dang / lha'i bu dga' ba bkod pa dang / zhwa'i bu tshangs rab dang / bzang por
457b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang / rgyal ba dang / rgyal ba'i blo gras dang / rab tu e ning dral ba'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu legs par sems pa dang / de dag la sogs pa thams sa
457b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu stag phrag nyi shu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po ban+d+ha byin dang / mi mjed kyi dang
457b6(dkon brtsegs): po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu ded dpon dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / de dag dang gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
457b7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa du ma dang / yang thabs cig go// de na bcom ldan 'das bkad pa chen po'i seng
457b8(dkon brtsegs): ze'i khril bzhugs te/ 'bar brgya blang du mas yangs su bskur cing mdun gyis bzlas nas chos snyan te/ seng ga lngar ni glegs nim lngar ni lan ne/ zla ba
458a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar ni lham me/ sbon ma ltar ni 'bar/ brgya byin ltar ni lhang ngo nge/ tshangs pa ltar ni lhag ge/ rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus nas ri rab ltar ni 'phags te/ 'khor chen
458a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i dbus su gshegs nas chos ston pa ni tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/
458a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la brtsams
458a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa la spyod par 'gyur ba yang dag par rab tu ston to// yang de'i tshe shar phyogs
458a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
458a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas yangs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba daskrun bcugs te/ mtsha tshang gnas la chos kyang ldan pa de'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
458a7(dkon brtsegs): bgacug na rin po che nas b+hA ba byang chub sems dpa' brgya sa dang / lhan cig tu lta dang / kU dang / gnang sani dang dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / namakha' lnga'i dang ma'am che /
458a8(dkon brtsegs): sgo phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya spang mang bas yongs su bska cing mdun tu bdang te/ 'jig rten gyi khas legs par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jis
458b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams ma mjed 'dir gnas par gyur te// detshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas rin pa che'i gdugs gcig gis gang gsum gyi snang chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
458b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byam / medag khadag dum bdag snga chags dag gis snang gsum gyi mang chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khengs par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jigazhin nyid du dus
458b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sums/ gang gis sdug bsngal mtha' yang bzang byas shing / btul zhugs brtan pas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa/ drang srang chen ze
