458b4(dkon brtsegs): shaka thub sus mthong ba// lha mi rnams kyis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed// gang ga'i bye snyed byang chub sems dpa' mang // brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis phyir bor te/
458b5(dkon brtsegs): stong zag bye ba'i bdud rnams rab btul nas// byang chub rdul bral mya ngan med pa thab// 'gro ba kun gyi gso bo bsnyen bkur bar// shar phyags lags kyi mchog gi
458b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khams// legs par sprul nas spyad pa langs dag pa'i// rgyal ba'i thang nas bdag ni 'dir mchis so// su dag chos kyi gtam rnams nyan pa dang // byam
458b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang // rkang gnyis gas pa de yang balnga 'ad pa// de dag bya rgod phrang bar myur du shog/ 'dren pa mthong ba shin tu rnyed par dka'/
458b8(dkon brtsegs): ni ba'i chos kyang thos par shin tu dka'// ngal 'byor mir skye shin tu rnyed par dka'// tshul khrims dad pa'ang rtag tu rnyed par dka'// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa bcun
459a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du// bde 'dod gang zhig bsod nams mi byed na// mya ngan 'das nas des ni ci bya yis// nga ni rgyal ba'i drung der 'dod bya// gang dag ngan 'gro
459a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spangs nas ni/ lha mi nang du bde ba thob pa dang // mya ngan 'das tho ba bde bar 'gyur 'dod pa// mtshungs med de yi gan du de dag deng// de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud
459a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsi sbyin/ de ni ded dpon mchog gi lam mtshan pa// de ni chos rgyal rin chen dam pa 'chang // de ni sems car kun gyi rten dang dpung // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
459a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po gtsug na rin po ches tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di dag smras nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang dbyangs kyis go bar
459a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos te/ thos nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dis
459a6(dkon brtsegs): bu'i don dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang nas byung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bus shar phyogs lags su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
459a7(dkon brtsegs): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya snang zag dgu bcurtsa gnyis 'das na/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya ba zhig yad de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa
459a8(dkon brtsegs): dam btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba da war mazhugs te/ 'tsha mong zhes la chos kyang ldan pa de'i/
459b1(dkon brtsegs): gan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa gtsug na rin pa che zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyang sang dang baHsa te/ ngal pa / kha dang / b+hUH
459b2(dkon brtsegs): bcan bkur bya ba dang / dwags bas nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang blta ba'i phyir lha dang / klu dang / gnad sbyin dang /
459b3(dkon brtsegs): dri ba dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / sgro 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya snong mang bas yongs su bkar cing mdun du bad nas/
459b4(dkon brtsegs): rnga ni rab du brdud/ me tog gi char ni 'bebs/ 'ad gzer ni 'byin/ lhung gsum gyi sang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni g.yo bar byed cing / byang chub sa
459b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi kham
459b6(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed 'dir byin te// ro'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa gtsug na rin pa tshe dus sems can bag med pa rnams yang dag par bskul
459b7(dkon brtsegs): pa thar/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// shA ri'i bu tshigs su babad pa 'di dag gis snang gsum gyi nga chen
459b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams go par byas nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
460a1(dkon brtsegs): po gtsug na rin po che byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong mang po de dag dang lhan gcig tu lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
460a2(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong du maMs yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ rnga ni rab tu brdung / me tog gi
460a3(dkon brtsegs): char ni 'bebs/ 'od gzer ni 'byin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni g.yo bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byung /
460a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'a/
460a5(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'
460a6(dkon brtsegs): ldi dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ phyogs/
460a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches 'di skad gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi/
460a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yangs su dag par rab tu gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gnad pa chung ngam// mang bzhung nga/
460b1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyad pa yang ngam/ 'tsha'am/ skabs dang bde bar rig pa la gnas snam zhes snyun gsal la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cang byang chub sems dpa
460b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa langs su dag pa mnyan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa yongs su dag par dang
460b3(dkon brtsegs): la gnas na/ shin tu mthar phyin pa dang / shin tu grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba dang / shin tu yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de dag bag chags
460b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe mtshams sbyar bar 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kun du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi spyad pa yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad kyi sem
460b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyad pa rab tu 'chal bar 'gyur ba dang / rtswa stod pa'i mtshan nyid rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes kyi spyod pas 'ad
460b6(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi spyod pa rnams par sbyong par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi spyod pas sems can mi mthun par spyad pa la gnas pa rnams yang
460b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i chos kyi nan tan lams par bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la kha na ma tha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / bam
460b8(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag la bdud thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nad ltar
461a1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba la sgrib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi spyod pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pas
461a2(dkon brtsegs): rig par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis leg
461a3(dkon brtsegs): par bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsa
461a4(dkon brtsegs): to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i dpe tsam
461a5(dkon brtsegs): cung zad cig bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan
461a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyad pa yongs su dag pa ni 'di bzhi ste/ gci gang zhe na/
461a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di sas par ladu phyin pa'i spyad pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi thugs kyi chos kyi spyad pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i spyad pa mang
461a8(dkon brtsegs): ma dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i srung pa yongs su dag pa se/ rigs kyi za bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang spyad pa 'ang
461b1(dkon brtsegs): rungag par rnas par sa tu tsunA pa'i byung ba yangs su dag pa ni kun tu bstan pa' mams la mkhas par khang du chud par bya'o// byang chub kyi thugs kyi chos kyi spyod na
461b2(dkon brtsegs): mangs su dag pa ni/ lam sa pa'i ma gos la mkhas par khang du chud par bya'o// mngon par shes bsgrub pa'i smad pa yongs su dag pa ni bsam gtan la sems
461b3(dkon brtsegs): mas su rung ba'i ma shes la mkhas par khang du chud par bya'o// sems can yangs su smin par bya ba'i spyad pa yongs su dag pa ni snying rje chen pos thug pa'i dran
461b4(dkon brtsegs): gtan pa'i ye shes las mkhas par khang du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa yongs su dag pa
461b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa yongs su dgu pa'o// drug po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang //
461b6(dkon brtsegs): brtsor 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so// rigs kyi bu de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
461b7(dkon brtsegs): pa spyad pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gser sna'i dri mas kun tu kres pa'i sems sel ba dang / tong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sems 'phel ba
461b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / de ser sna'i dri ma bsal te/ gtong ba'i sems la gnas nas/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems la nas so// de sbyin pa sbyin pa
462a1(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa bzhi mi byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can tha dad du mi byed pa dang / chos tha dad pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba tha dad pa dang / bsam pa tha dad du ma
462a2(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de la ji ltar na sems tha dad du mi byed ce na/ 'di la ni sbyin 'di la ni mi sbyin/ 'di la ni mang du sbyin/ 'di la ni nyung ngu sbyin/ 'di la ni bzang po sbyin/ 'di la ni ngan pa sbyin//
462a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni rtag du sbyin/ 'di la ni rtag tu mi sbyin/ 'di la ni bsti srang du byas te sbyin/ 'di la ni bsti sang du byas te me sbyin/ 'di la ni thams cad sbyin/ 'di la ni thams cad ma
462a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin/ 'di la ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ 'di la ni tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa/ 'di la ni sbyin pa'i gnas/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i nas ma yin/ 'di la byin na sbyin pa rnam par
462a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'gyur/ 'dis ni rnas par dag par mi 'gyur/ 'di ni yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'di ni lag par zhugs pa zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar gang 'di lta bu'i sem
462a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba grang zhing mnyam pa nyid dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / mi mtho ma dma' ba dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / yang dag par sbyar ba dang / mtshungs
462a7(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa dang / tshungs par byams pa dang / tshungs par snying rje ba dang / bye brag med pa dang / nam mkha' dang chungs par 'gyur ba de ni sems can tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya
462a8(dkon brtsegs): de la 'i sar na tshas pa dang du mi byed ce na/ gang chos sba bar 'gyur ba de drag la ni tsam/ gang chos ma yin pa rtsa bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni mi sbyin no nam du sems mi bskyed de/
462b1(dkon brtsegs): mams cadas ma babang rab namatsun pa sbyin / mas b+ha ba rnams na man pa' gram duldan pa maston/ 'phags pa nams namachen pa'o zhes tsun pam
462b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi byings rang bzhin gyis mnyam ste/ bye brag med pas sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di ni chos bdad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar yangs su bsngo ba tha dang du mi byed pa ma gang
462b3(dkon brtsegs): thur pa byin pa'i dge ba'i ma bde brgya byin zab par mi bas/ tshangs parngub ma yin rgyal ba'i srid dang / tshang dpan dang / khyim bdag dang / gzugs dang / langs smra dang /
462b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang drug dpa lag 'dud par maman/ srid pa'i 'gra bams cad du 'chi'ab bdag skye ba'i skye gnas rnams su dge pa'i rtsa ba de 'ang sasu ma ba'o// nyan thas kyi rig
462b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mam rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par ma yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yangs su mi dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gzhan du ma sngo ba 'di ni phra ba tha dad pa
462b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa zhes bya'ode la ji ltar na sbyin pa sbyin pa na bsam pa tha dad du mi byed ce na/ bsam pa mnyam pa/ sbyor ba mnyam pa/ rnam par smin pa la mi re ba/ pha rol la byas pa'i
462b7(dkon brtsegs): lan re ba med pa/ g.yo med pa dang / sgyu med pas sems theg pas shin tu yongs su btang ba'i bla sems 'gyod pa med pa/ gnas gsum du dad pa thob ste/ sbyin na snyam pa dang /
462b8(dkon brtsegs): phyin par byed pa byin mas/ dad parab tu zab pa 'dzin pasam pa tha dang pa ma yin zhes byal/ rigs kyi bu ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyin btsun pa mams pa 'i ni
463a1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i rkang pa dang pa la/ de lta ba brgyad yongs su dag par sbyin
463a2(dkon brtsegs): basbyin par byed de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdag tu lta ba yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu ltar
463a3(dkon brtsegs): dang chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/ lta ba brgyad po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de bag la
463a4(dkon brtsegs): rgal ba bzhi yongs su dag par spangs nas/ sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi bag la nyal dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi bag la nyal dang / rang sangs
463a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos kyi bags nyal dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i bag la nyal te/ dag la nyal ba bzhi po de dag yang sa spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin byed de/ de 'du shes pa na mas/
463a6(dkon brtsegs): grangs nas sbyin pasten par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag par 'du shes dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / gtsang mar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa ste/ 'du shes pa ni
463a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de rnam pa bzhi yang su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / sems
463a8(dkon brtsegs): mang sa dag padas bsam pa ma su dag pa sa/ rnam pa pani dag sangs su sbyin ba ston par byeng // dachags pa gsulas shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/
463a9(dkon brtsegs): ngag yongasu dag pa dang /
463b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang nam rnam par ldan pa 'a chags dang / 'byud pa la chags pa dang / theg pa dman par bya brgyags pas/ gsum pa de dgas pa shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byan
463b2(dkon brtsegs): de 'jigs pa sum las shin du'adas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum ga zhen/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'jigs pa dang / blo sems kyis 'jigs pa dang / bdud skyes
463b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'jigs pa ste/ sum pa de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de rgya bzhis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nang snang pa nyid kyis rgyas
463b4(dkon brtsegs): btab pa dang / bye stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / byang chub stong ba nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ste/ rgya bzhi po de dag gis pa/
463b5(dkon brtsegs): nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed nga/ de bcan 'grus bcom pa bzhi dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bani gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i brdzun
463b6(dkon brtsegs): 'as brtsam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chas thams cad mangs su sgrub pa'i bcan 'grus tsam pa dang / mtshan dang dab byung bzang ba yangs su rdzogs par byed pa'i brjon
463b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus tsam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i brtson 'grus tsam pa ste/ btsun 'grus rtsom pani pa de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do//
463b8(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra ba zhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang / sangs rgyas mthang ba dran pa dang / byams pa chen badren
464a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spangs pa dran pa ste/ dran pazhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de 'khor sum yangs
464a2(dkon brtsegs): su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gis 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi 'khor yongs dag
464a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ 'khor sum po de dag yongs su dag par smin pa sbyin par byed do// de shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhis yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ ba ni gang zhe na/ sbyin pa
464a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sgyu ma'i chos su so sor rtog pa shes yongs su dag pa dang / bsngo ba
464a5(dkon brtsegs): las sar rtag pa shes pa yongs su dag pa ste/ shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag kyis yongs su dag pa sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
464a6(dkon brtsegs): zhaba' de lta bu'i chos la zhugs de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa shin tu yangasu dag par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
464a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/
464a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yangs su dag pa ni rnam pa cig ste/ rnam pacig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sem
464b1(dkon brtsegs): da sa pa ya bzlas sa/ dz+nyAn mangs man pa' mams 'jig tan mam ldam sa cad lam mchag du zag+sa 'phags pa'i sems/ nyananas nga
464b2(dkon brtsegs): margyas rnams cad zil thal gnon pa'i sems/ bdud thams cad 'dus bu'i sems/ las dang / na mngos pa'i slob pa thams cad yangs su zad par byed pa
464b3(dkon brtsegs): thams sems can thams cad skal ba'i sems/ man tan rin pa che dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sems de nyid mi 'dor zhing srung ba dang / sbed pa dang /
464b4(dkon brtsegs): brjed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha ral tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa cig go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byung
464b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa nyes te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'dab zhe
464b6(dkon brtsegs): grags pa med pa dang / sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi bsam pa'i tshul khrims zhal mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis sa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa
464b7(dkon brtsegs): chug khrims kyi pa rab tu phyin pa yangs su dag pa rnams pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus kyi gnad pa thams cad bsal bas lus sa sru /
464b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhag spangs dang / ngag gi skyon thams cad bsal bas ngag yangs su dag pa dang / 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rdzo//
465a1(dkon brtsegs): babs 'bras sums sdu ngag sa 'dun nus pa phru ga dasas du byung chub sas ba rgyu khyam pa rgyu bar 'du ldan du 'byung ba yang spangs pa
465a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srab pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / sgrub pa yang dag par bzung ba mnyam pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongasu sun
465a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ston pa bzhin du gus par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa
465a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga pa ste/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag la mi sdod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / ma bslab pa la mi brnyes pa dang / nyan thos kyi sem la mi
465a5(dkon brtsegs): bdang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'dad pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa lngal/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha ral tu phyin pa'i spyad pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa drug
465a6(dkon brtsegs): s+t+waM rnam pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srab pa las mi 'da' bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims la 'gyod pa med pas/ chos rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas
465a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bzlapa pA la dz+nyAn pas dge 'dun rdzas su dran pa dang / na zlas pa thams cad yangs su spang bas gtang ba rjes su dran pa dang / sme ba thams cad la minus pa tshul bris rjes su
465a8(dkon brtsegs): tha ma ma mags par byed sadu pay-i namam ga gi/ rinas kyi ba byang chub ma 'gas kyi rgyas
465b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang sa dag pa rnam pa bdun ste/ rnam pa bdun gang zhen/ 'dis ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang / bdag nyid dbang du byas ste/ dra cha shes pa dang /
465b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad mang na sum du byas te// khrel yad pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pas des pa dang/ 'jig rten par 'asmra ban
465b3(dkon brtsegs): mtho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rnam par 'tshe ba med pa dang / sems kyis yongs su gdung ba nye bar zhi bas mkhan tu 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bdun no// rigs kyi bu byang
465b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad de/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos
465b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas kha gsag med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis mchog shes pas thob kyis 'jal ba mi byed pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis yo byad bsad
465b6(dkon brtsegs): pas 'bags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yangs su rdzogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi gtang bas lus la mi lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos yangs 'dzin pa
465b7(dkon brtsegs): srog 'ami lta ba dang / 'dra 'ji spang bas cig pun dga' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos kyi dga' ba lams pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par ba
465b8(dkon brtsegs): do/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa dgu ste/ rnam pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun nas
466a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu po rnams 'dul ba dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu po rnams las shin tu 'da' ba dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms pa
466a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dgu po rnams kyi rtsa ba yongs su spyod pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pas sems ni dang / sems las su rung bas zhi nas kyi tshogs kun tu 'tshal ba dang / cho ga dang chu/
466a3(dkon brtsegs): mas dang lnga ba rnams pa las shin tu 'das pas ma ldong ba dang / theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad lam bsdu ba dang / tshul khrims la spyan med pas shin
466a4(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas sems phyed pa ste 'di ni rnam pa dgu'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa 'a/
466a5(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa rnams pa bcu ste/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las rnam par rab bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / ya
466a6(dkon brtsegs): ma rnas ma dag pa dang / gas b+hU nga rdzas gang 'as pa yang ban pasal pa dang byu nga/ bslab pa rnams cad dang mi 'dal ba dang /
466a7(dkon brtsegs): spyo ba'i dngos pa sa thabs das sug pa nga / rus zhing ca shes kyi pa'i tshar/ sems sa rmod pa yan pa dang / bdag nyid med pas thams rnas
466a8(dkon brtsegs): nang byung ba dang / de rgya ma pas sbyin paganas mam la dung cing phyag 'tsham pa dang / srog ga dbang bar ches drang du da kyis/ 'jig tan na thang ba mdun/
466b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu / mas bstug/ gas kyi bu gzhan gang byang chub sems dpa rnams pargyag khrims kyi par na/ khyen pa byung ba yongs su dag rnam pa sa
466b2(dkon brtsegs): ma pa ga bzhan/ 'dzin na/ mam dang sa she du pa dang / rdzas pa'i rdul rnam pan zag pa stor yang mi dran pa dang / sa nam dzang pa ladun ba
466b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal man mam thams cad la snyam 'ad par nub pa ste/ 'din rnam pa gnyis pa// dbas kyi bgazhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i nal khrims kyi par 'i tu na pa
466b4(dkon brtsegs): pasangs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'dig ste/ nad rnam par dag pas skyes mche rnam par dag pa dang / bya rnam par dag pas yul mas cad smras pa'o// dgas
466b5(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis byang /
466b6(dkon brtsegs): chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid de/ gnyis po de dag go/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sos dpa'i tshul khrim
466b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ dag rigs kyi bu 'dab drang
466b8(dkon brtsegs): sems pa'i das yongs su dag sa/ 'di ltar gzhi yang slar mi gshe'o// lus yongs su dag pas brdegs cing slar mi brdeg go// sems yongs su dag pas thos kyang sngar/
467a1(dkon brtsegs): // mi khrob// lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas tshig par byas kyang spang ma tshigs go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems la lta ba'i /
467a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis rgyas sam/ ngan tu brjod pa'i tshig gi 'amathos kyang mi gna'o// 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba'i phyir lag pa dang bang ba dang / dbyig pas brdegs kyang khang zag/
467a3(dkon brtsegs): mi'agyur ro// byung chub thun tu bsrung ba'i phyir yan lag dang 'di lag bcad kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bsdu ba'i dngos pa'i
467a4(dkon brtsegs): bub ni pa'i bying mang pal mi gsheg// byang chub kyi lam gyis nye bar brtan phyir de dag 'a byams pa nye bar smyung ba// smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de dag pa ni
467a5(dkon brtsegs): rje bskyed do// bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ gang srong yang de la phan par sems shing snying rje dang ldan de/ byang chub kyi yan lag du nges par
467a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing bzod do// stobs
467a7(dkon brtsegs): ses sa rnags par byab byed/ byang chub rdzasas dran zhing bab nga// dus bum la chags pa med da'i migs mthang ba sangs su rdzogs pa bya ba byang sag+sa
467a8(dkon brtsegs): lam yang ma rdzogs par byang tshong pa dab yang parnapa sa ya ba // ldan pa se mas dgas pa
467b1(dkon brtsegs): bras du mdang ma ba gad pa rnas su dran nyung ba dang // ma 'gas pa yang sa su rnags par bya 'i byed de dge bstos pa rnam sa nga da bab nga/ sa
467b2(dkon brtsegs): sa cangs 'du pa 'byong steg tsug d+har ma snang brjes su dran 'a bzed pa// 'jig rten thams nang pol kyis mngon pa'i byor/ mam dang babyang bdang ba
467b3(dkon brtsegs): ngas dran zhing bzod do// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes myang ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su dra zhing bzod do// rigs
467b4(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa ni stobs gnyis kyis yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sa so rtog pa'i stobs dang sgom pa'i stobs so//
467b5(dkon brtsegs): de la gang lus sems langs te bzod pa ni so sor rtog pa'i stobs so// gang chos thams cad lanas te bzod pa ni sgom pa'i stabs so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
467b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni gang / sems can thams cad la bdag med pas bzod cing / chos sethams cad bden par
467b7(dkon brtsegs): bzod de/ gang ces thams cad la mi bzong po ri ni brjod pa yongs su dag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la di dam par gang bzong ba'am/ mi bzod pa chos
467b8(dkon brtsegs): med do// gang chos thams cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ chos khas len pa la bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// gang chos thams
468a1(dkon brtsegs): / cad la zhum pa med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ zhum pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de'i badz+ra
468a2(dkon brtsegs): pa deb bzod pa yangs su dag pa ste/ badzin pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med de// gang la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / ches med pa ra
468a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa yongs su dag pas/ bdag dang sems can dang chos la rnas pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dngapa
468a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzod pa yong su dag pa dang / chos thams cad nga/
468a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gnyis po de dag go// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa yongs su dag par/
468a6(dkon brtsegs): dgas kyi bri sa byang chu mams dpa'i brtson 'grus gi rol tu phyin pa'i snod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhen/ gang byang chub kyi sems mi gting ba dgas pa dang /
468a7(dkon brtsegs): dges pam khyen pa zhum pa med pa/ rtsom pas me la ga/ dge bangartsa ba la sags pa la mi gzhan sa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag pas phy-ir mi ldog pa/
468a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa 'angs su tshol ba la badzin pa/ thathams cad son par rtsom pa/ rnasathams cad yongs su dzin pa la sla'o// mdzod sbyin chen pa las sgrum pa/
468b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams sangs pa sten pa yangs sum stug/ rangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par snang brdeg pa man pa las she 'da' ba na ma bas pa yangs
468b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed pa/ smin pa dang / tshul khrims thos pa'i tshogs stsogs pa/ sngon gyi bsod nams bsngags pa/ chud mi ston pa/ nga rgyal med pas sems cam ma
468b3(dkon brtsegs): cing la ma gro bya'i tshig byed pa ste/ 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi bya'o// de yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la mig yong dang gzugs brnyan du shes
468b4(dkon brtsegs): ba tshig la brjod du meng par shes pa/ sems la shin du nye bar zhi bar shes pa/ zad pa shes pa/ rnam par rig pa/ zad pa shes pa rab tu shes pa/ mi skye ba shes pa/
468b5(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa'o// de rtsom pa gsum las rnam par grol bar rtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ nas pa'i rtsom pa dang / dmigs pa'i rlom pa dang / yongs su
468b6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'i rlom pa ste/ gsum po de dag go// de chags pa gsum la mi chags par brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gsum gang zhe na dmigs dang / gzugs dang /
468b7(dkon brtsegs): mig gi rnam par shes pa la ma tshigs pa/ rna ba dang sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ sna dang dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ sre da
468b8(dkon brtsegs): ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi chag pa/ lus dang reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ yid dang chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags
469a1(dkon brtsegs): / bgo/ de 'dzin pa med cing dong ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas sbyin pa ma len/ ser sna ma 'dang/ tshul khrims mi len/ 'chal pa'i rgya
469a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'do bzod pa ma lam/ gnod sems pa 'dod/ brtson 'grus mi len/ le lo ma 'di/ bas mnyan ma len/ g.yeng ba ma 'dod// shes rab mi len/ 'tshal pa'i
469a3(dkon brtsegs): dab mi 'dzu/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge bam 'dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma len/ na rdzas dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma 'dong ro// ldan pa med ci
469a4(dkon brtsegs): pas gnyis yongs su dag brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de la gnyis gang zhe na/ gang nang gi kun tu ldang las dmigs pa kun tu ldang ba dang / phyi rol tu rnam par
469a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba de ni gces zhes bya'o// de la gnyis yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang nang nye bar zhi bas phyi rol tu ma d+hU ba dang / spros pa med ste/
469a6(dkon brtsegs): ni ga sa sangs su dag pa zhes bya'o// gang rgyub med cing ma spros pa smras pa med pa'i badzin 'grus d-i lta bu de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ban 'grus kyi pa ral du
469a7(dkon brtsegs): pa snang pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang bsam ga na gyis/
469a8(dkon brtsegs): lag rnams yang dag par sgrub cing yang dag par bsgrubs nas// gsang rdzog pa dang / sa song rtags nas kyang skams par 'jug pa yin te/ de bas ma gtan byed kyang gajugs
469b1(dkon brtsegs): pa sa nga pag na da ngam gan byed pang tshang pa lam pan/ 'dugs pa mdzum 'du byed namag lam lam/ rnam par shes pa la gnas te// ma ga na
469b2(dkon brtsegs): thasam btan byed kyang mig la gnas te/ bsam gtanam byed pasam gtan byed kyang rnam lags te/ bsam gtan ma byed/ sA la ma yin/ yu la ma yin/ lus lam yin/ yidas
469b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma ni byed // de bsam gan byed kyang gzugs la nas te bsam gtan mi byeng/ sgra'am yin/ dril ma yin/ rol ma yon/ reg bya ma 'im chos pazlas te
469b4(dkon brtsegs): gnam byed do// bsam gtan byed kyang lus su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed de/ bsam gtan byed kyang sems su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te bsams
469b5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bzhin du chu la ma yin// rlung la ma yin/ nam mkha' la gnas de bsam gan mi byed do// de bsam gan
469b6(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang rtsa lam yin/ nyim lam yin/ brgya byin lam yin/ tshangs pa la yin/ skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas de bsam gtan ma byed do// 'dod pa'i khams lagan
469b7(dkon brtsegs): sa gam byed // gzugs kyi khams la ma man/ gzugs med pa'i khams pa gnas bsam gtan ma byeng // de sa gan byed kyang 'jig
469b8(dkon brtsegs): sa la ga nim rgya/ 'a na pa sa sa te bsam gnam byeng // de babam gan byed kyang mi mtha me ma' ba sa migs pa gra
470a1(dkon brtsegs): / gtanam byed do// dbas ma gtan byed byudag nye bar len pa'i la bAnas de bsam gnam byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can lam che/
470a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzog sas ma/ gas pa lam yin/ gang zag la yin/ las skyes pa'am yin/ shed branye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtanam byed do// de
470a3(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed byang chu par lta ga khas drangs te bas ma gtan mi byed // de bsam gtan byed kyang drug par lta bla ma yin/ 'byung bar lta ba la ma yin/ 'jig par
470a4(dkon brtsegs): mangs drangs te bsam gan mi byed do// de bsam gan byed kyang zag pa shin zad par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang sbyin med pa
470a5(dkon brtsegs): dug pa nga smras bu ba pa na sum byu d+ma byung bsam ga mabyung // de bsam ga byed byung du ngan ba 'dum byu 'i myong ngas ma ga ma
470a6(dkon brtsegs): sa da zung ma sgrub
470a7(dkon brtsegs): smre byung sasu byung sa
470a8(dkon brtsegs): sa su
470b1(dkon brtsegs): ga gas slong zhen pa'i byin gyi rlabs la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par sgrubs pa bsam gan du byed do/ des
470b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ sbyin ma chang ba med pa/ tshul khrims mtshang ba med pa/ bzang po mtshang ba med pa/ brten 'grus
470b3(dkon brtsegs): da nga med pa/ bsam ga nam dzad pa med ge shes rab ma chang ba med pa/ thabs ma nad pa med pa/ byabs pa chen po ma chad pa med pa/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / ba
470b4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms ma tshang ba med pa/ bden pa shes pa la 'jug pa mtshang ba med pa/ byang chub kyi sems sems can lta ba ma tshang ba med pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam
470b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyo ma chang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mthun pa ma tshang ba med pa/ dran pa dang shes bzhin ma tshang ba med pa/ dran pa nye bar
470b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan sa/
470b7(dkon brtsegs): brgyud pa ma tshang ba med pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ma tshang bu med pa/ sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa mtshang ba med pa/
470b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / khrel long pa ma tshang ba med pa/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cid dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa/
471a1(dkon brtsegs): // kyi tshul 'bar bas yang dag par bsdus pa/ dge 'dun gyi tshul yongs su sdud pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brdam
471a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrubs pas legs pade brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bsngos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ma
471a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'adi dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ mi 'jigs
471a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi la rab tu gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang rjes su 'thun pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ma 'dres pa/ bag chags kyi
471a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshams sbyong ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang ma bral ba/ sems can thams cad kyis rton par gyur pa/ rton pa pa bzhi thob pa/ 'dzi
471a6(dkon brtsegs): da 'jig na las das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid theg pa/ sems can thams cad ngas su sbyin par byed pasam snang ba/ rang bamakhas pa/ sems sa
471a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal sa pa/ mangs pa mas pa snang ba/ na bo las sbrul ga yin pa rnams pa ga cing nga/ rang bzhin gas te ba na 29
471a8(dkon brtsegs): mas pa sa kyis ze ba ma nganapa kyil pang gro/ las rgyas kyi sems ci sa pa dgas dzi
471b1(dkon brtsegs): byin gyi brlabs bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol pa med pa/ rang gi nga gis lung du ma snun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa/ bar zhi bas bsil/
471b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bar ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya'o// rigs
471b3(dkon brtsegs): k+Shi bu 'di lta ste dper na yongs su rtag pa bzung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad
471b4(dkon brtsegs): rim mkhan bzo tha dad pa bslab pa/ yan lag rnam par phye ba tha dad du bslabs par gyur te/ de la la la mi sa gcod pa mkhas 'dri ba la mi mkhas
471b5(dkon brtsegs): la ni gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas kyang yan lag dang nying lag la mi mkhas/ kha cig ni rkang lag 'dri ba la mkhas kyang / mig dang mgo dang rna ba 'drib
471b6(dkon brtsegs): la mi mkhas pa dag cig yin la/ rigs kyi du de ltar rnam pa tha dad bslabs pa/ yan lag rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslab pa/ gzugs tha dad du bslab
471b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag thams cad la/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ ras shig byin te khyed rnams kyis ras 'di la 'di gzugs
471b8(dkon brtsegs): te 'on gcig/ khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri mo bris shig/ de nas ri mo mkhan de dag tshogs nas/ ras de brgyangs pa las/ ri mo mkha ni de dag gi/
472a1(dkon brtsegs): / ma nas/ ri ma ma khan cig gcig yul gzhan zhig du song bar gyur la/ de nas ri mo mkhan phyi ma de dag kyis de la rgyal po'i gzugs bris na/ rigs kyi bu
472a2(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/ ri mo mkhan gcig po de'i lag tu ma blangs na/ ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so//
472a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na ji tsam du don dam par rig par bya ba'i phyir 'di dper byas te/ 'di'i don cing lta zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ri mo ma
472a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa de med na/ ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa de sred dang spyod pa ji snyed dang / brtson pa ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi
472a5(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam de dag las/ gal te rnam pa gcig ma bstan na yang rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin no// nam sangs rgyas kyi
472a6(dkon brtsegs): tshis rnams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par bdus shing lta ba dang / skyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa de'i spros pa thams cad lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni/ khyang
472a7(dkon brtsegs): sa dpa pa mas ca pa ba nga ldan pa snang pang yin// don pa 'dings par bshad pan byang chubasams g-i bad+had kyang gis rnam pa rnams cad kyi
472a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa gang ba sa pa pa ba tu thob gi/ sa pa tha gyi chung sems dpa' rabam tu phyin pa'i byung pa sangs su dag pa'o// gas kyi du
472b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shes rab yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu nyis
472b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang // ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / dri mang mtha' la 'ang
472b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug
472b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / da ltar byung ba la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing
472b5(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi
472b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang 'di 'jig rten pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong
472b7(dkon brtsegs): brtags pa myed par 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang / ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs par 'jug pa dang / bde/
472b8(dkon brtsegs): bshes pa la yang ngo shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa mdo cing thogs par 'dug pa dang / kun rdzob bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong bachags pa med cing rdzon
473a1(dkon brtsegs): #pa med par 'jug pa dang / don dam pa bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dang
473a2(dkon brtsegs): bodang / brtson 'grus rnams parda dang phying rab dang 'bring dang / bla ma'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang
473a3(dkon brtsegs): shes mthong bachags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa yin te/ de'i shes rab de pags bzag pa med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang
473a4(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa gting dpag dka' ste/ mthong bar dka' zhing zab la/ khong du chud par dka' ba bye brag byed cing nges par rdzo
473a5(dkon brtsegs): g+ha lta ba dang bral ba ngag chags bsal ba bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa/ thams cad stong pa nyid kyis rjes su zhugs pa/ chos stong pa nyid kyi chul shes pa/
473a6(dkon brtsegs): don la nges par rtogs pa/ shing du lugs pa/ shin tu legs pa/ shin tu sbyangs pa/ ci yang snang ba med pa/ 'gal ba med pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dus dang dus ma
473a7(dkon brtsegs): ba la rtog pa/ dus las mi 'da' bo/ skyon med pa/ tshogs par srung gi/ sbyin med pa/ legs par srung ba/ sbyin med pa la dga' ba/ bden pa khong du chung ba/
473a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs pa/ shin tu rgal ba/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa gcig pu'i sgrung ba/ spyod pa med pa// kha legs par spyad pa spyong po/ sem
473b1(dkon brtsegs): na thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las phyir ldog kyang / gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med pa/ yul thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang / sangs
473b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul las phyir ma log pa/ rtson pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa las phyir ma log pa/ spyod pa thams cad las shi
473b3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'das kyang / dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir ma leg pa/ sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi sems can rnams
473b4(dkon brtsegs): tsasangs ci stong ba 'is byang sa log pa/ bar 'anub la smod kyang nye bar len pa med par 'byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyi ma migs kyang 'ju
473b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ma bral ba/ lus med kyang sems can thams cad kyi smod pa dong bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o// dedi shes rab de yang de'i ngang tshul la snang pa dang bsam
473b6(dkon brtsegs): ba rjem sa zhugs pas// de shes rab de yang de dang tshul la spyod pa/ myur du khad du chung pa/ dbyung po smin par 'gyur ba/ phun ring ba lta ga nas rgyu
473b7(dkon brtsegs): mad pa dag chas btsun pa/ byang chub kyi snying po las tshul pa/ dge ba'i sbyin pa la spyod pa/ nye bar le med par 'bang ba/ rangs
473b8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ don thams
474a1(dkon brtsegs): cad rjes su rtogs pa/ chos thams cad ngo mtshungs pa/ thabs thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba'o// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
474a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu song ba dang dpag tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa zhes pa'o// mtshan ma thams cad de dang dmigs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad
474a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol sa pas/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i shes rab yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta
474a4(dkon brtsegs): ste chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so// gzhan yang
474a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhem/ dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongs su dgu pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so// de shes rang
474a6(dkon brtsegs): yang thams cad gi rjes su song ba/ sems can gyis rjes su song ba/ chos kyi rjes su song ba'o// de'i shes rab de ni nyon mongs par thams cad kyis phyir mtshams sto
474a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang ma la/ skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi mtshams cad sbyor ro// de 'i shes rab de gnas pa pang med la/ yul thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes shes
474a8(dkon brtsegs): yul layang gnas sa// de gis rab de ni mtha' dang yang zil la/ dngus la yang ma gnas pa'o// de'i shes rab den phyogs bcung rnam par lta bas sgrib pa med pa
474b1(dkon brtsegs): phul lo/ rung bzhizhi mthong bar byor sgrub pa med pa'i yang rnyed pa'o// ma shes rab den chos thams cad shes shing mngon par rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// dacin
474b2(dkon brtsegs): rab de ni chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan yang / ldan pa yang mA yim mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin te/ sbyor ba'am mi stong ba 'am/ chos grangs gis kyi
474b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi 'byung gnas yin no// bas rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin no// thos pa'i 'byung gnas yin no//
474b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi 'byung gnas yin no// chos kyi 'byung nas yin no// gzungs dang spobs pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// so sor yang dag par rig pa'i 'byung gnas yin no//
474b5(dkon brtsegs): tan dang ye shes rnams pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'byung nas yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//
474b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa 'di bstan pa ni/ 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi srog chags nyi khri stong bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub se
474b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zad pa rnams las sems rnam par grol
474b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu khri na chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag nas// de dag tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
475a1(dkon brtsegs): / byin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba lags na/
475a2(dkon brtsegs): dag thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta spos kyang ci 'jal zhes smras so// bam po gnyis pa/
475a3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa bcom ldan 'das ces byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen po gcug na rin po tshol bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod
475a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyis rjes su lwa ba dren pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas te/ lus las sang rtog pa dang ldan po /
475a5(dkon brtsegs): banye bar 'jog go// rnam pa gnyis su rtag pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma sdug pa'i rnams dang sa sor rtog pa dang ldan pa dang / sdug pa'i rnam par sa sar dag pa dang ldan pa'o//
475a6(dkon brtsegs): lam sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste kye ma lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/ bcog pas yongs su gang bu yun thung zhing byas bred pa yin no zhes bya ba 'din mi snan
475a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i ma pangs pa rtog pa dang ldan pa'o// de la sdug pa rnam par sa song rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhen/ gang chus ma gtsang ba grags med pa 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
475a8(dkon brtsegs): m+bu ba rnams kyi sku/ legs kyi suM rdzo klu'i misogs pa'i sra/ zag pa me pa'i ska 'jig rten gsum las bu brag cu 'phags pa bya/ gzugs mthang na sems ca
475b1(dkon brtsegs): nga mi bar 'gyur ba'i ma/ thab bar byar snyam pa 'ang na sdug pa rnam paras par rtog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu dzin byang chub sems dpa'i ma pa brgya
475b2(dkon brtsegs): sus sor rtogs pa ldan par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa snyam pa'i// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su la ba'i dran pa rtse bar bzhag pa
475b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa ni/ rjes gnyis yongs su srung ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ martag pa'i rnam pa dang / rtag pa'i rnam pa'o// de ba mi rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ bye ma lus 'a
475b4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ste/ ring por mi gnas pa/ tha mar chi ba yin par shes nas/ lus kyi phyir mi mthun pa'i 'tsho ba'i mi spyad cing / snying po nyid len to// de sring po gsum
475b5(dkon brtsegs): len de/ nga gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyi snying po dang / longs spyod kyi snying po dang / 'tsho ba'i snying po'o// de'i lus mi rtag go snyam nas/ sems can thams cad kyi
475b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / slob mar khas blangs de ci bya'i cog la 'bad pa yin/ lus mi rtag go snyam nas/ lus kyi nyes pa yon pa dang / g.yo dang tshul chos pa thams cad mi byed do//
475b7(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag go snyam nas/ srog la bag mi rton par 'gyur te/ srag gi phyir yang sdig pa mi byed do// lus mi rtag go snyam nas langs spyod pa la sred cing chags pa mi da
475b8(dkon brtsegs): de/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i mi rtag pa'i rnam pas lus la lus kyis rjes su lta ning gnas te/
476a1(dkon brtsegs): / de las yon tan gyi ba yon rab tu 'thob bo// de la rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la lus kyi rjes su ga cing rnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ngas
476a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis spyod pa'i shes skyes shing byung ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi rigs mi 'chang ba dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi lan
476a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su bskyab po'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad la btang ba sems can thams
476a4(dkon brtsegs): dang thun mong du byed pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam par zhes bya'o// gang mi zad pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste// 'dus mi byas ni mi zang ba zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas pa ni rtag pa'o//
476a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dge pa'i rtsa ba bcom pa de dag thams cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'dus ma thas tshad du yongs su bsre pa 'di ni rtag pa ma pa nas
476a6(dkon brtsegs): / stong pa nga/ mtshanam med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rtag pa zhes bya'o// de la du nubasems dpa' snang ba nyid kyi snying yul dang / mnam mang ba mas
476a7(dkon brtsegs): rtags pa dang / sngon lam med pab rgya 'thun pas brtson 'grus brtsam pa thams cad tsam pa 'don rtag pa'i rnam pa nas bya'o// nam mkha' ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/
476a8(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnam par ma rtog pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ 9
476b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa snyam pa bdag kyi lus de la sems can thams cad rtsa lus nye ba
476b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs shing / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyis lus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i gnas la gnas par bya'o snyam ste/
476b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltang rang gi lus kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin du rtog go/ de zag pa med pa'i chos la mkhas pas/ sem
476b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab du shes so// de zag pa med pa'i lus kyis zag pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sogs
476b5(dkon brtsegs): so m+bu med pa'i sems kyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i de dag zag pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngo'o// de zag pa med pa'i chos thob pas rba/
476b6(dkon brtsegs): pa las 'byung bar mi byed do// zag pa rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i zag pa dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag
476b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de 'dod pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsams bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su smra
476b8(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin to// ma rig pa'i zag
477a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang lta ba'i zag pa gnyis rtsa ba rnas gdon pa'i phying byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la 'jug go// lus la lus rjes sul zhing dran pa nye bar gan/
477a2(dkon brtsegs): bsdam pa de rdzus la ldan gyi mtha' nas par byung bar sa sor rtog go// lus la phyi ma'i mthar yang ma 'pho bar su sar rtog go// lus la da ltar byung ba na rang bzhin gyis dben du
477a3(dkon brtsegs): mangs par rtog ga/ de de ltar lus la rjes su lnga zhing gnas/ lasal lta ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma skyed do// 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bral bas bdag ga ma
477a4(dkon brtsegs): / bdag gir byed pa med pas yongs su mi 'dzin to// yongs su 'dzin pa med pas rtsod pa med pa rab tu 'thob bo// rtsod pa spangs pas gnod sems med do// gnod sems
477a5(dkon brtsegs): med pas bzod pa rab du thob bo// bzod pa rab tu thos pas phreng khyengs par yang mi 'gyur/ 'dud par yang mi 'gyur ro// khengs par yang ma 'gyur/ 'dud par yang ma
477a6(dkon brtsegs): bas chos nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// chos nyid la gnas pas phyir yang chos ma yin pa spyod par mi 'gyur ro// chos spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i 'gros su song ngo //
477a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gros su song bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab tu rnyed do// chos dang ldan pa'i grogs pa rab tu bzung bas chos dang ldan pa'i mnyan pa thos par 'gyur ro// chos zas pa/
477a8(dkon brtsegs): na sa kyir yang yu la rnams la dag par mi 'gyur ro// da bral la bsrungs pas ting nge la ni sgrub gi// mjam par bdag pa yang dag pa dza lta bzhin durabatugs pa/
477b1(dkon brtsegs): dab pa dri pa ma du rabatu shes pas byang ba drug par ma byed du/ rnam par rtog par ma byed do// rnam par mi byed pa/ rnam par martog pas mi 'gyur ro// mi 'gyung bas kyi
477b2(dkon brtsegs): yang mi byed do// rnam par ma byed do// nam mi byed rnam par mi byed pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid kyis chos ji ltar ba bzhin thob nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu
477b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyad pa yongs su bdaga'// rigs kyi bu de la byung chub ma
477b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnam
477b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshar ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa na tshor ba la bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de 'di lta
477b6(dkon brtsegs): gang la tshor ba med pa 'di na bde ba yin no zhes sgrub ste/ de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spang ba'i phyir/ tshor ba rnams la nor ba rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar
477b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pa snam mo// de sems can rnams kyi tshor ba 'gog pa'i phyir/ gtu bgos kyang bdag gi tshor ba 'gog par yang ma byed de// des tshor ba dang ci
477b8(dkon brtsegs): yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung zhing myong bar byed de/ de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de ni/ 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnam
478a1(dkon brtsegs): / la skyong rjechen po rjod de// bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bgal nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bden/ zhes sdang la spyod pa'i sems na
478a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la snying rje chen rnyed de/ bdag gi zhe sdang gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // nam bdi ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa 'tshor ba myong bden/ gti mug la sta
478a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab slong ngo // de bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ rjes su chags pa legs
478a4(dkon brtsegs): par yang byed do// sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur te// khang khrob lags par 'jom par yang byed do// sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba
478a5(dkon brtsegs): gi pa dang ldan par mi gyur te/ ma rig pa legs par 'jom par yang byed do// des nor ba gang ci zung ba de dgathams cad kyang marig par shes shing myong bar byed do// sdug bsnga
478a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes shing myong bar byed do// bdag med marla shes shing myong bar byed do// de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi rtag par shes par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi tshor bal ni zug rngur shes pa
478a7(dkon brtsegs): gyung / sdug bsngal yang ma yin pade ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'anan pa shes par 'gyur ro// de mang na gang bde ba na me rtag pa'o// gang sdug bsngal ba den sdug
478a8(dkon brtsegs): sa yi da par yang ma 'an/ sdug badral ba yang ma yin pa ni bdag med pa'o// rigis kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de gar tshor brnams me tshor ba rjes su sa
478b1(dkon brtsegs): gdas par tsas thas cad skyes pa dang zhig pa dang / nu ba dang gnas med pa shes sa/ chos thams cad la skye ba dang 'jog par yangs sor rtag gonas chog dag nga sa 'o
478b2(dkon brtsegs): brnams gang du stsogs par 'gyur snyam du chos rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des chos rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang tu yang mi 'gro bar shes nas/ tshor/
478b3(dkon brtsegs): mas cad rgyun chad par sgrub po// bsgrubs nas kyang nan tan dudu ma byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba 'gag par byed kyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gtsir ba 'gag pa gyi
478b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'ang byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa thabs mkhas pa dang snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'o// gang tsho
478b5(dkon brtsegs): bdagag pa yang rab tu shes la/ tshor ba la 'gag pa mngon sum du yang ma byed do// nor ba rnams la tshar ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa snyam pa la gnas te/ tshor ba rnams
478b6(dkon brtsegs): dben par yang dag par jilta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di la ni myong ba gang yang med do// 'di la na tshor bar byed pa gang yang med do// chos de dag thams cad ni snang ba sa
478b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o// byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang mi ldan pa'o// rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa'o// bdag po med pa'o// ngayi ba med pa'o// yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/
478b8(dkon brtsegs): des yang dag par na rgyu dang rkyen de dag kyi dngos po mi dmigs so// des ma dmigs sa 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar rkyen stong pa yin pa de bzhin du/ rkyen las byung ba'i
479a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ chas rnams kyang stong pa'i sum nas de stong nyid kyi don rig pas lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang / don shes pa dang / chos rnams shes pa dang / yin
479a2(dkon brtsegs): rig pas tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lnga ba'i dren pa nye bar banan
479a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rig kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyis rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang
479a4(dkon brtsegs): marigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa che bar bzhag pas nus pas/ byang chub kyi sems nye bar bzhag bshin/
479a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar bzhag ste/ sems dran pa'i ye shes kyis sems kun tu tshol lo// de sems kun tu tshol ba na/ sems nang na yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
479a6(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sems bye nang na yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phung po rnams la sems yang dag par rjes su mam
479a7(dkon brtsegs): thams la yang sems yang dag par sa su ma mdzang / skyemache rnams la gang sems yang dag par rjes su ma mabyung / des sems sang dgas
479a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzas sum mdzang bas sems dang las byung gis sems kyi tsun tha~M dutshul zhing de 'di sam du sems te/ dmigs pa yod pa las sems 'byung bar gyu
479b1(dkon brtsegs): sams// de yang 'disam du sems te/ ci migs pa de 'ang gzhan la/ sems de yang gzhan nam/ don te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems ma man
479b2(dkon brtsegs): te dmigs pa yang gzhan la/ sems kyang gzhan ni sems de gnyis su 'gyur ro// 'on de dmigs pa gang yini ba de nyid rnams ldazhin no/ sos kyis sems
479b3(dkon brtsegs): nathong bar 'gyur/ sems kyis sems mthang bar ma rung ngo // 'di la ste pe na/ ral gyi so de nyid kyis ral gri'i sa de ting gca par ma nus so// sa
479b4(dkon brtsegs): mdze ci mo de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse ma de nyid la reg par mi nub pa de bzhin tu/ sems de nyid kyis kyang sems de nyid mthong bar ma nus so snyam nas/ de 'di la rna
479b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rab tu sbyong ba gang sems ma chis pa chad pa ma yin/ ga pa ma yin ther gzug tu ma yin/ mi gnas pa/ rgyu med pa ma yin pa/ rkyen dang mi 'gal ba/ de las
479b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa gnan las kyang ma yin/ de nyid kyang ma yin gzhan yang ma yin pa'i sems kyi rgyud sems kyi 'dra shing sems kyi ches nyid sems kyi mi gnas pa
479b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems rgyu ba med pa dang / sems snang ba med pa dang / sems snang ba med pa dang // sems rab kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'khrugs par mi byed pa de
479b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar shes so// de ltar mthong ngo // de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin tu/ sems de dag dben pa nyid rangab tu shes/ de bzhin du mthong ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa
480a1(dkon brtsegs): / sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems la cung zad tsam yang mi mthong /
480a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi mthong / ma tog rnam par martog/ g.yo meng rlom sems med/ spros pa med pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su kyi rjes su lta ba'i dranapa
480a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar sems gzugs med de bzhin du/ sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs
480a4(dkon brtsegs): ngo// de ltar sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzugs med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems kyi sems su bsngos pas yang gzugs med
480a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar byang chub kyi sems su bsngos pa/ gzugs med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub de yang gzugs med de/ de'i phyir sems cil bar spyod pa yang de bzhin no// spyod pa'i/
480a6(dkon brtsegs): ba byung chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub de la dang yongs su bsngo ba yang de bzhin zhes byaste/ sems kyi nga bzhin ni byang chub bo// byang chub kyi rang bzhin nas thams cad
480a7(dkon brtsegs): gang 'di ga sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes sun pa'idzin panye bar bzhag pa'o// dgas kyi bugan
480a8(dkon brtsegs): bang gang mgyogs pa/ ra tu margyags pa/ ma gnas pa cug sde rang rlung 'drag rab brgya tshun dang / 'dresang kyi ma me dang drag kyang ring bang gro sa dus
480b1(dkon brtsegs): rdulal ug/ snru drug la snang yul ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis shes pa dang dran pa'i sems rnas pa rtse gcig pa/ mi 'phrod rnam par ma 'gro ba/ ni gnas pa ses
480b2(dkon brtsegs): rtse cig pa/ g.yeng ba med pa de ni sems nas pa zhes bya'o// de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ gang sems la rnam par shes pa dang / sems latshas
480b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings su gnas par shes pa dang / sems la sems gnas par shes pa dang / sems la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar shes pa dang / sems la ji lta ba bzhin du/
480b4(dkon brtsegs): bdang / sems la ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang / sems la mngon sum gyis shes rab tu shes pa dang / sems la sgyu ma'i chos su shes pa dang / sems la dus
480b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes dang / sems la de khong nar shes pa dang / sems la g.yo ba med pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o//
480b6(dkon brtsegs): de rang kyi sems kyis rang bzhin gang yin pa sems can thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin yang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems kyi ring bzhin de yongs su
480b7(dkon brtsegs): shes nas/ de bzhin du chos ston to// rang gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yid par rab tu shes
480b8(dkon brtsegs): so// sems kyi ngo bo de nyid shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis spyod pa'i
481a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ mtshan nyid kyang de yin rab tu shes so// sems kyi mtshan nyid de shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// ji ltar rang gi sems stong pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams ca
481a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems kyang stong par rab du shes so// sems de dag stong pa nyid du shes nas kyang / de bzhin du chos ston to// de rang gi sems yang dag par 'du ba gang yin pa/ sems can
481a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems yang dag par 'du ba yang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de rang kyi sems ma
481a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so// sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes
481a5(dkon brtsegs): tshas thams cad mnyam pa nyid durab tu shes shing / sems kyis 'gyur bar mi byed de/ rnam par mi 'gyur ro// sems gnas pas chos kyi dbyings gnas rjes su shes kyang sems
481a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i chos nyid de las kyang mi g.yo ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyis rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag
481a7(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi ngal na ba mas la sa sa su sna d+ma bdug nag pa spyad pa yangs spangs pa gang shes/ rigs pa bu ma byu ba mams
481a8(dkon brtsegs): mas tshas kyi rjes sul pa dzin pa kyi bar gzhag pa la rnas pa 'di sam du sems te/ chos len sgrib rnams s+ho/ chos khon 'gag pa rnams 'gag ste/ 'di la pas
481b1(dkon brtsegs): skye bu 'am
481b2(dkon brtsegs): gam sems can nas/ srog gas/ skye ba po'am/ gus pa'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes pa'am/ shed bu'am gang skyes pa'am/ rga ba'am/ 'chi mam/ skye bar
481b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang yang med // rin sa rnams thams nyid de/ gal te bsnangs pa ni 'grub/ gal tim bsgrubs nan mo 'grub ste/ dge ba' rung / mi dge ba yang rung / rog song
481b4(dkon brtsegs): rung ji lta bsgrubs pa de ltar sgrub mod kyi/ chos rnams la sgrub par byed par yang med la chos rnams rgyu ba med par yang 'gag kyang mi skyed snyam du nye bar brtan na 'di ltar rdzu
481b5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i yi nas skye ste/ gang bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang / mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang gsum mo// de la bdag gis ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed ba
481b6(dkon brtsegs): gnon par bya'o// de ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med par mchog dam pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa/ bcu rgyur 'gyur/ bcu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus yongs su dag pas
481b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzan dpe byad bzang po dang / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong pa dang / pha rol gyis gnang bar bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
481b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa rnam pa drug cu shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing / rtag tu rgyun mi chad par
481b9(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin mi 'khrugs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa yongs don dang chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa mi zad pa dang / byams pa chen po
482a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pas sems sathams cad ma ngan las 'das pa'i lam la rab tu 'bad ba dang / rlung rjechen pa yongs su dag pas bskal pa dpag du med par 'khor bas yongs su
482a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyo ba dang / stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs pas du gcod pa dang /
482a3(dkon brtsegs): yang drugacod pa'i gyis ma yin pa rab tu rtogs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres mongs su rdzogs pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus gsum la mchags
482a4(dkon brtsegs): papa'i shes mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas rang byung gi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos blan med pa dam pa/ bzang po ma
482a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mas dgas pa bcu ba dag ga rgyur byur ro// des don gyi dbang 'di mabyung bas bsod nams kyi tshigs brtags pa la chog cha shes par 'gyur ro// de bas rnams mni
482a6(dkon brtsegs): ba du byed rnams mngan par 'du ma bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar bdag la mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyis thams cad du bag chags su yang mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas rton par bye/
482a7(dkon brtsegs): dmig po pa'i du byed mas shes na migs pa'i rnams par 'jug pa bsgyud kyang / ting nge 'dzin pa del snying por 'du shes par yang mi 'byur la/ ba 'an kyi nga
482a8(dkon brtsegs): mam byas/ kyi tshigs badrugs pa dang / mang ca pas su smi par bya ba byor tshun mam gyi ring gis 'ang papa ngas su 'a byal
482b1(dkon brtsegs): dri de ngan drung chung sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa nas rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba dren pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas shing / byang chub tu sgrub pa'i chos dang yin pa de dag snga la/
482b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi mi mthun pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag spong yang dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du byed pas rtag par lta ba yang ma ltung / ming go ba'i chos slong yang chad par lta bar mi
482b3(dkon brtsegs): ste gang yang zad pa med cing rtag pa mang cang rtag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su spangs pa'i dbu ma'i 'am mo/ de yang gang zhen/
482b4(dkon brtsegs): lha ste gang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / mi rig pa de zhig yang mtha' ste/ gang la de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni gtags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/
482b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di na chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// de bzhin du ma rig pa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed med pa rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang /
482b6(dkon brtsegs): ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs med pa dang / skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug med pa dang / reg pa dang / reg pa med pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba med pa dang / sred pa dang /
482b7(dkon brtsegs): sred pa med pa dang / len pa dang / len pa med pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa med pa dang / skye ba dang skye ba med pa dang / rga shi dang / rga shi med pa dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
482b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa zhes bya ba de gnyis yang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis yang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni ba
483a1(dkon brtsegs): mamang cing ga gas par 'gyur ba med pa 'dzin chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// chos rnam kyi dbu ma'i lam de ni 'di 'dra'o zhes bstan par mdu /
483a2(dkon brtsegs): dbu ma'i 'am ni btags pa med pa/ bdags par 'gyur ba ma yin pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ gnas med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa/ kanag zham
483a3(dkon brtsegs): zhibarab tu zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// mnga' gang nas 'phangs pa dang / gang duphog pa de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ gang phags
483a4(dkon brtsegs): bdas phog pa de'i dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba yin te/ lnga pa'am reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu dmigs pa gang gis
483a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa skye dang / gang tus song rnam par dag pa gnas pa de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ bang de gnyis kyi dbu ma bstan par ma nus pa 'di ni/ rig
483a6(dkon brtsegs): mdu bu ma lam ga/ don ma pa rnam yin// don dam par gang yin pa den brjod du med de/ de la ni nyung du yang mod/ mang pa yang
483a7(dkon brtsegs): gang rgyu 'ang me/ mang ba'i med do// gang ga cu du yang mi mang po yang med pa ni dad ma lam ste/ rigs kyi bu ga na yang bdug dang dag
483a8(dkon brtsegs): ngas bya gtog pa sa// ba ga dang ga mi nga rje ba nyi ma pa dag pani bu ma'i lam mo// srog dang gang theg ces bya ba gcag
483b1(dkon brtsegs): / ga shA gas na ny-id ma par dag na dbu ma 'am ma/ mtshan ma dang man myed pa zhes bya ba dag ga yang nga
483b2(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ rtogs pa dang 'dzag pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam
483b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzun pa dang bden pa zhes bya ba de gcig yang mtha' ste/ srog dang gang zag gi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// mtshan ma dang mtshan med pa zhes bya
483b4(dkon brtsegs): de gnyig yang mtha' ste/ mtshan ma med par rtog pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ rdzogs pa dag
483b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// rdzun pa dang bden pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ brjod du med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// tshu rol dang pha rol zhes bya ba
483b6(dkon brtsegs): de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ 'jig tshogs 'gag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// 'dum byas dang 'du byas zhes bya ba de nyi ga mtha' ste/ spong ba med pa ni dbu ma'i
483b7(dkon brtsegs): mo// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ rnam par rig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos rnams la chos
483b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su lta ning dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la nus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dran pa la gnas te/ de chos thams cad chos
484a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings su 'dra bar rab tu shes so// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid sems can gyi khams so// de chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa sems can gyi khams dbye
484a2(dkon brtsegs): med par khong du chud do// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / sems can gi khams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs par rab tu shes so// des chos thams cad
484a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings gcig tu shes nas/ chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang / chos la mngon par chags shing lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de nam ma mthong ba den chos rnams la
484a4(dkon brtsegs): latha dad du mi byed do// des chos rnams mthong yang sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// gle'i mig mtshan
484a5(dkon brtsegs): mar 'du shes pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// de'i mig mngon par 'du byed par ltung ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir de lnga'i mig gis mthong ma yin no// de'i mig smos
484a6(dkon brtsegs): bal snod pa sa yin te// de'i phyir de shes rab kyi mig gis mthong bam yin no// chos rnams la chos kyis rjes srug ning gnas pa de chos thams cad ji lnga ba bzhin du mdzad nas
484a7(dkon brtsegs): sa bang sa yang mi gnas ste// des ces thams cad mi gnas par shes nas chos rjes su dran pa des sngon gyi sprin lam ma gtong ba 'dini rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa tsam
484a8(dkon brtsegs): des su na pa la rgyas kyis bang// gang drung zang tsas da mal sa yang dgas thas rnams pa rgyad pa gyi byang chub kyi sem sarnas su na pa rang pa nga
484b1(dkon brtsegs): mas kyi du byang chub sems dang chis rnams pa chos kyi rjes su lnga ba'i dran panye bar 'anag pa stod pa 'angs su dag pa'o// ngan pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi po de dag la gnas pa na
484b2(dkon brtsegs): ni sto \u0f7f/ ni ga shin 'di stsag/ chus 'dzus kyi rjes sug nang gnas pas mi sdug pa sdug par 'dushes pa'i byin ci 'og gru // ra ba yang nga
484b3(dkon brtsegs): rnaMs su mA ning gnas pa sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spang ngo // sems la sems kyis rjes su lnga zhing gnas pas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa
484b4(dkon brtsegs): nga'i byin ci log rab tu spong ngo // chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // de phyir ci lag med pa
484b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par nyid du sgrub bo// rang dag pa nyid la bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa
484b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i yang dung spyod pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rab tu 'thob te/ yang dge par spyod pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' de 'badang
484b7(dkon brtsegs): maud ci lhun gyis 'grub pas dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba la sems 'dug gi/ mi dge ba la nim yinan// de byer zhing sdig pa mi dge bas chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phying brtso/
484b8(dkon brtsegs): 'grus 'dros pa dang / sdig pa ma'i ge ba chos mi skyes parnams mi skyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus bcom pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa'i rnams bskyeng ba'i phyir brjod/
485a1(dkon brtsegs): // grus bcom pa dang / dge ba'i chos smras pa rnams gnas pang / nyes par mi 'byung ba dang / byer zhing 'byung ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyi
485a2(dkon brtsegs): khrus btsam pa'o// gas kyi bu bya chub sems dpa 'di na gyilas 'angos su dag pa gang ny-id kyis dge babacos rnams mngon tu gyur te/ babang pa med cing rgyun gyis drub
485a3(dkon brtsegs): pas dge chos ma skyes pa rnams snang// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yong su dag pa de
485a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par snang ba ban po 'di dag sems ces dbang bsgyung bar 'gyur gyi brtson 'grus kyis dbang sbyang bar 'gyur ba na ma yin no// de dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang /
485a5(dkon brtsegs): thob med pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba'i byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba 'jug ste/ @
485a6(dkon brtsegs): thags pa de yang dag pabang ba la gas pazhes zag// tsa byong zhes/ de'i slong mam pa lan gyim mkham pas pan no// snying bam ma pa
485a7(dkon brtsegs): ma pas pan/ yang dag pa sang bzhes tha ba na/ ba nyi mim ma par byung ba/ mapa da kyis ma maM bar sgru /
485a8(dkon brtsegs): ya ga pa ring bzhes kyi// sang yang dag par drugs pa rdzu tshum gyi nga ma pani pa rnams sas su rdzogs par gyur / ngag ga
485b1(dkon brtsegs): rnamathA/ na pa mau de 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa dang / bdun 'grus kyi ri de bzhi dang pa'i 'du bye dang ldan pa ju 'phrul gyis da
485b2(dkon brtsegs): / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin snang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu ba 'phrul gyis dang pa dang / dpung pa'i zhing nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis dang /
485b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems kyi sdug pas bsam pa 'dren pa yang bar 'gyur ro// mi dge ba'i chos spang bas brtan 'grus yang bar 'gyur// nga rjechen po rab tu bapas se
485b4(dkon brtsegs): rang bar 'gyuraro// thabs mkhas pa rab tu thob pas dpyod pa yong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gis byung
485b5(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pas dbang gzhi rab tu 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe la dbang ba 'thob po// tshe la dbang ba des 'dod na/ sems
485b6(dkon brtsegs): mchung du rnams kyi nang du tshe ring po yongs su 'dzin cing / sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sems can tshe ring po chos snyanan/ yongs
485b7(dkon brtsegs): skyo mas la rjes bstan pas yongs su rnam par bya ba'i phyir me thu du yongs 'dzin pa dang / lha'am ma gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du ni'i tshang la dbang bsgyur/
485b8(dkon brtsegs): bai ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dbang po 'di thob pa/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la dbang 'thob ste/ lus 'dzis
486a1(dkon brtsegs): ba des yid kyi lus rab tu 'thob nas/ lus ci 'dra ba dang / gzugs ci 'dra ba dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs dang spyod lam ci 'dra/
486a2(dkon brtsegs): bas sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de lus dang / gzugs dang / kha dag dang / mtshan dang /
