486a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs dang / spyod lam kun tu ston te/ de 'dod na sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam mtshungs
486a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang gnyis pa 'di thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpanga' chos pa dang
486a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ chos la dbang ba des 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton par 'gyur gyi/ 'jig rten gyi chos la rton par mi 'gyur ba dang / de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la to/
486a6(dkon brtsegs): / 'jig rten gyi b+ha ba rnams cad du yang snang la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes de las kyang mi g.yo ba dang / gang 'di shes rab dang / ye shes chags
486a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang // macing 'brel par 'byung ba zab ma'i ye shes pa bdag nyid dang chos rnams rnam par bsgrub pas lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rternams par bye
486a8(dkon brtsegs): bang gis sems ca can med pa rnams bsam pa dang / mas pa jil pa bzhin du 'dul bar 'byung ba de 'dri ba'i chos kyi gtam byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang/
486b1(dkon brtsegs): rlam sams dpas dbang gsum pa 'di 'thob bo/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dbang 'thob ste/ byed kyi rlabs langs
486b2(dkon brtsegs): ba des gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad rgya mtsho gcig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang 'dres pa yang med la
486b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa de yang kun tu ston pa dang / grang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyal po rib de dag thams cad rig cig tu byin gyis brlabs
486b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang / rgyal chen bzhi'i rig kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams phan tshun 'phos par yang mi shes la/ spyod pa de yang kun tu ston pa
486b5(dkon brtsegs): dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ji ltar rin po che'i sa gzhi 'am/ tsan dan gyi gzhi 'am/ spos kyi sa gzhi 'am/ me tog
486b6(dkon brtsegs): gis gzhin 'am/ nam mkhar gyur pa 'am/ chus yongasu gang ba 'am/ mes yongasu gang ba 'am/ rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur
486b7(dkon brtsegs): ces de ltar byin gyis brlabs na yang de 'dra bar gnas pa dang / de bzhin du byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis gang ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa de'i de ltar
486b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems bskyed ma thag tu byin gyi rlabs thams cad de bzhin du kun tu gnas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang
487a1(dkon brtsegs): // bzhi pa 'di 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
487a2(dkon brtsegs): dngas rnams dang / lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug ste ga ma zer ro// de bzhin du tshangs pa thams cad dang / brgya byin thams cad dang / 'jig rten snang
487a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / lA dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / ma mkha' lding dang / mngam ci dang / l-I 'phye chen po dang / ma dang mi ma yin pa
487a4(dkon brtsegs): cang dang / lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug ste gtam zer ro// de ci'i phying zhe na/ byang chub sems dpe' de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag shin tu yongs su snang ba byas pa'i
487a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yongs su spyad pa gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste lus yang bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma dang / sbyin gnas rnams la ldang ba dang / rim gra
487a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / gus par smra ba dang / drag 'tshal ba dang / thal ma sbyar ning mthun par byed pa dang / ngag yang bar bya ba'i phyir bka' blo de zhing 'dun par 'dzin te/
487a7(dkon brtsegs): shi bus pa de bzhizhi byed pa dang / sems yad par bya ba'i bying rgyal ming bdang / zhes gus pa med pa dang / tham la rim gri byed ci gas padang 'acu pa /
487a8(dkon brtsegs): rang dung ba dang / sems pas su rung ba dang / sems la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / spong ba rnams la brtsor pa mi gtong ba dang / bden pa'i 'du ba zhigs /
487b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed dang / mtho par na pa dang / dgas pa grub par byed pa dang / sdom las byed pa dang / sems ma zhum pa dang / 'dodu chags rnam par sel ba dang / de sdang ce bang /
487b2(dkon brtsegs): ni bar byed pa dang / gtsug gimun pa sel ba dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / khrag deg dang / ser sna dang bral ba dang / khams ma bdang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la stong bdagag
487b3(dkon brtsegs): dgas pa snang ba 'am bying ba dang / ma byung brnam khung sgrol ba dang / 'am rdzab la sregs 'degs pa dang / glang latham pas stsol ba dang / chub la grwa stong ba gi sas can ci
487b4(dkon brtsegs): ba yo su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dga' ba'i tshig thos par byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng ba dang / nyes 'byung ba rnams gsob par byed pa dang / 'gyod pa rnams sel ba dang / kun nas ldang/
487b5(dkon brtsegs): brnams rnam par sel ba dang / kham gang gis 'byung ba khong du chud pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po tham cad yongasu gtong ba dang / byin nas kyang 'gyod pa dang / sems can thams cad la lta ba'i phyir byang chu
487b6(dkon brtsegs): dung rjo dang dang bstan tu 'gro ba dang / gzhan ga dag pa'i rtsa ba yang dag par badzin du 'dug pa dang / bdag bde ba la mtshigs pa dang / bde ba bzhin la stabs pa dang / bdag pa rnyid pas chog shes pa /
487b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi rnying pa la drag dog med pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rab tu 'byung ba la mos par byed pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / mdza' ba san pa dang /
487b8(dkon brtsegs): nga dag la ba' bab semasasam padag nyi da kyang brtsid pa gis dang lung b.rung gyid pa dang lags 'das par blo 'byung ba dag po ma mdzad 'di rig gyud pas/
488a1(dkon brtsegs): / ga yul ston pa mam mas yang zhi pa dang ma slabs pa namal mi gas pa dang / yul rnams pa 'angs spyod gid pa dang na rnas kyi g.yog byed pa dang / bla sbyin pas /
488a2(dkon brtsegs): ma rjong pa nga ma tsha ga ma tho bye pa dang nga byed dang nga marji pa nas la ga pa dang / min gyis tu 'ang bdang / sdi pa mam gyi/
488a3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'a na gyichos mas cad kyi yangs padang / yon ga mas sa smrab pa dang / bya chub kyi sem bsngon dutu 'gra ba dang / dran pa mi rnams pa/ gas kyi bu 'dzin bya chub sams dpa phrul
488a4(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa 'ongs spyang ba'o// ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam yongasu sbyangs na/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du rnams pa mi 'gyur/ yongasu ma par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems

488a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi dridri la mi 'jog pa brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dran pa'i dbang po dang / nyid rje chen po mi gtong ba ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / chos
488a7(dkon brtsegs): yin sa da skyes ngas ma sa shed du 'chu ba sems smra da pa yang dag

488b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa nga ni kyi dang thag khamapas an kyis tsham gad par su bas pa nishes rab kyi dbang po'o// ga kyi bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nga chu dag
488b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mi byed par gyur pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'gro ba ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa ni dran pa'i dngang
488b3(dkon brtsegs): po sems can thams cad 'a 'ad ga zer ma ma par btong ngani ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongasu shes pa ni shes rab kyi dngang pa'o// kyi buganas
488b4(dkon brtsegs): sems mang na cad pa na tu 'da' bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang ba'o// sems na thams cad chag pa la shin tu thar par byed pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang ngo'o// gang la 'ang /
488b5(dkon brtsegs): migs pa drend pa'i bang pogathams cams cad kyi chags pam ma pa zhi bang rung ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pa'o// gang rtags pang du mchags pa mas cad dushes pa na
488b6(dkon brtsegs): sa rab dang pag/ rigs kyi bu gzhan pang gang drug par nga gyur ba 'i dpa'i bang pagis rlog pa ma nga byed pa yang yi 'a na grus kyi nga dag dgas paza
488b7(dkon brtsegs): ma ma pa dzin pa la nga sa rdzug pa me bya bzhi dang 'as jug pa dang rdza shes pa ni ting nge ni gyi nga po// ga tsug pa ma co par gyung
488b8(dkon brtsegs): rnyong mang rdzo nyid par su 'gad pa dini rjes kyi dang po// zhes kyi bu gnan yang mi dge ba'i cos pa cang spong bya nubs ma dngapa did pa'i bang po'i/ ga bcom ma thang bang da tu
489a1(dkon brtsegs): / thub pa ni brtson grus kyi dbang nga'o// dge ba tshis spangs pa dang ma bsgrub rnam mi ba ba ni dran pa'i dbang po// gang ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang bde ba mi 'dod cing / sems can thams cadas ban pa
489a2(dkon brtsegs): de ba'i phyir bsamagan byed pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// gang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnam mnyam pa nyid du so so rang gi she ba 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rig kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub ba ma pa dang dran
489a3(dkon brtsegs): mo ma gyus ni pa dag par baphyug na ma ngon// nge yin gyis ni smye// zhes rab kyi rnam par byed/ kyi 'a rgya nub mam su du na ga zhi ba tu nga/ ma rdzus ni /
489a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi pa do ba ni 'jig cig la lta ba la zhi tu ga/ ting nge 'dzi byi ni ste pa gyur ba drug burgyag lding do sherab kyis ni dag chag kyi mjam sbyong bar gyur dri lkon mo pa mu tu spong ste/ ris kyi bu 'di ni byeng nub seMs dpa bang po'i spyod pa yos
489a5(dkon brtsegs): bya sa nga 'i kyi sbyi pa lung ga pa dang des dang dang bdi dag gi k+shi pa ngas ne dums kyis mi byung ba dang / dang yangs kyi khrig da gas rje dreg pa chung ba dang me pa nas
489a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyi ma dag lnga sung bdang / ba ma chu gyungar ba dang / sngo gyi ma bas pa la na par gyur ba dang / sems kyi shin du bdan par 'gyur ba dang / lus kyis stabs dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / da pam
489a7(dkon brtsegs): gas rdzus kyi ma sa shA srung ba sungs ma la mas brgya bab srung ba'o// ni kyi bri nga byu khrus pa dang pa'i ga na brub ma yin pa ma byed / ma jus /
489a8(dkon brtsegs): byi bye ga pa 'i kyi kyi zud mi son/ rjin gyi ngas me'i dun / ga dzi da ga la ma gyi rlom 'dzin / sas kyi chud pa dasum ldang bas ma /
489b1(dkon brtsegs): gamarib bu gdan dang bya ba mas dpa' da pa skabs kyis ni yang gzhan ga dang ngas ma 'thal brjod 'grugyi sub kyis ni bar mdong num par mi 'gyur// drad pa'i stobs kyis ni badrang ba dang
489b2(dkon brtsegs): slo par du ba ba/ de de 'dzin gyi skabs kyis ni mchung bu rgyas ston go/ shes rab kyi snod kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi the tsomatham cad gtsang ngo // rigs kyi bu gan yang byang chub ses
489b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dad pa'i stob kyis na mos pa'i skyob yongs rdzogs pa byed do// brtson 'grus kyi stob kyis rnam par grol ba'i stob yongasu rdzog par byed do// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni rnam par grol ba'i
489b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i stobs yongasu rdzog pa byed de// ting nge 'dzin gyi stob kyi ni sem dang bsam pa'i stob yongasu rdzog pa byed de// shes rab kyi stob kyis ni/ sems can tham cad kyi spyod pa tshim pa
489b5(dkon brtsegs): rig kyi bra gzhan pang byang chub sem pa dad pa'i sto m+b+hi ni ser sna dri ma rab tu spong/ btsun 'grus kyi ste kyis ni dag gi bdog pa thams cad yong su gtong ngo // dran pa'i stobs kyi ni byang chu tu la sring sa la
489b6(dkon brtsegs): na gyi sto kyi ni mnyam pa'i sem mi 'di'o// shes rab kyi stob kyi ni rnam pa smin pa la re ba medo// rig kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa' dad pa'i spos kyis ni 'tshal pa'i tshul khrin gyi drim rab tu spong/ brjon bgra kyi stob kyi sa
489b7(dkon brtsegs): bas la mang po/ na sro kyi ni byang chub tu yong su bsngo// ting nge 'dzin gyi snying kyi ni dul pa dang zhi ba dang cung shes kyis la 'gro'o/ shes rab kyi skyob kyi ni mngon pa 'du byed pa'i tshul khri rab tu spong ngo / sa kyi bu gzhan yang byang chu
489b8(dkon brtsegs): semang dang nga'i slob kyi ni gnasas kyis drimirab tu skye // con gru kyi sto TI ni bzod pa sgom/ dran pa sri ni byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o/ ting nge 'dzin kyi stob kyis ni sem sa rjes su she sa kyi go'i kyi ni ga deg
489b9(dkon brtsegs): pa la ra
490a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa mi na ga rigs kyi bu gzhan ya/ dbyang chub sems dpa'i spobs kyis ni le lo 'drim rab tu slongango // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni rtsom pa thams can nas 'og/

491a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag/
491a2(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ba ni 'dun te/ bdun gang shen/ 'dis ste/ dran pa yang dag par byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson
491a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang

491a5(dkon brtsegs): brnams chung mi btsun pa yin te/ 'di n-i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagas+ho/ chos rnamanga' 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag no gang sdug mthong gi tshogs dpa
491a6(dkon brtsegs): du par 'gyur bayi te/ 'an ces rnam par 'byod pa sa dag rgyang chub kyi yan la // brtson 'grus ya dge byang chub kyi yan las ni gang srung ba khyad pa du
491a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bzung ba yin te/ 'don brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lags/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang mi dga' bsel bar 'gyur ba yin te/
491a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dos b.las byang chu kyi na ma shig/ seMs sum pas drug rgyang chub kyi sanas ga neg sus dang sems shid tu byang bar 'gyur ba yin te/ 'dod/

491b2(dkon brtsegs): dag nga napa kyi mchog // pa Na sems yang dag byang chub kyi yan la pa n-i/ byed pa byas par 'gyur ba yin te/ 'dzin pad sems yang dag byang chub kyi yan ma
491b3(dkon brtsegs): ces pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub kyi bsam pa mi brjed pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lago/ gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson
491b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni chos rnam par byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// gang sems can yongasu smin par byed pas yongs su mi skye ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan
