491b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni shin tu spangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lago/ gang ting nge 'dzin la sems can rnams rab tu 'god pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go
491b7(dkon brtsegs): gang mngon sum du shes pa btang snyoms bral sems can rnams rab tu 'god pa 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang nyan
491b8(dkon brtsegs): thos dang nga sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis dran pa med cing yid la mi byid pa 'di ni/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang chos tham
492a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes pa mkhas pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ga sbyong ba yongs su dag pa'o// gang lus
492a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag dang yid kyi las rdul pa 'din brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi sbyong ba yongs su dag pa'o// gang chags pa dang khod khro sbyong pa 'don dga' ba yang dag
492a3(dkon brtsegs): bya chub kyi san lag gi skyed pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang bya ba byas pa dang byed pa byas pa 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ga song pa yongasu dag pa'o//
492a4(dkon brtsegs): gang 'jig rten gyi bya thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug kyang gcig tu snyom song 'azhugs par 'gyur ba 'dzin ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi smod pa yongasu dag pa'o//
492a5(dkon brtsegs): gang ba'i su me nga'i chos pa rab tu gnas te// rtog pa dang sem pa med cing bdang snyoms par yang kun tu snangs/ sis can la yang lta ba'idi ni btang snyoms yang dag 'ang nub
492a6(dkon brtsegs): ra po tsung pa yongs su dab ga// rigs kyi du gnas nga bya chung sems dang pa kyis rnams cad 'ang du spang bar da pa dang / rnan thogs par bye pa
492a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes par byed pa dang / 'jal bar byed pa dang / nye bar rtog par khong du chung cing sems can gyi song sa mtho ba dang / dma' ba thams cad rtogs te de la gnas nas kyang
492a8(dkon brtsegs): da ra du 'gyur ba'i lam smom pa dang / dngos pa dang ngos pa me pa'i bags la ba dang / kunan pa dngas pa dang bras pa 'ad dag na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas
492b1(dkon brtsegs): nga chub kyi yanas garnams zhes bya'o// 'di ni phags pa rnams kyi spyod pa yin gyi/ 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yulag
492b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni/ bdud sdig can rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni/ nga rgyal can thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'bas
492b3(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni/ bas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa do na mtshan ma la dmigs pa thas cad
492b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod rdul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnas kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yino// 'phags pa
492b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tshor ba yong su 'dzin pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams spyod yul gang yin pa de ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa rnams
492b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag byed pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i chos rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no/
492b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tha na mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes la byed pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin te/ chos thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa
492b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod yu'o// chos thams cad la rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongasu rtog pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yu'o// chos thams cad kun
493a1(dkon brtsegs): nas mi ldang ba'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thas cad dang mi mthun pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yulo// chos tha
493a2(dkon brtsegs): cang dang phyid pa med pa'i snong yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// thams cad mitshan ma med pa'i spyong yul ri baphags pa'i rnams kyi spyod yul lo// rigs kyi bu de ltar gang 'phags
493a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod tshul yongs su dag pa 'di byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi sbyong pa yong su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu des bang rgyu ba sems dpa'i lal gyi spyod pa yongs su
493a4(dkon brtsegs): sapa ga shin/ 'din saM/ yang dag pa'i sa pa dang / yang dag pa'i rdzog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mapa dang / yang dag pa'i 'cho
493a5(dkon brtsegs): / pa dang / na/ nas rnas pas/ yang dag 'asgrub ga na/
493a6(dkon brtsegs): sa dus sa shes rangs 'a sa / ngag dang / spyo pa'i dus sa sa
493a7(dkon brtsegs): su su sa su su
493a8(dkon brtsegs): sa rdzug mun/ na
493b1(dkon brtsegs): du pam sa na/ na/ 'byung bas / gyu
493b2(dkon brtsegs): ga 'din chung so// de' ga tshogs sa pa dang / ngar 'di dang sa pa dang / ngayi 'dzin par sdu ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba 'ang ldang bar mi byed na// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'am
493b3(dkon brtsegs): sa lta / stsa smra na sa dag na sasas rgyas skye sa sa
493b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / stong panyid dus pa yang ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir ner/ sangs rgya su lta ba dang / chos lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungaso// rigs
493b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi du deg ri lta ba'i dmigs pa ni ci tsam du chung ngu na mya ngan las 'das pa la lta ba'i dmigs pa yang rung ste/ ji tsam du yang dag pa'i lta ba ma yin no// gang tha ma dang rab dang
493b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bring gis par gyur pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de mnyam par wA'i/ mi mnyam par ma yin no// ji lta
493b7(dkon brtsegs): namanyam par lnga'i mi mnyam par ma yin zhe na/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rdzas ni dman pa/ slob pa rnas kyi chos rnams ni dam pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar ldan/ mi mnyam par lta ba
493b8(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye ro'i chos rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa/ mi slob pa'i chos rnams ni zag pa med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnam
493b9(dkon brtsegs): zing dang bzhu pa/ rang sa na kyi chos rnam ni zang zing med pa'o ste du gal te de ltar stan ri nyam pa
494a1(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam par blta
494a2(dkon brtsegs): ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lhan/ so so'i skye bo'i rnams
494a3(dkon brtsegs): ni dus byas yin/ sas rgyas kyi chos rnams ni 'dus ma byas minan snyam dugs te de sa na/ ma mnyam par gyu 'o// nam rdzas ma sbyi 'i chos kyi'ang zhin gyis sa pa
494a4(dkon brtsegs): nga ma pa'i chos kyi 'ang ni gyi nga nyid du mabyung ste/ de sa ni yang dag du'i gyu zhes bya'o// sasa'i sbyo 'chos stong pa'i dang / mi spong pa'i chos gang pa nyid chung
494a5(dkon brtsegs): tshom mthong ste/ deg sa pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// so so'i sgo bo'i chos kyi rkyen mnyam pa nyid khong du na pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rkyen mnyam nyid kho
494a6(dkon brtsegs): rlu mangs par mthos/ dag 'ag ba na sang dag pa'i sa pa zhes bya'o// sas skye ba'i chos dben pa dang / byang chub ses dpa'i chos dben pa mnyam nyid rdungs pa
494a7(dkon brtsegs): / ngas pa ga sa chos sos su byung zhe ci nga / rgyas ky-i sa yongs byu me pa pa'i
494a8(dkon brtsegs): mas mtho / pan yang dag bas shes bya// ga rdungs pa mthong ba phyir yang gnyis sa tho ma 'jugs/ ba gi su med pa mthong bdes sa
494a9(dkon brtsegs): / 'a sa ma di / ma ma gas/ mas meng nga ya
494b1(dkon brtsegs): // sa thams sa pa ga pa gas thong ni nga sa pa mthong bar/ yang marnangs par marjod ni mang bces /
494b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa ni meng dag mthong ba'i// gang madrangs par mthong ba de la ni chos gang mang sa para'i 'gyur te/ chos thams cad snang ba med papa mthong ba de ni yang dag pa mthong ba// rig
494b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gang chos 'di dag 'dilta mthong ba 'di ni yang dag par mthong ba'o// ji lta pa bzhin du mthong ba dang / mnya nyid du mthong ba 'di ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dus ba lal
494b4(dkon brtsegs): dgang ji lta ba zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol// byang chub ses sa dpa' stong phrag
494b5(dkon brtsegs): mang shog ni mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid la bzod pa skyes// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtog pag she na/ rtog pa gang nag pa spong bar 'gyur ba'o// de mangs
494b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di ga ge zhi gnas kyis yong su bsdus pa'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa ste/ de chos gang zhig chos gang dang ldan swA du/ de chos de dag la rnam par lta'o// rnam par rtog go/
494b7(dkon brtsegs): des chos thams cad ngan nun mi ldan pa dang / rab tu ldan pa ma yin pa dang / ma 'dres pa rab tu shes te/ des de ltar shes nas/ mnyam par yang mi rtag ra/ gang mi mnying dog pa
494b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas ma yin no// de chos rtog pa dang / yongasu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa tham cad spangs te/ phyir yang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni
495a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i gang nas dra'o// rigs kyi bu das byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i dag gang zhen/ tshig gang gis bdaga' yang mi gdungs/ gnas
495a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / bdag kyang ku' ngas por 'ongs par mi byed la gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang / bdag la sang mi gnod pa la gzhan la yang ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i dag ces bya
495a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan nga yang dgang ba ga tshig gang gis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ngas par dog 'o// de'i chos nges 'jog pa de sang chos nges pa'i tshig des 'byung ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i dag ces bya
495a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngas ni gang mnga' ba dang / mi mdzab rnams lang ga mnyal pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes dag mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa
495a5(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba'o zhes ngag mnye pa dang / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o//
495a6(dkon brtsegs): mas sa das ra// myo na las das pa'i log pa shes rig mnyam dang / chos thams cad de bdag da pa dang / sems can med pa dang / rlig med pa dang /
495a7(dkon brtsegs): ga sa seMnas pa dang/ chos rnams ca kyi ma pa ma pa'i zhes dpa yang / chuci' pa 'bras bu
495a8(dkon brtsegs): nga gas sa/ ga dag mi gces bya dag ma na rnams / gang ga gan dpa kyims la ju nga / byang chub ya dag
495b1(dkon brtsegs): byu / gan dag 'a pas bya'o// des dag pa'i ga nga sangs pa kyang zher/ ngam thams cad sangs rgyas kyis mang su 'byung ban/ rnams kyi ma
495b2(dkon brtsegs): sa ma dag pa'i g.yongs dag gzhen/ rigs kyi bu des byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i la kyi mtha ga shen/ las gang las rang ba 'gyur gyi/ 'a'adzi 'du rjen
495b3(dkon brtsegs): phyi mamin dang / las gnyon mongs nye rani par 'gyur gyi/ nyon mongs pa'abar nga'iphyir ma yin pa dang / las gang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ nyon mong skye ba'i phyir ma min
495b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang dag 'ilas kyi mtha' zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gnan sang byang chub sos dpa'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni gang chos 'di dag 'di ltar rab tu de shing dge ba'i mngon par 'du ba bas
495b5(dkon brtsegs): cad mngon par 'du byed kyang de'i mngon pa' 'du bya ba de dag kyang gsob nyid du snang ba dang / gsog nyi dang / snying po med pa nyi dang / stong pa nyid snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub ses dpa'i byang chub
495b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnangs dngor de'i bsnang ba'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub ses dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'chog she na/ 'tsho ba gang bdag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang gnod/
495b7(dkon brtsegs): mithung / gtig sa yang gad par 'gyu'ang ste/ 'don yang dag 'tsho shis bya'o// gzhan ya 'a dag 'i 'arjong ni/ 'tshong g.yon ngas paras mi zhugs pas/ 'din yang dag
495b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhes bya'o// byang chub se ma dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tsheng zhes byang ni/ gang sam can mas cad kyi 'tsho yongasu dag par 'gyu' ba ste/ 'tsho ba yong su dag pa del ha cang 'dud par yang mi byed/ 'du
496a1(dkon brtsegs): dngas mi byed/ 'tshong gang gis bdag gi da dang gzhan gyi do dang / chos kyi don yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tshong yong su dag
496a2(dkon brtsegs): da'o/ sa kyi du des byang chung sas dpa'i ra dag pa'i tshul ba gang nen/ gang dgazhing rab pa'i chos deng dag par ska 'byor/ sem yang dag pa ra du 'dzin pa dang / 'dun pa dang / bcod pa dang
496a3(dkon brtsegs): srong dang rtsom pa dang / mi num pa dang / yang dgang yin tan gyi mngon du byed nga ste/ 'di ni mang dag pa'i tshul pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i tshul ba ni gang man tshul gyi na mnyam
496a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ dri ma khar rtsol gyi mam pa ma yi nan/ ga chos su ma pa yang mi byed ma ma pa' yang mi byed pa/ byed pa med cing na par mi byed pa'o// chos de gi chos dang / chos gnas
496a5(dkon brtsegs): nga gang de zhi du tshul 'o// ces de gi yang dgapa'i chos nyid ngas bzhin du thos pa'o// chos de dag gi ti dang / bye brag tu ba med pa dzis bde bzhin du/ rgol pa'o// yang dag pa'i rdul
496a6(dkon brtsegs): deng mamasas ca kyi gas dang tshul bdam khye yosu su yin/ ni chu sems da la dag sa pa'i kyi brangs byang bams
496a7(dkon brtsegs): / gyi sa/ su sa su smras dus sa sa
496a8(dkon brtsegs): mams sa sa/ rje nas da ga'i sa gi na sa ga ma
496b1(dkon brtsegs): sod da bdags sman kyi thams ca sla 'i byed pa dang / drang mug kyis ma grol bdang/ yang dang ltung ba dang / dra pasro bur bya ba gsas pa seMs pa
496b2(dkon brtsegs): rnaMmi dge bas cang kyi sgribs mi byed pa so// 'di ni yang gang yin pa'o// gan yang byang chub ses dpa'i yang dgang 'dren pa ni da pa gang gis dranang bun sa rdzogs pa dang / skyon med pa'i mo kyang / dra
496b3(dkon brtsegs): sa du skye ste/ sa kyi bu don nga chubasams dpa'i mang dag pa 'dri 'o// kyai sa bya gu sa nga dag pa 'i rlog / pa gsanapa gyur ba
496b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi bden pa yongasu shes pa dang / 'thun pa kun 'byung ba'i bden pa spang pa dang 'thun pa/ 'gog pa'i de nang mngon du bya ba dang 'thun pa/ la gyi bden pasgo ba dang un ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i nga 'dzin
496b5(dkon brtsegs): bya' bdag dang nyid pa ces rjes cad mnyeng nyi dang / bdag rnang 'dag pa ches thas cad rnapa dag pas/ bdag stong pa nyid pas chos thams cad stong pa nyi du yang dag par sres par 'jug pa/ gang de lta snyom par 'jug
496b6(dkon brtsegs): tsang yang dag pa 'di la 'jug kyang de bar yang mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub ses dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin to// yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin gang gi sem gyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i she rab kyi zas cad mkhyen pa dang / rnams
496b7(dkon brtsegs): da mkhyen 'i leshes pa gru ba rangatu 'dod/ rig kyi bu byang nungase ma dpa'i ti 'dzi bya ste/ 'dani nga nu ba sem dnga'il gyi skyed nga yongs dag pa'i// byang nub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spongs
496b8(dkon brtsegs): long su dag pa 'di gan pa dang / lha dang mi srog chags can po kyi theg can pa 'gyur la mnug khri drag stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu sem skyes/ bam po gsung//
497a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de la byang
497a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i spod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa
497a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam po snga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcur rnam par lta bas snang ba thob pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
497a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la yang dag par lta bas mun pa mun nag dang bral ba de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no// sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba la yang dag par lta bas shin tu nges
497a5(dkon brtsegs): par sngags pa don de'i lha'i mig yin no// phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba dang / kha dog dang mtshan dang / dbyibs la yang dag par lta bas shin tu btsun pa de ni
497a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mig yin no// rang gi gzi brji dgrub pas mngon par 'dum byed pa'i mtshan nyid du/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sems sbyin dang / dri za thams cad dang / 1
497a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lci bar byin pa do de'i lha'i mig yinaH/ rigs kyi burnam pa 'di sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi mngon par zhes pa 'i/
497a8(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa yongs su dge pa'o// de lha'i rna ba mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ gang gis mi'i sgrarna
497b1(dkon brtsegs): thos par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa'i sa rnams thos par 'gyur dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i
497b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams thos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas pa'i chas bstad pa'i thathams cad thos par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs bcu'i ma dang sna thams cad thos par 'gyur
497b3(dkon brtsegs): / rigs kyi bu 'dini byang chub sems dpa'i sgra'i rna ba'i spyang pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga'o// de pha rol kyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong
497b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa rnam pa dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pas gang zhe na/ gang gis skra dang mi dang sems can dmyal ba pa dang bdud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
497b5(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mthar sems skyes pa gang yin pa de yang rab tu shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar sems skye bar 'gyur ba yin pa de yang rab tu shes
497b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus na sems skye ba gang yin pa de yang rab tu shes pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang / dmigs par lta ba dang / nges pa dang ma nges pa dang /
497b7(dkon brtsegs): sog pa nyid du nyes pa dang / yang dag pa nyid du nyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa dang / 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams dang / ne spang
497b8(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pa rnams dang / gti mug la spyod pa rnams dang / cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang /
498a1(dkon brtsegs): kho na bzhin du de de dang 'thun par chos ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i
498a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga'o// de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ sem
498a3(dkon brtsegs): gong 'dod chags kyi rgya las byung ba rnams dang / zhe sdang gi chu las byung ba rnams dang / gti mug gi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / de dag gis lus ci 'dra ba yongs su bzung
498a4(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag kyang rjes su dran pa dang / sems gang smin pa las byung ba rnams dang / tshul khrims kyi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / byams pa'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / snying
498a5(dkon brtsegs): rje'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi hUM las byung ba rnams dang / de dag gis lus mi 'dra ba yongs su bzung ba de dag kyang rjes su dran pa dang / sems gang rgyu dang mi
498a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba rnams dang / rkyen dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang / dmigs pa dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang / de dag gis lus ci 'dra ba yongs su bzung ba de dag kyang rjes su dran pa dang / sems
498a7(dkon brtsegs): gang sung dus bstan pa rnams dang / marig pa dang / gnyisagrags yang dag par bzlas pa rnams dang / de dag gis sus ni 'thab yongs su brdung ba de dag kyang rdzas su
498a8(dkon brtsegs): padang / de dag gi che nga/ 'dos dang / gzi brji dang / g.yos dang spobs dang / grags pa dang / brjod pa dang / dbang phyug ci 'dra bar gyur pa de yang rjes su rdzo/
498b1(dkon brtsegs): / rigs kyi bu 'don byang chub sems dpa'i smod kyi gnas rjes sudran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i myod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa smra'o// del du 'phrul kyi bu ba mngon pa sa
498b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'dis ste/ lus dang gzugs kun tu ston pa'i rdzu 'phrus dang / tshig dang ska rnam par rig
498b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems dang yid mngon par 'du byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems can thams cad kyi skad du rnam par rig par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul bya ba'i mngon par ni
498b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lnga dang ldan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ma
498b5(dkon brtsegs): bsnga'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shes rab kyi mig gis brtags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rnam
498b6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa rab tu gnas pa ni/ lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa ni pha rol gyi sems
498b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa mngon par shes pa'i smod pa yongs su dag pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su gcod par rab tu gnas pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon
498b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// mngon par 'du byed par rab tu gnas pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu mngon pa
499a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa rnams shes bya ba de ni zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dag so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par shes pa lnga po
499a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gis rnam par brten pa cing zag pa zad pa'i ye shes la yang gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba bgrod dgos pa na/ gling
499a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhig yod de/ grong khyer chen po de'i lam ni bgrod par dka' zhing ring la nyam nga ste/ 'jigs pa dang bcas pa/ zas dang skom dang / bza' ba dang yang med pa zhigs
499a4(dkon brtsegs): gang grong khyer chen po der byin pa de'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ba zhig yod pa dang / de nas skyes bu la la zhig gis grong khyer chen po de'i yang dag pa'i yon tan
499a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bsngags pa thos nas/ skyes bu de la bu mthong na dga' ba/ sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ mi mthun pa ma yin pa/ gcig kyang yod pa las de bu cig po da bor nas/
499a6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po de'i lam du zhugs te/ de stobs kyi shugs dang brtson 'grus thams cad kyis sdug bsngal thams cad khyad du bsad de/ lam ring po de 'das nas/
499a7(dkon brtsegs): rmang pa ya cig ni grong khyer chen po de'i sgo'i thim pa la banag/ nang pa ma cig ni pha rol na 'dug pa la/ des bu gcig pa de yid la dran par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam dusas
499a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ mas kye ma'o bdag gis bu gcig pa de 'dir khrid de ma 'ongs pas zhig skam nas/ bu gcig pa de sdug pas grong khyer chen po der ma zhugs kyi/ maphyogs nas
499b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa dag la 'dug par spang log pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'bad pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ched pa
499b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / skrag pa'i bsam brtan pa'i nan tan gyis mngon par shes pa lnga po rnams bskyed de/ sems kyis bsam pa gtan dang mngon par shes pa yongs su srung ba
499b3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de la zag pa zang ba'i ye shes mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de snying rje chen po'i sems skyes nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir zags
499b4(dkon brtsegs): zod pa'i ye shes 'dris par byas pa las/ sems can rnams la lta bas phyir phyogs te/ slar log nas skye so sor skye bo'i sa na yang kun du snang ngo // rigs
499b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu grong khyer zhes bya ba der zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// dpag tshad brgyad stong phrag bye ba bgrod bgos pa zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba dpag tu
499b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yongs su 'dzin pa tshig bla dgas so// bar du bcod pa mang po bgrod ces bya ba de ni bdud kyis 'dun pa bzlog pa bar chad kyi tshig zla dgas so// skyes
499b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dgas so// rkang pa ya gcig ni grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la bzhag/ rkang pa ya gcig phyi rol gyi tu bzhag ces
499b8(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang 'dres pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams 'jug pa'o// bu gcig pa dran nas
500a1(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa las phyir phyogs te/ slar log ces bya ba de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
500a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad lta bu gcig pa bzhin du byams pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de zag pa zad pa'i spyi bor byin kyang / zag pa yang mi spong la/ sems can yongs su smin
500a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir/ phyir phyogs shing log par yang 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ci 'dra ba'i tha bas mkhas pas sems can rnams la cher snying
500a4(dkon brtsegs): rje bskos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang
500a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams 'di ltar byang chub lag mthil du thob pa yang mi 'tshal bar 'khor ba nyid kyi rjes su 'jug cing / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pas
500a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi sgo ba ni ngo mtshad to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos chu zhig dang lnga na 'khor ba yongasu mi skye ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
500a7(dkon brtsegs): sa pa'i mas pa/ rigs kyi du byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po dmas chos kyi bu dang sman/ 'khor ba na yongs su ba yod te/ ma shin
500a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dis ste dge ba'i rtsabs yang dag par zin pa'i byams pa chen po dang / byams pa chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i se
500b1(dkon brtsegs): chen yongs smin par byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pas/ yang dag par zin pa'i brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par zin pa'i skrag pan
500b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag par zin pa'i thabs dang / thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa'i yang dag
500b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyis yang dag par zin pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / mngon par shes pas yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par zin pa'i
500b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / nas pas yangs par ba byu dang / rnan pas ya hAg par dzin kyis ma sgrug pa'i bas ma tho nga rnalal
500b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas yang dag par zin pa'i bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yang dag par zin pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom
500b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zin pa'i thos pa'i nan tan dang / thos pa'i nan tan gyis yang dag par zin pa'i gzungs dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i spobs pa dang / spros pas
500b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zin pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
500b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos nyi shu po de dag dang ldan na 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po gtsug na rin po ches
501a1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ska na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang pa
501a2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bcom lnga ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i thos pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor pa
501a3(dkon brtsegs): namadzes so// thos nas brgyan pa'i spobs pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dran pa nyams pa thob pa'i gzungs kyis ni
501a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ban mdzes so// lag na rin po che mi zad pa'i longs spyod kyis ni skye bo mang po la ni nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
501a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// chos ston pas yongs su mi skyo bas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
501a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// ye shes kyi brgyan pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'a
501a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// de bzhin du byed pa nyid kyis kyang skye
501a8(dkon brtsegs): mang po la nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdag pa thams cad yongs su gtang bas naM/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes te/
501b1(dkon brtsegs): zam ci rigs par chos sbyin pas na po mang pozhi bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gnas gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ni byang chub sem
501b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// thos pa yongs su dag pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ji skar ba ga yod pas byang chub sems
501b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po lte bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis 'di skar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das drin
501b4(dkon brtsegs): dus bskal pa grangs med pas ches grangs med pas/ yangs pa tshad med pa bsams kyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bskal ba dga' ba
501b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang pa zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams sbas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshes pa dgra bcom pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'is
501b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
501b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // rigs kyi bci'i phyir bskal pa
501b8(dkon brtsegs): de dga' bar gyur pa zhes bya zhe na/ rigs bu bskal pa de la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur te/ de na gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi snga dgo gis/ kye man
502a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs po dgra 'di ni bskal pa bzang po yinate/ bskal pa 'dis sangs rgyas stong phrag drug su 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dga' ba'i rnaH
502a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / den lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dga' ba'i sgra de thos so// thos nas kyang dga' ba dang dad dang / mos pa chen po skyes te/ de nas lha drang mi de dag gis kyi
502a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'o// bskal pa 'di ni dga' bar gyur pa'o zhes de skad sbas pas/ de'i phyir bskal pa de'i ming dga' bar gyur pa zhes btags so// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi lam
502a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta thams cad kyis bltas brtags kyang / de ngoms par mi 'gyur ba de tsam du blta na sdug cing de tsam du nyams dga' bar gyur pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi
502a5(dkon brtsegs): khams de ltas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams lngas rnam par bltas pa de'i gzhi ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po sha stag s+ho/ stong gi 'jig
502a6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams kyis ca dan srul gyi gang pode'i lce ma khas gcig gi rin tu yang mi pa mdzo // 'jig rten gyi khams denas thos kyi ngang langs pa'i dris ni phyugs pacu
502a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jim rten gyi khams cang med brnangs med pa dag du bya go// nan dang sbrul gri lding busas myung ba'i satshan pa de las 'ad ga zer gyi drub snang ba zhes bya ba'i ba chen ci
502a8(dkon brtsegs): gagazungs byas/ ba gi yong kyis 'jig na kyi ma pa kyi rjeng 'o// zings kya me gyi khyim las byas pa'i pa tshigs pa su /
502b1(dkon brtsegs): ga dang / khyams dang / rnababs kyis legs par btsun pa la longs spyod par gyur // 'jig rnyed kyi khams den myong khyer dang thos dus gnas pa zung
502b2(dkon brtsegs): mi de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la 'gro'o// de dag mngon par shes pa rab tu thob nas nam mkha'i dkrol na 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag gi nang du 'dug cing mamakha
502b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'gro// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni mngal na gnas pa yang med de/ mi de dag thams cad kyang brdzus te skye ba sha stag go// don bud med kyi ming yang mi gra'o// dang sa
502b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang med do// ngan 'gro rnams kyang med do// sdug bsngal yang med do// 'jig rten gyi khams don kha zas rags pa yang med do// de dag thams cad kyang man
502b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes dang / bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i kha zas can no// mos pa rlabs po ches theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ste/ sa de ni theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med do// gang
502b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams de'i mi de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi cod pan rdzogs shing dpung rgyan dang / rnanas brgyan pa spu'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang ldan par gyur pas
502b7(dkon brtsegs): skrag go// gang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur pa bede de dag gi rab tu byung ba yin te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ngur
502b8(dkon brtsegs): smig du bka' stsal ba yang med de/ 'di ltar sems la rnyog pa med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang tshangs pa'i kha dog lta bu spyod lam rab tu ni bas byang
503a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston to// rigs kyi bu gang phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ba de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'a
503a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jog rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas
503a3(dkon brtsegs): mde lkugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ning de'i yon tan gyi bkod pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing 'dong ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
503a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' de/ nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston pa de na/ tal brgyad cu srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ tshangs
503a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de ni ji ltar de ltar nga bzhin du mang du smos te/ rnam par phye bas chos kyi gtam mi
503a6(dkon brtsegs): smon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshig dang yi gi zhu dus chos kyi gtam mngor ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ri zur tsam gyi sog bshes pa ste/
503a7(dkon brtsegs): cig gis tshig brgya stong rjes su 'jug pa sha stag go// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
503a8(dkon brtsegs): sbed pa yongs su dge pa dang / mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can sem yongs su smin par byed pa'i sbyor pa yongs su dag pa dang / spyo
503b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas sun pa'i bde dag nyid byang chub sems dpa'ang 'o ma rdzog sa mnga' las brtsams te/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bani dag
503b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon slar mangs 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
503b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing / skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur zhes gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des tshig de gnyis rgyas par phye ste/ bstan nas de la 'di skad
503b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi blo thogs pa med pa ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa ni skye bo mang po nye byar 'gyu
503b5(dkon brtsegs): ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des bskrun pa de lta bu bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug cu chos rnams la
503b6(dkon brtsegs): su 'gyur pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob bo// rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sem
503b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po dkon mchog skur mda' des yang 'di skad ces gsol to// gso bcom ldan 'das ji sar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par bgyid
503b8(dkon brtsegs): lags/ desad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenam
504a1(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog skar mda' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni/ byang chub kyi snying po
504a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par byed pa'o// de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ ci tsam du chos rnams sgrub pa'o// chos rnams sgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa/
504a3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di na bag yod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i ga yod pa ni 'di sa ste/ sbyor ba tshad med pa mthar thug pa go ma rtsom pa tshad med pa dang /
504a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad med pa sdud pas mi zad pa tshad med pa dang / mi spong cing sangs rgyas kyi rjes su 'azang ba'i tshul khrims kyis tshul khrims tshad med pa dang / sdug bsngal
504a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang du len pas bzod pa tshad med pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i las kyi brtson 'grus tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa bsgrubs pas bsam
504a6(dkon brtsegs): gdam tshad med pa dang / chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi phyir shes rab tshad med pa dang / sems can tshad med pas byams pa tshad med pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po skyed /
504a7(dkon brtsegs): bye pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa yang dag par sgrub pas 'byor ba yongs su dzin pa cang ba pa dang / bdas bde bas mi rnags pas sems can yongs su
504a8(dkon brtsegs): par byed chang ma pa dang / ris brtson 'grus brtan pas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa chang med pa dang / yang dag par sbyor bas yon tan yang dag par gru bcir tshu las/
504b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / ye shes tshad med pas sangs rnams mchod pa dang / rim mo byed pa cang med pa dang / kes bskyong bam thos pa yongs su rgyas pacad med pa /
504b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems la 'jug pa tshad med pa dang / byas pa nges pas spangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la zhugs pa
504b3(dkon brtsegs): mazhugs pas tshad med pa dang / sems 'dul bas dgon pa la gnas pa'i yon tan gyi cho gas tshad med pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
504b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas zhi gnas dang skrag thong gi tshogs tshad med pa ste/ dkon mchog skar mda' chos 'di dag ni bag yod pa sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi
504b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' brag yod pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// bag yod
504b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ye shes bsgrub pa'i chos rnams kyi gnas so// drag yod pa ni dge ba'i zlos bsngags shi bsngags pa rnams so sor yang dag par 'dzin to// bag yod pa
504b7(dkon brtsegs): ni sngon thos pa'i chos rnams chung mi brtson pa'o// bag yod pa ni bsdu bar bya ba'i chos rnams bsrung ba'o// bag yod pa ni sgrib pa'i chos rnams mi sdud pa'o// bag
504b8(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ni sgrib par mi 'gyur ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'dzin pa'o// bag yod pa ni ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i srubs gcog pa'o// bag yod pa ni dam pa'i ba'i chos yongs
505a1(dkon brtsegs): nga ba byed // pag spyod pani byung po rnams thom par byed pan// bas yod pa na mam nyam ng+yas na/ rlung ba
505a2(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa ni dus drang dus ma yin par spyod pa las sus 'a'o// bag yod pa ni stobs te/ thobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// lag yod pa ni zil gyis ma
505a3(dkon brtsegs): non pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// bag yod pa ni yon tan dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i 'byung gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
505a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// bag yod pa ni spyi bor phyin pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
505a5(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des 'di lta bu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
505a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzo par gyur to// rigs kyi bude'i tshe ngo dustan byang chub sems dpa' dag mchog skur mdo 'gyur ba dgasan ni gamam cu myod dgas shing kyi tsam pa'am/ ying
505a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su myur ba na yang de ltar mi bsa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog sar mda' zhes bya ba
505a8(dkon brtsegs): sung // rigs kyi ba khyod rnam grangs 'dis kyang ci song bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa dang / de'i tshang
505b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang rgyu kyang bag yod pas tho ba par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bungs byang chub sems can
505b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skyed pa yongs su dgra pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi spyod pa ni tshad med mtha' yas bsams kyis mi khyab ste/
505b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su sbyin par byed pa'i spyod pa yang tshad med mtha' yas pasam gyis mi khyab bo// de byang chub sems dpa' sems can/
505b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bsam pa shes nas/ sems can rnams yongs su srin por byed nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar sems can la la ni tshul khrims kyis
505b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par 'gyur/ la sa ni rdul khrims spangs pas/ sems can la lani tshig gis shin tu gdams pas yongs su smin par 'gyur/ la la ni 'dzum pos//
505b6(dkon brtsegs): las ni chog rtsub pos/ la la ni de gnyis gis/ la la ni 'jigs par byas pas/ la la ni 'jigs pa las yongs su thar bar byas pas/ la laM ni bsrangs
505b7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ la la ni ma bslangs pas/ la la ni gnod pas/ la la ni ma gnod pas/ la la ni zil gyis mnan pas/ la la ni zil gyis ma mnan pas/ @
505b8(dkon brtsegs): mal ni sbyangs pas/ la la ni ma sbyangs pas/ la la ni tshar bcad pas/ la la ni sbyin pa la phyir byin pas/ la la ni blangs pas/ sems can la la ni yid du'o/
506a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzugs nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang /
506a2(dkon brtsegs): chos yid du 'ong ba nye bar bsgrub pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni gzugs nye yid du 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyu
506a3(dkon brtsegs): / sems canas la ni sgra dang / dri dang / re dang reg pa dang / chos yid du mi 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la
506a4(dkon brtsegs): skrong pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la sa ni rtag tu mthong bas/ la la ni mi mthong bas/ sems can sa sa na sangs rgyas kyi sngas/ sems
506a5(dkon brtsegs): cin sa la ni chos kyi sgras/ sems can sa la ni dge 'dun gyi smras/ ma la ni mi rtag pa'i sgras/ la la ni sdug bsngal gyi skas/ la la ni bdag med pa'i sgras/
506a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa / sems canas la na sbyin pa dang / nus sems dang / brjod pa dang / brjod 'grus da/ bam ga nA dang / sa nga ga nas sa
506a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam // sems canal la nisems cad kyis pa dang / chung ma'i skyes gnas dang rje'i 'jig rten gyi drug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba
506a8(dkon brtsegs): thal mongs su smin par 'gyur// sa ladi mra'i 'a rje'i slong ba ma sa mings su mangs ma/ thams 'das mdzini thos kyimig pa'i ga ma gyis
506b1(dkon brtsegs): sang+yas rgyas kyi theg pa'i shAtam gyis/ ma man cheg bachen pa'i gtam gyis yongs su smin par 'gyurar// sems can sa lan na pas yongs pa na
506b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur gyi/ snyan par sla bas ni ma yin no// don spyod pas ma yin/ don 'thun pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni snyan par smra bas yongs su smin par
506b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin/ don spyod pas ma yin/ drin 'thun pas ma yin sems can la la ni don spyod pas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin
506b4(dkon brtsegs): snyan par sla bas ma yin/ don 'thun pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni don 'thun pas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin/ snyam par sna bas ma
506b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ don spyod pas yongs su sbyin par 'gyur ba ma yin/ sems can la la ni/ bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi po de dag gis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sem
506b6(dkon brtsegs): nas la ni rang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/ la la ni phyi rol gyi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/ sems can la la ni rlung ma dang / bu lo dang /
506b7(dkon brtsegs): kun gtong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni do lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo kun gtong bas yongs su smin pa
506b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sems su can la la ni rtsed mo dga' ba dang / glu dang sil snyan gyis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// la la ni gcig tu bde bas/ la la ni gcig
507a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal pas/ lus ni gnyigs/ sa la ni gnyi ga ma yin pas/ sems can la la ni dge slong du sprul pas 'dul ba/ sems
507a2(dkon brtsegs): cad la la ni dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge slo bsnyen mar sprul pas 'dul ba/ sems can la la ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog gis
507a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa yin te/ de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku bstan pas 'dul bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu des byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems kyi spyod pa
507a4(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs byed pa shes nas/ sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su shes pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dam byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor
507a5(dkon brtsegs): yis nges par byung bar gyur cing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yang dag par smras par gyur te/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa la mkhas par gyur pan
507a6(dkon brtsegs): denas gdang sams can yongs su zin par nga dus pa'i thal par mthu yong rgya ro// rigs kyi du byang chub sems dpa chos pa'i ldanan/ sems canarnams
507a7(dkon brtsegs): yangs su smin par byu dus twa/ blon gang she na/ 'dis te/ yongs myi ts+tsha ba dang / bdag 'dabras tsho chags pa dang / dus dang nas ma yin par bskul ba dang /
507a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs shes partse/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems sa dpa' chos zin ze de dag dang sanan/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus sa// rigs kyi chu ba
507b1(dkon brtsegs): masems dpa' tshas pazhi na na/ sems can mas yongs su smin par byed nas te/ ba'i gang med/ bka' tho bde ba dang / snyan pa sa pa dang / @
507b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jam pa dang / bzhin 'dzub pa zhing khro gnyer med pa sa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang snam/ sems nan rnams yongs su smin par
507b3(dkon brtsegs): rnas so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/ ba'i gang zhe na/ ling khri bam
507b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang / bdag shin tu 'dul ba'i sems te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
507b5(dkon brtsegs): bani po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed dus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan ying byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/ sems can
507b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa dag pa dang / g.yo med cing sgyu dang bral ba dang / brtson 'grus pa dang / legs par byas pa
507b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyes par byas pa bzod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed dus so// rigs
507b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed rus par rig par bya'o// rigs
508a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par
508a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa dga' byed la/ 'jig rten gyi khams zhi bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
508a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas pa
508a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba de'ang 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/
508a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba/ sna dang mis rib tu gang bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par snang ba de'i na
508a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang / nyan thos chen pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug kyang 'dus par gyur to// de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / byang chub sems dpa' sam
508a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rten pa brgyad khri ba'i stong 'dus par gyur ti// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdzim med pang snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' di dag gi che'i tshad ni
508a8(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri ba'i snying thub par gyur to// rigs kyi zu 'i rdo rgyal bu gzhon nunor dpal zhes bya ba gzugs bzing ba/ mdzes pa bas na srug pa/ mdog bzang /
508b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa mchog dang na pa zhig byung ste/ bcas nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang / re gzugs bzang ba dang / longs spyod dang / sbrid pas dregs shing cul zlus
508b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyags nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma mod par snang ba de'i gan du mi 'gro// sten par mi byed/ bsnyen par mi byed/ rim gro ma byed de/
508b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma lha rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
508b4(dkon brtsegs): smin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod na/ de gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / skying bas
508b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pas dregs te/ da rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du yang mi 'ong na/ gal te de rgyun mi chad par bskul na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song yang ming
508b6(dkon brtsegs): mo// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag bsdus so// bsdus nas kyang rigs kyi zu ngag
508b7(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyi nang nas/ yid yongs mi skyo bar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim gyi sgor 'gro zhing bde ba thams cad ni spangs sa/ sU
508b8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ni dang du blangs te/ de nas den kun tu sngo ba 'am/ yang dag par sla ba 'am stan tsam yang mi rnyed kyi steng du gce rgya zhing tshig ngan brtsub mo mi snyan par zer mangs
509a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba su yod ces tshul shing drims so// rigs kyi bu de ltar tshus shing khrims kyang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri ba ni stong
509a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag las byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' tsam yang sngo bor ma gyur to// bcom ldan 'das des tshul ging thogs to// lan gnyis lan gsum du drims kyang sus mablangs
509a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rigs kyi bu ro'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dras par gyur nas
509a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa de stan las sangs te/ bre gos zag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i spangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
509a5(dkon brtsegs): medas zung ba gas de sogs su thal mo myur ba btu nas/ bcom ldan sa ban gshegs pa drim med par snang bas na ces pam to// bcos ldan
509a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag mi ma brgyad khri ba'i myong gi bar du yid yongs mi skye bar/ bde ba thams cad ni spangs/ sdug bsngal thams cad ni jim snyam par bgyis te/ rgyal bu gco
509a7(dkon brtsegs): rlo sa kyi kyis rigs kyi la byung ba snyams dpa' rnams pa na jus nas ma hAH/ dus
509a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi myong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tugasong nas/ rtswa'i bu rgyang zung kyis kyi seng gi mngams 'i rgyang chub sems dpa' na 'phrum la
509b1(dkon brtsegs): thus brjon 'grus chen po'i gol lags pa 'ad du migs sa legs sos/ legs so zhes bya byin no// mas kyi busas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa na
509b2(dkon brtsegs): na 'thus 'dir la rba gan dung dbul gyi khyim nu songs/ khyim gyi go drung na 'jug pa dang / demyed po'i tshogs chen pa des mthong nas/ gagets+tshan sa
509b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs te/ de las dang rdul yang gtor/ de la lag pa dang / dbyig pa dang / bong bas kyang bajigs so// des mthong shing thos te/ lus la rag ci
509b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur byeng / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar 'jug pa'am/ gtse ba 'am/ 'ong khro ba 'am/ phyir log par ma gyur gyi sted na/ brtson 'grus
509b5(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa'i stobs rab tus bskyed nas/ stobs dang rab tu ldan pa dang / snying rje chen po yang bskyed de/ de lo sbyong lon pa dang / rgyal po'i pho zung gi sgo gang bdun
509b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nang du zhugs pa nas/ lo bdud khri lon pa na dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo gang drug pa'i nang du zhugs so// de lo brgyad khri bzhi spong son pa dang / drus zin
509b7(dkon brtsegs): bzang gi sgo gang bdun pa'i nang du bzhugs pa dang / de nas gdong rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal des tshig ster te/ dge slong khyod ci 'drod/ ci zhig tshel/ khyod ma
509b8(dkon brtsegs): dgos smros shig dang ci nus kyis rab tu sbyin par bya'o// rgyal bu gzhon nu de'i dge slong de la ngo mtshar chen po'i 'du shes skyes nas/ ci tsam du dge slong des yongs skyo ba
510a1(dkon brtsegs): mnags nus pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar des rgyal bu gnan
510a2(dkon brtsegs): nu gzho nor dpal de sems rab tu dang bar shes nas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zas dang skom dang gos dang bza' ba rnams// gzhon nu bdag sa dgos
510a3(dkon brtsegs): paci yang med// zang zing med pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas// bdag ni chos kyi pho ny+dzar 'dir 'ongs so// 'jig rten don mdzad drang srong che byung ba// mi mchog dri ma med
510a4(dkon brtsegs): par snang zhes bya// der sdug bsngal mthar byin chos ston te// sems can gang gis thos pa mi 'chi thob// bskal pa stong phrag bye ba grangs med na// sangs rgyas
510a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni brgyas ma 'byung bar 'gyur// da ltar 'jig rten mun nag skyon gyur pa// yon tan dam pa mnga' bde skyes na// khyod ni 'dir 'dod pa'i yon tanachags// khe \u0f7f
510a6(dkon brtsegs): dang sangs spyong rnams la rtag tu skyes// skyid mos de bzhin rgyal ming myos pas na// chos kyi rgyal pos bar long mi 'gro// longs spyod mi ga de bzhin rgyal srid tshig
510a7(dkon brtsegs): rtse'i zil thigs 'dre shes rgyal bas gsungs// gang pyir sangs rgyas thos kyang myos 'gyur ba// de ni rgyal bu khyod kyi ma yin// khyod 'drin byang chub mchog zhugs
510a8(dkon brtsegs): // sems can dag kyang nyer te zol bar gyis// khyod bdag dasar dod pa'i phran gyur na// ji skar mos pas skye bya 'gyur// ngargyal spongs te nyon mongs soms
510b1(dkon brtsegs): da ni rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar gyis// brtson 'grus paskyed de 'jig rten ming ban+de gyis// phyi ma'i dus na gtung bar gyur tere// rgyal bus tshig su ba
510b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di thos nas// nga rgyal spangs te gus pa rab bskyed nas// brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te// gang sngon bdag gis gnod bgyis bzod par
510b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol// bdag ni d+hal srid thams cad spangs par bya// 'dod dang de bzhin longs spyod kun mi tshol// nga rgyal zla ba'i skyon dang dregs te// myur du bde bar gshegs pakyi
510b4(dkon brtsegs): gan du 'gro// de ni srog chags bye ba brgyad nus bskor// me tog na bza' sros dang bdug pa thogs// dri ma med par snang po skyes bu ma chog/ rgyal po de yi
510b5(dkon brtsegs): drung dul bar song // bde bar gshegs kyi gan du phyin nas kyang // zhabs la phyag 'tshal de nas mchod byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa de yi spyan sngar 'dug/
510b6(dkon brtsegs): bu de las tshig ni 'di smras so// gang phyir skye med sems kyis bskul bas na// brtson 'grus 'bar ba bdag gi ston pa mgon// ji ltar don mchod pa'i 'os lag
510b7(dkon brtsegs): na// de la lan tu phan pa bgyi ma nus// bdag ni 'jig rten mgon la bzod pa gsol// chos kyi rgyal la gus pa gang ma bgyis// de dag thams cad de rings
510b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs// bdag ni gi nongs pa 'jig rten mgon mkhyen mdzod// sems can don tu snying rje bskyed nas su// bdag ni byang chub dam pa 'di mchog la rabazugs te/
511a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa mchog mthob bar du ni// slan cad bag med spyod pa mi bgyi'o// rgyal bu de yis rgyal srid rnams spangs te// sems can bye ba brgyad
511a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis bskor// byang chub dam pa 'di ni yongs tshol zhing // mngon byung rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu byung // rgyal bas de dag gi ni bsam mkhyen nas// byang chub la mngo mchog
511a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan pas na// chos thob sems can rtag tu dag pa rnams// thams cad kyis kyang rjes 'thun bzod pa thob// rigs kyi bungs bskal pa 'am/ bskal ba las
511a4(dkon brtsegs): sdug par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bsngags pa brjod cing gang chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod kyang yon//
511a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtha' zad par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing the tsom pa
511a6(dkon brtsegs): yid gnyis su gyur na yang desar mi gyi'o// gyu na/ de'i mi de'i dus na snying zung chub sems dpa' brjon 'dus 'ang gas pa pa gyur/ sa
511a7(dkon brtsegs): 'i de'i dus nargyal du gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa dgazhan ni ga yin pa sgyum du dogs shing gi tsam tha'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na yang desar mi bas ma/
511a8(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nun dpal zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu desar
511b1(dkon brtsegs): rjod byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongasu mi skyo ba zhing 'di sa shin tu stobs dang ldan te/ badzin 'grus nye par ldan // rigs kyi
511b2(dkon brtsegs): bu skya bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'dod pas/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar shes bya ba des ras
511b3(dkon brtsegs): ba byu / deci'i byor na na/ rigs kyi bu sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin no// rigs kyi bu bani po 'di dag ni
511b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dis sde bdud kyi las las shin du 'da' ba'i byang chub sem
511b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i las dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / lus dang ngag dang yid brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / sangs
511b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i las te/ rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin
511b7(dkon brtsegs): / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyes par 'gyur ba'o// dz+ra bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
511b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang / dbang po yongs su shes pa'i ye shes dang / nad thams cad ni ba'i sran
512a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i ye shes dang / nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes te/ rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
512a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par spyad par 'gyur ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa
512a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po rjes/ gtsug nor bu rin po che gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rngu bas mngon par grub pa gang
512a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu nor bu nor na po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang bas kyang rin tu mi bzod pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che de/ de bzhin gshegs
512a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gtsug na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba'i dge ba'i
512a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spyi gtsug bskur mi snang ba thob pa dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes skye bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang ldan par gyur cig/
512a7(dkon brtsegs): denas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe 'dzum pa mang dzad // 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyis / mam 'dzum pa ma dza na bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam tsham
512a8(dkon brtsegs): nam pa ga zer ba ga dum pa dag sgo chags 'dis kyi ston po dang / ser po dang / dmar bdang da bo dang / me banan dang / ril dang / dus kyi ngasas
512b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyuste/ dedag gis 'dig rten rgyalams mtha' yas su med pa de gzod kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig na kyi yar du mngon par 'phags te/
512b2(dkon brtsegs): nyim rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis yongs su zad par byas nas myur log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong d+ha mar bskor na ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
512b3(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' srabs pa myur ba zhes bya ba sbyin las langs te/ za gas phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bus mo gsus
512b4(dkon brtsegs): nga'i spangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das lag la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'jum
512b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa'i don nus so// mi mnyam pa mnyam pa'i dam pa 'jig rten mig sbyin 'jig rten mchog/ shAkya'i rgyal sras dbang po ni zhing dri gsum drim spangs// mtshungs
512b6(dkon brtsegs): med mtshungs 'das byams pas 'phags pa rgyal ba ri rab bzhin// ci slad 'dir 'dzum ye shes 'byung gnas bdag la lung bstan gsol// gya rgya mi mnga' rab tu mchen
512b7(dkon brtsegs): sa shin snyan pa'i gsung // skyes bu dam pa bder ba sbyin pa dran mchog blo gros thugs// bde gshegs mos pa mchog dang ldan pa lha dang mis mchog ma// ci srad 'dzum
512b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'adi mdzad pan pa mdzad pas bstan tu gsol// stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' 'dom gang 'od dang bsod nams gzi brjid 'od// 'khor gyi nang du seng ges bur rin
513a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags rgol ba bcom// thub pa srid gsum khyod dang mnyam pa'am lhag pa gang yang med// chos kyi dbang phyug ci sdang 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan
513a2(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// rab tu bzhad cing mchog tu dgyes pa shin tu dri med nal// zla ba lta bur nam mkhar gshegs nas phyogs su lam me bar// mun pa bcom zhing rdul bcom 'od
513a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal ni rab rgyas nas pa// bde bar gshegs pa 'dzum pa mdzad pan pa mdzad pas bka' stsol cig/ gser ri 'od 'dra bcul zhug grub pa'i bsod nams ye shes 'gro/
513a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas rtag su bsngags 'jig rten ngo mtshur mchod pa'i 'os// srid pa'i dam pa 'jig rten 'das pa sbyin gnas mi zad ning // rnam ma 'dzi dngas rab sna
513a5(dkon brtsegs): shAkya seng ges 'dzum pa bstan// lha dang mis mchod khyod 'bras dang rtswa yul dag na'ang med// mi mnyam mos pa mnyam pa khrel yod dpal gyis rangab rgyas
513a6(dkon brtsegs): sa na brtsanams shis ng+yas pa'i mtshan ni ba rdzogs pa// bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa thub pa bzla kar stsol cig/ kun cu khyod kyi yi shes dum gsuM mchags
513a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa la // sems deng me myo bi gang dang sems can bsam pa bad+ma// sems can kun gyi bsam pa d+hArnams cad ni cig mtshan// mi'i sa sa
513a8(dkon brtsegs): gang mar 'dus ma rang rigs don bdag sa gsungs// nam mkha' gnas pa'i sa mang yid kyang rab tu dga'// mitshigs sam gnas pa thal sbyang phyag 'tshal gyis/
513b1(dkon brtsegs): gang thos lha mi'i mun pa'i rdul rnams srel 'gyur ba// mi mchog gis ni bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dbye bar gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
513b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa myur ba la 'di skad ces gso bka' stsal te// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'dis/
513b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ched du/ gang gtsug gi nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa sa phul ba mthong ngam/ gsom pa ma
513b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas bcoms
513b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dis gan klung gi bye ma snyed mnyes par byas/ bsti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas shing mchod nas/ thams cad du'ang tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ sems
513b6(dkon brtsegs): can dpag tu med pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa
513b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong na/ bskal pa dri ma myed pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
513b8(dkon brtsegs): nabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten pa mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ swa dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
514a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i sa gzhi ni rin po che sna ba
514a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'od gang byung ba des/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// 'od de yang gser
514a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi kha rig lta bur 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag 'od des reg par gyur pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gzir bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams
514a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od dri ma med pa de yang 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur ro// de byang chub sems dpa' rin po che ma gtogs par rin po che gnan
514a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ming rin po 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rab tu thob
514a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de dag gi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa thams cad kyang bsam pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang mi 'byung
514a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// den mi khom pa dang / ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur ro//
514a8(dkon brtsegs): da bam ldanas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba blan med pa'i chos kyi rgyal pom gtogs par rgyam po gnan 'byung bar mi 'byor// sgra dang mi dag thams
514b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams den bud med dang 'jig cing 'dra ba'i ming yang med par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi 'ams dran tham
514b2(dkon brtsegs): can song ba 'am/ nor ba 'am/ na po 'am/ skyur po 'am/ yan lag mtshang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ de dgra thams cad kyang lus mtshan gyis legs par
514b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dpag med par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe tshad kyang bskal pa bar ma bzhi bcu rtsa ba'i
514b4(dkon brtsegs): thu bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub dang rab tu ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa/ snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldanu pa ma gtogs par
514b5(dkon brtsegs): gtam gzhan ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang dbang po rdo ste/ zur tsam gyis go bar 'gyur ro// de dag kyang chos kyi sgo'i tshig reres/ sangs rgyas
514b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyu
514b7(dkon brtsegs): ro// de la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshig gcig gis tshig thams cad la 'jug pa'o// tshig gcig po de yang ga she na/ 'di lnga ste tshig mi zad
514b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na/ tshig mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang zad par byed mi nus pa'o// tshig mi zad pa gang zhen/ 'diH
515a1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ a zhes bya ba ni tshig mi zad pa'o// a zhes bya ba la zhugs na/ yi ge 'bru thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de ltar na yi ge zam
515a2(dkon brtsegs): cad ni mi zad ste/ yi ge 'bru gnyis snga phyi med par thos par mi nus so// yi ge 'bru re re nas brjod kyi/ yi ge yang yi ge gnyis dang 'brel ba ma yin no// de bas na tshig
515a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig po de nyid rnam par dag pa'i tshi ga ste/ gang rnam par rig pa'i tshig de yang rnam par rig pa'i tshig ces rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed do// de ltar tshig de ma
515a4(dkon brtsegs): rtog rnam par mi rtog par dgos pa med de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs la 'jug pa'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba de byang chu
515a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi blangs bskal pa 'am bsal lus lhag par 'jig rten 'gyi khams 'od
515a6(dkon brtsegs): drim med pa de'i bsngags pa brjod cing de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che 'byung ba de'i chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab sa
515a7(dkon brtsegs): de brjod kyang / man can yongs su brjod par nga bar mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de di yon tan gyi rnam pa gad pa rgyang med pa de med 'byung bar 'gyur ro// denas
515a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches bdag srung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' mgu yid yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes
515b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ chos rnams su
515b2(dkon brtsegs): rim gshegs// 'khrul pa'i sbyin rnams thams cad las// de bzhin gshegs pa shin du 'das// ye shes chen po khyed rje mtshar// sangs rgyas bye ba med ma/
515b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sngon mchod gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen// 'das dang ma 'ongs dus rnams dang // de bzhin daskar ba yi// bdag gi spyod dang de na
515b4(dkon brtsegs): // srog chags kun gyi rab tu mkhyen// thub pa ci 'dra 'dra bar// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur zhes// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag lung bstan//

515b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung // ye shes ldan la shes rab che// des ni bdag la bden tshig gis// byang chub mchog tu lung bstan pas// sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur// thugs kyis yid ni
515b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas na// bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra dang // sangs rgyas zhing yang ci 'bru ba// de 'dra nyid bu kun bstan to// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas// the tsomam
515b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis dbang po tshim// sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyar// mchog gi spyod pa sprad par bgyi// bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra ba// sngon gyi mthar ni rnam sbyangs pa// de bas shin tu
516a1(dkon brtsegs): dpag yas par// bdag gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi// 'di ni le los mi 'da' bas// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i spyod pa 'di// zhum pa ma mchis sa
516a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis su// byang chub spyod pa spyad par bgyi// bdag ni byang chub lung bstan pa// sangs rgyas kyis yi ni spo brtsal// ji srid 'dren par ma gyur pa// de srid brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo //
516a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu byung chub mchog gzhol te// sems can thams cad gnyer bar bgyi// byang chub dam pa don tu btsal// de dag bdag gis bskyang bar bgyi// byang chub sems dpa' ba
516a4(dkon brtsegs): marin po che sa tshigs su bcad pa'i 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags stong phrag bcu cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'jig rten gyi
516a5(dkon brtsegs): khams 'od dri ma med par rtse bar sems kyis sngon te tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das nam de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba des byang chub thob par gyur pa de na/
516a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cing ces smras pa dang / de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to// de nas pa
516a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan las kyis med ldan pa kum pa' phel bka' stsal la/ kun dga' tshems kyi rnam rdzangs 'di chung gis/ chongs / thog shig/ nub par byas
516a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang kyi cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mi gangs ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam theg pa de dag ni/ thanas
516b1(dkon brtsegs): pamang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu srung bstan tu// kun dga' bo rags kyi sgra'am rigs kyi su mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
516b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me snang du mi bzhed ces sbyin pa pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mes te 'chang ngam/ rlog
516b3(dkon brtsegs): gam/ de len bzhin du nan tan byed na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang ste/ tshad med grangs med par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
516b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di jis
516b5(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yo ngas su dag pa zhes bya bar
516b6(dkon brtsegs): zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag ces bya bar zung shig/ gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka
516b7(dkon brtsegs): sbal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
516b8(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rna dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
517a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ gtsug na rin po ches nus pa'i le'u
517a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ste bzhi bcurtsa bdun pa rdzogs s+ho/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de darmata sha~M las nus te/ skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab bo// 'phag
517a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi cu rtsa brgyad pa ste/ lha mo dpal 'phreng seng ge'i sgras zhus pa/
517a4(dkon brtsegs): bam po dang po'o/ rgyagar skad du/ ma grams de bas mnang nam mahA ya sUtra/ bod ma du/ 'phags pasdu mo pa
517a5(dkon brtsegs): 'breng sring po'i sgra zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
517a6(dkon brtsegs): d+has gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgo ni med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bcugs so// de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal
517a7(dkon brtsegs): po gsus rgyas dang / btsun mdam pa brgya ma 'brings rnams/ skyes dpas 'bring ches tshogs nas/ rang ba ma man pa'i skabs su gtam thongs pa/ bral ba
517a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po kyis kyad kyi sras ma sum dpal 'brid ni 'ab 'dzings gang gsams mas kying mkhas / gas nyings bcom ldan 'das mthong bstad/ chags chung dus
517b1(dkon brtsegs): gas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la yang mtsham ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas yul lo la'i rgyal po gas la rdul gyis/ brgyad po 'ijis
517b2(dkon brtsegs): sa 'das ces smras so// 'phreng ldan ma'o bu cag gis/ lha mo dpal 'breng la po nyanus pa zhig gtang gor ma chag go// deskade ces smras pa dang / mdun pa 'i
517b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi tshig te mnyan nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo 'phreng ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa
517b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa du ma bris ste/ nang kor ma yid brtan pa zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba de'i lag 'phrin yig bskur de mthar kyis song ste/ grong khyer 'thab med du phyin nas/ btsun mo
517b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor du song ste/ lha mo dpal 'bred la phyag 'tshal nas phan tsun kun dka' ba'i gtam byos te/ snga mo dpal 'breng gi lag tu 'phrin yig byin no// deras
517b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal 'breng gis pa ma la gus pas phrin yig de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas/ mgo la gtugs te/ bdag nyid kyis 'phrin yig blangs nas/ phrin yin
517b7(dkon brtsegs): gri don bzang ngo zhes nges par bzung ste/ don tu nges par bzung nas/ mgo gcogs te ya mtshan du bzung nas/ lha mo dpal 'phreng gis nang kor ma zla ba lta bu la
517b8(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra 'di ni// 'jig rten dag na shin tu dkon// gal te tshig 'di bden gyur na// bdag gis khyod la mgo ba
518a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin// gal te bcom ldan 'das rgyas te// 'jig rten don tu byung gyur na// de ni bdag la thugs rje yis// bstan pa'i ched du 'dir skyon cig/
518a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas de yi skad cig la// mgor po gshegs nas mkha' la bzhugs// bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sku// 'od gzer 'gyed cing bzhugs pa mthong // de nas
518a3(dkon brtsegs): de tshe lha me ni// gus pas 'khor byas langs nas kyang // spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas// smra ba'i mchog la bstod pa ni// mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang // dpal
518a4(dkon brtsegs): dpe gang na'ang yod ma mchis// bsam yas dpe zla ma mchis pa'i// 'jig rten mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang // ye shes la
518a5(dkon brtsegs): yang bas ma mchis// khyod kyi sangs rgyas chos mi bas// de bas thub khyod skyabs kyang lags// bsam yas rtsal ldan khyod kyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyi skyon
518a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams bsal// nyams ma mchis pa'i sa brnyes pa// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes bya thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// ye shes sku yi dbang phyug ste//
518a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi// mthar phyin khyodas phyag 'tshal lo// bzhas yas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dpe las 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ kham
518a8(dkon brtsegs): yas chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas gzugs khyad phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni dasar mgon pos bskyabs/ byang chub sa ben rnam par bskyed// ma
518b1(dkon brtsegs): pa d+hAgaH// thub pas bdag la pham gdags mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bran rnams su skum kyang//
518b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sbyor ba byas// phyis kyang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu// ngas ni rjes su gzung bar bya'o// lha mo dpal 'phreng gis gsol pa/ bdag gis 'di dang gzhanadag
518b3(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams gang dang gang bgyis pa// bsod nams yis mgon pa kyang// rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog/ de nas snga mo dpal 'byung dang sman
518b4(dkon brtsegs): / btsun mo kun dga' dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi la rlabs la gtugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dus pa
518b5(dkon brtsegs): nang du lha mo dpal 'phreng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ lha mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i yon tanag gis
518b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod pa'i bsod nams bstsags pa gang yin pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di lha mo khyod bskal pa tshad med grangs med par/ lha dang mi'i rgyal srid phun sum
518b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs thams cad du yang nga mthong ba dang bral mi 'gyur zhing / nga la mngon sum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags pas bsngag
518b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// dbyin cad bskal pa brgya stong phrag grang
519a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyi shu na/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i
519a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe yang lha mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas kying zhing der ngan song dga' byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyang dge bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par 'gyur te/
519a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag la nad kyang med/ rga ba yang med/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i gnod pa yang med de/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro//
519a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di lhur bde ba dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dpal
519a5(dkon brtsegs): dang gzi brjid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / longs spyod thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag shin
519a6(dkon brtsegs): tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyuraro//
519a7(dkon brtsegs): sku de bzhin dung dge ba'i rtsa ba dag byas pa'i sems can rnams de'i ni/ sangs kyi zhing dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha mo dpal 'breng gi lung bsun phun sumachags
519a8(dkon brtsegs): bathos nas/ lha dang mi dpag tu med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi'ing der skye ba'i smon sam bam po// de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar bcom ldan 'das/
519b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis lung bstan to// de nas sa mo dpal 'phreng gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ yi dam chen po brgyalangs
519b2(dkon brtsegs): par zangs so// bcug zhe na/ 'di sa skye bcom ldan 'das de sung cad bdag gis tshul khrims kyi la dus las 'da' ba'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan
519b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das yi dam dang po 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das nga slan cad bdag gis za ma dag la mgus pa
519b4(dkon brtsegs): sems bsred par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam gnyis pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par drang ngo // bcom
519b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ngasran cad gang tu yang sems can la khro ba dang / gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam gsum pa 'di yang byang chub snying
519b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par thang ngo // bcom ldan 'das da sran cad bdag gis gzhan gyi dpal dang kyi gnan phun sum tshogs pa dag la drug
