519b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam bzhi pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom
519b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dgran cod bdag gis than lam slad ma tsam la yang ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam lnga pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying zan/
520a1(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de slan cad bdag gis/ bdag nyid kyis longs spyod pa'i slad du nor yongs
520a2(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can dbul po sdug bsngal zhing mgon ma mchis pa yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su gzung bar 'chal
520a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam drug pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das da sran cad bdag gis bsdu
520a4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po bzhis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa na bdag la sman du re ba'i srad du sems can bsdu bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'ad zang zing ma mchis pa'i se
520a5(dkon brtsegs): dang chog par mi 'dzin pa dang / ldog pa ma mchis par sems can yang dag par bsdu bar 'tshas te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam bdun pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i ma
520a6(dkon brtsegs): zug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par zang ngo // bcom ldan 'das ngasrad cang bdag gis sems can mgon ma mchis pa dang / gor stsal ba dang / bcings pa dang / na
520a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyam thag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul po dang / phongs par gyur pa dang / tshogs chen pos tsho ba dag mthong na/ de dag la sman ma btag par gom pa gcig kyang
520a8(dkon brtsegs): ring bar mi bgyi'i/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag mthong na/ sdug bsngal de dang de dag las yongs su thar bar bgyis pa
520b1(dkon brtsegs): nor gyi bsgru bas bsgrubs nas/ skad kyis bdag mchis par bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam brgyad pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis
520b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das slan cad bdag gis bag 'tshong dang bya ba la sogs pa'i sdigs pa'i las kyi 'tsho zhing / de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa
520b3(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'i tshul can dge mthong na/ yal bar mi 'dod gyi bcom ldan 'das grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i bo zung
520b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gang dang gang dag na bdag gi mchid nyan pa de dang de dag su tshar dgum pa'i rigs pa rnams ni tshar dgu ma/ sman gdags pa rnams la ni sman gdags par 'tshal lo/
520b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das tshar dgum pa dang / sman gdags pas ni 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i slad du ste/ dam pa'i chos yun
520b6(dkon brtsegs): ring dru gnas na/ skra dang mi rnams kyi sus rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / ngan song rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
520b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjes su bskor bar bgyid pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam dgu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gis yang dag par zang ngo //
520b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dgran cad bdag gis dam pa'i chos bzung ba las bskyud par bgyi ba'i sems gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i srang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'a
521a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos bzung ba las bskyud na theg pa chen po bskyud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po bsgyu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa srung
521a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa bsrud ni/ theg pa chen po la ma mthun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
521a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po gang theg pa chen po la ma nges pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la mi 'dun par 'gyur zhing dang nyam du gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byis pa
521a4(dkon brtsegs): lha so so'i skye bo'i sar mchi ba'i skal pa can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis nyes dmigs dang gnod pa chen por mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'ad
521a5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa las ni bdag dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dpag tum mchis pa'i don yongs su grub par mtho
521a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar ba'i yi dam bcu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par zang
521a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs pa lags te/ 'di la chos kyi rdo nyid bdag gi dbang tu
521a8(dkon brtsegs): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das ston pa mngon sum du gyur bu lags kyang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung rdul ma dag/ kye ma ma yi sa chen po bcu po 'di
521b1(dkon brtsegs): dag ni phyogs par dka'o// snyam nas du bdag la the tsom 'am/ yid gnyis 'tshal ba de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis yun ring por gnod pa dang / sdug
521b2(dkon brtsegs): bsdam pa dang phung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid la spyan gdags pa'i skang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di brgya
521b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ bdag gis yi dam chen po bcu po gang dag blangs pa'i yi dam bcu po 'di dag la/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag ji skad smras pa de bzhin du/
521b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba sti na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'dis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig/ lha'i sgra grag
521b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ des kyang bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di len par gyur cig/ lha mo dpal 'breng gis tshigs de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i tshe lha'i me tog gi
521b6(dkon brtsegs): char 'bab par gyur cig chen po bab nas bar snad las swa'i sgra grags par gyur te/ des bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs de mnos nas/ snga mo de de bzhin no// jis
521b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs byas pa de ni de bzhin du gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul de yang mthong / spu'i skas
521b8(dkon brtsegs): mnos pa de yang thos nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor the tsom cing mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/ lha mo dpal 'phreng dang mi 'bral zhing / 'grogs par smon lam
522a1(dkon brtsegs): btab bo// 'khor de thams cad de bzhin du 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// de ba nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gyis bcom ldan 'a
522a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyan sngar smon lam chen po btab bo// gsum gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'dis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag la sman
522a3(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa gang lags pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bcom ldan 'das bdag tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa'i chos rtogs pa thob par gyur cig/
522a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po dang po lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos rtogs pa de thob kyang / ngal ba dang / yongs su skyob ma mchis par sa
522a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag go smon lam chen po gnyis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos bstan pa de yang
522a6(dkon brtsegs): sus dang thogs mis par dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gsums
522a7(dkon brtsegs): gas te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sman la ma chen po gsum pa de dag 'debs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi se sa mo dpal 'bring gi smon lam chen po yul che bas/
522a8(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag sung son pa mdzad do// su mo 'dis ste dper na/ thugs su gtogs pa thams cad ni nam la che khams kyi longs su 'dus shing khongs su gtogs la lo
522b1(dkon brtsegs): rung // sum bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gnA'i rlung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang smon lam chen po 'di gsum gyi khongs su gtogs pa khongasas du ra
522b2(dkon brtsegs): smon ma mtshan pa gsum po de dag na de ltar yul che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sna mo dpal 'breng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la smon la
522b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'i yus bstan pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa
522b4(dkon brtsegs): gnang gis khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la snga mo dpal 'phreng gi 'di sad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i ska
522b5(dkon brtsegs): lam gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i smon lam chen po gcig gi khongs su 'dus khongs su chud
522b6(dkon brtsegs): de/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin na de ltar yul che ba legs so// de na nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga mo dpal 'phreng la legs so zhes bya ba
522b7(dkon brtsegs): byinaH/ snga mi legs so legs so// snum khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/ thabs kyis yongs su bsgom pa'i shes rab dang ldan no// snyam sems cad gang dag khyong cin
522b8(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa'i don rtogs pa de dag ni dkon pa yin te/ yun ring po nas sangs rgyas du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa yin na/ lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su
523a1(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba bstan pa ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang dam pa'i chos
523a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gzung bar bstan pa de nyid bshad do// 'chad do// 'chad par 'gyur ro// lha mo nga yang da ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub mchog thob nas/ dam pa'i chos yongasu
523a3(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba bstan pa rnams du mar ston to// lha mo de ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa ngas rnam pa du mar bshad kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan rnams
523a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtha' 'am mu thug pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la yang mtha' 'am mu thug pa med do// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o// lham
523a5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar phan yon che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
523a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod spobs par ni
523a7(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la snga mo dpal 'bring gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni/
523a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bar lag so// bcom ldan 'das das pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni na gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong sdud pa
523b1(dkon brtsegs): mgams// bcom ldan 'das dper na 'jugs pa'i dus kyi che'i sbyin chen po che 'dos mtha' yas pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che mtha' yas pa'i rtsa dang lda ba
523b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ba'i dungam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yang bso rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i mab ci rgya 'apal dum mchis dang /
523b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyun dpag dam mchis pa dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na 'chags pa'i dus kyi che'i rlud kyi phung po chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jib
523b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ams kyi skye gnas de las ni gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag rgya kha dog sde tshogs pa dang dbyings snga tshogs pa'abyung ming 'i 'a gling bram bye bar rgya brag badrang dru pa'i ba kyi bu
523b5(dkon brtsegs): de las 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa theg pa chen po yang dag par 'grub pa'i 'byung khung dang / che gnas su gyur ba de las byang
523b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang / chos snang ba'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs dang 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten po'i dbang byug rngams
523b7(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / 'jig rten las 'angs pa'i dad balnga dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba gang lags pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das dper nas chen po ma 'u chen pa
523b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i'i rted bgyid pa legs te/ bzhi po de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chab kyi phung po chen po rgya mtsho dang / ri mang po thams cad tshad dang gnas pa dang / rtswa dang / shing bel ba dang / sngan
524a1(dkon brtsegs): lo tog dang / nags tshal thams cad dang / sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi rten bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po mi 'ur chen po bzhi pa
524a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gi rjer dgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sa chen po bas kyang mes khur chen po ba'i rnyed ba la gas
524a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang rer 'di sde lnga ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang bral zhing thos pa dang ldan na/ chos can ma lags pa rnams lha dang mi'i phun su
524a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa thob par bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dgal sbyor ba na/ sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po ster lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems cad 'jig 'amacho
524a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa la stong ba bgyid pa ni/ sa chen po byas ches khur chen po byeng ba lag so// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can bcig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sbyor bar brjidas
524a6(dkon brtsegs): thobs kya chos la chen po byer ba lags so// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can la ga theg pa chen po ma myor bar bgyid pa ni ma chen po bas kyang rjes drang chen
524a7(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag ni khur chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi dra bo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ dung rjen
524a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ba'i byang ba lags te/ sa chen po ngas kyang ches chen du gyur ba dang sa chen tho zas grangams bu chen po khyer ba dang / lung tha yas pa byer ba dang / sems ca thams cad bye
524b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyan+ya rung / rnams pa bgyis pa dang / snying rje can dang / sman par 'tshal ba dang / snying brtse ba dang / chos kyis 'jig rten gyi ma zhes baN+DI ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper nas
524b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi mi bzhi'i 'byung ba nas lags te/ sna ba'i pa de dag gang nin 'i mtsho na thang ma mchis padag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po tshe na byang mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang /
524b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ning bas rlung bdag gis 'byung gnas dang / rin po mye de pas kyang rlung bdag gi 'byung gnas la gas te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar sa chen po rin po che sdu bzhi po de dag gi 'byung gnas su
524b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas/ sems can rnams kyis rin po che'i cho ga chen po rin po che thams
524b5(dkon brtsegs): dam par gyur pa bzhi'i lce rnyed par 'gyuraro// gang zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la brten nas/ sems can rnams kyis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par
524b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi kyi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa she
524b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thob par bgyi brnyed par gyur pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu nye bar 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ches thon mthob par bgyi brnyed par 'gyu
524b8(dkon brtsegs): bste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ngom pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa la brten nas/ sems can rnams kyis rin po che thams cad kyi mchog ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rin po checheno
525a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i lce rnyed par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das ter chen po rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bgyi ba de ni dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dgas lags
525a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dpa pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa ces bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpa pa'i chos kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ @
525a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos lag so// bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i tshe yong su 'dzi pa po yang gzhanal /
525a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rdu lag so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du'an/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni sems
525a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sbyin pa yongasu smin par bgyi ba de dag ni sbyin pas yongasu smin par bgyid de/ tha na lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag yongasu gtong bas/ kyang yongasu sbyin par bgyid de/ de ltar yo
525a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par bgyis pa rnams dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i srin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sem nan gang dag tshul khrims kyis yongasu smin par bgyi
525a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de ga ni dbang po drug bsdams pa dang / sras dang ga dang yid kyi las yongasu dag pas sos sri par zer/ tha byangs sa gyis de dag gi sems srung ning ying su min par
525a8(dkon brtsegs): de sades de sar yongs srin par bkris pas dpa pa'o chos la gnas par gyur pa 'dzin/ de'i tshul khrims kyi pha ma tu smin pa lags// bcom ldan 'das sem sa na gang dag bzeng pa
525b1(dkon brtsegs): su med pa 'akyila'i sems can de dag la ni dag gis del myos brgyad// gtsob bgyis kyang nanod sems ma mchis shing snyan par 'tshal ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs ngas pa dang ldan pas yo su
525b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bgyidang/ blan gan gyi mangs kyis kyang de dag gi sems srung sa zhing yongasu smin par bgyid nga/ de dag yang su smin par bgyis pas/ das pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ ror brjod
525b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag brtson 'grus kyis yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems mthum zhing mi so ma mchis pa dang /
525b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus bcom pa mchog dang ldan pas yongasu smin par bgyid de/ tha na rang gi spyod lam bsgrims pas kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongasu smin par bgyid de/
525b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag de ltar yongasu smin par bgyis pas/ dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems gang dag bsam gtan
525b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis yong su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems mi g.yeng ba dang / yid phyi rol mi rgyub dang / dran pa 'khrul pa ma mchis pa/ mchog dang ldan pas yongasu smin par bgyid de/
525b7(dkon brtsegs): zan bgyis nas yun ringadabyalags pa dang / sbas nas yun ring bu lags pa mi bskrad pas kyang dedas gi sams srung ning yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dgang slar yong su mi dpar babyed
525b8(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su dpa pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di 'di de'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa lags sa// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis rab kyis yongs su smin par
526a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems can gyi don 'dri ba dag la le lo ma mchis par lung ston dang / bstan bcos thams cad dang / rig pa dang / zo
526a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas thams cad kyi thar phyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na bzo gra'i gnas chen po dag tu yang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag yongasu srin par
526a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par gyur pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lta legs pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang blan ma lags la/
526a4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa po yang bzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di la de
526a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis/ khyod kyis
526a6(dkon brtsegs): spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la snga mo dpal 'breng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzi
526a7(dkon brtsegs): pha po nas bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
526a8(dkon brtsegs): dam kyi mchas yongs su dzin pa po da dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa lags so// ngo tsa'i mang cazhen/ mngam ldan 'das kyi chu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dam pa'i chos 'ings
526b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa sa ni/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i srang du la nasag gsum yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di sar sus dang mog dang sos sus
526b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma lus yongs su gtong bas na/ sangs rgyas kyi mu 'khar ba'i phyi ma'i tha'i mangs tam pa/ nA ba dang / rab dang / 'om dang sa
526b3(dkon brtsegs): thigagasapa/ rtag pa bden pa ni bather zug pa/ 'chi'abo pa dang bras pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
526b4(dkon brtsegs): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo srog yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par 'phrul pa gnas pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i ma dang nyam pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dang zas pa/ mtha' yas pa
526b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo longs spyod yongs su gtong bas ni sems can thams
526b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis mchod pa/ 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa/ bsam par mi 'gyur ba/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa rtag
526b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mi 'chad cing / rtag tu gnas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ngam pa'i chos ma
526b8(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa yan lagasum po 'di dag yongasu gtong bas ni yon tan shin tu rmad du byung ba gsum po de dag thob par 'gyur te/ sang rgyas tha cad kyang lung ston par mdzad// bco ldan 'dra rig kyi phun
527a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo gang zhig dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i che/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bye zhing gnyis su gyur la skye sder chad de/ phyogs bya
527a2(dkon brtsegs): su gyes nas rtsod par gyur pa ma/ g.yom mchis shing gya gyu ma mchis la/ rgyu ma mchis par chos la dga' zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/ chos can gyi phyogs la 'ju/
527a3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de zhugs pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad las lung bstan pa nges par thob par thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
527a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar brtson 'grus chen po lags pa sum bdag bgyid de/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags/ ye shes su gyur pa lags
527a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ning bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni rton pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ldam dpa
527a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bring gis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa la rjes su yod rang ba mdzang pa/ lha mo de bzhin pa/ lha ma dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i ni brtson 'grus chen po yin na/
527a7(dkon brtsegs): lha ma par nam spobs dang ldan pas// gnang du mi drag par bstan du zin kyang snang bar 'gyur zhing nang bsrung bar byang // lha mo de bzhin du ngas pa'i chos yongs su na pa ni chung
527a8(dkon brtsegs): khas kyang bdang sdig cam pa gnod par 'gyur ni sra ngan bzung / sngags 'dzin par byeng ba// sumangs na badrang sdig can sa dam pa'i tshis yongs su yin pa/ dgar ma dzu /
527b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur nang sa par bsrungs ste sngags 'dan par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar mya ngan bsrung ba dang / desbyar smre sngags 'ad par byed pa'i dge ba'i chas gzhan gcig grang ma mthong
527b2(dkon brtsegs): lha mo dper na ba lang gi mchog khyu mchog gis ni 'di ltar pang mtho ba dang / chu zheng gis pa lang gi tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan te// mngon par brjod cing yang dag par mad
527b3(dkon brtsegs): par brjod do// lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang chung ngu zin kyang / 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por gyur pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
527b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon to// lha mo dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis ni 'di ltar mtho ba dang / rgya che bas ri nag po thams cad zil gyis
527b5(dkon brtsegs): gnon cing mngon par lhag ger 'dug go/ lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i lus dang / srog la mi zhing phan gdags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su
527b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa yang 'di ltar rgyal po dang / rgya chen por gyur pas theg pa chen po pa theg pa las gsar du zhugs pa lus dang srog la lta ba rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis
527b7(dkon brtsegs): gnon na/ gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ lha mo de lta bas na sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du bzhugs par bya/ yang dag par ga
527b8(dkon brtsegs): bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya/ gzung bar bya dgod par bya'o// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o// de ltar 'bras bu cham
528a1(dkon brtsegs): lha mo gal te bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ngas bshad du zin kyang / lha mo ngam
528a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yom na dang / phan yon bshang ba de dag gi mtha' 'ams thug par mi 'gyur ro// lha mo ngam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar ban mam
528a3(dkon brtsegs): yas pa dang ldan no// lha mo dam pa'i yongs su bzung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis banod pa ngas ma bstan pa/ da khyod kyis bshad par spobs par bgyis nig
528a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul pa mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
528a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos nas bgyi ba 'din theg pa chen po pa'i tshig bla dgas legs so// nga ci'i srang du nam bcom ldan 'das nyan zas dang / rang sa
528a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyirnas pa thams pa dang / 'jig ta pa dang / 'dagatan pas 'das pa'i dge pa tshas thams cad na zag pacan pas rba bye ba'i srang dum// bcom ldan 'as dpa
528a7(dkon brtsegs): na pa bzhi ni mchom dras pas 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ducan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa thams cad dang / 'dzi can pa dang / 'dzis rten mamal
528a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ge pa'i chos thams cad pang dag pa ni chen po las 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dper nas bon gyi rnam pa gang tsa lags pa dag dang / n+ya dang shing sel ba dang / sman
528b1(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal de dag thams cad sa chen po la brtan cing / sa chen po la gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rangs
528b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags pa dag dang / 'jig pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags pa thams cad dang / de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la
528b3(dkon brtsegs): brten cing theg pa chen po la gnas te/ skye nong 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas theg pa chen po la gnas shing / theg pa chen po yongs su bzung na/
528b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang / brten cing gnas te yongs su brgya
528b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang / dam pa'i chos nub pa dang / so sor thar pa dang / 'dul ba dang / rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzog
528b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gnas drug po 'di dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing btags pa gang lags pa'i gnas drug po de dag kyang / theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa las byung ba legs so//
528b7(dkon brtsegs): da ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa tsam lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po'i
528b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa nyid ni dam pa'i gnas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs can lags
529a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po nub pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos nub pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das so sor pa dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di dag gnyis
529a2(dkon brtsegs): nidon gcig ste/ yi ge'i 'bru ni tha dadang lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi bslab pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
529a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di sar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi srang du rab tu 'byung ba dang / bstan par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slang dus/ bcom ldan 'das de sa lags pas/ 'dis pa
529a4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bgyi ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa dri ni theg pa chen po'i cho ga'i tshul khrims kyi phung po lags so// bcom ldan 'das tha
529a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma mchis so// nga ci'i srang du zhem/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skad du rab tu 'byung ba dang /
529a6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni ma mchis kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi srad du nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa
529a7(dkon brtsegs): lags pa'i srang du'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams gang nga bzhin gshegs pa nyid la srabs su mchi ba legs te/ bamam ldam
529a8(dkon brtsegs): ngas bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams cang 'jigs pa dang btsam tha lags sa// bcoM'i srang dunam/ bcom ldan 'das dag bcom pa rnams dang / ngas
529b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams cang 'du byed thams cad la ma bzang par 'jigs pa'i 'dugs nye bar gnas pa lags pa'i srang drum// bcom ldan 'das dper na gsheng mas ras thams pa thom
529b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ de dag kyang nges par byung ba shin tu bde ba thob pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i srang du zhe na/ skyabs su gyur pa ni skyabs gan
529b3(dkon brtsegs): chos ba ma mchis pa'i srang du'o// bcom ldan 'das ji slar sems can sra bas ma mchis pa rnams gang dang / gang gis 'jigs skrag pa de dang de las 'byung bcos pa dbazhin du
529b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas rnams la yang 'jigs pa de mchis te/ 'jigs pa des skrag pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
529b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi bar khas len pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lagra
529b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang skye ba'i chos kyi lhag ma dang bcas lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi skye
529b7(dkon brtsegs): ba bas yang ma mchis sa// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bsten par bgyi ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ nges na de dag gi dag pa ma lags/ las mthar phyin pa ma lags te/
529b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi bgyi ba mang lags so// de dag gi spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gzhan yang mang du mchis te/ de dag ma sngags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
530a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
530a2(dkon brtsegs): babs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas
530a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o//
530a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
530a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das pa/
530a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yin tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i srang drag/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pan
530a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba 'di ming bzhin gshegs pa rnams thabs lagasaH/ daci'i srang canam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs padag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'is
530a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas spang bar bgyi ba'i sngon thams cad spangs shing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams
530b1(dkon brtsegs): da 'angs rgyas rnams ni sbyin gyi lhag ma rnams dang bcas pa yongs su dag pa'i chos can lags pa'i srang dram// bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das panas
530b2(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
530b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pa'i srad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying
530b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ring ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mtha' dbugs phyin pa rjes
530b5(dkon brtsegs): su dran pa bzhi po gang lags pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa can dang lhag ma bcas pa dang / drang ba'i don dang rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bgyi lags so// de ci'i
530b6(dkon brtsegs): srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyun 'chad pa'i 'chi 'pho dang / yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho
530b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ni nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das yongs su bsdu
530b8(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'bon dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang thob pa dag gi yid kyi sku
531a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams lags te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la 'chi 'bo 'di gnyis las rgyun 'chang pa'i 'chi bo'i dbang dub
531a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ bdag gis skye bzang ngo snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i 'bras
531a3(dkon brtsegs): bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la bsnyen nas/ bdag gis tshangs par spyad pa bsten to snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so// byis
531a4(dkon brtsegs): pa so so'i skye bo dang lha dang mi bgyi ba dang bcas pa thams cad dang / slob pa bdun po dag gis nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba sngon ma bgyis pa
531a5(dkon brtsegs): daspangs pa la brten nas/ bya ba byas so sam dra ngas bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yogs pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'dis bu tsang las/
531a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mazhes sa zhes bgyi bani sa gcom pas spang bar bzhi ba'i tsan mongs pa rnams dang / yang srid par tsang marnams sbyor ba'i dbang du bgyis nas/ 'dis thum
531a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mags sa sam dra dam bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'dis bu nyidi las gzhan mishes sa snyam pa
531a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang rnamangs pa sems cang spangs pa yang ma lags sku ba thams cad yongasas bcal ba las byung ba yang ma lags pa/ 'a'i srang du mas bcam ldan
531b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa dang / skye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs sum btsal pa yang mchis pa'i srang dram
531b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dag ni rnam pa gnyis te/ gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa nims dang / kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gnas
531b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lta ba gcig la gnas pa'i gnas kyis dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chag
531b4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gnas kyis bzhi po de dag gis nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba thams
531b5(dkon brtsegs): cad bskyed pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang skad cig pa ste/ sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rigs pa'i
531b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis thog ma mchis pa'i dus nas/ mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gnas kyis bzhi po 'di dag gi nang na/ stobs che ba gang la
531b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bzhir gyur pa ma rig pa'i gnas kyis stobs che ba'i grangs sam/ cha 'am bgrang ba 'am/ dpe 'am rgyur yang mi bzod lags so//
531b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni stobs che ba lags te/ srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i sa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na bdud sdig can ni
532a1(dkon brtsegs): gan yul dbang byang kyisa'i nang du gtogs kyang / 'di ltar gzugs dang khadag dang gzi brjid dang / stobs dang 'khar dang / dbang phyug sa
532a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phral dbang byed kyi lha rnams zil gnon to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa'i gnas kyis srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis zhes bgyi bas kyang sa
532a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis pani badz+ra ga zil gyis gnonaH/ nya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi byem las 'das pa snyid kyi rten du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bzhi dang / yang yun ring po nas lhan cig gnas
532a4(dkon brtsegs): bdas can pas dang / rang sas rgyasatsigs pas mdzob dang / de dzin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi migs kyis gnam par btsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ma pa
532a5(dkon brtsegs): gas thams thams samasas/ 'am com ldan pas dpa na ldan pa'itsun gyis phag pa dang bcas pa'i las rgyu las byung ba tshang
532a6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dag ldan 'das pa ma pas pa sems sa sas byung ba'i sa ma rnams dang/ seM kyi ma rnams
532a7(dkon brtsegs): byangs pa sems dpa' bang zab pa rnams pa nga kyisas gsus 'byungabacom ldan 'das sa rig pa'i gnas kyis nas gsum tha 'didag tu yid kyi sus gsan pa
532a8(dkon brtsegs): didag zu ba pas mas mas na pa ma ze mnas se/ bamam lda pa sa rnamamatshas can zungs/ da lams pa ma
532b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni yid kyi lus gsum po rnams dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rkyen lags pa'i srang du/ srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis dang / ming 'dra ba lags
532b2(dkon brtsegs): so// de lta lags kyang srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis dang / lus thun mong ba ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni sa bzhi po dag
532b3(dkon brtsegs): las tha dad pa kho na lags te// yongs su grol ba'i sa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa sas spang bar bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par
532b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni gnas kyis bzhi spangs kyang / zag pa zang pa la dbang
532b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i stobs kyang mi tho ba/ mngon sum du yang mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das zag pa zad pa zhes bgyi ba de ni ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan
532b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de lta lags pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / srid pa tha ma par gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sas
532b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrib shing tshong la yongs su dkris te ldongs par bgyis pas chos de dang de dag rab tu ma 'tshal zhing mi rtogs so// bcom ldan 'das chos de dang de dag ma 'tshal cing ma mthong bas
532b8(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dang de dag spongs shing byang bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag ma spangs shing byang bar ma bgyis pas/ bcom ldan
533a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'das de dag ni skyon las rnam par grol ba/ lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi/ skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
533a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lhag ma dang bcas
533a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags kyi/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags
533a4(dkon brtsegs): skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags pa dang / rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags pa dang
533a5(dkon brtsegs): lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags kyi/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma lags pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba lhag ma
533a6(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa lags so// kun 'byung ba sangs pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so// sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis bai lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so/
533a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsel 'gas par 'gro ba'i las bskam pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sug bsngal yongs su 'jal ba lkugs bcas papa
533a8(dkon brtsegs): sdus bsngal ban 'byung ba spangs pa lhags dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngam chags pa mangs sumadu bcom bsas mi dang bzhes pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gas par 'a
533b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa lhag ma dang bcas pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa lags so//
533b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun
533b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyis pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgoms pa gang la
533b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa bcom zhing / rtag tun pa'i 'jig rten du rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang sil ba'i dngos po'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de
533b5(dkon brtsegs): dag ni skyob pa ma mchis pa dang / skya bas ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten 'jig rten gyi skyob pa dang skya bas lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bzang ngan du 'byed pa'i
533b6(dkon brtsegs): chos can dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa tho ba/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba
533b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i slad du'o// bcom
533b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ltar lags pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni ro gcig ste/ 'di ltar rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i ror ro mtshungs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la dag
534a1(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ma spangs shing byang bar ma bgyis pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su ro gcig pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar rig pa
534a2(dkon brtsegs): ngang rnam par grol bar ro mtshungs pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pas spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung gi byem
534a3(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa snyed ma spangs shing ma spangs pa'i srang du ste// bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung gi byam las 'das pa skyed mtho bcing mngon sum dum bgyis par gyur
534a4(dkon brtsegs): spang dul/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni bsgom pas spang bar brtsi pa'i tsha mongs pa dang / nyaba'i tshan mongs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i 'byung ba
534a5(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ngasas ni sems kyinye ba dzin mangs dang / ni gnas kyi kyi pa'i tsan mongs pa dang / lhag mthang gis pa'i na mongs pa dang / bsamagan gyi ma
534a6(dkon brtsegs): mangs pa dang / lan gyis pa ma ngas pang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i che ba'i nyon mangs pa dang / rnas 'gyur gyi nyi ba'i can tshangs pa dang / gas pa'im pa'i tshan mongs pa /
534a7(dkon brtsegs): thas ma pa khamangs pa / mamangs pa dang / rnams pag mas sa mams pa yang byung lagasas
534a8(dkon brtsegs): mams lag grang sa rgyam sa pa las ban pa gags pa'i thamasam da
534b1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'ams 'byung ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad kyi rgyu dang / gan brten lags so// bcom ldan
534b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kun nas ldang ba lags pa de dag ni skad cig pa ste/ sems kyi skad cig dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis thog ma ma mchis pa'i
534b3(dkon brtsegs): dus nas mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma la 'das pa snyeng gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yin
534b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzhom pa zhing spang bar bgyi ba'i chos dag thams cad kyi gan dang rten ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i gnas kyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa
534b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang / drang shing gel pa dang / sman dang nags chal de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das sa la can cings la gnas te/ sku zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan
534b6(dkon brtsegs): dran 'das sanan pac-ig cing shegs ma gda' bar gyur / mamachis par gyur nanas pa kyirnam pa gang ni lags pa dag da na shing gas padang / ldan mags sa
534b7(dkon brtsegs): mas kyi bang gi mam pa bas gyung shi mamatshas par 'gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das ba'i du spang bar bgyi ba'i chis ng+gA l+r-ing gi byam pas 'as parnam
534b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi mashes kyis gnam par bgyi bdag thams cad kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyis 'artan cing / ma rig pa'i gnas kyis la gnas te/ sbyi na 'ams po
535a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyung ma gsas// bcom ldan las ma rig pa'i gnas kyis spangs shing sbyangs te ma mchis par gyur na ni spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i gling gi byam
535a2(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa steng gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang gnan ma
535a3(dkon brtsegs): lags/ chos kyi sku yang gzhan ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid chos kyi sku lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg
535a4(dkon brtsegs): pa theg pa gcig gi mtha' lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi mtha' nas bgyi ba de ni/ theg pa gcig gi mthar sbyang ba'i tshig bla dgas lags so// de ci'i slad du
535a5(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dus kyi mtha' mchis pa la gnas pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
535a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug par gnas pa'i srang du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ 'jig rten la smad pa'i slang du dus kyi mtha
535a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i thugs rje can dang / dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs dam mnga' ba ma lags te/ kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir dus kyi mtha' med par snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dus kyi
535a8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' mang par yangs bcas pa'i sems can malal nas 'am bdag ni bcom ldan 'das bzhin gshegs pa cad la yang dag par ska bas smra ba lags sa// 'a
535a9(dkon brtsegs): na la phan pa'i phyir rgyas mi bang pa dang / chos rtag pa dang / chos brtan pa dang / skyabs kyi sems tsamamalas nas 'chi bdag kyang de bzhin gag gas pa nyid la yang dag par/
535b1(dkon brtsegs): smra bamams so// bcom ldan 'das dal lags pas/ 'di sa rang bzhin gshegs pa dam brtsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni skya bsu ma mchis pa dang /
535b2(dkon brtsegs): bang mtsham pa'i 'jig tan gyi phyi ma'i mthar thug par skyabs mi bzang pa dang / skyabs rtag pa dang brtan pa lags ma// bcom ldan 'das ches nas bkri po 'di theg pa gcig gsas
535b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i tshig bla dgas lags// bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun zhes bgyi bde ni theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das skyabs 'di gnyis ni de'i yan
535b4(dkon brtsegs): lag gi skabs nas bgyi ste/ skabs kyi rab ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa cig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyang / chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' lags
535b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de'i pha rol ma thag pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyis ni bgyi ba ci yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das thethag pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyang 'jig pa dang bcas pas/
535b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la skya ba su mchis pa dang / 'byung ba'i thabs tshol ba dang / slob ma dang / bgyi ba dang bcas pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa lag so//
535b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na skyabs 'di gnyis ni/ skyabs kyi ra ba ma lags te/ dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i skyabs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa
535b8(dkon brtsegs): btul ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su 'chi ba na/ chos nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mngon par dad pas chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang skyabs su mchi ste/ bcom ldan
535b9(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mngon par dad pas skyabs su mchi ba gnyis la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la sbubs su bgyi
536a1(dkon brtsegs): ban ches nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mngon par dad pas mchi bar bgyi ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pasrabs su mchi ba ni skyabs su mchi ba yang
536a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das skye bas su mchi ba gnyis kyang yang dag par na de gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi zhes bgyi ba'i gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang spangs shing /
536a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs te ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag thams cad spangs shing sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang+gA'i klu
536a4(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed brnyes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa brnyes te/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang / thams cad
536a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa dang / skyon thams cad spangs pa dang / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug chos thams cad la mnga' sbyar ba'i sar gshegs nas nga'i skye ba
536a6(dkon brtsegs): bang po/ tshangs par sbyang ba bsnyen te// bya ba zlas so// 'di la bu N+Did las gzhan mogs so nas seng gnyis so rba bang mang // bcom ldan 'das sgra lags pas/ de bzhin ga
536a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams sa 'a sa pa da legs sa dang 'dzi man sa spang bdun pa ma pa gas/ bcom ldan sa 'dis mnying pas gnam mas sa
536a8(dkon brtsegs): sa su sa
536a9(dkon brtsegs): ma mas su sa
536b1(dkon brtsegs): rtsub byabs mang ces dag padag kya/ thams bcu ba dag stobs dang ma ma 'angs pa'i sathun mad pa tsham rgyag kya yang dag par gagasas kyi byams pa sa mam
536b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ShishA kyis rnam par dag zi granas 'dis bu 'di la gzhan ma shes nas kyis seng ge'i sgra stos par mang ngo // bcom ldan 'dra dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i 'jig pa lnga brgal bar mtsha
536b3(dkon brtsegs): rtarna par bres pa dgas pa banyams myong ba nam mi 'di ltar bdag ni 'khor ba'i 'jim pa rnam las yongs grol gyis/ bdags ni byin cang 'bar ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyu snyam du yang dag par
536b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong te/ bco ldan 'dra dgra btso pa rnam dang rang sang rgyas rnams 'di lta bu nyid lnga gzhan mi sheso zhes bgyi brtog na/ dbugs phyin pa'i mchog mya ngan las 'dra ba'i sa sor rtog/ bcoM ldan 'das degI rtogan kyang
536b5(dkon brtsegs): sa te rmod pa ma mchis pa'i chos can du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'dra gis kyang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bang gis ni 'di ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i sa thob ste/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzog pa'i byang chub tu
536b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gyur tesnyam du rgyal to/ ci'i slang du nas btsa ldan 'dudzin tu dang rangs rgyas kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par 'du ba'i ming du ste/ btsa ldan 'damag pa chen po zla bgyi ba de nis rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshig blang gra lags/
536b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'ad ltaran zag pa gas pa 'ag rig pa gcig ldan mang su mchi'o/ bcwa ldan 'duzag pa gcig sa pa blan med pa yang dag pa rdzog pa'i nga grA ba tsug/ btsam ma
536b8(dkon brtsegs): dag pa rjes pa'i byang nu ba rje bci ba ni myangs 'dra ba'i dbying sa tshig blang gra lags/ bcom ldan 'du mya ngan las 'dra ba'i dbu shes bgyi bar mi de bzhin gzhag pa'i gyi sgo'i gablang bre ba lda
536b9(dkon brtsegs): ma las spang byung ba kyis mo sa sa maldan lung ba sas pa yang 'damapas srubs mi ga'anapa sa se ma ldad dang ba dang dgatha bci sa thags pa dag ma semamam ma kyi
537a1(dkon brtsegs): ban pa chos 'di yang ban gas pa sgyu du mya nga/ gagagasapa shi sa pa yang dag par grub na
537a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i srad du'o// bcom ldan 'das mos pa ji lta dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pas theg pa gnyis po thabs kyis bsgrubs pas bsgrubs pa de dag kyang / theg pa chen po nyid kyi srang du/
537a3(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa 'di gnyis kyi meng rnams / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par na 'dis theg pa yang dag pa lags te/ theg pa gasnyam yang mang /
537a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'du'o// bcom ldan 'das can thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa thog mar mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa gcig pus ni gnas kyis de sad cig
537a5(dkon brtsegs): spong bar gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes pa gcig dus yongs su bcas pa las grogs pa yon tan bzhin rnams mngon sum dub rtsi par 'byur shing / don bani ba dag
537a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis shin du so sor rtogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i shes pa la zhes pa bani 'pho ba dang / dmigs pa pa ni 'pho ba mchis te/ btsa
537a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'jig rnam las 'das pa'i zhes pa de m+b+ha du mi 'dra ba'i chos can lags so// bcom ldan 'das demar 'dil can thos dang ngasangs rgyas rnams cad kyi gnas
537a8(dkon brtsegs): mamamang gags pa'i bad shes pa y-i me dag 'jigs pa 'gas/ ma 'das dgapa 'angamamapa' ba rnam pa gakyis kyim sa
537b1(dkon brtsegs): ni mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma la/
537b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi skabs spong lags so// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad
537b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phagags pa'i bden pa 'tshul pa dang po ni mthar phyin pa'i shes pa ma lags
537b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bzhugs pa'i shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i don de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig
537b5(dkon brtsegs): / drang gas ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan chang mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i yan lag gi yon tan ldan pa'i slad du
537b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'phags pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi ba de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa ma
537b7(dkon brtsegs): lags/ nyan thos dang rang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ma lags te/ bden pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis thog mar mngon par rdzog
537b8(dkon brtsegs): mngong par mkhye sa so sor rtogs nas/ de mngon par mkhyen pa'i nag tu de nin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs su bcug pa'i 'jig rten sa bam
538a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'a jug da pa'i rdong
538a2(dkon brtsegs): cing brtags te/ de'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi'o// za ba cang bral brtags pa ste/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag mi rus la rtog
538a3(dkon brtsegs): 'i snong su ma lags te/ mkhas sh-ing 'dzangs pasna rig pa dang / bajig rten rnams cad dang mi mthun thamags so// de ci'i mang du nam/ bcom ldan 'das khyab
538a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhad pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lags pa'i mang duste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa 'di'i gnas
538a5(dkon brtsegs): so/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i gnas zab pas na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don yang zab cing phral/ brtags pa ste rdzogs par dka' ning brtag
538a6(dkon brtsegs): mi nus la rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags te/ mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang nyon mongs pa
538a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sgrub s+t+waM kyi mthas bkrus pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la the tsom ma marnaMs pa de ni nyan mongs pa rnams cad kyi srubs nas/ rnam par zol pa'i de /
538a8(dkon brtsegs): gcig sa pa sa kyi skyes yang the tsom ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'angs rang gi yi de ba gshegs pa'i nam sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bas ma gyis
538a9(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa'i dgongs pa'i mthar pa de ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i don the shang pa rnams pa 'di gnyis la yid ches shing dang mos pa lags so// bcom ldan 'am de sa
538b1(dkon brtsegs): na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa 'di gnyis la yid ches shing dang de mos pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis
538b2(dkon brtsegs): ni rig par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis gang zhes na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa ba
538b3(dkon brtsegs): ba mchis pa dang / bgyi ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba mchis pa mi 'phags pa bden pa bstan pa btags pa tshang
538b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnan gyis bgyid du stsal kyang sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba
538b5(dkon brtsegs): cad spang ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par bgyi ba'i lam thams cad bsgom par mi nus te bcom ldan 'das de lta
538b6(dkon brtsegs): lags pas 'khor ba la yang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa mchis so// mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dus byas ma byas pa mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i
538b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'phags pa'i bden pa pa ni bstan pa dang / btags pa dag dpag tu ma mchis lags so//
538b8(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i sad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyis brtsal kyang zin pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal pa dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal
539a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spang ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / zil
539a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgom par nus pa'i srad du ste// bcom ldan 'das de lta na de bzhin gshegs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa bshad pa
539a3(dkon brtsegs): gang lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
539a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bstan pa bgyi ba ma mchis pa bzhi po dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa lags so// nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
539a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni rdzogs par bgyi ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rab 'bring tha ma'i chos rtogs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rtogs pa ma las
539a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i srang du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i don bshad pa brgya
539a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa dag la/ rdzogs par mdzad pa lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams
539a8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni yongs su mkhyen/ bcom ldan 'das nyan mongs pa dang / rtse ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dra ba'i drug pa
539b1(dkon brtsegs): can b+hugs kyang srungasatsamaldan 'das meng kyi byung ba thams cad 'gog pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'jug pa ni na sgyum du mdza dang / bcom man
539b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog pa ni chos rlung gzon pa lags so// de ci'i sang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos chos kyi sku thog ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis
539b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ma bgyis pa ma skyes pa mi bas pa/ bas pa mchis pa/ rtag pa brtan pa/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su ngas pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs nas nges par
539b4(dkon brtsegs): grol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas pa/ grol bas shes pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa snyed dang ldan pa ni
539b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i ming gis bstan pa'i slad du ste/ bcom 'das de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa'i sbubs nas nges par
539b6(dkon brtsegs): grol ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes pa nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lags te/
539b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sngon mthong ma rtogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su rung
539b8(dkon brtsegs): cing mngon sum du mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa ni 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
540a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa'i snying po'i mos pa thams cad kyi sbubs dang tha dad du gnas pa ma grol bas shes pa rnams kyis song
540a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas shing grol bas shes pasam gyis mi khyab pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa me
540a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mi stong pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa rnams rnam pa 'di gnyis lnga ni/ nyan thos chen po dag kyang bcom
540a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das nyid la yid ches pas 'jug par bas te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyi shes pa ni phyin ci log gi dmigs
540a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ban po dag sa 'dug lags so// bcom ldan 'das de sA lags pas can thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad sngon ma
540a6(dkon brtsegs): / ma la sa su sbyang ba sa/ smra sa
540a7(dkon brtsegs): man+t+ra m+bu ba'i lam rnams kyang bang brnams so// mam ldan 'das 'angamam tho'i bded pa padi'i 'dung sa sa drin pa gsum ni mi ga pa lanasas// badzin pa
540a8(dkon brtsegs): dag pal gams ma/ maldan das pa sa dzu mapa ma dus sa
540b1(dkon brtsegs): sa na ma dag lam/ sa na ma ma can pa ma// brtsam la ma
540b2(dkon brtsegs): can de dag ni mi bden pa dang / mi rtag pa lags te/ skabs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ 'phags pa'i sdug bsngal bden pa dang /
540b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal kun 'byung ba bden pa dang / sdug bsngal 'phrog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i yang yang dag par na/ mi bden pa dang / me rtag pa lags te//
540b4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags so// bcom ldangs 'di la bden pa gcig ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi
540b5(dkon brtsegs): yul las 'das pa de ni rtag pa lags so// gang rtag pa de ni mi slu ba'i chos can lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang mi smra ba'i chos can de ni bden pa dang / rtag pa dang /
540b6(dkon brtsegs): skabs lags so// bcom ldan 'asu de lta lags pas 'di la sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa nyid ni yang yang dag par na bden pa dang / rtag pa dang skyangs lags so//
540b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul las 'das pa/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
540b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad kyi she ba'i spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na dmus long gzugs la lha mi nus pa dang / bu btsal ba'i gnas nas mchis pa'i
541a1(dkon brtsegs): byis pa dgung bdun lags pa/ khyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las mi nus bzhin du bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa yang rgyas
541a2(dkon brtsegs): bso so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul yang ma lags/ stan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i yul yang ma lags so// @
541a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byis pa so so'i spyi bo thams cad rnam par shes pa'i zhes bgyi ba de ni/ mtha' gnyis la lwa ba'i phyir phyin ci log rnams kyi tshig bla dgas la/
541a4(dkon brtsegs): sos bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni/ shes pa dag pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das
541a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha kyis sul bzhes pagyi ba n-i bar len pa'i phung po dgal bdas tu mngon par nan pa'i sas bu ba ga she bdag po rgyag kyangagam lags so/
541a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di gnyis ni ma thar sla ba sa bgyi ste/ gnyis gang zhen// nang par sta ba dang / rtag par pa lags so so// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'du byed
541a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mi rtag par ldan/ de na nga'i chang bar sa pa ma lags te/ do ni de'i yang dag pa'i lba ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te mya ngan las 'angs
541a8(dkon brtsegs): pal dag par ldan/ de ni de'i yang dag par lta bsags so// de ci'i mang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rtog ge ba dag gi lta ba ni 'di lta bu lags te/ lus /
541b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / tshor ba dang / sems pa rnams tshe 'di nyid la 'jig par mthong nas/ srid pa'i mtshams sbyor ba la 'dug par mi bgyid cing / mtha
541b2(dkon brtsegs): ldongs par gyur pa snad de/ chang par lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rtog ge ba dag gi lta ba ni sems kyi rgyud la rmongs shing / sems kyi skad cig 'jigs pa
541b3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jug par mi bgyid la/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa de skad de/ rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na tog ge bdag gi lta ba ni
541b4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu dag lags pa sang de/ de dag ni don de las bral ba'i la ba dang / den de'i tha chad kyi lta ba dang / gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dres pa'i la bas/ nang pa
541b5(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems bgyid pa dang / rtag par rlom sems bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ni zin pa'i phung po lnga dag la/ byin ci log du gyur /
541b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa
541b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi su
541b8(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa dag pas kyang sngon ma mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams de bzhin gsheg pa la dang /
542a1(dkon brtsegs): pas rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gtsang mar 'du shes pa'i sems can de ni bcom ldan 'ad/
542a2(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur ba lags so// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bani/
542a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nyid rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gtsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i
542a4(dkon brtsegs): slang du'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyis de ltar mthong ba de dag ni yang dag par mthong ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das yang
542a5(dkon brtsegs): dag dag par mthong ba gang lags pa de dag ni bcom 'angs kyi sras thugs las skyes pa dang / nal nas skyes pa dang / chos las skyes pa dang / chos kyis sprul pa/
542a6(dkon brtsegs): chos bgos la spyod pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shes pa dag pa zhes bgyi ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/
542a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar zhes pa dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni/ shes pa dag pa de'i spyod pa yang ma lags/ yul yang ma lags na/
542a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sug pasngal 'gog pa'i bden pa rtogs pa pan shes pa can dag gi slong su lam lags ning / tshul ma lags pasams kyang kyi 'tshas/
542b1(dkon brtsegs): mang sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das drug pa gsum pa'i las dang po pa rnangs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can dag gis don khong du chud par 'gyur ring / nganang rtogs pa
542b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon pa bani bshad cing btags pa pa ni bshad cing btags pa'i srang du'o// bcom ldan 'das rton pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten
542b3(dkon brtsegs): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das rton pa gcig pu 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni rton pa thams cad kyi mchog 'jig rten las 'das pa lags
542b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni yang dag par rton par bgyi ba dang skyabs lags so// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'khor ba na rton pa lags te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid
542b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang du bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi mtha' med do zhes bshad cing btags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchis na/ 'khor
542b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes mchis na ni tshig de rig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba zhes bgyi ba ni zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams 'pho ma thag tu/ zil pa dag gi dbang po rnams len pa
542b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'khor ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho dang skye ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos gnyis kyi ming de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan
542b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das gum zhes bgyi ba dang skyes zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad lags so// bcom ldan 'das gum zhes bgyi ba ni dbang po 'gag pa 'di lags so// bcom ldan
543a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das skyes zhes bgyi ba ni dbang po gsar rnams 'byung 'di lags te/ bcom ldan de gzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la ni skye ba'am 'gum pa'am/ 'pho ba
543a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am 'byung ba yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gnas
543a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying po ni dag pa dang brtan pa dang ther zug pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni tha dad du mi gnas shing / 'brel la sbubs
543a4(dkon brtsegs): nas grol ba'i shes pa can dag gi gzhi dang / rten rang gnas lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'brel pa ma mchis shing tha dad du gnas la/ shes pa
543a5(dkon brtsegs): grol ba ma lags pa/ phyi rol gyi 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi gzhi dang rten dang gnas kyang lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma mchis na ni sdug
543a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal la spro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang / smyon pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i snang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes
543a7(dkon brtsegs): pa drug po gang lags padag dang / rnam par shes pa gang lags pa 'di dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bdun po 'di dag ni mi gnas pa dang / skad cig pa dang / sdug
543a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong ba ma lags pas/ chos de dag ni mug bsngal la sgo ba dang / myang rnams 'das pas 'dod cing don du gtsor ba dang / smin par mi rigs so// bcom ldan 'das da
543b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i snying zazag pa dang tham mchis pa'i mthar mchis pa dang / mu~M ste ba dang mi 'gag bachos can sdug bsal myong ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das de ban gshegs
543b2(dkon brtsegs): snying po de ni sdug bsngal la yang skyo ba dang / mya lngas 'das pa la yang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang / sdod pa 'os so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yang
543b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma lags sems can ma lags thog ma lags/ gang zag ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po sems can 'jig tshogs la lnga bar srung ba
543b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang / phyin ci log gis nyams par gyur pa dag dang / stong pa nyid las sems g.yengs par gyur pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bani
543b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sring 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po lags so// myos kyi sku'i snying po lags so// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snying po sogs so// rang bzhin
543b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su dag chos kyi snying po lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mos
543b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/ bsam gyis mi khyab po snyam padag bgyid do// de ci'i srad na na/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i sems skad cig paste/ nyon mongs pa
543b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ bcom 'angs mi dge ba'i sems kyang skad cig pa ste/ sems de yang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags kyi
544a1(dkon brtsegs): srad du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems la mi reg/ sems kyang nyon mongs pa rnams la mi reg pa lags na/ bcom ldan
544a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di la ji ltar sems mi rigs pa'i chos can nye bar nyon mongs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yid mchis la/ sems nye bar nyan
544a3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa yang mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongangs pa'i don ni khong du chud par dka' ba lags te/
544a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'dil bcom ldan 'das cid skar du gyur ba lags te/ ye shes su gyur pa sags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams gyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom
544a5(dkon brtsegs): na'ades ni non pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'breng gis rtog par dka' ba'i don pa sha gsananas/ rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ sgyu ma/
544a6(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin no// lA mo de de bzhin te/ sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni rtogs par dka'o// lha mo chos 'di gnyis ni rtogs
544a7(dkon brtsegs): par dka' ba ste/ 'di lta ste sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dgu pa rtogs par dka' ba dang / sems de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rtog+sas dka' ba'o// lha ma
544a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dris nyis kun dus pa mi byed nge ma byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po dpa ldan pa gnan dag chen no// mA me lum mnyan thos rnams ni chos 'di gnyis la
544b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas dang pas 'gro bar bad de/ sa myo nga'i nyan thos dang gang dag dad pa dang ldan ning dang bu'i dbang du byed pa dag ni dang pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag ni drang ba'i dbang
544b2(dkon brtsegs): snang ba la rten nas/ chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pas 'di la nges par 'gyur ro// lha mo chos 'thun por sdud pa shes pa zhes bya ni/ lha mo dbang po'i rnam par rig
544b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yid kyi spyod yul la rnam par lta ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par lta ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gnyid la rnam par lta ba dang / sems la dbang
544b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa rnams kyi bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / bde ba la rnam par lta ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par sna
544b5(dkon brtsegs): bskye/ lha mo rnam par lta ba'i rang bzhin rnam pa lnga la mkhas 'di dang ldan na/ lA mo da ltar dang nga 'das pa'i 'og ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga'i nyan thos dad pa dang ldan ning dang
544b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag dang pu'i snang ba la brten nas chos dang 'thun par sdug pa'i shes pas rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang / sems nye bar nyon mongs pa la nges
544b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// lha mo de dag gi nges pa de nyid ni theg pa chen po'i lam du 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// lA mo de ltar na 'di lta ste chos zab mo mi spong ba'i phyir/ de bzhin
544b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro ba na phan pa mang ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la
545a1(dkon brtsegs): sman pa mang ba'i don bshad pa gnan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod sa
545a2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lho pal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
545a3(dkon brtsegs): bra mo chos zab mo dgal ma smras ma nyams par rig pa'i bdag nyid la srung ba dang bsod nams mang du bskyid pa dang / theg pa chen po'i lam du yang zhugs par 'gyu
545a4(dkon brtsegs): ba lags so// gsum gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'ad smA rIgs kyi bu mo gang dag rang gis rig pa'i chos za ba mo dang ldan dang / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
545a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang dag chos dang 'thun par sdug pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu mo g+hang+gA dag chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid kyi shes pa zhum pa
545a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas/ 'di ni bdag gis mi shes te/ don de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen par zad do// bcom ldan 'das la sems rnam par gtong bgyid do//
545a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gtod ba de dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mi chos zab mo dag la ma sbas ma nyams par bas
545a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid la srung ba dang / bsod nams kyang mang du bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i lam du yang zhugs par 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi 'am/
545b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gsum ze 'di dag las gnan pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag ni chos za pa dag lanan gyis mchog tu zung nas/ na mas kyi sems ca
545b2(dkon brtsegs): tsi mngon par nin spyon par brjid/ kun d+ha sgru bar brjid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de dag la ngam pa'i chos la rgyab kyis thogs pa dang / brnyan sa segasacanang/
545b3(dkon brtsegs): ma thon ram pa lags te// rgyal po'i thang du yang mchis te/ brlag par bgyi'o// zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'angs sa bon rul bar gyur pa de dag ni/ sna dang mi dang lha
545b4(dkon brtsegs): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par myur bcad par bgyi ba lags so// de nas su mo dpal 'bring gros de sad ces gsal nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas bkyi
545b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi nabs la gtugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'phreng la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo khyod kyis dus dang skabs su chos zab mo dgal
545b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid yang dag par bsrung ba'i thabs kyi don bsan pa bshad pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi dam mtshar bcad pa leg so legs so// snga mo khyod ni sangs rgyas 'bum phrag
545b7(dkon brtsegs): bamang pol bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin pas khyod kyis don bshad pa 'di la ngo mtshar che ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dngul 'brar bas 'khon gyi dkyil 'byor gyi
545b8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi lus pa 'od kyi khyab ba mdzad nas/ tal bdun srid tsam du na ma mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ nabs kyi som 'dor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan yod kyi
546a1(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gal ba der gshegs so// de nas sna mo dpal 'phreng 'khor dang bcas pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas/ ska bas mchog mi shes shing / mig ni
546a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dum pa sa pas// bcom ldan 'das las ni 'khong bar gyur to// gang girje bcom san 'das de dag gi mig byung gis mo sebs par byur ba de'i \u0f7f/ mA me pal
546a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas pa chog tu dga' ning rab tu mgu ba'i ni ba dang ldanu bas/ gcig gis gcig gi mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams rnam pa du mar bsngags nis
546a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa ma brjed bzhin du/ gleng khyer 'thab med du dong ngo // de nas la mo dpal 'phreng gis rang gi khyim tam rgya po grags pa'i bshes ga
546a5(dkon brtsegs): theg pa tsun po la nges par bcug go// khyong khyer rjen po'i bud med kyi tshogs bu mo lo bdun lon pa yan rgyud rnams cang theg pa chen po la brdung ngo // rgyal po grags pa'i brtse/
546a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyen gyis kyang / grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa'i 'khor khye'u lo bdun lon po yan cad thams cad theg pa chen po la bcung bar gyur te/ de ltar grong khyer ba thams cad theg pa
546a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po la mngon du grags par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal ba baN+Dal byed kyi tshal du byon te/ nang du gshegs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang bka' sal
546a8(dkon brtsegs): tha'i bang po brgya byin pa yang dayongs so// rinam su'i dbang po masu byin sa cig thang cig sung samado nyid la/ lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bder te/ bcom ldan 'das
546b1(dkon brtsegs): suM pa 'i// rnam pa shod cig kun dang
546b2(dkon brtsegs): spyan snar 'jug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la chos kyi rnam grus 'di rgya cher yang dag par bstad
546b3(dkon brtsegs): kau'u shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zung shig/ ke'u shi ka chos kyi nem grangs 'dri khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang
546b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la shod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po chu byin gyis
546b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnams grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
546b6(dkon brtsegs): shig chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzi ni yin tan mkha yas pa dang ldan te/ ko lu ni ga nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyi mdo'i don thams cad ma lus pa
546b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'am/ bsku ba'am/ nye bar brtag par minus na/ sems can gzhan dag gis sa kyi snyom/ ko'u shi ka ng+ge mAldan nos kyin ma grangs 'di ni zlabs mo
546b8(dkon brtsegs): ze'i byung na sa yin na/ TI ka ng+ge ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab la yon tan chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no// kau'u ni kI de'i phyir chos kyi ma grangs
