546b9(dkon brtsegs): tan gyi mong yongs su brjod pa cas nis bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la ming la zung shig dang / ngas khyong la bgad nga// sna'i dbang po brgya phyin pa/ tshang
547a1(dkon brtsegs): h+ma ts+tsha/ kun dus myenas pa rnas / tsam pa na sa kyis ldan pa dang / bsum man la sa 'das
547a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' gyul to// kor+d+ha ni ka'i ngani ni de bzhin gcom pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yang dag par bston pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ kor+ya shi kA 'dzi ni yi ma tshan
547a3(dkon brtsegs): ba la gyis mi khya ba sa bar ya byung na mas sa ru ba du man gyizhes bya bya da / dam thams sa su ldan pa pam kyi
547a4(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa zhes byang slang ba theg pa gcig tu yang dag pa 'jug brten rjes bya bar yang zung shig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa btung bas pa nas bya bar yang gyu
547a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa zhes bya bar ma yang zung zhes/ chos kyi sku bsun pa zhes bya ba yang zung shig/ song ba nyid kyi don gyi dgongs pa la yang dag par
547a6(dkon brtsegs): brnyes bya bar yang byung ste// badzin pagar+b+he ga brlan pa nas bya bar yang zung // rtag pa dang / ban pa dang / de btsun pa dang / ther nug pa dang / snrubs kun tu gyur bas
547a7(dkon brtsegs): m+bu yang brdzunas/ sbyin cilag gis pa sa zla bar yang rlung brji thus yo phywan dag pa'i semapa la dgangs pa bdun pa zhes bya bar yang rna
547a8(dkon brtsegs): na 'igs sa kyi sa ngas par maman po'i bye ba'i khri zhib 'i rtsi
547b1(dkon brtsegs): kamado 'di bskur ba gang dag bshad pa de dag thams cad ni rtsub bcad pa dang / nges pa'i dod dang rnon pa gcig pa des bya bar yang zung zhig/ gaju shi gsu mo pal
547b2(dkon brtsegs): sa ze ma ze'i sgra bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ ngas khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis 'jig rten na/ dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa de sdeng gnangadu/ phyogs
547b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rte thams cang ngu yang dag par rdzog shig/ bstan cig/ lnga 'di dbang po brgya byin rjes/ bcom ldan 'am legs so zhes gsas te/ bcomaldan 'angs
547b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi skur sngar/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung rnying kun chub par byas nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gzhan yang gang der 'dus pa
547b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dge dang / 1mi dang / lnga ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
547b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ dpal 'phreng gis nus pa'i le'u zhes byas/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
547b7(dkon brtsegs): rdza gar phyi ma'ad po den mi tra dang / mukhyen po de dang / zhu chen gyi los pa ni ye shes ces nus te gtan la phab pa// 'phags par 'o mchog bcags chen po/ le'u mo pa
547b8(dkon brtsegs): brgya las/ drang srong rgyas pas nus pa'i le'u bzhi bcurtsa dgung ste/ rgya gar nang du// ad+ya d+ha sa pa ri pring/ na ma ma hA yAn sutra/
548a1(dkon brtsegs): ngong sad du// 'phags pa drang srong rgyas pas nus pa zhes bya brjeg pa chen po'i mdor// bamapo dang go/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
548a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cadas phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pas dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gyi bye ma sbed 'gram brgal bar bya ba yin pa/ khu byug dang / rna
548a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bung ba dang / ngang ba'i rgyal po dang / bya'i tshegs du masdu snyan pa 'byin pa/ shing pAg sha dang / n+ya dro dang / tsan dan dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / sAl la ki r-i ya lags bskyabs
548a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ chag du me tog dri zhim po'i silam bkram ba den dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang / bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ zag zad pa/ rdul zad pa/ chos pas mi rdzogs pa
548a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / kha ngon lnga pa/ 'chags dang / khri'i steng na bcug pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar sa phyogs de na mdzes par byed pa sha sag la/ kha cig ni nang du yang ngag 'jog la gnas
548a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ kha cig ni shing drung na gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' kun pamo bar byed pa/ cha byang ngul ring brtan pa/ spyod lam rab du ni ba/ 'dod pa la 'dod pa dang / brjod
548a7(dkon brtsegs): rnarnams dang / sem pa dang / gnyid dang / bai so dang bral ban phrag zig dang thabs cig tu brdugs te/ de na tsam ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams sa pa 'astsal pa/
548a8(dkon brtsegs): slong dag rkyen pabyin cig/ byab gang yin ba gyis shig nurtsa khrims kyi tsam pas bsams shing / dbang zams la ming ni bar gnas par gyis shig/ da nas bcom lda
548b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'od srung chen po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / bkul dang / nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u 'dir+ya dang /
548b2(dkon brtsegs): dag las stsogs pa nyan thos po sha sag dang thabs cig ste/ yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam mdzad do// de'i tshe nub phyogs sogs
548b3(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lho bzhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs
548b4(dkon brtsegs): logs na 'bar ning snang ba nus kyi 'od zer lta bur ganga' ba 'di ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di nad ces pa
548b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// kun dga' bo 'di ni dri ma'i bu drang srong 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ drang srong rnams kyi mchog/ drang srong rgyas pa zhes bya te/ drang srong dka'
548b6(dkon brtsegs): thub drag po la gnas par brgya stong gis dub pa/ lus kyi mdzes pa med pa/ lnga brgya tsam phyi bzhin du 'brang ba la/ drang srong dka' min gnon nu dang / mi lA dang / rnam par de
548b7(dkon brtsegs): srung gi bu dang / ri dgas mo'i bu dang / sgyu byed kyi bu dang / phur burna dang / me'i bu dang / rnam par rko ba'i bu dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / de las stsogs pas yongs su
548b8(dkon brtsegs): bskor nas/ rjesu chags pa'i'o// de nas do'i bar skabs su rgyas pas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dbang po ni ba/ thugs ni ba/ bsam
549a1(dkon brtsegs): btur gyi bde ba la gyes pas/ shing sngon pa stug po'i nangangan btsugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang rgyas pa 'drisam du sems te/ kye mtshams
549a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshar te/ 'di bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ phyin cim logs pa gsung ba zhes 'jig rten du grags pa ni gnas yin yin// ji ltar 'di kha dog rgyas pa
549a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan cing rmad du byung ba'i gzugs rgya chen po phun sum tshogs pa las ni 'di gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
549a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rgya chen po 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi bdag po drug dang bcas pa bzhin du spangs te/ bud med rin po che sa ma 'tshom las
549a5(dkon brtsegs): spogs pa bud med drug stong yang spangs nas/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal gyi nang du gshegs te/ bzhugs pa 'di ni kye ma'o 'jig rten na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'o snyam du sem
549a6(dkon brtsegs): so// de nas drang srong mas sbyin gyi zlas kyang rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tsam ni mgul kyi rangs 'a rab tu dgu ste// dga' ba dang
549a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa/ na nga sa nga ba ga shes ldan 'das la mngon par yang po grong ngas 'as nga // rtsamachims
549a8(dkon brtsegs): thar mi bar grang // gzus man yin tung bar bze// khyi ba rkyen gying gang babyed// de rgyang dri meng phrag/ yung na ma rje gcig 'phags// nan gyi nyi ma ra
549b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzugs bar ba'ang mnan/ danas drang meng chen pa dang sa thams padangapa'am mig sde ma rnams/ sa ldan sa ga
549b2(dkon brtsegs): denas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge mong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgal mdzu' tha~Mng pa'i drang srong pa'i phung bar 'bar ba ma pa cong ban can nas ga ra
549b3(dkon brtsegs): ba zas mi za ning bsnyen par gnas pa shing shun dang / g.yang gni byon pa/ thal bas byugs pa/ thang dang brag khrod na gnas pa/ bkres bkres par 'dug pa/ drung 'gams
549b4(dkon brtsegs): zla ba byed bsnyen gnas byed pa/ yan lag sem pa/ gcer bu pa dang / shing shun gyon pa/ a gcom dang / sen mo dang / spu ring bzung ba'i kha dog lnga bu/ dka' thub kyi mong cad/
549b5(dkon brtsegs): bzlas brjod dang / sbyin bsreg dang / bsrung ba dang / bkra shis pa byas pa/ sna dang / thug pa med pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa/ rkang pa khyen du bsgred pa/ co gtsog por 'dun pa
549b6(dkon brtsegs): tsA dang du 'jug pa/ m-imadaga' bar ba dang / bsreg meng rab du 'bar ba dang / nyams sus shin tu bdus pa/ nga 'brub drug pos yongs su ni ba/ rabang bdugs pa
549b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs tsam gyis yongs dga' ba/ bla na med pa'i ye shes dang bral ba de dag la ltos/ de dge slong dag drang srong chen po 'di dag ni 'khor ba las 'byung ba mi shes pa dag ste/ 'di dag
549b8(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod pa dang / rgyags pas myos pas/ yang sring bar ste yongs su dag pa sha stag go// de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems thag pas srubs su dong nas
550a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni tshangs par spyod pa'i tshogs su grub pa ste/ de ci'i slang du bdag cag srid par skye ba yongs su
550a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin to// de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas/ drang srong chen po de dag gi sems dang mi 'jigs pa dman zhing lta ba dman par khad kyis khad kyis brtags nas/ gus pa skyes te zhes
550a3(dkon brtsegs): bcas par drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ ral pa mang po brjes te/ mchod phyir thogs phrogs pa/ spro bsangs po/ mig gnyis ser ba/ sA tsA ba cing thugs
550a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnang byu gu gsum thogs pa/ gzugs rab tu mi sdug pa dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i ngos las 'gro ba/ gtam sna tshogs kyis gtan tshigs dang ldan pa/ de bcom lda
550a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das gal bder so song sa phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'khor 'di ni kur du rmongs pa re/ 'di ni gnas lags na/ bdag 'dir mchiH
550a6(dkon brtsegs): par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po srid par skye ba thams cad kyang ngas shes te/ dngos po
550a7(dkon brtsegs): de yang rig go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ gsal ba/ zur byin pa/ ni ba dang / mkhas pa/
550a8(dkon brtsegs): blo da shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ral pa'i bar bu'i cod pan 'di su lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bos 'di ni drang srong
550a9(dkon brtsegs): com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
550b1(dkon brtsegs): rin po rgyas pa zhes byaste/ rig byed rnams byed pa/ nus can du'i bsar btsas kyis 'chog/ mi gyis tshogs snang ba'o// de nas papa bcom pa de dag thams cad
550b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa mngong nas/ bcom ldan 'angs su 'di na ces mal to// bcom ldan 'das 'di 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs sum thos pa lags na/ shA
550b3(dkon brtsegs): sa yongs su rgyar yongs pa rnyed pa 'das kyinag ba/ dgra bcom pa de dag yang 'ang na ma du sems te// rgyas pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la gtam gang bdag med kyi
550b4(dkon brtsegs): gtam 'am/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam 'am/ ci'i rtswa dang rkyen gyi gtam zhig zhu snyam mo// de nas drang srong chen po ches pas bcom ldan
550b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / da ltar skyong chen po tshogs pa 'di ni shin tu rnyed dka' ba lags so// gal te nus nas nu ba lung bstan
550b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i srad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las
550b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs ga' jig 'o// de nad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di sad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po myong
550b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ci 'dod pa dris zhig dang / dris pa de dang de/ des de ltar lung bstan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
551a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bgyi/ sbyir ba ma lags pa'i don gang lags/ sbyin pa zhes rab tu 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i don ga
551a2(dkon brtsegs): lags/ sbyin bdag ci ltar rab tu 'tshal bar bgyi/ ji ltar na bladag lags la gtong ba po ma lags/ ji ltar na bdag sbyin pa'i mthar 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ spungs pa
551a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'am/ brtsegs par gnas pa'am/ ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ ji ltar na sbyin bdag len pa dang mi gnas par spyir ba sbyin pa lags/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin
551a4(dkon brtsegs): bci ltar blta bar bgyi/ ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa lags/ bsod nams de'i rnam par srid pa lta bar bgyi/ btse
551a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces/
551a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po'i sems dang po bskyed pa pa'i gan khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rtsing ngo // de nas gnas can shA ra dwa ti'i bu sI ma ring ba gnyer ma can
551a7(dkon brtsegs): mgo skye bos las pa g.yas pas smin ma gzar nas/ mig lpags bteg ste/ bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong chen po rgyas pa 'di 'jig rjen na grags
551a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yin na/ gtan tshigs kyi rigs pa mi shes pa byis pa rogs rjod lta bur mkhas pa'i tha med de/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi gtam spangs shing / bdag med pa'i gtam po
551b1(dkon brtsegs): # sa
551b2(dkon brtsegs): / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsos to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis drang srong chen po 'di la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i srin pa'i bka' mching bgyi'o//
551b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas dris shig la/ nyan thos kyis bshang pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul ma yin te/ ming
551b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis kun dag zo de ga ma zer cig/ 'di ni gnas ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la cho dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di ga ces gsam to// bcom ldan
551b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis drang srong chen po rgyas pa ci dang rje 'tshal pa dris pa'i lan gang ba bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bA ri'i bu khyod kyang 'di sa mi
551b6(dkon brtsegs): ma zer/ nga'i mdun na nyan thos kyis the rtsom bcad pa 'di ni mi rigs ste/ nga la sems can gyi sems rangs par 'gyur ro// sems ma 'di skad du gang gi phyir rgyas pas dri
551b7(dkon brtsegs): na nyan thom 'chang du bcug pa lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin du nges so// yang nA ni sangs rgyas lta bar 'dzin pa yod de nas zer bar 'gyur te/
551b8(dkon brtsegs): sems saca rgyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das drang srong
552a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po rgyas pa'i the tsom bsal ba'i srang du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po stonas
552a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par sbyin pa dang // sbyin pa'i bya ba dang / sbyin pa'i rnam par bye ba dang / sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa bdag gis yongs su spyad na/ ji ltar sbyin pa skyong ba da
552a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag la byinan bsod nams kyi rnams par smin pa ci ltar rab tu 'phel ba nyon cig/ gang gi phyir sbyin pa zhes bya ba dang / sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni drang
552a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di la gtong ba pos sbyin pa'i dngos po yongs su btang ste/ dad pa bskyed nas gzhan byed du bcug ste/ yul gnan du song nas byed du bcug pa des kyang nor rnams
552a5(dkon brtsegs): par gtong bar byed na/ nor gang gi yin pa de ni spyir bdag yin no// byed bcug pas byin pa ni gtong ba po yin gyi/ sbyin bdag ma yin no// gang rang gi dngos po bdag nyid kyis
552a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa de ni gtong ba po yang yin la/ sbyin bdag kyang yin no// drang srong chen po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sbyor ba yongs su mdag par bsdu'o// rnam pa sum cu rtsa
552a7(dkon brtsegs): gang chen/ 'dis seng spyong chen po 'di la gtong ba po byed ci lo gtul bar gyur cing / mdad pa dang / mdung ba mngal/ des sbyin pa byin na/ de'i snyir ba de yongs sum
552a8(dkon brtsegs): dag pa yin no// drang srong chen po gnan yang bar btags pa la chu' dzegs par bya ba'i phyir tshur pa byer na/ nga yongs sum dag pa yin no// des man pang
552b1(dkon brtsegs): nga man rgya shes/ na rgya la/ ldan
552b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam tha byu pa byinan// rnyir bar yongs sum dag pa yinan// gang 'jigs pa'i phyir tsham po la grags pa la byin pasnyen te/ thun mong sa ma yin pa lta byinan/ yang
552b3(dkon brtsegs): ma dag pa byin no// drug sbyin pa dang / mtshon cha sbyin pa dang / srog chags pasang de sha sbyin pa dang / bag med pa rnams la dang sbyin par byed pa dang / 'di dag ni bdag gi
552b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bdag gi rim gri dang / mchod par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems can bsdu ba dang / 'thob pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i sbyin pa dang / gang brjod pa dang / swa dang / tshigs su
552b5(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / gang gar dang / glu dang / gnad gang dang / rtsed mo dang / gtam dang / dga' bar bya ba'i phyir rol mo mkhan rnams la sbyin ba sbyin ma
552b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa de yongs su mngag pa yin no// gang gza' mtshan ma'i phyir skar mkhan la sbyin pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gang gzhan gyi nor mdza' bo la phyin pa dang / gang gi
552b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ zhing la gzhan gyi 'bru'i phung po'am/ nas dang gro'i phung po lnga ri dgas dang bya za ba de de la dga' ba dang / mgu ba skyed na de yang sbyin pa yongs su ma ngag pa
552b8(dkon brtsegs): moH/ gang phyir sbyin pa sbyin dang / gang yang lus mi bde bas 'jigs pa'i phyir sman pa la sbyin pa dang / gang yang spong ba rnams la spyos brgyad de/ tshig pa za bar byas nas
553a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin basbyin na// de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no// gang yang sbyin basbyin pa 'di'i rnam par smin pa yod dam/ med ces the tsom zan/ de yang yongs
553a2(dkon brtsegs): su ma dag pa yin no// gang yang sbyin pa sbyin nas gdung ba dang / 'gyod pas gdungs na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no// gang yang sbyin pa byin nas gang bdag las khyer ba than
553a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis tshe phyi ma la sngar sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam pa 'di lta bu'i sems skyed na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no// gang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'di ni bdag nyid kyis
553a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod kyi/ sems can gzhan gzhan gang la yang ma 'gyur cig snyam du de ltar sems skyed na/ de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no// gang lang tshol bab pas sbyin pa byin pa dang /
553a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir dang byid dang / rga ba'i gnas dang / na bas gzir pa dang / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang ga nang tu byog pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang / snad pa dang 'chi ba'i mya ngan du gyur pa na/ sangs
553a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa la dga' ba dang / dad pa med par rtsa lag rnams kyis byed byed bcug ste/ sbyin gnas rnams la sbyin pa byin na/ de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no// gang yul
553a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan nu gnas na yang yul dang / gnas ga ge mo nas bya ba na/ bdag sbyin bdag tu grags par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ grags pa'i rgyur sbyin pa byin na/ de yang yongs sum
553a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mo// gang yang la zas gtod mi 'bod pa la 'jig rten pa mi dga' bar mthong nas/ srin thong ba'i nyes pa ni 'jig rted kyis bzod dosam ste/ srin pa byin/
553b1(dkon brtsegs): de yang yongs su mngag pa yin no// gang yang zud med ming du phyug te/ rlung mar blang ba'i 'brel pa dang / phyir byed par bya 'i don du zung med kyi gnams pan
553b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen mang ba dang / 'brel pa'i phyogs la nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / pad+ma ra dang / man ngar ba dang / t+yai ru dang / du gu la'i ngas la sngog
553b3(dkon brtsegs): pas mgu byed na/ de yang yongs sum dag pa yin no// gang yang 'di ltar bdag la nor ni mang dri yod na/ bdag la bu med de/ bdag gis gang rigs pa la gtong
553b4(dkon brtsegs): sram sbyin pa byin na/ de yang sangs sum dag pa yin ma// yang yang ngas byen pas 'jig rten pa sa da par 'gyur ro// rnam pa'i sems gis nin babyin/ yang
553b5(dkon brtsegs): sum ngag yin no// gang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / zang zing 'dod pas dbul ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug 'phongs pa gos dengs snyeng rim ldarnams btsugs te
553b6(dkon brtsegs): lha phyug pa rgya chen po thob dag la sbyin pa byin na/ de yang sbyin pa yongs su ma dag pa yin no// drang srong chen po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni sbyin pa byi yang / yongs su dag pa
553b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par bsdu'o// drang srong chen zi de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni/ ma no can gyi ning las bon ngan pa btab pa'i myagu sde ba bzhin du bas ste/ smin pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni medapa
553b8(dkon brtsegs): nem yin thong kyi/ 'an kyang zhing dngas zin gyi zhes pas mingag dang 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'dis snyed dper na skyes phul la nig dang 'dong pa'is par rje /
554a1(dkon brtsegs): marmos ma bsal ba'i zhing la btab na/ 'dis bon sa la gnas pa de la char pa ba banas 'das na gdon mi za bar mu gu ste nus par 'gyur te/ 'on kya
554a2(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin ba de'i rnam par dbye ba de yang bsam pa dang / sbyor ba kun nyon mongs pa can du gyur pas/ 'bras bu
554a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa grung por mi 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis thams
554a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa dang 'thun pa'i rnam par byin pa ste dgu rnams lnga phan pa dang / bde ba bgyid pa ni bstan lags so// bcom ldan 'das ji skur tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / chul
554a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa la stsalan/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa chab mi 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pra song chen po khyod sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa 'jug na ca
554a6(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po dang pas gang bung zang ci byin pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya'o// drang srong chen po gang yang 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pas/ snong la mi rtog par ma bas
554a7(dkon brtsegs): par yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/ ngan pa'i tshul khrims 'chal pa la dad pa bskyed nas/ mig phye ste/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byinan
554a8(dkon brtsegs): tshu ma ma mo ma ma mas kyim khri ma ma sa dzin pa nga / rang ba dang / nas

554b2(dkon brtsegs): spos dang 'dred bzhin pa'o// dang srong chen po rgyas pa stsagaso lnga pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dang pa bskyed de sems can rnams cad migs dang / rnams
554b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis grus pa'i/ dram pas sbyin babyin pa de rnams cad ni yongs smra ga pa yin no// skur par yong smos phrin pa ni yongs su dag brjes tshug
554b4(dkon brtsegs): yang sbyin pa la thun myed par ba palngaste/ yang don/ de bzhin mashegs pa sa sbyin pabyed pa ni rgyun med pasnyen no// pasas spyon ba byin pa na myed pa yi na/
554b5(dkon brtsegs): yang sbyin pa chen por gyur pa ni rgyal po rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug las nyams pa la ston pa byin pa ni sbyin pa chen po yin no// rgyal pos mnar ba pa mgon med pa dang / nang pa

554b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa dang / rnam par grol paphun su mtshogs pa dang / rnam par thol po tshe shes mthong bdun su ma tshogs pa la phyin babyin nu bachen po yin no// du 'gro byi
554b9(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la sbyin babyin pa mi ldan med pa med// chos sla ba la tshu me byin pa ni ldan med pa mo da pa la sbyin pabyin pa na med pa
555a1(dkon brtsegs): su song ba bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / ring gas la spogs pa la mi 'jigs pa byi nar sbyin pa chen po yin no// gang la gang dgos pa dang mi dgos pa de'i
555a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni sbyin pa chen po yin te/ drang srong chen po de ltar na sbyin pa byin pa yongs su dag pa dang / sbyin pa chen po yin no// spyir ba yongs

555a4(dkon brtsegs): ster ba yongs su dag pa 'di la rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba de dag mtshungs par bsod nams skyed pa po dang / sbyin bdag tu 'gyur te/ de ltar na gang rjes su yi rang ba dang

555a6(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur zhes ji ltar sbyin pa'i bsod nams zad par 'gyur zhes khyod kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu yid la
555a7(dkon brtsegs): zung shig dang ngas bshad do// drang srong chen po gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa la mchod pa byed pa de'i rnam par skye/
555a8(dkon brtsegs): pam tshungs pa mnyam ming 'dzum nas pa'achang // de ci'i phyir chen/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni chos kyi skus rab tu bye ba yin gyi/ gzugs kyi sras ras tu
555b1(dkon brtsegs): ma man gyur ro// gang la la ni gang 'jug pa'am yongs su mya rnams 'das pa sa ma dang/ sems ma ngas pa'i phyir 'di gnyis sa bsod mas kyi byung
555b2(dkon brtsegs): zang kyang med do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal pos ris su gtogs pa rnam la bsngo ba ni gang gis kyang deng phyin cang sgrog gcod pa dang /
555b3(dkon brtsegs): ma byir bar len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun gyi chog 'byin pa dang / phra ma dang / ngag chub po dang / chog 'khyal ba 'byin pa mi bya'o//
555b4(dkon brtsegs): thams dang / gnod sems dang / lag pa la lba ba'i sems bskyong bar mi bya'i zhes bsgos/ del mI la las rgyal pos bsgo ba de thos nas/ sgo ba rnams rnam
555b5(dkon brtsegs): srung ma/ rgyal po de'i lus la mchod pa byed pa ma yin mod kyi/ rgyal po ngas bsgo ba bzhin du de de dag gis byas so snyam ste/ dga' bar 'gyur ro// de dag rgyal po
555b6(dkon brtsegs): nges bstan cing bsngo ba/ rab tu srung zhing srog gcod pa las sogs pa/ kun srung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba yos su 'dzin par 'thu
555b7(dkon brtsegs): rmo// gang dag rgyal po des nges bsan cing bsgo ba mi srung zhing / mi dge ba'i las la sbyor ba de dge ba'i las byed pas/ tshe 'di la rgyal po 'di la sdug bsngal rjes
555b8(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi ba'i dus byas kyang log par ltung bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du gang dag gis ngal gzugs kyi sang mthong la/ ba
556a1(dkon brtsegs): mas sa su m+b+ha smyung ngag pas dzu 'ardzu na/ dngag gis log pa la smra ba brjenganas/ ma zin pazhin du sems cacad myal
556a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang dgang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na/ bslab pa rnams srung ba dang / mchod pa yang byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas mchog dam par /
556a3(dkon brtsegs): so/ drang srong chen po de ltar nga mchog tu phyin te/ sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags shing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pas/ mnges
556a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can rnams la ming bslus pas kyang bslab pa phun sum tshogs par bya'o// drang srong chen chen po gang la la zhi gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/
556a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'og tu mchod pa byed pa de 'dug pa la mchong ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po sems can de dag bsod nams lhag par bya ba gang byed pa thams cad ni bsodas
556a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'phen pa byang chub tu 'gyur ba brus pa yin no// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ngogs kyi 'jam bu stug po'i nang du me btang na/ char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chus de/
556a7(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin bdag sbyir pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po sdud par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i tshogs de yang sbyin pa pi de nyid kyi rgyud la
556a8(dkon brtsegs): ngang ba'i char pa ba ban phyin pa po nyid kyi chung la rdzogs par 'gyur mod kyi/ sbyin pa byin nga yang phung por gnas pa'am/ srungs par gnas pa'am/ phyogs na ga nas pa
556b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur ro// gdu ya 'di sar sbyin pa byin pa 'i byin pa de'i sbyin ba po de la gribs bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ nges na skyid pa po nges bson mas
556b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa de mthong yang bsod nams de khong du mi chung ngo // drang srong chen po 'di lta steng dper na/ rgun rlon dang bur rab shing ma btsir ba de la khu ba dmigs kyi
556b3(dkon brtsegs): btsir nas dmigs te/ chu 'bru dang / bra rab shing de'i khu ba de yang phung por gnas pa'am/ spangs par gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas par mi snang ngo // khru ba
556b4(dkon brtsegs): deni nan 'brur ra dang / bu rim ming gi dum du'i ro'i mang du 'dus pa yang ma yin no// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin pa byin pa'i yang sring ba po'i lag pa'i rnam/
556b5(dkon brtsegs): snying dang / bral la rnam par mi gnas te/ sbyin pa de rnam par smin pa mi byin pa yang ma yin la/ sbyin bdag 'dor ba yang ma yin no// ji ltar chu 'bru dang / buram
556b6(dkon brtsegs): shing bor na khu ba de dmigs par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du sbyin bdag med na sbyin pa'i rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ tshe'i 'du byed ma btang bar yang smin pa'i rnam
556b7(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa snang ba ma yin no// drang srong chen po 'di lta sde dpar na/ shing n+ya grong sa bon kham 'bus par shing du snang bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyin pa 'phel ba
556b8(dkon brtsegs): las 'bras bu grung por 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong la la zhig rdzas kyi tshogs nyu ngu'ig khyer te yul gzhan gyi grong khyer du song nas/ tshong
557a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus grang ba ra du zang gi rdzas da rgyan por rgyas par bgyur te/ 'i dong de wa du las mang por gyur pa dang / snang dri'i snang mas ma
557a2(dkon brtsegs): marung bar byas pa lhur/ sbyin bdag gi rnam par smin pa yang cher stsogs par 'gyur ro// dper na/ sprin ni ma 'ongs pa'i char pa'i chu rab tu 'dzir to// de bzhi
557a3(dkon brtsegs): du 'dzin to// de bzhin du sbyin bdag kyang rnam par smin pa 'phen par byed de/ drang srong cheran po de ltar sbyin bdag bsod nams 'phen par byed cing sbyir pa byin no//
557a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'bras bul yang spyod do// de bas na len pas sbyin pa shes par byed do// drang srong cher po bsod nams zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol tu rdzogs par byed po 'am
557a5(dkon brtsegs): mthu rtsal thob pas srung ba ste/ de bas na bsod nams zhes bya'o// 'jig rten pha rol ras gcig nas gcig tu lus dang longs spyod par byed pas de'i phyir 'dzi/
557a6(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol gyi zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sbyin pa rnam par smim
557a7(dkon brtsegs): mibaka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa lus su ci lar 'jug/ rnam par shes pa 'di ci lhur na lus chags pa bskyed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
557a8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal ba// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper ma/ rgyal po zong khyer gyed bum na 'jug pa pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas thog ma nyid du'o bas na/
557b1(dkon brtsegs): myu mdzugs pas pa dang / sa tha pa ba rung bar byer cing / rgyal mtshan bskyed nas nan mas pa tsug/ khang sa dang /
557b2(dkon brtsegs): tshang gis ro bar byed do// ri dang nags nA gnas pa rnams cad dang nad yin la phyogs pa thams cad blang ngo // dmug mi rnams kyang nir gyis bsdus nas/ 'di nang du
557b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang 'thab 'dod par bgyis te/ so so'i lag cha thogs la/ ral gyi phyung ste nyin mtshar mnyan par 'dug shig ces bsgo nas/ pha rol gyi dmag rta dang glang po
557b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang / mir 'dres pa 'angs pa dang / 'di ltar rgyal po des bdag gi dem ga dbyug sa 'byin cing / pha rol gyi dadrung rang gi bso rnams zad pa dang / mthurnam
557b5(dkon brtsegs): zang pa dang / mtshon gyis smras pa dang / pham par gyur gyi bar du 'khor la grags mi rnyed par byed do// drung srang chen po de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyus
557b6(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi grong khyer la mi rtog pa'i ngo bor gnas par mthong nas/ de'i tshe dang pa'i 'obs rko bar byed / brtson 'grus la gnas te 'dug/ bzod pa'i gonachon/
557b7(dkon brtsegs): brnam pa chen po rtsom/ chos kyi glang po che rgyags par byed/ ye shes kyi rtul zhon cing rgyug ste/ skye mched kyi grong khyer la 'di skad ces bag yod par ci byu ba dus/
557b8(dkon brtsegs): mu gyis kyis/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi dpung thub par dka' ba/ mi rtag pa'i dmig dpag tu med pa 'od gis/ dmyur du sbyin pa'i gon gyon cing
558a1(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi mtshar rdzogs shin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i phyogs sbyor cig/ tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / gtong ba'i sbyangs mno//
558a2(dkon brtsegs): shig ces bskul lo// de dag kyang pha rol gyi dmag nye bar gnas pa de dang phan tshun mi mthus pas 'bros so// de dag kyang mi mthun pas skye mched kyi grong khyer
558a3(dkon brtsegs): de zhig nas/ rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po de lus kyi grong khyer bor te yul phyogs nas bros so// rnam par shes pa zos nas lus dang dbang po'i tshogs khams kyi sbrul gyi
558a4(dkon brtsegs): gang bas skye mched drug ni gnas/ bdag po med pa yid brtan du mi rung ba'i lus kyi grong khyer 'jig par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyal pos
558a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong khyer bos/ lus kyi gzhan yongs su 'dzin par byed do// de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di rgyal po ltar blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyal bas 'di skad
558a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pas bsod dam sul bar mchi ba 'am/ bsod nams mgags par nye bar 'chi ba'ab/ mi g.yo bar che bar mchi ba 'a/
558a7(dkon brtsegs): mig sngo ba che bar che gA'i sgras 'i lta rab tu 'tshul/ rnam pa zlas pa 'di 'i dkyis bdun gisas 'di snyos su nam dra la das/ rnam par shes pa
558a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis bdag lus 'di yongs su btang ngam/ mi btang sum du'i sar rab tu 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po 'di sa ste dper na/ skyes
558b1(dkon brtsegs): nas par 'a'o sa/ ldan m+mA du gyun/ rgyu pa dang / mtshan pa rgyu sa rgyung mar byu snang thugs pa
558b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mardzangs pang / 'dzin pa dang / na sbyin gyis bug med dang / sgras ma po'i rgya numam kyi brnam ma 'dzugs minas/ d-id mau ma shing gdong pa ngas
558b3(dkon brtsegs): min/ ram kyi'ajam du byin par gyu // chu bo'i byung rab du 'jigs pa de mam tha sa/ gci ma de sangapa' ba brgya / ba'idas 'dis padag mngon po di
558b4(dkon brtsegs): las rnam ta snyam bsams nas/ gzings de la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ gzings de bar rab tu mchod pa byas so// drang srong chen po de bzhin du/ gang bsod rabs
558b5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i sems can 'di nas shi 'phos pa de'i rnam par zhes de 'di snyam du sems te/ lus 'dis bdagA bde 'gro lnga dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung ba dang ldan pa pa/ dngas
558b6(dkon brtsegs): don yod par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ lus 'dis bdag ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal te/ 'dis ltar skye ba'i gnas yongs su bzung ngo zhes 'di ltar lum
558b7(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba bskyed nas/ bdag gis 'di la mchod pa legs par bya'o mam mo// khyis lus de gzings bzhin du bau nas/ 'jig rten pa rol tu 'dzin//
558b8(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis bsod nams ma byas de'i rnam par shes pa de ni ji ltar skyes bu gzings rgyal pas/ mtsho chen po de'i nang du 'byin ning rig sde/ ma rung bar gyur nas sras zungs
559a1(dkon brtsegs): nyam thag pa/ gzings nig pa des 'jigs bzhin du 'gram du phyin nas kyang seng ge dang sdug yod pa'i 'jigs par phyin par gyur
559a2(dkon brtsegs): nus de 'di skad ces zer ro// gzings rul par nyon mongs kyi steng du log par song nas mtsho chen po chu'i rlabs kyis dkrugs pa/ sbrul gyis rmongs par
559a3(dkon brtsegs): so nas gzings de la de skad smra'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di bsod nams ma yin pa byas pa'i lus la brten pas ngan song gi sar song nas lus de la 'di skad
559a4(dkon brtsegs): ces zer ro// sdig pa'i lus 'dis ci zhig rnyeng na sdig pa can gyi lus mngon par grub nas bdag khur lta bus rngon par gyur/ bdag lus rul pa 'di'i rgyus ngan song
559a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par phyogs shing zhugs te/ mchil bas nyan zin pa bzhin no snyam mo// de ltar rnam par shes pa de legs par byas pa'i bsod nams kyis gzings
559a6(dkon brtsegs): gzang po bzhin du 'khor ba las brgal bar byed do// bsod nams ma yin pas ni log par lhung bar byed do// de ltar na rnam par shes pas bsod nams su nye bar 'gro
559a7(dkon brtsegs): badrang / bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i lus rnam pa 'di gnyis rab tu shes so// yang rnam par shes pas lus 'di yongs su btang nas/ gzhan lus
559a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis par 'gro zhing lte bar 'gro'o// de mangs na gnas pa'i ma/ nag bdun gyi bar du shes pas bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'dir 'ongs so// las 'ang byas
559b1(dkon brtsegs): mang bdag gis las 'di byas so nas de dran nas/ dri legs par byas pa'i las kyi dga' bzhin du 'char// de rnam na gnas pa na da'i mal mtshan mya gsum zung na/
559b2(dkon brtsegs): gsupa gshen/ 'dam zhing / ro bzhin rnaM pa ma yin padang / ban me la dgal bur 'gyur cing/ nang pa gsas pashA sa
559b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lan lan du mar chub pa dang / dag sa / ba dang rab tu mdzes pa ste/ bsod nams mu bar 'dra ba'i rnam par shes pa ma'i mang ma ru ngas pa'in
559b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs das byur b.la'o// drang srung can blo gang bam rnamam ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pas skyes par gyur pa na ga bdun gyi bung du bdag rnas
559b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dir skyes so// sdig pa'i las ni 'di byas so nas des bu ngan par 'gyur ro// de de la budran nas yid mi bde bsgre'o// yid mi bde ba skyes pa de'i ma stsams pa du
559b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bltas te/ lus dri mi nim par 'gyur ba dang / lus ring par 'gyur ba dang / lus la sems pas khyad par 'gyur ba dang / yang dang yang du bzhin khro gnyer sdung
559b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / gang tshun cad sems can de mngal du skyes par gyur pa de tshun cad khyim der nyon mongs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nang mang por 'gyur ro// sems can
559b8(dkon brtsegs): de btsas pa'i tshe yang na ni 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ yang nir bdag nyid mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma rung bar 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po de lta bu ni bsod
560a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pas lte bar 'gro ba'i sems can du blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di gad ces gsom to// bcom ldan
560a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di la rnam par shes pa de thog ma mngal du skyes pa'i tshe/ ci dran ci rnam par shes par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po 'di la
560a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa thog ma skyes pa'i tshe/ 'di lta bu dran par gyur te kun dga' ra ba dang / skyes mos tshal dang / nags tshal dang / rdzing dang ldam dang / gser gyi gnas /
560a4(dkon brtsegs): khang mthong zhing 'dzam bu'i gling 'di skye bo 'dza' ba 'du bas gang ba dang / mchog tu yid du 'ong ba'i bsod nams byed pa'i sems can gyis bang bar mthong ngo /
560a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i snang bas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma rjes su ngan no// rjes su dran ning rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba bskyed de/ 'di ni skye ba lnga brgyar bdag gi mar gyur te nas
560a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rab tu shes te/ de ltar rjes su dran nas ma de la chags par mi byed cing 'dod chags dang bral ba snyed de/ kye ma'o 'di ltar yang skye ba dang / 'byung ba ni sdug bstsal
560a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bas ni chog go// yongs su 'dzin pa 'dis kyang chog go sam mo// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
560a8(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can de mi chags na/ 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang po
560b1(dkon brtsegs): d+hA ma na/ rnam par gas pa TI gzugs med pa/ ban du ma ga/ snang ba myeng phyum// ga rnam par gas pa'i 'ams chags pa
560b2(dkon brtsegs): ba mi / na ma / ma rnamams pa bdag seMm pa 'a sgyu
560b3(dkon brtsegs): cheng ni de myur 'gyur ro// nga chen po de dag ni 'di sar phye/ rnam par shes pa gang de sar sems pa na rnam par shes pa'i nas che ba ba
560b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhes che bas ni mi nus so// rnam par shes pa ni tshor bar byed pa/ rnam par shes pa ni sems sa// drang srong chen po khyod kyis rnam par shes pa de de ltar khong du chud par byan/
560b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ngagra rnams thams cad shin du srung // nyon mongs stsogs par byed pa po// shes
560b6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes shes pa po// shes rab dang ni gti mug ldan// lnga dang nga rgyal ma rig dang // rnam par shes pa kun la yod// rnam par shes pa med pa ni// gang yang 'drub
560b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa med par ni// de dag 'du bar mi 'gyur te// cig car gyur na 'dra bar 'gyur// gcig min 'khor lo shing rta bzhin// skyes bu mnyam
560b8(dkon brtsegs): 'du ba ni nyid dang gnan dang gnyi gas min// gcig gis ma yin gzhan gyis min// glang gnyis ji lta bzhin du'o// shing rta sA rgyud gnyis dang no// 'khor
561a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis smrasman padang // na padag dris bcings byas pa// sing rnams ni yongs su grags// de sar chum kyi shing \u0f7fdang / khams kyi 'dra brjod
561a2(dkon brtsegs): las 'byung // de las dbang po ldan gyur te// rnam par shes pas rab tu bstan// gnang dang mtshams su sbyor ba dang // de ltar rtsa dang mjid chung dang // sna dang rus paso dang
561a3(dkon brtsegs): sen mo pags pas mdog byas deng // rgyu ma tho ba mkhal ma dang // snying dang mcher pa cil bu dag/ thams cad mnyam du 'dus pa las// lus ni shin tu gnas pa yin/
561a4(dkon brtsegs): de la khams nI lus chen te// sems las dngos po kun 'byung bas// de phyir rnam par shes kyir 'dod// de ni kha lo sbyar bar 'dod// drang srong chen po gzhan yang rnam par
561a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'di ni/ phra ba gzugs med pa bskrun tu med pa/ mi mngor ba ste/ li ni kha dog dang / dbyibs dang gzugs kyi dbang po ma yin no// dbang po rigs pa bor
561a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin rnam par shes par blta pa gnan med de/ mi'i snying 'bar ba dang / 'jigs gang las byung ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang dpyod pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni
561a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa shes pasgris che ba yin gyi/ lus kyi shasan+te ba min+d+ra / lum nas rna bam min n+do// de nas bcom ldan 'das li nga stong chen po rnas pas 'dzim
561a8(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi rang bzhin rje sar bas par bgyi/ sems can dmyal bar nye bar mche ba dang / yi dgas su nye bar
561b1(dkon brtsegs): sa sa ra / na sa sa
561b2(dkon brtsegs): da kyi sa nas pa ky-i mas nga ma m+bu/ me sa yang sa rnam
561b3(dkon brtsegs): phyi nga / su g+ho dang / yi dgus sa skye bar 'gyur ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis nga brtan du gsol/ zitsam snar 'das kyi bkur sbru pa/ rlung med
561b4(dkon brtsegs): khyong sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / 'chi 'pho dang rtse ba tshan cig/ yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i yum 'di ni mngon pa mashes pa la
561b5(dkon brtsegs): yul ma yin no// 'di ni lha rnams dang tshungs pa las sogs pa 'og sbyin la thug pa rnams kyi ma yin te/ 'di ni nyan thos kyi thabs cad ma yin na/ sems can gnam
561b6(dkon brtsegs): kyista ga la yin/ drang stong rnon po gang dri ma gsum spangs pa chos nyid dang po thob pa/ nga'i bas nang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul ni yin te/ des
561b7(dkon brtsegs): drang sring thams kyini ma yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / drang srong chen po rgyus pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 'di spyad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad
561b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni rgas 'khogs gtugs pas 'bras bu rnams la brtsal ba'i rngo mi thog go// bdag khur chen po bkur ba'i rngo mi thog go// bdag nga bcom ldan 'das da
562a1(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / thab thams cad spangs pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// bdag/ deng sran cang slob ma dang bcas g.yog dang bcas
562a2(dkon brtsegs): te gsum la skyabs su mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba gang du 'gyur ba de bshang du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
562a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das drang skyong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / las gang yin pa ngas
562a4(dkon brtsegs): shang // drang srong chen po 'di la me tog dang / spos dang / 'bring ba sbyin pa dang / bsnyen pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pa dang / dang bdang ldan pa'i skyes
562a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'chi ba'i dus b+h+yas ras 'drad stegs kyi lha'i nang du zlar// nga zung rje pong 'chi 'i dus kyin/ de'i byas dri btu ni mapa'i thos kyis bsgom pa'i mchomadun
562a6(dkon brtsegs): dun po// dang srong chen po de la me tog gi char mang po btu bablanas che ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/ de'i lus la me ga ma chog sa rab cu 'thor bar 'gyur/
562a7(dkon brtsegs): hU~MhU~M ming du gyu pa gang yinA pa de dag kyang / mi tig zugs shing lung byed par 'gyur/ ba zhir gyi ma sgyum par bad+d+ha/ sa rlung 'dum ba pa
562a8(dkon brtsegs): gyib ma ma mas pa gyur/ galal par ma'i dzis
562b1(dkon brtsegs): du smra sa kyang mthong par 'gyur / 'ang pa bca bsgrupa ma tog tu rtogs rab tu sbyangs pa/ mchog rdu dang pas mdzes par byas pa/ chung med du rdzos
562b2(dkon brtsegs): bskor bri/ mthong nas ca lag rnams la 'di skad ces smras te/ bdag gis rmyi lam na khang pa brtsegs pa/ lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lnga ldi snangs
562b3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ lha'i me tog bkram pa/ bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba/ de lta bya mthong ngo zhes bdag gi rtsa lag de dgra la smras nas/ de dag gis kyang 'phreng thogs kyi lha
562b4(dkon brtsegs): nad skye bar rig go// de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'breng thom kyi lha'i nang duts+tsha ba ma/ ma dang ma 'dus pa mthong nas skye ba yongs su 'dzin to// 'phreng ba thogs pa de dag
562b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis spong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi bzhin no// de la de dag gi rnam par shes byan tshun 'dres shing dga' ba tsam gyis non pas
562b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ de dag khu ba 'byung ba ni ma yin no// drang srong chen po lha de dag ni lha mos mngal na nag bdun gi bar du 'dzin to// zhig bdun 'das nas dku g.yas pa nas 'byung
562b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo // drang srong chen po de de'i mngal nas byung nas/ lha'i me tog dri rab tu zhim pa mchog tu yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs brgyus pa'i 'phreng ba 'brang ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dra
562b8(dkon brtsegs): chen po de'i 'phreng ba dri rab tu nim pa'i dang rlung gis bangs nas phyogs kun tu dpag tshad tsam du 'gro'o// 'phreng ba de la kha dog bdun yod pa 'di lta ste dkar po dang / dmar
563a1(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang /
563a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdongan po dang / bai DUr+ya dang rma dang / bdU ga las lhag pa ste/ blta na sdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba de dag gi gnas de ma shi'i bar du mi ngas
563a3(dkon brtsegs): par thogs par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de 'phreng thogs zhes bya'o// drang srong chen po 'phreng thogs lha de dag gi gnas de na/ shing ljon pa ha cang yang mi rib ha cang yang mi thung ba
563a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu sna tshogs ha cang yang mi sbyar/ bcang yang mi mngangal bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba'i ro bro ba mang po bzang po// lnga'i ro bro ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dag yod do// drang rdzo
563a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po gang du ngan ngan/ shing tig zil btsam mo// de dag gi nang nas la rnams gang zlab 'dod pa'i zas de dang de dgas nye bar gnas te/ s+ya de dag ni 'bras brabs
563a6(dkon brtsegs): bsa'i/ khams kyis za ba'i bas can ni ma yin no// drang srong chen po lnga de dag gis phyogs ni rab tu rno ba'i tshor nga'i bag med pa/ me tog gis mdzes par byas pa
563a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshug seng gis khebs pa/ gas ngang chud dum kyi 'drang ba snga tshogs kyis mangs par byas pa/ ya ras ser bas zung byung ba'o// nga srong chen po gnas den
563a8(dkon brtsegs): chabardigs pa'i sgra'i rgyam ba rgyu' bar ba'i gos dang / rgyan mamar rung dpa Sh+Ta dang bu 'i ngas la grub zang ba dang song ba de ba'i tshig nga na padag pas
563a9(dkon brtsegs): ma 'i ma ma pa po// dang pa sal 'byung ba sa 'du 'dzu las ni ma sa thang
563b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam ma bang gru mas ngas nam papa' ba da pa ra/ 'thung ba ma rnaM ma par ma tshang bar 'gyur/ lha'i 'a gan gyi

563b3(dkon brtsegs): sa rlung khye 'i shing nga / rlu ga dang 'bras bus mdzes par byas bu dang / lha'i bu ba'i tshogs dang 'dri ba yongs su bti nas bzo rnams zang bar 'gyur

563b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// 'di ltar snying la dag pa skyes shing 'khod 'khod pa las mi 'dod bzhi na dung bang med par mtho ris nas lhung ngam/ e ma'o lha gno nung myur du bye mi'i 'jig rten du skye

564a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // nags tshal snga tshogs stug po nyams dga' ba 'dod par 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ lus len pa med par mngal na 'dzin par 'gyur
564a2(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam na bsod nams sna tshogs kyi tshong 'dus me tog gi 'breng ba srungs pa'i grong khyer mthong ste/ 'di dag ni de'i mas las mthong ba'o// drang srong chen po gzhan yang lhag na
564a3(dkon brtsegs): de btsas nas/ phreng ba thogs pa'i skalas shi 'phos pab shin du dga' cu'o// gos dkar po la dga' bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ shes pa dang mi ldan
564a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur 'dod la rab tu chags shing 'gro ba dang / rgyu ba 'phyar ba gcan dang / dus ston na/ ltang mo dang phra ba'i gos la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ kun dga'i rab

564a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa/ drang srong chen po gtan yang rgyam chen ba'i ma rnaMs kyi snar sde ba'i stas dang 'chi'abo ba'i las su blta ba ni drang srong che pa 'angs /

564b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// de lus yongs su btang nas rnam par shes pa de rab tu dga' bar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du sbed mos tshal dang nags

564b6(dkon brtsegs): tog sna tshogs dri dang ldan pa'i rlung rjes su 'thun pa ldang bAr/ de shi nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang na pha ma 'dus nas/ skyed mos tshal na rtse zhing 'dod pa myong

565a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis spras shing mdzes par byas pa/ lha mo brgya stong gis legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i gnas mtho ba/ rang bzhin gyis mdzes pa reg bde ba'i rlung ldang

569b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag yang tshol bab pa/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ num gser gyi bum pa lngar 'dril ba/ mchu pad+ma 'dra ba dag dang / gnal med khang che po dang // shing
569b2(dkon brtsegs): bdus bcos mA gudang/ yas bachags pas mdzes par byas pa/ bung med drug khri lang long du gyur ba/ 'di dag la rdo cong gyes par mdzod ci kyis 'a
569b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gnas pi l+r-ing dang / gling du dang / rdza rnga dang / cang te'u dang / glung byangs 'byung ba de dag na/ lha'i gding bas mdzes par byas pa'i seng po'i khri mthong

570b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod chen po dag na de dag gi skyed mos tshal dang / nags tshal gyi gam yin/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thig les rnam par bkra ba'i snod mngon par 'asgrub se/ rtswa'i bu

570b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ste/ de ni de dag gi sbyin pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi rnam par smin par blta ste// gang gis sngar sbyin pa byin la/ phyis 'gyod par gyur pa'i

575b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par zhugs pa na/ 'bru mar gyis gtor ba lta bu byung ngo // nges 'bru mar gyis gtor pa de mthong nas snying dngangs sAg se/ rdzing bu de nas byung nas
576a1(dkon brtsegs): nags stug por rgyug cing bros so// de rings par 'gro ba'i bu mo de dag gis mthong nas/ phyi bzhin du 'brangs pa dang / de nags stug po de'i nang na na
576a2(dkon brtsegs): drung zhig 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu mo dag snying rje rje skad du/ gachang bar du zhing 'di skad ces jo co bdag cag bor te/ gcig du shing drung 'di na ji dga' zhes 'dzer to// de du
576a3(dkon brtsegs): ni ngang man pa'i sgras 'di skad ces smras so// bdag 'di ni sngon ma byung 'bru mar gyis gtor ba lta bu lus las byung ngo zhes de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan khung gnyis nas rdul byung
576a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de dag gis rdul byung ba mthong ba dang / lha'i bu de dag ring du song ste yongs su spang so// des yongs su spangs par shes nas/ mya ngan gyis reg go/ de mya bgyis reg pas
576a5(dkon brtsegs): dbugs drag tu rgyu'o// dbugs rgyu ba'i rgyus lus la gdung ba skyes so// de lus dang sems dadungs pas pas/ me tog gi thong sngon rnying mi srid pa'ang mi rnying / 'phreng ba yang yo/
576a6(dkon brtsegs): surnying / sngon rnyings myi sring pa'i gos kyang rnying / lha'i gding ba bting ba'i mal na nyal yang dga' ba mi rnyed de// / de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas kyis
576a7(dkon brtsegs): na par shes nas/ de'i dri de myi bzod de ring du spangs nas/ snying rje rje skad ga par bdag la dbang med par du'o// 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen mas rab tu ngu zhing / kyi hud
576a8(dkon brtsegs): lus mchog shin tu 'jam pa/ lha'i skyed mos tshal dang / nags tshal na rgyu ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gling na ngur pa dang 'dra ba/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs na/ ngang pa'i rgya
576b1(dkon brtsegs): da rgyag n+d+ha kA sh+tsash+tsam+b+ha ma/ rnyeng thas sa sa 'dus banos dang/ skyed mas rgya lan drung bas r+dz+dza dang / 'angs pa
576b2(dkon brtsegs): matog kun nan sa bu ba gcag par te gar song / ga na gnas shes 'jeran cing bdag la dbang med par du'o// de bdag la dbang med par rims nad kyis bad ba ste/
576b3(dkon brtsegs): rims nang nges lus dang sems bklags nas/ 'dron po 'dzin po mang po dang bral te/ 'brog tshol ba dang mtshungs/ lam grogs gru ba zhig pa dang 'drar/ rgyal po ma
576b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi nor bu stor ba dang mtshungs/ re zhig pa dang 'dra bar mi rtag pa'i rlung gis gtor nas/ lus su'i steng na 'dre ldog ste/ nam lding gi mchus klu gzhon nu zin pa dang
576b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar 'das bzhin du myur bar thal mo sbyar nas/ lha'i bu mo de dag lce gsol ba btab pa/ chur shog lag pa'i thal mos nga'i lus la reg par gyis shes skyong 'dar la/
576b6(dkon brtsegs): gdungs bzhin du de smre sngogs 'don cing gsol ba btab pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag gis bltas mi nye bar spangs te/ yan lag la reg par lhag la byed kyi/ me ton
576b7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi yal ga thogs te/ 'chi 'phro bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i bu de'i snying kar bzhag nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzeran to// mtho ris kyi bsod nams yongs su nyams te/
576b8(dkon brtsegs): myur du 'jam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes de skang smras pa dang / lha'i bu de bdag lus kyis yongs su btang bar nas/ kyi hud kyi hud ces sna tshor sring rje rje skad dudu
577a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing kye ma'o mtho ris lha'i gnas 'di lta'i yo byang dang // rgyan dang skyed mos tshul mchog na rtse ba rjes su myong zhing lha'i bu mo 'di dag la
577a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sdug par bsams pa las/ de bdag 'chi ba'i dus la phyogs shing zhugs pa'i tshe/ de dag nye bar mi gnas shing / 'di skad ces khyod 'dzam pa
577a3(dkon brtsegs): gling du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to snyam nas/ yang dang yang du bdag gis gnas la lta zhing sa la 'gyel nas/ snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/ kyi
577a4(dkon brtsegs): hud dga' tshal dang / 'dres tshal dang / ar mo ni ga ltar 'jam pa'i rdo le ba dang / kyi hud lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs dang / sheng yongs 'du dang / rnam par
577a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzes pa dang / dga' tshal dang skyed mo'i tshul dang / rdzing bu dang / gzhal med khang dam bsgo mang po 'di dag dang / lha'i yul pa'i lha'i gnas 'di dag tho
577a6(dkon brtsegs): to// da ni mtho ris kyi ga yang sa gonas gdon mi za bar ltung ngo zhes skrag par skyes nas/ de rang gi gnas la lta zhing / kyi hud bdag 'dza' bo byams pa
577a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa 'chir nyen ci'i phyir mi swa/ 'di ltar nga ni nga 'khor ba'i 'grog dgon pa dgongs mal ring por chas kyis/ tshur shog la khyad/ b+his ngas kyang khyo/
577a8(dkon brtsegs): mimathong / khyod kyis kyang 'dim mthong ngo // kyi chung mtho sa 'di nas pasod nas kyi 'bras bu zang pas/ 'pho bar 'gyur ba'ing/ bdag mun po sa bra snang ngo //
577b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzangs 'di skyong ngam/ 'di na yang rol mdong sil spyan kyang mi len tam/ de dag gi sgra yang mi skrag go// lus kyi nyes pas bdag ni 'di gas par gyur to zhes des du smras na
577b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ste sngags 'dzin to// d+ha mthongs dang de bas mangs par byas na/ gang mi gsong ba'i lha'i 'khor du 'gro ba dang / bris yang de mthong bar 'gyur ba ni bsod nams na'o//
577b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas skyes pa'i me tog nga'i klang pa la 'dug pa ci'i phyir rnyis zhes/ lha'i bu des smras pa dang / lha'i bu sems dman pa dri ma med pa'i rnanA'i gdu bu mgul pa thogs
577b4(dkon brtsegs): med de dag thams cad me tog khyer te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ lha'i bu brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing / lha mo bde stsogs dang / lha modag phyi bzhin 'brang / mi sbyin gyi bu dang / sbyin
577b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang / sna tshogs rgyun dang / gtsug bud lnga pa dang / dum bu ru la sogs pa lha dang / dri za rnams lha'i klu'i dbyangs len cing 'dod pa dag gis ltas lnga po des nyam thag par gyur mthong nas/ snying
577b6(dkon brtsegs): rje bskyed de/ nga ro gcig tu kyi hud mi rtag pa/ 'di ni rab tu drag cing mi bzang ngo zhes tshig smra'o// lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis kyang lha'i bu de la bltas nas/ tshangs
577b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so// mchog go l+la'i bu bdag cag thams cad kyi 'gro ba'ang 'di 'jas/ sred par ma byed/ ngan 'gror ma
577b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas shig/ lha'i bu de dag gis dbyangs gcig tu sbas pa/ grogs po dge ba byed pa'i 'jig rten mi'i 'jig rten du song zhig ce byas pa dang / lha'i dag ni ngar 'chis dag na
578a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mo sbyar nus lnga mang po dag la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// bdag ni 'chi 'pho ba'i dus nye bar gnas kyis// lha'i bu thams cad bdag/
578a2(dkon brtsegs): la bzod par mdzod cig/ de'i cha shugs ring du phyung nas/ lngas gnyis 'byung ste/ mig pad+ma'i lo ma lta bur gyur pa dang / rgyan thams cad mi snang bar bya
578a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas lnga'i bu de dag gis rgyan mi sdang bar gyur pa mthong nas/ me tog man nga ra ba dang / pad+ma las sogs pas mngon gtor/ phi wang dang / gling bu dang
578a4(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan gyisgra yang byas nas/ rgyun de dag kyang lhas bsdus par mthong nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling la dga' bskyed de/ de mchi ma zag cing ga chad par du
578a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'chi ba'i dus kyis chos sbyor ro// // lha'i bsod nams dang tshe yongs su bzad nas// rlung drag po langs so// rlung drir ba ban
578a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan rjes de'i lus la phog nas gtor te/ lha'i bya da gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro// gnas de nas 'pho ba na lus kyi gnas mi shes so//
578a7(dkon brtsegs): de gnas de nas 'phos nas/ mir skye ba yongs su len to// mir skyes te ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ mal mtshan mar blta ba ni/ de nyid gru dang gar
578a8(dkon brtsegs): che ba dang / dgod pa mi dga' ba'i dbang bar#/ me chog dang 'bras bu dang / 'jigs chags 'char ba'ogs 'chang ba
578b1(dkon brtsegs): yang tha la nga gyur/ dem ma la pa rnam 'dod pa'i nga 'grus sa pa pa smra
578b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhim pa'i rgyu lugs la dga' bar 'gyur// gtsad log na yang rmilaman lha 'angon brtul ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de mngal na gnas
578b3(dkon brtsegs): nA phrin nam lag pa'i tshulam mthong du// bca' ba'i ngas na 'dud chags dang she sdang dang / gnyis ga rnams bcas te/ da gzugs pa
578b4(dkon brtsegs): sa pa ma las 'a m+b+ha/ sa
578b5(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i lba bu/ so grags bzang ba/ shin tu 'jam pa'i lus so// de gcig tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la chags par 'gyur
578b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags
578b7(dkon brtsegs): babyu du// gos thabs papa' ba/ skyed mos tshal la dga' ba/ dzi dang rol mo la dga' bar 'gyur ro// deg ser nga ra rnams cad rtsor pa'i dzi
578b8(dkon brtsegs): por skyes te/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la dga' bar 'gyur ro//
578b9(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'dod pa la shin du chagasanas/
578b10(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / tshul khrims la dga' bar gyur na/
578b11(dkon brtsegs): sa ma sa cheng mam mams
579a1(dkon brtsegs): / bla rnams la song pa dang / hacang sngob yang ma yin pa dang / ha cang dkar ba yang ma yin pa dang /
579a2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo thams cad dga' ba dang / gnan gyi chung ma la chags shing / bdag gi rlung ma mi lta ba dang / rtsa lag gi skye bo la dga' bar 'gyur ro/
579a3(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris nas shi phos pa'i ltas byung ba'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
579a4(dkon brtsegs): skul nus/ cher ba rgyas pa dang / drang srong chen po dadag dang / klu dang meng/ sem yin dang / rna
579a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'jig rten yid sa / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // daphags pa na namachog
579a6(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// drang srong rgyas pas nus pa'i le'u
579a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ bani bcu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// / mang+ga yaM/
